name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000001
text: Philipas' Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000002
text: The monsters' attacks are becoming more violent. {nl} I'm determined to succeed, but I also fear for our safety.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000003
text: It doesn't matter - I can give up my life today, or be a dead man tomorrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000004
text: Commander Vacenin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000005
text: Somehow, we need to resolve our poor supplies and forces. {nl}Once we accomplish that we will be able to break through the forest, piece by piece.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000006
text: Even though everyone's getting tired, we can't give up until Kateen Forest is ours again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000007
text: Senior Officer Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000008
text: I wish for a peaceful world. {nl}In order for this to happen, I need to work harder.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000009
text: I'll do anything to regain this forest from the monsters. {nl} It's worth risking my life for.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000010
text: Our front line is composed exclusively of Philipas' troops. {nl} They'll follow Philipas' commands through anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000011
text: Live with the idea that any moment could become your last. {nl} We must learn from the past and use it to our advantage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000012
text: Officer Felix

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000013
text: The Entrance of Kateen Forest is rather on the safe side, but please refrain from going any deeper than this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000014
text: Weak Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000015
text: My power is slowly weakening. {nl} Even though there are many souls that need guidance...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000016
text: Scared Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000017
text: The holy power of the forest is weakening. {nl} What will happen to us after it's gone?!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000018
text: It's too scary. {nl}This never happened when the goddess was still around...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000019
text: Sincere Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000020
text: This forest is cursed... it consumes the owls. {nl} I have hardly anything to compel bravery from others.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000021
text: Ever since that huge tree suddenly arose, this forest has changed into something horrid. {nl} Even the trees' roots frighten whoever stares at them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000022
text: Devoted Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000023
text: Someone was held captive. {nl} I have a feeling he's going to disappear...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000024
text: The sacred force created by the goddess has not completely disappeared. {nl}Will it be able to suppress this devastation? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000025
text: The chief gave me power.{nl}I won't be scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000026
text: I'm not going to be afraid anymore. I will never be eaten by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000027
text: Troubled Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000028
text: I'm suffering every day.{nl}Perhaps, I will also be eaten by monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000029
text: This forest is increasingly covered with demons.{nl}Where is the goddess?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000030
text: I was chosen by the chief... {nl} I'll do my best to defeat the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000031
text: The chief is also struggling like this...{nl}Never will I be eaten until the goddess comes back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000032
text: Subordinate Owl 3

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000033
text: We have always been here at this place, but where is the goddess who has always looked after us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000034
text: Do we exist only for guiding humans' souls?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000035
text: Soldier Dominic

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000036
text: I've been ordered to protect this place with my life and to do some reconnaissance at the same time.{nl}I don't know exactly what they expect me to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000037
text: Next time I'm going to make sure they tell me exactly what they want me to do.{nl}No. wouldn't it be better to ask Julian?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000038
text: If it's just monsters of that level, I guess I can report that there is no serious problem.{nl}Oh, if you happen to run into Samson, please tell him to stop fooling around and continue scouting.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000039
text: I will protect this area, so go patrol Veltui Crossroads.{nl}As for the reports, I will do them separately at a later time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000040
text: Soldier Samson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000041
text: Can you please help me find Dominic's engagement ring? {nl} I'm currently undertaking a mission, so I won't be able to leave this spot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000042
text: I tell you, he acts like that even though I bought him a roughly similar one. So stingy...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000043
text: What is this ugly thing? Oh, could the ring be inside?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000044
text: A knife won't fit inside, and there's no other way to get it out.{nl}Right! Can't we burn it to retrieve what's inside?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000045
text: Just make sure to bring me ones that aren't too thick.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000046
text: This should be just right.{nl}Good. Now, how do I burn this while I am working and not get caught?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000047
text: There should be plenty of Dry Thorn Forest Wood at the edge of Ishisineti Cliff. {nl} I'm on patrol and don't have time, so I ask of you again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000048
text: Ah, you should be able to burn it secretly at the top of Ishisineti Cliff. {nl} This is my last request. You just need to make preparations for the fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000049
text: I will never again care for another's wedding ceremony.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000050
text: I'll just say I have to go to the bathroom and burn it secretly there.{nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000051
text: Soldier Poulter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000052
text: My goodness, the order states to eliminate all of the monsters in this area!{nl}How am I supposed to handle this many enemies all by myself?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000053
text: It was too overwhelming to carry out the task just by myself.{nl}However, I'm really fortunate since you decided to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000054
text: I could almost cry my eyes out!{nl}Thank you very much for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000055
text: Commander Julian

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000056
text: Thanks for the help! {nl} If it's okay with you, I'd like to borrow some more of your strength.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000057
text: Won't you support Commander O'Rourke's unit at the Veltui Crossroads?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000058
text: Commander O'Rourke

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000059
text: Very impressive.{nl}Looks like I'll have to buy Julian a drink.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000060
text: It occurred to me while watching Ironbaum. {nl} What an exceptional companion it could be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000061
text: O'Rourke's unit has been exhausted through big and small battles with Ironbaum.{nl}It would be very reassuring if you could become our strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000062
text: Substitute Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000063
text: I want to help purify the thorny forest, but I'm not strong enough. Could you eliminate the Tree Ghouls bothering the soldiers?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000064
text: It would be nice if more people could come and go using this road like before.{nl}I find people very interesting.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000065
text: Thank you. I hope I'm not giving you needless trouble all because of my aspirations.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000066
text: Alright. We haven't received any word from our forces at Niurus Highway.{nl}I request you find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000067
text: If you can't find them, return to us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000068
text: Soldier Kallus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000069
text: There are still a few of our colleagues further in.{nl}Please help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000070
text: Soldier Dainus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000071
text: Ironbaum attacked us at the Drieza Waterland.{nl}There are still soldiers left that have not yet escaped.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000072
text: I'm embarrassed to have escaped by myself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000073
text: Settled Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000074
text: I have something to ask from you.{nl}I'm worried about the soldiers who are being hurt by the Ravinelarvae.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000075
text: Thank you.{nl}From now on, can our soldiers work comfortably?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000076
text: I appreciate your kind help.{nl}One day, I will return this favor when I meet your soul form.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000077
text: Are you the famous Revelator?{nl}Good, I'm puzzled with something. I need your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000078
text: Ah, now I've received the order.{nl}Return to Commander Julian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000079
text: I'm collecting information about Ironbaum.{nl}In order to reach the Gateway of the Great King, we have to defeat this monster first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000080
text: Thank you.{nl}Come back after taking this order to Poulter at Zaizda Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000081
text: Give me back the good old times.{nl} When there were no thorns.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000082
text: If the path to the Gateway of the Great King is safe then I will be able to see more people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000083
text: Over all this time, I've seen it all.{nl}Now, I want only joy to be seen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000084
text: Why do human souls contain so many things?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000085
text: If we run into monsters, we'll have no choice but to fight.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000086
text: We're working to reach the Gateway of the Great King.{nl}Have you heard the news about Ironbaum?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000087
text: In order to be a group leader, you need unwavering principles.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000088
text: It's true that trying to reach the Gateway of the Great King is reckless.{nl}However, we can't disobey the order.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000089
text: It may seem bad at first, but the two commanders have a surprisingly good relationship.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000090
text: I feel so lonely since no one is here.{nl}It's been a long time since I met new faces.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000091
text: What do you want to do here in this empty forest? No way, the way is available?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000092
text: Thank you.{nl}The soldiers and my colleagues will now be able to sleep comfortably.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000093
text: I can't feel my arms and legs.{nl}I feel so strange even though It's not cold.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000094
text: We must defeat Gaigalas.{nl}Otherwise, I won't be able to sleep in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000095
text: We will start the hunt for Gaigalas soon.{nl}I'm so excited.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000096
text: This grudge is so sad.{nl}It's sad that we are powerless to stop it either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000097
text: Losses will continue unless somebody stops the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000098
text: Joint Investigation Unit Member Frey

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000099
text: I'm Frey.{nl}Listening to the story, the situation sounds bad.{nl}If the information you and Scott researched is correct.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000100
text: {nl}Then, I will have to do something.{nl}Please defeat some Red Vubbes first. They have been bothering me lately.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000101
text: Please, I ask of you...{nl}I get sick just looking at the red color.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000102
text: Oh, did you really defeat them for me?{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000103
text: I got something after talking with Scott.{nl}Something like a moving Woodsman piece of tree sculpture.{nl}Is it somehow related with the bark of a tree that the Vubbes got?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000104
text: By the way, there is still no news from Scott about a second report.{nl}I wonder what happened to him? Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000105
text: Wow, great!{nl}I owe you one. Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000106
text: Right? So I will ask you.{nl}Woodsmen are appearing on the Deer Hoot Site along with the left side of the path.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000107
text: I will take this combined result of the information Scott gave me and this fragment to my superior. {nl}By the way, There is still no news from Scott. Even the time Scott promised has long since passed. Just using the hearsay is not enough for the other investigator?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000108
text: Could you pick up the report from Scott?{nl}Do not forget to scold him for skipping work!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000109
text: Please handle Scott's report. Okay?{nl}Sometimes, he is stupid, but he is also cute.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000110
text: I have no face. Nowadays, I have been investigating everywhere to find something..{nl}Thanks a lot. If you are not..{nl}Ah, I don't want to think about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000111
text: Oops, there's no time for this.{nl}I'm sorry, Please give it to Frey instead of me.{nl}I don't know where to start to clean the mess that Vubbes did..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000112
text: Ah, it is the report! {nl}Good, and what was Scott doing?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000113
text: Really? He couldn't handle a single Vubbe and got in trouble instead.{nl}Such a shame..I will scold him later!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000114
text: Everything is messy. {nl}I can not concentrate as the Vubbes.{nl}He must laugh, If he look at it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000115
text: Joint Investigation Unit Member Frey

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000116
text: It is still in progress to find the truth of the events.{nl}Take it. It's a soul collection scroll.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000117
text: Once you defeat the Red Vubbe using this scroll, the soul of Vubbe should be out?{nl}I'll have you collect it for me. Then, the data are almost done.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000118
text: Do not forget the order.{nl}You have to defeat the Red Vubbes after using the soul collection scroll on them. Alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000119
text: About the bark of a tree that the Vubbe got.{nl}I think I can combine it using something like a spirit..{nl}Well, Please tell this news to Ukirt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000120
text: Joint Investigation Unit Member Ukirt

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000121
text: Scott and Frey did a good job. What do you think of it?{nl}I don't think so that Vubbe can't create themself.{nl}I will have to check what they do using this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000122
text: There may be something inside the supply boxes that the soldiers left a long time ago.{nl}You will find some old supply boxes up there.{nl}Can you go there and check? If we obtain some clues there, we may get an answer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000123
text: If you go back the way you just came, you will see an observatory tower on the hills.{nl}I hope the monsters haven't touch it yet..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000124
text: Are they really planning something?{nl}Something.. is suspicious..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000125
text: The Vubbes broke the supply boxes and ran away with this?{nl}Why? Were they really making it?{nl}No way, they aren't smart enough to do that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000126
text: Good! We should pay attention and solve the problem!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000127
text: Okay. Are you ready?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000128
text: Before you came, I saw Vubbes moving in groups.{nl}Go to Gebene Cliffs and see how the situation is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000129
text: The Vubbes were always involved with anything that happened here.{nl}It can't be just a coincidence..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000130
text: I think.. I understand now. {nl}I think that was like a big factory creating huge monsters called Woodspirits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000131
text: The flag of Vubbes must have called in the ghosts.{nl}Then they polluted the trees and created huge monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000132
text: That tree barks must have been the ingredients for making Woodspirits.{nl}There's no way those Vubbes could do it alone.{nl}They must have received an order from somebody!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000133
text: We may find some decisive evidence at the place where the Vubbes are grouped together.{nl}If Prey sees this, it will like it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000134
text: Vubbes are not very smart so he must have made only simple orders.{nl}How could he think about controlling those Vubbes..{nl}I don't know what to say. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000135
text: I am sure that Woodspirits are created from various places.{nl}I can sense vicious energies coming. {nl}We should first destroy the flags that are creating Woodspirits!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000136
text: Leave as soon as you are ready. {nl}The best course of action for now is to stop the creation of Woodspirits..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000137
text: I think we've done our best for now. {nl}Since we can't do anything about the ones that were already created.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000138
text: I can feel the closest flag from here is near Gatves Highway.{nl}The huge trees that people saw is probably Woodspirits.{nl}How could I miss this simple thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000139
text: Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000140
text: Thank you so much. {nl}The other owls must have gained confidence because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000141
text: Weak Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000142
text: It really was too late..{nl}The goddess really can be harsh sometimes..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000143
text: I have one last request. {nl}Can you burn the Owls so they could rest in peace?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000144
text: Do you think my allies can reach Goddess Ausrine safely?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000145
text: Thank you so much. {nl}First bring me the Oil from Oil Boxes on the way to Neuoder Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000146
text: If you are okay with it, I'd like to get some more help from you.{nl}I've sent a messenger, but due to the last attack, I am now worried about him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000147
text: That messenger should be safe... but I still worry for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000148
text: Thank you so much.{nl}He must be there by now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000149
text: The squad was dispatched to recover Kateen Forest from the monsters.{nl}The entrance here to Kateen Forest is safe compared to other areas. The other areas are yet to be recovered.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000150
text: As you go deeper inside, there are a number of soldiers along the way lacking in supplies.{nl}If a well known person like you can help them, it will be a great help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000151
text: Fallen Messenger

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000152
text: This is my fault, for assuming the entrance to Kateen Forest was secure.{nl}I will go back to the camp after taking a short rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000153
text: Ah, this is my bag.. thank you for saving me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000154
text: Only you can help me right now.{nl}Can you tell Felix that the operation at Peledos Crossroads has already started?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000155
text: There are many strange things that can't be seen in forests other than Kateen Forest.{nl}Such as the wooden owl sculptures.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000156
text: The operation? Oh, what an ignorant messenger.{nl}I can get that from the camp... Thanks anyway.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000157
text: Oh, the way back is dark, so it would be appreciated if you could light up the bonfire again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000158
text: You can't see much sunlight in Kateen Forest due to the enormous amount of trees.{nl}It seems like ghosts could come out at any moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000159
text: Okay, so the messenger is safe?{nl}This place has been well taken care of thanks to your efforts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000160
text: I shall take some rest here.{nl}Is there a good place to hide?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000161
text: For letting Saltistter come in this far behind our lines, I should scold the person in charge of guarding this place.{nl}Thanks anyways. You sure live up to your reputation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000162
text: Guard Lyle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000163
text: I lost many colleagues through the Petrifying Frost.{nl}I don't understand why I am here to support a newbie Chronomancer... so inefficient.{nl}On top of that, we don't know when those violent monsters would attack here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000164
text: If you are okay, can you get rid of the monsters while we are protecting here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000165
text: It is very unfortunate that we should take care of that woman this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000166
text: Thanks. We can stay safe here for some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000167
text: A few weeks ago, our comrades were attacked while sleeping by Petrifying Frost.{nl}After the world turned out like this, we haven't gotten much support and have to wait here.{nl}The monsters are attaking the petrified victims at the moment. May the curse lay upon those monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000168
text: If there are comrades out there who still remain in stones, can you stay near them and protect them for a while?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000169
text: My old friend, Galen is one of the victims.{nl}Please protect him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000170
text: Thank you so much. I hope the reinforcement comes soon so he could return to his family even if he is petrified.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000171
text: There are many cursed documents and uncleaned objects on Ruklys Street.{nl}There are also many thieves who are after those.{nl}And among them, Dico Thieves frequently attack the guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000172
text: Can you defeat them at the military district?{nl}If you could defeat them, we will go and capture them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000173
text: The one who was caught last time told us that the stone statues were talking to him.{nl}Do you think that makes sense?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000174
text: I was able to arrest lots of thieves because of your help.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000175
text: Guard Nomabis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000176
text: A few days ago, we lost our supplies to Dico Thieves.{nl}They must have taken them to Drasos Chapel Ruins, but since I can't leave this place, I guess we're all gonna die.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000177
text: Can you retrieve the lost supplies?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000178
text: A few decades ago, the thieves attacked the guard camp and stole the supplies secretly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000179
text: They lured us in front of them and stole the objects from behind so there was no way we could prevent them from stealing.{nl}They wanted to take the objects legally so they were sent to gallows.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000180
text: The number of Dico Thieves is growing.{nl}They are very close to monsters. I don't know if they train those monsters or if there is something that I don't know yet.{nl}I heard the Knights of Kaliss was attacked by them.{nl}Maybe they are going after Sabina. She carries only expensive stuff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000181
text: To avoid any kind of danger, we should first attack before they move.{nl}Go to Drasos Chapel Ruins and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000182
text: The city that collapsed hundreds of years ago does not have any assets or lives to protect.{nl}It rather feels like protecting ruins. There are thieves as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000183
text: You taught them a lesson. Well done.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000184
text: A few weeks ago, the colleagues who used to work here received damage by Petrifying Frost and became stone statues at the square. {nl}The reason why the colleagues received damage was because they were engaged in eliminating traps that the thieves had set, but could not avoid them.{nl}There are still many traps around. We recently found one of them. Can you get rid of it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000185
text: The number of Dico Thieves may be more than the number of guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000186
text: You caught monsters outside the thieves' area. I am sorry that you had to go through such a dangerous job.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000187
text: Chronomancer Sabina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000188
text: Lots of things happened here, but since they occurred long time ago, we need more information in order to find out the truth.{nl}Can you find the records from the Gate Route that was fallen down and make copies of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000189
text: Everything is being destroyed as time passes by.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000190
text: Thank you. This is about the collapse of the fortress.{nl}I should look more into it to find more decisive information.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000191
text: I am doing many investigations here, but I am having a hard time discovering an incident that occurred more in the past due to those monsters.{nl}Can you go and look into the past on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000192
text: Use the magnifying glass of time near Pergale Highway. You should be able to see the past.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000193
text: Please use it with extreme care. This is the only one left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000194
text: What the hell happened? Do not say anything about what you've seen here outside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000195
text: To understand better about the circumstances, we have no way but to go to the Fortress of the Land which is the headquarter of Ruklys.{nl}But, we can't enter since the Royal Army guards are limiting the entrance.{nl}I have a good solution though..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000196
text: The portal that was used by the remnants when they tried to run away from the Fortress of the Land.{nl}There are total ten of them according to the record.{nl}Four of them are here. Can you check if they are still activated?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000197
text: Because of our plan, we may be sent to the gallows.{nl}Please keep it a secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000198
text: The portal at the military district is our only hope.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000199
text: Hunter Talus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000200
text: I am looking for a few artifacts of Lydia Schaffen, who built the Astral Tower.{nl}The famous archer who planted an arrow into Ruklys' chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000201
text: Royal Army Guard Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000202
text: Because of the Petrifying Frost that were created due to Ruklys' rebellion a few hundreds years ago, the land turned into a wasteland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000203
text: We will allow you to enter since the Knights of Kaliss requested us to do so, but please stay where our gaze remains.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000204
text: After Medzio Diena four years ago, Benas was appointed as the chief commander for the forces here.{nl}He ordered to take good care of the road leading to the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000205
text: If you are not in a hurry, please defeat the monsters in area A.{nl}That will be the first step for you to contribute to the goddess and the kingdom..{nl}Of course, I will promise you enough rewards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000206
text: Rebel Commander Ruklys, and the citizens here engaged in an evil conduct{nl}despite the selections from the great merchant, Premier Eminent. The result is this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000207
text: That's not bad. Maybe the guards can use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000208
text: After Medzio Diena, the Petrifying Frost are occurring irregularly.{nl}Due to irregular Petrifying Frost, we lost many of our soldiers on this wasteland.{nl}And we set the petrification devices limitedly here at the square of lamentation and we check the frequency of the frosts and move out the soldiers accordingly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000209
text: Check the petrification devices if you want to to loyal to the Kingdom and receive it's determination.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000210
text: There are monsters who try to go after the soldiers who maintain the devices. Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000211
text: The Petrifying Frost are to be driven away from the two places.{nl}I heard you are a quite famous Revelator. {nl}Aren't you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000212
text: Starting from a few months ago, the monsters who attacked the soldiers who maintain the devices have appeared.{nl}The soldiers who were able to survive told us that it was a gigantic bird.{nl}When we looked at the illustruated records of the Kingdom, it looked a lot like a Sparnashorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000213
text: If you are the Revelator, you will have no problem fighting against it.{nl}But, not here in area A. The exhausted soldiers may get involved in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000214
text: Use this absorption scroll to temporarily get rid of the Petrifying Frost that're starting to form in area A. {nl}The Sparnashorn will then appear from the Petrifying Frost in area B.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000215
text: These guards had their lives threatened by the Sparnashorn and Petrifying Frost. {nl}They are blinded by fear so they don't stand a chance fighting against it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000216
text: The Petrifying Frost is gone, but only temporarily.{nl}There is no way we can stop the punishments Ruklys will bring no matter what we do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000217
text: Are you ready? It's time to defeat the Sparnashorn. {nl}But we don't have enough time. No matter how great a Revelator you are, if you are exposed to the Petrifying Frost, then that will be the end. {nl}Go to area B. The Sparnashorn will come attacking if you touch the detector. {nl}Defeat it and get out of there before the Petrifying Frost starts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000218
text: Running to evade it is also a good way. {nl}But you can't keep doing that for long. {nl}This has to be stopped when there's a great and loyal volunteer like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000219
text: Hearing that it was defeated is the most hopeful story I've heard in years. {nl}Now I better let the troops rest first and tell them the good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000220
text: There is something I always wanted to ask if I'd meet anyone here. {nl}Can you clean our workshop? Monsters pop out wherever I go and I can't work. {nl}The cowards of the Royal Army are too scared to even come near here so don't mind them. {nl}What do you think? Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000221
text: The kind of work I do is business secret so I can't tell you what it is... {nl}No one owns these things anyway. Finders keepers if you need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000222
text: That fast? Have you not missed any of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000223
text: Aren't you curious how I made it through the strict security? {nl}It's all becuase I have connections. There are some Royal Army guards who buy xxx claws to raise their work records. {nl}But actually, I don't want to be around those monsters. Especially with A's.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000224
text: Can you catch them and get me those claws?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000225
text: I think you misunderstood. We are archeologists, not thieves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000226
text: This seems quite pricey. {nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000227
text: You better stop if you're planning to get something from the Petrified City. {nl}Aside from us, there is the outrageous Dico Thieves. {nl}But you might be at least rewarded if you help us out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000228
text: In area A, there is a box that contains things the Dico Thieves bring in from outside. Can you get them? {nl}I took a sneak peek and seems like they are not back yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000229
text: They are really clever. {nl}They bring in cheap antiques and place them where the Petrifying Frost blows. {nl}Then the antiques would petrify and turn into something that looks exquisite. {nl}I heard the nobles in big cities are fooled and buy them at expensive prices.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000230
text: Seems like the Dico Thieves are planning to make their business bigger than I thought. {nl}That's an enormous amount. Do you think they also have connections with the Royal Army?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000231
text: Petrified flowers are sold at very high prices among novice sculptors. {nl}They look at this to make counterfeits but they don't know where it is from. {nl}It wouldn't do any good to know anyway...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000232
text: So, can you collect some petrified flowers?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000233
text: My brother once studied hard to become a sculptor. {nl}Although I don't know where he is after Medzio Diena... {nl}I'm sure he's carving a beautiful Goddess Statue somewhere if he is alive...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000234
text: This reminds me of my brother... {nl}Where and what would he be doing now? {nl}Anyway, thank you for collecting it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000235
text: I have a friend who's supposed to come here but he's nowhere to be found. You didn't think I'd work alone in this huge area, did you? {nl}I think something happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000236
text: He is hiding among the guards in Security Area. This Water Bottle has a code on it. If you give it to the guards, he'll know and talk to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000237
text: Better work on it quickly because the Petrifying Frost just sweeped by. {nl}You can know when and where the Petrifying Frost starts if you observe the Royal Army's retreat. {nl}And the fastest way to get that information is by becoming a Royal Army guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000238
text: Hush! Lower your voice. It will be the end of both of us if we get caught.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000239
text: Did that stupid Hubertas send you here? {nl}I told him many times that I'd go back if I'm done with my work here. {nl}I didn't know his stupidity would send someone. {nl}There is a big problem here actually.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000240
text: Our family can't come into the city from outside. {nl}We need your help. {nl}We can't bring in my family without the troops knowing. {nl}They should all be gone from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000241
text: I'm going to make a big fuss in area A. I'm going to call in Saltistter that are roaming around the area. {nl}In order to do this, you need to gather Scented Stone Powder from the monsters. Can you do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000242
text: Our families should have passed this place earlier than the Royal Army. {nl}But Retia hurried things when the Petrifying Frost swept by some time ago so we weren't able to.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000243
text: This is exactly right. {nl}If you pour this here, you will soon see the Saltistter show up it's huge self. {nl}But that is not our plan!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000244
text: We should not make this place a battlefield. Then our families can't pass through. {nl}Let's think for a while...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000245
text: Apply this powder on x monster that appear in area B. {nl}Then the bewitched Saltistter will attack them. {nl}Retia will not just stand and watch her area be invaded like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000246
text: Our families come from various areas. I was also once a junior officer with dreams to become a strategist. {nl}Of course, it was before the area I was assigned to completely disappeared from the map 4 years ago on Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000247
text: Did you use everything? {nl}Then now it's time to get busy!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000248
text: Go to Retia and tell her that Saltistter is coming. {nl}She won't believe it but I can already feel the Saltistter running at us. {nl}Hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000249
text: You just have to tell her that Saltistter is coming. {nl}There is no reason for her to suspect us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000250
text: Our families passed through this place thanks to you. {nl}You will find many interesting truths if you continue your journey in this area. {nl}And you may also meet our families. But be careful of the Dico Thieves. {nl}Unlike us, they were robbers from the beginning.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000251
text: Guard Gofden

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000252
text: I don't want to be here either. There's really no need to guard this place. {nl}Orders came in to support the Knights of Kaliss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000253
text: Can you help me? {nl}Kostas has not come back for days so I can't leave this place but the monsters are running wild so I can't just stay put.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000254
text: The officers don't like the Knights of Kaliss. {nl}As for lower rank guards like me, Knights of Kaliss give us supplies and support so there's no reason for us to hate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000255
text: When I first came here, we just had to be careful of the Petrifying Frost but since Medzio Diena four years ago, every day is a crisis. {nl}I'm going to apply to move out when I'm done here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000256
text: It hasn't been that long for the Royal Army to enter this area by the request of Kostas. {nl}Much of the city remained in it's original form 600 years after the misfortune. {nl}One of my missions here is to clear the records of rebels remaining here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000257
text: I can't leave my post since Kostas is not here. Can you take care of it for me? {nl}You can find many records if you look around the trade area and Parduo square area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000258
text: Don't mind what's written on the records. {nl}It's all nonsense.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000259
text: I have to escort, clean up, and guard. I wonder how they are expecting me to do everything alone. {nl}It's a good thing you came to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000260
text: A few days before I was dispatched here, many soldiers came to this place to do a preliminary check for the research of Knights of Kaliss. {nl}But no one returned. They were attacked by the irregular Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000261
text: I was ordered to take back their keepsakes but it's hard just to think about it. {nl}Can you help me out?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000262
text: The authorities do not take it well that tens of soldiers were sacrificed for support activities. {nl}That's why the Royal Army and the Knights of Kaliss have become distant.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000263
text: You may not believe it but I might have been standing there too. {nl}Good thing I was off duty that day.. I don't even want to think about it. {nl}I will deliver this to the families of the deceased.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000264
text: How are you traveler, although, I don't know why you are passing through this place...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000265
text: Ah, so you are the famous Revelator. I've heard a lot about you from my colleagues in Klaipeda. {nl}They say you go around to save the world according to the will of the goddess?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000266
text: Then let me make a good offer, I found a way to turn back this Petrified City. Can you help me? {nl}First, get rid of the monsters around here. I have to be safe first before I can tell you anything, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000267
text: The Cryomancers in Klaipeda are stubborn and arrogant. If you feel something like that from me, then that's your delusion. {nl}There is Cryomancer as humane and warm-hearted as me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000268
text: Did you dry the seeds? Good, anyway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000269
text: Now, the next test is for you to take this and test if it's usable while I find the formula of magic circle. {nl}An Ice wall will appear if you use this so check how useful that is to the monsters. {nl}We need a safety net in order to test and this will do the job.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000270
text: The monsters will come attacking when the Ice wall is formed so take care of the rest of the monsters that you missed a while ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000271
text: The Petrifying Frost will not happen anymore for a while. {nl}Don't worry about that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000272
text: It's very effective! Now this should be able to block monsters or Revelators.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000273
text: Now we get to the important part. The most important part of the test is to find the Mark of Silk, a strong magic tool that can turn back petrified things. {nl}The stupid Royal Army lost the last Mark in this area 4 years ago so it's probably somewhere around here. {nl}It can also be inside the monster's stomach.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000274
text: Defeat the monsters and get the shiny stone from them. That will shine by itself so bring that and I will look for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000275
text: The stupid Royal Army probably doesn't know how great that Mark is. {nl}Probably no one knows, except me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000276
text: Pray that the Mark of Silk is among these stones. {nl}If not, I will be really mad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000277
text: Aha! It's here. Why wasn't the Royal Army able to find it when it is so easy like this? {nl}Are their heads only good for wearing helmets? Anyway, let's begin the test. Follow me to the magic circle I installed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000278
text: Hey friend, how did you get here? {nl}Are you looking for a job? {nl}I might sound a bit nosy but It's dangerous to go around alone. {nl}Of course, the same goes for anyone else too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000279
text: I need to work in the commercial area but I can't work alone because of the monsters. {nl}Can you help me out?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000280
text: It's a good thing the cowardly Dico Thieves did not come until here. {nl}Things are limited but people are coming in flocks to take it away...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000281
text: If it's cleared up that much, then looks like I can start already.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000282
text: I'm gonna go to Gerove Workshop. Can you help me out while I work? {nl}You jsut have to follow me around and fight the monsters while I do the work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000283
text: I got a load of it thanks to you. I won't have to go around for days. {nl}I plan to wait here until my colleagues arrive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000284
text: Please take care of the monsters and grave robbers in the Barracks District while I prepare the test. {nl}We should not be caught or interrupted.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000285
text: It's relatively safe on top of the fortress. There are monsters and thieves swarming if you leave this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000286
text: You cleared the test areas. Good job.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000287
text: I will proceed the test from up here. {nl}Please go to the portal and prepare to test it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000288
text: Everything will be alright. It's all just visuals and it can't come across to this world.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000289
text: Something outrageous happened. What could those be? {nl}Chronomancers will not believe it. Did the past interfere with the future? Or the future interfere with the past?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000290
text: I better stay here and tune the portal leading to Final Battle Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000291
text: Adjutant General Hans

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000292
text: It hasn't been long since we cooperated with the grave robbers. {nl}Supporting them without the Royal Army knowing is like having your life on the line. {nl}But what can we do. We're just following orders. .

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000293
text: They will pass through the Downtown Street. {nl}Of course, they will face the monsters. A big commotion will happen and the guards will find them. {nl}I want you to get your hands on at that point. Unlike the Dico Thieves, they can't stand to be in debt so they will be helpful to your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000294
text: They are more than just a few so we don't know when they will pass through. {nl}But we continuously watch over so that nothing will go wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000295
text: Did you defeat the monsters? The guards were asking what the fuss is about so I told them about you. {nl}Everything should be alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000296
text: Don't forget. Our helping the grave robbers here is a secret to the Royal Army. {nl}Your life can be on the line.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000297
text: We need to bring Stepnas to Downtown Street. {nl}He promised to get us the Frost Core which will help in studying the Petrifying Frost. {nl}We need to slip away the guards in order to do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000298
text: The guards are unofficially receiving supples from the knights. Please coat it with the monster's scent. {nl}Then give it to the guards at the mouth of the river. This will cause a big commotion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000299
text: They will reduce their boundaries as they are getting attacked. {nl}Or bring a huge army in. {nl}But they won't be able to do that with the current state the kingdom is in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000300
text: Did the guards sense the scent? {nl}The monsters should have.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000301
text: The Stone Whale will soon attack the guards. {nl}Act like you're greeting them and lead them to vacate the crossroads. {nl}Then Stephonas will pass through without secretly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000302
text: Rofdel will be watching from the watchtower but on a foggy day like this, he won't take action.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000303
text: Stephonas passed through safely. {nl}He was looking for you. Go and help him. {nl}The guards won't mention our names to Rofdel. {nl}What they have been taking until now was all against the military law.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000304
text: The headquarters are collecting old records that the Royal Army weren't able to clean up. {nl}Since you've seen it a few times yourself, did you sense something fishy?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000305
text: The Royal Army spreading promotional materials praising the great prime minister of the past, Premier Eminent, and the grave robbers. {nl}Please get that leaflet. There will be a loophole if we compare it with the historical data we've collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000306
text: The Royal Army have had difficulty recruiting since 4 years ago so they've been spreading out leaflets like this to the nomads outside the fallen city or the grave robbers for them to apply. {nl}Of course, they will just be treated like slaves when the world becomes better to live.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000307
text: So, this is what it says. They made such embarassing stories sound like a heroic epic to the ignorant people. {nl}I will send this to the headquarters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000308
text: You're the one who made me an opportunity. {nl}You deserve applause for understanding and executing Hans' imprudent plans, but we have to stay quiet so just receive my thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000309
text: The reason I called you is to find the Frost Core that I've promised Kaliss knights. {nl}But I didn't know the guards are goind around like that! There's a change of plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000310
text: The Frost Core that we're looking for is inside Stone Froster. You will need a very strong bomb to get it out. {nl}Bring me the stone gun powder from the monsters nearby watermill ruins. Then I will process it to be useful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000311
text: There is someone watching the Downtown Street from the Southern Watchtower. {nl}It won't be easy to make him ignore the fuss you and I made here. {nl}So just do as I tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000312
text: Ah, this will make a great explosion even with a small hit. Good! Wait a minute.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000313
text: To prevent this from exploding in your hands, you either have to make it a time bomb, or throw it. {nl}But you can't really find fuse around here and it wont light because of the dust. {nl}I will give you the processed stone gunpowder so throw it to the monsters. If you're lucky, it will create a big explosion without any noise and if not, it will make them angry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000314
text: If we can't get this done, we can't even start with the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000315
text: It won't explode right away and explosion is not steady. What to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000316
text: In order to make it stick to the monster! and then explode with a BAM! then we need something with high viscosity. {nl}Can you get Sticky Liquid from the monsters in Viskas?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000317
text: I'll say it again but this is the only way to keep you safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000318
text: I think you spilled some on your way. Too bad for your new shoes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000319
text: You will find a stiff Stone Froster in the residential area. {nl}It fumes somethings like the Petrifying Frost but it is not that dangerous. {nl}Throw this to it to wake it up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000320
text: Remember to stay away after you stick it on to it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000321
text: Maybe this time, it can even be seen from Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000322
text: So this is the frost core that bothered many people... {nl}The soldiers who helped you will tell the guy watching from the watchtower about your heroic stories so they won't suspect you. {nl}Dont' worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000323
text: The watchtower is starting to breakdown. Support has been cut for years and there is no place like here to watch over this area. {nl}We can't send the troops to Fedimian so we have to be self-sufficient.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000324
text: While you're her, can yuou get rid of the monsters near Vadovo Dock and get lump of lime from them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000325
text: I can't find workers so the new recruits are operating and restoring elevators.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000326
text: Thank you. {nl}We better start restoring when the next Petrifying Frost is over.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000327
text: There are limes that constantly float down the Vadovo Dock. {nl}It is the record of the disaster 600 years ago. {nl}They depress the morale of the soldiers so the officers retrieve or destroy them. {nl}But we can't do that anymore so I want you to bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000328
text: Reading stuff about the death throes of rebels gives us the chills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000329
text: Got to break this one and use it to restore the watchtower. It's killing two birds with one stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000330
text: The monsters that weren't able to run away from the Petrifying Frost are gathered in the demolished Amosi Port below the watchtower. {nl}Problem is that it's causing other monsters to gather. {nl}Some even act as though it's petrified and deceive the guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000331
text: Can you take care of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000332
text: In the past, this place was a big city that's not even comparable to Klaipeda or Fedimian.{nl}But when people left, monsters started to fill the place. {nl}From then, the monsters adjusted to the city in ways even smarter than humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000333
text: You know better about what the Royal Army should do than the army themselves. {nl}Do you have any thoughts on applying to the Royal Army? I'm just kidding.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000334
text: We lose a few soldiers whenever the Petrifying Frost sweeps by. {nl}The kingdom can't support for the lost soldiers so the number of our men to guard the area is decreasing. {nl}So we thought of an idea to train the refugees and grave robbers to become guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000335
text: What we can do here is to post this leaflet around Downtown Street. {nl}Can you do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000336
text: I'm sure people are taking the leaflets but the number of applicants have decreased recently. {nl}It's either the grave robbers started checking inside or the monsters think of it as food and are eating it. {nl}Isn't it suspicious?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000337
text: Thank you. If you serve the kingdom like Premier Eminent, I'm sure you will take an important role when the kingdom flourishes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000338
text: Wilhelmina Carriot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000339
text: There is nothing more useless and stupid here than helping the Royal Army. {nl}If you want to help someone, I ask your favor to help us out instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000340
text: The number of monsters in Kovos Hall Site is increasing. {nl}We don't even know what is leading them here. {nl}Please get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000341
text: I heard you have a lot of battle experience. {nl}There are even stories about you saving towns and villages. I look forward to seeing the great things those people saw.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000342
text: You're as great as the rumors say. The Knights of Kaliss need heroes like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000343
text: Stone debris and dust blow a lot in this area so many soldiers and knights cough severely. {nl}The headquarters send us refreshing candies mixed with medicinal herbs. {nl}But our soldiers were swepted by the Petrifying Frost while carrying our supplies for this month and the monsters stole it all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000344
text: Can you get defeat those monsters and get back the refreshing candies?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000345
text: I would like to give you some if we have extras. {nl}Even the grave robbers are preying on the candies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000346
text: I won't blame you if you eat one secretly. {nl}But you don't seem to be that kind of a person.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000347
text: Soldiers patrolling this area were swept by Petrifying Frost while passing by Stalactite square some time ago. {nl}We are only affiliated to Royal Army but we're mostly residents of Kaliss province. {nl}I want to help my folks from back home.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000348
text: But there is no way to get them out of the curse. {nl}We can only get their last will and keepsakes for their families. {nl}Won't you show your kindness for them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000349
text: I understand their loyalty for the kingdom but when I see them make people do impossible things that result to deaths, I don't know who is the monster anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000350
text: Nonsense! {nl}You mean all of them are gone? {nl}I'm sorry to have made you face such misfortune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000351
text: In order to restore the city, the Knights of Kaliss are recruiting more men than their budget could handle. {nl}I was also recently hired to release the curse through spell. {nl}But they just recruit people without any support afterwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000352
text: If my presumptions are correct, there is a high possibility that all of the things happening here are results of someone's sinister spell. {nl}In order to check, we need elixirs to drag out whoever it is. {nl}Can you defeat the monsters in Sacred port and get those?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000353
text: New methods always lead to new directions. {nl}I will lift this curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000354
text: That's enough ingredients to make the Liberation Elixir. {nl}Now, let's start.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000355
text: I will give you this Liberation Elixir. {nl}Use it on petrified guards or grave robbers. {nl}Their souls trapped in their body might tell you something about what they last witnessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000356
text: The angry souls might attack you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000357
text: There was nothing worth noting save for the victims being overwhelmed with fear before their deaths.{nl}I guess I better look for even older victims.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000358
text: Before they die, petrified victims release evil thoughts.{nl}Please use the incense and the stone while the knights are gone and I'll be heading over. When enough of the evil thoughts have gathered, we can see what happened on that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000359
text: Please do not provoke them. You know how those guys get.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000360
text: This is some serious stuff. I should deliver it to the headquarters of the knights.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000361
text: It's not like paper or trees, it's a living thing that turned to stone and died...{nl}Where else would such astonishing things happen? I am very interested in this strange phenomenon.{nl}With your assistance, I might be able to help those who are still alive, with minimal injury.{nl}Well, they may lose a few fingers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000362
text: Can you try using this solvent on the monster? There must be some of them suffering from the stone curse.{nl}If we can use it on them, shouldn't it work on humans too?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000363
text: What do you think? Even if it works on just one or two of them, that would still be great.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000364
text: You weren't able to save any of them? {nl}I guess this is not a good way. I will take back what is left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000365
text: I think we should use different drugs and test as much as we can. {nl}But then we will need a lot of samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000366
text: Can you defeat the monsters in Neiveikiama Castle and get me petrified samples?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000367
text: I'm still thinking so can you come back later?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000368
text: This should be enough for about five tests. Good work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000369
text: May those sacrificed rest in peace. However, like the river that attracts those who are thirsty, this place is astounding for me and my thirst for knowledge. {nl}But there is a foolish monster trying ruin this wonderful place. Can you take care of it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000370
text: It if has a brain, how can it go around ruining this? {nl}Oh well, maybe that's why it's a monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000371
text: Did you defeat it? Great job!{nl}Now I don't have to fear this place being torn down until another monster shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000372
text: I heard about you from Wilhelmina. I heard you're good? But can you enter the Fortress of the Land without our help? {nl}You will need a pathfinder no matter how good you are. I will take you if you help me and Wilhelmina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000373
text: Wilhelmina asked for the records from Ruklys days in exchange for her help. Can you gather it from the assembly area in front? {nl}I will cause a big commotion if we go out ourselves so I want you to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000374
text: We plan to go into the room of treasures in the Fortress of the Land without the Royal Army's knowledge. {nl}But there's a Gargoyle blocking our way and we can't defeat it ourselves without making a fuss. {nl}That's why we need your and Wilhemina's help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000375
text: Did you see the Gargoyle statue in the assembly area? It moves whenever I try to approach it so I can't get into Fortress of the Land.{nl}Wilhelmina says she has a tool to suppress it so you just have to hand over what you found and take that from her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000376
text: Unlike other knights, Wilhelmina seems to have sensed something. {nl}We work in hand in gloves so it's been easier for use to do work around since Wilhelmina came here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000377
text: Now hand over these records to Wilhelmina and take that thing we need.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000378
text: Finally, the records untouched by the Royal Army have arrived. {nl}This is... a love letter? I don't need it so you can take it or throw it away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000379
text: Hmm... It contains most of what we need. I better send this to the headquarters. {nl}I will give you this vacuum scroll. Use this on the Gargoyle that bullies Amanda. {nl}No sound will transmit even if you have an explosion or thunder inside so the Royal Army will have no clue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000380
text: The Knights of Kaliss have some very good wizards so they will give us what we need.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000381
text: It looks more pleasant than I expected. I thought she'd give us something like a ballista or a cannon. {nl}But I guess this would be the best for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000382
text: Can you use that on the Gargoyle while I pack? {nl}I'm sure it will be easy enough for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000383
text: There is a monocle that helps you identify precious things and it will help us find the room of treasures easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000384
text: The scroll Wilhelmina gave us is awesome!{nl}I didn't hear a thing even from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000385
text: Shall we go now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000386
text: I'm a wizard who can't use any magic. I feel pathetic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000387
text: Antares... He used to be a great wizard back in the day.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000388
text: Rearguard Unit Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000389
text: We, the Rearguard Unit, are in charge of controlling and guarding the lines of communication and supply.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000390
text: We need to regain the forest captured by the monsters. {nl}We will not fall back this time!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000391
text: If we retreat, Klaipeda will be totally isolated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000392
text: Troops in the frontlines don't know what hardships we go through. {nl}They think that they're the only ones who have their lives on the line.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000393
text: It would be nice if the goddess send us her blessings at times like this... {nl}Honestly, we're exhausted.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000394
text: Do you think there will be an end to this war? {nl}Frankly, I'm scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000395
text: The Rearguard Units are doing their best, but the supply situation remains horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000396
text: Is Helgasercle attacking again? {nl}If that's the case, this battle will be a very long one...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000397
text: Are there still a lot of monsters in the tower?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000398
text: Even if they outnumber us, we can't let them ruin the tower!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000399
text: Suspicious Lamp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000400
text: I may just be an unusual lamp, or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000401
text: Recently monsters have been swarming out of the deep parts of the forest. {nl}But our chronic shortage of manpower is hindering us from taking action. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000402
text: After much debate on how to solve the situation, your name was brought up. {nl}They said you would gladly come forward to hunt down the monsters. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000403
text: I don't know how to thank you for accepting such a difficult mission.. {nl}Well then, please take care of the monsters in Purple Tree Fault Forest. {nl}Purple Tree Fault Forest is located past Fedimian, on the way to the Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000404
text: Good job. {nl}I've been hearing a lot about how great you are, but it seems like it wasn't all just rumors.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000405
text: Huh, tsk tsk... What a pity. {nl}Of course, a merchant like me won't fully understand it.. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000406
text: But if you help me out, I will give you something. It may not be as great as what you broke but it's pretty good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000407
text: It's nothing much, really. {nl}The symbol of pilgrim on the Starving Demon's Way outside Fedimian will do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000408
text: Nevermind if you can't. {nl}But if you can, that'd be awesome.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000409
text: Oh, you got it... {nl}Well, aren't reckless challenges the fun in life?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000410
text: The monsters are eating my companions. {nl}I still have some holy power from the goddess, but it won't last long.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000411
text: Officer Danus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000412
text: Many cities will become isolated if we don't get back this forest.. {nl}But the situation isn't on our side.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000413
text: This forest doesn't even have Owl Sculptures. {nl}Makes you feel like you really don't want to come back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000414
text: Soldier Roy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000415
text: I heard the Rearguard Unit was surrounded. How did you make it through? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000416
text: Squad Commander Johan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000417
text: I am a squad commander who sent his men first. What words can I say? {nl}I feel miserable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000418
text: This battle was a shameful one as a commander. {nl}I don't know what would have happened if it wasn't for you..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000419
text: Danus' Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000420
text: It's too scary to patrol the area full of monsters. {nl}But I can't keep relying on other people either..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000421
text: Ruklys and I were taught by the same teacher.{nl}That's why I know what he is trying to achieve.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000422
text: Lands with buried stories also tend to have lots of resentment. It can't be any better for studying necromancy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000423
text: Epitaph of Agailla Flurry

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000424
text: My name is Agailla Flurry. {nl}I have realized something from the epitaphs left in the land and I would like to make a confession.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000425
text: Since some time ago, I was able to have a long life through a strong spell. {nl}As soon as I realized that I was not bound by the lifetime of humans, I lived the life of a bystander.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000426
text: (You cannot read the rest because the epitaph is damaged.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000427
text: Only after a century of achieving nothing did I start to regret the life I lived. {nl}And after spending a long time lamenting on my foolishness, I decided to follow their mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000428
text: I cannot reveal what this mission is. {nl}And I do not know how I will continue it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000429
text: Maybe my tower soaring towards Goddess Gabija can continue the answer. {nl}But I will not be like my predecessors, letting my personal feelings ruin the work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000430
text: How foolish it is to be overconfident and be swayed by shallow feelings. {nl}You, who lives through such times, must have realized something like I did.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000431
text: To finish, I thank you for making pilgrimage following my epitaph. {nl}I will leave you a little bit of power on this epitaph as a reward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000432
text: Villager

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000433
text: This place is over. {nl}With so many monsters, I can't be a lumberjack here anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000434
text: Old Man Moses

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000435
text: Why isn't Cahill here yet? Tsk tsk..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000436
text: Villager Cahill

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000437
text: I don't get why the old man is like that to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000438
text: I think I can understand him now. {nl}But it would be much better if he treated me kindly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000439
text: A bow once made can fire many times, but arrows are gone once shot away. {nl}That's why we never stop making them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000440
text: I don't think prayers and ceremonies are the only way to serve the goddess. {nl}Serving the world through physical training is also an important mission of the cleric. {nl}That is what a monk is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000441
text: I'm sick of Fedimian. {nl}Where could my brother be..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000442
text: For what did my brother... {nl}How important could that thing be...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000443
text: Fedimian is still under reconstruction. {nl}The Holy Area is better off; the other areas are so bad you can't even enter them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000444
text: I'll probably be working again from now on. {nl}You gotta be busy to feel alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000445
text: I would have been in trouble if not for your help. {nl}Fedimian is still under construction and there aren't any proper medical facilities.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000446
text: There are two ways to approach the goddess. {nl}Strong belief for the goddess and the sound of silver dropping on the offering box. {nl}We're just being honest here. Don't you think the same?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000447
text: I don't really mind the rumors but do people believe that spell can retain your youth? {nl}Well, maybe it can but... {nl}Ah, I don't want to talk about it anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000448
text: Supplies Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000449
text: There's always a shortage of supplies and we're always tired.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000450
text: The Rearguard Unit always complains the supplies are late or inadequate. {nl}But we have our own problems.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000451
text: Oh, you got them. Thank you. {nl}Please go back to the monster's nest and burn the Destroyed Owls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000452
text: Terrible things are happening. {nl}Can't we just go back to the peaceful days?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000453
text: The goddess can be so cruel. {nl}Please pray that my colleagues may rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000454
text: Pilgrim Liliya

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000455
text: If I die, please bury me..{nl}Make my body unseen...{nl}If I lose my breath, please bury me...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000456
text: And if you meet a pilgrim named Julius, please tell him these words... tell him goodbye...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000457
text: Pilgrim's Memo

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000458
text: This land is cursed by Naktis. {nl}I may die but let it be known to the pilgrims who pass this place. {nl}Demon Lord Naktis drove cursed Tree Root Crystals around this Ray-lit Land, and those Tree Root Crystals are spreading curse of indolence to the pilgrims.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000459
text: You must destroy the Tree Root Crystals to avoid the curse. {nl}May the goddess' blessings be with the pilgrims.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000460
text: Who? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000461
text: Anyway, do you have any food? Please give me something to eat... I can't stand the hunger anymore. I can't move. Hey, if you have faith in the goddess, please get me some food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000462
text: Even the meat of those wild monsters is fine. Eating the whole world is not enough... Ugh... I'm hungry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000463
text: Not yet? I think I can even eat you now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000464
text: Aakk! That's right!! Give me that! I will eat it all!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000465
text: Hey don't go yet! Not yet!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000466
text: I ate meat so I need to eat veggies. {nl}I heard the shoots of the reeds around here are moist and edible. {nl}Get it! I'm hungry! I want to eat!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000467
text: Look through the reed shoots!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000468
text: Why are we told to share with others when I don't even have enough food for me? {nl}Is it hypocrisy?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000469
text: Pilgrim Julius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000470
text: I think there was some food here... {nl}Did that guy take it? {nl}Ugh..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000471
text: I'm starving and now I'm having headaches! {nl}I feel my head exploding with just the thought of food but other things keep coming to mind. {nl}What was it... Something like an orgel...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000472
text: {nl}Why does it's food keep popping up in my mind when I can't even eat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000473
text: Those dirty fools... I will revenge... {nl}Aah Liliya...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000474
text: The necklace.. yes. {nl}Well done.. Please take good care of it. {nl}This is a token of my gratitude.. The orgel was a memento for both of us but the necklace is special...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000475
text: {nl}The Cathedral was blessed so I'm sure it'll be a good thing for you too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000476
text: Aaaaagghh! Aaagh! {nl}I will swallow it all!!!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000477
text: Who are you? Ugh... I want to keep arguing but I'm starving.. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000478
text: ...Hehe. What do you say helping me eat if you have time?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000479
text: Maybe even some monster flesh... Arrg I'm too hungry and seeing things again!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000480
text: Monster meat has some odor but it's not too bad to eat. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000481
text: Hehe. Thank you. {nl}As you can see, I just can't move.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000482
text: That is it! give me that! {nl}I'm going to eat that! No one can take it from me! It's mine!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000483
text: ...? That? What about that? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000484
text: Oww! My head! Arrgh! Yuck! What's that? What about that orgel? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000485
text: My memories... Her... Give me that! It's mine!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000486
text: So that's what happened... Thank you. She left this orgel behind. {nl}We promised marriage and we left our way on pilgrimage to the Cathedral to confirm our promise for the future. {nl}But ah.. Liliya.. Liliya..!!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000487
text: In our happy journey to pilgrimage... That's where we met then. {nl}Na... Naktis! The Demon Lord!{nl}She took away our necklace and orgel, stared at it for some time, and threw it far away!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000488
text: {nl}Then she made us fight and hate each other for gluttony and just disappeared. {nl}I need to go... To meet her, she, how is she...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000489
text: The orgel rolled out somewhere and the necklace... Her servant swallowed it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000490
text: Then Naktis made us... like this... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000491
text: Oh, sorry. {nl}I'm too dizzy and it's difficult to talk. {nl}There are Nikotias in the Starving Demon's Way that are used as medicinal herbs. Won't the dizziness fade away if I eat some of those herbs?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000492
text: I heard Nikotias grow in the upper area. {nl}But it's not easy to get it so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000493
text: Ah, it's that... Thank you. {nl}It feels better. {nl}Liliya... Her orgel... She probably isn't in this world anymore... Without her, I don't need this necklace either. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000494
text: If you meet that nasty Naktis' monster, please strike a revenge for me. {nl}Please take out the sign of our love from it and let it see the light of the world. {nl}And as a sign of gratitude for the revenge, please keep that necklace. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000495
text: It's a necklace that received the blessings of the Cathedral so it will come in handy. {nl}That necklace doesn't mean anything to me anymore..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000496
text: Pilgrim Zenius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000497
text: What! Move away! I need to protect these precious food supplies!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000498
text: I almost lost my foods because of you!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000499
text: These food supplies are more important than your smelly body! Don't touch it! The only things I need are food! Go away! {nl}The monsters are also annoying!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000500
text: If you want to talk to me, get rid of the monsters preying on the food or something!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000501
text: Impressive, but I don't have time to spare for you! {nl}Did you see the one that ran away a while ago? {nl}He made a food stack in Isblyskes Square too! {nl}But I can't leave! Isn't it obvious that someone will steal these food?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000502
text: {nl}That's why I need you to bring it! {nl}I'm sure the monsters ate the crops! You need to make them spit it out!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000503
text: You have some good moves! Nice! {nl}It's alright as long as the food is safe. {nl}Now you go ahead on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000504
text: Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000505
text: Would you like to hit the Tree Root Crystal?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000506
text: Pilgrim Gracius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000507
text: Who... Well I'm busy now... I have things left to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000508
text: Ugh...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000509
text: Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000510
text: Oh... Thank you. I am Gracius. Excuse me on our first meeting. {nl}But since you helped me out, I want to ask for something. {nl}
