name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000511
text: Souls of pilgrims who were betrayed and unfairly killed are trapped in these altars. {nl}I release them and pray for their souls.. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000512
text: It's really difficult because I'm injured but I can't stand not doing it. {nl}Thinking about those colleagues... I pity the angry souls who were not able to go to heaven.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000513
text: So can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000514
text: I was just trying to release the soul trapped in this altar. {nl}But it didn't go as I expected. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000515
text: We need to pray here, and return the souls that were trapped. {nl}But the souls in Scattered Stairway are full of rage so you have to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000516
text: I have seen all of it myself. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000517
text: As you can see, I was injured when they first appeared so I was listed off. {nl}That's why I saw all of it but still made it alive... so I am trying to release the souls myself. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000518
text: Maybe this is my call of become a cleric... Oh ,God...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000519
text: All the souls scattered... {nl}And I can't move with my legs like this.. {nl}Please, take care of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000520
text: Before heading on the journey, I remember hearing about the Revelator. You truly are special. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000521
text: If only I wasn't hurt like this..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000522
text: They killed the pilgrims like that. I mean each other... {nl}As if they step back and enjoyed controlling people... It's horrible. {nl}One pilgrim's soul was even thrown around by the monster like a toy. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000523
text: I take out and release the monsters thrown inside the monsters. {nl}I'm making a drug to take the souls out of the monster... {nl}But it is not going well. {nl}Can you test this?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000524
text: First, spread it under the monster. {nl}If the soul comes out, then it means success.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000525
text: I wish it'd go well..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000526
text: Ah, I guess something is still missing. {nl}What was that... what...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000527
text: Ahh! I remember! That's it! {nl}That thing the pilgrims carry around!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000528
text: The Scripture!!!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000529
text: Please bring it! {nl}One of the pilgrim souls trapped here somewhere must have it!!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000530
text: This is it!{nl}Oh, thank you. I can finally make the drug!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000531
text: If you use this, the soul inside the monster will shine. {nl}Defeat those monsters so that the souls may rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000532
text: They were sneaky and careful. {nl}They made the seminarians betray and kill each other. {nl}People who were supposed to become priests and spread the love of the goddess to others betraying and killing themselves, and their souls trapped in the altar for the rage against each other..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000533
text: And I mean in the altar where we offer ceremonies to the goddess. {nl}I may be injured but I'm still alive and I can't forgive those monsters. How much more for the pilgrims who were killed like that.. {nl}That's why the souls in the altar are full of anger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000534
text: I hope the shining soul will brighten your way. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000535
text: They will also be thankful to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000536
text: I felt the peace of souls released even from afar. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000537
text: But there are still things left to do. There's a lot of altars in the Scattered Stairway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000538
text: Chliz Uphill and Branginti Hills, the alley past Oshimas Road and right before the Purple Tree Fault Forest, there are altars in the these four areas with souls waiting for the day to be free from rage. {nl}Ther are different ways to release the souls, but I'm sure you can figure it out. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000539
text: As all things go, it is more difficult to execute than to know. {nl}I will pray here for the souls to rest in peace. {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000540
text: I don't know why they made this place like this. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000541
text: It seemed like they were looking for something. {nl}They seemed to be sure that something is here as they harrassed the souls and destroyed the altar. {nl}What could it be.. Could it be related to the Cathedral that lies at the end of this Pilgrim's Way..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000542
text: Speaking of the Cathedral, I have a recipe. {nl}Actually, I don't know how to use this thing so I always thought that I'd give it to someone who deserves it. {nl}I think it is right to give it to someone who will make the souls here rest in peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000543
text: Even if you are the Revelator, facing the angry souls is a dangerous thing. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000544
text: Please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000545
text: It's 4 altars. {nl}There are many ways for the souls to rest in peace. {nl}It may be offering flowers, or gathering the scripture of the pilgrims... {nl}You may need to control the angry souls first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000546
text: {nl}I hope my prayers help the souls to find peace.. {nl}And this is just my presumption but if there are any items received after the souls rest in peace, please bring it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000547
text: It might be helpful to you. {nl}Of course, this is just my speculation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000548
text: You're back. What a relief. And thank you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000549
text: No wonder.. You deserve this recipe. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000550
text: I will give you this. {nl}It was a gift from my grandfather who was a blacksmith when I said I will become a cleric. {nl}Although my colleagues found peace, I plan to stay offering ceremonies for them so I don't need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000551
text: Purple Tree Fault Forest Notice

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000552
text: There are blessed altars around the Purple Tree Fault Forest. {nl}Pilgrims who pass by can offer worship to all altars and be blessed. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000553
text: Each sanctum is under the management of the Priest Masters.{nl}When there is trouble at a sanctum, go find the Master responsible for it's management.{nl}The detailed locations of the sanctums are..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000554
text: (The notice is half broken. Can't read all the writings.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000555
text: Altar Notice

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000556
text: You can receive blessings by offering money. {nl}Amount of offerings that can be received from each pilgrim differs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000557
text: {nl}{nl}May the grace of the goddess be with you. {nl}-- Manager : [Pardoner Master] Maistes Goldmunt

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000558
text: You can receive blessings by offering goods. {nl}Lure fresh goods from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000559
text: {nl}The grace of the goddess be with you, always. {nl}--Manager : [Priest Master] Vorable

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000560
text: Worship the Sanctum here. {nl}Blessings will be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000561
text: {nl}May the grace of the goddess be with you.{nl}-- Manager : [Cleric Master] Rozalija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000562
text: The cover of scripture on the altar smells like blood. Did the monsters eat all other pages?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000563
text: You can receive blessings by offering clear water. {nl}Fetch clean water from the stream.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000564
text: The blessings of the goddess will purify your soul like the clear water. {nl}-- Manager : [Oracle Master] Apolonia Barbora

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000565
text: You will receive blessings if you offer reed flowers. {nl}Offer the reed flowers that can be found near the Purple Tree Fault Forest's Farewell Bridge. {nl}The grace of the goddess be with you, always. {nl}-- Manager : [Druid Master] Gina Greene

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000566
text: You must offer money to the Sanctum. {nl}The blessings of the goddess will be with you. {nl}May you receive the grace of the goddess. {nl}-- Manager : [Pardoner Master] Maistes Goldmunt

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000567
text: Pay worship to this Sanctum. {nl}The blessings of the goddess will be with those who lay themselves low. {nl}May the grace of the goddess be with you in your ordeals. {nl}--Manager : [Krivis Master] Hercus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000568
text: Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000569
text: Will you offer money and receive blessings?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000570
text: Find goods to use for offering.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000571
text: You need more goods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000572
text: I heard that the Purple Tree Fault Forest was damaged by Naktis. {nl}But I didn't know that even the sanctuariues would not function.. I feel bad and angry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000573
text: Take this holy water and spray it on the Sanctum. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000574
text: I hope this will be enough to purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000575
text: I hope the Sanctum will be back to normal. {nl}I trust that with you, it will work out well but... Naktis and the Great Cathedral...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000576
text: Goddess Vakarine Statue of Purple Tree Fault Forest? There are many, but one of them is broken..? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000577
text: That's strange. It could be dangerous. {nl}We only have one Goddess Statue in Purple Tree Fault Forest. {nl}Well anyways, since you say it's not functioning..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000578
text: It might have taken a part of the statue so hunt the monsters nearby. {nl}If my prediction is right, then it must be Naktis' act. {nl}I was away but I've been getting the news. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000579
text: If you find water nearby, then try to stick the plaster piece. {nl}There seems to be a problem in the Great Cathedral...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000580
text: You might have heard about it but since Gesti's defeat, Naktis has been trying to prove her position under Gesti by entering the Great Cathedral. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000581
text: That's why she's been ransacking the Pilgrim's Way which is rumored to have the clues. {nl}It will be a difficult journey for you..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000582
text: I feel bad that I can't go with you as I have things to do here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000583
text: I wish you luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000584
text: You mean the Sanctum in Purple Tree Fault Forest? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000585
text: Oh, I heard the rumors but is it that bad?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000586
text: I guess Naktis is not an easy Demon Lord. {nl}Sounds like the the Sanctum is polluted by monsters near it. {nl}Find the badge of the Sanctum from the monsters nearby and burn it in front of the Sanctum. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000587
text: Even if the Sanctum is purified, it might not turn back to it's original form but it will function again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000588
text: Naktis must be looking for clues for entering the Great Cathedral. {nl}If my prediction is right, it's not only the Purple Tree Fault Forest but all of Pilgrim's Way that must be that way. {nl}If you do reach the Cathedral, please defeat Naktis. {nl}We have to stop the demons from getting their hand on the goddess' revelations.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000589
text: You must burn it at the sanctum. Please.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000590
text: Will you fetch clear water?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000591
text: Will you prove your faith by offering flowers?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000592
text: Will you prove your faith by offering money?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000593
text: That purifier should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000594
text: What? Me? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000595
text: {nl}What was it? What was I doing...? {nl}I think Naktis told me to stay here...{nl}And I was just hungry...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000596
text: This place is done. {nl}All crystals have mutated. {nl}We must do everything we can to turn back the crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000597
text: Please save me. {nl}I didn't know the crystals will be like this. {nl}I feel like slowly dying.{nl}Anyone passing through this place must be careful of the crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000598
text: If you don't destroy it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000599
text: I guess I'm dying. {nl}If you're passing through, be careful. {nl}All the Tree Root Crystals are threatening you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000600
text: If you don't disband or destroy it, you might be cursed. {nl}The curse of Demon Lord that killed me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000601
text: Pilgrim Theophilis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000602
text: Uhh... a pilgrim? Oh... Are you the Revelator? You must have some questions for me, but I can't move. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000603
text: Water... I need water. Please bring me water.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000604
text: I don't have the strength to explain in details but... I was fleeing with all the strength I had and became like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000605
text: I..can't even stand. I'll explain the rest after I get some water...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000606
text: Maybe gathering some dew from the gravestones down south will help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000607
text: Even if it's from the gravestones, dew is still water... I can drink it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000608
text: Oh, please give me that. Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000609
text: Woah, I think I can live now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000610
text: {nl}Hmm?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000611
text: {nl}Uhm, are you planning to pass through here like that? {nl}No you can't. You might be cursed. {nl}I will make some medicine so take that at least before you go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000612
text: {nl}Arrgh, I don't have my bag. {nl}I didn't know I've lost it to the monsters while escaping.. {nl}Hey, if you find me my bag, then I'll make you a medicine that has immune effects against the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000613
text: It's a bag with all the tools to make the medicine.. {nl}Please find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000614
text: I am interested in different fields so I've learned some techniques.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000615
text: Yes, that's the one. {nl}Give it to me!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000616
text: {nl}Looks everything is still left in the bag since it's not food! {nl}What a relief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000617
text: I will make you the medicine as promised. {nl}As long as you get me the ingredients...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000618
text: The Pretense Intersection is no longer a silent road of the pilgrims because of some wild monsters. {nl}All my colleagues who came for pilgrimage with me were attacked. {nl}I started my pilgrimage to decide on my job and mission. {nl}I had craftmanship since I was young and I was interested in medicinal herbs but you can't live doing everything you like. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000619
text: I wanted to decide if I want to become a pharmacist, or blacksmith or tanner. {nl}I didn't know I would meet them just before reaching the Great Cathedral... {nl}I was not enticed by them because I took my secret medicine. {nl}Drawing out the greed in people and turning people into their servants.. You need to take the medicine so that you won't suffer from one of their servants.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000620
text: The monsters pesting on the roots of wide leafed reeds in Sestines Wilderness have the ingredient to the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000621
text: They are grumpy so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000622
text: Sorry that I can't go with you as my body did not fully recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000623
text: This is the one! Wait for a while. {nl}Although my body is not well yet, I can do this much for someone who got me water...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000624
text: How is it? {nl}Can you feel it? The effects come slowly..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000625
text: Aside

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000626
text: I did drink it but is it really effective? {nl}Should I go and test it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000627
text: Now that you've taken the medicine, you won't fall under the curse of her servants. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000628
text: If I may ask you a favor, there is this one guy full of greed who left for pilgrimage with me... {nl}If possible, please get him back to his senses like you did to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000629
text: I do regret that I did not share the medicine with him.. {nl}The slight guilt...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000630
text: Actually, he had some things that he treasured so maybe he might get back to his senses if you show him the things. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000631
text: I think the reason he lost his senses is because the trees and spring in Mirsta Lake was polluted. {nl}Just my assumption.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000632
text: While running away, I saw him drop something near the Meeting Plaza and gravestone of Wedroka Entrance. {nl}Maybe it's there somewhere...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000633
text: I think it was his mother's belongings. {nl}Although I don't know for sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000634
text: Pilgrim Witas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000635
text: Arrg! Oh you? Why isn't my curse working? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000636
text: Who are you? Even the beauty of the Succubus is not working?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000637
text: Th-that? What is that? What is that in your hand? Give me that! {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000638
text: Aaaak, aaakk, aaakk!!!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000639
text: This place is... Ah... {nl}That is my mother's portrait and handkerchief..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000640
text: My mother gave it to me the day before I left my long journey for pilgrimage. {nl}Ah, mother...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000641
text: Thank you for getting me back to my senses... {nl}I think I was delusioned to do wrong things to everyone who passed this place.{nl}What should I do for all my sins..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000642
text: Pretense Stream

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000643
text: Needs to be purified.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000644
text: Pilgrim soul that was trapped

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000645
text: I was doing the things that I used to despise.. {nl}I am sorry... Being released... I should have thrown away my anger... {nl}I did harsh things to you...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000646
text: {nl}Yes.. Thank you for saving me. It's so nice like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000647
text: Trapped Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000648
text: Thank you for finding my scriptures... {nl}I couldn't leave this world thinking about the one who tore the scriptures. {nl}Now I can... {nl}Thank you...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000649
text: Pilgrim's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000650
text: I can't forgive the betrayers... {nl}I should stop here. {nl}This is something that I don't need anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000651
text: Who are you? Are you dazzled by the beauty of the Succubus?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000652
text: They made me fall into their temptation. {nl}I think it was to curse everyone passing through here and to look for a clue. {nl}Funny that I can't remember it anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000653
text: I wanted to do a lot of things. {nl}Still same though.. {nl}That's why there was many talks about it. {nl}I'm really talkative for someone who does not have a normal body, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000654
text: Ah, are you done? {nl}The trees and springs here.. Are the source that can keep the Pretense Intersection clean. {nl}What happened...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000655
text: According to eyewitnesses, something huge and very scary appeared. {nl}It's face seemed like it's all cracked and had thing fingers. {nl}Considering the surroundings here, I think it's more likely that it's plant type than animal type.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000656
text: You should study the mosses first if you want to study huge plants like that. {nl}Well then, thanks!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000657
text: Where will I head to next after this?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000658
text: There must be many rocks with mosses if you go to the deserted ferry. {nl}I want you to get it from different places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000659
text: Mosses are indicator plants. {nl}Which means you can study the mosses to guess certain pollutants.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000660
text: Oh, nice. {nl}Fresh and looks good enough so this should do!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000661
text: I heard from the soldier in felled area that there is many discolored grass there. {nl}It's not like the weather is cold for it to freeze nor was it colored... What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000662
text: I heard the strange grass is in Naudingas Felled Area. {nl}What a relief that you're here. Haha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000663
text: Naudangis Felled Area is not that far from here. {nl}But the Vubbes will keep chasing you so better be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000664
text: You plan to cross this forest? {nl}You can't. This place is seriously dangerous!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000665
text: Ahh, I'm Scott. {nl}I'm a member of the Highlander and Peltasta Masters' joint investigation team. {nl}We were ordered to investigate what's happening in here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000666
text: I heard that you have great abilities. {nl}So if you insist that you must cross this area... Why don't you just help our investigation?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000667
text: Oh, now we're talking. I like you. Haha. {nl}First, get me some tree barks those Vubbes are carrying around. {nl}The Vubbes won't carry around tree barks for no reason, don't you think? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000668
text: Vubbes are spread all over the area. {nl}They go around in groups so you better be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000669
text: First, I will investigate because it's fishy but... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000670
text: You don't think the Vubbes are up to something, do you? {nl}They are too dumb for that...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000671
text: You're even better than I thought! {nl}We'll get something if we investigate this. We better do because you brought it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000672
text: {nl}Hmm, first, can you deliver the investigations here to Frey?{nl}He's not far from here so you'll find him easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000673
text: It's very unusual like I suspected. {nl}I can feel something evil... It'll need some time to figure it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000674
text: I will look for evidence to who instigated it while you destroy the flag. {nl}Although we didn't catch who it was, I'm sure the demons intervened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000675
text: Good. I have one last favor to ask. {nl}Please defeat the Woodspirits. {nl}Then the rumors about something creepy showing up will be gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000676
text: Thanks. {nl}The Woodspirits were sighted in Atsylka Rest Area. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000677
text: When this is over, we will trace and find out who did this. {nl}It may be a long fight..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000678
text: The demons intervening.. Feels like things are getting bigger. {nl}I think I should report this to the head when it is over. {nl}Frey will want to do it himself but it doesn't feel right. Something like it's a different level?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000679
text: Haha... You're incredibly strong like Scott says, huh? {nl}I didn't imagine you'd defeat the Woodspirit this fast. {nl}I owe you one. Thank you very much. Let's meet again!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000680
text: I have a favor. {nl}Can you take this Wing Fragment to our Owl Chief at Neuoder Field?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000681
text: This Wing Fragment is the Brave Owl's. {nl}It's a very sad and painful thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000682
text: This is a fragment of my friend's wing. {nl}It was broken off by the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000683
text: Please. Deliver this Wing Fragment to the other owls. {nl}It still has the power of the goddess left in it so it will encourage them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000684
text: This is a fragment of Owl Chief's wing... {nl}Thank you. We will continue to work hard!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000685
text: The other owls are in Kongfiska Hill and Clover Highland. {nl}I believe that this strength will help at least a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000686
text: Isn't that a fragment of the chief's wing? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000687
text: Be careful. The monsters are flocking in!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000688
text: Patrol Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000689
text: If you see an unlit bonfire, please light it again. {nl}This place is quite dark even during the day.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000690
text: May the grace of the goddess of fire, Gabija, be with the bonfire... {nl}This will make it last longer, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000691
text: Writings on Pilgrim Memorial Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000692
text: I'm a gravestone, the stroking hand. {nl}The sculptor placed me here as a sign of undying memory.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000693
text: May you have light in your life.{nl}No sadness in your life. {nl}Life is an instant and time will take everything...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000694
text: I'm requesting because there is a soul that I personally want. {nl}It's a soul with deep grudge. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000695
text: The two Soul Stones required to summon his soul can be found in the younger hill of the Siamese Twin Hills. {nl}Please hear my request.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000696
text: It was an altar long ago but now, it's just ruins. {nl}Life of man maybe is as futile as this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000697
text: Oh, this brilliant color. {nl}Yes, this is it. You brought the right one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000698
text: Look at this. What a pity. {nl}It's stuck in the Soul Stone yet craving from strength. {nl}But it isn't showing it's true colors yet. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000699
text: But what I want is a pure soul. {nl}I want you to place the two soul stones in the holy box and purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000700
text: What could have possibly happened to make the soul become like that. {nl}Now it's just something that pollutes the holiness... {nl}Interesting.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000701
text: The wandering of this pitiful soul will end here. {nl}I will keep this with me. {nl}Thank you for listening to the wish of this insignificant tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000702
text: The holy box is located in the older hill of the Siamese Twin Hills...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000703
text: Look at the Meduja Larvaes roaming around. Aren't they beautiful? {nl}Well, this is what I think. {nl}There must be a reason for these beautiful creatures to become wild and violent..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000704
text: The light of Meduja Larvae shine as they absorb memory of the souls roaming around. {nl}So can you gather the Meduja Larvaes?{nl}There are souls who I want to save and I need to read their memory in order to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000705
text: Meduja Larvae flee away if you approach them. Aren't they cute?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000706
text: These would be enough to read their memory. Hold on. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000707
text: I can feel the heart of the souls around here. {nl}It's near Bonewide Cliff, Sudetas Valley, Stone Hill and Duokliu Hall. {nl}Please check each one of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000708
text: Lingering Escort Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000709
text: I need to guard my madam but I can't find her. {nl}I need to protect her from the monsters. {nl}But I can't strengthen up my body.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000710
text: Madam is someone who'd even crawl her way if the carriage breaks down... {nl}At least I have to protect her!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000711
text: I need to protect Madam no matter what...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000712
text: Lingering Soul of Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000713
text: Look what happened to me because of the stupid scholar and sloppy soldier. {nl}Do you think that Madam or whatever is important when I lost my luggage?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000714
text: It gets me angry that I've gone through all the suffering for nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000715
text: My fortune is the most important thing for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000716
text: Lingering Soul of Scholar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000717
text: Did the rescue finally arrive? Did they come to save me? {nl}What? no? {nl}Did Madam fail by any chance? Madam is in danger!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000718
text: We need the scroll that the Lapasape stole in order to save Madam. {nl}If we don't deliver the scroll to Madam..!!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000719
text: We were cowards. We escaped while the escort and merchant were under attack. {nl}There was no way for us to save them..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000720
text: I regret it a lot. {nl}I should have been brave enough..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000721
text: Soul of Lost Lady Explorer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000722
text: Excuse me! Please help me! {nl}Whew, my god! I didn't expect to meet anyone here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000723
text: If we announce that we've found the epitaph of the sculptor, people will recognize our family again. {nl}But strangely, I can't get off my feet. {nl}I need to take down the writings on the epitaph as evidence that it's found..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000724
text: Thinking of which.. I don't know. I don't know who I am, where I am from.. {nl}My head is full of thoughts about that epitaph and I can't think of anything else.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000725
text: It was a memorial stone meant to show to humans but the writings must have had powers of calming the souls. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000726
text: Desperate Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000727
text: Sequoia Flame alone is a critical threat to us. {nl}Those might burn us first. {nl}It's painful and horrible to just think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000728
text: I don't want to burn. {nl}Please help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000729
text: Thank you. Now I don't have to worry about burning. {nl}I'm sick and tired of the Sequoias now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000730
text: Please help. There are souls whose bodies I can't save by myself. {nl}Can you take care of their remains at Nuapti Lowland?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000731
text: They were soldiers heading back home. {nl}But a swarm of monsters suddenly attacked them and...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000732
text: You've gathered them well. {nl}I hope this will comfort them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000733
text: I'm sorry. {nl}I am too weak and wasn't able to comfort them with their remains only. {nl}Maybe the keepsakes that the monsters took would help..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000734
text: This forest was peaceful just four years ago. {nl}Now it's suffering because of the monsters and crying souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000735
text: Thank you. {nl}I'm sure the soldiers are thanking you too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000736
text: This might sound selfish, but.. {nl}I want to give a gift to the souls who followed me. {nl}There's a mysterious bush called Butterfly Fragrance that allows souls to smell the scent of their hometown.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000737
text: No one would want to forget their hometown. {nl}When I smell Butterfly Fragrance, I also reminisce the days before I became a statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000738
text: Thank you very much. {nl}Now they can rest in peace. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000739
text: Please pray for them at the Garden of Consolation later when you have time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000740
text: You are a very kind person. {nl}Butterfly Fragrance only grow in bushes at Butterfly Tomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000741
text: We guide souls to Goddess Ausrine. {nl}But it's a big problem now because the number of souls is multiplying while the goddess is not around.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000742
text: Sad Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000743
text: Help! {nl}A Throneweaver is destroying us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000744
text: Monsters were around even before. {nl}But ever since that tree emerged in the capital, they began to destroy us. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000745
text: Do you think the end of the world is really coming?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000746
text: One... Two... Three... {nl}Yes, this should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000747
text: The Throneweaver likes Sakmoli Roots very much. {nl}If it smells a mix of both, it will jump out right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000748
text: This will be enough to lure it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000749
text: Now go back to Tomb Spider Nest again. {nl}Defeat it when it smells the bait and rushes in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000750
text: Teach it a lesson so that it won't destroy the owls again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000751
text: Thank you. {nl}They will not dare to attack us now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000752
text: To the monsters, our magic powers provide them good nourishment. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000753
text: But we shouldn't end up like that. {nl}Who else will guide the souls then? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000754
text: Shy Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000755
text: Something strange is happening. {nl}The souls I've been guiding have suddenly stopped moving. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000756
text: I think they were caught at Nelaisve Shore but I have no way of knowing. {nl}Please help me. If we don't save the souls, they will fall to evil.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000757
text: More and more wandering souls are beginning to suffer. {nl}Maybe someone is doing this on purpose...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000758
text: Thank you. {nl}Who would do such a thing?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000759
text: Sad Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000760
text: Help me. {nl}Souls are disappearing towards Amolallul Hill. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000761
text: I want to find out what is happening. {nl}Please persuade the souls going to the hill and guide them to me. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000762
text: The souls are disappearing. What do you think is happening? {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000763
text: The souls are saying the Goddess Statue at Amolallul Hill called for them. {nl}But there is no Goddess Statue there...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000764
text: I'm sure someone did this on purpose. {nl}Please go to Amolallul Hill to find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000765
text: There is no Goddess Statue there. What would they be referring to? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000766
text: A monster in disguise as a Goddess Statue. I pity the souls. {nl}Now the souls can rest in peace. It's all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000767
text: If someone is intentionally intercepting the souls, then it can only be the demons. {nl}Why do you think they would want to break the balance?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000768
text: You can find Sakmolis near the Tomb Spider Nest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000769
text: Officer's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000770
text: Can you see me?{nl}Then let me ask you a favor.{nl}I need someone to help us finish our last mission.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000771
text: That Owl Sculpture is not moving an inch. {nl}I heard they guide souls, but I don't think it's true.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000772
text: Good job. This will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000773
text: I will weave this wood to make it human-like. {nl}After this, the crisp skin of Old Kepa at Purple Fountain would be just right. Please do me another favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000774
text: I've spent a long time without salvation. {nl}My men will also be saved if you defeat those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000775
text: You've gathered the skin of the Old Kepas? This will be enough. Good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000776
text: The decoy is ready. {nl}I'm sorry, but I want you to test this on the monsters at Uzesy Hill for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000777
text: Run away if the decoy fails. {nl}I don't want you to become like me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000778
text: The decoy seems alright then. {nl}Follow me to Grobis Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000779
text: Thank you for following me. {nl}Weave in some Ellom Leaves to finish the decoy with hair.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000780
text: Good work. Now it's time for revenge.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000781
text: This is my last favor. {nl}It's at Grobis Crossroads. Please finish our last mission with this decoy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000782
text: If your life is in danger, don't hesitate to run. {nl}I don't want you to get caught up avenging us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000783
text: Whew. Now my men and I can rest in peace. {nl}We will meet the goddess soon. I will pray for her grace towards you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000784
text: Thank you. Thank you very much.{nl}First, please get some Legs of Solid Wood from the Bushspiders at Purple Fountain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000785
text: Well. I don't know what I'm still doing here. {nl}That Owl that's supposed to guide us is not saying a word either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000786
text: Maybe we can go back to the goddess if we achieve what we were not able to. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000787
text: That fellow worries a lot. {nl}I said it's not Deadborn but he's still worrying like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000788
text: It's worth a shot if it's Saltistter. {nl}But if it's Deadborn, then I'm out of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000789
text: I never heard of any Deadborn sightings in Kateen Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000790
text: We had to go through so much to recapture this entrance to Kateen Forest. I don't think Deadborn will appear, would it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000791
text: The monsters' endless raids are tiring us. {nl}If you help us and break their assault, then my soldiers can cheer up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000792
text: Not knowing what happened to the other troops is frustrating.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000793
text: Thank you. I can feel relieved for the time being. {nl}Ah, if you see a soldier named Roy, please tell him to return.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000794
text: We didn't just stay put when we were sieged by the monsters. {nl}We sent out scouts to get away from here but no one came back. {nl}{NP}If it's okay with you, I'd like to ask you to search for them. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000795
text: We need every man we have. {nl}I hope nothing happened to them...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000796
text: You're really trustworthy. {nl}They went up north.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000797
text: Were you sent by Danus? {nl}You're too late. The others were taken out already.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000798
text: The monsters will come to attack again soon. {nl}But I can't move right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000799
text: You saved me. I won't ask you to bring me back to camp, though. {nl}Thank you for saving my life!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000800
text: This is a method I used when I was alive. {nl}It was mostly successful back then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000801
text: The Supply Squad should have arrived already, but they are late. {nl}I'm sure something happened to them. Can you search for them in the lower area?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000802
text: I'm sure we can find our way out of here if we can find the Supply Squad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000803
text: Are you from the Rearguard Unit? {nl}I'm sorry we've been so late. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000804
text: But we are all very tired. {nl}If you want to help us get back to the Rearguard Unit Camp, please help us gather the scattered supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000805
text: All kinds of monsters attack us when we have supplies. {nl}We need more soldiers, but we haven't received any, no matter how much backup we requested.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000806
text: Thank you. {nl}This will be enough to cover for us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000807
text: Right now, it would be best for our troops to join with Danus' troops. {nl} We will join them soon after a little rest so please deliver them the food supplies first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000808
text: We are sorry for delivering the supplies late. {nl}But this is the situation of most supply troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000809
text: What happened? {nl}Is the Supply Squad well on their way? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000810
text: At least the food supplies were delivered first. {nl}Good work. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000811
text: Danus ordered me to return? {nl}I can't return until I collect a Puragi's Hook.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000812
text: My mission is more important than his order to return. {nl}If we were to consider priorities, I mean.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000813
text: Thank you for your help. {nl}But do I just return to Danus' troops?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000814
text: Have you seen a soldier named Roy? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000815
text: You mean you returned him to the Rearguard? {nl}That's bad. We're short on men. You are partly responsible for that now, so you better cooperate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000816
text: Blood will be shed soon. {nl}I pity you for going in Roy's stead.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000817
text: So, just as I've heard. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000818
text: The next mission is to find my missing scouts. {nl}They were sent to Razygis Hill but have not returned for hours.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000819
text: The scout unit was attacked, myself included. {nl}I hope I can at least find the report to send to sir Philipas...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000820
text: Our squad is all dead because of my incompetence. {nl}I'm the only one alive but I don't think I have much time left either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000821
text: This report is completely soaked in blood and unreadable. {nl}I can't stand that my men's efforts were all for nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000822
text: There is one last favor I would like to ask you. {nl}The remains of my men are up in the hills. Please take care of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000823
text: I feel sorry for them being abandoned amongst the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000824
text: Thank you.{nl}My men can now rest in peace. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000825
text: Oh, I've found some readable parts from my men's reports. {nl}Please tell sir Philipas that the monsters will attack the regular troops soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000826
text: ...Is that so? I guess it's too late for the scouts. {nl}I swear to treat them with respect. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000827
text: According to Johan's report, we better strike them from behind. {nl}I will meet you in Isdaigininko Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000828
text: Revenge is best served cold. {nl}Even for Johan and his men.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000829
text: You're here. {nl}Are you ready? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000830
text: The battle has begun. Troops have entered Isdaigininko Highway already. {nl}It will be a big help if you fight with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000831
text: The plan will not fail. {nl}I promise this to Johan's troops.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000832
text: It looks like you've done more than Roy's part. {nl}If it wasn't for you, we would not have been successful. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000833
text: I hope the blessings of the goddess are with you on your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000834
text: I can't close my eyes before we defeat that monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000835
text: When will this pitiful feeling end. {nl}When I look at the souls, I don't think it will end.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000836
text: I can suffice with delayed supplies or reinforcements. {nl}But telling us to just wait around is too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000837
text: I'm afraid where the monsters will jump out from. {nl}I plan to run away if an unknown monster shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000838
text: We're making up for the lacking supplies. {nl}If the supplies don't arrive, we have to cover for it on site.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000839
text: Somehow, at least sir Philipas' troops...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000840
text: There was another route that we used before. {nl}But it got like this when that gigantic tree suddenly emerged. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000841
text: We're clearing up this route to make it easy for supplies but.. {nl}As if the monsters isolating us was not enough, now there are no news of supplies, and the soldiers are becoming weary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000842
text: I'll be grateful if you can do that. {nl}If you relieve us from their attacks, it might even boost the troop's morale.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000843
text: I want to let go of everything and just rest. {nl}But thinking of my men..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000844
text: The monsters are swallowing my companions. {nl}This never happened before that big tree emerged in the capital...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000845
text: There are more and more wandering souls, {nl}and souls that are suddenly disappearing. It's really scary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000846
text: First, you have to find the hiding Throneweaver. {nl}Please gather Ridimed Leaves. The Throneweaver loves it. {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000847
text: Good. {nl}First, defeat the Big Blue Grivas up the hills and put a damper on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000848
text: I feel regretful. I can't close my eyes like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000849
text: I have a request. Please save my companions. {nl}They will be eaten if we don't save them quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000850
text: There is a monster's nest at the end of this road. {nl}My colleagues may still be alive there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000851
text: Thank you. {nl}My colleagues were taken to the nest at the end of the road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000852
text: I can't feel the owl that guides the souls at Ishrai Crossroads. {nl}I'm worried that it may have been attacked by the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000853
text: I hope nothing happened to it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000854
text: Monsters' attacks are becoming stronger and there is no news from the troops that went out. {nl}This is not good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000855
text: Thank you. {nl}I thought I would lay dormant forever like this. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000856
text: It's confusing. {nl}There seems to be something with Lydia Schaffen and Ruklys... but they're still traitors, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000857
text: (You cannot read it because it's broken.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000858
text: We are after an unknown monster. {nl}I hope it's not Deadborn, but I feel like it is. Can you help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000859
text: That's weird. I think I saw a Deadborn.. {nl}What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000860
text: Dear Revelator, please lend us your strength! {nl}We're fighting against Saltistter and us alone is not enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000861
text: You're great, as expected! Commander Vacenin wants to meet you. Go to the camp quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000862
text: Soldier Rudolfas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000863
text: Even if you're the Revelator, this place is too dangerous. {nl}Please go to a safe area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000864
text: What did I tell you? {nl}Thanks for your help but you should turn back quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000865
text: Soldier Aspas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000866
text: I was careless. {nl}It would be big trouble if the monsters attacked now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000867
text: You saved me. {nl}Do you know what happened to my colleagues?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000868
text: Meleech swallowed Dominic's engagement ring. {nl}I did lose it, it's really terrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000869
text: This place is too dangerous for citizens to go around. {nl}Go to a safe area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000870
text: I understand that you are strong but it's dangerous to go around alone here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000871
text: I could have supported O'Rourke and the troops, if only I was not injured...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000872
text: This place is dangerous. {nl}Especially with Ironbaum around, I have not seen such a violent monster before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000873
text: There are still many who have not yet returned. {nl}Do we really have to go through all this danger to clear a path to the Gorge Area...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000874
text: I'm safe thanks to my colleagues. {nl}I did not think we could defeat Ironbaum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000875
text: Bishop Aurelius' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000876
text: Revelator.. It was a long time. {nl}I have awaited centuries to guide you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000877
text: This Great Cathedral is a legacy of Maven, the first bishop, and a sanctuary with a revelation. {nl}But I am unable to leave this precise area. {nl}As it stands, I have no power to aid the holy mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000878
text: It has been worth the long wait. {nl}Although my body is like this, I am overflowing with emotion right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000879
text: This will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000880
text: I believe a scripture will hold the Spirit Essences well enough. {nl}Unfortunately, they are all at Pamaldu Groom. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000881
text: Although I'm just a spirit, I have offered myself to the goddess. {nl}I want to be placed in a scripture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000882
text: Are you done with the ritual? {nl}Check if this scripture can call me correctly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000883
text: Splendid. {nl}Now you must solve the secret of the Great Cathedral and get the revelation. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000884
text: Of course, there will be hardship. {nl}The burden of the holy mission will surely weigh down on your shoulders. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000885
text: But only you and the goddess can save this world..{nl}Even knowing my body would turn out like this, I desired to guide you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000886
text: Don't worry. You just have to finish the bowl to hold me. {nl}First, gather the Essence of Soul. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000887
text: Oh, the vessel should be completed at the Altar of Stability. {nl}I have spent centuries without a body, so I hope you get a decent scripture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000888
text: It's simple. {nl}Use the scripture of soul in your inventory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000889
text: Cleric

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000890
text: This Great Cathedral is like a repository of knowledge. {nl}Of course, that should mean that we can find how to release Naktis' curses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000891
text: I'm roughly done studying this area, but we need the reports of clerics from other areas. {nl}If you meet other clerics in the Great Cathedral, can you get their reports for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000892
text: If we've got the reports, even Naktis' curse will just be as if it were a mere spell. {nl}Yup, that's right. Great work. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000893
text: Isn't it scary in here? {nl}Even the Owl Sculpture feels gloomy..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000894
text: I've heard about sightings of souls with resentment. {nl}If it's true.. Uhh, you're not one of them, are you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000895
text: Grave Keeper Romas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000896
text: Being a Revelator doesn't mean that you can roam around freely tomorrow as you do today.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000897
text: Every Revelator who said that they were different never really made it far.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000898
text: This is no place for civilians to pass by and it won't happen anytime soon. {nl}It's too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000899
text: My colleagues are still inside. {nl}It's frustrating because there's no way to know what happened to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000900
text: I can't forgive them for making the tower such a mess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000901
text: You better watch out. {nl}Why do you think even the wizards ran away?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000902
text: We can help Goddess Gabija if we have the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000903
text: Now that the trasport magic circle is destroyed, we have to go head to head.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000904
text: I think I can remember something... But first, it's important to go to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000905
text: Uhg, my head aches.. {nl}Maybe it's because of the crazy old man a while ago...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000906
text: This is endless. I want to just burn it all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000907
text: I will make them pay for doing this to our tower!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000908
text: I can't stay down like this when you've helped so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000909
text: Even if the odds are against you, you can turn the tables if you make the perfect formation. {nl}But this is all useless for you if you enjoy solitude.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000910
text: They're all dead or ran away. {nl}I guess I'm the only one left in this floor. Those cowards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000911
text: It's a big mistake to look down on Corsairs in ground battles. {nl}As long as there is a place to set foot, we are unbeatable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000912
text: Eternity... Look at Tesla. {nl}You don't think that there is no agedness in eternal life, do you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000913
text: Don't compare me to the old folk who carve owls out of mere tree logs. {nl}I always use the best materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000914
text: Supply Soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000915
text: I don't know about the frontlines but it makes no sense to complain to the Rearguard Unit. {nl}The Rearguards must work well for supplies to make it through.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000916
text: I can't even count how many monsters I had to fight on my way here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000917
text: Being in this battle for so long, I even wonder if there really was a goddess. {nl}I wonder if this is a dream, or whether we can wake up from it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000918
text: Even with the escort troops protecting us, I almost got myself killed twice.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000919
text: The supply troop is safer compared to other troops. {nl}But they do a lot more manual labor, so people avoid it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000920
text: The longer the battle goes on, the more soldiers are deserting. {nl}It's really frustrating.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000921
text: I understand that leaving the supplies and running away means failing the mission. {nl}But you need to be alive to deliver the supplies, don't you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000922
text: Revelation of Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000923
text: If this revelation reaches you, then it would mean that Maven accomplished his mission splendidly.{nl}Here, I would like to tell you about the principles of a world different from this one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000924
text: There is another world beyond the world that you live in. {nl}You cannot cross both worlds unless you have supreme powers. {nl}At least, that was before the Divine Tree emerged. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000925
text: The aftermath of the disaster left a wound, opening cracks that divided these two worlds. {nl}And then, the demons freely crossed between worlds through the dimensional crack. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000926
text: The dimensional crack is scattered across many places. {nl}But the biggest problem would be the one in Demon Prison where the most dangerous demons are imprisoned.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000927
text: If the demons join the ones from Demon Prison through the dimensional crack.. {nl}It will be another threat to this world. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000928
text: I have told Vakarine to prepare for it. {nl}But the uncertainty brought by the torn demons might catch up with her. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000929
text: The gap, once opened, will continue to widen. {nl}Dear Savior, please help Vakarine as quickly as you can. {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000930
text: Bishop

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000931
text: You've arrived. Maven's device is in here. You need to step on both footsteps to release the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000932
text: Whew, this is really endless. {nl}I don't know how much longer I can take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000933
text: We need to stand up again. {nl}Your help gave me the strength to defeat the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000934
text: Dying Pilgrim's Message

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000935
text: Most of the Tree Root Crystals in Ray-lit Land are rotten. {nl}It curses, decomposes, and turns into monsters. {nl}It must be destroyed before more disasters strike.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000936
text: {nl}I don't know who will read this note. {nl}Some Tree Root Crystals have inserted it's core in monsters. {nl}You can destroy at least a pillar if you bring the monster and see it's reaction to the pillar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000937
text: Well done. {nl} Now to continue hereafter at this pace.. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000938
text: About the second secret.{nl}Unfortunately, the demons of Naktis made their move first. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000939
text: I'm relieved we got it back. {nl}I finally get to see the holy relic after death. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000940
text: Bring that holy relic to the Small Hall and place it on top of the altar. {nl}Only then will you be able to get the first key of Maven.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000941
text: I am studying how to release the curse of Naktis. {nl}Can you get me some monster samples for the poor people who are under the curse of monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000942
text: It would have been nice if the Church sent us enough people. {nl}Oh, I better test the samples you brought.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000943
text: Oh no, that's a bland reaction. {nl}I'm sure each curse has it's own characteristic, but it seems like there's a key to it..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000944
text: I think I need to test again rather than just imagining it. {nl}I'm sorry but can you get me a different monster sample this time?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000945
text: I thought I just had to match the properties of the monster but it seems like the opposite. {nl}Naktis.. What could be moving that demon?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000946
text: Oh, I heard from Titas but I didn't think that's you. I feel reassured. {nl}Well then, please support the monster extermination mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000947
text: The other clerics are at the Grand Corridor, Penitence Route, and the Sanctuary. {nl}Research is important but I hope they are safe. {nl}{nl}If you see the other clerics, please send them my regards. {nl}They are in dangerous places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000948
text: Priest Inea

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000949
text: Why is the goddess leaving those blasphemous monsters alone... {nl}Is this also the will of the goddess?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000950
text: It's not easy to get samples. {nl}There is not enough for research too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000951
text: Ah, there was definitely a reaction this time. {nl}I would have had a hard time if it wasn't for your help. Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000952
text: We need to take care of it before it reaches Naktis. {nl}Please defeat the demons and find the holy relic of salvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000953
text: Priest of Evidence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000954
text: Did you find the herbs?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000955
text: Give me the herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000956
text: I need herbs to make the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000957
text: Completed preparing medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000958
text: You need to get all of Maven's keys first. {nl}And you need to solve a lot of secrets to get the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000959
text: Unfortunately, it is Maven's will that you solve every secret by yourself. {nl}First, get on the platform at the Meile Oratorium to solve the first secret and get the Holy Relic of Mercy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000960
text: Writing on the Platform

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000961
text: Remember the holy number with your two eyes. {nl}The light of candles drives away the evil dark.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000962
text: You must thoroughly check the writings on the altar. {nl}Well then, I will.. wait in the Grand Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000963
text: You must have seen the recruitment notice. {nl}It's true that we lack military manpower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000964
text: The person in charge of the mission in Soul Peak is Julian. {nl}He will probably welcome you with open arms.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000965
text: That was great. You were of great help to this mission. {nl}What do you think about enlisting to the army?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000966
text: Can that thing even be broken? {nl}What the.. I'm at a loss for words to say. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000967
text: But you have to pay for damaging public facilities. {nl}Sorry but you have to fix the wooden seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000968
text: Thank you for saying that. {nl}I guess it is better to support Julian's troops in Soul Peak than here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000969
text: I'm planning to exterminate the monsters interfering the route to Gorge Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000970
text: I heard the Pirent Wood in Jade Filled Cliff is solid and elastic. {nl}You can get ropes to tie those from the Red Panto Spearmans. Get me those first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000971
text: Villager Darren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000972
text: Are you the one sent by Joseph of Klaipeda? {nl}Well even if you aren't, please help our village. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000973
text: We were fine even during Medzio Diena, but sometime ago, the bees suddenly turned into monsters. {nl}The other bee farms have already become a mess, and now I'm worried how our bee farm will fare.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000974
text: Our town lived on bee farming and mead. {nl}Goddess Austeja looks after us so we were better off than other villages.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000975
text: And then, on Medzio Diena, our once-normal bees suddenly turned into monsters. {nl}That and Goddess Austeja disappeared, with the priests telling us to wait for her return.. {nl}These days have been frustrating.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000976
text: Really?{nl} The other Revelators just ignored us... {nl}Ours is the Rododun Apiary just down the road. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000977
text: I hope nothing happened. {nl}We put a lot of effort in the farm. We can't just lose it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000978
text: The bee farm is alright? What a relief. {nl}I got to think of a way to protect the bee farm now, quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000979
text: The monsters from other forests are also a problem in addition to the bees. {nl}I'm sure they are preying on honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000980
text: Oh, how about this? {nl}We'll fool the monsters with empty beehives. {nl}If there is no honey, why would the monsters bother attacking the apiary?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000981
text: When was it. I think it was around the same time the bees turned to monsters. {nl}A huge flock of monsters marched into our village. I've never seen that many monsters before. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000982
text: At first, they only gathered around Swaying Arable Land and Spring Light Woods. {nl}But it wasn't long before they moved onto here. {nl}I'm sure they are aiming for the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000983
text: The monsters that smell sweet must have empty beehives. {nl}Goddess Austeja, we will need to borrow some of her help here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000984
text: You got one! {nl}I hope this will be enough to fool them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000985
text: By the way, I'm worried about the brewery of Mr. Dorjen. {nl}He must be fuming after seeing his life's work ruined by monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000986
text: I think he's been planning to burn the entire forest.. {nl}And he is not listening to us. Can you stop him?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000987
text: He spread out oil barrels near Micolas Brewery. You must get rid of those first. {nl}And about Mr. Dorjen.. Please help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000988
text: Brewer Dorjen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000989
text: What could the Revelator possibly want from me.. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000990
text: Hmm? Aren't these my cork stoppers? {nl}Did you just ruin my plan? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000991
text: Don't you dare think of stopping me. {nl}I am going to blow them up, even if it's going to cost me my brewery! {nl}..Can't even trust Revelators anymore now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000992
text: The monsters ruined the beefarm and brewery. {nl}So Joseph went to Klaipeda to look for Revelator who could help us. {nl}{NP}I thought the problem would be solved but guess what happened. {nl}They started disappearing one by one. They backed out. Those cowards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000993
text: Calm down? Do I look like I can calm down?! {nl}Okay. Maybe I can calm down if you get my signature mead from the Honey Wine Warehouse. {nl}That's if you can get it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000994
text: I bet you won't be able to get it. {nl}Just know that if you fail, I will burn down my workshop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000995
text: What in the world.. did you actually get that? {nl}I thought you would give up because of the monsters... You are really remarkable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000996
text: Alright. You win. I won't burn down my workshop as I said. {nl}But I'm still pissed. All those years of work... because of those monsters..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000997
text: Thank you very much. {nl}I will feel much better if you do that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000998
text: I won't think about burning down the forest again. {nl}I'm sure a person with abilities like yours can save our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_000999
text: That is enough. Whoa, Joseph did find great talent,{nl} even though we lost the apiary and brewery. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001000
text: I guess I can trust you unlike other Revelators. {nl}If it's alright, can you go to Maras in Three Brooks Wood?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001001
text: Kirina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001002
text: I followed Darren here because I was worried for him, but what can I do now? {nl}There are so many monsters, I'm worried if I could even make it back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001003
text: The monsters here all seem like they're possessed by something, it's scary. {nl}Now that I think about it, they all seemed to have our honey stuck on them...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001004
text: Thank you. Now how do I get back from here...{nl}Isn't it ironic, that the very bees that are beholden to us have now become monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001005
text: Cleopas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001006
text: I can't take it anymore. Do you know Mikolas? {nl}Oh you wouldn't know. He's a guy I really adore. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001007
text: He started getting mad at me since some time ago and now he wouldn't even look at me. {nl}I have no clue why. I should know the reason at least to apologize or something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001008
text: Oh, that is some sweet advice. {nl}He wouldn't get mad at someone he sees for the first time, would he?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001009
text: Why do you think he is mad? {nl}Can you guess why?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001010
text: Mikolas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001011
text: Oh Cleopas... What a shame on him to ask someone else's help. {nl}He borrowed my brewing machine, sold it somewhere, and now acts like he doesn't know about it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001012
text: How could he do that to me when I was so good to him? {nl}He even lied about it. He said he placed it in front of my workshop but I never received it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001013
text: Is Mikolas not ready yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001014
text: How could he do this to me?{nl}Mikolas...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001015
text: What? That doesn't make sense.{nl}I really left it at my brother's workplace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001016
text: Ah, probably.. it may have been done by Elite Chukaruka.{nl}I saw it licking the brewing device. {nl}Can I ask one more time? What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001017
text: Thank you so much!{nl}I saw an Elite Chukaruka Dvikcoji Rest Area.{nl}If you find the brewing device by any chance, please let Mikolas know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001018
text: I hope the Elite Chukaruka took it.{nl}If not.. I don't wanna see his disappointed face.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001019
text: Oh, Isn't that my brewing device?{nl}Where did you get it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001020
text: Oh my god. I owe you a lot.{nl}And my Cleopas.. I can't lift up my face.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001021
text: I have a favor to ask you.{nl}Please obtain some royal jelly and hand it over to Cleopas.{nl}Cleopas really likes it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001022
text: Us?{nl}We are best friends who grew up in the same village.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001023
text: By the way, why are you asking?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001024
text: Ahah, thank you so much.{nl}You will be able to obtain royal jellies form the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001025
text: If it weren't you, we would have never gotten closer again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001026
text: Um? Isn't this royal jellly?{nl}Mikolas... It is so fortunate. I was able to get rid of the misunderstanding because of you.{nl}May the Austeja bless you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001027
text: Maras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001028
text: Was it you who Joseph was looking for? {nl}I don't care if you're not. {nl}If you don't help me, you will be the same as those Revelators who ran away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001029
text: After all, I've placed all of my faith in the priests, but I just can't it any longer.{nl}That's why I want to hire someone who is skillful like you. {nl}I will compensate you well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001030
text: I don't know what the priests are doing, because anyone would know that the monsters are after the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001031
text: I made a request to Klaipeda, but they have not been responding since they lack the manpower.{nl}And it is not easy to hire mercenaries in this area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001032
text: Thus, the only ones I can count on are the Revelators.{nl}You're looking for a goddess? We once had a goddess in our village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001033
text: Look carefully for undamaged beehives.{nl}With luck, you might obtain some beehives that are in good condition.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001034
text: Oh, this one is quite big.{nl}Good job.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001035
text: Now, go to Vulvini Farm.{nl}If we could provide proof that the monsters are after the honey, the priests should stop only thinking about their altars.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001036
text: There are many altars around here.{nl}You know about them already, no? They were all created to praise Goddess Austeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001037
text: The disciples are only concentrating on the altars so they don't care whether we die in hunger or not.{nl}They think everything will be solved if they pray hard.{nl}That's why we decided to take an action.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001038
text: With a beehive that huge, you will definitely lure monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001039
text: How was it? How did they react?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001040
text: No response?{nl}Darn.. So they weren't just going after the honey.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001041
text: The monsters have been gathering near Bichiu Altar, so I figured they might be amassing honey there.{nl}But if they're not after the honey, maybe they're there for something else.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001042
text: You will find Bichiu Altar if you go down the road from here. {nl}If you see something suspicious, please bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001043
text: You came back sooner than I expected.{nl}How was it? What did you see?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001044
text: So the monsters were going after this fragment?{nl}This is my first time seeing it... I should first check Gaudeji Altar up there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001045
text: If something suspicous comes out like a while ago, please hand it over to Lamar who is near the tree observatory tower.{nl}I really... don't know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001046
text: Lamar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001047
text: Maras told you to show me this?{nl}This is the very object that the priest stressed to us not to touch, was it broken like this originally?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001048
text: I should talk to Maras about this.{nl}Something doesn't feel right... What could this be used for?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001049
text: Riesz

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001050
text: The monsters ruined all the fields so I was trying to start from scratch again.{nl}And then of all a sudden, a Honeypin showed up, so I left everything and ran away.{nl}My farming tools.. I don't know what to do now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001051
text: Thank you so much.{nl}The place where I lost it is Shirsie Sunny Place.{nl}The Honeypin is huge and scary, so don't overdo it if you can't handle it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001052
text: Ah, yes, these are the ones.{nl}Everything would've been okay if we villagers could take care of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001053
text: Valda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001054
text: Maras told us to gather as many empty beehive fragments as we can, but that doesn't make sense at all.{nl}That implies we defeat the monsters, which we can't!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001055
text: I beg you.{nl}Please think of it like saving a person and collect those beehives for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001056
text: Really? I am so touched.{nl}Ah, the beehives are at Saldus Bee Farm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001057
text: I can't do it this time, even if we lose all of this year's supply of honey.{nl}We may be better off just worrying about lost farming tools like Riesz.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001058
text: Wow, they are so fragrant! {nl}Thank you so much. {nl}Ah, please keep this a secret from Maras, okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001059
text: We shouldn't stop farming even if the monsters are making a mess.{nl}But the monsters are still scary. Can you help me? It's not that hard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001060
text: Really? Thank you!{nl}Please sow these seeds at Radanza Farm. Okay, I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001061
text: After you sow the seeds, they will grow by themselves.{nl}Of course, you should take care of them sometimes while avoiding monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001062
text: I am relieved for now.{nl}The rest will be okay when Maras and Lamar get rid of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001063
text: Priest Raeli

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001064
text: Goddess Austeja is sealing two spots that are the source of the vicious energy.{nl}However, due to demons' continuous attacks, the seal is getting weaker.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001065
text: That's why we lured the demons into demonic stones...{nl}Hasty behavior from the villagers created the trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001066
text: There is no way you can say you have nothing to do with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001067
text: I don't know if Medzio Diena was the cause, but since some time ago,{nl}the evil energy began to dwell deep underground.{nl}The energy has accumulated so much, it could explode anytime now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001068
text: Goddess Austeja has been trying her best to seal that energy with her power.{nl}If she had not done that, this forest might have very well turned into a thorn forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001069
text: A land where the only living creatures are monsters.. a devastated land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001070
text: I would briefly explain the situation to you now, but I sense monsters coming this way.{nl}We've prepared a guardian stone at the edge of the village for times like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001071
text: I am relieved by your words.{nl}If we can't hold them back all of Siauliai Woods may be destroyed, so I am counting on you.{nl}
