name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001072
text: I will explain everything to you in detail after you come back.{nl}Please get rid of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001073
text: I am now a little relieved.{nl}My greeting was a bit late. I am Priest Raeli serving Goddess Austeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001074
text: The purification back then?{nl}Unlike the other Revelators who succumbed to the evil energy, I purified you in the name of the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001075
text: The goddesses have already blessed the villagers, they just don't know about it.{nl}The goddesses don't want chaos.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001076
text: It is good to hear that you feel involved.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001077
text: We need to purify those demons to obtain something.{nl}Please obtain the branches of the bee trees near the village. They are endowed with the power of Goddess Austeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001078
text: We should get this done quickly, before the monsters rush in again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001079
text: You brought them. Good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001080
text: Remember how I said that there are two sources of evil energy?{nl}For them both, I will make an orb that will restore the seal for this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001081
text: First, bring me some demons' ashes that I will make the orb with.{nl}When the demons are pierced with these bee tree branches,{nl}they will be overwhelmed by the branch's divine power and turn into ash.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001082
text: Obviously, the goddess' powers can only indirectly affect demons. {nl}You will have to exhaust some of the demon's HP before using a branch on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001083
text: Well done. {nl}It is uncomfortable to use the demons as sacrifice but... we're now reaching the final stage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001084
text: Take this orb. I made it in a hurry, so it's not complete yet. {nl}You must fill it with magic at a place that is full of the goddess' holy energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001085
text: Palama Cliff is the nearest place you can do this at, so please head there. {nl}The demons will be marching in soon, so please hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001086
text: This will be enough. {nl}Please prepare before you restore the seal. It might become a tough battle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001087
text: The weakened seal tower is near Stulr Road. {nl}I'm getting a little bothered about how quiet the demons have been recently.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001088
text: Please hurry. I can feel that the seal is weak. {nl}May you have the goddess' blessings..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001089
text: I believe you are the Revelator who purified the sealed tower?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001090
text: I have been suppressing the evil energy here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001091
text: Please restore the seal tower at Spring Light Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001092
text: After the evil energy gushed out, plants mutated and enlarged abnormally. {nl}It seems dangerous, so I just watched from afar but it fumed out an ominous energy. {nl}I'm worried those mutated plants might harm the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001093
text: That would be so thankful. {nl}But you don't know how dangerous it could be so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001094
text: So could it be the evil forces that turned it to become so grotesque?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001095
text: Ah... the monsters were hiding in it. {nl}But it's a relief that you defeated it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001096
text: Greedy Druva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001097
text: Let me tell you a secret not even the villagers know about. {nl}I went all the way to Fedimian and bought this expensive charm. {nl}They said it will drive away the monsters. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001098
text: And so... {nl}I want to ask for your help putting a scarecrow up with this charm. Hehe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001099
text: I knew you'd get it. {nl}Now, if you want to put up a scarecrow, you'll have to gather the ingredients first. {nl}Please get me some planks of Oak Wood from around the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001100
text: I'd be really rich if things go well this time. Hehe..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001101
text: That's a lot. {nl}It sure is good enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001102
text: Now, please put this scarecrow up with this charm attached to it on my farm. {nl}I want to watch the fun up here by myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001103
text: The farm is located on the left of Arkllui Crossroads. {nl}It's a bit far but that's how I stay low from the villagers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001104
text: Ruined Bee Farmer Logen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001105
text: It's all gone... I have lost everything... {nl}I took care of the beehives for years... and the monsters destroyed everything. {nl}The priest told me to persevere, but...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001106
text: Are you trying to cheer me up? {nl}Then nothing would be better than teaching those monsters a lesson in pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001107
text: I know the priest is right, but I can still rant about it, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001108
text: That makes me feel better. {nl}How I wish they'd all be gone forever.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001109
text: Priest Dazine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001110
text: Revelator. I assume you've heard the story from Goddess Austeja. {nl}That there are a number of Revelators who were addled by the evil energy attacking the village while trying to restore the seal here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001111
text: There is a way to save them. {nl}We can purify them if we find the symbol of Goddess Austeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001112
text: First regain the goddess' symbol and then use it to restore the Austeja Altar. {nl} Purifying the Revelators will come next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001113
text: Whether it's to restore the weakened seal or to cure the addled Revelators, {nl}We will need that symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001114
text: The damage is worse than at the seal in the shaking field. {nl}The evil forces are fuming out stronger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001115
text: Fortunately, the goddess blessed the villagers with her divine protection before focusing her effort on the seal... {nl}The Revelators from before had no way of knowing about this, their fates were sealed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001116
text: This is it, Revelator. {nl}This will save the addled Revelators.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001117
text: The addled Revelators will march towards here soon.{nl}Please purify them before anyone gets hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001118
text: Luckily, they did minimal damage. {nl}Now, if we can restore the seal, this will never have to repeat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001119
text: Restore the weakened seal towers using the symbol of Goddess Austeja.{nl}There is the Rankis Seal and the Ranka Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001120
text: The demons found out about the source of evil energy and so relentlessly attacked to destroy the seal. {nl}I'm sure if the seal is strengthened well this time, they will retreat after a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001121
text: We don't know what will happen next, though.{nl} We just have to believe that Goddess Austeja will take care of everything if anything happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001122
text: One thing that worries me is that... {nl}The symbol was destroyed once so it might not be fully restored again. {nl}Of course, everything will depend... on the goddess...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001123
text: Merchant Dulke

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001124
text: Oh no, what do I do? {nl}I lost all my wares while running away from the monsters. {nl}But I'm afraid I might lose my mind like the other Revelators if I go back for it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001125
text: At a glance, you wouldn't be able to tell if they are a human or a monster. {nl}They would have a blank, soulless stare and when called, it would disappear while making a strange noise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001126
text: And there are more than just one or two of them. {nl}Yet, I think the people in our village are still normal...{nl}Could the goddess have protected us with her blessings?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001127
text: Please help me. {nl}I just started my business with everything I got, and now I'm afraid I'm about to end up with nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001128
text: Oh, I could never thank you enough... yes, this is my stuff. {nl}And I thought it was weird that you were fine, unlike the other Revelators. You truly are a special one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001129
text: Villager Emil

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001130
text: I used to travel in and out of town, but the priests told me to stay put, saying the seal is dangerous.{nl}That seal really is nothing for me, it's the demons that are scary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001131
text: I have to have a livelihood. {nl}The other villagers here just spend all day looking up to the priests and the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001132
text: I've seen other Revelators here that got all weird, but you seem fine.{nl}Did you meet the goddess or something? {nl}Well, you did some great work. I wish I was as strong as you are.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001133
text: Pharmacist Tiana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001134
text: Priest Dazine asked me for medicine to cure the future addled Revelators with,{nl}but I ran out of Spring Light Grass... and I'm also scared of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001135
text: You're such a sweet person. {nl}Oh, Spring Light Grass is not easy to find. {nl}It only appears when it's reacting to this honey jelly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001136
text: Thank you for so much help. {nl}I'm sure this will be more than enough for the priest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001137
text: Church Candlestick

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001138
text: The Church Candlestick is not lit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001139
text: When that tree started to destroy the capital, the spinning wheel of fate turned towards destruction. {nl}Laima said only a human could be chosen as the one to end that cycle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001140
text: I can feel a very strong force of the demon flowing in front.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001141
text: You can't enter it now becuase the doors are sealed. {nl}Pass by the Tikinciuju Gallery and into the room. You'll find the barrier candlestick. {nl}The sealed door will open when you blow the candle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001142
text: The portal to the bishop's hidden room opened. {nl}You can go in the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001143
text: There was a sect to move all the relics to somewhere safe. {nl}But look at how horrible things have turned out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001144
text: How can they do this to the sacred things that contain the words of the great bishops...{nl}It's so resentful to see it just scattered among those blasphemous monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001145
text: Fortunately it does not seem damaged. {nl}If only I was stronger, I would have purified those monsters in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001146
text: Some relics hide themselves when they feel an evil force. {nl}When that happens, you just can't find it no matter how hard you try.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001147
text: That's why I brought the beads that can detect holiness{nl}but look at those monsters' eyes. {nl}They might kill us as soon as we find the sacred things.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001148
text: Yes, good work. {nl}We've found the important things so we can ask the sisters for the other things.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001149
text: The priests in the Great Cathedral were sent to release the curse of Naktis in the Pilgrim's Way. {nl}In my case, I'm looking for important documents but preferably those related to Naktis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001150
text: If you don't mind, can you help me find documents related to Naktis?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001151
text: A lot of the Great Cathedral's facilities and documents were lost on Medzio Diena. Moreover, even the demons are damaging the facilities and documents further.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001152
text: What about the documents?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001153
text: Thank you for finding this much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001154
text: If you find any documents around the Great Cathedral, I want you to bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001155
text: What a trick those demons used... I don't think retrieving the documents will be easy as long the demons are here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001156
text: The demons stole all the documents I gathered.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001157
text: The demons are obsessing over the things to the point it seems really weird. {nl}Last time, the demons stared at the wall for a while then started smashing it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001158
text: And even funnier, they took the fragments from it and left off somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001159
text: You found it all back. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001160
text: Something urgent happened. Naktis' servants began attacking Maven's device. The demons will find the things Maven hid and take it to Naktis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001161
text: We have to get it back before it reaches the hands of Naktis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001162
text: The demons took away the things I got from my friend.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001163
text: I don't know why but the demons are showing obsession over the things.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001164
text: There are two Maven's devices left. {nl}But a problem occurred.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001165
text: I don't know how to release one device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001166
text: There are Naktis' servants around the device so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001167
text: Were you able to gather the data? Great, hand it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001168
text: The data says you need monster's fur, leather, or clothes that it wore. {nl}Defeat Naktis' servants nearby and get their leather and clothes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001169
text: You must be extremely careful of Naktis' servants.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001170
text: You got all the materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001171
text: Use the pot at the end of Laukti Narthex and make the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001172
text: There is a pot at the end of Laukti Narthe which you can use to make it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001173
text: Go to the first device of Maven and get the key. {nl}Then go to the second device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001174
text: I am a priest sent to release the curse that is spread in Pilgrim's Way. {nl}There is a cursed pilgrim in this Penitence Route who I want to experiment with.{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001175
text: He won't take the medicine easily. {nl}Apply it on the meat so that he'll eat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001176
text: It doesn't matter what it is as long as it's edible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001177
text: This should be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001178
text: Defeat the monsters nearby and get meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001179
text: I'll give you the medicine. {nl}Apply it on the meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001180
text: Apply the medicine on the meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001181
text: Give the meat to the pilgrim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001182
text: Give meat to the pilgrim and observe his reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001183
text: Did the pilgrim eat the meat with medicine?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001184
text: Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001185
text: I feel hungry no matter how much I eat...{nl}Hey... Please give me more food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001186
text: Give me some food, quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001187
text: I am part of the priests who were sent to release the curse of Naktis. {nl}We must study and collect data in order to release the curse of Naktis. {nl}But I have to find the bishop who said he'd protect the Cathedral after Medzio Diena. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001188
text: Will you help me find him?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001189
text: Oh no... The bishop returned as a corpse... {nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001190
text: I need to bury the bishop but there are too many monsters around.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001191
text: I shouldn't have left him in the Great Cathedral...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001192
text: I received your help again. Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001193
text: I'm worried about the whereabouts of the bishop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001194
text: Use Naktis' monsters... {nl}But how can we use them... {nl}Aha! We can turn into Naktis' monsters from the Sanctum and make the other monsters destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001195
text: There are materials in the Sanctum with instructions on how to make a medicine that turns you into a monster. {nl}Find those materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001196
text: Now it's time to tell Naktis' monsters where Maven's device is located.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001197
text: I fell while holding the materials, and they slid under that device. {nl}It keeps moving up and down making it difficult to get them out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001198
text: That was close.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001199
text: I'm sure Naktis' monsters took it. {nl}We better find the key quickly.

text: Talk to Soldier Samson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001903
text: Soldier Samson seems to be troubled. Talk with Soldier Samson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001904
text: Look for the engagement ring in Meleech's stomach

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001905
text: Soldier Samson says that he is too tired to be ordered around by Dominic. As Samson requested, defeat Meleech and look for the engagement ring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001906
text: Give it to Soldier Samson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001907
text: I found a sticky lump with the ring in it. Return to Soldier Samson and give it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001908
text: Meleech that swallowed the engagement ring

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001909
text: An object that looks like a ring is visible through the disgusting lump, but I have no way of taking it out. Talk with Soldier Samson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001910
text: Collected Dry Thorn Forest Wood from Ishisineti Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001911
text: Soldier Samson told you that he may be able to obtain the ring by burning the lump. Collect Dry Thorn Forest Wood to burn from Ishisineti Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001912
text: Got an ample amount to light up. Hand them over to Soldier Samson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001913
text: Even after you brought the Dry Thorn Forest Wood, it seems that Samson is still worried. Talk with Soldier Samson again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001914
text: Set the firewood at the top of Ishisineti Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001915
text: The ring can be extracted by burning the lump atop the firewood. On behalf of Samson who is concentrating on his work, set the firewood at the top of the cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001916
text: The fire is now ready to be started. Return to the Soldier Samson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001917
text: Inspect the Rotten Stump

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001918
text: There is an interesting rotten tree stump over at Suvyte Cliff. Why not try touching it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001919
text: Defeat Giant Red Wood Goblin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001920

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001921
text: Talk with Soldier Rinas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001922
text: It was a little dangerous, but you were able to defeat all the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001923
text: Defeat Giant Red Wood Goblin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001924
text: Talk to Commander Julian

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001925
text: Commander Julian is troubled with no one able to do a mission. Talk to Commander Julian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001926
text: Hand it over to Soldier Poulter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001927
text: Commander Julian asked you to help with his work. Pass the order he gave you to the Soldier Poulter at Zaizda Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001928
text: Talk to Soldier Poulter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001929
text: Upon receiving the order, Poulter's face grew gloomy. Talk to Soldier Poulter again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001930
text: Defeat the monsters nearby to help Poulter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001931
text: Soldier Poulter is agonizing over an order that seems unreasonable to him. Get rid of the monsters nearby on behalf of Soldier Poulter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001932
text: You defeated all the monsters nearby. Talk with Soldier Poulter again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001933
text: Defeat the nearby monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001934
text: Since you passed the order to Soldier Poulter, go back to Commander Julian and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001935
text: Talk to Commander O'Rourke

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001936
text: Commander Julian wants you to support O'Rourke's unit, which lost strength due to many battles. Talk to Commander O'Rourke at Veltui Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001937
text: You defeated Infrogalas that suddenly attacked. Talk with Commander O'Rourke.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001938
text: Defeat the attacking Wood Goblins

text: Defeat Treegools at Byreti Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001942

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001943
text: Report to the Substitute Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001944

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001945
text: Defeat Treegools

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001946
text: Talk with O'Rourke

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001947
text: Commander O'Rourke is astonished by your skills after seeing you defeating the monster ambush. Talk with Commander O'Rourke.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001948
text: Look for the soldiers at Niurus Highway

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001949

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001957

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001962

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001965
text: Find the grave at the Sunset Flag Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001969

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001970
text: Find the Messenger

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001971
text: Commander Vacenin sent a messenger into the depths of the forest and is worried. He is likely at the Crying Place. Go find him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001972
text: Find the Messenger at the Crying Place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001973
text: Commander Vacenin is worried about the messenger he sent and asked you to search for him. Find the Messenger near the Crying Place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001974

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001975
text: Retrieve the Bag of the Messenger and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001976
text: Defeat the monsters who attacked the Messenger

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001977
text: Talk with Scott

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001978
text: He has to go to Kateen Forest to look for the sculptor, but it is too dangerous to cross there due to an unknown incident. Ask him what you can do for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001979
text: Scott wants to investigate the moss. Please collect the moss from the dock.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001980
text: We have enough moss to be investigated. Return to Scott

text: Collect %s stuck on a rock

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001982
text: Scott heard from the soldiers from the felled area that the grass that has unique color is growing. Collect the unique grass from Naudingas felled area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001983
text: You have collected enough unique grass. Return to Scott.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001984
text: Gather %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001985
text: You should cross here to look for the sculptor of Kateen Forest which the revelation of the goddess is indicating, but the man with unnormal clothes is investigating something diligently. Talk to him what's going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001986
text: Scott said he came here to investigate the dangerous incident that occurred here and suggested you to move with him. To aid his investigation, please collect the tree barks from Vubbes that are carrying spears.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001987
text: You have collected enough tree barks. Return to Scott.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001988
text: Obtain %s by defeating Red Vubbes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001989
text: Talk with Royal Survey Corps Ukert

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001990
text: You thwarted the conspiracy to make the Woodspirits, but you should get rid of the Woodspirits that were already created. Talk with Ukert.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001991
text: Defeat Woodspirits

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001992
text: Defeat Woodspirits that are the source of the bad rumor of the Forgotten Dock.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001993
text: You finally defeated the Woodspirits that were the source of the bad rumor of the Forgotten Dock. Return to Ukert.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001994
text: Talk to the Scared Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001995
text: The Scared Owl Sculpture is calling you desperately. Talk with the Scared Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001996
text: Give it to the Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001997
text: The Scared Owl asked you to send it's friend's Wing Fragment. Hand over the fragment to the Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture at Neuoder Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001998
text: Talk with the Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_001999
text: The Earnest Owl Chief looks sad after receiving the Wing Fragment. Talk with the Earnest Owl Chief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002000
text: Send the wing to the Devoted Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002001
text: The Earnest Owl Chief wants you to pass his Wing Fragment that is endowed with the power of the goddess to the owls in this region. Give the Wing Fragment to the Devoted Owl Sculpture at Kongfiska Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002002
text: Hand the Wing Fragment to the Troubled Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002003
text: The Earnest Owl Chief wants you to pass his Wing Fragment that is endowed with the power of the goddess to the owls in this region. Give the Wing Fragment to the Troubled Owl Sculpture at Clover Highland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002004
text: Report to the Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002005
text: You've handed over the Wing Fragments to all the owls. Return and report to the Earnest Owl Chief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002006
text: Defeat the monsters that are attacking the Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002007
text: Talk to the Patrolling Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002008
text: The Patrolling Officer has been staring at you for some time. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002009
text: Light up the Bonfires

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002010
text: The patrolling officer asked you to light up the Extinguished Bonfires. Light up the bonfires for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002011
text: You lit up the Extinguished Bonfires. Talk with the Patrolling Officer again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002012
text: Light up the Bonfire.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002013
text: Talk to Commander Felix

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002014
text: On behalf of the Messenger who can hardly move, tell Felix that the operation at Peledos Crossroads has started.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002015
text: Talk with the Commander Vacenin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002016
text: Return to Vacenin and tell him that the messenger is safe

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002017
text: The grave protecting owl seems to want something. Talk with the grave protecting owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002018
text: Collect two spirit stones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002019
text: The grave protecting owl says there is a spirit with the great resentment and wants to have the spirit. Obtain the two spirit stones to summon the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002020
text: It seems that you have collected all spirit stones to summon the spirit. Return to the grave protecting owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002021
text: Talk with the grave protecting owl

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002022
text: It seems that something is still lacking with only spirit stones. Talk with the grave protecting owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002023
text: Summon the corrupted spirit and defeat it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002024
text: The grave protection owl wants to have only the pure part of the spirit. Put the spirit stone into the holy box and purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002025
text: It seems that you purified the spirit as the grave protection owl wanted. Return to the grave protection owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002026
text: Obtain %s by defeating the collapsed spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002027
text: The desperate owl has something to do. Talk with the owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002028
text: Collect Miduza Larvae

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002029
text: The desperate owl says it wants to save some spirits. Collect Miduza Larvae that absorb the memories of spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002030
text: It seems that you collected enough memories of spirits. Hand them over to the desperate owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002031
text: Talk with the spirit of the escort soldier that has lots of regrets

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002032
text: The spirit of escort soldier that has lots of regrets is desperately looking for her. Talk with the spirit again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002033
text: Defeat Colimenprus near the wagon

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002034
text: The spirit of escort soldier has to protect her, but he is too exhausted to use any remaining energy. Get rid of the Collimenprus near the wagon for the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002035
text: As you eliminated Collimenprus near the wagon, the spirit is satisfied.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002036
text: Defeat Collimenprus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002037
text: Talk with the spirit of the merchant with many regrets

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002038
text: It seems that there is a spirit that is rejecting the salvation since it has many regrets in this world. Find the spirit of the merchant with many regrets and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002039
text: Find the luggage of the merchant with many regrets

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002040
text: The merchant is not satisfied for losing all of his luggage. Do you think you will be saved if you find all of his luggage?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002041
text: After you found all the luggage, the spirit of the merchant with many regrets seems to be satisfied now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002042
text: Talk with the spirit of the scholar with many regrets

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002043
text: The spirit of the scholar with many regrets were trying to help someone. Talk with the spirit again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002044
text: Retrieve the ripped order paper

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002045
text: The spirit told you that he needs the order paper to save her. Retrieve the ripped paper from Lapasape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002046
text: After you found the order paper, the spirit seems to be happy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002047
text: Talk with the wandering adventurer's spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002048
text: It seems that you found the spirit of the wandering adventurer that doesn't know what to do. Talk with the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002049
text: Write down what's in the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002050
text: The spirit of the wandering adventurer finally found the the epitaph, but somehow he can't move. For the adventurer, copy down what's on the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002051
text: The spirit of the wandering adventurer seems to be satisfied now. Return to the desperate owl sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002052
text: Talk with the desperate owl sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002053
text: I can see the shade from the desperate owl. Talk with the desperate owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002054
text: The desperate owl is scared of dying in the flames of Sequoia. Extinguish the flames of Sequoia for the desperate owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002055
text: It seems that the flames of Sequoia are not strong anymore. Return to the desperate owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002056
text: Talk to Officer Danus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002057
text: You can see an exhausted Officer Danus. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002058
text: Defeat the monsters that are attacking the Readguard Unit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002059
text: Officer Danus says that his squad has been cut off due to the monsters. Defeat the monsters nearby for Danus' Squad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002060
text: I think the squad can be freed from the monsters now. Talk to Officer Danus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002061
text: Talk to the Weak Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002062
text: There are many Owl Sculptures that guide souls in Kateen Forest. Listen to the story of the Weak Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002063
text: Collect the soldiers' corpses

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002064
text: They were soldiers of a tragic tale. After collecting their corpses, take them to Weak Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002065
text: The Weak Owl trying to calm the soldiers seems to be in trouble. Talk to the Weak Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002066
text: Collect the soldiers' belongings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002067
text: The Weak Owl tried to calm the dead soldiers with their corpses, but it couldn't calm the others. To calm the dead soldiers, collect their belongings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002068
text: Talk to Weak Owl with the dead soldiers' belongings that you have gathered.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002069
text: Obtain %s by defeating Ellomago

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002070
text: Soldiers' Belongings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002071
text: The dead soldiers seem calmed with their belongings. Talk to the Weak Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002072
text: Collect Butterfly Fragrance

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002073
text: The Weak Owl wants to give the dead soldiers who followed it well Butterfly Fragrance, which reminds them of their hometown, as a gift. Collect the Butterfly Fragrance from the bushes with broad leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002074
text: You've collected enough Butterfly Fragrance to give to the dead soldiers. Return to the Weak Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002075
text: Prayer for the Regretful Souls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002076
text: The souls that passed away sadly sleep at the Garden of Consolation near the Goddess Statue. Pray in front of the Goddess Statue and calm the souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002077
text: Perform the Memorial Ceremony

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002078
text: As you prayed in front of the goddess, the regretful souls started to gather toward the Goddess Statue! Protect these souls for a specified time frame.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002079
text: Talk to the Sad Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002080
text: There are many Owl Sculptures that guide the souls in Kateen Forest. Listen to the story of the Sad Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002081
text: Collect Ridimed Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002082
text: The Sad Owl said a Throneweaver keeps trying to destroy the owls. Lure the Throneweaver out with the Ridimed Leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002083
text: You have collected enough Ridimed Leaves that the Throneweaver likes. Return to the Sad Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002084
text: Ridimed Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002085
text: You have collected enough Ridimed Leaves that the Throneweaver likes. Return to the Sad Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002086
text: Obtain Sakmoli Roots

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002087
text: The Sad Owl suggested you use Sakmoli Roots to lure out the Throneweaver. Collect Sakmoli Roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002088
text: You have obtained some Sakmoli Roots. Talk with the Sad Owl about what to do next from here on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002089
text: Sakmoli Roots

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002090
text: Talk to the Shy Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002091
text: There are many Owl Sculptures that guide souls in Kateen Forest. Listen to the story of the Shy Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002092
text: Rescue the spirit of the restrained soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002093
text: The Shy Owl told you that the souls that once followed its guidance stopped moving some time ago. Find out what happened to the souls and do something to make them move again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002094
text: The souls were being tied with branches. By releasing the souls from the restraints, could you find out the origin of the evil energies? Talk to the Shy Owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002095
text: Talk to Sad Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002096
text: There are not only restrained spirits among wandering spirits. Listen to the detailed story from the sorrowful owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002097
text: Persuade the souls that lost their way

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002098
text: The sorrowful owl told you that the spirits that went to the statue of the goddess for comfort are agonizing themselves so something must be wrong. Persuade the spirits that try to go to the Goddess Statue and take them to the sorrowful owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002099
text: The sorrowful owl heard enough stories about what's happening to the spirits. Return to the sorrowful owl and ask what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002100
text: The Sad Owl spoke with the souls. Talk to the Sad Owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002101
text: Find out what happened at Amolallul Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002102
text: The souls are claiming that the Goddess Statue at Amolallul Hill were calling them but, the Sad Owl told you that there isn't a statue there. Go to Amolallul Hill to find out exactly what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002103
text: A Corrupted disguised itself as a Goddess Statue. Demons masquerading as goddesses are unforgivable. Return and report this to the Sad Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002104
text: Defeat the Gray Golem that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002105
text: Advance to defeat the Gray Golem that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002106
text: After you touched an unknown monster, a Gray Golem suddenly appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002107
text: Defeat the Gray Golem that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002108
text: Talk to the Officer's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002109
text: The souls of some soldiers who aren't ready for salvation and a spirit that looks like their Officer doesn't know what to do. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002110
text: Collect Legs of Solid Wood from Bushspiders

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002111
text: The Officer's Spirit vowed get revenge on the monsters who killed him and asked you to bring Legs of Solid Wood from Bushspiders.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002112
text: You've collected all the Legs of Solid Wood that the Officer's Spirit asked you to collect. Return to the Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002113
text: Collect %s from Bushspiders

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002114
text: Something seems to be lacking with only wooden legs. Let's talk to the Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002115
text: Collect Kepa Skin that make rustling sounds

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002116
text: The Officer's Spirit is trying to make a human figure by tying the wooden legs. Let's collect some skin that make rustling sounds from the old Kepas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002117
text: You have collected enough skin. Return to the Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002118
text: Collect %s from Old Kepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002119
text: Obtain Rustling Skin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002120
text: It seems that you have collected enough materials to make a decoy. Talk to the Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002121
text: Demon Decoy Experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002122
text: The decoy for the demons was completed, but the Officer's Spirit doesn't seem convinced that it will work. Let's use the decoy on monsters to see if it's working properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002123
text: Fortunately, the monsters are reacting to the decoy well. Return to the Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002124
text: The decoy was completed well. Talk with the Officer on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002125
text: Collect Ellom Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002126
text: To make a better decoy, the spirit suggested that you tie Ellom Leaves together and make it look like hair. Let's collect Ellom Leaves as suggested by the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002127
text: You have collected enough Ellom Leaves that will be used as hair for the decoy. Let's go back to the Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002128
text: Obtain %s by defeating Elloms

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002129
text: Ellom Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002130
text: The spirit told you that he will go to Grobis Crossroads. Go there and talk to the spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002131
text: Complete the last mission using the decoy at Grobis Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002132
text: This will be the last mission. Defeat the demons that killed the officer and his soldiers using the decoy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002133
text: You've defeated the monsters using the decoy. Talk to the spirit again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002134
text: Defeat 10 monsters within 1 minute and 30 seconds

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002135
text: Talk with the Scouts

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002136
text: It seems that the Scouts have differing opinions on whether Deadborn is nearby. Talk to the Scouts again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002137
text: Defeat Deadborn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002138
text: Deadborn suddenly attacked. Defeat Deadborn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002139
text: Officer Danus doesn't know what to do. Talk to Officer Danus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002140
text: Look for Danus' scouts

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002141
text: Officer Danus told you that the scouts who were sent to find out what's going on around here were all lost. Look for the scouts who went to the Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002142
text: Talk to Danus' Scout

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002143
text: It seems that you found one of the scouts that were lost. Talk to the Scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002144
text: Defeat the monsters that are rushing in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002145
text: The Scout said that the monsters would soon attack. Defeat the monsters that are rushing in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002146
text: You've defeated all the monsters that are rushing in. Talk to the Scout again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002147
text: Defeat Bites

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002148
text: Officer Danus seems to be waiting for someone. Talk to Officer Danus again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002149
text: Look for the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002150
text: Officer Danus is desperately looking for the Supply Squad. At the lower end of the Rearguard Unit Camp look for the Supply Officer and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002151
text: Talk to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002152
text: You've found the Supply Squad. Talk to the Supply Officer again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002153
text: Retrieve the Supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002154
text: The Supply Officer told you that the soldiers are exhausted, so he asked you to retrieve the Supplies on behalf of them. Retrieve the Supplies that are scattered nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002155
text: Hand it over to the Supply Officer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002156
text: Acquired all the scattered Supplies. Give them to the Supply Officer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002157
text: Since you've retrieved all the Supplies, talk to the Supply Officer so that the Supply Squad can unite with the Rearguard Unit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002158
text: Hand over the supplies to Officer Danus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002159
text: The Supply Officer told you that since the soldiers are exhausted, it will be hard for the Supply Squad to move right away. So when you hand over the Supplies, the complaints from the Rearguard will be reduced. Hand over the supplies to Officer Danus on behalf of the Supply Squad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002160
text: Talk to Soldier Roy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002161
text: It seems that you found Soldier Roy. Talk to Soldier Roy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002162
text: Obtain a Puragi's Hook

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002163
text: Soldier Roy told you that he can't go back before he completes his mission. Collect a Puragi's Hook to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002164
text: Hand it over to Soldier Roy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002165
text: You've got a Puragi's Hook. Hand it over to Soldier Roy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002166
text: Talk to Senior Officer Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002167
text: Senior Commander Philipas is waiting for Soldier Roy at the Center Unit Camp. Talk to Philipas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002168
text: Defeat a Big Blue Griba at the hills

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002169
text: Senior Officer Philipas is blaming you for Soldier Roy being at the Rearguard. First defeat a Big Blue Griba at the hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002170
text: Report to Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002171
text: You've defeated a Big Blue Griba on the hills. Report to Senior Officer Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002172
text: Look for Squad Commander Johan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002173
text: Senior Officer Philipas is telling you that he direly needs the report of his scouts, but the scouts are not coming back. Look for the scouts who left for Razygis Hills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002174
text: Look for the report from the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002175
text: Squad Commander Johan told you that all his colleagues are dead and he is the only one that managed to survive. Defeat the monsters nearby and look for the report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002176
text: Give them to Squad Commander Johan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002177
text: You found the reports that are not readable since they are soaked with blood. Hand them over to Squad Commander Johan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002178
text: Talk to Squad Commander Johan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002179
text: Johan thought deeply about something after receiving the reports that are soaked with blood. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002180
text: Collect the remains of a soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002181
text: Squad Commander Johan is sad to discover that the corpses of his comrades are left with the monsters. Recover the remains of the soldiers for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002182
text: Hand them over to Squad Commander Johan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002183
text: You've finished retrieving all the remains. Hand them over to Squad Commander Johan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002184
text: Please report Squad Commander Johan's message, and the story of his colleagues to the Senior Officer Philipas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002185
text: Follow the Senior Officer Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002186
text: Senior Officer Philipas is trembling with fury and decided to head to battle. Follow Philipas to Isdaigininko Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002187
text: Senior Officer Philipas' Mission

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002188
text: All the soldiers are participating in the battle. Talk with Senior Officer Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002189
text: The soldiers are already fighting against Mushwort. Defeat Mushwort.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002190
text: Report to Senior Officer Philipas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002191
text: You've defeated the Mushwort. Talk to Philipas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002192
text: Found a herd of small Gribas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002193
text: There is a small herd of Gribas near the Rearguard Unit Camp. Let's go and see them carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002194
text: As you touched the small Gribas, Big Blue Gribas appeared. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002195
text: There are the belongings for an unknown soldier who died here due to the monsters. He might be the owner of the necklace that you picked up. Wear it for him and pray for his soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002196
text: Defeat Werewolf

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002197
text: So that's the Werewolf that led the unknown soldier to the death. Defeat the Werewolf and pray for his soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002198
text: Pray for his soul

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002199
text: Pray for his soul in front of the belongings of the unknown soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002200
text: You've got enough Sakmoli Roots that you would use to lure Throneweavers. Talk with the Sad Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002201
text: Defeat Throneweaver

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002202
text: Defeat Throneweaver for the Sad Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002203
text: Defeated the Throneweaver that was destroying the owl sculptures. Talk to the Sad Owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002204
text: Defeat Throneweaver

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002205
text: Talk with Soldier Rudolfas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002206
text: Talk with Soldier Rudolfas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002207
text: Defeat the Meleeches that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002208
text: Meleeches appeared while you were talking to Soldier Rudolfas. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002209
text: Defeat the interfering monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002210
text: Talk to Soldier Aspas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002211
text: Wounded soldier Aspas is looking for someone's help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002212
text: The monsters are attacking Aspas. Defeat the monsters for Aspas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002213
text: You've protected Soldier Aspas from the monsters. Talk to Soldier Aspas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002214
text: Defeat the Keparaiders that are attacking

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002215
text: Enter the Square of Lamentation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002216
text: Enter the Square of Lamentation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002217
text: Talk to Royal Army Guard Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002218
text: Talk to Royal Army Guard Retia

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002219
text: Royal Army Guard Retia is waiting for someone's help at the Square of Lamentation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002220
text: Royal Army Guard Retia asked you to defeat the monsters at region A.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002221
text: You defeated the monsters as Royal Army Guard Retia requested from you. Return to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002222
text: Examine the Petrification Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002223
text: Royal Army Guard Retia has asked you to check the petrification devices that are installed at various places in the Square of Lamentation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002224
text: As Royal Army Guard Retia requested to you, you checked the petrificaion devices. The reactions on the devices are abnormal. Let's go back to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002225
text: Remove the weak Petrifying Frost

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002226
text: Royal Army Guard Retia asked you to remove all weak Petrifying Frost at Area A. Use the scroll to absorb Petrifying Frost to eliminate the weak Petrifying Frost as you discover them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002227
text: As Royal Army Guard Retia requested to you, you've removed all the weak Petrifying Frost. Return to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002228
text: Royal Army Guard Retia requested you to defeat Sparnashorns that attack the Royal Army guards before the Petrifying Frost starts. When the Petrifying Frost start from A area, you will be able to see Sparnashorn. Check the petrification device again to seee whether Petrifying Frost started.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002229
text: As Royal Army Guard Retia requested to you, you successfully defeated Sparnashorn before the Petrifying Frost started. Return to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002230
text: Talk to Grave Robber Hubertas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002231
text: Grave Robber Hubertas is waiting for someone's help at the Square of Lamentation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002232
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to defeat the monsters at Area A so he can start to excavate some stuffs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002233
text: As Grave Robber Hubertas requested, you've defeated enough monsters at Area A. Return to Hubertas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002234
text: Collect monsters' toenails

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002235
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas asked you to obtain the toe nails of the monsters that are being traded for high prices among the Royal Army guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002236
text: You've collected enough toe nails of the monsters as Grave Robber Hubertas requested of you. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002237
text: Steal Petrification Stolen Goods

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002238
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to steal Petrification Stolen Goods that Dico Thieves set on A area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002239
text: You've stolen the Petrification Stolen Goods from the Dico Thieves as Grave Robber Hubertas requested. Let's go back to Hubertas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002240
text: Collect Petrified Flower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002241
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to collect the Petrified Flowers that are being traded for high prices among the aristocrats in big cities.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002242
text: As Grave Robber Hubertas requested, you've obtained enough Petrified Flowers. Let's go back to Hubertas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002243
text: Deliver the Cryptically Engraved Bottle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002244
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to find Grave Robber Benjaminas who is hidden among the guards. When you hand over the water jars that are engraved with passwords, Benjaminas would recognize it and talk to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002245
text: Talk to Grave Robber Benjaminas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002246
text: Someone is calling you among the guards!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002247
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas is waiting for someone's help at the Square of Lamentation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002248
text: Collect Fragrant Stone Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002249
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas told you how to get past the soldiers while avoiding their eyes. Let's collect the Fragrant Stone Powders from the monsters in area A.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002250
text: You've collected Fragrant Stone Powder as Grave Robber Benjaminas requested. Let's go back to Benjaminas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002251
text: Rub the Fragrant Stone Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002252
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas told you to rub the Fragrant Stone Powder on the monsters in area A to lure Saltistter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002253
text: As Benjaminas suggested to you, you rubbed the powders on the monsters. Before Saltistter appears, let's go back to Benjaminas to carry on to the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002254
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas has asked you to tell that Saltistter has appeared as planned to Royal Army Guard Retia. When the soldiers go out of the camp to face Saltistter, the colleagues of Benjaminas would move safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002255
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas and his accomplices passed safely. Let's go back to Grave Robber Benjaminas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002256
text: Defeat Saltistter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002257
text: Talk to Guard Gofden

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002258
text: Guard Gofden is waiting for someone's help at the gloomy market place in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002259
text: Guard Gofden asked you to help here. Defeat the monsters nearby to help Gofden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002260
text: You've defeated all the monsters nearby as Guard Gofden requested of you. Let's go back to Gofden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002261
text: Destroy the Rebel Army Records

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002262
text: Guard Gofden asked you to destroy the records of the rebels that were left neglected for a long time. You can find the records of the rebels from the Trade District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002263
text: As Guard Gofden requested of you, you've destroyed most of the rebel's records. Let's go back to Gofden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002264
text: Collect Guard's Memento

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002265
text: Guard Gofden asked you to get the mementos of the petrified guards from Parduo Plaza Site and the Trade District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002266
text: As Guard Gofden requested of you, you've collected the belongings of the petrified guards. Let's go back to Gofden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002267
text: Talk to Cryomancer Kostas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002268
text: Cryomancer Kostas is looking for someone who can help with his work at the gloomy market in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002269
text: Cryomancer Kostas came here to look for a way to remove the curse of the petrification, but he can't concentrate on his research activities due to the monsters here. Defeat the monsters around and help his research activities.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002270
text: You've defeated the monsters nearby as requested by Cryomancer Kostas. Let's go back to Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002271
text: Experiment with the Inferior Ice Wall Scroll

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002272
text: Cryomancer Kostas has asked you to experiment Inferior Ice Wall Scroll at the street of masters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002273
text: As Cryomancer Kostas has requested of you, you successfully completed the Ice Wall Scroll experiment. Let's go back to Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002274
text: Collect Sparkling Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002275
text: Cryomancer Kostas has asked you to collect Sparkling Stones that may contain the symbol of silk by defeating X monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002276
text: As Cryomancer Kostas requested, you've collected the Sparkling Stones. Let's go back to Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002277
text: Cryomancer Kostas is looking for someone who can complete his experiment at the groomy market in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002278
text: Look for Kostas who ran away

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002279
text: Cryomancer Kostas ran away with the symbol of silk. He doesn't seem to solve the petrified curse. Let's look for Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002280
text: Defeat Glackuman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002281
text: Talk with Grave Robber Rudolfas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002282
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas is looking for someone's help at the groomy market in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002283
text: Defeat monsters at the workplace

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002284
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas asked you to defeat monsters at the workplace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002285
text: As Grave Robber Rudolfas requested, you've defeated the monsters at the workplace. Let's go back to Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002286
text: Help the excavation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002287
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas asked you to help with the excavation. As Rudolfas works on the excavation, let's face against the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002288
text: For Grave Robber Rudolfas to work well enough, let's eliminate the monsters nearby. Let's go back to Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002289
text: Defeat Blue Sequoia

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002290
text: Talk to Guard Lyle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002291
text: Guard Lyle is waiting for someone's help at Ruklys Street in the Petrified City.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002292
text: Guard Lyle asked you to defeat the monsters that are roaming around the checkpoint.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002293
text: As Guard Lyle requested, you've defeated enough monsters. Return to Lyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002294
text: Protect the petrified victim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002295
text: Guard Lyle asked you to protect the guards that are dying due to their exposure to the Petrifying Frost at the great square. Write down the wills of the guards and defeat the monsters that are attacking.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002296
text: As the Guard Lyle requested to you, you've protected the will and the last moment of the victims of the Petrifying Frost. Let's go back to Lyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002297
text: Protect the victim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002298
text: Arrest the Dico Thieves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002299
text: Guard Lyle asked you to suppress the Dico Thieves that are stealing stuff at the Trade District. After you are done suppressing them, Lyle and Nomabis are going to arrest them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002300
text: As the Guard Lyle requsted of you, you've helped the Dico Thieves. Let's go back to Lyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002301
text: Talk to Guard Nomabis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002302
text: Guard Nomabis is waiting for someone's help at Ruklys Street in the Petrified City.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002303
text: Retrieve the items that were stolen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002304
text: Guard Nomabis asked you to retrieve the supplies that Dico Thieves have stolen from you from the Drasos Chapel Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002305
text: Acquired the supplies as requested by Guard Nomabis. Return to Nomabis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002306
text: Defeat Dico Thieves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002307
text: Guard Nomabis has asked you to fix the bad habit of the Dico Thieves. Defeat them at the Drasos Chapel Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002308
text: As Nomabis requested of you, you've defeated the Dico Thieves. Return to Nomabis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002309
text: Eliminate the trap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002310
text: Guard Nomabis has asked you to get rid of the traps that the Dico Thieves have installed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002311
text: While you were getting rid of the traps as requested by Guard Nomabis, the Bebraspion that was caught and locked by the Dico Thieves appeared so you killed it. Let's tell this to Nomabis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002312
text: Talk to Chronomancer Sabina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002313
text: Chronomancer Sabina is looking for someone's help at Ruklys Street in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002314
text: Craft a copy of the petrified book

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002315
text: Chronomancer Sabina asked you to get a copy of the petrified book near the collapsed Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002316
text: As Chronomancer Sabina requested of you, you crafted the copy of the petrified book. Hand it over to Sabina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002317
text: Look at the past using the Time Magnifying Glass.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002318
text: Chronomancer Sabina told you to use the Time Magnifying Glass to look at what happened at Pergale Highway a few hundred years ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002319
text: As Chronomancer Sabina instructed to you, you observed the disaster in the past using the magnifying glass. Return to Sabina and tell her what you just observed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002320
text: Look for the portal that is usable

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002321
text: Chronomancer Sabina told you that there may be some portals of the great earth that may be still activating that are scattered across Ruklys Street.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002322
text: As Chronomancer Sabina requested, you found the portal to the Fortress of the Land, and it seems it can be still activated. Return to Sabina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002323
text: Maintain the Trade District

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002324
text: Chronomancer Sabina has asked you to defeat the monsters near the portal so that he can carry on the experiment near the portal which is the only one that can be activated near the Trade District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002325
text: As Chronomancer Sabina requested of you, you've defeated all the monsters near the portal in the Trade District. Return to Sabina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002326
text: Defeat the monsters near the portal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002327
text: Activate the Portal of the Fortress of the Land

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002328
text: Chronomancer Sabina has asked you to go to the portal at the military district and carry on the experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002329
text: You observed something unexpected as you started the experiment as Chronomancer Sabina has requested from you. Let's go back to Sabina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002330
text: Defeat Lepus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002331
text: Talk to Adjutant General Hans

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002332
text: Adjutant General Hans is looking for someone who could help him at Downtown of the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002333
text: Adjutant General Hans has asked you to defeat monsters that are located between Downtown and the mouth of the river.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002334
text: Adjutant General Hans requested from you, you've defeated enough monsters. Let's go back to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002335
text: Rub monsters' body odor

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002336
text: Adjutant General Hans has asked you to put the monsters' odor on the supplies that were to be provided to the Royal Army guards to lure the boss monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002337
text: You've sent the supplies with the monsters' odor to the guards as Adjutant General Hans has requsted. Let's go back to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002338
text: Lure the guards

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002339
text: Adjutant General Hans told you that the boss monster would appear soon. To help Hans cross Stephonas, you've asked the soldiers to fight against the boss monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002340
text: As Adjutant General Hans requested, you've helped the thieves to cross by avoiding the eyes of the guards. Let's go back to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002341
text: Retrieve the propaganda of the Royal Army guard

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002342
text: Adjutant General Hans asked you to retrieve the propaganda that the Royal Army guards spread to the thieves. The propaganda are attached to the ruins of the watermill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002343
text: As Hans requested, you've retrieved all the propaganda that the soldiers spread. Return to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002344
text: Talk with Grave Robber Stephonas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002345
text: Collect Boulder Explosives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002346
text: Grave Robber Stephonas suggested you to collect the ingredients for the bombs to awake the petrified Golem. Defeat the monsters nearby and collect the Boulder Explosives.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002347
text: As the thief Stephonas requested of you, you collected enough Boulder Explosives. Return to Stephonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002348
text: Obtain %s by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002349
text: Experiment the processed Boulder Explosives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002350
text: Grave Robber Stephonas has asked you to experiment the processed Boulder Explosives on the monsters before using it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002351
text: As requested by Grave Robber Stephonas, you've checked how strong the Boulder Explosives is. You found that it is unstable to use it at the moment. Return to Stephonas and let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002352
text: Obtain the pasted mucus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002353
text: Grave Robber Stephonas asked you to stabilize the unstable Boulder Explosives and to do so, you should defeat the monsters at Visko Sanctum Ruins and obtain the Kneaded Slime.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002354
text: As Stephonas requested of you, you obtained enough Kneaded Slime. Return to Stephonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002355
text: Obtain %s from monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002356
text: Obtain the Kneaded Slime

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002357
text: Obtain the Frosty Core

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002358
text: Grave Robber Stephonas asked you to defeat Stone Frosters and obtain the Frosty Core which the Knights of Kaliss has asked you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002359
text: Grave Robber Stephonas obtained the Frosty Core from Stone Frosters. Let's go back to Stephonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002360
text: Obtain %s from Stone Frosters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002361
text: Talk with Royal Army Guard Rofdel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002362
text: Royal Army Guard Rofdel is looking for someone who could help you at Downtown of the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002363
text: Collect Lime Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002364
text: Royal Army Guard Rofdel wants you to defeat monsters to fix the tower and also wants you to obtain some Lime Powders from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002365
text: As Royal Army Guard Rofdel requested from you, you've obtained enough Lime Powders. Let's go back to Rofdel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002366
text: Obtain %s by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002367
text: Destroy the petrified records

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002368
text: Royal Army Guard Rofdel has asked you to destroy the petrified records that are at Vadovo Dock.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002369
text: You've destroyed all the petrified records as Royal Army Guard Rofdel requested to you. Return to Rofdel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002370
text: Destroy the petrified monster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002371
text: Royal Army Guard Rofdel asked you to destroy the petrified monster at the collapsed Uodegos Dock.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002372
text: As Royal Army Guard Rofdel requested to you, you destroyed the petrified monster. Let's go back to Rofdel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002373
text: Destroy the petrified monster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002374
text: Put flyers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002375
text: Royal Army Guard Rofdel asked you to put the flyer on the bulletin board to conciliate the thieves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002376
text: You've put the flyers in the various places in the main district, as Royal Army Guard Rofdel asked you to. Let's go back to Rofdel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002377
text: Talk to Wilhelmina Carriot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002378
text: Wilhelmina Carriot is seeking for someone's help at the inner district of the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002379
text: Wilhelmina Carriot wants you to defeat the monsters at Kovos Hall Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002380
text: You've defeated the monsters as Wilhelmina Carriot requested of you. Let's go back to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002381
text: Retrieve the Tasty Candy Balls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002382
text: Wilhelmina Carriot has asked you to retrieve the Tasty Candy Balls that the monsters took away from her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002383
text: You've defeated the monsters as requested by Wilhelmina Carriot and retrieved the Tasty Candy Balls. Let's take them back to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002384
text: Retrieve the Tasty Candy Balls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002385
text: Soothe the victims

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002386
text: Wilhelmina Carriot asked you to soothe the Royal Army guards that are dying due to the Petrifying Frost at the Stone Icicle Square. Let's go back to Wilhelmina Carriot after receiving their wills and belongings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002387
text: Look for the dead guard

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002388
text: You've discovered a guard who is already dead due to the effect of the Petrifying Frost. Let's go back to the guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002389
text: As Wilhelmina Carriot requested of you, you've received the belongings and the wills from the victims. Let's go back to Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002390
text: Talk to Bokor Edita

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002391
text: Bokor Edita at the Petrified City is seeking for someone's help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002392
text: Collect the ingredients for the medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002393
text: Bokor Edita asked you to defeat the host monsters and bring the ingredients for the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002394
text: You've collected the ingredients for the medicine as Bokor Edita requested to you. Return to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002395
text: Obtain the ingredients for the medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002396
text: Release the ego

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002397
text: Bokor Edita asked you to use the Liberation Elixir on the petrified victims to release their evil thoughts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002398
text: As Bokor Edita requested of you, you've released the evil thoughts of the victims by using the Liberation Elixir on them. Return to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002399
text: Light up the brazier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002400
text: Bokor Edita asked you to light up the brazier in the fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002401
text: You've lighted up the brazier as Bokor Edita requested to you. Let's go back to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002402
text: Talk with Alchemist Saliamonas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002403
text: Alchemist Saliamonas is waiting for someone's help at the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002404
text: Use the Petrification Thawing Liquid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002405
text: Alchemist Saliamonas told you to use the Petrification Thawing Liquid on the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002406
text: You used the Petrification Thawing Liquid on the monsters as Saliamonas told you to, but you made them angry. Let's go back to Saliamonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002407
text: Collect Petrified Sample

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002408
text: Saliamonas asked you to obtain the Petrified Samples by defeating the monsters at Neiveikiama Castle for the experiment of the new medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002409
text: You've collected enough Petrified Samples as requested by Saliamonas. Let's go back to Saliamonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002410
text: Collect Petrification Samples

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002411
text: Defeat Elite Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002412
text: Saliamonas asked you to defeat Elite Monsters that are destroying the ruins in Neiveikiama Castle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002413
text: You've defeated Elite Monsters as requested by Saliamonas. Let's go back to Saliamonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002414
text: Talk to Grave Robber Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002415
text: Grave Robber Amanda is waiting for someone's help in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002416
text: Collect the Record from the Ruklys Era

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002417
text: Grave Robber Amanda asked you to collect the records of the era of Ruklys at the rendezvous point for the transaction with Wilhelmina Carriot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002418
text: You've collected the records of the era of Ruklys as requested by Amanda. Let's go back to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002419
text: Grave Robber Amanda asked you to hand over the records of Ruklys' era to Wilhelmina Carriot who is working at Kovos Hall Site. After that, you should receive a weapon from Wilhelmina Carriot which you can use to defeat Gargoyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002420
text: You've received the vacuum scroll from Wilhelmina Carriot. Let's give it to Grave Robber Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002421
text: Defeat Gargoyle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002422
text: Grave Robber Amanda told you to destroy Gargoyle at the rendezvous point that are trying to enter the Fortress of the Land. Use the vacuum scroll that you received from Wilhelmina Carriot and defeat Gargoyle without making any sound.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002423
text: You've defeated Gargoyle as Grave Robber Amanda requested to you. Return to her and let's talk about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002424
text: Talk to Knight Titas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002425
text: After reading the notice to recruit more soldiers, you feel like you should help. Talk to Knight Titas at West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002426
text: Defeat the monsters at Soul Peak

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002427
text: Knight Titas told you to help Julian squad who is trying to march forward between Soul Peak and the gateway of great king. Destroy 100 monsters in Soul Peak.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002428
text: Report to Commander Julian

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002429
text: You've defeated many monsters on Soul Peak. Report to Commander Julian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002430
text: Defeat the monsters at Soul Peak

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002431
text: Talk to Villager Darren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002432
text: Darren seems to be puzzled. Listen to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002433
text: Check the beehives at Rododun Apiary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002434
text: Darren is worried about whether his beehives at Rododun Apiary are okay after they were attacked by monsters. Go to Rododun Apiary and check whether the beehives are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002435
text: Fortunately, the beehives are okay. Return to Villager Darren and let him know about this.
