name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002436
text: The beehives at Rododun Apiary are okay, but we should do something to them. Talk to the relieved Villager Darren.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002437
text: Defeat the monsters with sweet fragrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002438
text: Villager Darren told you that the monsters are going after the apiary's honey so he wants to use empty beehives to deceive the monsters. Defeat a monster with sweet fragrance and get an empty beehive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002439
text: Hand over the empty beehive to Villager Darren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002440
text: Acquired an empty beehive. Hand over the beehive to Villager Darren.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002441
text: Obtain %s from a monster with sweet fragrance

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002442
text: Villager Darren seems to have more to say. Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002443
text: Draw out the oil from the oil barrels

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002444
text: Villager Darren suspects Brewer Dorjen is going to burn down the forest in anger towards the monsters. Before you pacify Dorjen, draw out the oil from the barrels near Micolas Brewery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002445
text: Talk to Brewer Dorjen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002446
text: You've drawn out all the oil from the oil barrels you found. Talk to Brewer Dorjen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002447
text: Remove the oil from the containers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002448
text: Brewer Dorjen, is angry after he found out that his plan of burning the forest was foiled. Soothe Dorjen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002449
text: Bring back Dorjen's Signature Mead from the Honey Wine Warehouse

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002450
text: Brewer Dorjen can't calm himself down and told you to bring back his signature mead from the Honey Wine Warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002451
text: You've brought the mead in good condition. Hand it over to Dorjen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002452
text: Brewer Dorjen seems to trust you a lot now. Listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002453
text: Defeat the monsters who ruined Dorjen's brewery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002454
text: Brewer Dorjen told you that if you could defeat the monsters that ruined his brewery, his anger may subside. Exact revenge on the monsters for Dorjen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002455
text: You've defeated the monsters as requested by Dorjen. Let Dorjen know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002456
text: Defeat Chupalukas who ruined the brewery business

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002457
text: Check the beehives at Rododun Apiary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002458
text: Check the beehives at Rododun Apiary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002459
text: Defeat Sparnas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002460
text: Defeat the Sparnas that occupied the Rododun Apiary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002461
text: Check the mead storage boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002462
text: You can smell some sweet fragrance from somewhere. Check the boxes with sweet fragrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002463
text: It seems that a Biteregina came after the smell of honey. Defeat Biteregina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002464
text: Talk to Kirina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002465
text: Kirina seems to be afraid of something. Ask her what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002466
text: Kirina is worried about the way back to the village. To make her comfortable, defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002467
text: You've defeated enough monsters nearby. Return to Kirina and soothe her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002468
text: Talk with Cleopas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002469
text: Cleopas seems to have some troubles. Listen to what happened to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002470
text: Talk with Micolas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002471
text: Talk with Micolas on behalf of Cleopas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002472
text: You heard why Micolas is angry. Tell Cleopas about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002473
text: Check with Cleopas whether she remembers something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002474
text: Obtain the brewery device from Elite Chupalukas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002475
text: Cleopas once saw the Elite Chupalukas licking the device recklessly. Check with the Elite Chuparuka whether it has the brewery device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002476
text: Hand the brewery device to Micolas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002477
text: Elite Chuparuka has the brewery device. Hand it over to Micolas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002478
text: Obtain %s by killing large Chupa Luca

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002479
text: Micolas has a favor to ask of you. Listen to his story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002480
text: Obtain Royal Jellies by defeating the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002481
text: Micolas wants to give Royal Jellies to Cleopas as a way to apologize. Obtain Royal Jellies by defeating the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002482
text: Hand over the Royal Jellies to Cleopas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002483
text: Acquired all Royal Jellies. Hand them over to Cleopas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002484
text: Collect %s from monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002485
text: Talk to Maras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002486
text: Talk to Maras who is investigating at Three Brooks Wood

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002487
text: Check the Sweet-smelling Beehives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002488
text: Maras wants you to check whether the monsters are going after honey or not. Obtain pieces of honey that would lure the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002489
text: You have obtained a piece of sweet honeycomb. Ask Maras what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002490
text: Obtain %s from beehives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002491
text: Ask how Maras will use the fragments of sweet honeycomb

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002492
text: Defeat the monsters who smelled the sweet fragrance

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002493
text: Maras suspects that the monsters are lured by the honey so he told you to check their reaction to the fragments of sweet honeycomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002494
text: The monsters did not show any peculiar response, even after smelling the fragments of sweet honeycomb. Tell Maras about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002495
text: It seems that what the monsters were going after was not honey. Ask him whether he has a different idea.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002496
text: Check Bichiu Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002497
text: If they are not going after the honey, then there is only one possible culprit. Check the Bichiu altar where monsters often go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002498
text: Hand over the magic piece to Maras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002499
text: It seems that the monsters were lured to the magic piece at Bichiu Altar. Hand over the magic piece to Maras.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002500
text: Ask about the piece that was discovered at Bichiu Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002501
text: Check the Gaudezi Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002502
text: Maras told you that she doesn't know this piece is, but there is one more altar like this up there so check the Gaudezi Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002503
text: Talk to Lamar near Wood Watch Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002504
text: You found the piece with the same shape at the Gaudezi Altar. Go to Lamar as Maras told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002505
text: Talk with Lamar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002506
text: Talk with Lamar about the magic fragment at Gaudeji Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002507
text: Talk with Raeli

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002508
text: The Priest Raeli told you to come to Swaying Arable Land and left. Follow her to Swaying Arable Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002509
text: Check the altar of Three Brooks Wood at the north

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002510
text: Check the altar of Three Brooks Wood at the north

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002511
text: Destroy Cyclops at the altar of Three Brooks Wood

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002512
text: Destroy Cyclops at the altar of Three Brooks Wood

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002513
text: Talk to Riesz

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002514
text: Riesz seems to have lost something and doesn't know what to do. Ask him what is he looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002515
text: Find the bag of farming tools at Shirsie Sunny Place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002516
text: Riesz encountered a Honeypin at Shirsie Sunny Place, so he ran away without his bag of farming tools. Retrieve his farming tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002517
text: Hand over the farming tools to Riesz

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002518
text: You found the bag of farming tools. Give it back to Riesz.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002519
text: Search for %s at Shirsie Sunny Place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002520
text: Defeat Honeypin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002521
text: Talk with Valda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002522
text: Valda has something to ask you. Listen to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002523
text: Collect the pieces of honeycomb

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002524
text: Maras asked Valda to collect the pieces of honeycomb, but the nearby monsters scare him from going. Collect the pieces of honeycomb at Saldus Bee Farm on behalf of Valda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002525
text: You've collected all pieces of honeycomb. Hand them over to Valda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002526
text: Collect %s at the Saldus Bee Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002527
text: Riesz seems to have a problem. Find out what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002528
text: Sow seeds at Radanza Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002529
text: Riesz should be sowing seeds at the fields near the village, but he is scared of the monsters. Sow seeds at his farm for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002530
text: You've sowed all the seeds. Return to Riesz and let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002531
text: Talk with Priest Raeli

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002532
text: Priest Raeli seems to be quite angry. Meet Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002533
text: Collect Bee Tree Branches

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002534
text: To quell a possible insurgency of the villagers, Priest Raeli requested you obtain branches of bee trees. Collect the branches of bee trees near the village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002535
text: You've collected enough branches. Return to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002536
text: Obtain %s using the branches

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002537
text: It seems that Priest Raeli has something to say. Meet Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002538
text: Activate the Guardian Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002539
text: Priest Raeli told you that more demons are incoming. Activate the Guardian Stone and stop the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002540
text: Stopped the monster attack. Return to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002541
text: Ask Priest Raeli what to do with the branches.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002542
text: Defeat the demons with the branches and collect the ashes of the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002543
text: Priest Raeli told you to use the branches to burn demons when their HP is below half, using the power of the Goddess Austeja, so you can get ashes from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002544
text: You've collected the ashes of the demons. Talk to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002545
text: Priest Raeli made the orb using the ashes of the demons. Ask her about what to do the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002546
text: Recharge the orb made of ash with holy energy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002547
text: The land where the Goddess Austeja used to control is full of holy magic energies. Go to Palama cliffs and recharge the marble of ashes with the energies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002548
text: You've filled the orb made of ash with holy energy. Return to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002549
text: The orb made of ash has gathered enough holy energy. Ask Priest Raeli what to do next with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002550
text: Restore the weakened seal tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002551
text: Restore the weakened seal tower at Stulr Road. Demons may be there to break the seal, so you should hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002552
text: Talk to Goddess Austeja

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002553
text: As you restored the seal tower, Goddess Austeja has appeared. Listen to Goddess Austeja's story

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002554
text: Listen to Goddess Austeja's story

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002555
text: Goddess Austeja told you that the everything that is occurring at the apiary is the act of the demons that are trying to release the seal that is placed upon the Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002556
text: Priest Raeli is worrying about something. Ask her what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002557
text: Check the large mutant plant

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002558
text: The large plant looks somewhat dangerous. Inspect it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002559
text: The large mutant plant was a Kurmis. Report about it to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002560
text: Check the weakened Seal Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002561
text: Check the Seal Tower that was weakened by demon attacks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002562
text: Defeat Demon Lord Tautrimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002563
text: The Demon Lord Tautrimas appeared to go after the weakened sealed tower. Defeat Demon Lord Tautrimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002564
text: Talk with Greedy Druva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002565
text: Greedy Druva is looking for someone who can help him out. Talk with Greedy Druva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002566
text: Collect Oak Wood Planks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002567
text: Greedy Druva wants to put the scarecrow that would drive out the monsters. Collect the oak stems that will be the materials to make the scarecrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002568
text: You've collected all the oak stems. Return to Greedy Druva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002569
text: Collect %s near the village

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002570
text: You've brought the oak stems as requested by Greedy Druva. Listen to the next story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002571
text: Place the scarecrow with the charm attached

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002572
text: Set up scarecrows with amulets on it in Druva's farm and observe the monsters' reactions. The farm is located on the left of Arkllui Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002573
text: Talk to Ruined Bee Farmer Logen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002574
text: It seems like Logen is in a bad mood. Ask him what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002575
text: Bee Farmer Logen says his bee farm had to close down because of the monsters. Enact revenge against the monsters for Logen's sake.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002576
text: Defeated the monsters as Logen requested. Return to Logen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002577
text: Talk to Priest Dazine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002578
text: Go to Priest Dazine in the Spring Light Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002579
text: Collect the Fragmented Symbol of Austeja

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002580
text: You need the Symbol of Austeja to cure the Revelators who are addled by the evil energy. First, collect the fragmented symbols of Austeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002581
text: Retrieve the Fragmented Symbol of Austeja

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002582
text: Restore the symbol at the Austeja Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002583
text: Restore the fragments of the symbol at the Austeja Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002584
text: Restored the symbol at the Austeja Altar. Give it to Priest Dazine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002585
text: Talk to Priest Dazine about how to purify the addled Revelators.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002586
text: Purify the addled Revelators

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002587
text: Fight the addled Revelators to subdue them, then use the Austeja's Symbol to purify them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002588
text: Purified all the addled Revelators. Talk to Priest Dazine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002589
text: Cured all the addled Revelators. Ask Priest Dazine what to do next. {nl}{nl}With the addled Revelators now purified, talk to Priest Dazine about the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002590
text: Restore the Rankis Seal and the Ranka Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002591
text: The seal towers that sealed the forces of evil were all destroyed by the monsters. The Symbol of Austeja can restore a little bit of power to the Seal. {nl}{nl}The Seal Towers that sealed the forces of evil were all destroyed by the monsters. The Symbol of Austeja can restore a little bit of power to the Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002592
text: Restore the goddess' powers to Rankis Seal Tower and Ranka Seal Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002593
text: Restored power to the first destroyed tower. Now, I have to restore power of the other destroyed tower as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002594
text: Goddess Austeja appeared and is trying to tell you something. Listen to what she is saying.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002595
text: Check the Spring Light Woods Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002596
text: There is a suspicious shadow in Spring Light Woods Altar. Take a close look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002597
text: A Chafer was hiding near the altar. Defeat Chafer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002598
text: Check the destroyed seal tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002599
text: Someone destroyed the tower. Check its status.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002600
text: Defeat Manticen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002601
text: It seems like this Manticen destroyed the tower. Defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002602
text: Talk to Merchant Dulke

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002603
text: Seems like Merchant Dulke is troubled. {nl}Ask him what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002604
text: Find Merchant Dulke's Package

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002605
text: Merchant Dulke says that he lost his belongings while running away from the monsters. Find Dulke's belongings for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002606
text: Give the packages to Merchant Dulke

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002607
text: Found all Merchant Dulke's packages. Give it to him,.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002608
text: Find %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002609
text: Talk to Villager Emil

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002610
text: Villager Emil in the Spring Light Woods wants to ask you a favor. Go to Villager Emil.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002611
text: Defeat the monsters around the village

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002612
text: Emils says that it is too dangerous to go to Three Brooks Woods. Defeat the monsters so that the route will be safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002613
text: Defeated enough monsters. Go back and talk to Emil of Spring Light Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002614
text: Talk to Pharmacist Tiana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002615
text: Pharmacist Tiana makes medicine using herbs from Spring Light Woods. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002616
text: Collect Spring Light Grass

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002617
text: Pharmacist Tiana says she needs more Spring Light Grass to make her medicine. Use bee honey jelly to find and collect the elusive Spring Light Grass.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002618
text: Give the Spring Light Grass to Pharmacist Tiana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002619
text: Gathered enough Spring Light Grass. Give it to Tiana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002620
text: Talk to Equipment Merchant in Fedimian

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002621
text: The Equipment Merchant seems to pity you for your failed upgrade attempts. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002622
text: Collect Marks of Pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002623
text: The Equipment Merchant offered a pretty good reward in exchange for your help. Go to Starving Demon's Way and collect Marks of Pilgrim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002624
text: Give them to Fedimian Equipment Merchant

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002625
text: Obtained all the Marks. Give it to the Equipment Merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002626
text: Obtain %s from the monsters at Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002627
text: Meet Commander Uska

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002628
text: Commander Uska seems to be troubled. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002629
text: Hunt the monsters in Purple Tree Fault Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002630
text: Commander Uska says a swarm of monster appeared from the deep forest but he did not have enough men to do anything about it. Defeat 100 monsters in Purple Tree Fault Forest for the commander.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002631
text: Completed the Purple Tree Fault Forest monster huntdown mission. Return to Uska and tell him the good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002632
text: Defeat the monsters in Purple Tree Fault Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002633
text: Observe the Fallen Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002634
text: There is an Owl Sculpture at Tomb Spider Nest. Take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002635
text: The Throneweaver appeared when you touched the collapsed sculpture!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002636
text: Suspicious Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002637
text: There is a Goddess Statue in Amolallul Hill. This statue looks different from the other statues but worship it first anyway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002638
text: Defeat Corrupted

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002639
text: The Goddess Statue turned into Corrupted! Defeat Corrupted first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002640
text: Defeat Corrupted

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002641
text: Talk to the Owl Chief Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002642
text: The Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture seems gloomy. Talk to it again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002643
text: Check on the Weak Owl Sculpture at Ishrai Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002644
text: The Owl Chief says it's worried about the owl at Ishrai Crossroads. Look for the Weak Owl and if it is out of place or fallen down, help it back up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002645
text: Talk to the Weak Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002646
text: Stood back the Weak Owl Sculpture lying on the floor. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002647
text: The Weak Owl Sculpture seems like it is about to cry. Talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002648
text: Find traces of the kidnapped Owls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002649
text: The Weak Owl wants you to find other owls that the monsters took away. Find the traces of owl statue in the monster's hideaway located at each end of the Ishrai Crossroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002650
text: Give the broken owl sculpture parts to the Weak Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002651
text: Found all the Broken Pieces of the Owl. Give it to the Weak Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002652
text: Talk to Liliya

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002653
text: There is a pilgrim names Liliya in Way of the Big Staving Demons. Seems like she desperately needs something so try talking to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002654
text: Find food

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002655
text: Liliya keeps saying that she's hungry. Get some meat from the monsters around and give it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002656
text: Give monster meat to Liliya.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002657
text: Get %s from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002658
text: Liliya still seems hungry. Talk to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002659
text: Get soft reed stem

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002660
text: Gather soft reed stem for Liliya from the reed sprouts nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002661
text: Gathered all the soft reed stems. Give it to Liliya.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002662
text: Gather %s from reed sprouts

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002663
text: Is Liliya's hunger satisfied? Talk to her again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002664
text: Defeat Carnivore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002665
text: What happened? The hungry Liliya is gone and a Carnivore suddenly appeared. First, defeat the Carnivore that is attacking you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002666
text: Talk to Liliya on the floor

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002667
text: Liliya appeared on the spot where Carnivore was defeated. Try talking to Liliya.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002668
text: Defeat the Carnivore that seems like what Liliya turned into

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002669
text: Make a grave for Liliya

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002670
text: Seems like Liliya will lose her breathe soon.. Do her last favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002671
text: Make a grave for Liliya

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002672
text: Talk to Pilgrim Julius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002673
text: There are many pilgrims with stories in the Starving Demon's Way. Talk to Julius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002674
text: Get monster meat

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002675
text: Can't understand Julius' story exactly but he seems hungry. {nl}Try to get him something to eat from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002676
text: Give food to Pilgrim Julius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002677
text: Got enough monster meat. Give it to Julius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002678
text: Get %s from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002679
text: Julius is gobbling down the monster meat. Try talking to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002680
text: Persuade Drapeliun

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002681
text: Is there some kind of curse casted in the Way of Big Staving Demon? Julius took the orgel then turned into a Drapeliun! You need to persuade him to turn back into human. How about consuming some HP first by attacking it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002682
text: Julius appeared again. Talk to him and listen to his story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002683
text: Seems like Julius is back to himself now. Go and listen to what he says.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002684
text: Get the young Nikotia leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002685
text: You need to get young Nikotia leaves so that Julius can get back up and tell his story. You can get the leaves in Emptry Tree Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002686
text: Gathered all the young Nikotia leaves needed. Give it to Julius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002687
text: Food supplies in the Ascetic haven

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002688
text: The rotten meat Julius mentioned can be found past the Ascetic haven, just before the Ray-lit Land. Go there and find the Reaverpeded that swallowed Julius and Liliya's ring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002689
text: The Reaverpede that swallowed Liliya and Julius' necklace appeared! Defeat it and get back the necklace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002690
text: Defeat the Reaverpede that swallowed the necklace

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002691
text: Talk to Pilgrim Zenius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002692
text: There are two pilgrims in the Reed field in Starving Demon's Way. Seems like they have a story to tell so try talking to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002693
text: Who was the one killed while going through the food piles guarded by Zenius? What is happening in Starving Demon's Way? Let's talk to Zenius first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002694
text: Zenius is still huffing and saying that even the monsters are preying on the food piles. First, clear up the surroundings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002695
text: Cleared up the surrounding area as Pilgrim Zenius asked. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002696
text: Get monster bait from the food piles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002697
text: You need to find some food to calm Zenius down

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002698
text: Use food scraps to catch monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002699
text: Found hard black bread with some molds on it which seems suitable to use as bait for the starving monsters. Use it to lure the monsters nearby and help Zenius build the food piles.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002700
text: Gathered enough grains that the monsters stole. Take it to Zenius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002701
text: Lure the monsters with food scraps and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002702
text: Clean up the food piles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002703
text: There are food piles here and there along the Starving Demon's Way. People just gathered and left the food to spoil when gluttony took over them. Clean up the food piles that are full of rotten food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002704
text: Observe the Indolent Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002705
text: There are weird looking Tree Root Crystals in Nederlingas Highway. It seems to be source of the strange forces around it so take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002706
text: Destroy the Tree Root Crystal protection device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002707
text: Guardian devices appeared while you were checking the Tree Root Crystal! Avoid monsters' attacks and destroy all the protective devices within time limit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002708
text: Destroy the protection device of Indolent Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002709
text: Try to destroy the Indolent Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002710
text: In Nomadic camp, there are mutated Tree Root Crystals under the curse of Naktis. Approach it and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002711
text: Destroy the Guardian Stone of the summoned Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002712
text: When you attacked the mutated Tree Root Crystal in Nomadic Camp, its stamina disappeared and the core split nearby. First, find the cores and break it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002713
text: Destroy the Indolent Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002714
text: Broke all the cores of the Crystal. {nl}Try to destroy the mutated Tree Root Crystal again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002715
text: Mutated Tree Root Crystal of Zikore Shore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002716
text: There are mutated Tree Root Crystals in Zikore Shore. Approach it and release the curse of Indolence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002717
text: Defeat the monsters swarming out

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002718
text: Monsters jumped out when you touched the Tree Root Crystal! Defeat them all within time limit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002719
text: Destroy the mutated Tree Root Crystal in Zikore Shore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002720
text: Defeated all monsters. Destroy the Tree Root Crystal again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002721
text: Destroy the Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002722
text: There is a Tree Root Crystal to the east of Pilgrim's Grave. You must destroy that Tree Root Crystal in order to release the curse on this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002723
text: Defeat Cactusvel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002724
text: The Tree Root Crystal turned into a Cactusvel! Defeat Cactusvel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002725
text: Mutated Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002726
text: There is a mutated Tree Root Crystal in Paskuti Crooked Road. Take a close look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002727
text: Gather energy source of Tree Root Crystal from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002728
text: While taking a look at the Tree Root Crystal, it made a weird reaction and contaminated nearby area! First, let's find the energy source of Tree Root Crystal that were scattered among the monsters during the reaction.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002729
text: Seal the mutated Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002730
text: Gathered all the energy source of Tree Root Crystals. Use it to seal the Tree Root Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002731
text: Mutated Tree Root Crystal of Noras Fountain

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002732
text: There is a mutated Tree Root Crystal in Noras Fountain. Get closer and check what must be done to release the curse of Indolence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002733
text: Break the Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002734
text: Multiple Tree Root Crystals were summoned while you were checking the Tree Root Crystal! Find the real Tree Root Crystal and break it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002735
text: Alley to the Scattered Stairway

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002736
text: In the vacant lot along the alley to the Scattered Stairway, there is a large mutated Tree Root Crystal. Its size and form is different from other Tree Root Crystals. Take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002737
text: Defeat the Shape-shifting Glutton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002738
text: The Tree Root Crystal suddenly transformed to a Glutton! Defeat Glutton!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002739
text: Defeat the Glutton that was once a Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002740
text: There is a treasure chest in Pilgrim's grave. What will happen when you kick it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002741
text: Bring back the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002742
text: All the monsters came out of the treasure chest when you opened it! Bring back the monsters and place them back in the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002743
text: There seems to be a pilgrim in trouble near Vinas Brewery. Approach him and listen to his story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002744
text: When Pilgrim Gracius touched the altar, something went wrong. Pilgrim Gracius fainted and monsters rushed out. First, defeat all the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002745
text: Talk to Pilgrim Gracius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002746
text: Defeated all the monsters. Pilgrim Gracius regained his senses again so ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002747
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed out of the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002748
text: Talk to Gracius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002749
text: Try talking to Gracius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002750
text: Pray to the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002751
text: With a suspicious look, Gracius asked you to offer prayer to the altar in front. Offer prayers first to relieve Gracius' suspicions and listen to his story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002752
text: You offered prayer to the altar and released the trapped souls. Talk to Pilgrim Gracius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002753
text: Now talk to Gracius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002754
text: Go and Test the Reagent

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002755
text: Let's go and test if the medicine Gracius gave you is effective. The key point is to test it carefully while avoiding the monster attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002756
text: Tell Gracius about the results

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002757
text: It seems to have failed. Tell Gracius about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002758
text: Told him the test medicine did not work. Now talk to him again on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002759
text: Get the Scripture from the Pilgrim's Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002760
text: You need to get on more thing for the test medicine. You can get a hint about it from the altar on the northern part of Rudiziu Forest road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002761
text: Give the scriptures

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002762
text: The pilgrim who was trapped by Merge gave you the scripture as he disappeared. Give it to Pilgrim Gracius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002763
text: Seems like you can now listen to the story behind this place from Gracius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002764
text: Free the soul from the monster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002765
text: Angry souls are not only in the altar but also trapped in the monsters. You can see the monsters with souls in it when you use the dye of light that Gracius gave you. Get those monsters and free the souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002766
text: Defeated all the monsters that had souls trapped inside them. Talk to Pilgrim Gracius agian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002767
text: Defeat the monsters with souls trapped inside them

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002768
text: Talk to Gracius to free the souls trapped in each altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002769
text: Free the souls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002770
text: Follow Gracius' words and find altars in the Scattered Stairway and calm the angry souls who are enraged for being betrayed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002771
text: Meet Pilgrim Gracius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002772
text: Successfully comforted all trapped souls. Now return to Gracius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002773
text: Chliz Uphill Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002774
text: There is an altar on the way to Chliz Uphill. Offer prayers for the souls in Scattered Stairway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002775
text: Flowers for the angry souls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002776
text: Gather flowers and offer them on the altar for the souls who were unjustly killed and even had their souls trapped in the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002777
text: Check the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002778
text: Comforted the souls at the altar. Now clean up the flowers placed on the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002779
text: Souls of the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002780
text: There is an Altar associated with the souls of Scattered Stairway when you go past the Chliz Uphill. Take a look at the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002781
text: Protect the souls of the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002782
text: Souls and monsters trying to harm the souls appeared when you touched the altar. You must defeat all the monsters before they harm the souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002783
text: Talk to the Trapped Soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002784
text: Defeated all the monsters around the angry souls. Now talk to the soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002785
text: Defeat the monsters summoned by the soul of the pilgrim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002786
text: Branginti Hill Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002787
text: There are many altars in Scattered Stairway. See what story is behind the altar in Branginti Hill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002788
text: Gather the Pilgrim's Lost Scripture Pages

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002789
text: Checked the altar and there are scripture pages on teh floor. Get the rest of the pages from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002790
text: Gather the Scripture Pages and place them on the Branginti Hill Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002791
text: Gathered all the pages. Return to the altar and offer it with the cover.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002792
text: Get %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002793
text: Altar in the alley of Purple Tree Fault Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002794
text: There may be souls hiding in the altar on the way to Purple Tree Fault Forest. Get close and take a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002795
text: Defeat Fire Lord

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002796
text: There weren't pilgrim's souls trapped in this altar but the Fire Lord! Defeat the Fire Lord before it becomes dangerous!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002797
text: Defeat Fire Lord hiding in the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002798
text: Northern Rudiziu Trail Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002799
text: There are altars with unknown purposes in Scattered Stairway. The altar in the North Rudiziu Trail is half destroyed making it even harder to know its purpose. Go and take a close look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002800
text: Merge suddenly appeared when you approached the altar and started destroying the souls that appeared nearby the altar! Defeat the Merge!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002801
text: Examine the Altar again

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002802
text: Defeated the merge. What were the souls that you saw before the Merge appeared? Check the altar again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002803
text: Defeat Merge

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002804
text: Cool the Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002805
text: The altar at Osimas Highway keeps producing a red light. Go check it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002806
text: Apply the Cold Monster Fluid on the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002807
text: You can use the cold fluid rarely found in monsters to cool down the wrath of the altar in Oshimas Route. Defeat the monsters in Scattered Stairway and get the cold fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002808
text: Spray the Cold Monster Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002809
text: Spray the Cold Monster Fluid on the altar at Osimas Highway to cool it down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002810
text: Obtain %s from monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002811
text: Get fluids from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002812
text: Receive the Sanctum's Blessing

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002813
text: Read the signboard and find a reasonable way to receive blessings from the Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002814
text: Offer contributions to the Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002815
text: You need to offer money to this Sanctum. The amount and number of offers per person is set so make your offers with caution.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002816
text: Offered appropriate amount of silver to the Sanctum. Receive the blessing of the Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002817
text: Lure monsters to use as sacrifice

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002818
text: If you want to worship the Sanctum properly, you need to offer sacrifice as written in the signboard. Lure the monsters nearby to the Sanctum and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002819
text: Pay worship to the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002820
text: Offered enough sacrifice. Worship Sanctum to receive blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002821
text: Offer Worship to the Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002822
text: Gathered monster meat to use as sacrifice and offered worship but it was a polluted Sanctum!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002823
text: Defeat the monsters near the Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002824
text: Monsters swarmed out when you prayed to the Sanctum! Looks like the monsters appeared after smelling the meat because the Sanctum is polluted. Defeat the monsters first then look for a way to purify the Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002825
text: Go to the Priest Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002826
text: The Priest Master manages this Sanctum so he must know how to purify it. It's going to be a long journey, but let's begin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002827
text: Defeat the monsters that gathered around the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002828
text: The polluted altar of Sukurys Hills in Purple Tree Fault Forest was under the watch of Priest Master. Talk to Priest Master on the altar can be purified.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002829
text: Purification through Holy Water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002830
text: Priest Master laments for not being able to go himself. He gave you the Holy Water he made and asked you to purify the altar in Sukurys Hills. Go to Purple Tree Fault Forest and purify the polluted forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002831
text: Find the True Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002832
text: There is a Goddess Statue near the saint's grave. Find out which Goddess Statue in Purple Tree Fault Forest is real.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002833
text: Fake Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002834
text: Fake Goddess Statue turned into a monster. Defeat the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002835
text: Defeat the monster that was disguised as a Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002836
text: There is a Goddess Statue south of Malone Trails. Find out which Goddess Statue in Purple Tree Fault Forest is real.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002837
text: Talk to Dievdirbys Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002838
text: Seems like this Goddess Statue is broken. Report it to Dievdirbys Master who made this statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002839
text: Seems like this Goddess Statue is broken. Report it to Dievdirbys Master, Sculptor Tesla, who made this statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002840
text: Tell Dievdirbys Master, Tesla, about the Goddess Statue and ask how you can repair it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002841
text: Gather materials to repair the Goddess statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002842
text: In order to repair the statue, you need to get back the pieces of plaster the monsters stole and mix it with water to apply it on the statue. Get the pieces of plaster from monsters and gather dew drops from the reed nearby then repair the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002843
text: Repair the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002844
text: You have all the materials! Go visit the Dievdirbys Master to carry out repairs on the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002845
text: Monster %s obtained from peripheral

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002846
text: Repairing the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002847
text: Is the Goddess Statue repaired well? Let's take a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002848
text: This Goddess Statue was fake! And the monsters even spread out a summon circle around it! Remove the monster summon circles!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002849
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed out

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002850
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed out of the polluted Sanctum!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002851
text: Go to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002852
text: As written in the signboard, this Sanctum is under the watch Cleric Master. Ask him what must be done to purify it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002853
text: Talk to Cleric Master about the Sanctum in Purple Tree Fault Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002854
text: Find the Badge of Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002855
text: Cleric Master said that monsters cursing the Sanctum will appear if you use the crest he gave you. Return to the Sanctum and use the crest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002856
text: Repair the Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002857
text: Looks like the monsters under curse are all dead as Cleric Master said. Let's return to the Sanctum and check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002858
text: Fetch Clean Water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002859
text: To receive blessings from the Sanctum, you need to fetch clear water from the bridge in the stream of Purple Tree Fault Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002860
text: Take the clear water from the bridge in stream to the Sanctum and pray.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002861
text: There is a Goddess Statue near the house of recluse. Find out which of the Goddess Statues in Purple Tree Fault Forest is real.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002862
text: How to be blessed

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002863
text: Prepare offerings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002864
text: You need to offer flowers for blessings of the Sanctum. Pick flowers from nearby to offer to and pray to the Sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002865
text: Gathered all the flowers needed. Offer it to the Sanctum and receive blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002866
text: Go to Pardoner Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002867
text: People just lose their silver and faint even after offering money to the Sanctum. This Sanctum also seems to have been polluted and the signboard says its under the Pardoner Master's management to go to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002868
text: Purify the Polluted Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002869
text: The Sanctum will be back if you burn the purifier you bought from Pardoner Master in front of the Sanctum. Burn the purifier.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002870
text: Learn from Pardoner Master how to purify

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002871
text: The monsters suddenly appeared from the Sanctum! The Sanctum must have been polluted. Please first defeat monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002872
text: You've successfully defeated the monsters. Since you defeated the monsters who were the source of the pollution, pray again at the Sanctum and receive its blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002873
text: Defeat Ironbaum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002874
text: Talk to the Pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002875
text: There is a Pilgrim who fell down on Sestines Wilderness at the Pretense Intersection. Ask him what happened to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002876
text: Obtain Water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002877
text: You need water for Pilgrim Theophilis to regain his consciousness. If there is no water nearby, at least get some dew that collects on the nearby gravestones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002878
text: Talk to Pilgrim Theophilis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002879
text: You collected almost all the dew on the gravestones. Now bring that water to Theophilis and listen to his stories.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002880
text: Teopalace regained his consciousness. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002881
text: Get the bag of Theophilis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002882
text: Retrieve the bag of Theophilis that the monster took

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002883
text: Bring the bag

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002884
text: You found the bag of Theophilis. Let's return it to the owner.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002885
text: Retrieve %s by defeating monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002886
text: Defeat monsters and retrieve Theophilis' bag

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002887
text: Let's listen to the story of Theophilis who regained his conciouness after drinking water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002888
text: Let's get the ingredients for the medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002889
text: Theophilis regained his consciousness. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002890
text: Take the ingredients to Pilgrim Theophilis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002891
text: You obtained all the ingredients. Now take the ingredients to Theophilis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002892
text: Now since you took the medicine, let's listen to the story here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002893
text: Save the other pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002894
text: When you find the objects that are somewhere on the Pretense Intersection and show them to other pilgrims, they will gain their consciousness back. Please look for those objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002895
text: Talk with the seduced pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002896
text: Now since you found all the objects, let's look for other pilgrims. They must be not that far from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002897
text: Obtain %s from the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002898
text: The Tombstone at the Meeting Plaza

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002899
text: There is a tombstone for someone present at the Meeting Plaza. Let's listen what story is behind it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002900
text: Look for the pieces of the photograph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002901
text: You found a small photo frame near the tombstone. You will be able to get a photo which you could put into this frame from the monsters nearby. Hunt for the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002902
text: Find %s by defeating the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002903
text: Find the pieces of the drawing by defeating the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002904
text: The tombstone at Klajone Access Road

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002905
text: There is a tombstone for someone present at Klajone Access Road. Let's listen what story is behind it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002906
text: Look for the Chest's key

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002907
text: The box rolled down from the tombstone, but you can't find the box key. {nl}Try defeating the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002908
text: Open the bag

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002909
text: You found the key for the bag! Let's open the bag.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002910
text: Obtain %s by defeating the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002911
text: Obtain the key by defeating the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002912
text: Purify the Pond of Silence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002913
text: The spring at the Pretense Intersection looks as though it lost its clarity. You may find a way to purify it when you get near the spring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002914
text: Put the pot to collect the sap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002915
text: You should find the pot to put the sap. Look around. There are pots near the spring. Put the pot at the lower side of the trees in Niekas Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002916
text: You should find the pot to put the sap. Look around. There are pots near the spring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002917
text: Retrieve the sap from the pot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002918
text: You should pull out the sap from the pot you just put.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002919
text: It seems that you have enough sap in the pot. Now retrieve it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002920
text: Sprinkle the sap onto the spring

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002921
text: When you sprinkle the sap onto the spring, the trees would regain its energy. Please sprinkle the sap onto the spring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002922
text: The secret of the Pretense Intersection

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002923
text: After you purifed the spring and the trees regained its energy, something seemed appeared from the marked place! Please hurry to the place!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002924
text: Demon of Seduction, Succubus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002925
text: This must be the Succubus that seduced the pilgrims at the Pretense Intersection. Defeat Succubus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002926
text: Defeat Succubus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002927
text: Hidden Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002928
text: When you collected 3 kinds of symbols from the poles, something seemed to occur from the place very far from here. Go inside. In order to get there, you need some special method.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002929
text: The secret of the symbolized stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002930
text: The boss appeared from here as the symbolized stone shone it self. What would happen when you defeat this boss?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002931
text: Defeat the boss that protected that place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002932
text: Talk with Frey who is a member of the kindom research team

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002933
text: Frey looks serious while he is reading the reports from Scott. Talk with Frey again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002934
text: Defeat Red Vubbe Thieves on behalf of Frey

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002935
text: Frey told you that he should go see other researchers for a minute and asked you to defeat Red Vubbe Thieves in the meantime. You feel strange, but you think you can handle this task.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002936
text: It seems that Frey has returned while you were defeating Red Vubbe Thieves. Let's go back to Frey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002937
text: Frey remembered something as he was reading Scott's reports. Talk with Frey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002938
text: Defeat Woodsman and collect their fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002939
text: Frey saws Woodsman at Deer Hooves Lot and he is thinking maybe they have something to do with those unpleasant barks that the Vubbes are carrying with them. For Frey to look into this, defeat Woodsman and bring him the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002940
text: Frey won't have any problem researching the matter with this much amount. Please take the fragments of Woodsman to Frey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002941
text: Obtain %s by defeating Woodsman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002942
text: Frey is confused since there are more things to come, but they haven't arrived yet. Talk to Frey again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002943
text: Bring the reports from Scott

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002944
text: Frey should receive the second report from Scott, but it hasn't arrived yet. Please get the report from Scott on behalf of Frey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002945
text: Scott was in a real danger since he was surrounded by Vubbes. Talk with Scott who seems to be stunned.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002946
text: Defeat the monster that attacked Scott

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002947
text: Frey told you to bring the 2nd report from Scott. Talk with Scott to get the 2nd report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002948
text: Hand over the 2nd report to Scott

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002949
text: Frey may be waiting for Scott's information. Please hand over the 2nd report to Frey that you got from Scott.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002950
text: Talk with Frey

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002951
text: The incident that occurred at Forgotten Port is yet to be resolved. Talk with Frey what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002952
text: Obtain the spirit of Red Vubbe Archer by defeating Red Vubbe Archer using the scroll to collect the spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002953
text: You can obtain the spirit of Red Vubbe Archer by casting the magic on it and defeat it using the scroll of spririts' prison. Collect the spirits of Red Vubbe Archer and hand them over to Ukert.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002954
text: Talk with Frey with the spirits of Red Vubbe Archer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002955
text: Obtain %s by using the scroll of spirits' prison on red Vubbe archers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002956
text: Talk with Royal Survey Corps Ukert

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002957
text: It seems that you are now more close to the truth behind the incident that occurred at Forgotten Port. Talk with Ukert again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002958
text: Check the supply box that the soldiers have left

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002959
text: Royal Survey Corps Ukert doesn't know exactly, but he is sure that they are trying to do something with the tree barks. To get the clues, go to the observatory tower and check the supplies that the soldiers had left long time ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002960
text: Defeat the Vubbes who destroyed the supply box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002961
text: Chase after the Vubbes that ran away after destroying the supply box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002962
text: As you arrived at the observatory tower, you found out that the Vubbes destroyed the box that the soldiers left long time ago and ran away. Chase after the Vubbes that ran away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002963
text: Talk with Royal Survey Corps Ukert

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002964
text: Obtain %s by defeating Chafers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002965
text: It seems that Ukert remembered something. Talk with Ukert again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002966
text: Go to the place where Vubbes left and reconnoiter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002967
text: Royal Survey Corps Ukert saw the Vubbes moving together. Divide the areas to reconnoiter with Ukert

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002968
text: The Vubbes did some ritual ceremony by putting the strange looking flag on the ground! Return and report to Ukert.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002969
text: Destroy the flag of the Vubbe Tribe

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002970
text: Royal Survey Corps Ukert told you that Vubbe's flag seems to be making Woodspirits. Talk with Ukert to ask him what to do from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002971
text: Destroy the flag of Vubbes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002972
text: Royal Survey Corps Ukert feels vicious energies from various places and he told you that maybe Woodspirits are being created from various places. Destroy the flag of Vubbes and prevent them from gathering ghost so that they won't be able to create Woodspirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002973
text: It seems that you destroyed all visible flags. Return to Ukert.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002974
text: Look at the pothole

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002975
text: You can see the pothole at the single story area. Get nearer to take a close look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002976
text: Fortunately, you discovered white truffles as you looked closely at the pothole! But the monsters who smelled the white truffles attacked! Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002977
text: Look closely into the pothole

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002978
text: It seems that monsters came here because there's something here. Look closely into the pothole one more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002979
text: Defeat the monsters that are blocking the road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002980
text: The monsters that are protecting the boxes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002981
text: There are strange looking treasure boxes at the single story area. Take a close look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002982
text: Defeat the monsters that gathered around the treasure chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002983
text: As you touched the treasure chest, the monsters suddenly rushed in! You don't know why they are rushing in, but defeat them first!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002984
text: Defeat the monsters that are around the treasure chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002985
text: Inspect the Destroyed Owl Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002986
text: There are broken Owl Sculptures at the end of Ishrai Crossroads. When you take a close look at them, you may be able to find out why.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002987
text: Monsters appeared right after you found the traces of the Owl Sculptures! Defeat them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002988
text: Defeat the monsters that destroyed the Owl Sculptures

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002989
text: Defeat the monsters that destroyed the Owls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002990
text: Defeat the Mushwort that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002991
text: It seems that the Mushwort over there destroyed the owl sculpture in this place. Destroy the Mushwort to calm down the spirit of the Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002992
text: Defeat the Mushwort that destroyed the Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002993
text: Talk with the Weak Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002994
text: The Weak Owl is very sad after receiving the fragments of the Owls. Talk to the Weak Owl again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002995
text: Obtain Oil from the Oil Box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002996
text: The Weak Owl wants you to burn the Destroyed Owls to send their spirits to the goddesses. Obtain Oil from the Oil Boxes on the way to Neuoder Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002997
text: An Owl Sculpture fell on the Ishrai Crossroads. Get near it and try to stand it up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002998
text: Burn the destroyed fragments of the Sculptures so that the Owls can rest in peace eternally

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_002999
text: Burn the destroyed Owl Sculptures using the Oil as the Weak Owl requested. The Destroyed Owls are at the end of Ishrai Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003000
text: Help the Owls to rest in peace eternally

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003001
text: Since you lit it up, protect the fire so that the Owl Sculptures can rest in peace eternally.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003002
text: Try to burn the Owl Sculptures again

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003003
text: You were surprised by monsters' sudden attack, but since you defeated them all, burn the Owl Sculptures again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003004
text: Protect the fire so that the Owls could rest in peace eternally.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003005
text: Defeat the monsters that are rushing in after seeing the fire within the specified time frame

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003006
text: Burn the destroyed fragments of the Sculptures

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003007
text: Protect the fires until the Sculptures burn completely

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003008
text: Report to the Owl Chief Sculpture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003009
text: You helped all the Owls to rest in peace eternally. Return to the Neuoder Field and let the Owl Chief know what you did.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003010
text: The scout at the entrance of Kateen Forest wants you to help him. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003011
text: Defeat Saltistter that attacked Vacenin Squad

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003012
text: The scout wants you to help him since he is facing against Saltistter. Help the soldiers to defeat Saltistter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003013
text: You successfully defeated Saltistter. Talk to Commander Vacenin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003014
text: Light up the Patrol's Bonfires that were extinguished

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003015
text: Talk to Bishop Aurelius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003016
text: Someone is welcoming you at the Great Cathedral. Talk with Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003017
text: Collect Spirit Essences

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003018
text: The bishop Aurelius has been waiting for hundreds of years to guide you. For Aurelius to guide you well, please collect the essences of spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003019
text: You've collected enough Spirit Essences. Please hand them over to Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003020
text: Talk with Bishop Aurelius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003021
text: You should make a vessel for Bishop Aurelius' Spirit. Talk with Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003022
text: Look for a Complete Scripture at Pamaldu Groom

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003023
text: Bishop Aurelius told you that a scripture would be a good vessel for his spirit. Look for a Complete Scripture at Pamaldu Groom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003024
text: Complete the vessel for the spirit at the Altar of Stability

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003025
text: You found a Complete Scripture. Put the Spirit Essence into the Scripture at the Altar of Stability and complete the vessel for Aurelius' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003026
text: You've completed the vessel for the spirit. Talk with Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003027
text: Call Bishop Aurelius with the Spirit's Scripture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003028
text: You've captured the Bishop's Spirit in the completed vessel. {nl}Try calling out Bishop Aurelius using the Spirit's Scripture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003029
text: You were able to call Bishop Aurelius using the Scripture without any problem. Talk with Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003030
text: It seems that the spirit of Aurelius sets well into the scripture. Now talk with Bishop Aurelius about what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003031
text: Solve the secret of Meile Oratorium

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003032
text: Obtain the hint for the secret at the platform of Meile Oratorium. If it is hard to solve for the secret, call out the spirit of Aurelius and ask him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003033
text: You found the divine artifact of the blessing. Talk with Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003034
text: You found the divine artifact of the blessing. Talk with Bishop Aurelius what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003035
text: Look for the Holy Relic of Salvation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003036
text: Retrieve the Holy Relic of Salvation by defeating the demons. If you have trouble retrieving the relic, call out Bishop Aurelius and ask him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003037
text: Main Chamber

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150317_003038

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003178
text: The occurrence of the Petrifying Frost became irregular after Medzio Diena four years ago.{nl}Due to its irregularity, we lost many of our soldiers in this wasteland.{nl}And we also install the search devices for the Petrifying Frost limitedly here in Verkti Square and we move out our soldiers accordingly based on the frequency of the occurrence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003179
text: You've accepted a difficult mission, so I don't know how I can thank you...{nl}Okay, I need you to defeat monsters at the Forest of Prayer.{nl}The Forest of Prayer is located past Fedimian and on the way to the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003180
text: My necklace... My music box...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003181
text: Julius... I am sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003182
text: Hey... I am so hungry, I can't move at all.{nl}Anything will do, please get me something to eat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003183
text: The meat of those monsters over there will do.{nl}Please hurry..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003184
text: Not yet?{nl}I am so hungry that I feel like I could even eat a handful of dust...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003185
text: Meat? Are you going to eat it?{nl}Yes.. Give me that!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003186
text: Don't go yet! I am starving to death.{nl}The meat you brought me came too late. What must I do?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003187
text: Okay.. I think I can eat those Young Leaves.{nl}They're thin and wet... yes, they will be good!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003188
text: My hunger doesn't go away even after eating a lot.{nl}It's actually getting worse, I might as well just die.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003189
text: There must be something to eat around here..{nl}Please... get me something to eat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003190
text: I am so hungry yet something is echoing inside my head...{nl}The sound of a music box..  I can't eat an echo..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003191
text: Ahh, my Liliya...{nl}I will never be able to see you again...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003192
text: Please think of that necklace as the gift from Liliya and keep it safe.{nl}It carries a blessing from the Great Cathedral, so it will help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003193
text: I am still hungry. Hungry...{nl}I can't take it anymore. I am hungry!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003194
text: I am so... hungry.{nl}Hey, if you have any leftover food, please share it with me...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003195
text: Even if that's all you have, please share it with me... Please...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003196
text: Meat... Quickly... {nl}I feel like I am dying.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003197
text: Meat... Meat!{nl}Please give it to me fast. Fast!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003198
text: Wait, that music box.. What is it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003199
text: My memories... She...{nl}Give it to me! That's mine!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003200
text: Damn. What was I doing?{nl}Ahah. Liliya... My Liliya!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003201
text: We left for a pilgrimage to the Great Cathedral to receive the blessings of the goddesses to celebrate our wedding.{nl}But then, that evil Naktis... that unforgivable Demon Lord.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003202
text: Stole her music box and necklace and gave them to the monsters and cursed her with gluttony.{nl}As if to laugh at Maven's lessons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003203
text: Wait. My head is shaking because of the curse. {nl}I still have a lot more to say... I don't know if I would be able to endure until then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003204
text: I heard the Asellus at the Hollow Tree Forest have purifying powers.{nl}I should be able to endure with its purification.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003205
text: To completely remove the curse, you should go see the priests...{nl}I want to stay here and recollect Liliya a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003206
text: Thanks. Way better.{nl}My Liliya... my music box... She must not be in this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003207
text: If you meet the servant of Naktis in any case, please get a revenge for her.{nl}The mark of our love which the demon possesses... Please receive it as a compensation for my gratitude.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003208
text: This necklce will be very useful since it is blessed by the Great Cathedral. {nl}That necklace is meaningless to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003209
text: You should not touch it.{nl}It will come soon... just wait little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003210
text: Did you see that? That boy is my son, who left for the pilgrimage four years ago.{nl}I followed him to save him from the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003211
text: Thank you so much for your words.{nl}It will be good if you could defeat the monsters that are disturbing me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003212
text: There is a way to save my son.{nl}I believe that my devotion to this will reach him eventually.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003213
text: Well done. {nl}I won't be scared of anything from now on, because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003214
text: If the amount of Food Scraps that I gave to you is not enough, go to Isblyskes Square.{nl}I have mixed divine water into the food there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003215
text: The food that was stolen by my son is mixed with the divine water. {nl}As time passes by, he will throw up all the energy of the curse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003216
text: To be honest with you, I don't know if I will be able to save my son with this.{nl} I need hope, I mean... I need some reliable results.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003217
text: When you throw these Food Scraps to the monsters, some of them might eat the food.{nl}If you attack them a lot afterwards, they will throw up. Bring me what they throw up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003218
text: If there are not enough Food Scraps, you can get some more at Isblyskes Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003219
text: The Condensed Cursed Energy. It indeed worked. {nl}Now I should just wait for my son to throw up.{nl}Thank you so much. May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always...{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003220
text: I am sorry, but I am a bit busy.{nl}I have many things going on in my head, so could you just please go now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003221
text: What the hell was that...{nl}You saved me. I am sorry about before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003222
text: While my brothers were on the their way to the pilgrimage, they all died due to the tricks from the demons.{nl}I feel sorry for my brothers who can't return to the godddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003223
text: I might be down a bit, but I want to help them somehow.{nl}Please. Please help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003224
text: I was going to release the souls that were locked in this altar.{nl}But, it didn't work. Was there something wrong with my prayer?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003225
text: I was broken off from the group due to my injury, but became sensitive to what lay ahead.{nl}After all, I saw a group of demons move on out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003226
text: That night... I hid behind the grass forest and had to look at everything. {nl}Everyone was pointing guns at each other. They were so close to each other...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003227
text: And they were so absorbed with madness even after their death so they could not even return to the goddesses.{nl}That's why I wanted to give them the eternal sleep.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003228
text: Maybe, everything so far was fated so that I would become a priest. Oh, goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003229
text: I can't move with my legs like this.{nl}Why'd it have to be like this... The only one I can trust is you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003230
text: Before I left for my pilgrimage, I overheard the stories about the Revelators.{nl}And you are really special among them. Can you listen to me little more?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003231
text: It was really horrible. Those brothers who used to be keen to each other hurt each other...{nl}And the demons cheated on those brothers who died.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003232
text: Some of their souls were thrown to the monsters like toys.{nl}Those souls need to be laid to rest as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003233
text: Can you first test this?{nl}I am making a reagent that will extract souls from monsters, but it's not working so well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003234
text: Test this on the monsters that shines with the light of the souls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003235
text: Use anything you have, this method, that method, this ingredient and that ingredient.{nl}It should work well...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003236
text: Ah, something must be lacking.{nl}Maybe the method is wrong too...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003237
text: I remembered what's missing. A scripture!{nl}One of the souls that is locked in the nearby altar should have one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003238
text: Unfortunately, I lost my Scripture in the mess.{nl}If I had it, I would have remembered that right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003239
text: This is it. Many mysteries are being solved because of you.{nl}Let's see, why don't we try a different method this time?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003240
text: The spirits inside the monsters' stomach will shine when you use this medicine this time.{nl}When you defeat that monster, the spirits that were tied there will be freed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003241
text: My brothers are blaming each other and crying out in madness even after their death.{nl}At the altar of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003242
text: Even a living being like myself could never forgive it, how would the souls feel?{nl}How could I let priests, those who should spread the love of the goddesses, do such a thing?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003243
text: They will definitely thank you.{nl}I hope the blessing of the goddess lights your way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003244
text: This method will be effective for sure.{nl}It must be. If not...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003245
text: Thank you so much for everything so far.{nl}Because of you, my brothers can rest in peace now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003246
text: Ah, not only my brothers are trapped here.{nl}When you see a soul that needs saving, please do not just leave it, but save it in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003247
text: The demons were looking for this thing while teasing spirits.{nl}Maybe it has something to do with the Great Cathedral at the end of the Pilgrims' Way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003248
