text: Ah, something came to mind now that you mention the Great Cathedral.{nl}I have this crafting recipe, but I have no idea how to use it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003249
text: But if there's anyone who could help all the spirits lay into eternal rest..{nl}It would be the owner of this land.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003250
text: If it's you, then it won't be hard to find a way to save them.{nl}I will stay here and pray that the souls attain eternal rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003251
text: There are many ways to send souls to eternal rest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003252
text: You may have to dedicate some flowers, or you may have to collect the scriptures of the pilgrims..{nl}You may have to suppress wrathful spirits with your power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003253
text: You helped the restrained spirits to sleep eternally?{nl}Oh my god.. This craft manual definitely belongs to you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003254
text: This artifact was left to me by my grandfather. He gave it to me because I had always dreamed to become a priest.{nl}This is meaningless to me now. I will create a commemoration for my colleagues here and live on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003255
text: Guide Purple Tree Fault Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003256
text: There are many blessed sanctums in the Forest of Prayer. {nl}All pilgrims who cross here should pray in front of these sanctums and receive the blessings of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003257
text: Each sanctum is managed by a master of the cleric class. {nl}If you find any problems at a sanctum, go meet the class master that manages that sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003258
text: The detailed locations of each sanctum..{nl}(The notice board is broken in half, so you can't read the rest.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003259
text: Sanctum Notice Board

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003260
text: When you make a contribution to prove your belief, you will receive blessings from the goddesses.{nl}Please understand that the amount of the contribution one can make differs by the individual.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003261
text: May the blessing of good fortune be with you today.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Pardoner Master] Mistes Goldmund

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003262
text: Show your determination to defeat enemies for the goddesses.{nl}Sacrifice their vicious beings to the sanctum as proof of your belief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003263
text: May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Priest Master] Boruble

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003264
text: The goddesses will only answer to truthful prayers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003265
text: May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Cleric Master] Rosalia

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003266
text: A scripture cover page with a vague smell of blood. Did the monsters swallow the other pages?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003267
text: Pure Water that purifies the spirits.{nl}This is also the mighty power of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003268
text: The stream near the sanctums has been purified, so get Pure Water from Ryskus Stream.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Oracle Master] Apolonija Barbora{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003269
text: All life that flourishes on this land are the results of the blessings of the goddesses.{nl}Appreciate the goddesses with beautiful flowers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003270
text: May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Druid Master] Gina Greene{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003271
text: If you prove your belief by making contributions, you will receive our blessing.{nl}For advice on this belief, please purchase warp scrolls from the stand and visit our master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003272
text: Lower yourself in front of the goddesses and leave everything to them.{nl}The goddesses will bless the ones who truly confess their wrongdoings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003273
text: May the goddesses remove your ordeals.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Krivis Master] Hercus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003274
text: Make contributions to appreciate the goddesses.{nl}The blessing will be with you always.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003275
text: Pray in front of the goddesses.{nl}Sacrifice the vicious monsters to prove your belief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003276
text: I already knew that Pilgrim's Way was ruined with Naktis' curse.{nl}But I didn't know that even the sanctums were corrupted.. It's such a shame.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003277
text: It would be the best if I do it myself, but I can't leave this place behind.{nl}I want you to purify the Sanctums with this divine water.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003278
text: I heard the congregation sent the disciples, but I guess it didn't turn out right.{nl}I think the everything will be alright since you will do it. But I am still uneasy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003279
text: The statue of Goddess Vakarine at the Forest of Prayer...{nl}Naktis... How would have one ever known that she would ruin the teachings of Archbishop Maven.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003280
text: In any case, we could at least do some emergency procedures.{nl}Collect Grey Gypsum Fragments and repair it with dewdrops that are endowed with the blessings of the morning star.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003281
text: I hope the goddesses protect you.{nl}Not only the statues of the goddesses, but the sanctums also would have many problems.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003282
text: By 'corrupted sanctums', you mean the Forest of Prayer, right?{nl}I thought I had prepared a lot for that, but I guess Naktis' curse was even stronger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003283
text: I hid my Symbol of Faith in the sanctums to prepare for times like this.{nl}That symbol enables you to find the monsters who have swallowed the badges of the sanctum.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003284
text: Find the badges of the sanctum and burn them in front of the sanctum.{nl}It may not return to how it used to be, but you will be able to purify it a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003285
text: The blessing that cleanses evil energy.{nl}Oh, goddesses, bless us with purified water.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003286
text: A floral tribute to the goddesses.{nl}The pleasure and joy of collecting flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003287
text: I was able to get one step closer to the goddesses due to my contribution.{nl}May the blessing be with you always.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003288
text: You know that Pilgrim's Way holds the lessons of Maven right?{nl}To be able to cast a curse on humans as if they originally sinned... Naktis sure is formidable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003289
text: I feel hurt whenever I think about my son.{nl}I can't believe that my son who left for the pilgrimage to the Great Cathedral received the curse...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003290
text: Hey.. Please wait. You will face great danger if you just go on like that.{nl}This place has a very dangerous curse cast upon it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003291
text: Ah, I just want to try some alchemy. I don't mean any harm. {nl}I will make some medicine for you, so you can consume it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003292
text: Okay then, I want you to find my bag... {nl}I am sorry. As you can see, I fell down while I was running away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003293
text: This place is crazy. {nl}This road is less like the road of the pilgrimage, and more like the road of the curses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003294
text: The stuff in my bag should be untouched, since none of it was edible. {nl}I will make the medicine soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003295
text: Darn. I thought they were all okay, but one of the bottles is broken. We needed that.. {nl}Fortunately, the ingredients are near here, but its too dangerous. What should I do?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003296
text: Apsimesti Crossroads is not a road for pilgrims anymore, due to those vicious demons.{nl}How would one have ever known that they would encounter such demons right before they arrived at the Great Cathedral?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003297
text: After seeing my companion Witas fall under the curse of the demons, I ran away.{nl}As a result, I don't know about other curses, but I will be able to stop Witas' curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003298
text: Go to the Sestines Wilderness and look for reeds with big leaves.{nl}Get the liquid essence from the monsters that reside in the reeds' roots.{nl}Remember to be careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003299
text: I am not fully recovered yet... I am sorry that I can't go with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003300
text: Ah, you did a good job. Please wait a moment.{nl}I am still hurt, but I think I can manage.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003301
text: Here you go. It is now completed. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003302
text: How about it? Can you feel it?{nl}The effect comes slowly so please be patient.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003303
text: A refreshing feeling slowly came over me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003304
text: When the medicine starts to take effect, you will be able to endure against the demons' curses.{nl}But wait, I... I have a favor to ask. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003305
text: Witas. My colleague who is cursed.{nl}I would do anything to restore him to his normal status.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003306
text: Objects that are precious to Witas are here. {nl}If you find these and show them to him, I think he will regain his senses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003307
text: The things that he dropped while desperately following me are probably those objects...{nl}It was between the tombstone near Meeting Plaza and Klajone Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003308
text: I remember he said that item was what his mother left to him before she died.{nl}I don't know a lot about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003309
text: Who are you anyways? How come my curse didn't work?{nl}How come the power of seduction that the Succubus taught me didn't work on you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003310
text: That.. Give it to me, now!{nl}That's not an object that belongs to you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003311
text: What have I done?{nl}Ah, mother... what should I do with this sin...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003312
text: Pond of Silence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003313
text: (This stream needs to be purified.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003314
text: I've done the same thing as the people I used to hate would do.{nl}I am sorry. Had I thrown away my anger, I wouldn't have been trapped like this..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003315
text: How could I do and say such things to your innocent being...{nl}Yes... Thanks for saving me. I am at peace now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003316
text: When I thought about the moment when this scripture had been ripped into pieces,{nl}I became so enraged that I ended up trapping myself here.{nl}But now I am able to rest because of you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003317
text: I really appreciate the effort you took, getting back this precious scripture. {nl}But, I'm no longer attached to it now. Goodbye...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003318
text: I realized that all deaths of my colleagues were due to the revenge.{nl}I don't need it anymore... Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003319
text: Who are you? Become the slave of the Succubus!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003320
text: I can't say milk and honey flows in this land anymore.{nl}Should I give up on bee farming?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003321
text: The bees have turned into violent monsters.{nl}I don't know how I can make a living from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003322
text: I don't remember what happened after I was casted with the curse.{nl}But, those demons, they definitely must be looking for something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003323
text: If you are going to the Great Cathedral, I want to stop you.{nl}The demon who casted the curse on this land went to the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003324
text: I saw the true nature of the curse with my own eyes.{nl}That Succubus beside Naktis... Even I, who was silently watching, almost got seduced.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003325
text: Even during Medzio Diena, this place was safe.{nl}I used to think disasters were somebody else's problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003326
text: The bees are not the only ones that changed.{nl}The monsters that I saw for the first time in my life had overrun Siauliai Woods back then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003327
text: I've spent many years making mead, but I have to end now without any significant product.{nl}Who should I blame for this..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003328
text: All other Revelators were wrong.{nl}But if it were you... I don't know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003329
text: The priests told us to wait, but the damage caused by the monsters was getting bad.{nl}I could not stand it anymore so I took action.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003330
text: I will find out why the monsters are making a mess here.{nl}Then the priests will be speechless.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003331
text: Maybe we touched something we shouldn't have touched.{nl}I think we did...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003332
text: The priest is very angry.{nl}Damn, if only she told me more about the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003333
text: The villagers told us that they couldn't trust the priest anymore so they were taking action themselves.{nl}Me? I don't care, as long as the monsters get taken care of.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003334
text: Where could Goddess Austeja have gone at a time like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003335
text: I know that the priests are trying their best, but we should protect our village.{nl}We're having trouble living on due to those monsters, so we can't just do nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003336
text: The priests never told us what's wrong.{nl}We know that they are afraid that we might feel uneasy... But still we want to know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003337
text: I know this might come out wrong but, I only trust you alone, Revelator.{nl}I am sorry to the priests... and I am sorry to you, Revelator, for saying that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003338
text: So we created the incident.{nl}Our actions.. I am so sorry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003339
text: I'm scared Goddess Austeja won't come back to protect our village...{nl}But, I am even more scared of the monsters in front of my eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003340
text: I refuse to just wait around as the priests have said.{nl}I refuse to be driven around by those monsters anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003341
text: I don't want to doubt the goddesses.{nl}But the priests don't tell us anything.. Isn't that strange?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003342
text: There's so much distrust between our priests and the villagers right now.{nl}I don't want to create a mess..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003343
text: The only thing I could tell to the villagers who were wounded was to wait..{nl}Even if it was the monsters' doing. Reality is cruel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003344
text: A thorn forest... If it weren't for you, this place would have became just like that.{nl}I feel grateful to the villagers since I believe they guided you to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003345
text: The seal here was able to be protected by you.{nl}But, I can't relax yet because the seal of Spring Light Wood is still left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003346
text: My sister Laima has told me about this in the past.{nl}The goddesses have a duty to save humans, but the humans also have a duty to save us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003347
text: Farmer Druva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003348
text: I don't care about the monsters or the seals.{nl}Someone else getting hurt is their problem. We clear?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003349
text: Times like this are an opportunity.{nl}Prices for agricultural products are increasing due to the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003350
text: I was a refugee from the capital.{nl}I moved here hearing that this place was safe.. but that apparently is untrue. I'm ruined.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003351
text: Ah, I am so hungry... I can't endure any longer.{nl}Hey. Is there something to eat?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003352
text: I can't do anything since I am starving to death...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003353
text: I came here to save my son who is cursed.{nl}If you see a young man who is about to starve to death, let me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003354
text: I will return to my hometown with my son.{nl}Yes. The Revelator of the goddesses helped us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003355
text: I want to see my son being healthy again.{nl}It's too painful to wait until my son to throw up the vicious energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003356
text: What should I do about it to save the spirits?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003357
text: These are not Maven's teachings.{nl}They are just Naktis' curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003358
text: There are four more necklaces besides this necklace, each with a teaching of Maven.{nl}They are all meaningless to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003359
text: We all promised each other to become good priests.{nl}It feels like that moment was just the day before yesterday... Just a meaningless dream.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003360
text: Witas really.. went back to the goddess.{nl}This is all the curse's doing, please don't feel guilty about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003361
text: Ah, if you see the Tree of Faith, please restore it.{nl}I heard that tree blocks the curse's energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003362
text: If it weren't for you, Maven's teachings would have been left cursed until the end.{nl}You saved this land. Witas' spirit as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003363
text: I heard that all the necklaces of Maven can be combined together through a special method.{nl}I heard the crafting recipe is present somewhere, but I don't know where it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003364
text: No... Not yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003365
text: I've been waiting for you for hundreds of years.{nl}However, you are still weak. You must improve...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003366
text: Priest Daram

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003367
text: I heard that a priest succeeded in removing the energy of the curse.{nl}But, her method only works on the curse of gluttony.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003368
text: The special bishop is at the Great Cathedral.{nl}He died when he was young, but he still stays at the Great Cathedral because of his special mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003369
text: I tried my best to hide Maven's secret, but..{nl}Naktis is also staying at the Great Cathedral too long.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003370
text: Priest Goda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003371
text: The Great Cathedral has collapsed, but it still keeps its beauty.{nl}Especially, the secrets of Archbishop Maven, they look amazing every time we see them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003372
text: Archbishop Maven contributed everything building this Great Cathedral.{nl}All that was collapsed on Medzio Diena... destiny is too harsh.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003373
text: Farewell is short, but the relationship lasts long.{nl}Someday we will meet again by the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003374
text: Priest Prosit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003375
text: Do you think the Great Cathedral will return to its normal state one day?{nl}I mean at least before I close my eyes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003376
text: I want to tell them that we should retake the Great Cathedral.{nl}But, I know we are not ready yet...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003377
text: Revelator. It has been long...{nl}I have waited hundreds of years to guide you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003378
text: Don't worry. We just have to complete a vessel for my Spirit.{nl}To start, please collect some Spirit Essence here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003379
text: It's simple.{nl}Just open the Spirit's Scripture in your inventory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003380
text: My body is rotten and has gone back to Zemyna.{nl}But, my spirit remained at the Great Cathedral and saw many things.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003381
text: I still clearly remember.{nl}The Great Cathedral during its time of prosperity... many bishops... waves of pilgrimage...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003382
text: It continued until the day that the Great Cathedral turned out like this, due to Medzio Diena, four years ago.{nl}I felt so miserable back then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003383
text: Bishop Aurelius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003384
text: Maven was one of the greatest priests, yet he was also interested in machinery.{nl}I am sure that the demons, who only think about magical power, don't understand his machines.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003385
text: The Platform of Benevolence is one of the machines Maven invented.{nl}Proceed through Arka Chapel and to the Reception Room to obtain the second key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003386
text: Sergeant Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003387
text: Arleruno controls this place directly.{nl}He is so busy so I don't know where he is right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003388
text: Do you think we can get some if we catch those monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003389
text: In fact, that string is used for tieing the sacks of grains.{nl}It's so obvious why we tie the sacks.{nl}To prevent the things inside from falling out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003390
text: Good.{nl}Well done.{nl}We can tie up the sacks now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003391
text: Are you a beginner?{nl}Don't just look at like that. Please help us.{nl}I am putting the trashes into the sack, but we don't have enough strings.{nl}I need a firm string to tie it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003392
text: It doesn't look like a normal sack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003393
text: We've tied all sacks... We just have to throw them away.{nl}Ah... I am so lazy to do this now.{nl}I will do this later... Hey you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003394
text: Me? I am the sergent controlling many soldiers under Baron Allerno who is clever and wise.{nl}But since not many people come here, we are doing this kind of work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003395
text: Yes. I left the sack at that cliff.{nl}I want you to take care of that.{nl}You can either bury it under the ground or kick it out from the cliff.{nl}I have been doing that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003396
text: Why did you come again?{nl}Did something come out from the sack?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003397
text: Jaunius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003398
text: Where is this place anyways?{nl}Why me...{nl}Hey please save me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003399
text: Jaunius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003400
text: I can't move my legs..{nl}Hey, I don't know who you are, but please get me the hardtack that I hid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003401
text: My nickname is Squirrel since I hide things well in various places.{nl}Anyways, I can request to you like this as a result.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003402
text: I remember that I hid many things one by one in the grass.{nl}Ah... I have a headache...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003403
text: What happened to the villagers...{nl}How come I was in this sack...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003404
text: Ah, thank you!{nl}That's it! You already found three of them!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003405
text: I was about to ask him something, but he just disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003406
text: Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003407
text: I don't know who you are, but you came at the right time. The farmers here complain that their work is too hard.{nl}I am sharing this solution that I received from the baron to the farmers after diluting it.{nl}It's called Nutritious Tonic!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003408
text: {nl}I should get some poison of Scorpio to dilute this solution.{nl}It's simple. Just extract the poison right before it dies.{nl}After extracting the poison from it, it will be neutralized and die.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003409
text: As the baron ordered me, I am observing the farmers here,{nl}Actually, managing them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003410
text: Okay then, please get me the poison from it.{nl}This solution is too strong.{nl}And I also don't feel good about sharing it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003411
text: Do not repeatitively hit it even if it is unconcious.{nl}Just get closer to it slowly...{nl}Ah that's not it... just get close to it and talk to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003412
text: Okay this is it.{nl}Just wait a minute.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003413
text: Now we should share this with the farmers here.{nl}Especially, Dalius over there. He looks as though he is out of his energy these days.{nl}He's not doing his job and looks down..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003414
text: You should take a leaf of sweet herb on your way.{nl}Even if you diluted it, it's too strong to be eaten alone.{nl}There are many sweet herbs around here so you won't have a trouble finding it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003415
text: I didn't miss anything.{nl}Please move fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003416
text: Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003417
text: Who are you? and what's that?{nl}Stepas sent you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003418
text: He told me to take this?{nl}Nutritious tonic?{nl}I never expected this from him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003419
text: Ah, that...{nl}Maybe the medicine was too strong? or the poison of Scorpio got rotten.{nl}Well, don't think about it. You just continue on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003420
text: Ah, my heard. What is this.{nl}I feel bloated...{nl}I shouldn't have eaten the food he gave to me!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003421
text: I don't know what this is all about.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003422
text: Marius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003423
text: I should bring him some food. He must be looking for a small plot of field where he could scatter the seeds across the bridge over there.{nl}Whenever I try to go there, the food gets rotten.{nl}Can you bring me some?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003424
text: Come back whenever it gets rotten.{nl}But, since there are not many of them, please take care.{nl}I only have six left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003425
text: You came at the right time since I was hungry.{nl}Something strange has been keep delivered from the lower side so I was so heptic.{nl}I will be concious again if I eat that rice cake. Give to me fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003426
text: Now it will be good if you bring that to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003427
text: What are you doing? Move fast...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003428
text: Well.{nl}I don't understand why the food gets rotten whenever I cross there.{nl}... Is it because of the smoke there?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003429
text: {nl}How would I know about it. If you are going back to Marius, then get rid of those strange things.{nl}I can't do it because I am scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003430
text: They can be removed if I rub them with my feet and hands right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003431
text: I will eat this rice cake well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003432
text: In fact, I suspected the smoke.{nl}But as a farmer, I didn't know about it.{nl}I was also scared of those guys who claim that it was made by those barons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003433
text: Okay. Farewell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003434
text: Baron Secretary Arunas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003435
text: Hello. I am the secretary of the baron, Areluno, who is the owner of this place.{nl}The baron ordered me to do something, but it's hard.{nl}I am little tired as well..I feel tired whenever I come out to the land.{nl}Please help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003436
text: Long time ago, this place was full of vitalities due to tennat farming, but since one day..{nl}Sorry, but I can't tell you anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003437
text: It's simple. Please investigate that place a bit, and make sure the crops are growing well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003438
text: Is the task that I requested to you not done yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003439
text: Ah, is that so. They are really like that as the baron and Rimas told so.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003440
text: Then, we should remove that energy.{nl}I will give you some woods first so please make the magic circle using that woods on that place.{nl}Like me, you don't seem to have skill to create a magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003441
text: {nl}I will give you this spell scroll. First make it by tieing it with woods and burn it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003442
text: I am counting on you.{nl}I think feel more tired due to the energy in this place..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003443
text: Ah, I am tired..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003444
text: Yes? The crops died?{nl}Was the spell too strong?{nl}Well, don't think about that too much. If you were able to remove the strage energy, it would be fine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003445
text: Wizard Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003446
text: Are you the Revelator?{nl}Please do not think about the machine behind me.{nl}Unless you help me with one of my tasks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003447
text: This machine is being used for an important task.{nl}It is related to the past that isn't that long ago.{nl}The portal that would bring the eternal life and the power that sustains the eternal life..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003448
text: You can only minimize the strange energy surrounding this place by enhancing the seal magic circle.{nl}To do so, we need those empty bottles.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003449
text: Is everything going alright?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003450
text: Very nice.{nl}The machine is going well for sure.{nl}Its all because of you.{nl}And that strange energy is influencing the growth of the crops here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003451
text: I activate the power generator using the fuel that we accumulated in that storage.{nl}That's why we needed more grains.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003452
text: {nl}It is so fortunate that the farmers are helping us without resistance.{nl}..Anyways, recently that storage is being attacked by the monsters so we worry about it.{nl}I guess its not strange since the grains are piled up there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003453
text: I can only say that the power generator helps to keep the gate open which leads to an important place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003454
text: I don't know when those monsters appear again so I can't leave this place. I can't also let the baron do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003455
text: It will be quite for some time. {nl} Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003456
text: The storage door is locked.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003457
text: Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003458
text: What is that? Is that the head of the stone statue? Give it to me. I got something to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003459
text: It is the upper body of something. Give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003460
text: Is that the lower body of the stone statue..?{nl}Give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003461
text: That looks like a wing.. Can you give it to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003462
text: I have a headache..{nl}Why am I here..?{nl}Anyways, I will return.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003463
text: Should I take some rest..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003464
text: Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003465
text: Really? A person comes out from the sack?{nl}Why did he do that?{nl}Well. I don't know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003466
text: The baron, Areluno is the landlord of this land!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003467
text: Sergeant Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003468
text: The farmers here are too lazy. {nl}If I was the landlord, I would have swept them all..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003469
text: {nl}The baron is very kind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003470
text: Even if this place belongs to the baron, this place is too infertile and the monsters also took the seeds..{nl}So, can you retrieve the seeds that were taken by the monsters?{nl}I put them well in my pocket..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003471
text: I need more seeds.. Can you get me some more?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003472
text: I don't know who took it. We should catch them all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003473
text: I don't know anymore.{nl}If he could share me a small plot of field, that would be good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003474
text: Yes. That's right. Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003475
text: Now we have some seeds. Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003476
text: Ah, that's right.{nl}There are many ways to enhance the magic circle.{nl}It is always a problem that I can't go since I can't leave the baron and this magic power generator behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003477
text: {nl}Okay. Take these and scatter them.{nl}This is one of the methods for the enhancement. I made it to prepare times like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003478
text: Use the poison to enhance the magic circle?..{nl}I am not sure if its right, but let's try it anyways.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003479
text: I've collected that poison from the monsters.{nl}The monsters are very vicious and hard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003480
text: Benius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003481
text: There are Manticens which the baron takes care at the Mirukis farm.{nl}I was little bit worried that they only do what they want to do..{nl}Anyways, yesterday, I fed them. Little big one.{nl}Their habit is to eat something after hiding somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003482
text: {nl}I will search here so could you please take a look at Vinai brewery?{nl}I will give you a lump of meat so use it as a bait.{nl}They always hide like that so I can't feed them on the right time.{nl}I wouldn't worry if there were only one or two of them..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003483
text: Protect the things that are important to the baron?{nl}Hahat!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003484
text: Ha, Where did they go..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003485
text: Even if we miss one, no one would recognize.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003486
text: Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003487
text: Revelator?{nl}We don't have enough workforce at the moment so could you please help us?{nl}We need to prepare many things to do a big task.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003488
text: I don't know why, but, somehow I am the one who is leading.{nl}Its embarrassing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003489
text: Please get some wood sticks from the tree fence near here.{nl}I will make a round woodstick.{nl}Let's say.. it is some kind of tool.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003490
text: Recycle the trees that were used in the fence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003491
text: Very well indeed!{nl}With this much, I think we have enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003492
text: I even have a plan to put the stone in the middle of a leather string.{nl}More we have, we will be better off.{nl}I am sorry to you..{nl}In fact, we should take care of our job, but we are in a hurry.. I am sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003493
text: You should be busy with the task of revelation...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003494
text: {nl}Well, I will explain it to you.{nl}To get a revenge on the source of the destruction and to find out the truth behind the everything that is happening here.{nl}Our objectives are those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003495
text: The monsters have something that looks like a hard core.{nl}That is harder than a stone so if one gets hit by that, its quite lethal.{nl}And I think it would be better to get those from the monsters instead of getting stones here where the stones are not hard enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003496
text: We will take care of our own tasks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003497
text: That's enough.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003498
text: We should accumulate the poison that we will put on the weapons.{nl}The battles will be effective as a result.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003499
text: Our biggest weakness is that it's not certain.{nl}It seems that they are hiding something in the restricted area in the aqueduct bridge.{nl}He is a greedy oldman, so there must be something inside. I am sure of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003500
text: Place the poisonous pots and lure the monsters near them.{nl}When you collect enough, please bring me those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003501
text: I am sorry that I had to make you do this kind of work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003502
text: Farming tools are used to plowing the fields so they can be also used in battles.{nl}But we would definitely need the help from the farmers..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003503
text: Show the letter that I gave to you and if you successfully persuade them, you would be able to receive their farming tools.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003504
text: I hope the farmers don't request something big..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003505
text: You broought a lot!{nl}Thanks!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003506
text: Tauras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003507
text: You fight well when you are not in hunger.{nl}I am called Tauras and I am in charge of supplying the food.{nl}We don't have enough time so we need help from anyone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003508
text: {nl}Could.. you help me a bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003509
text: Desire comes when you are not in hunger.{nl}You may think there's plenty of food since this place is farming area..{nl}But that's before the plundering took place.{nl}Farming is hard and I am always in hunger..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003510
text: {nl}It is reasonable that we should prepare something like this.{nl}We will make it happen with Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003511
text: Please get some dandelions there.{nl}Dandelions are thankful flowers.{nl}They can be used with grains to make soups and they can also be used in medicines.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003512
text: We appreciate for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003513
text: Thanks. I feel so relieved.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003514
text: Dried food is better to keep it for a long time.{nl}Especially, you will feel full when you consume only a little amount of beef jerky.{nl}That's why we are accumulating them a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003515
text: Since one day, lots of plunderings occurred in this place.{nl}The farmers starved to death..But one thing strange is that although some of them didn't die due to hunger, we kept hearing the reports about their disappearances.{nl}I personally think this has something to do with the baron.{nl}I want to find out about that. Even if I would have to use my force.{nl}Horacius was the one who agreed with my plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003516
text: Obtain some meats from the monsters in this region and put them in the dryer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003517
text: The key to this plan is whether we would be able to get fresh meats from the monsters.{nl}They hardly give up..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003518
text: Thanks!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003519
text: The problem is that the food storage gets attacked by the monsters frequently.{nl}Please help me a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003520
text: The food storage should be somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003521
text: I can relax for now, but I don't know when they would attack again..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003522
text: Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003523
text: Are you the Revelator?{nl}I listen to the stories even when I am here in this rural region.{nl}I am planning to restore the Tenants' Farm here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003524
text: {nl}It is crucial to avoid the eyes of the baron.{nl}It is my mission to eliminate the vicious marks that were put in various places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003525
text: I've been doing this job for a long time..{nl}And we have only 3 left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003526
text: Over the fence, there is an altar that the villagers used to do ritual ceremonies.{nl}But due to the strong monster that the baron left here, we can't do ritual ceremonies anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003527
text: I can only guess.{nl}I am sure that something serious is going on here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003528
text: Be careful.{nl}It is very vicious.{nl}I am keep trying, but I always failed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003529
text: Oh my god!{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003530
text: The seal magic circle which was discoverd in the A area... We should eliminate it.{nl}This is the hard stone that we obtained from the monsters.{nl}If we throw this, we may able to break the field.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003531
text: I am the one who should have finished this job..{nl}I am sorry that I passed this job to you...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003532
text: Cheer up, Revelator!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003533
text: Ohoh, you succeeded!{nl}Now this place is going back to its normal status.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003534
text: There's a magic circle in this region as well.{nl}We should break that.{nl}But, the monsters are always disturbing us...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003535
text: Just think that the monsters don't have brains.{nl}They are not on the baron side and they are also not on our side.{nl}They always cause troubles and they disturb our tasks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003536
text: I feel so relieved to see that you are so enthusiastic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003537
text: We are almost there! The moment of restoration!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003538
text: There are lots of tasks to do for the restoration.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003539
text: The pieces that you gave to me are not normal.{nl}These must be.. those barons must have manipulated something on this land and destructed them.{nl}You collected all these...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003540
text: {nl}Can I trust you?{nl}Hmm, then...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003541
text: I am collecting the clues here.{nl}I can't tell you in details, but I am preparing something big.{nl}We should have some reasons to persuade the farmers and the villagers to do that task.{nl}I am collecting those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003542
text: First, I should glue these pieces together. Can you get me some sticky fluid from the monsters?{nl}I will try to glue them with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003543
text: {nl}I feel... I feel like ruining the divinity, but I have no choice since I am running out of the supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003544
text: We don't have enough sticky fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003545
text: Okay that would be enough. Give it to me.{nl}I will try to glue them together.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003546
text: To prepare the big task that we will do in the near future, I am collecting the clues to persuade the farmers.{nl}I mean... since the baron is wrong, I am telling you to get a revenge on the plunderings and the cruelties.{nl}.. I will tell you that much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003547
text: I mean, we should take the monster to the magic circle down there.{nl}In order to succeed the experiment, it would be better to extract the half of the blood from it.{nl}And then make it react to the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003548
text: You are understanding correctly right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003549
text: Yes.{nl}It really was like that. Monsters fall into the eternal sleep.. dying..{nl}The monsters are dying due to the energy coming from there...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003550
text: Jonaris

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003551
text: From the one day, the crops here do not grow anymore.{nl}Even after I scatter the seeds a lot.{nl}So I am thinking maybe the reason of it is related to the magic circle that was created by the fellows of the baron.{nl}Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003552
text: As you can see, this place is full of water.{nl}The place full of water means that this land is very fertile.{nl}But, you can see it right? The crops at some places are not growing.{nl}It's not that all the fields are like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003553
text: When you see the place near the magic circle, you will see the monsters with flames on them.{nl}Long time ago, I was able to put the flames on some of them in order to eliminate the magic circle, but after that I was so busy here.{nl}When you go there and put them into the magic circle, the field will break.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003554
text: Still not completed?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003555
text: Wow amazing.{nl}Thanks!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003556
text: But, the magic circles are still left.{nl}Is there some way we could borrow the mighty power of the goddesses...{nl}Only if there were the statues of the goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003557
text: Starting from the one day, those barons' plunderings increased a lot and many magic circles were created a lot. Somehow, some of them were less shiny.{nl}Anyways, when you get near the bright ones, it will be hard to eliminate them since you may get hurt.{nl}Of course, the most difficult task is to avoid the eyes of the barons and continue to do this task.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003558
text: {nl}I don't know exactly who you are, but you are the perfect candidate to help us since you are not well known here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003559
text: Yoana has it?{nl}If we put them in the magic circle, don't you think the field would break?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003560
text: You came well at the right time. I tied them up with the sticky fluid.{nl}... As I expected. This is the statue of the goddess.{nl}You tied them up with the fluid from the monsters... I am so sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003561
text: {nl}You need this? Take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003562
text: I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003563
text: Really?{nl}My predictions are all correct.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003564
text: Cheer up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003565
text: Jugas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003566
text: Master, have you seen my seed pocket that the monsters took away from me?{nl}I am begging you.. please find the seed pocket for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003567
text: It's lacking.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003568
text: Ah, thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003569
text: There is an unstable sealed magic circle down there. {nl}The baron told me that the seal which prevents the strange energy spurting out from the places nearby is not perfect yet so the energy is leaking out. However, the problem is that it doesn't look like that.{nl}It is suspicious.{nl}Now we have to tie up these pieces, so can you find more about the energy on behalf of me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003570
text: Hmm.. It is almost completed now.{nl}We have enough reasons.. the food, almost everything.{nl}Now, we just have one more to go...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003571
text: My wish is not something big. We just want to live.{nl}Harvest for one year and stay full until the next harvest. {nl}We, farmers want only that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003572
text: {nl}If that one thing doesn't get accomplished, we have no choice, but to stand up.{nl}Against the source of the plunderings.{nl}Also if the process of the plunderings ruin the mighty power of the goddess, and the objective of the plunderings results from the greed of one person, we do have to get mad about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003573
text: We do have to check whether the farmers would particpate.{nl}I will give you the sheet so please get their signatures on the sheet.{nl}Along with the date for the execution, this sheet confirms that we all act together for the same purpose.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003574
text: {nl}How could I request this to you...{nl}I am so sorry. If this gets completed, we will do the rest ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003575
text: This task will give you some trouble.{nl}The farmers are not that simple.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003576
text: Completed!{nl}Now you go on your way!{nl}I can't leave the completion of the task to you. That's too much burden for you.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003577
text: To do a big task..{nl}We should accumulate some clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003578
text: Ah, What should I do...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003579
text: Leader Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003580
text: More we prepare, better off we are.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003581
text: Now, leave the things to us here.{nl}Thank you so much for everything so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003582
text: I mean the second secret. {nl}Unfortunately, it seems that Naktis' servants have taken the lead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003583
text: I am investigating on how to undo Naktis' curse here.{nl}For the sake of those who are suffering from the curse, can you get me samples of the demons?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003584
text: Well darn. We should be experimenting, not imagining things.{nl}I am sorry, but could you get me samples of other demons?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003585
text: How come the goddesses leave those filthy demons like that...{nl}Is this also what the goddesses want?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003586
text: We should just finish it before it gets in the hands of Naktis.{nl}Defeat the demons and find the divine artifacts of the salvation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003587
text: We don't have much time left to stay in the Great Cathedral.{nl}In the meantime, we should find clues on how to release the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003588
text: We should find out how Naktis' curse influences the psychology of humans...{nl}It really is a tough nut to crack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003589
text: The Great Cathedral is like a repository of knowledge.{nl}If you find those documents, we will easily find a way how to face against Naktis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003590
text: If no one maintains it, even great architectural wonders collapse easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003591
text: I knew that the Great Cathedral would still be standing, even on Medzio Diena.{nl}But, Naktis' attacks were not something that could be endured.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003592
text: 4 years have passed since the congregation ordered the evacuation...{nl}Everything about the Great Cathedral is meaningless now due to Naktis' curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003593
text: Priest Ruodell

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003594
text: Hmm, I know it is an order from the congregation, but we should first retrieve the Great Cathedral...{nl}Then we would be able to get an answer for the curse as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003595
text: I don't know if we will be able to find a way to release the curse if things continue like this.{nl}If I only had the power, I would have driven all demons out from the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003596
text: Priest Yosana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003597
text: The congregation told us that they will retake the Great Cathedral once Naktis' curse is resolved.{nl}It just isn't right to leave the Great Cathedral, which supported the goddesses, like this for four years.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003598
text: We lost many documents in the Great Cathedral due to Naktis' servants.{nl}Whenever I think about it, I feel so bad that we lost them..{nl}Those documents were over a hundred years old...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003599
text: Priest Alisha

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003600
text: Are the Thistles not ready yet?{nl}If they come late, the medicine will dry out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003601
text: Did you get them?{nl}Please give them to me. I will put them in the cauldron and boil them now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003602
text: Thank you so much!{nl}I need them as fresh and green as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003603
text: I think the medicine is ready now.{nl}Okay... how should I administer this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003604
text: Pilgrim Orville

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003605
text: Please help me.{nl}I ran away and got here by avoiding the monsters, but I can't find a friend of mine who came with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003606
text: Please find my friend.{nl}I lived so hard until now, so I can't just die here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003607
text: Priest Roana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003608
text: Thanks for helping us.{nl}The goddess help the ones who try their best, and I think it was you, the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003609
text: It is getting stronger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003610
text: So the true nature of the curse was Chapparition.{nl}I was busy with the curse of Naktis so I think its so fortunate.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003611
text: Ah, can you send this report to Priest Aden if you get a chance to go back to the Main Chamber?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003612
text: The revelation is being protected by the five keys of Maven.{nl}To get those keys, you must solve all the secrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003613
text: Then I should go back to your small pocket for a minute.{nl}Do not trust anyone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003614
text: The goddess wants you and Hauberk to defeat the pawns of Blut so that the 1st zone gets released from the control of the demons.{nl}To do so, you should disturb the consciousness of the subordinates who try to free the Blut.{nl}Could you defeat the monsters at the gathering place of Rituala?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003615
text: Blut's

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003616
text: They tried to break the loosened barriers and run away outside.{nl}Get some help from Hauberks if you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003617
text: Well done. I feel that the barriers in this region are more enhanced now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003618
text: You have big ambition..{nl}I can feel the strong spirit in you,.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003619
text: I am Demon Lord Hauberk. I will tell you the story that you may be interested in...{nl}About Vakarine, goddess of the Evening Star.. I will tell you where she is.{nl}You want to find Vakarine?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003620
text: So you want to save the Goddesses? You made a clever decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003621
text: Unlike the other guys, I can't possess your body.{nl}So please carry my pieces of the seal now and enter inside.{nl}I will guide you from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003622
text: Blut are facing against Kupole Zydrone at Nuzikalti Hall.{nl}Zydrone would try his best to resist, but I can't keep them anymore with our power only.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003623
text: The only way to weaken Blut is to get the secreting glands that Blut shared with his subordinates and weaken his influence.{nl}There are Blut's guys near Bjaurer Hideout. Get the secreting glands of Blut from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003624
text: The goddess is facing against the Demon Lord somewhere in the prison.{nl}She desperately needs help from you and Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003625
text: Good. I will eliminate this from this world.{nl}Blut would feel like as if he lost it's feelers.{nl}It will be a big help to Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003626
text: The battle with Blut will be hard for us.{nl}Hauberk should help us. We should grant the substance to Hauberk again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003627
text: {nl}Blut sealed his power at his altar for his escape.{nl}If Hauberk could absorb that, it will be a great help to us.{nl}Go to the concentrated area. Control the altar there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003628
text: {nl}If you succeed on granting substance to Hauberk, please go see Zydrone.{nl}We are really running out of time now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003629
text: The power of the demons reject the power of the goddesses. Only Hauberk can do this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003630
text: Were you able to grant the substance to Hauberk? It is so fortunate.{nl}Everything will go as the goddess wishes...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003631
text: I locked Blut in the barrier of the prison, but it won't stand long.{nl}When we are prepared, we should defeat it with Hauberk.{nl}If we lose, Vakarine would also fall down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003632
text: Go to the 2nd area of the prison. Norgaile is waitng for you and Hauberk there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003633
text: Blut and his followers want to escape to the external world. Can you defeat them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003634
text: The power of the Goddesses should control here again...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003635
text: Well done. Now I am relieved.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003636
text: The investigation team formed by humans came here lately.{nl}However, they could not get out and died here.{nl}The demons carry their belongings like their booties.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003637
text: {nl}If you could retrieve them, I will hand them over to their families when this place becomes stabilized.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003638
text: No humans can come to this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003639
text: Thanks. I hope there are no more sacrifices like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003640
text: It's hasn't been that long when the subordinates of Nuaele started to encroach this place.{nl}But, because of some guy who planned this meticulously, the barriers of the Goddesses are collapsing from all over the places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003641
text: {nl}In order to destroy the power of Nuaele here, we should eliminate his subordinates.{nl}At the 1st isolated zone, there's some guy who is waiting for Nuaele to defeat Kupole Aldona.{nl}Please defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003642
text: I am worried about Aldona at Nuaele's place...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003643
text: Even if we fail to defeat Nuaele, we reduced the number of his followers who would listen to his orders so I think it would be safe for some time..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003644
text: All demons here were the followers of Hauberk at this place.{nl}Hauberk knows well about that. {nl}Hauberk was granted with the substance, but I am sure he is still unstable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003645
text: Hauberk wants to retrieve his manes that he shared with the demons.{nl}Please make Hauberk more stronger. He must also want that.{nl}Please go to the 2nd isolated zone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003646
text: Long time ago, when Helgasercle was ripped in pieces and sealed, his followers also were kicked out from the demon realms.{nl}The demons who lost their owner started to trample upon humans and the Goddesses locked them up here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003647
text: {nl}Ferocious Nuaele has the seal pieces of Hauberk.{nl}They are following Nuaele as if he is Hauberk.{nl}If you retrieve the manes of Hauberk and give them back to Hauberk, they won't at least follow Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003648
text: Before Hauberk's seal pieces return to Hauberk, I expect the demons would be in confusion for a while.{nl}Hauberk must regain his power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003649
text: Nuaele had many chances to use the accumulated power to go out into the world by breaking into the weakened power of the Goddesses.{nl}But, he is waiting something. We don't know what he is waiting for.{nl}We should interrogate the subordinates of Nuaele to find out what that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003650
text: {nl}I will give you this marble that I received from the Goddesses.{nl}Kupoles can't use this anymore since the control of the Goddesses in the prison became weak.{nl}But since Hauberk helps you, you will be able to read the minds of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003651
text: When the power of the goddesses get weak, the power of us, Kupoles also get weak.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003652
text: They were thinking of making the demon prison into their demon realm from the first place.{nl}If this place falls into the hands of him, even Ausrine won't be able to do anything.{nl}You just told me an important information. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003653
text: There's *monster at the 4th isolated area. Hauberk used to trust him the most, but as Hauberk was sealed, he went to Nuaele's side.{nl}If you could defeat him, then its like you are eliminating one of strongest weapons of Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003654
text: Hauberk would welcome this. We don't need that kind of subordinates anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003655
text: When Hauberk was sealed by Helgasercle, the demons thought that no one like Hauberk would appear again.{nl}But, Nuaele is acting like Hauberk and he became the most threatening Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003656
text: What did Hauberk tell you? It's good for all of us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003657
text: After Nuaele disappeared, among the demons that were being controlled by Nuaele, there are some demons that want to expand their influences.{nl}Please destroy the demon monster at the 1st isolated area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003658
text: Hauberk and Nuaele will become symbolic figures to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003659
text: Because of you, this place was able to be stabilized a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003660
text: Many sisters who fought against Monster * at the 4th isolated area were killed a lot.{nl}The demons stole the necklaces from them and collecting them as if they are medals.{nl}Please help us so that those demons would not underestimate us again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003661
text: Many sisters are being sacrificed even at this moment at other prisons where your help can not reach.{nl}Please help us. Revelator...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003662
text: I will pass these necklaces to Vakarine when this place gets okay.{nl}I hope the goddesses always protect you...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003663
text: Nuaele is planning something.{nl}Please go see Aldona. He will take you to Nuaele's area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003664
text: We don't have enough time to catch him and ask what he is planning!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003665
text: I can feel that Nuaele has disappeared.{nl}Please go to the District 3.{nl}Vakarine is waiting for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003666
text: Because of you, Zydrone and Aldona were able to help me.{nl}Thank you, Revelator and Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003667
text: {nl}I will restore my Dionys to its previous status now.{nl}Meet Zydrone. Please help her to complete my key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003668
text: The goddess is trying to calm down the violent Dionys and trying to help her to come back to her previous status.{nl}To do so, we should accumulate the power of the goddess that are scattered across this area.{nl}We can collect that power using the Evening Star Key. But we will definitely need your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003669
text: Due to the space that was created near the Oruarma Cathedral, the place where the key should be recharged, it's pretty hard to do the ritual normally. {nl}Deactivate the space at the scar of transformation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003670
text: Dionys was family of the goddess and her companion.{nl}The goddess became very sad after sacrificing Dionys to seal him up with the chains.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003671
text: We can start the ritual again. When the Evening Star Key gets completed, we would be able to restore Dionys who became violent to her normal status.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003672
text: Let's go to Oruarma Cathedral. As I am recharging this key, you should protect me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003673
text: {nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003674
text: Please bring this key to Aldona.{nl}On behalf of the tired goddesses, Aldona is preventing the escape of Dionys.{nl}Please hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003675
text: We can't stand anymore. Dionys can't be faced by the Kupoles.{nl}You and Hauberk should help. And one more thing...{nl}You should unleash the power of the seal that the goddess has prepared for the worst moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003676
text: Please unseal the Rearda, Kasa and Rada Seals that are near the magic suppressor using the Evening Star Key that you received from Zydrone.{nl}You will have easier time facing against Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003677
text: The goddess prepared for the everything that could occur.{nl}The problem is time. If we arrive late, then even Vakarine won't be able to do anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003678
text: As the seal unleashes, the lights of the goddess are coming to the magic suppressor.{nl}Now, everything is ready. We also have enough time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003679
text: I will persuade Dionys first, but it won't be effective.{nl}Dionys has the chains that Giltine had created.{nl}That's why she is breaking everything she sees.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003680
text: If we fail, Dionys will escape from this place.{nl}It will be the same thing as unleashing tens of Demon Lords to this world.{nl}Tell me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003681
text: We just ran into a problem. The reason why the goddess helped Hauberk to regain his energy was because Hauberk is the key who can quiet down this mess.{nl}The goddess tried to close the space that was opened from the demon realm using the chains and the spirits of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003682
text: I am sorry to deceive you. But, I can't tell you the truth as long as Hauberk is with you.{nl}Hauberk ran away to District 4. Please tell this to the Goddess as quickly as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003683
text: Alright... so that's why.{nl}Do not lose your hope savior, it's not too late as long as you are alive.{nl}Hauberk ran away to District 4 which is like a mae in this prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003684
text: Look for Daiva there. She will guide you to Hauberk.{nl}I will observe Dionys from here.{nl}If you or the Kupoles seal Hauberk, we will meet again at the District 5.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003685
text: The dimensional door that was opened from the demon realm. The dimensional crack can't be closed even by the goddess.{nl}We should control the dimensional crack using Hauberk and eliminate with the chains.{nl}But in that process, Hauberk was completely eliminated. Before he ran away like that, I had to lock him up...{nl}{nl}I am so sorry to see the goddess again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003686
text: As Baltrus disappeared, the demons were confused who used to receive orders from him.{nl}That caused the demons more violent whose behaviours were already unpredictable.{nl}Can you defeat those who are coming to Oruarma Cathedral?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003687
text: Even if the goddess isn't here, the Kupoles won't be violent.{nl}We are the symbol of rules and disciplines.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003688
text: The great hall is one of the places which the Goddesses could easily regain their energies.{nl}So it should be safe from the demons all the time.{nl}Thanks for taking care of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003689
text: The demons that ran away after being attacked by Dionys are hiding near the Rearda Seal.{nl}The fragments of Dionys that are stuck on them

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003690
text: The toe nails of the spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003691
text: Retrieve them.{nl}It will help the goddess to restore Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003692
text: Dionys is not normal. {nl}The goddess rescued her when she was being persecuted by the demons and became the Dionys nowadays.{nl}She temporarily lost her consciousness due to the chains, but you should not suspect her belief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003693
text: Thanks. I will pass these toe nails to the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003694
text: Dionys was trying to destroy Rada Seal before she was locked up inside the magic suppressor.{nl}Luckily, we were able to lock it before...{nl}At then, it released its power to various places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003695
text: Please collect the symbols of the stars that Dionys scattered near Rama seal.{nl}It will be a big help to the goddess who wants to restore Dionys to it's previous status.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003696
text: The damages that were caused by Dionys were so great.{nl}Hundreds of demon prisoners were dead and the violent Baltrus ran away before the Kupoles locked up Dionys.{nl}There were more than tens of Kupoles that were dead by the toe nails of Dionys at then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003697
text: Thank you. I will try my best to restore Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003698
text: I've been wating for you. Hauberk is near here.{nl}He is trying to escape from Nebilau by attacking the barriers of the goddess.{nl}I hope you resist him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003699
text: Now is the only chance to restore everything back to its previous status.{nl}Please catch him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003700
text: You should chase him til the end to catch him.{nl}And even a slightest energy should be left in him so that he could share it with his subordinates.{nl}The goddess wants Hauberk in perfect shape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003701
text: Hauberk is recruiting his subordinates and allocating them here again.{nl}The guys who were roaming around the various places in the prison are coming to Hauberk again.{nl}Hauberk is sharing the pieces of his spirit to his subordinates to deceive our eyes while he is running away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003702
text: Even one piece is important to us since Hauberk should be in perfect shape.{nl}Defeat the servants of Hauberk at the inner isolated area and collect the pieces of Hauberk's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003703
text: When we catch Hauberk, we will give him the pieces of his spirit back to him which he shared with his subordinates.{nl}You should not let Hauberk run away from this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003704
text: He shared many pieces of his spirit more than we thought.{nl}Maybe, he is trying to eliminate the power of the key from him.{nl}We should prevent him from sharing more pieces!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003705
text: We found the location of the place where Hauberk ran away.{nl}Let's meet at the entrance of the poison room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003706
text: Hauberk found another space in the poison room.{nl}They are trying to deceive our eyes by being possessed to his subordinates.{nl}Take this Night Star Spectral Orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003707
text: When you use the Night Star Spectral Orb, you would be able to find{nl}Hauberk that is hiding at the poison room of Idunga.{nl}Defeat the demons until he gives up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003708
text: If Hauberk gives up and tries to run away, I will block him from this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003709
text: You'be succeded driving Hauberk in.{nl}I will block here so that Hauberk would never return again.{nl}Chase after Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003710
text: If you drive Hauberk into the Galutin Solitary Confinement, Sigita would help you there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003711
text: You've lured Hauberk into the Galutin Solitary Confinement.{nl}He will have a trouble escaping from that place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003712
text: I will block Hauberk's escape here.{nl}Sigita must be blocking from the other end.{nl}Go follow Hauberk. Don't let him escape!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003713
text: The demons are all criminals after that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003714
text: Everything is not working well as planned...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003715
text: I don't have anything to talk with a weak person.{nl}Go back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003716
text: The person who committed a sin would pay for his sin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003717
text: Hauberk is protesting inside the Galutin Solitary Confinement.{nl}Suppress and seal him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003718
text: {nl}Tell me when you are ready to attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003719
text: Something not according to plan occurred.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003720
text: There were so many sacrifices. Everything that was caused by the dimensional crack is collapsing this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003721
text: We've done it. Please go to the goddess in the District 5.{nl}We will send the sealed Hauberk to the goddess when we need it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003722
text: After catching Hauberk, his subordinates ran away to various places in the prison.{nl}If we relase them, we don't know what they will do later so we should find them and get rid of them.{nl}Could you defeat Hauberk's demons that ran away to Aklaga isolated place?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003723
text: The influence that started to spread fom the capital city of the humans would disturb the control of Vakarine more and more.{nl}In order to prepare for that, we should get rid of the subordinates who used to follow the Demon Lord.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003724
text: Thanks. I will stay here and chase after the rest of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003725
text: Right before you succeeded on sealing Hauberk, some of the subordinates of Hauberk ran away to Ishidevi Hideout by disobeying the order of Hauberk.{nl}The conspiracy that Nuaele planned occurred because we failed to catch him before he ran away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003726
text: {nl}That should never occur again. Please get rid of the betrayers near Ishidevi Hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003727
text: I can't forget that my sisters were killed by Nuaele...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003728
text: Well done. I will find those guys so that they can't resist against the goddess.{nl}Even if the goddess use all her powers, we will still defeat them so that they can't resist against us...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003729
text: The goddess may not agree, but I want to get revenge.{nl}The influence of the disaster that occurred at the capital city of the humans is spreading quickly here.{nl}As the demons killed our sisters and took away their belongings, we also have to do the same thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003730
text: {nl}Could you defeat the demons at the Hradeti Crossroads and collect the teeth of those demons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003731
text: This is cute compared to what they did.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003732
text: Thanks. Please keep it secret to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003733
text: We could come this far because you helped us.{nl}If we could finish the job well, I think we will be able to protect the prison for a while.{nl}Are you ready to block the dimensional crack?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003734
text: While I was away from this place, the dimensional crack became more stronger..{nl}If we move Hauberk in this situation, our seal would be unleashed and we will miss Hauberk.{nl}There's something that you should do it for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003735
text: I don't feel good since I feel like I left a big burden on your shoulders.{nl}But, I can't help you if we can't finish this task.{nl}The power of the demons is lacking too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003736
text: {nl}I will give you the Evening Star Rune. {nl}But, you should combine the runes with the traces of the metastasis that are on the demons that came here.{nl}Defeat the demons at the Aushura worship place.{nl}It will be an important medium to collect the power of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003737
text: I should have listened to Laima's warnings from the beginning.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003738
text: I've collected enough Evening Star Rune.{nl}I will use this to pull the spirits of demons.{nl}Receive the Evening Star Rune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003739
text: Use the Evening Star Rune to the demons and neutralize those demons.{nl}The demons that became neutralized would come to me.{nl}I will combine them with the spirits of Hauberk here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003740
text: The goddess and the demons can't control each other's spirits easily, but it is possible through the Revelator like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003741
text: Thank you Revelator...{nl}The demons you've sent, the Kupoles are combining the with the spirit of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003742
text: The demons are also gathered at Ishishula which is little bit far from here.{nl}Use the Evening Star Rune there and neutralize them.{nl}My Kupoles would go there and receive them..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003743
text: Since you helped me, the influence of me and the Kupoles is recovering in the prison.{nl}We can go anywhere and we can appear from anywhere.{nl}And I am always looking at you. Be confident Revelator..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003744
text: Due to your help, the Kupoles are combining with the spirits of Hauberk.{nl}We almost filled them...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003745
text: There's a way to get more power of the demon spirits.{nl}Retrieve the symbols of the condemned criminals that we placed on them so that they can't use their power.{nl}Go to Etmesta isolated area and suppress the guys there. If you use the Evening Star Rune, you would be able to receive the symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003746
text: Me and the Kupoles could go anywhere in the prison, but I could not observe all of them besides.{nl}I engraved the symbol of the condemned criminal who committed most deadly sins so that they can't use their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003747
text: With these symbols, we would be able to increase the size of Hauberk's spirits even more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003748
text: We collected enough power of the demon spirits to block the dimensional crack.{nl}As me and my Kupoles block the dimensional crack, you should protect us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003749
text: The root of the disaster that came to this place doesn't exist here anymore. You should receive the credit for this, Revelator.{nl}Now we will call Hauberk. And we will eliminate the dimensional crack here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003750
text: {nl}I am going to be here. If you need my help, come any time..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003751
