text: The demons hid into various places in the District 5 before I was able to fill the dimensional crack when I arrived here...{nl}And many of them are concentrated near Vanaga Monitor District, so please defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003752
text: The number of Kupoles is increasing a lot..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003753
text: If I disappear from this place a bit, this space would go wide again.{nl}I hope you find Laima fast...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003754
text: Dionys is recovering fast due to you. Someday, she would protect us again near me...{nl}But she is suffering from the slow recovery while I am protecting this place.{nl}Can you defeat the demons that are at the Pasaru isolated place get me the empty spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003755
text: When Dionys gets recovered, you would be able to stabilize this prison without me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003756
text: Thanks. When Dionys comes back, it will be okay even if I leave this place for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003757
text: The small dimensional crack is widening at the areas where we can't reach.{nl}The Kupoles all went to different districts so I have no way to block the dimensional crack.{nl}Can you do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003758
text: I'm in big debt to you, Zydrone and Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003759
text: Thank you Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003760
text: As Aldona ordered me, I've been wating for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003761
text: Do you think the circumstances would be better if we were to receive Laima's warning little sooner from Vakarine?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003762
text: You ended the lengthy battle...{nl}Aldona and Zydrone, I will send the Revelator so you guys should wait.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003763
text: Please leave me alone...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003764
text: The demon tricks are becoming more vicious.{nl}That demon is waiting for the next victim by hiding its evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003765
text: It seems that Naktis has found out why we came to the Great Cathedral.{nl}Otherwise, there'd no reason for those demons to go after reports that should've been passed to Aden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003766
text: There are these orbs that keep spreading the curses.{nl}It's ineffective to destroy it. We can only stop the spreading of the curse through a holy ritual ceremony.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003767
text: If you find an orb, please bring it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003768
text: It seems that they are spreading Naktis' thoughts...{nl}If we investigate it, we may be able to make use of this information.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003769
text: It is made by an interesting principle.{nl}Anyways, thanks for your cooperation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003770
text: Ah, if you get a chance to go back to the Main Chamber...{nl}Could you pass this document to Priest Aden?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003771
text: There once were always holy prayers echoing in this Great Cathedral.{nl}But, after Naktis' arrival, I've only seen unfaithful behavior.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003772
text: My mission is to retrieve the sacred artifacts, but I can't stand and watch this anymore.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters that are roaming around the Great Cathedral?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003773
text: Everyone is angry, but they are hold it in with their objectives in mind.{nl}But I.. just can't stand it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003774
text: There are many who trample on this sacred place.{nl}I can't forgive them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003775
text: I can still visualize those vicious beings.{nl}I will never forgive them in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003776
text: They should be ready to receive the punishment of the goddesses.{nl}Eternally.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003777
text: I hope the goddesses always protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003778
text: There are a lot fewer demons, but there are still many of them.{nl}I can't forgive any of those demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003779
text: If this Great Cathedral gets purified, all credits would go to you.{nl}But, we still have a long way to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003780
text: The demons that are spreading the vicious curses are still roaming the Great Cathedral.{nl}As a priest under the goddesses' name, how can I just leave this be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003781
text: Priests always have patience and mercy in their minds when they train.{nl}But, their patience and mercy are not for the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003782
text: You've done well, but there are still many demons left.{nl}When this mission is over, I am planning to receive the mission of purification.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003783
text: We have trouble. Hurry to Uola Chapel...{nl}I will tell you more when you get there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003784
text: Unfortunately, the bridge to it has collapsed so there's no direct path.{nl}There is no alternative besides the way around through the Penitence Route.{nl}Please hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003785
text: Cursed Pilgrim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003786
text: I am so hungry even though I keep eating... Please get me some food...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003787
text: Don't go without me... Please get me something to eat...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003788
text: Oh goddess, so you are the one who saved me.{nl}I am sorry, but my body has not recovered yet...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003789
text: I will take care of him by my side until he completely recovers from the curse.{nl}Maybe, I could also cure the other curses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003790
text: The curse of gluttony makes a person not to digest the food well.{nl}That's why the cursed people are always hungry. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003791
text: After he recovers from the curse, he will be totally exhausted, so I will take care of him by my side.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003792
text: Gytis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003793
text: Revelator, we are in trouble. Please help us!{nl}As you can see, the workers are dying due to the poison of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003794
text: As Uska ordered, we were clearing the forest to grow some food until this incident occurred.{nl}The monsters here weren't that vicious before, but now they use poison...{nl}I don't know what happened to them...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003795
text: The Pyromancer Master may help since she owes me something. {nl}Please. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003796
text: I know this well because I'm from this region.{nl}Even during Medzio Diena, the monsters here just ran away from people instead of using their poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003797
text: But just now they attacked the workers with their poison.{nl}If we don't complete the farm, we'll have trouble supplying the city with food...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003798
text: The monsters on that land?{nl}I can't believe it. I know it well since I used to go there a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003799
text: A Long time ago, I did a favor for the Pyromancer Master...{nl}She's the only one we can rely on now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003800
text: But if Gytis told you that, then I must say it's true.{nl}I do owe something to Gytis... Alright. Let's find a way together.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003801
text: First, we should find out why the monsters became vicious.{nl}Go back to the land and get me samples of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003802
text: The Pyromancer Master told you that she would help?{nl}That's a relief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003803
text: The monsters became vicious and the poison..{nl}There are so many things these days that can't be trusted.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003804
text: As expected, your skills match your reputation.{nl}Could you wait a sec? It shouldn't take that long to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003805
text: I can feel the presence of a spell with a mysterious poison.{nl}I'm sure that its true nature lies somewhere on the land...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003806
text: I can feel something horrible from these samples.{nl}Please be careful...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003807
text: Leather and a dagger with a magic circle engraved on them.{nl}Unfortunately, these kind of objects are not my speciality so I don't know much about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003808
text: From here on, it'll be better if we ask the Bokor Master.{nl}No one can compete with her in terms of spells.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003809
text: You want to know what spell is cast upon these objects?{nl}Hmm. It is a very filthy spell.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003810
text: I see. This spell spreads a poison that's pasted on the dagger to everything near it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003811
text: You will find the answer to the question when you ask the Bokor Master.{nl}I am sorry that I can't help you anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003812
text: However, I don't know what this poison is.{nl}But this dagger... How about you go meet the Ranger Master?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003813
text: This dagger. Where is this from?{nl} You better tell me quick, before I lose my patience.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003814
text: The Ranger Master studied daggers for some time in the past.{nl}That was due to Ebonypawn... She will give you the answer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003815
text: It was cast with a spell to spread poison on that land?{nl}Hmm. I've received help from an unexpected place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003816
text: Anyhow, this dagger belongs to Ebonypawn.{nl}You can tell by looking at the shape of the blade and the symbol. {nl}I can't detoxify it, but we've got some clues.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003817
text: Don't worry about that. The Hunter Master knows a lot about poison.{nl}Like me, she is also after Ebonypawn, so she will definitely welcome you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003818
text: Can I help you with anything?{nl}So you want to know how to detoxify this poison...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003819
text: He would dare come to Klaipeda...{nl}Ebonypawn. I won't let you slip away this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003820
text: What happened to the Pyromancer's task?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003821
text: So should I just report about the task to the Pyromancer Master?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003822
text: Thanks for helping me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003823
text: I should reward you since you helped me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003824
text: These are the research documents. Tell Cryomancer Master that you would hand over the research documents on behalf of Gytis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003825
text: It is so fortunate that this resolved well enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003826
text: These are the research documents that I asked from Gytis. I will use them well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003827
text: Please take it to him quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003828
text: I am feeling little better now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003829
text: Soldier Dennis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003830
text: The deadline for the farm's construction is approaching,{nl} but the monsters have suddenly become vicious, so the workers can't even touch the site.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003831
text: The other soldiers went to defeat Gorgon, and I can't leave this place.{nl}I can only trust you now for this. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003832
text: Really? Thanks..{nl}The location is the Joint Farmland. I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003833
text: Do you think this makes any sense at all?{nl}Those monsters used to be scared of humans. Now they attack humans. With poison!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003834
text: Sir Uska would have scolded me if it weren't for you... Thank you so much.{nl}Anyways, I wonder why the soldiers haven't returned yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003835
text: Ah, this is troubling.{nl}I heard the monsters here are supposed to be innocuous, but they suddenly turned violent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003836
text: What the hell is the world coming to?{nl}...Now Alan, my colleague, is left protecting the entrance gate to the farm all by himself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003837
text: Can you really do that?{nl}Alright, please take care of Alan before the other soldiers return.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003838
text: Soldier Alan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003839
text: Don't come! Monsters are coming!{nl}Damn it, how will I be able to stand against this alone..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003840
text: It's so fortunate that you are here.{nl}How come I can't hear anything from the soldiers who went to defeat Gorgon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003841
text: Was Alan okay?{nl}It's so fortunate that you're here, otherwise the whole district would've been swept away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003842
text: So you are the Revelator that I've heard rumors of. Thank you so much.{nl}I don't know why those monsters turned out like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003843
text: Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003844
text: I received the farm land from Gytis, but it's such a mess.{nl}Especially Ridimed. But, what can I do with my hands that only touched hoes before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003845
text: Just as I ran into trouble, I'm so lucky to have met the goddesses' helper.{nl}I am counting on you. It's already too late to manage the crops though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003846
text: You really drove the annoying Ridimeds away?{nl}That's such good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003847
text: It's so good to hear that you drove the Ridimeds away.{nl}Now let's see what we can do next.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003848
text: I think it would be helpful if I at least had a fence.{nl}Can you help me a little more?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003849
text: There's a lot of wood from the trees that have been cut down at the cultivation area.{nl}If you could bring me some, we could make a fence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003850
text: Among the farms that were damaged on Medzio Diena, there are many that can't be recovered at the moment.{nl}They are either corrupted by evil energies or have too many monsters in them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003851
text: So Uska planned to make farmland by cultivating this forest.{nl}The restoration is important right now, but we can't do anything if we can't even obtain food supplies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003852
text: If the monsters were harmless, I would have done it myself.{nl}Heck, we wouldn't have to make the fence in the first place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003853
text: Fortunately the wood isn't corrupted.{nl}Please wait a bit. I will make the fence quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003854
text: That scarecrow should scare the monsters, but it's too small.{nl}We should make the scarecrow look bigger. Using the monsters' fluffy hair might do the trick.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003855
text: The scarecrow should be bigger than humans.{nl}I will make the scarecrow bigger using the hair of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003856
text: Good. Now we are ready to set the fence.{nl}There are still a lot of monsters, so I hope you can help me to do this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003857
text: I was worried about the monsters, but now I am also worried about not having enough crops.{nl}Strangely, they don't grow anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003858
text: I really appreciate you making the fence.{nl}It will help the citizens of Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003859
text: Researcher Gareth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003860
text: The crops are growing too slowly.{nl}If we don't solve this, we may miss the harvest season.. Could you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003861
text: As Uska ordered, Gytis is leading the construction.{nl}Instead of attempting to restore the farms that were corrupted on Medzio Diena, they want to cultivate the forest.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003862
text: Originally, the farmland belonged to the city, so the owner of the farm never came.{nl}But due to the food problem, they made the farm entirely in the name of the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003863
text: First, could you get me samples of the Sakmolis?{nl}That monster is a plant-type, so it must have been influenced just like the crops were.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003864
text: This is our last chance.{nl}If we don't find out why the crops grow so slowly, we may have to give up on this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003865
text: So you've got them.{nl}Please wait a bit. I'll get the results soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003866
text: So the monster suppressor was the problem.{nl}We were trying to prevent the number of monsters from increasing, but we almost ruined the crops as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003867
text: First, please retrieve the Monster Suppressor.{nl}If we had a weaker device we would switch to it, but we can't do anything about that right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003868
text: These were made for plant-type monsters so they would definitely influence the crops too.{nl}It was my fault for overlooking that possibility.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003869
text: If it weren't for you, the harvest could've been spoiled and all that effort would've been wasted.{nl}Everything should grow well now, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003870
text: They're late. My colleagues went to the Ishigiti Herb Farm to defeat the Gorgon.{nl}I don't wanna think that they were annihilated.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003871
text: Soldier Peirce

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003872
text: Run! Gorgon is coming!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003873
text: I hope I'm wrong.{nl}The monsters are going crazy...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003874
text: You defeated the Gorgon yourself?{nl}It is fortunate that my colleagues are safe, but I don't know what they did as soldiers..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003875
text: I will report to Sir Uska that you saved this farm.{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003876
text: Help me! The Gorgon is chasing after us!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003877
text: The person who is leading the mission at Dvasia Peak is Julian.{nl}Julian will really welcome me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003878
text: Thanks for your words.{nl}But it would be better to support Julian's squad at Dvasia Peak instead of this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003879
text: I heard that the hardness and the elasticity of the wood sticks of Firent at Nepritas Cliffs is good.{nl}You can get the rope that was made from tieing those sticks from Red Pantos with spears. Please get me those first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003880
text: At first, they were gathered to Uskis Arable Land and Spring Light Wood.{nl}But, not after a long time, they came to this place.{nl}They must be going after the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003881
text: You're the most trustworthy Revelator I've ever met.{nl}If it's okay with you, could you look for a person named Maras at Vilna Forest up north?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003882
text: If you find something like this again, please hand it over to Lamar near the Wood Watch Tower.{nl}I.. really don't know anything about those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003883
text: You've gathered a lot.{nl}I think this will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003884
text: Since the seal towers here were damaged more seriously than the one at Uskis Arable Land,{nl}the evil energy here flows stronger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003885
text: There is one thing I am worried about..{nl}That symbol was once damaged so it may not restore the seal perfectly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003886
text: I believe that the goddesses will protect us.{nl}But, we must also do our best to repair the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003887
text: I heard about the thorny forest before.{nl}That place was once a normal forest, right? What do we do if our village turns out like that?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003888
text: I can't just endure the monsters' violence anymore.{nl}We have to protect the village from now on instead of only relying on the priests.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003889
text: This isn't all happening because Goddess Austeja is absent, right?{nl}If it's true though, what should I do now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003890
text: I will give you this scroll of purification, use this on the demons and then defeat them.{nl}The demons' fluids will become a solvent purified with the holy energy of the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003891
text: You were able to avoid the curse, but you could not get away from the monsters.{nl}Maybe it was wrong to come here to do the pilgrimage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003892
text: You will pay for your intent of obtaining the revelation.{nl}Of course, you should obtain the fourth key of Maven as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003893
text: Finally, the last key.{nl}I've been waiting for this moment for hundreds of years..{nl}A sentiment that is neither joy nor emptiness fills my heart.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003894
text: The last secret is in the Small Reception Room.{nl}You should remember the order of the candles and their number.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003895
text: Maven's Message

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003896
text: I am glad that my life's masterpiece has protected the revelation well.{nl}But, yours and my mission is not over yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003897
text: Savior. Please open the door to Pasala Altar.{nl}If you really wish to obtain the revelation of the goddess, you will receive it at the end...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003898
text: My guidance ends here.{nl}It has been very fortunate that I was able to guide you well...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003899
text: I am going back to the goddesses.{nl}Please... save the kingdom and the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003900
text: Let's extract the curse's energy from the Penitence Route and make it appear.{nl}While I am concentrating, please activate all the Altars of Purification.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003901
text: The curse of Naktis makes people suffer just by looking at it.{nl}It makes people miserable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003902
text: We have no other choice, but to find the solutions for each curse.{nl}It's like there are different treatments to different diseases.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003903
text: I want to go back to my hometown.{nl}Demons, the curse... I am tired of everything now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003904
text: When the next priest comes, I am planning to return to my hometown with them.{nl}It will be really good if I could return home while I am alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003905
text: Naktis' curse isn't the only one in this world.{nl}The famous city of Roxona is still effectively under the curse of petrification even though hundreds of years has passed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003906
text: The documents that are normal must still be present in the deeper side of the Great Cathedral...{nl}I am so sad that I wasn't able to see those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003907
text: I would say that was the wisdom of Maven.{nl}Maven thought that the Great Cathedral would not be normal all the time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003908
text: So if we could just recharge the magical power, any kinds of magics will be okay.{nl}Even if that's a magical power from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003909
text: Go to Karuna Altar when you've recharged the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power.{nl}The third key is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003910
text: If you think you are ready, I will show you the true nature of the curse.{nl}If you can't eliminate it at once, it will make a bigger trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003911
text: Now all that's left is the Verification Test.{nl}The scripture that possesses my spirit, please open it in front of the altar of the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003912
text: The Scriptural Relics contained the words of the great bishops...{nl}I am so infuriated that they are placed now in the wake of filthy demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003913
text: Fortunately, most of the holy relics seem okay.{nl}If I had a little more power, I would have purified the demons in the name of the goddesses right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003914
text: To prepare for times like this, I've brought an orb that can detect holy energy.{nl}Keep an eye on the demons though. You may be in for some trouble,{nl}since they will run towards the relics as soon as they see them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003915
text: We were sent from the congregation to investigate Naktis' curse.{nl}We should first find the documents that were scattered here, but those demons are a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003916
text: The lost documents all contain important content.{nl}I want to bring all of them, but we should first remove the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003917
text: This is a big help.{nl}When I treat the people who are cursed, I will tell them your name.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003918
text: I made a stupid mistake.{nl}I lost my concentration for a moment and lost the report that I should've sent to Aden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003919
text: I have been looking around, but I think the demons may have played a part in this.{nl}If it's alright with you, could you help me look for the report?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003920
text: Ah! This is it.{nl}If you get a chance to go to the Main Chamber, please hand it over to Aden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003921
text: We will need a lot of solvent in order to make the reagent that removes Naktis' curse.{nl}But, as you can see, we can't get the solvent at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003922
text: But, there is still a way.{nl}If you could help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003923
text: I was confident in making reagents so I thought I would be successful.{nl}I think I overestimated myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003924
text: Thanks.{nl}The purity is a little lacking... but, if we refine it one more time, it will be useful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003925
text: You are late. Maven's secret here is already being attacked.{nl}If we lose the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power, we will never be able to get the third key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003926
text: I regret that I could not do anything.{nl}We should get the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003927
text: It is very fortunate that the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power is alright. {nl}However, I can't seem to sense its magical power anymore, likely due to the long passage of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003928
text: Defeat the demons nearby using the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power.{nl}This will collect the magical power that is needed to obtain the third key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003929
text: To remove Naktis' curse, I am making a reagent which resists against evil energy. {nl}But, it's hard to guarantee its effects right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003930
text: If you are okay, can you check the effects of the medicine?{nl}Ah, I don't mean to try it yourself. I am telling you to try on the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003931
text: This reagent pulls out evil energy from the body.{nl}But, it could cause internal injuries.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003932
text: It's either ineffective or... actually it seems okay.{nl}It even explodes?{nl}Then we should work on it little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003933
text: The number of Maven's keys that remain now are two.{nl}The secret for one of those keys cannot be solved right now, with the condition of the Cathedral as it is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003934
text: We have only one method... using the demons.{nl}I will tell you about the plan later, there are some things to find first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003935
text: There are documents here that describe a method of disguising as a demon in this Sanctuary.{nl} Through this method, you should be able to get the next key without shedding a drop of blood.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003936
text: You found it. Now let me see.{nl}Where was the clause..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003937
text: Ah. The method is rather simple. But you may have to put in some effort.{nl}First, get some articles of clothing from Naktis' servants.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003938
text: Using the demons... The goddesses may turn their heads away,{nl}but if this is the best method, I will do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003939
text: That will be enough.{nl}Now use the apparel to complete the scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003940
text: In this recipe, it says that you can complete the Demon Transformation Scroll at the Altar of Intelligence.{nl}Fortunately, the Altar of Intelligence is at Laukimas Antenave.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003941
text: That's the passion of the priests who tried to protect the kingdom from the forces of evil. {nl}It continued on for hundreds of years until today.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003942
text: So the demons went to Apgaule Altar without any complaints?{nl}Now then, it is time we follow them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003943
text: I am making the medicine quickly to heal one of the pilgrims who is cursed.{nl}I am almost finished, but it's so hard to get the thistle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003944
text: By itself, the medicine tries to push out the evil energy, so he won't consume it easily.{nl}I am thinking about putting the medicine in meat. Could you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003945
text: I hope this method is effective.{nl}It will save a lot of people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003946
text: The smell is strong enough so you should be able to deceive him.{nl}Please wait a minute. I will put the medicine into the meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003947
text: Any meat will be okay. Even the meat from the monsters nearby.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003948
text: It's completed.{nl}The medicine should work well.. Can you pass this meat to the pilgrim down there?{nl}{nl}You should continue to feed him until he is satisfied.{nl}I mean all the meats you've obtained. 20 lumps in total right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003949
text: So the pilgrim ate the meat?{nl}Ah... still not well yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003950
text: So the medicine worked well?{nl}Really... that is so fortunate. Thanks for helping me.{nl}I will tell the other priests about this recipe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003951
text: I can sense another kind of curse. This curse is different from Naktis' curse.{nl}The true origin of it should be present somewhere, but it's hard for me to find it alone.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003952
text: We've found it!{nl}Now we will eliminate the true origin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003953
text: My friend looks strange. {nl}He is not breathing and his face looks pale. His heart also doesn't beat anymore.{nl}Did he already leave for the goddesses? Dallas, please open your eyes..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003954
text: Thank you so much. {nl}Dallas would also speak of you to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003955
text: I am going to go to bury Dallas.{nl}Can you be with me until the end?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003956
text: So you are safe.{nl}I am going to go back to my hometown with Dallas' belongings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003957
text: Are the peaceful days going to return like the old times?{nl}Revelator...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003958
text: Revelator. I want to bury Dallas under the Taika Cliff where he can see his hometown.{nl}But there are so many monsters there. Please get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003959
text: First, it would be better to find some documents at the Sanctuary.{nl}I remember there are documents there about methods of disguising as demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003960
text: Okay. Use the scroll to lure the demons to the Apgaule Altar.{nl}If you want to know what will happen... Well, you'll have to wait and see.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003961
text: There is a dangerous demon luring priests and leading them to their deaths.{nl}It disguises itself to look like a secret of Maven.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003962
text: The location is Maskuote Narthex.{nl}Please relieve our priests of this threat so they can concentrate on their mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003963
text: I will submit a report as soon as I return to the congregation.{nl}This should soothe the priests who were in despair. Thanks.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003964
text: And so all five keys are now collected.{nl}Go to Pasala Altar. The secret there will lead you to the hidden room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003965
text: Are you the Revelator of the goddesses or the one who belongs to the mighty power of the darkness?{nl}The evil darkness can not cross here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003966
text: You've proven that you are the Revelator of the goddesses.{nl}You may enter the room where the revelation is located.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003967
text: It's so brutal. {nl}Our Great Cathedral, to those demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003968
text: Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003969
text: Hello. This is the garden of Ginaga.{nl}This place is the hometown and the land of Druid Master, Gina Greene.{nl}The master welcomes all people who visit this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003970
text: You must have traveled various places in the kingdom.{nl}I am sorry, but do you know anything about the mysterious girl?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003971
text: The girl left these trees before Medzio Diena.{nl}My master asked me to find about the trees, but I knew nothing about them...{nl}I want to get help from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003972
text: We should find out if they just imply some kind of a symbol or they are endowed with some kind of power.{nl}Please first collect the leaves of Ellum at the neglected grape fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003973
text: This girl had a mysterious energy.{nl}A long time ago, she traveled across the kingdom and left many forecasts and miracles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003974
text: Recently, we saw a similar looking girl at the Crystal Mine. {nl}But, strangely, she wasn't able to say anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003975
text: Ellums are the monsters that were created in mass after Medzio Diena.{nl}If the trees here are endowed with some kind of power, the leaves of Ellum should react to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003976
text: This will be enough. {nl}Let me concentrate for a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003977
text: Revelator, this is amazing!{nl}When we endowed the power of the trees to the leaves of the monsters that you brought, they waned right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003978
text: If that's the case... Please get me two lumps of sample soil corrupted with evil energy.{nl}I want to know more about the power of this tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003979
text: Before, evil energy was purified by the power of humans.{nl}But, if the power of this tree is true... they will be purified by planting it at several places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003980
text: So you brought them.{nl}I just finished the preparation for the purification ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003981
text: I will see the responses of this sample like the leaves.{nl}I hope it goes well.. Please see it yourself Revelator!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003982
text: Oh goddess, please look at this. The ritual was successful.{nl}The master would purify everything at once with trees like this one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003983
text: Until the master comes back, I am going to do some base work for the large scale purification.{nl}Can you collect the five bottles of Tanus fluids from the Kvie Farm Area?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003984
text: Thanks for helping me.{nl}The girl who left this tree.. who was she I wonder?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003985
text: This tree is so mysterious.{nl}It's like the Revelator brought the clues of purification.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003986
text: You've done enough.{nl}I should tell the Druid Master that you've been a great help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003987
text: Ah, I have one last thing to request of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003988
text: This is a box that we discovered that contains more of these trees.{nl}If you get a chance to go to Shaton Farm, please give it to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003989
text: He likes to interfere with others' lives so he may be involved in some kind of matter.{nl}Maybe you should ask the people there about his whereabouts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003990
text: Farm Supervisor Dorn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003991
text: This is the private land of Shaton. {nl}Even a Revelator should not interfere here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003992
text: Farmer Max

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003993
text: Wheat farming is possible here unlike Shaton Farm.{nl}We were able to harvest the last farming... but...{nl}I am worried about the next farming.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003994
text: Farmer Darcy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003995
text: Blast it. We might have to leave this place.{nl}We were able to harvest and live due to the care of Gina Greene, but it's too hard now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003996
text: Monsters are the bigger problem we have at the moment besides failing harvesting due to vicious energy.{nl}If you could move out the monsters, then we may be able to endure little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003997
text: We may be able to stand until the harvest season.{nl}But, the land is getting more and more corrupted, so one day it may turn just like the thorn forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003998
text: To receive unexpected help from you..{nl}You and the druids are all trying hard, so I can't just give up like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_003999
text: We were lucky though. Do you know the Druid Master?{nl}Gina Greene, the owner of this farm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004000
text: She lent me the land without asking for any consideration after I lost my hometown due to Medzio Diena.{nl}But, what should I do now. Harvesting is becoming ineffective, and the number of monsters is increasing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004001
text: I was so thankful until now, but I can't let the families starve..{nl}If the vicious energy of the garden does not get removed, we have no choice, but to leave.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004002
text: Did you feel something strange while you were coming here?{nl}I mean the dandelions. They are big compared to the ones in other places.. and they are quite threatening.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004003
text: We should pull them out while they are sprouts, otherwise they could cover the whole farm.{nl}But due to the monsters, we can't continue our work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004004
text: It may be a lethargic excuse.{nl}We lost our hometown and we can't even farm on the land that we hardly deserve.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004005
text: I should help you somehow since you helped me a lot.{nl}I will pay attention from now on. I won't lose to those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004006
text: Matilda, the young lady of the farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004007
text: This is my hometown that I returned after a long time and it has changed a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004008
text: Farmer Miren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004009
text: I want the druids to drive the monsters out, but they're all focused on that tree.{nl}It's infuriating me. Who is that girl anyway? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004010
text: Hey. You, Revelator. Please help me instead of just looking at me.{nl}I want you to drive out the monsters that are on my fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004011
text: The girl the druids are talking about.{nl}I don't know about the tree, but I think it will bring disaster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004012
text: I can't farm due to the evil energy and also those monsters..{nl}I've been farming here for a long time, but ever since that girl came here and left, we've had only trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004013
text: I know that I've lived here for my whole life, but young people should not lie.{nl}Are you telling me the tree or the girl could be of help? That's nonsense.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004014
text: Thanks, really.{nl}You are way better than those useless druids there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004015
text: I would have driven out all druids if it weren't Gina Greene.{nl}When I was running away from the monsters last time, they saved me, but they don't look after me after that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004016
text: Okay, good. Please find my bag.{nl}I was so busy then, I forgot everything about that bag.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004017
text: There are many farmers here so there may be bags of other people here as well.{nl}There are name tags in the bags so please do not mix them up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004018
text: Where did I lose it?{nl}I fell down once somewhere..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004019
text: Thank you so much for finding my bag. {nl}Now that I look at it, I can't blame the druids. They all have hard times right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004020
text: Alchemist George

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004021
text: I came here to get the useful ingredients of alchemy, but I can't move my body..{nl}I have an important experiment soon, but there's no one who could help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004022
text: Investigator Monahan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004023
text: I came here from Klaipeda.{nl}To investigate the damage on the farms of this kingdom since Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004024
text: You must know that there isn't enough food in the kingdom.{nl}If you are okay, can you help me with my investigation?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004025
text: That's so thankful.{nl}First, please get me the eggs of the monsters first. I have something to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004026
text: There are places that need me so I feel very thankful. {nl}But, my stamina is not like before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004027
text: Well done.{nl}With this, we should be able to know how much evil energy has accumulated so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004028
text: That's strange. I thought I should give up on this place, but some other energies are mixed together.{nl}To know this, we need something that received the energy of the ground strongly. Could you help me a bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004029
text: Please take a look at the roots of grapevine closely at the Avarza Grape Farm.{nl}The other monsters' eggs must be adjacent to them. I want you to bring me about three of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004030
text: Please be careful since you may get hurt when you touch the egg houses.{nl}It is a good habit to be always be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004031
text: Good. The sacred energy is slowly spreading in the ground.{nl}Since you helped me, we don't have to give up on this garden.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004032
text: But, that energy is too weak and it is from the kind that I barely knows.{nl}Maybe the druids should know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004033
text: Shaton Family's Private Officer Hartman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004034
text: I will help you so please move out before I scold you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004035
text: You can't enter here unless you have the permission.{nl}But, it may be possible.. You know what I am saying right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004036
text: If that's so, come back after defeating those Drakes.{nl}Ah, and don't forget to bring me the evidence. I've got something to report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004037
text: This place is the private farm of the Shaton family.{nl}No one can enter except for tenant farmers and the people who are permitted to enter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004038
text: If you are gonna keep spouting nonsense such as pollution, you better move out of here fast.{nl}Or... there is another way to get the permission from me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004039
text: If you receive something, then you shuld also give up something.{nl}You thought you would be able to enter without any charges here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004040
text: Very well. From now on, you will be able to enter the farm whenever you want.{nl}But, you should do something about my underlings though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004041
text: Are you looking for Druid? I know where he is. {nl}The soldiers levied the tax, but it's not enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004042
text: I am sure that he hid it away, but I don't know where it is.{nl}The brown pocket with the grains in it. If you understood it, come fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004043
text: It's going to take more time to look for the druid if you take more and more time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004044
text: Great work. Well done.{nl}The druid that you are looking for actually came here before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004045
text: He talked about the labor conditions of the farmers, so I sent him away with some petty excuse.{nl}He just walked off after I told him that the farmers at the workplace and the brewery weren't returning{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004046
text: What, that's wasn't a lie so that shouldn't be a problem.{nl}Go to Neshiva Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004047
text: I was acting kindly to the druid because of the neighbouring farm located not far from here.{nl}Remember, if you annoy me, I will expel you from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004048
text: Druid Martinek

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004049
text: You have something for me?{nl}Hold on. You came at the right time. I have to first save these people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004050
text: Druid Joel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004051
text: We need lots of help here.{nl}Could you help them with me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004052
text: I will pay attention to your story later.{nl}First, here's an antidote, please use it to cure the poisoned farmers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004053
text: This is just emergency care, so I'll stay here to make more medicine.{nl}The locations that are indicated on the report are Zirta Brewery and Gausa Workplace. Please, hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004054
text: Shaton Farm looks peaceful at first sight.{nl}But, this land is polluted with evil energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004055
text: I know that purification is important,{nl}but if we don't save those poisoned farmers right away, they may lose their lives.{nl}As a druid, how can I leave those people behind?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004056
text: Please hurry. {nl}I assume they won't die very soon, but they must be suffering a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004057
text: It's fortunate that you came when you did, or else we would've been in big trouble.{nl}By the way, did you need anything from me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004058
text: I see, so Ellie finally found the true nature of the trees.{nl}And the seeds of those trees are in this box.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004059
text: But these seeds are too old, we need to endow them with the power of nature.{nl}Could I borrow your help, please?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004060
text: I will borrow some power from the frogs with wings.{nl}Could you exhaust them and bring them back using this stick?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004061
text: These are the seeds that were discovered with the tree that the mysterious girl had left.{nl}We also found out that these seeds are that of those trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004062
text: But, since no one knew about what these trees really were, we never thought about planting them.{nl}However, I will use these seeds to engage in the large scale purification.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004063
text: It is not a hard task for a druid to revive old seeds.{nl}Of course, it will be important to look for a place to plant them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004064
text: Make sure that the monster is alive.{nl}We can only use its power if it's alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004065
text: Well done. {nl}If we now give them a moist environment, they will become healthy seeds.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004066
text: However, the areas nearby are too polluted with evil energy. We will need a specific type of water.{nl}The water at the well of Gausa Workplace may work..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004067
text: It's dangerous to go alone, so take this with you.{nl}This is a plate that is used in the ritual ceremony of the druids.{nl}It will purify the evil energy by a little bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004068
text: The stream near here is too polluted.{nl}The water at the well of Gausa Workplace should be okay since they are located far below underground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004069
text: It's so fortunate to see you are okay. {nl}Let's start the ritual soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004070
text: Alright, let's start. {nl}This is a simple ritual, so it should be quick.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004071
text: You came.{nl}I guess I didn't plan for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004072
text: Farm Soldier Gedson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004073
text: Even if you are the Revelator, this is a private land. {nl}Go out if you don't have any business here!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004074
text: If that's so, come back after defeating Cysts up there.{nl}After seeing how you behaved, I will think about whether I would just let it go or not.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004075
text: I can't do this anymore.{nl}This place is corrupted with evil energy and they are not even paying me a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004076
text: Good. I appreciate that.{nl}But, it doesn't mean I will let you go just yet. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004077
text: The one who makes me most annoyed is Drake.{nl}He is violent and looks disgusting. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004078
text: Come back after defeating the drake at Ishicla farming road. {nl}I won't say anything if you could do that for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004079
text: Those monsters are doing well even if the evil energy and the poison is all over the place.{nl}This world is such an unfair place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004080
text: As I promised, I won't say anything for your intrusion into the farm before.{nl}But, this is just my jurisdiction. Behave yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004081
text: The woman at the far, Charlotte

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004082
text: I don't wanna see Shaton family and those soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004083
text: Tenant Farmer Charlotte

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004084
text: Please help us.{nl}We have to grow things like this, they will all die within a short period of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004085
text: A lot of grapes were spoiled due to the evil energy.{nl}If this continues, people could die.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004086
text: Please spray the herbicide on the grape vines without those soldiers knowing about it.{nl}If they find out that the grapes are not growing, Shaton might change his mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004087
text: When was it.. I believe it was way back before Medzio Diena.{nl}There was a girl in worn out clothes who told us, with an{nl}awkward accent and gestures, that the disaster would come.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004088
text: Medzio Diena came not long after that.{nl}Just like that girl said, I personally think the spoiled grapes are a part of the disaster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004089
text: I cannot fathom why he wants to harvest even those..{nl}I am sure that Shaton, the owner of this farm, has gone crazy.{nl}It surprises me to see how a person could change that much after losing his son.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004090
text: What? A forest is covered with thorns and vines?{nl}I like grapes, but these grapes are spoiled with evil energy.. That's horrible, don't you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004091
text: Thank you very much. I understand the son of Shaton is missing, but still..{nl}I have no doubt that he went crazy because of that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004092
text: Damn!{nl}Chupakabras came after smelling the polluted grape vines dried to their deathes.{nl}What should we do?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004093
text: If you go near the bushes, the hidden monsters may suddenly appear.{nl}I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004094
text: I am relieved.{nl}Thank you. Now, it will be better if Shaton regains his consciousness.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004095
text: Farmer Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004096
text: Shaton farm was not the place to live long ago.{nl}But, at least, it wasn't like this before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004097
text: Tennant farmer, Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004098
text: I am having a hard time because of the supervisor and the soldiers.{nl}They want me to go to the Zirta Brewery.. I think they are trying to kill me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004099
text: Hey. I am sorry, but I don't have any power.{nl}If you are okay, could you go to Zirta Brewery and defeat Tontus nearby?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004100
text: The soldiers want bribes and the supervisor doesn't care even if anything happens to us.{nl}And Shaton takes the taxes in the amount that would barely keep us alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004101
text: If we don't listen to them, I am sure they will just ask for more bribes.{nl}In the end we either starve to death, or risk our lives.{nl}The old days when his son was the owner were much better.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004102
text: Even if the monsters get defeated, the peaceful time wouldn't contine for a long time. The monsters would come again soon. {nl}But, do you think I can think about tomorrow when I am having hard times now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004103
text: I'm really grateful that you did this for me.{nl}I'm also thankful to the druid here. You and him are good people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004104
text: I want to ask you one more favor.{nl}There are some seeds that aren't corrupted yet. It's because I secretly stashed them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004105
text: I hid them well by avoiding the eyes of the soldiers, but the monsters blew them away.{nl}Could you get me those back? They are in the square of the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004106
text: I can't do this anymore.{nl}Once I get those seeds back, I will leave this farm and start my own farm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004107
text: Thank you very much for retrieving it.{nl}I understand that Shaton has lost his son, but still..{nl}I've heard that they are recruiting tenant farmers near Klaipeda's suburbs.{nl}Maybe I should go there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004108
text: I hope Shaton thinks about the people who are starving a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004109
text: I heard about Mr. Shaton being stubborn, but I did not know he was this stubborn.{nl}If we don't somehow persuade him, the evil energy can possibly spread across the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004110
text: You may have listened to me.{nl}But, if only you could somehow convince him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004111
text: Gord Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004112
text: Are you working with that druid?{nl}Are you here to tell me to plant those useless trees at my son's farm?{nl}How preposterous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004113
text: If we fail to persuade Shaton..{nl}Then our next move is to meet with his daughter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004114
text: I will hear no more about this 'purification'.{nl} Leave my lands at once!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004115
text: Mary Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004116
text: Welcome to Shaton's farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004117
text: Vanessa Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004118
text: I am sorry. I apologize for my father's behavior.{nl}Please understand why he's like this. He's been suffering for my brother, who went missing a long time ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004119
text: Look, I believe what the druid said was right.{nl}I will help you, so that my father can give up on the vineyard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004120
text: My brother left to investigate the underground tunnels but never came back.{nl}If you can find traces of my brother in the underground tunnels..{nl}I guess my father could realize the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004121
text: You haven't found any traces of my brother yet?{nl}There are quite a few underground tunnels near the farm, so please look in every single one of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004122
text: My brother.. in the underground tunnels..{nl}Please show this necklace to my father, to prove to him that my brother will never return..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004123
text: This grape farm belongs to my brother.{nl}My father is managing this farm on behalf of my brother.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004124
text: A long time ago, my brother went missing while he was investigating the underground tunnels.{nl}All my other family members have buried him in their hearts, but my father.. couldn't do that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004125
text: I think it was from that point on,{nl}that my father continuously said my brother would eventually return,{nl}and since then he became obsessed with managing the vineyard.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004126
text: James Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004127
text: If you are not gonna help me, get outta my land!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004128
text: What is this. My son's necklace?{nl}Are you telling me that my son is dead just by showing that necklace?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004129
text: You just want me to give up on my son's vineyard, don't you?{nl}Did you really think that I wasn't aware of your dirty little plan? Get out of here! I know nothing about purification.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004130
text: Actually, I do know something now! That my son would never return again.{nl}Quick. Anyone! Just defeat those who killed my son!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004131
text: I do not want to talk about it anymore.{nl}Get out of my sight.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004132
text: Did you think you can persuade me just because you've done that?{nl}You don't know what it is like to lose a son.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004133
text: That's right. It's not enough. {nl}Actually, I have something nice..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004134
text: Hmm... If you have something to do in my farm, I won't block you.{nl}But, you should not disturb my subordinates or my farmers! Do you understand?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004135
text: I paid a lot for this from the black market in Fedimian. {nl}It will be much more helpful than the Revelator like you or those shameless druids.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004136
text: Soon, powerful monsters will be born that will only listen to my orders.{nl}Then, I will get rid of all the monsters in my son's farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004137
text: Our colleagues came to the garden of Greene family to support us.{nl}With their help, we were able to set the protective barriers on the trees.{nl}I came here in a hurry since I had an ominous feeling. It was indeed dangerous.{nl}If it weren't you, it would have been really dangerous. Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004138
text: What am I doing... {nl}I feel like my son is scolding me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004139
text: I felt like if I gave up on grape farming, it would be like losing my son completely.{nl}I knew something was wrong... I just didn't want to admit that my son was dead.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004140
text: I will leave this farm to my daughter from now on.{nl}My daughter can make wise decisions. I am sorry and I want to thank you for making me realize the truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004141
text: That is good to hear that his daughter is now managing the farm.{nl}Can you explain the large scale purification process to his daughter?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004142
text: Instead of me explaining, it will be better if you explain it.{nl}The reason why Shaton gave up his obsesseion is because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004143
text: Yes. My father has told me about it.{nl}I am planning to plant the trees with the help of the druid in this farm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004144
text: I will give up on harvesting the grapes. And I will improve the labor conditions of the tenant farmers. {nl}I believe that my brother, who is with the goddesses right now, would have done the same.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004145
text: More than anything else, thank you so much for enlightening my father... Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004146
text: I am really honored to have been together with you up to now.{nl}I wish for the best of luck in the large scale purification process.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004147
text: Maybe... that particular girl didn't only forecast about the disaster.{nl}Well then, may the grace of Goddess Zemyna be in your footsteps.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004148
text: Steward Valen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004149
text: You must think this farm is strange, right?{nl}You probably don't understand why they are growing the spoiled grapes, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004150
text: This is the farm where Shaton is awaiting his lost son.{nl}It is why I cannot turn my back against my master. Wouldn't you agree?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004151
text: If that's so, then I have a request for you.{nl}I will pay you handsomely. Please get rid of the Carcashus who are ruining this farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004152
text: It's such a pity.{nl}His son is dead, but he just won't admit it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004153
text: Well done.{nl}Even if we plant some other crops in the future, it will be better if there are no monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004154
text: As you can imagine, there are many people with stomach aches due to the spoiled grapes.{nl}That's why I sent people to Klaipeda to buy medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004155
text: However, they were attacked by monsters and barely managed to survive.{nl}How could I find the bags with the medicine with this old body of mine?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004156
text: Since I am going to share them with all the people in the farm, we need a lot.{nl}I hope my master will also eat it, but I don't know if he's going to.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004157
text: Regrettably, the soldiers here only listen to the orders of the master.{nl}Thanks, I will use the medicine well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004158
text: The commander of Shaton Family, Buros

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004159
text: Shaton is not kind at all normally...{nl}But, he is especially sensitive today.{nl}You should be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004160
text: General Buros

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004161
text: I am working here by order, but this place feels bad.{nl}A long time ago, the son of my master disappeared in the underground tunnels. That alone is somewhat frightening.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004162
text: Hey. I will share you some of my works. Are you interested?{nl}You just have to defeat Raujinutes across the tunnel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004163
text: Obsessed, perhaps too obsessed.{nl}I feel sorry for Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004164
text: Well done. This is my reward to you, as promised.{nl}I have tons of work here, so you can always come back if you want.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004165
text: It's you again. You just have to defeat Raujinutes across the tunnel.{nl}My subordinates don't wanna go that place since it is somewhat spooky.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004166
text: Please defeat Raujintes this time as well.{nl}We are almost seeing the end so keep up the good work at the tunnel just little bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004167
text: I think Shaton will be satisfied now.{nl}Well done. Oh and, don't tell any others about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004168
text: Oh my god. You must have gone crazy.{nl}I heard Scorpio appeared near the Wind Vane Tower because of you. You should be responsible for this!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004169
text: My useless subordinates already ran away.{nl}Quick, go to the Wind Vane Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004170
text: You are the one who went crazy so you should be responsible for this.{nl}But since I also have the pride, I will pay you for that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004171
text: Hunter Oliver

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004172
text: I am doing an important task at the moment.{nl}If you are not gonna help me, don't disturb me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004173
text: Someone requested me to hunt for those Beeteros.{nl}They need those leaves.{nl}Don't go into too much details. I don't ask the requestor too many details.{nl}Anyways, it seems it's too much for a person.. how about it? can you help us?{nl}If you could collect the leaves, I will pay you enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004174
text: Good decision.{nl}It will be much better to collect together instead of collecting them alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004175
text: Are you going to receive the compensation with just those?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004176
text: Hmm. The quality isn't bad.{nl}The requestor would also be satisfied.{nl}It is fortunate that we don't have any competitors. Here this is for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004177
text: Straggling Soldier Upham

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004178
text: Help me! I was patrolling with my colleagues, a..and was attacked by the monsters..{nl}and then fell behind.{nl}I am begging you. Can you take me back to my general?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004179
text: That's a relief. {nl}I'll be careful not to fall behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004180
text: I don't understand why all my men are like this.{nl}Thank you very much. What a useless little..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004181
text: Do you think I am still the stone in your pocket?..{nl}Do you think I will be defeated by you guys!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004182
text: You guys are on the same side..{nl}I was ignorant.{nl}But you guys really think you can face me!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004197
text: You better leave without being involved in the matter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004198
text: Keep listening to him

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004199
text: Notice/!/Liliya passed away..{nl}Please make the grave for her#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004200
text: I will get you some meat from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004201
text: Give him the music box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004202
text: Ask him if there's anything you could help

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004203
text: Tell him to take some rest now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004206

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004207

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004208

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004209
text: Leave now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004231

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004232
text: Notice/!/The vicious energy came out from the box and permeeated into many monsters.{nl}Defeat the monsters near the box and put the energy back into the box.#7

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004233
text: Let's just look at it quietly without disturbing

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004234
text: Let's get out since you are busy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004699

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004701

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004702
text: Acquired some Asellu Leaf Buds. Take them to Pilgrim Julius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004703
text: Look through the lump of rotten meat at Ascetic Sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004704
text: Julius and Liliya met Naktis around this location. Could Liliya's necklace be around here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004705
text: Pilgrim Zenius is protecting food at the Starving Demon's Way. He seems to have a story to tell so go talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004706
text: A man stole a lump of food under Pilgrim Zenius' watch. Talk to Zenius about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004707
text: Pilgrim Zenius said that man is his son, and he wants the curse removed from his son. First, defeat the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004708
text: Pilgrim Zenius wants to help his son. Talk to Zenius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004709
text: Experiment the monsters using the Food Scraps

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004710
text: Pilgrim Zenius said that if you throw the Food Scraps to the monsters, some monsters might eat it. Defeat the monsters that eat the Food Scraps to collect Condensed Cursed Energy. You can get more food from the piled up food at Isblyskes Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004711
text: Acquired enough Condensed Cursed Energy from the monsters. Take them to Pilgrim Zenius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004712
text: Clean the piled up food

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004713
text: The piled up food that was collected by the ones who are cursed is getting rotten at the various places in the Starving Demon's Way. Look through the piled up food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004714
text: Look closely at the piled up food

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004715
text: The piled up food that was collected by the ones who are cursed is getting rotten at the various places in the Starving Demon's Way. Clean the piled up food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004716
text: Destroy the spoiled protective barrier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004717
text: As you were about to look closely at the Tree Root Crystals, the barriers that were protecting the crystals appeared! Destroy all the barriers before they disappear.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004718
text: Spoiled Tree Root Crystal at the Nomads Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004719
text: There is a Tree Root Crystal at the Nomads Camp that has Naktis' Curse of Sloth cast on it. Better go check it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004720
text: Destroy the Reformed Tree Root Crystal's Core

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004721
text: As you were trying to destroy the Tree Root Crystal at the Nomads Camp, it consumed your stamina and scattered its Core everywhere. Find the Core pieces and destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004722
text: You destroyed all the crystal's Cores. Now, try destroying the transformed Tree Root Crystal again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004723
text: Spoiled Tree Root Crystal at Pusapskritimis Shore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004724
text: There is a Spoiled Tree Root Crystal at the Pusapskritimis Shore. Better light up a fire and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004725
text: Burn the crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004726
text: You lighted up the Tree Root Crystals, but the flame looks weak. Obtain some kindlings from the monsters and throw them at the fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004727
text: Destroy the Tree Root Crystal at Pusapskritimis Shore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004728
text: The Spoiled Tree Root Crystal is burning well. Now destroy the Tree Root Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004729
text: Spoiled Tree Root Crystal at the right side of the Pilgrim's Tomb

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004730
text: There is a Spoiled Tree Root Crystal at the right side of the Pilgrim's Tomb. To remove the curse from this land, you should destroy this Tree Root Crystal as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004731
text: Tree Root Crystal of Sloth at Posukis Path

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004732
text: There is a cursed Tree Root Crystal at Posukis Path. Get closer to it and look carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004733
text: Look for the Core of the Tree Root Crystal from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004734
text: The Tree Root Crystals are reacting strangely and polluted the nearby environment! You better find the Cores of Tree Root Crystals from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004735
text: You've collected all the Cores of Tree Root Crystal. With those, seal the Spoiled Tree Root Crystal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004736
text: The Tree Root Crystal at Noras Fountain

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004737
text: There is a Tree Root Crystal in Noras Fountain. Get closer to it and inspect it to find out what you should do to solve the Curse of Sloth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004738
text: Find the real Crystal among the summoned Tree Root Crystals and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004739
text: As you were looking closely at the Tree Root Crystal, numerous Tree Root Crystals were suddenly summoned! Find the real one among the summoned Tree Root Crystals and destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004740
text: Investigate the Tree Root Crystals on the way to Altar Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004741
text: There is a gigantic Spoiled Tree Root Crystal at the space towards Altar Way. It looks different from the other Tree Root Crystals. Get closer to it and look closely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004742
text: You saw a treasure chest near Pilgrim's Tomb. Get closer to it and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004743
text: Return the evil energy into the Treasure Chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004744
text: Evil energy came out of the Treasure Chest and permeated into the monsters. Defeat the monsters near the Treasure Chest to return the evil energy back into the Treasure Chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004745
text: Pilgrim Gracius seems to be trying to release souls. Get closer to Pilgrim Gracius and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004746
text: Pilgrim Gracius asked you to pray in front of the altar. Pray first to relieve Pilgrim Gracius' doubts, and then talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004747
text: Pilgrim Gracius looks surprised after seeing your face. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004748
text: Let's go test whether the medicine which Gracius give to you will be effective. Get closer to the monsters near Rudiziu Trail and test the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004749
text: Let Pilgrim Gracius know the results

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004750
text: It seems that the result turned out to be a failure. Tell this to Pilgrim Gracius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004751
text: You told Pilgrim Gracius that the experimental reagent was ineffective. Ask him what you should do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004752
text: The last step that was needed for the experimental reagent was a scripture. You probably would be able to get it from the altar at the upper side of Rudiziu Trail.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004753
text: Hand over the Scripture to Pilgrim Gracius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004754
text: Listen to Pilgrim Gracius' story of this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004755
text: Release the souls from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004756
text: When you use the Reagent that Pilgrim Gracius gave to you, you will be able to see which monsters have souls trapped inside of them. Defeat those monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004757
text: Talk to Pilgrim Gracius to save the souls that are trapped in each altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004758
text: Save the souls at the altars

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004759
text: Save the souls that are restrained at the altars. There are total of 4 altars on your way to the Forest of Prayer and they are on Chliz Uphill, Branginti Hill, and near the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004760
text: You have successfully saved all the restrained souls. Now go back to Pilgrim Gracius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004761
text: There is an altar at Chliz Uphill. Pray for the souls that are restrained at the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004762
text: Collect flowers for the wrathful souls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004763
text: When you go up on the Chliz Uphill, the spirit in madness is restrained at the altar. Investigate the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004764
text: There are many altars at Altar Way. Investigate the altar on the Branginti Hill to find out what kind of story is behind it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004765
text: Obtain %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004766
text: Obtain Scripture Pages from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004767
text: The altar near the Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004768
text: It seems that there may be some restrained souls at the altar on the way to the Forest of Prayer. Get closer to it and check it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004769
text: Fire Lord is hidden in this altar rather than the souls being restrained here. Defeat Fire Lord before you get into a danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004770
text: There are many altars at Altar Way. The altar at the upper side of Rudiziu Trail is broken in half so you don't know if it's working. Get closer to it and look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004771
text: The anger from the altar at Osimas Highway can be cooled down by Cold Fluid that you can get from monsters. Defeat the monsters near the altar and get the Cold Fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004772
text: Receive the Sanctum's Blessing by reading the notice nearby the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004773
text: You can receive the blessing from this sanctum by making contributions, but the amount of contribution differs for each person. Make a contribution and receive the blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004774
text: Lure monsters to the sanctum and defeat them

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004775
text: You need sacrifices in order to receive the blessing here. Lure the monsters near the sanctum and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004776
text: You've contributed enough monsters as sacrifices. Pray to receive the blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004777
text: Monsters rushed in as you prayed in front of the Sanctum. You better defeat the monsters first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004778
text: We should look for a way to purify the sanctum. Meet with the Priest Master, who is the manager of the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004779
text: We should first purify the corrupted sanctum on Sukurys Hill. Talk to the Priest Master what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004780
text: Purify the sanctum using Holy Water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004781
