text: The Priest Master asked you to purify the sanctum on Sukurys Hill using the Holy Water. Return to the Forest of Prayer and purify the corrupted sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004782
text: Pray in front of the Goddess Statue near the grave of the saint

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004783
text: There is the Goddess Statue near the grave of the saint. Pray in front of the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004784
text: This statue was a fake. Defeat Sparnashorn, who was disguised as a Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004785
text: There is a Goddess Statue at the lower side of Malone Trail. Let's find what is real among these statues.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004786
text: Get advice from Sculptor Tesla

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004787
text: This Goddess Statue seems to have some kind of problem. Meet with Sculptor Tesla and ask him what to do about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004788
text: Talk with Tesla about the Goddess Statue that does respond

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004789
text: Return to the Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004790
text: You've heard about how to repair the Goddess Statue from the Sculptor Tesla. Return to the Forest of Prayer to repair the Goddess Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004791
text: Inspect the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004792
text: First, inspect the Statue. You should know what kind of problem exists before you repair the Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004793
text: Obtain the materials to repair the Goddess Statue with

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004794
text: Get the materials for repairing the Goddess Statue as the Sculptor Tesla advised. You can get Grey Gypsum Fragments from monsters and Dewdrops from the reeds nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004795
text: Repair the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004796
text: You've collected all the materials for the repair work. Return to the Goddess Statue and repair it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004797
text: Check if the Goddess Statue is well repaired

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004798
text: You've completed repairing the Statue. Check it again to see if the Statue has recovered well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004799
text: Destroy the demon summoning circles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004800
text: The statue that you spent time repairing was fake. Destroy the demon summoning circles quickly, since you don't know what will happen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004801
text: The sanctum was already corrupted. Defeat the monsters that are coming to the corrupted sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004802
text: The manager of this sanctum is the Cleric Master. Ask her what she should do to purify the corruption of the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004803
text: Listen to the advice of the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004804
text: Get some advice from the Cleric Master regarding the corrupted sanctum at the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004805
text: You have obtained advice on how to purify the corrupted sanctum from the Cleric Master. Return to the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004806
text: Look for the Symbol of Faith at the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004807
text: To prepare times like this, the Cleric Master hid her Symbol of Faith at the sanctum. Look for the Symbol of Faith at the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004808
text: Burn the badges of the sanctum after finding it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004809
text: As the Cleric Master taught you, use the Symbol of Faith to find the badges of the sanctum which the monsters swallowed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004810
text: Burn the badges of the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004811
text: You have found the badges of the sanctum. Burn the badges to purify the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004812
text: Obtain some Pure Water from Ryskus Stream

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004813
text: You will need Pure Water in order to receive the blessing from the sanctum. Get some Pure Water from the stepping stones in Ryskus Stream.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004814
text: I've brought Pure Water. Go to the sanctum and pray.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004815
text: Pray in front of the Vakarine Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004816
text: There is a Vakarine Statue near the Hermit's House. {nl}Try praying in front of the Statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004817
text: Protect the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004818
text: As you prayed, the Statue was attacked. Remove the thorny bushes that are binding the statue and protect it from the monsters that are coming from various places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004819
text: Devote Flowers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004820
text: You should devote flowers to this sanctum. Put flowers on the sanctum and pray in front of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004821
text: Since you have flowers, devote them to the sanctum and receive its blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004822
text: Get advice from the Pardoner Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004823
text: It seems that this place is also polluted so go meet the Pardoner Master who is the manager of the Sanctum and get some advices. If you purchase the warp scroll that will direct you to the outer edge of Fedimian from the stand beside, you will be able to move faster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004824
text: Purify the corruption at the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004825
text: The Purifier that you bought from the Pardoner Master can purify the sanctum a bit. Burn the Purifier in front of the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004826
text: Ask the Pardoner Master how to purify the sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004827
text: As you were about to pray in front of the sanctum, Ironbaum appeared. You better defeat it first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004828
text: Pray in front of the Sanctum and receive the blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004829
text: Fortunately, it seems that the sanctum is not corrupted yet. Pray again at the sanctum and receive the blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004830
text: There is a pilgrim who fell down at the Sestines Wilderness on Apsimesti Crossroads. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004831
text: Pilgrim Theophilis is calling for you desperately. Get closer and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004832
text: Investigate Theophilis' bag.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004833
text: Pilgrim Theophilis told you that this place is cursed and also told you that he would make some medicine for you if you could find his bag. Find Theophilis' bag which the monsters took.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004834
text: Hand it over to Pilgrim Theophilis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004835
text: You've found the bag of Pilgrim Theophilis. Give it back to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004836
text: Retrieve %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004837
text: Pilgrim Theophilis is looking at the bag. Talk to him again to get the promised medicine again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004838
text: Obtain Reed Sap Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004839
text: Pilgrim Theophilis doesn't know what to do since one of his medicine bottles is broken. Obtain Reed Sap Crystals from the monsters that are living on the roots of the reeds with big leaves at the upper side of the Sestines Wilderness.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004840
text: Acquired all the Reed Sap Crystals. Now, take the materials to Theophilis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004841
text: You felt strange as you consumed the medicine created by Pilgrim Theophilis. Talk to Theophilis again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004842
text: Search through Witas' belongings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004843
text: Pilgrim Theophilis wants his colleague, Witas to be cured of his condition. Look for Witas' belongings at the gravestone near Meeting Plaza and Klajone Access Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004844
text: Give them to Pilgrim Witas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004845
text: You've found all the objects that belong to Witas. Go to Pilgrim Witas to return all the objects that you just found.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004846
text: Look for Pieces of the Portrait

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004847
text: You've found a Small Frame near the gravestone, but only ripped pieces of the Portrait is left. You may find the rest of the Portrait from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004848
text: Look for a %s by hunting monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004849
text: Look for the pieces of the Portrait by hunting the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004850
text: The Abandoned Chest at Klajone Access Road

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004851
text: There is a chest that seems to be abandoned at Klajone Access Road. Inspect it to find out more about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004852
text: You can't find the key for the chest. It is possible that the monsters have swallowed it, so try defeating the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004853
text: Open the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004854
text: You've found the key! Now, let's open the chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004855
text: Obtain the key by defeating the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004856
text: The only Pond at the Apsimesti Crossroads looks very dirty. You may find a way to purify it near the Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004857
text: Place the pots that will store the sap of the Tree of the Brothers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004858
text: Look for the pots that can store the sap near the pond. Take those pots and put them under the Trees of the Brothers near Niekas Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004859
text: Look for the pots that can store the sap near the Pond. Take those pots and put them under the Trees near Niekas Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004860
text: Purify the Pond of Silence with the sap of the Tree of the Brothers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004861
text: The sap has collected some at the pots that you have placed. Purify the Pond of Silence using the collected sap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004862
text: When you purify the Pond of Silence using the sap, the Tree of Faith will retrieve its energy. Pour the sap into the Pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004863
text: The appearance of an evil energy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004864
text: As the Tree of Faith revived, an unknown, evil energy appeared at the Peddler Camp. Hurry to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004865
text: The Succubus that lured the pilgrim at the Apsimesti Crossroads appeared. Defeat the Succubus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004866
text: Defeat the monsters that are protecting the hidden space

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004867
text: It seems that we are still far away from resolving the accident that occurred at Paupys Crossing. Talk with Frey what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004868
text: It seems that you are now more closer to the true nature of the scary incident that occurred at Paupys Crossing. Talk to Ukert.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004869
text: You can see something that is caved in at Poslinkis Forest. Get closer to it to look closely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004870
text: There are suspicious treasure chests at Poslinkis Forest. Get closer to it to look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004871
text: Talk to Bishop Aurelius at the Grand Corridor

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004872
text: Acquired Maven's First Key. Talk to Bishop Aurelius who is waiting at the Grand Corridor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004873
text: Solve the secret at the Platform of Benevolence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004874
text: Solve the secret at the Platform of Benevolence by stepping on the footholds of the Arka Chapel and the Reception Room. If you have a trouble solving for the secret, get some help from Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004875
text: Obtain Maven's Second Key

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004876
text: The secret is solved. Obtain Maven's Second Key at the Platform of Benevolence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004877
text: Talk to Bishop Aurelius at Uola Chapel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004878
text: Pass through the Penitence Route at the upper side of the Grand Corridor and reenter into the Grand Corridor to meet Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004879
text: Defeat the demons that are after the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004880
text: Naktis' servants are trying to solve Maven's secret by obtaining the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power. Defeat the demons and obtain the Symbol of Spiritual Power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004881
text: Obtain the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004882
text: You've defeated all the demons that are going after the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power. Obtain the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004883
text: Fortunately, the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power seems to be okay. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004884
text: Recharge the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004885
text: Recharge the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power by deploying it and defeating monsters nearby. If you have difficulty recharging the symbol, get help from Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004886
text: Obtain Maven's Third Key at Karuna Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004887
text: Obtain Maven's Third Key using the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power at Karuna Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004888
text: Talk to Priest Ruodell

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004889
text: Priest Ruodell needs your help. Talk to Priest Ruodell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004890
text: Look for documents that are related to Naktis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004891
text: You've found documents that would help removing the Naktis' curse. Talk to Priest Ruodell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004892
text: Talk to Priest Yosana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004893
text: Priest Yosana seems to be at a loss. Talk to Priest Yosana again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004894
text: Retrieve Priest Yosana's Research

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004895
text: Priest Yosana told you that her research documents have disappeared and she suspects the demons have a role. Defeat the demons and retrieve her research documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004896
text: You've found all of Priest Yosana's documents. Hand them over to Priest Yosana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004897
text: Retrieve %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004898
text: Talk to Priest Daram

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004899
text: Priest Daram needs your help. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004900
text: Collect solvents by using the Scroll of Purification on the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004901
text: Priest Daram told you that many solvents are needed to make the reagent. Use the scroll of purification on the demons and collect the solvents.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004902
text: You've collected enough turbid solvents. Hand them over to Priest Daram.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004903
text: Priest Daram is thinking about something. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004904
text: Use the reagent Priest Daram created on the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004905
text: Priest Daram told you that she successfully created a reagent, but she needs to experiment with it. Test the reagent on the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004906
text: The reagent caused various effects. Tell Priest Daram about the reagent's effects.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004907
text: Defeat Naktis' servant, Riteris

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004908
text: Talk to Priest Alisha

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004909
text: Priest Alisha needs your help. Talk to Priest Alisha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004910
text: Collect thistles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004911
text: Priest Alisha wants to cure the pilgrim who is cursed, but she can't get the herbs since it's too dangerous. Get some thistles for Alisha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004912
text: Hand them over to Priest Alisha

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004913
text: Acquired enough Thistles. Hand them over to Priest Alisha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004914
text: It seems that the medicine is completed. Talk to Priest Alisha again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004915
text: Collect the meats from the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004916
text: Priest Alisha told you that the medicine is completed, but she is saying that he will not eat it. Defeat the monsters nearby and get some meat from them which will be used to hide the medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004917
text: Acquired all the meats that will hide the medicine. Hand them over to Priest Alisha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004918
text: Talk to Priest Roana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004919
text: Priest Roana found the true origin of the curse. Talk to Priest Roana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004920
text: Defeat the True Origin of the Curse

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004921
text: The true origin of the curse was a Chapparition. Defeat Chapparition.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004922
text: You've successfully defeated the Chapparition that was the true origin of the curse. Talk to Priest Roana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004923
text: Priest Alisha hid the medicine into the meats. Talk to Priest Alisha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004924
text: Feed the pilgrim the meat with medicine in it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004925
text: Feed the meats with the medicine to the cursed pilgrim. You should continuously feed him until you see its effects

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004926
text: The pilgrim who consumed the meats with the medicine seems to be recovering. Return to Priest Alisha and tell her about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004927
text: Priest Roana needs your help. Talk to Priest Roana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004928
text: Activating the Altar of Purification

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004929
text: Priest Roana told you that the curse at Penitence Route is a different kind of curse so asked you to find its true origin. Activate all the Altars of Purification at Penitence Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004930
text: You've activated all the Altars of Purification at Penitence Route. Talk to Priest Roana again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004931
text: Talk to Pilgrim Orville

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004932
text: Pilgrim Orville is speechless after seeing the dead body of his friend. Talk to Pilgrim Orville.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004933
text: Defeat the monsters on Taika Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004934
text: Pilgrim Orville wants to bury his friend at Taika Cliff where his friend could see his hometown, but he can't due to the monsters. Defeat the monsters at Taika Cliff for Orville's friend.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004935
text: Now, Taika Cliff seems to be safe. Talk to Pilgrim Orville again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004936
text: Pilgrim Orville is ready for the burial. Talk to Orville again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004937
text: Go to Taika Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004938
text: Pilgrim Orville left to Taika Cliff to bury his friend. Follow him to Taika Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004939
text: It seems that Orville was able to hide well. Talk to Orville again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004940
text: Acquired the third key. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004941
text: Look for the documents that describe ways to transform into a demon at Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004942
text: Bishop Aurelius told you that before you find the next key, you should look for documents that describe ways to transform into a demon. Look for the documents that describe ways to transform into a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004943
text: You've found the documents that enable you to transform into a demon. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004944
text: You've collected all the materials to transform into a demon. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004945
text: Complete the Demon Transformation Scroll at the Altar of Intelligence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004946
text: Bishop Aurelius told you that you can complete the Demon Transformation Scroll at the Altar of Intelligence. Resist against the demons' attacks while you are completing the scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004947
text: You've completed the scroll successfully. Return to Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004948
text: You are all prepared. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004949
text: Lure the demons to Apgaule Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004950
text: Lure the demons to Apgaule Altar after using the Demon Transformation Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004951
text: You've lured enough demons to Apgaule Altar. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004952
text: Obtain Maven's Fourth Key

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004953
text: You are all prepared. Get Maven's Fourth Key from the monsters at Apgaule Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004954
text: Now is the time to obtain Maven's Fifth Key. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004955
text: Obtain Maven's Fifth Key by solving for the secret in the Small Reception Room

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004956
text: Obtain the final key by solving for the Maven's secret at the Small Reception Room. If it is hard for you to solve the secret, call Bishop Aurelius to get some hints.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004957
text: Acquired all the keys. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004958
text: Enter into the Pasala Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004959
text: Bishop Aurelius told you to go to Pasala Altar that will lead you to a hidden room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004960
text: You've arrived at Pasala Altar. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004961
text: Look for the hidden path using the keys

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004962
text: Use the keys from your inventory in front of the orbs to look for the hidden path. If it is hard for you solve the secret, then call Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004963
text: Move to the hidden room using the portal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004964
text: You've used all the keys of Maven. Move to the hidden room using the portal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004965
text: Open the door that will lead you to Pasala Altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004966
text: Talk to Priest Prosit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004967
text: Collect the curse-spreading orbs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004968
text: There are many orbs that are spreading the curse at various places in the Sanctuary. You can't destroy them normally so collect them and bring them to Priest Prosit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004969
text: Hand them over to Priest Prosit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004970
text: You've collected all the cursed orbs. Hand them over to Priest Prosit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004971
text: Talk to Priest Goda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004972
text: Priest Goda seems to be wary about something. Talk to Priest Goda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004973
text: Investigate the Platform of Maskuote Narthex

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004974
text: Priest Goda asked you to defeat the demon that is disguised as a secret of Maven. Investigate the Platform of Maskuote Narthex and defeat the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004975
text: You've found the demon who was disguised as a secret of Maven. Let Priest Goda know about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004976
text: Defeat Linkroller

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004977
text: You've opened the portal that will lead you to a hidden room. Talk to Bishop Aurelius what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004978
text: Pass the Verification Test

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004979
text: The room in the altar of the revelation is locked tightly. Pass the last test that Maven prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004980
text: Obtain the revelation of the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004981
text: Obtain the revelation of the Great Cathedral by opening the Spirit's Scripture at the altar of the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004982
text: Bishop Aurelius is thinking about something while reading the documents that contain the method of transforming into a demon. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004983
text: Collect demons' garments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004984
text: Bishop Aurelius asked you to collect materials to create the Demon Transformation Scroll. Defeat the demons and collect the materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004985
text: Hand them over to Bishop Aurelius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004986
text: You've collected some demon garments. Return to Bishop Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004987
text: You see Orville, who seems clueless. Talk to Orville.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004988
text: Search for Orville's friend

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004989
text: Orville told you that he lost his friend while being chased by monsters. Find Orville's friend.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004990
text: Orville's friend is dead. You should pass this sad news to Orville.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004991
text: Meet Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004992
text: Someone needs your help at the land of Baron Allerno. Meet him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004993
text: Get some strong rope

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004994
text: Tadas asked you to get some rope since there isn't enough rope to tie the sacks of grains. Hunt the monsters to get some rope.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004995
text: Take the tough rope to him

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004996
text: Acquired enough rope. Hand them over to Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004997
text: Obtain %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004998
text: Obtain strong rope from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_004999
text: Talk to Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005000
text: Talk to Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005001
text: Listen to Tadas' request

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005002
text: Tadas told you that there is a place where he put the sacks of trashes. Go there and push them off the cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005003
text: Get rid of the sacks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005004
text: You feel somewhat strange. You better open the sacks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005005
text: Talk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005006
text: A person came out from the sack! You don't feel good, but you should talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005007
text: Try talking to him

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005008
text: What happened? A person came out from the sack which Tadas told you to push off the cliff. You should talk to him to find out why he was in the sack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005009
text: Bring potato rice cakes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005010
text: Jaunius told you to find the food that he hid in the grass bushes. Seach through the grass bushes nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005011
text: Bring the food that you found

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005012
text: This dried bread seems to be what Jaunius was looking for. Bring it to Jaunius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005013
text: Talk with Jaunius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005014
text: Talk with Jaunius again

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005015
text: Jaunius went home without listening to you. Tell this to Sergeant Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005016
text: Meet Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005017
text: There is a person who needs your help at the land of Baron Allerno. Get closer to him and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005018
text: Get some poison of Scorpio

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005019
text: Stepas told you that he is making the nutritious tonic that would energize the villagers. It has to be diluted with the poison of Scorpio before the villagers consume it so get the poison from the marked place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005020
text: Bring the poison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005021
text: Acquired the poison of Scorpio. Now, bring this poison to Stepas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005022
text: Talk with Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005023
text: It seems that the nutritious tonic is well diluted. Talk to Stepas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005024
text: Bring the nutritious tonic to the farmers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005025
text: Stepas told you bring the nutritious tonic to Dalius. Let's also bring the leaves of sweet herbs so he can eat more comfortably.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005026
text: Hand over the medicine to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005027
text: Since you have sweet herb leaves now, hand the nutritious tonic to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005028
text: Talk with Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005029
text: Tell Dalius to consume the tonic

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005030
text: Return to Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005031
text: You should report to Stepas that Dalius has shown an irregular response after consuming the medicine!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005032
text: Talk with Marius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005033
text: Marius needs someone's help. Get closer to him and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005034
text: Hand over the normal rice cake to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005035
text: Marius gave you the rice cake and told you to pass it to Dalius. But, since the rice cake gets spoiled quickly these days, it is important that you pass him the normal rice cake. If the rice cake gets spoiled on your way to Dalius, just throw it away and get the new one from Marius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005036
text: Take the rice cake to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005037
text: You successfully arrived near Dalius by avoiding the rice cake getting spoiled! Hand over the cake to Dalius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005038
text: Now, talk to Dalius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005039
text: Remove the strange markings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005040
text: There were some strange markings that were stuck into the ground as you were going to Dalius from Marius. It seems that they cause the food to get spoiled quickly. Let's try eliminating them on your way back to Marius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005041
text: Return to Marius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005042
text: You've removed the markings that were stuck into the ground. Tell this to Marius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005043
text: Help Marius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005044
text: It seems that Marius has lots of tasks to do. Help him with his tasks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005045
text: Retrieve the seeds

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005046
text: It seems that the monsters in the land of Baron Allerno stole the seeds. Retrieve the pockets of the seeds from the monsters that appear from everywhere in the land of Baron Allerno.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005047
text: Bring it to Marius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005048
text: Take back the pockets of the seeds to Marius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005049
text: Retrieve %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005050
text: Retrieve the pockets of the seeds from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005051
text: Meet the one who needs your help

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005052
text: The one who needs your help is looking for you. Get closer to him and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005053
text: Check the strange aura

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005054
text: Arunas, the secretary of the baron is checking the irregular energy in this region. Go to the place where Arunas pointed and check the irregular energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005055
text: Report to Baron Secretary Arunas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005056
text: Tell Arunas that there's no problem at the place where Arunas mentioned

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005057
text: Talk with Arunas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005058
text: Talk with Arunas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005059
text: The tasks that Arunas ordered you to do

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005060
text: Arunas told you that you should block the strange energy in that place and gave you a few pieces of wooden sticks and a doll to be used for spells. Make the magic circle at the place where the strange energy exists and burn the doll to block the energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005061
text: Report to Arunas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005062
text: You've created the magic circle that eliminates the strange energy and burned the doll, but it seems that the crops are withering. Anyways, report to Arunas that you successfully created the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005063
text: Meet the Wizard Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005064
text: There is Wizard Rimas. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005065
text: Enhance the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005066
text: Would the attitude of Rimas change after you enhance the magic circles at each side?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005067
text: Report to Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005068
text: You successfully enhanced the two magic circles. Tell this to Rimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005069
text: Look closely at the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005070
text: Look closely at the magic circles first in order to eliminate the strange energy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005071
text: Eliminate the protective jewel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005072
text: As you were looking closely at the magic circle, the objects which resemble jewels came out from the lower side of the magic circle and scattered to various places nearby. It seems that they were protecting the strange energy. It seems that the magic circle would be enhanced when you break those jewels.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005073
text: Enhance the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005074
text: You've collected all the energies of the monsters into the empty bottles. Now, sprinkle the energies of the monsters to the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005075
text: Get closer to the magic circle and find out why the magic circle is not stable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005076
text: Collect the energies of the monsters into the bottles and bury them under each side of the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005077
text: When you bury the bottles at each side of the magic circle after putting the energies of the monsters into them, the sealed magic circle will be enhanced.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005078
text: Talk to Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005079
text: Talk to Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005080
text: Protect the storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005081
text: The monsters sometimes steal from the storage that contains the fuel of the power generator behind. Help Rimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005082
text: You've defeated the monsters that were about to attack the storage. Go to Rimas and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005083
text: Defeat the monsters that are trying to attack the storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005084
text: Get near to the magic circle and look closely into it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005085
text: Explain to Rimas about the situation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005086
text: The magic circle is vibrating stragely. Report Rimas about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005087
text: Sprinkle the poison to the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005088
text: Take the poison bottle that Rimas gave to you and go to the magic circle to sprinkle it. I don't understand why the vicious energy of the monsters enhance the magic circle, but get some more information by doing as Rimas told you to do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005089
text: The magic circle will now be enhanced since you sprinkled the poison onto it. Go there and take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005090
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in to the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005091
text: As you were about to enhance the magic circle, the monsters suddenly rushed in! It seems that it's due to the poison that was sprinkled onto the magic circle. Defeat the monsters first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005092
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in after smelling it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005093
text: There seems to be an unstable magic circle. Enhance the magic circle before the strange energy spreads anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005094
text: Absorb the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005095
text: In order to enhance the magic circle, you should bring the monsters near the magic circle. Bring the monsters that are alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005096
text: Talk to the man

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005097
text: There is a man standing who seems to be related to the baron. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005098
text: Go there by bringing the meats

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005099
text: The Baron's secretary Benius is complaining that the Manticen that the Baron is keeping for strategic purposes is eating too much despite it's lack of usefulness. He gave you some new meat mentioning that the Manticen has become a fastidious eater. Go to the location mentioned by Benius with the meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005100
text: Report to Benius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005101
text: Tell Benius that Manticen was disappeared since he was trying to eat humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005102
text: Observe the suspicious place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005103
text: You can see half of the head from the statue of the Goddess is buried in the ground. The statue of the Goddess in this place.. Go there and and dig it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005104
text: Dig the head of the statue of the Goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005105
text: It is strange that the head of the statue is in this place. {nl}Try digging it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005106
text: Obtain the information of the object

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005107
text: The thing that was buried under the ground was not a Goddess Statue, but in fact the head part. You better tell this to someone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005108
text: Open the alcohol box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005109
text: It is strange that the alcohol container is in that location. Get closer to it and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005110
text: Break the alcohol container

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005111
text: As you were about to open the alcohol container, monsters appeared and tried to disturb! Avoid the attacks from the monsters and break the container within a time frame and open it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005112
text: Look for a person who would find the clues

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005113
text: You've found pieces that seemed to be belong to the upper body of the small statue from the broken container. Bring this to someone to find out the true nature of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005114
text: Look closely at the wooden alcohol container

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005115
text: The wooden container seems irregular. Get closer to it and look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005116
text: Make a wooden hammer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005117
text: It's hard to open the alcohol container. You've heard before that the wooden containers like this should be opened with a wooden hammer. Look for the materials to make a wooden hammer nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005118
text: Look for clues

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005119
text: You need a person who would listen about the piece of the stone statue that was discovered in the wine cask. Look for that person and ask him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005120
text: Look closely at the wing that is stuck on the ground

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005121
text: Something that resembles a wing is stuck on the ground. Get closer to it to look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005122
text: The wing that was stuck on the ground belonged to Corrupted. Defeat Corrupted.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005123
text: Obtain some clues from the wings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005124
text: There may be a person who knows about the small wing piece that you obtained from Corrupted. Find that person and show this piece to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005125
text: Talk to Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005126
text: Yoana took all the things that you collected before. Ask Yoana about those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005127
text: Obtain stick liquid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005128
text: Yoana told you that in order to glue those stone statues, she needs something sticky. Get something that is sticky from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005129
text: Take it to Yoana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005130
text: Take the sticky liquid that you obtained from the monsters to Yoana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005131
text: Obtain %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005132
text: Obtain the sticky liquid from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005133
text: Meet Yoana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005134
text: It seems that Yoana has some tasks to do. Get closer to her and ask her what's the matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005135
text: Verifying the nature of the strange aura

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005136
text: There's some energy coming out from the specific place, and Yoana wants to find out what that is. Decrease the Monster's HP into the half and talk to the magic circle to see what happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005137
text: Report to Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005138
text: It seems that the energy is not negative since you can see the monsters disappearing. Tell this to Yoana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005139
text: Talk with Yonaras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005140
text: Someone seems have many things to do here. Get closer to him and find out if he has some information that you would be able to obtain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005141
text: Burn the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005142
text: Let's eliminate the magic circle using the monsters near the magic circle. If you throw the burning monsters into the magic circle, don't you think the magic circle would also burn?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005143
text: Report to Jonaris

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005144
text: Tell Jonaris that you successfully eliminated the sealed magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005145
text: Talk to Jonaris

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005146
text: It seems that Jonaris has a plan to eliminate the magic circle at the other place. Get close to him and listen to his plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005147
text: Get the statue of the Goddess and put it on the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005148
text: Jonaris told you that in order to eliminate the magic circle, the mighty power of the Goddesses would be enough. Check whether the pieces of the statue are well glued together and try putting it on the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005149
text: Report to Jonaris

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005150
text: The magic circle has been successfully removed and the sprouts started to grow from the fields beside! Tell this to Jonaris.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005151
text: Meet Jugas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005152
text: There is a farmer who needs your help. Get closer to him and meet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005153
text: Retrieve the seeds

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005154
text: Jugas is saying that it seems the monsters here took away the seeds that are needed for farming here. Collect the seeds from the monsters nearby and send them to Jugas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005155
text: Hand them over to Jugas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005156
text: You actually don't know well, but take the things that you retrieved from the monsters to Jugas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005157
text: Retrieve the seeds from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005158
text: Talk to Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005159
text: Horacius seems to have something to request to you. Get closer to him and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005160
text: Get some wooden rods

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005161
text: Horacius told you that in order to make some things to prepare for the big task, he needs lots of wooden rods. Obtain some wooden rods from the fences nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005162
text: Take them to Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005163
text: Acquired some wooden rods. Take the rods to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005164
text: Collaborate with Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005165
text: Talk to Horacius to help him what he is preparing

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005166
text: Obtain hard stones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005167
text: Let's collect some stones to help Horacius' big task. You can get them from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005168
text: Hand them over to Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005169
text: Take the stones that you obtained from the monsters to Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005170
text: Help Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005171
text: It seems that Horacius has some requests to you. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005172
text: Collect some poison from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005173
text: Horacius told you that he needs some poison to rub on the end of the wooden rods. Put the pots that he gave to you and lure the monsters to get some poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005174
text: Hand over the poison of the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005175
text: Take the poison of the monsters to Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005176
text: Ask Horacius if there's anything you could help for the supply of the weapons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005177
text: Obtain farming tools

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005178
text: Horacius told you that he needs lots of farming tools that will be used as weapons. He can't move since he is changing those tools into the weapons, so ask the farmers nearby whether you could get some tools from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005179
text: Take the farming tools to Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005180
text: Acquired the farming tools from the farmers after persuading them. Now, take them to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005181
text: Talk to Tauras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005182
text: Listen to what the other farmers have to say

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005183
text: Pull out dandelions

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005184
text: Tauras is in charge of supplying the food for the big task. To help his task, let's get some dandelions from xx region. When you pull out the dandelions, keep in mind that you also need their roots.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005185
text: Hand over the dandelions to Tauras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005186
text: Acquired enough dandelions, so now take them to Tauras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005187
text: It seems that Tauras has another request in order to store the food. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005188
text: Make beef jerky

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005189
text: You should make beef jerkies which can be stored for a long time in order to fight for stably. Hunt the monsters to get their meats and put them in the drier to make beef jerkies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005190
text: Hand over the beef jerkies

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005191
text: The beef jerky is prepared. Take it to Tauras.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005192
text: Obtain some meats

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005193
text: It seems that Tauras has some request to you. Listen to his request.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005194
text: Defeat the monsters that are trying to steal from the food storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005195
text: The farmers told you that the storage where the foods are stored gets stolen frequently by the monsters these days. Go check the storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005196
text: Report to Tauras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005197
text: As you expected, the storage was about to be attacked by the monsters. Tell Tauras that you've defeated all the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005198
text: Defeat the monsters that were about the attack the storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005199
text: Meet Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005200
text: Someone may need your help. Get closer to him and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005201
text: Talk to Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005202
text: Talk to Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005203
text: Talk to Albina about the reconstruction of the Tenants' farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005204
text: Listen to Albina about the reconstruction of the Tenants' farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005205
text: The recovery of the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005206
text: There is something across the fences that are pushing the altar of the Goddesses. Break the fences and eliminate the obstacle to the reconstruction of this region.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005207
text: Report to Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005208
text: Tell Albina that you've defeated Kirmeleech that was pushing down the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005209
text: Discuss with Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005210
text: Discuss whether there's anything you can do to help the reconstruction of Tenants' farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005211
text: Remove the seal magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005212
text: The seal magic circle has been discovered at XX region. But, if you touch the seal magic circle, you will receive some damages due to the effects of the magic circle. Throw the hard, black stones that Albina gave to you and break the seal magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005213
text: Report to Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005214
text: You've eliminated the seal magic circle successfully. Tell Albina about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005215
text: Discuss with Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005216
text: Talk to Albina about the reconstruction of the Tenants' farm. It seems that there's something that she needs to request to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005217
text: Break the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005218
text: You would be able to restore this region to its previous state if you break the magic circle. Break the magic circle in this region.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005219
text: You've eliminated the magic circle in this region! Tell this to Albina!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005220
text: Eliminate the seal magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005221
text: Discuss with Horacius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005222
text: It seems that Horacius has something to discuss with you. Meet him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005223
text: Distribute the joint signature seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005224
text: The day Horacius planned for is nearing. The last thing to do is to receive consent from the farmers of Tenants' Farm. Get their signature on Horacius' hand written letter and joint signature seal. You should receive eight signatures.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005225
text: Hand over the joint signature seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005226
text: Acquired their signatures on the joint signature seal! Now pass it to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005227
text: Collect demon samples that are needed for the research

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005228
text: Priest Benedict is researching a way to remove Naktis' curse. Obtain demon samples for Benedict.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005229
text: You've collected enough demon samples. Hand them over to Priest Benedict.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005230
text: Obtain %s by defeating Colifly

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005231
text: Collect demon samples

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005232
text: Priest Benedict thinks that his theory might be wrong so he asked you to get the samples of other demons. Collect samples of the other demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005233
text: Obtain %s by defeating Loftlem

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005234
text: Priest Goda seems to have many grievances. Talk to Priest Prosit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005235
text: Defeat the demons that are ruining the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005236
text: Priest Prosit can't forgive the demons that are ruining the Great Cathedral. Defeat the demons on behalf of Priest Prosit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005237
text: You've defeated many demons. Talk to Priest Prosit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005238
text: Talk to Gytis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005239
text: You can see Gytis who is worried a lot at the settlement land of Gytis. Talk with Gytis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005240
text: Ask for help from the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005241
text: Gytis told you that the workers at the settlement land were attacked by the monsters and they are sick. Talk to the Pyromancer Master to get her help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005242
text: The Pyromancer Master told you that she will definitely help you. Talk to the Pyromancer Master again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005243
text: Collect the samples of Pink Chupalukas at the settlement land

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005244
text: Pyromancer Master told you that she will definitely help you. First get some samples of Pink Chupalukas at the settlement land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005245
text: Bring the items to the Pyromancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005246
text: Acquired the samples of Pink Chupalukas. Hand them over to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005247
text: Obtain %s from Ziuluti Vacant Lot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005248
text: The Pyromancer Master who was investigating the samples of the monsters doesn't feel good about something. Talk to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005249
text: Search for the clues of the spell at the settlement area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005250
text: The Pyromancer Master senses some mysterious poison and a spell. Return to the settlement land and find out the true nature of the poison and the spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005251
text: You've found a leather and a dagger with the magic circle drawn in them at Nuodo Coast. Take them to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005252
text: Destroy the mysterious altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005253
text: Unfortunately, the Pyromancer Master doesn't know well about the spell. Talk to the Pyromancer Master again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005254
text: Talk to the Bokor Master about the true nature of the spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005255
text: The Bokor Master knows well about the spells. Ask the Bokor Master about the true nature of the spell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005256
text: The Bokor Master told you that the spell spreads the poison that is on the the dagger. But, she told you that she doesn't know very much about the dagger and to talk to the Ranger Master about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005257
text: Talk to Gytis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005258
text: Use the antidote

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005259
text: Cure the people who is suffering from the massive explosion using the antidote

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005260
text: Talk to the Pyromancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005261
text: Talk to the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005262
text: Talk to Soldier Dennis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005263
text: You can see Dennis who looks to be troubled. Talk to Dennis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005264
text: Defeat the monsters at the Joint Farmland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005265
text: Soldier Dennis told you that the other soldiers went out to defeat Gorgon so it's hard to defeat the monsters that are in the farm. Defeat the monsters in the Joint Farmland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005266
text: You've defeated the monsters at the Joint Farmland. Return to Dennis and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005267
text: Defeat the monsters at the farmland

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005268
text: Dennis still feels something's not right. Talk to Dennis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005269
text: Talk to Alan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005270
text: Dennis is worried about Alan who is protecting the entrance of the farm alone. Go to the entrance and support Alan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005271
text: You've protected against the monsters well. Return to Dennis and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005272
text: Dennis is still worried about something. Listen what's the matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005273
text: Look for the soldiers who went out to defeat the Gorgon

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005274
text: Look for the soldiers who went out to defeat the Gorgon. They are headed to the Ishigiti Herb Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005275
text: You've defeated the Gorgon that routed Dennis' colleagues. Tell this to Dennis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005276
text: Defeat Gorgon

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005277
text: Talk to Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005278
text: Louise needs your help. Talk to Louise near the Louise's Farmland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005279
text: Defeat Ridimeds at Louise's Farmland

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005280
text: Louise told you that he can't work at all due to the Ridimeds that came into his farmland. Defeat the Ridimeds at Louise's Farmland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005281
text: You've defeated many Ridimeds. Report to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005282
text: Defeat Ridimeds at Louise's Farmland

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005283
text: Louise told you that he defeated the monsters for now, but he is more worried about the future. Talk to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005284
text: Collect the wood to make fences

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005285
text: Louise asked you to help him since he wants to make the fences. Bring the woods from the land where settlement is planned.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005286
text: Report to Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005287
text: Acquired the wood. Bring it to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005288
text: Louise made the fences within a short period of time with the wood. Talk to Louise again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005289
text: Set up the fences on Louise's Farmland

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005290
text: Louise told you that there are still many monsters, so he asked you to set up the completed fences. Set up the fences on Louise's Farmland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005291
text: You've set up all the fences. Talk to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005292
text: Obtain %s that will be used as the materials for the scarecrow

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005293
text: Obtain the materials that are lacking by defeating the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005294
text: It seems that something is not going well for Gareth. Talk to Gareth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005295
text: Collect the samples of Sakmolis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005296
text: Gareth told you that the crops are not growing as fast as usual, and he wants to know why. Please obtain the samples from Orange Sakmolis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005297
text: Hand them over to Gareth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005298
text: Acquired the samples of Sakmolis. Hand them over to Gareth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005299
text: Talk to Gareth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005300
text: Gareth found something from the samples. Talk to Gareth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005301
text: Retrieve the Monster Suppression Device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005302
text: Gareth told you that the device which suppresses the proliferation of the monsters also influenced the crops. Retrieve the device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005303
text: Acquired the device. Report to Gareth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005304
text: Talk to Hasta

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005305
text: Meet Hasta at Aqueduct Bridge Area's Restricted Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005306
text: Talk to Demon Lord Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005307
text: The Demon Lord Hauberk whose spirit was inside Hasta appeared. Hauberk told you that he knows where Goddess Vakarine is. Ask him about Goddess Vakarine's location.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005308
text: You have found out that Goddess Vakarine is in trouble. The Demon Lord Hauberk told you that if you could take him to the Demon's Prison across the portal, he will cooperate with you so that you could meet Vakarine. Listen for more details from Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005309
text: Listen to Hauberk's plan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005310
text: Enter the 1st District of the Demon's Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005311
text: You've completed the contract with Hauberk. He is going to travel with you until you find Vakarine. Now, go to the 1st District of the Demon's Prison with Hauberk!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005312
text: Talk to Hauberk's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005313
text: Talk to Hauberk's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005314
text: Talk to Kupole Audra

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005315
text: Talk to Kupole Audra at the Demon's Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005316
text: Kupole Audra asked you to defeat the monsters that are having the ritual ceremony to help Blut's escape at the Rituala gathering place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005317
text: Obtain the secreting bland of the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005318
text: Get the secreting bland from the subordinates of Blut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005319
text: Defeat the monsters and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005320
text: Obtain the secreting bland of the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005321
text: Talk to Kupole Audra

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005322
text: Assist Hauberk with the ritual ceremony

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005323
text: In order to face Blut, Hauberk told you that he needs to be materialized. Help Hauberk to absorb the power of Blut in the Concentrated Management Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005324
text: Talk to Kupole Zydrone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005325
text: Talk to Kupole Zydrone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005326
text: Defeat Blut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005327
text: Defeat Blut by helping Kupole Zydrone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005328
text: Defeat Blut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005329
text: Talk to Kupole Norgaile

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005330
text: Talk to Kupole Norgaile

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005331
text: Defeat the demons at the 1st isolated area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005332
text: Obtain the manes of Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005333
text: Defeat the subordinates of Nuaele and obtain the manes of Hauberk at the 2nd isolated area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005334
text: Obtain %s from the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005335
text: Use the marble of the creed to Norgaile

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005336
text: Kupole Norgaile used it when he was interrogating the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005337
text: The marble of the creed of Norgaile

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005338
text: Received it. Interrogate the demons at the 3rd isolated area and find out why Nuaele is not trying to escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005339
text: Defeat * monster which is the subordinate of Nuaele at the 4th isolated area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005340
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005341
text: Talk to Kupole Aldona

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005342
text: Talk to Kupole Aldona and hunt for Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005343
text: Defeat Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005344
text: Meet Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005345
text: Goddess Vakarine is waiting for your help at the Corridor of Monitor in the Demon's Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005346
text: Talk to Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005347
text: Talk to Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005348
text: Eliminate the small metastasis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005349
text: Eliminate the small metastasis which is disturbing the recharging of the night star key of Kupole Zydrone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005350
text: Transform the night star key

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005351
text: Protect Kupole Zydrone while he is transforming the night star key

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005352
text: Talk to Kupole Aldona

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005353
text: Install the night star key

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005354
text: Use the night star key to unleash the seals of Rearda, Kasa, and Rada.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005355
text: Defeat Dionys

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005356
text: Talk to Kupole Daiva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005357
text: Meet Kupole Daiva at District 4 in the Demon's Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005358
text: Chase after Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005359
text: Kupole Daiva told you to resist the Demon Lord Hauberk that is breaking the barrier at Nebilau Broken District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005360
text: Talk to Kupole Daiva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005361
text: Defeat the servants of Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005362
text: Collect Hauberk's Soul Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005363
text: Kupole Daiva told you to defeat the demons that are gathered at the internal isolated division. He told you to collect the pieces of Hauberk's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005364
text: Talk to Kupole Daiva in front of the entrance of the poisonous room of Idinga

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005365
text: Retrieve the pieces of the spirit of Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005366
text: Talk to Kupole Daiva in front of Idinga

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005367
text: Pursue Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005368
text: Use the night star rune from Kupole Daiva to find the demon who was possessed by Hauberk's spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005369
text: Talk to Kupole Daiva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005370
text: Push Hauberk who is running away through the Zinuma Passage in to the Galutin Solitary Confinement!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005371
text: Talk to Kupole Sigita

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005372
text: Talk to Kupole Sigita

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005373
text: Talk to Kupole Sigita at the entrance of Galutin Solitary Confinement at District 4 of the Demon's Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005374
text: Suppress Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005375
text: Suppress Hauberk who is resisting inside the Galutin Solitary Confinement with Kupole Sigita and seal him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005376
text: Meet the Goddess, Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005377
text: Collect the traces of the metastasis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005378
text: The Goddess, Vakarine told you to defeat the monsters at Aushura worship place and collect the traces of the mestastasis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005379
text: Collect %s from the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005380
text: Make the demons obey you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005381
text: Goddess Vakarine told you to gather in the Rankine Isolation District with a demon to neutralize them. Vakarine will find and bring the disobedient demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005382
text: Neutralize the demons using the Evening Star Rune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005383
text: The Goddess, Vakarine told you to use the night star rune to the demons and neutralize them at the Ishishula collapsed area. When the monsters become neutralized, the cupols of Vakarine will take the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005384
text: Obtain the symbol of the condemned criminal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005385
text: The Goddess, Vakarine told you to neutralize the demons that are gathered at Atmesta isolated area, and use the night star rune to bring the symbol of the condemned criminal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005386
text: Obtain %s by defeating the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005387
text: Collect the symbols of the condemend criminal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005388
text: Seal the space of the metastasis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005389
text: Goddess Vakarine asked you to help her while she and her Kupoles are sealing the dimensional crack at the Vakarion Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005390
text: Defeat the monsters that are trying to escape

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005391
text: Defeat the demons that are trying to escape the Demon's Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005392
text: Collect the belongings of the humans

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005393
text: Kupole Audra asked you to defeat the demons near Bjaurer Hideout and collect the artifacts of the humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005394
text: Obtain the artifacts of the humans

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005395
text: Defeat the remnants of Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005396
text: Kupole Norgaile asked you to defeat the remnants of Nuaele at the 1st isolated place to stabilize the demons' prison where Nuaele has disappeared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005397
text: Retrieve the necklace of Kupole

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005398
text: Kupole Norgaile asked you to retrieve the belongings of the Kupoles who died while fighting against the demons at the 4th isolated area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005399
text: Retrieve %s by defeating demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005400
text: Kupole Zydrone told you that the demons who went out of the influence of Baltrus became more violent and irregular. Defeat the demons at the grand corridor of Orualma

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005401
text: Obtain the toenails of the spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005402
text: Kupole Aldona asked you to collect the toe nails of the spirit by defeating the demons near the Rewalda seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005403
text: Defeat the demons and collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005404
text: Collect the toe nails of the spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005405
text: Kupole Aldona asked you to collect the symbols of the star that are scattered across Rada Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005406
text: Kupole Daiva asked you to defeat the subordinates of Hauberk that ran away to Aklaga isolated area by avoiding the gaze of the Goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005407
text: Kupole Daiva asked you to defeat the demons that ran away after betraying Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005408
text: Obtain the teeth of the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005409
text: Kupole Sigita asked you to defeat the demons that hid into Huradeti crossroad and bring the teeth of the demons which are their symbols.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005410
text: Obtain %s by defeating the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005411
text: The Goddess, Vakarine told you that the demons that came out from the space of the metastasis ran away and headed to Vanaga Monitoring District. Let's defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005412
text: Collect the empty spirits

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005413
text: The Goddess, Vakarine asked you to collect the empty spirits from the monsters that are gathered at the isolated district of Pasaru in order to recover Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005414
text: Obtain the empty spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005415
text: The Goddess, Vakarine asked you to eliminate the small space of the metastasis that was created due to the disaster at the Gavara isolated district.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005416
text: Talk to Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005417
text: Druid Ellie is looking at you closely. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005418
text: Collect the leaves of green Ellums

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005419
text: Druid Ellie wants to know the true nature of the tree which the mysterious girl left long time ago. First bring the leaves of Ellums from the abandoned grape field first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005420
text: Hand over the leaves to Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005421
text: Acquired all the leaves of Ellums to find out the true nature of the tree. Take them to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005422
text: Collect %s from green Ellums

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005423
text: Druid Ellie is surprised by the result after endowing the power of the tree into the leaves. Talk to Druid Ellie again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005424
text: Collect the samples of corrupted soil

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005425
text: Druid Ellie wants to know more about the power of the tree. Get samples of corrupted soil from the Deserted Workshop and the Cottage of Farm Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005426
text: Hand over the samples of corrupted soil that you obtained for Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005427
text: Acquired the samples of corrupted soil. Hand it over to Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005428
text: Get %s from the Cottage of Farm Manager

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005429
text: Get %s from the Deserted Workshop

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005430
text: Druid Ellie wants to experiment something with the samples of corrupted soil. Talk to Druid Ellie again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005431
text: Check the experiment's result with Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005432
text: Druid Ellie is now all ready to find out the power of the tree. Tell her to begin the experiment together.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005433
text: The samples of corrupted soil were fully purified with the power of the tree. Talk to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005434
text: Druid Ellie is very delighted about the result of the experiment. Talk to Druid Ellie again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005435
text: Collect the fluid of Tanu

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005436
text: In order to engage in mass scale purification, Druid Ellie told you that he needs the fluid of Tanus. Collect the fluid of Tanus from Ziura Junction.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005437
text: Hand it over to Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005438
text: Acquired enough amount of Tanus' fluid that Elly wanted. Take them to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005439
text: Collect %s from Tanu

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005440
text: It seems that Druid Ellie has a last request. Talk to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005441
text: Look for a person who is likely to know the whereabouts of Martinek at Shaton Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005442
text: Druid Ellie told you hand over a box to Druid Martinek at Shaton Farm. Find a person who is likely to know the whereabouts of Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005443
text: Open the small box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005444
text: As you checked through the soil, a suspicious box appeared. Let's check what's inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005445
text: Search for Druid Joel after moving to Shaton Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005446
text: The box did not open. As Elly told you, you should find her colleague, open the box and show it to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005447
text: Talk to Farmer Darcy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005448
text: Farmer Darcy needs your help. Talk to Farmer Darcy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005449
text: Defeat green Ellum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005450
text: Farmer Darcy can't do farming anymore due to the monsters. Reduce the number of monsters nearby for Farmer Darcy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005451
text: You successfully reduced the number of green Ellums. Talk to Farmer Darcy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005452
text: Defeat Green Ellums

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005453
text: Farmer Darcy still has some complaints. Listen to his complaints.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005454
text: Get rid of the young dandelions

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005455
text: Farmer Darcy told you that the dandelions are sprouting irregularly, but he can't pull them out due to the monsters. Eliminate the young dandelions for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005456
text: You've pulled out all the young dandelions. Talk to Farmer Darcy again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005457
text: Talk to Farmer Miren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005458
text: Farmer Miren seems to have lots of complaints. Talk to Farmer Miren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005459
text: Farmer Miren is complaining since druids are just ignoring the monsters. Defeat the monsters for Farmer Miren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005460
text: You've defeated many monsters nearby. Return to Farmer Miren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005461
text: Defeat Spion

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005462
text: Farmer Miren remembered something she forgot. Talk to Farmer Miren again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005463
text: Find Miren's Old Bag

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005464
text: Farmer Miren told you that she lost her bag when she was being chased by the monsters last time. Find the old bag and hand it over to Miren.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005465
text: Hand it over to Miren

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005466
text: You've found Miren's Old Bag. Hand it over to Miren.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005467
text: Find %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005468
text: Talk with Investigator Monahan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005469
text: Investigator Monahan looks very exhausted. Talk to Investigator Monahan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005470
text: Collect the eggs of Leafnut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005471
text: Investigator Monahan told you that he was dispatched to Klaipeda to find out the damages that were inflicted on the farm. To find out the damages, hand over the eggs of Leafnut to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005472
text: Hand it over to Investigator Monahan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005473
text: You've collected all the eggs of Leafnut. Hand them over to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005474
text: Investigator Monahan found a good sign. Talk to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005475
text: Collect the oothecas from the Avarza Grape Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005476
text: Investigator Monahan told you that it is important to receive more energy of the ground. Collect the oothecas of the monsters that reside on the roots of the grape trees of Abarza.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005477
text: You've collected enough oothecas. Hand them over to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005478
text: Collect %s from the Grape Vines

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005479
text: The most special thing among the special things

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005480
text: Talk to Farm Supervisor Dorn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005481
