text: It seems that Dorn is not happy with your visit. Listen to the requests of Farm Supervisor Dorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005482
text: Defeat drakes and collect the horns as a proof

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005483
text: The supervisor, Dorn told you that you should do something in order to enter into the farm. Defeat Drakes and collect the horns of the drakes as a proof.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005484
text: Hand them over to Farm Supervisor Dorn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005485
text: You've collected all the pieces of the Drake's horns. Hand them over to Dorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005486
text: Collect %s by defeating Drakes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005487
text: Farm Supervisor Dorn seems to be satisfied with your skills. Ask him about the whereabouts of the druid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005488
text: Search through the sacks of grain that are scattered across the farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005489
text: Dorn wants you to retrieve the sacks of grain that the soldiers stole as a return for letting you know the whereabout of Druid. Search through the old wagon or wooden boxes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005490
text: You have found all the sacks of grain. Hand them over to Farm Supervisor Dorn and ask him about the whereabouts of the druid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005491
text: Search through %s in various places on the farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005492
text: You have completed all the requests of Farm Supervisor Dorn. Ask him again the whereabouts of the druid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005493
text: Talk to Druid Martinek

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005494
text: Dorn drove the druid deep into the farm. Go to Neshiva Road to find Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005495
text: Druid Martinek seems be in a hurry. You've found Druid Martinek as Druid Ellie requested. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005496
text: Cure the poisoned farmers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005497
text: Druid Martinek told you that there are farmers who are exposed to the poison at Zirta Brewery and Gausa Workplace. Give them the antidote.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005498
text: You have saved all the poisoned farmers. Return to Druid Martinek and tell him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005499
text: Since you've saved all the poisoned farmers, you can now continue with your original errand. Talk to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005500
text: Bring winged frogs with the help of the obedience stick

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005501
text: Reduce the HP of the winged frog and use the controlling stick to take it to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005502
text: You handed over enough frogs to Druid Martinek. Talk to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005503
text: Druid Martinek successfully endowed vital energy to the old seeds. Now, talk to Druid Martinek over what you should do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005504
text: Get some water from the well at Gausa Workplace

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005505
text: Druid Martinek is telling you that he needs clean water, but that's problematic because of the polluted nearby environment. Bring water from the well at Gausa Workplace with the bowl that Druid Martinek gave you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005506
text: Hand it over to Druid Martinek

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005507
text: You successfully obtained water from the well at Gausa Workplace. Hand it over to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005508
text: You are now ready to restore the old seeds. Talk to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005509
text: Go to the reservoir district of Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005510
text: Druid Martinek told you that he will try persuading the owner of the farm, Gord Shaton, to plant the seeds. Meet Druid Martinek at the Shaton Reservoir.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005511
text: Talk with Farm Soldier Gedson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005512
text: Farm Soldier Gedson is mad at you. Talk to him to find out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005513
text: Defeat Cysts

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005514
text: Gedson told you to help him, or else you can't enter the farm without his permission. Defeat the nearby Cysts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005515
text: You've defeated all the Cysts. Tell Farm Soldier Gedson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005516
text: Farm Soldier Gedson still has some tasks to request of you. Talk to Gedson again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005517
text: Defeat green drake

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005518
text: The private soldier, Gedson wants you to defeat green drakes. Defeat drakes at Ishikla farm road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005519
text: You've defeated all drakes. Tell this to the private soldier, drake.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005520
text: Talk to Tenant Farmer Charlotte

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005521
text: Tenant Farmer Charlotte is desperately looking for your help. Listen to her story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005522
text: Sprinkle the weed killer on the grape vine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005523
text: It is so horrible to plant the polluted grapes anymore. Sprinkle the weed killer on the polluted grapes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005524
text: You've ruined the grape vine enough. Return to Tenant Charlotte.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005525
text: Tenant Farmer Charlotte looks serious. Ask her what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005526
text: Defeat gray Chupacabra

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005527
text: Charlotte told you that many Chupacabras are gathered in front of the polluted grapes due to their smell. Defeat Chupacabras that are coming out from the vines.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005528
text: You've defeated most of the Chupacabras. Return to Tenant Charlotte.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005529
text: Defeat Chupacabras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005530
text: Talk to Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005531
text: Louise seems to be in a trouble. Talk to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005532
text: Defeat Tontus at Giruta brewery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005533
text: Louise has to go to Giruta brewery, but he can't go because of the monsters. Defeat Tontus near Giruta brewery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005534
text: You've defeated many Tontuses. Return to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005535
text: Defeat Tontus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005536
text: The tenant, Louise has one more request. Talk to Louise again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005537
text: Obtain the seed pouch from the old bag

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005538
text: Louise hid the seeds that he secretly grew, but he can't take them due to the monsters. Please look for the pockets of seeds that belong to Louise at the Farm Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005539
text: Hand them over to Louise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005540
text: You've found the pockets of the seeds that belong to Louise. Hand them over to Louise.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005541
text: Search for %s at the Farm Plaza

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005542
text: It seems that Druid Martinek failed to persuade Gord Shaton. Talk to him again about what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005543
text: Talk to Gord Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005544
text: Druid Martinek told you that he may listen to the words of the Revelator. Persuade Gord Shaton directly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005545
text: Talk to Vanessa Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005546
text: Druid Martinek told you that if you fail to persuade Gord Shaton, meet his daughter. Meet Vanessa Shaton and persuade her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005547
text: Look for the traces of Shaton's son at the underground tunnel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005548
text: Vanessa Shaton told you that you may persuade Gord Shaton with the necklace of her lost brother. You can find the necklace from the underground tunnel that is twisted like a maze.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005549
text: Hand it over to Vanessa Shaton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005550
text: You've found the necklace that seems to be belong to Shaton Family. Hand it over to Vanessa Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005551
text: Search for %s in the underground tunnel of the farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005552
text: Gord Shaton frowned after seeing his son's necklace. Talk to Gord Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005553
text: Defeat Lauzinute

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005554
text: Gord Shaton has gone mad after seeing the necklace. To calm him down, you better defeat the monsters in the underground tunnel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005555
text: You defeated the monsters at the underground tunnel. Report to Gord Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005556
text: It seems that Gord Shaton is planning something. Talk to Gord Shaton so he can calm down again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005557
text: Defeat the summoned monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005558
text: Gord Shaton summoned monsters that he claimed he bought at Fedimian, but the monsters were not obedient and started to attack. Defeat all summoned monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005559
text: Gord Shaton realized something as he saw the monsters attacking him. Talk to Gord Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005560
text: Gord Shaton will pass his duty of managing the farm to his daughter Vanessa. Talk to Druid Martinek about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005561
text: Druid Martinek asked you to talk to Vanessa Shaton about what to do from now on. Meet Vanessa Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005562
text: Vanessa Shaton promised you that she will support large scale purification. Tell this to Druid Martinek.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005563
text: Talk to Steward Valen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005564
text: Steward Valen needs your help. Talk to Valen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005565
text: Defeat Green Carcashu

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005566
text: Joel is worried about the Carcashu's irregular occurrences. Let's reduce the number of Carcashus and let's adjust the balance of the nature.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005567
text: You've defeated enough Carcashus. Let's go back to Joel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005568
text: Valen needs your help. Talk to Valen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005569
text: Find Valen's medicine bags

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005570
text: Valen ordered people to purchase medicine from Klaipeda, but they were attacked by monsters and barely managed to survive. Please find the bags of the medicine on behalf of Valen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005571
text: Hand it over to Steward Valen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005572
text: You've found all the medicine bags. Hand it over to Valen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005573
text: Talk to General Buros

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005574
text: General Buros is looking for someone who would help with his task. Talk to General Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005575
text: Defeat Lauzinute across the underground tunnel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005576
text: General Buros doesn't want to go into the underground tunnel because it's too scary. Defeat the monsters on behalf of General Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005577
text: You've defeated all the monsters. Talk to General Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005578
text: Buros seems grim. Talk to Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005579
text: Defeat Scorpio near the tower of Wind Vane Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005580
text: Buros told you that Scorpio appeared again because you went too crazy. Defeat Scorpio near the tower of the Wind Vane Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005581
text: You've defeated Scorpio. Report to Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005582
text: Talk to Oliver

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005583
text: It seems that Oliver came to this farm to look for something. Let's listen from him what he is trying to obtain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005584
text: Obtain the leaves of Biterose

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005585
text: Oliver wants the leaves of Biterose. Let's receive the compensation after helping with the save.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005586
text: You've collected enough leaves so Oliver would be satisfied. Let's return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005587
text: Talk with Farm Soldier Upham

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005588
text: You've found Farm Soldier Upham, who is sitting down alone at the Wind Vane Tower. Ask him why he is sitting there alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005589
text: Escort Farm Soldier Upham to a safe place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005590
text: Upham was separated from his colleagues due to monster attack. Please take Upham to the Farm Assembly Hall where General Buros is at.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150323_005591
text: You've took Upham to General Buros. Talk with General Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005592
text: How should we know what the baron's thinking?{nl}All he told us was to behave well when the Revelator came...{nl}We're just doing the work he told us to do.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005593
text: Well, if you go see the baron yourself, you may find out.{nl}He is working on something big at Myrkiti Farm, so why don't you go meet him?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005594
text: I have to tie the sacks of grain, but I don't have enough rope.{nl}I am sure that the monsters nearby took them. Please get some tight rope for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005595
text: Oh, ignore what the workers around here say.{nl}They are whining.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005596
text: Good. {nl}Now the task here is completed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005597
text: Hey, are you the Revelator?{nl}Then I welcome you. The baron told me to treat you well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005598
text: There is a small task you can do.{nl}We don't have enough hands here. No, I am not talking about farming.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005599
text: Something seems to be moving in the sacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005600
text: I request that you finish the rest.{nl}There are some abandoned sacks at Tvora Road. I want you to take care of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005601
text: We don't have enough workforce.{nl}Of course, the biggest reason is that the workers here are not working hard.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005602
text: That garbage came from other farms due to the lack of workforce.{nl}But, I don't understand why they have to be taken care of here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005603
text: You can bury them under the ground or push them off from the cliff.{nl}I've been doing that 'til now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005604
text: Why are you back again?{nl}Did you see something that you shouldn't have seen?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005605
text: Save me!{nl}Please, save me..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005606
text: I feel light headed. Please get me something to eat..{nl}I hid some food in the bushes a long time ago while I was working.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005607
text: I'm not sure. I was working like I usually do, and then I went upstairs... {nl}Something strange happened... It became dark...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005608
text: I don't know what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005609
text: What happened to all the people who were with me..{nl}Just what the hell happened..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005610
text: Thank you.{nl}I should recover some energy after eating this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005611
text: Soldier Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005612
text: Are you the supporting workforce? No? {nl}We don't have enough workforce so I want to ask someone to help us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005613
text: I need to distribute a nutritious tonic that the baron gave to me.{nl}But since this is undiluted, I should mix something into it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005614
text: The relationship between the farmer and the private soldier is always the same.{nl}One side works and the other side manages it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005615
text: Plus, it's the baron's orders,{nl}Even if he wants to share more, he can't. That's why I think their relationship is sour.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005616
text: What we need is venom from the Scorpio. {nl}The Scorpio is nocturnal, so it must be sleeping at Soil of Arable.{nl}Wake it up and extract the venom out from it. Sounds easy, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005617
text: Approach it carefully..{nl}If you attack too fast, it won't be effective.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005618
text: All done. {nl}Now, I will share this with the workers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005619
text: Especially Dalius over there. He seems to always be exhausted these days.{nl}He's not doing his work and he looks exhausted.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005620
text: I will take one sweet herb leaf on my way.{nl}That medicine, it's disgusting to consume it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005621
text: The Scorpio Venom.{nl}Can humans consume it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005622
text: Who are you? {nl}Stepas sent you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005623
text: Nutritious tonic? He told you to give it to me? {nl}Hmm, that's unexpected.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005624
text: The poison of Scorpio was somewhat strange.{nl}Damn. It's already in effect. I won't mind it, if it doesn't threaten my life.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005625
text: I have a headache. What's happening?{nl}My stomach's aching too... I'm an idiot to consume what that man gave me right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005626
text: (Is he really going to be okay?)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005627
text: I should bring lunch to my brother, he's working at Shileik Trail.{nl}Whenever I try to cross the bridge though, the bread gets spoiled.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005628
text: I swear I'm not lying.{nl}Can you take it there for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005629
text: Come back if it gets spoiled.{nl}But I only have two remaining breads so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005630
text: Did my brother ask you to give this to me?{nl}I'm tired and I don't know why these kind of things keep happening...{nl}But thank you, I appreciate this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005631
text: Is it okay now?{nl}Okay then hand it over to Dalius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005632
text: Are you scared?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005633
text: Strange isn't it? How come the food gets spoiled whenever I cross over there?{nl}Is it because of the smoke?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005634
text: How should I know about it?{nl}If you're going back to my brother, please get rid of those strange things.{nl}I'm too scared to do it myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005635
text: If they really are getting spoiled due to the smoke, I wonder what it is...{nl}It can't be good for your health, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005636
text: I actually suspected that those round things were making the smoke.{nl}They always said it was created by the baron, and that a harvester like me couldn't possibly know anything about that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005637
text: So did the smoke go away?{nl}That's the first time I've seen such a thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005638
text: Hello. I am the secretary of Baron Allerno, who is the owner of this place.{nl}There are some things that the baron told me to do, but it's not working well.{nl}I am somewhat tired also.. whenever I come out to the land, I get tired and my body doesn't seem good.{nl}Please help me a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005639
text: Rimas said the crops here not growing well due to the strange energy in this place.{nl}But, since there is no strange energy and the crops are growing well...{nl}Thanks for checking it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005640
text: Anyways, I received the report that the strange energy was definitely at the place you took a look at while ago.{nl}I will give the doll and some woods, use them to burn the doll.{nl}You will be prepared for some strange energy that may appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005641
text: What? The crops died after doing what you were told to do?{nl}Was the curse of the doll little strong?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005643
text: Are you the Revelator? {nl}I don't care about that, I am a bit busy right now so could you help my task?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005644
text: There are some magic circles around here that we put after receiving the order of Baron Allerno.{nl}The magic circle blocks the strange energy in this region and supplies the magical power onto this generator.{nl}But, since the power of the magic circle is weak, we need to enhance it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005645
text: {nl}The true Revelator would find the way to enhance the magic circle just by looking at it.{nl}Take the bottles since you may need them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005646
text: The power generator works by using the grains that are piled up at the storage over there.{nl}That's why I needed them a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005647
text: {nl}The tenants are cooperating with us without any resistance.{nl}...Anyways, I am worried since that storage gets attacked by the monsters frequently these days.{nl}I guess that's not strange since we piled up the grains like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005648
text: I can only say it's the power generator that helps the important gate which connects the two places to stay open.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005650
text: What is that? Is that the head part of the sculpture? Give it to me. I got something to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005651
text: This is the upper body part of the sculpture. Give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005652
text: That's the lower body part of the sculpture...?{nl}Give it to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005653
text: They are the wings of the sculpture.. Can you give them to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005654
text: Thank you for saving me.{nl}I am going to return now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005655
text: No matter how many times you ask, there are not many things I can tell you. {nl}But, where did the villagers go? I don't see any familiar faces..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005656
text: What? A person came out from the sack? What the hell?{nl}I really don't know anything. How could I know anything? I came from a different farm.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005657
text: You've done a good job.{nl}I will report separately, so just go on your way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005658
text: This land is too infertile and the monsters have taken all the seeds.{nl}Can you find the seeds that the monsters took?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005659
text: You haven't gotten enough of the seeds back yet.{nl}I am sorry, but can you get me some more?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005660
text: I put them well in small bags.{nl}I think the monsters who took them ran away to Tvora Road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005661
text: If I ask the baron to give me seeds again, he may hit me. {nl}The soldiers can't say anything to the baron either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005662
text: Oh, yes. This is it.{nl}Unfortunately, this isn't all that was taken.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005663
text: Now we have enough seeds. {nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005664
text: Where did Manticen hide?{nl}It's about the time that I should feed him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005665
text: {nl}Hmm? Are you new here?{nl}Then you should help my task.{nl}Please find the Manticen who ran away with the food.{nl}He may be near the brewery. I will search that side.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005666
text: I am doing many tasks that the baron told me to do.{nl}Well... something like feeding...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005667
text: If you find it, throw this meat to lure it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005668
text: Hmm? You defeated it since it was trying eat humans?{nl}Ah... okay...{nl}Okay. I will report to the baron.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005669
text: Somehow, I came up front.{nl}It's embarassing.{nl}I am just a tenant here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005670
text: We can make lots of weapons with the leather and the stonese.{nl}Right now, we don't have enough leather.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005671
text: The monsters are perfect to get the materials.{nl}You can also get the leathers from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005672
text: Now we should collect some poison.{nl}It will be used diversely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005673
text: {nl}My grandmother taught me this method.{nl}It is the method to obtain some specific substancees from the things nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005674
text: The farming tools are used to crave the land so they can be also used as weapons.{nl}But, we definitely need the cooperation from the tenant famers...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005675
text: Please extract some Nioles from there.{nl}Niole is a thankful flower.{nl}You can make soups with the grains and they can also be used as herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005676
text: The problem is that the food storage often gets attacked by the monsters.{nl}I have a colleague who is protecting there, but it's always dangerous.{nl}Could you help me a bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005677
text: The food storage is at Vinoga Brewery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005678
text: I am counting on your help with the storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005679
text: I am working for that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005680
text: You've defeated all the monsters that were attacking the storage!{nl}Thanks.{nl}As we were about to attack, the storage keeper hid well since you helped.{nl}I should tell him to protect the storage well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005681
text: Are you the Revelator?{nl}I often hear your stories even when I am in this kind of rural area.{nl}I am removing the magic circles that are stuck in the tenants' farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005682
text: {nl}We are doing this kind of tasks to help Horacius.{nl}Of course, I am doing the tasks for me as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005683
text: I've doing this job til now..{nl}Now, we have about 3 left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005684
text: The seal magic circle that was discovered in the fallow ground.. We should eliminate them.{nl}I can't break them since they have protective barrier.{nl}I will give you the stone of the blessing so try to break it by throwing this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005685
text: There's a magic circle at the entrance of Tarvas.{nl}You should break that first.{nl}But the monsters always disturb it..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005686
text: Now we are almost done!{nl}Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005687
text: It seems that the pieces that he gave to me belong to the statue of the goddess.{nl}This must be... the trace of those barons manipulating something on this ground and breaking it afterwards.{nl}You who collected these...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005688
text: I am collecting the traces here.{nl}I can't tell you in details, but I am preparing for something big.{nl}To do that, I need to persuade the tenant farmers.{nl}So I am collecting those.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005689
text: There's a magic circle before you reach Ramus Intersection.{nl}And the smoke is coming up from the ground.{nl}That's called the strange energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005691
text: Monsters fall into the eternal sleep.. dying..{nl}The monsters die due to the energy that is coming out from there...{nl}The monsters are tiresome and vicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005692
text: {nl}The monsters fall into the eternal sleep due to that energy, that proves that the energy is not bad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005693
text: The amount of the crops after harvesting reduced a lot from some point of time in the past.{nl}Even if we care a lot, the crops wither easily.{nl}I think it may be due to the magic circle that the barons created on this land.{nl}Could you help me out?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005694
text: {nl}That's why the amount of the crops was reduced.{nl}I am trying to find the reason for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005695
text: This magic circle has some kind of protective barrier so it's not easy to break it.{nl}So I am trying to light it up.{nl}To break the shield, I should maintain the flame.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005696
text: {nl}Should we kill those orange Dandells and throw kindlings on them?{nl}Try it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005697
text: The barons are pludering a lot these days and the magic circles like that have been created a lot across this region. Some of them are less shiny.{nl}Anyways, you get hurt from the ones that shine more so it's hard to eliminate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005698
text: You came at the right time. I connected the pieces with some sticky stuff.{nl}...As I expected. This is a Goddess Statue.{nl}I could only glue them like this with my skill... It will break again if I don't do it well.{nl}I am sorry that I just glued them like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005699
text: {nl}Hey, take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005700
text: Oh really?{nl}Very well done!{nl}Too bad about the statue.. but the goddesses would forgive this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005701
text: There's a uncompleted seal magic circle down there.{nl}The seal is not complete yet so the strange energy is coming out from it, but the problem is that it doesn't look like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005702
text: {nl}It is suspicious.{nl}I have to connect these pieces, so can you find out more about the energy?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005703
text: To accomplish a big task...{nl}You should first collect the clues.{nl}You can only persuade the tenant farmers with them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005704
text: The crops aren't growing... There aren't anything to eat..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005705
text: The enhancement of the magic circle and the magical power supply are closely related to each other.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005706
text: We are keep going to do the task to find ours and let the truth spreads.{nl}But, your task will end here.{nl}You can go on your way.{nl}I really thank you for helping us this far.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005707
text: Revelator.{nl}We are now ready.{nl}Now, we are going to do our work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005708
text: Well then, I will be inside your little pocket now.{nl}Don't forget. Trust no one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005709
text: The Goddess wants you to eliminate all demons in the prison.{nl}The demons became unforgivable creatures after Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005710
text: But, since the demons are coming through the space of the metastasis, it's not going to be easy.{nl}You should resist the demons that are trying to free the Demon Lord, Blut.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005711
text: This place is not the world of humans or the demons' world, but it is another isolated place.{nl}We've locked the demons in this prison that are not helpful in this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005712
text: It was like that before Medzio Diena, but the circumstances have changed a lot.{nl}We now have reasons to destroy the demons. They caused Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005713
text: But, it's not easy since the space of metastasis is keep enlarging.{nl}The demons are keep coming through the space of the metastasis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005714
text: Lots of demons are gathering at Rituala to paricipate the ritual to free Blut.{nl}Please first defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005715
text: The servants of the Demon Lord, Blut are trying to escape from here by breaking the power of the barrier.{nl}}Hauberk's help will be useful this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005716
text: Well done. You have prevented the worst case scenario.{nl}Now it is time to stem Demon Lord Blut's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005717
text: At last, I meet the one whom my spirit has been looking for.{nl}I am the Demon Lord Hauberk. I have a proposal for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005718
text: Please help me to get back a part of my spirit.{nl}In return I will tell you the location of Vakarine, the goddess of the Night Star...{nl}This should be an interesting proposal for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005719
text: Alright. The deal is established.{nl}Do not worry. I won't hurt you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005720
text: Strange.{nl}Unlike other humans, I can't possess your body.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005721
text: I do not have any other choice then. Take my seal fragment and go in there.{nl}I will guide you from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005722
text: Now, Zydrone is holding Blut.{nl}But, I don't know how much we can endure by ourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005723
text: We should somehow reduce the influence of the Demon Lord, Blut.{nl}Please take the secreting gland of Blut away from Blut's allies at Bjaurer Hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005724
text: He was the head of the demons that are locked in this district.{nl}They were trying to control this prison somehow and looking for chances to escape from here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005725
text: Actually, Blut told the others proudly that Hauberk turned out like that because of him.{nl}There were followers to the demons that were increasing their influence and Hauberk was leading all that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005726
text: Blut thought that Hauberk was being presumptuous so he told about it to Giltine.{nl}That's why he got ripped off by Helgasercle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005727
text: Vakarine and the other Kupoles are also having hard time.{nl}Let's finish our task here fast and go to a different district to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005728
text: This will be a great help to Zydrone.{nl}I will eliminate these. Blut should feel like he's lost his senses right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005729
text: To defeat the Demon Lord Blut completely, our power is not enough.{nl}I didn't want to do this before, but let's try getting some help from Hauberk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005730
text: There's something which Blut stored his power in at the altar at the Concentrated Management Area.{nl}Only demons can control it, but we have Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005731
text: After Hauberk absorbs that power, please go help Zydrone right away.{nl}To Nuzikalti Hall. Hurry. We don't have much time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005732
text: We are the attendants who are serving the goddesses.{nl}Our work differs depending on which goddess we serve.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005733
text: Our original task was to manage and supervise the prison.{nl}Now, with Vakarine's control, our task is to close the dimensional crack and defeat the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005734
text: The power of the demons reject the power of the goddesses.{nl}This role completely depends on Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005735
text: So you are the one who Vakarine mentioned.{nl}Good. The goddess will lead the everything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005736
text: I've locked Blut in the barrier of the prison, but he won't endure there for long time.{nl}We should attack all at once. Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005737
text: If we weren't able to defeat Blut here, Vakarine may have fallen down together.{nl}Hurry to the 2nd District. Medeina is waiting there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005738
text: Damn. The demons that lost their leader, Blut is trying to escape to the outer world.{nl}If they succeed on breaking the weak part of the barrier, a catastrophe would result.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005739
text: The area where the influence of the goddesses could reach is getting smaller.{nl}We should somehow help out the Goddesses..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005740
text: Well done.{nl}If the demons come out to the outer world, a catastrophe would result.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005741
text: The human expedition team actually came here.{nl}But, unfortunately, they all died.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005742
text: I want to calm their spirits by finding their belongings.{nl}But, it's not easy since the demons are carrying them like their booties.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005743
text: Humans should not come here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005744
text: Thank you. {nl}I hope there are no more sacrifices like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005745
text: Kupole Medeina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005746
text: We are in a trouble.{nl}The barrier of the Goddess is breaking due to the mighty power of the Demon Lord, Nuaele.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005747
text: Aldona went to face against Nuaele since he wants to resist some more.{nl}If you could reduce the mighty power of Nualele a bit... It will help Aldona a lot!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005748
text: The barrier of the goddess is like a great wall surrounding this prison.{nl}It will block the demons coming into the prison or escaping from here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005749
text: The dimensional crack started was created on the barrier due to Medzio Diena.{nl}Vakarine is having hard time since she should maintain the barrier and face the demons at the same time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005750
text: Please hurry to the 1st District before the demons meet Nuaele. {nl}I want you to eliminate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005751
text: Goddesses.{nl}Please protect Aldona..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005752
text: Well done.{nl}Since you've defeated many demons and their power will be reduce a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005753
text: Nuaele is luring his subordinates and spreading his influence with the pieces of the seal of Hauberk.{nl}Hauberk should feel something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005754
text: There are more methods to increase the power of Hauberk using that.{nl}Hauberk would also want that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005755
text: Nuaele was in fact not that strong of a Demon Lord.{nl}But, after obtaining the seal piece of Hauberk, he spread his influence at a astonishingly fast pace.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005756
text: After losing his master, Hauberk's subordinates started to follow him who has the piece of the seal.{nl}They are like betrayers to Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005757
text: Hauberk is retriving his manes that he gave to his subordinates as a symbol of their faithfulness.{nl}Now, go to the 2nd isolated area. They must be gathered there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005758
text: The subordinates of Hauberk are still following Nuaele as if he is Hauberk.{nl}But, if Hauberk retrieves his manes, they will know who is their true master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005759
text: Now, the Demon Lord, Nuaele would know it.{nl}In order to escapse from this prison, he should not only rely on his subordinates.{nl}But, its too late now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005760
text: By the way, Nuaele's behavior is somewhat strange.{nl}In fact, with the power that he accumulated secretly for a long time, he may just break the barrier and go out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005761
text: But, for us, we are waiting for someone that we don't know. {nl}I guess we should interrogate the subordinates of Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005762
text: I will give you the marbles that I received from the Goddess.{nl}We, Kupoles can't do it, but since Hauberk is a demon, he would be able to read our mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005763
text: When the power of the goddesses get weak, the mighty power of us, Kupoles also get weak.{nl}Furthermore, trying to disturb the minds of the demons, it's impossible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005764
text: He was thinking about changing the prison into his demonic world from the first place.{nl}If this place falls under the hands of him, even Ausrine can't do anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005765
text: Since we've found out Nuaele's intention, we should be moving fast.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005766
text: How about we first attack * monster at the 4th isolated area?{nl}If we could defeat it, it's like we are defeating one of the strongest weapons of Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005767
text: Hauberk was once the strongest Demon Lord who led the largest army.{nl}After he was sealed, I thought no one as strong as him would appear again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005768
text: However, Nuaele is imitating Hauberk as if she is the original with the fragment of his seal.{nl}He became the strongest Demon Lord at least in this district.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005769
text: You now see the end of someone who tried to use another's power instead of using his own.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005770
text: He was in fact the subordinate of Hauberk. Hauberk won't need him anymore.{nl}After Hauberk was sealed, he ran to Nuaele and handed over the seal piece to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005771
text: Nuaele is disappeared, but his ramnents are gathering at the 1st isolated area.{nl}They are going to continue his mission. Get rid of those demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005772
text: You have to be more careful.{nl}Hauberk and Nuaele became symbolic figures to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005773
text: Many demons came here through the dimensional crack to support the Demon Lord here.{nl}It will be the same in other places as well. Thanks to you we now have peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005775
text: If it continues like this, the demons will stand up again.{nl}Help us so that the demons that are locked in the prison do not look down on us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005776
text: The demons look down on us.{nl}It will take a long time before the rules here get established here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005777
text: I will pass these necklaces to the sisters myself.{nl}May the Goddesses protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005778
text: Nuaele is having the ritual ceremony to summon the demons in his district.{nl}But, all of his arms are legs are disconnected so its going to be easy to defeat him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005779
text: Meet Aldona. {nl}He would take you to the area of Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005780
text: Without Aldona's help, you will never enter the area of where Nuaele resides.{nl}You should seek for guidance from Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005781
text: Nuaele's behavior was something that can't be accepted.{nl}If he stayed quietly, he would have been forgiven.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005782
text: Let's go to District 3.{nl}Vakarine is waiting for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005783
text: Hauberk and the savior.{nl}With help from you, I can now punish the Demon Lord, Baltrus.{nl}But the threat of the space of the metastasis still exists.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005784
text: My poor Dionys..{nl}I will remove the strong power that is controlling her and close the space of the metastasis.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005785
text: Complete the Evening Star Key by helping Zydrone.{nl}With that key, you will be able to remove the power from Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005786
text: The strong power that we tried to protect from Baltrus is controlling the ego of Dionys.{nl}Fortunately, that power can be detached and be put in the key of the night star.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005787
text: Plese close the space of the metastasis that are on the scar of the metastasis first.{nl}Because of the waves coming out from the space, I can't hardly focus on the ritual.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005788
text: We don't know exactly what is the strong power that is controlling Dionys.{nl}We just know that it could close the space of the metastasis and it should not be stolen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005789
text: While the goddess was maintaining the barrier of the prison, she also had to fight against Baltrus at the same time.{nl}If the goddess gets defeated, that power can't be protected..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005790
text: The Goddess had to make a hard decision.{nl}Until the prison gets stabilized, she will seal the power to Dionys who is like family to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005791
text: Dionys is the guardian who Vakarine most takes care.{nl}She reluctantly sealed the strong power to Dionys and fell into the deep sadness..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005792
text: We can start the ritual now.{nl}When the Evening Star Key is completed, we could probably retrieve his ego.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005793
text: We could go to Orualma grand corridor to put the power of the Goddess into the key of the night star.{nl}As I am charging the key, please protect me from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005794
text: It's all completed. Please hand over this key to Aldona.{nl}Aldona is blocking the attacks of Dionys so please hurry up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005795
text: Soon.. We would collapse.{nl}Dionys is too strong to face against by us, Kupoles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005796
text: Vakarine saved some power to prepare for the worst outcome.{nl}With the key of the night star, please unleash the seals of Rewalda, Kasa and Rada Seals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005797
text: The problem is the time.{nl}If you are late, Vakarine can't do anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005798
text: The power of the Goddesses is accumulating at the magical suppressor.{nl}We are now all ready. And we have enough time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005799
text: We will now remove the power from Dionys.{nl}If we fail, Dionys may escape from here with the power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005800
text: It's going to bring the same result like unleashing tens of Demon Lords.{nl}You should approach it carefully. Tell me when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005801
text: The direction where Hauberk ran away is District 4 where Daiva is protecting.{nl}First, go back to the Goddess. I will take care of Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005802
text: Savior. You are now ready to know the truth.{nl}The reason why I am just leaving Hauberk like that is because he too is the key to close the space of the metastasis.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005803
text: The power that he took away from Dionys is called the chain of revivification.{nl}He was planning to close the space of the metastasis using that chain and the spirit of Hauberk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005804
text: But since you are here, it's not too late.{nl}The District 4, the place where he ran away to is like a maze. Daiva will be able to chase after him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005805
text: How come Vakarine left Hauberk to go crazy like that..{nl}I guess she must have a reason for that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005806
text: Even if we defeat Baltrus, that doesn't mean we have peace in this prison.{nl}The demons who lost their leader is going crazy here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005807
text: His subordinates are keep gathering at the grand corridor of Orualma. {nl}Please defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005808
text: We, Kupoles are different.{nl}Even if the goddesses are not around, we don't get violent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005809
text: We are the symbol of the rules and the principles.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005810
text: The Goddesses rest at the grand corridor and recover her power.{nl}That's why it has to be safe all the time from the demons. Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005811
text: Dionys is weak.{nl}If you could find his toenails, he will recover his energy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005812
text: There are many demons who ran away after getting attacked by Dionys near Rewalda seal.{nl}You may find the toe nails of Dionys from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005813
text: Dionys was originally the normal creature from the human world.{nl}Vakarine accepted him who was playing with the demons violently.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005814
text: Now he is the most faithful guardian of Vakarine.{nl}He lost his consciousness due to that power, but he must be suffering a lot himself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005815
text: Vakarine will recover fast when Dionys recovers.{nl}There are many things for Dionys to do other than that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005816
text: Thanks. {nl}This will greatly help Dionys who is very weak at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005817
text: When Dionys lost his ego, the Rada Seal risked breaking down.{nl}Fortunately, he regained his consciousness before that, but he could not save the Mark of Star.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005818
text: Please collect the pieces of the symbol of the star that are scattered near Rada Seal.{nl}It will help the Goddess to recover her power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005819
text: Dionys' power is astonishing.{nl}Even th violent Baltrus were busy running away instead of touching him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005820
text: Thanks. {nl}If the Goddesses recover, Dionys would also recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005821
text: Hauberk just passed here.{nl}I am sure that he is trying to break the barrier of the Goddess who hasn't been fully recovered and escape by breaking the barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005822
text: The barrier at the Nebilau Broken District is most weak so he must have went there.{nl}Hurry and follow him. I will block the route.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005823
text: Now, Hauberk is risking everything he's got.{nl}Now is the only chance that he can restore everything about him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005824
text: Anything Hauberk tries won't be effective.{nl}Let's keep pressuring him, and chase him to the very end.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005825
text: It seems that Hauberk's servants are coming again.{nl}I think he's trying to deceive us by giving the fragments of his soul to his servants, but that's also what we want.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005826
text: Please collect the pieces of the spirit by defeating the subordinates of Hauberk at the internal isolated area.{nl}Our objective is to collect more pieces of his spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005827
text: I will chase after Hauberk while I am collecting the fragments of his soul.{nl}Let's meet in front of Idinga Solitary Confinement.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005828
text: Even if Hauberk does something, this is inside the prison.{nl}As long as we are chasing, Hauberk could never run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005829
text: Well done. {nl}They might have succeeded in slowing us down, but they did not buy themselves much time at all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005830
text: They are trying to escape by borrowing the bodies of his subordinates. {nl}Let's keep searching by defeating the demons that contains Hauberk. Until he gives up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005831
text: Please take this Night Star Spectral Orb.{nl}We can find Hauberk easily with this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005832
text: I will push Hauberk to the single path where he won't be able to run away.{nl}If he tries to give up and run away, I will block here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005833
text: Don't worry too much even if he runs away.{nl}It's going well as planned.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005834
text: Success!{nl}No more escaping.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005835
text: We will start the hunting from now on.{nl}There is only single path in front so Hauberk would resist hard.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005836
text: Push Hauberk into Galutin Solitary Confinement.{nl}Don't worry since Sigita is blocking Hauberk's exit at the opposite side.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005837
text: Hauberk is like a rat that has no where to hide.{nl}Tell me when you are ready to attack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005838
text: Well done. We will take the sealed Hauberk and the strong power to the Goddess.{nl}The Goddess is waiting at the District 5 in the prison. Please hurry up to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005839
text: We've got Hauberk, but the problem is their subordinates.{nl}We don't know what they will do in the future.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005840
text: Hauberk's remnant forces are gathering again at the Aklaga Isolation Area.{nl}I want you to get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005841
text: The dimensional crack is the problem.{nl}There weren't this many low-class demons before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005842
text: Thank you. {nl}I will stay here and pursue the remaining demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005843
text: Some of Hauberk's servants ran away to Ishidevi Hideout. {nl}They are probably hoping for a revival, like Nuaele's. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005844
text: We cannot let that happen again. {nl}Please defeat the demons around the Ishidevi Hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005845
text: Leaving Nuaele alone just because it was trapped was a source of trouble. {nl}We paid a big price for that lesson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005846
text: Good work. {nl}I will track down every last demon so that they can't resist against the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005847
text: The Goddess may disagree but we need to show them a lesson. {nl}Can you defeat the demons in Hradeti Crossroads and get their teeth?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005848
text: The demons need to learn their lessons. {nl}It's rather gentle compared to what they did.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005849
text: Thank you. {nl}Please keep it a secret from the Goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005850
text: It was with your help that we made it until here. {nl}The prisons will no longer be threatened by the demons anymore. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005851
text: We will perform the ritual for closing the gap so better be prepared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005852
text: The waves of the dimensional crack have become stronger than ever. {nl}We can no longer fill it with Hauberk's soul alone. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005853
text: I feel heavy-hearted to keep burdening you. {nl}But this is something only you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005854
text: We will add the power of demons to the sealed soul of Houvberg. {nl}I will give you the Evening Star Rune but it is not in its complete state.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005855
text: Please defeat the demons in Aushra Chapel and collect the traces of the crossover. {nl}It will be an important tool for collecting the power of demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005856
text: There is something I realized after meeting you. {nl}That I should have accepted Laima's warning in the first place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005857
text: You've gathered enought to fill the Evening Star Rune. {nl}You can use this to draw soul of demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005858
text: Here. Take the Evening Star Rune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005859
text: Use the Evening Star Rune on the demons in Rankine Isolation District and incapacitate them. {nl}The demons will then be pulled to me by the power in the Runes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005860
text: From here, I will combine those demons with the soul of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005861
text: A goddess and a demon cannot easily interfere with each other's souls. {nl}Only a Revelator like you can do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005862
text: Good work, Revelator. {nl}The demons you sent are being combined with soul of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005863
text: We still need more of demons' souls. {nl}Please use the Evening Star Rune on the demons in Ishsula Ruins Area too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005864
text: Then the Kupoles will go to collect them..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005865
text: The dimensional crack is connected with the demon's world so it can't be removed without the power of the demons. {nl}That is why your role, not the goddess' nor the demons', is important.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005866
text: Now it's almost full. {nl}But I can't feel any more demons to gather.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005867
text: We have no choice but to resort to the last measure. {nl}Retrieve the Mark of Seal that was fastened on the powerful demons. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005868
text: The Mark of Seal absorbs the power of its host. {nl}You can get it by using the Evening Star Rune on the demons in Etmesta Isolation District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005869
text: We couldn't watch every demon by its side. {nl}So we used the Mark of Seal to prevent their powers to manifest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005870
text: Good work. {nl}These Marks can strengthen the soul of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005871
text: We have gathered enough power to close the gap. {nl}Please look out while me and the Kupoles close the gap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005872
text: The disaster that took its root in the prison is now gone. {nl}All credits belong to you, Revelator. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005873
text: I plan to stay here for some time. {nl}If you need the power of a goddess, you may come anytime for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005874
text: With the gap closed, the demons that lost its way are forming groups of their own. {nl}But I no longer have the strength to move for the time being. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005875
text: The demons should never stay in groups, not for the future. {nl}Please break the power of demons that are gathered in Vanaga Surveillance Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005876
text: The demons are using the aura of disaster to strengthen its powers. {nl}We may have blocked immediate disaster but peace still seems to be far away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005877
text: If I don't pay attention just for a while, the gap will open again. {nl}I hope you find Laima as soon as you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005878
text: We were able to find Dionys with your help but he's slow recovery is causing him too much pain. {nl}Can you get the empty souls from the demons in Pasaga Isolation Area?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005879
text: If Dionys recovers, the prison can be stabilized even if I'm not here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005880
text: Thank you. {nl}If Dionys recovers, it will all be thanks to you. {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005881
text: Small gaps are forming in places where my power is not reached. {nl}Even the Kupoles are focused in stabilizing process so there is no one to close the gap in Gavara Isolation Area. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005882
text: Can you take the role for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005883
text: I bear debt to Zydrone and Aldona, and even you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005884
text: Thank you, Revelator. {nl}If all powers are restored, I will take all measures possible to block the gaps from forming.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005885
text: It's done. {nl}I hope it works.. Can you give this meat to the pilgrim down below? {nl}{nl}You must feed him until he's satisfied. {nl}It's all the meat that you got. 15 pieces, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005886
text: Do I still look like a stone in your pouch.. {nl}You think this Hauberk will fall just like that!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005887
text: You were all in this together from the start.. {nl}I was foolish.{nl}But do you think you can take on my powers now!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005888
text: About why the Revelators are treated well

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005889
text: I can do that much

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005890
text: Reject dirty works

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005891
text: About the lacking manpower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005892
text: I will bring it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005893
text: It's scary so leave the place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005894
text: About why he was in the sack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005895
text: I have some more questions to ask

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005896
text: About the relationship of guards and farmers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005897
text: Waking up/KICKBOX/0.5/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005898
text: That much, I can help

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005899
text: I'm busy so I'll pass

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005900
text: Checking the magic circle/LOOK_SIT/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005901
text: Notice/!/Destroy the jewel to strengthen the magic circle #10

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005902
text: Notice/!/Collect the evil force of monsters in the empty bottle that Rimas gave you then bury it beside the magic circle!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005903
text: About the Spell Power device and crops

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005904
text: Checking the warehouse/LOOK/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005905
text: Checking the magic circle/LOOK_SIT/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005906
text: Spraying poison/STANDSPINKLE/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005907
text: Check the magic circle/LOOK_SIT/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005908
text: Notice/!/Bring the monsters near the magic circle and kill it!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005909
text: Notice/!/Defeat the monsters then destroy the box!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005910
text: Notice/!/Make a wooden hammer to open the liquor barrel!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005911
text: Is there anything I can help you with?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005912
text: I have a long way ahead so I will get going now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005913
text: About what you are doing here

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005914
text: About the things you are preparing for

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005915
text: Lighting fire/FIRE/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005916
text: Positive Evidence (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005917
text: Placing the Goddess Statue on the magic cicle/SITGROPE_LOOP/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005918
text: Notice/Go the the field and check the crops!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005919
text: About the leader's role

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005920
text: I will get the leather

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005921
text: I will get the cooperation of tenat farmers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005922
text: I will get going now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005923
text: Are there many cases like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005924
text: I will get rid of it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005925
text: I'm scared. I don't want to

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005926
text: Kicking the fence/KICKBOX/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005927
text: Completed Preparations

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005928
text: Listen to the story

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005929
text: Done enough

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005930
text: I won't deal with the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005931
text: I will do that

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005932
text: About the Demon Prison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005933
text: About Demon Lord Blut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005934
text: About the Kupoles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005935
text: All prepared

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005936
text: Notice/Go to Demon Prison 2nd Area and meet Kupole Medeina!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005937
text: Tell me how I can help

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005938
text: About the barrier of the goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005939
text: That sounds dangerous

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005940
text: About Demon Lord Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005941
text: I will help the interrogation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005942
text: Everything will be alright

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005943
text: About Hauberk and Nuaele's relationship

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005944
text: I will remove the small gap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005945
text: About the powerful strength

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005946
text: I will make sure to protect it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005947
text: I don't think I can handle it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005948
text: It doesn't sound like a good idea

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005949
text: I'm not sure if I can take down all those demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005950
text: Let's begin the ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005951
text: I will collect the Traces of Transference

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005952
text: I will collect the Mark of Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005953
text: I will defeat those demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005954
text: I will look for keepsakes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005955
text: I will get back the necklace

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005956
text: I will defeat the rampaging demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005957
text: I will retrieve the claws

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005958
text: About Dionys

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005959
text: I will collect the Marks of Star

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005960
text: I don't have for that

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005961
text: I might be scolded by the goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005962
text: Everything will be alright

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005963
text: He'll be cured soon

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005964
text: I need some more time

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005965
text: Go to Sergeant Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005966
text: Sergeant Tadas says there isn't enough rope to tie the sacks of grain. {nl}Hunt the monsters and gather tough rope.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005967
text: Give it to Sergeant Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005968
text: Gathered enough rope. Give it to Sergeant Tadas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005969
text: Get %s from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005970
text: Talk to Sergeant Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005971
text: Sergeant Tadas still has some favors left to ask you. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005972
text: Clean up the sacks of garbage at Tvora Road

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005973
text: Sergeant Tadas says there is a place where sacks of garbage are gathered and asked you to take care of it. Go there and push the garbage down the cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005974
text: Check out the suspicious sack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005975
text: Talk to the man inside the sack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005976
text: A man came out of the sack! Talk to him to find out what's happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005977
text: Check out the grassland

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005978
text: Return to Sergeant Tadas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005979
text: Talk to Soldier Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005980
text: Get Scorpio Venom from Soil of Arable

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005981
text: You need to extract venom to make nutritious tonic. Defeat the sleeping Scorpio and extract its venom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005982
text: Deliver to Soldier Stepas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005983
text: Collected enough Scorpio Venom. Give the venom to Soldier Stepas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005984
text: Collect Sweet Herb

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005985
text: Soldier Stepas asked you to get Sweet Herb so that it will be easier for Dalius to drink the the Nutritious tonic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005986
text: Give the tonic to Dalius at Shlake Trail

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005987
text: Give tonic to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005988
text: Soldier Stepas asked you to put Sweet Herb in the Nutritious Tonic and deliver it to Dalius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005989
text: Dalius is acting strangely after drinking the Nutritious tonic. You better report it to Soldier Stepas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005990
text: Give unspoiled bread to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005991
text: Marius asked you to give the bread to his brother, Dalius. If the bread spoils on the way, throw it away and get the bread again from Marius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005992
text: Deliver it to Dalius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005993
text: Arrived at Dalius with the bread still good. Give the bread to Dalius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005994
text: Delivered the bread. Talk to Dalius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005995
text: Dalius says there is a weird smoke nearby which seems to be causing food to spoil. Remove that smoke on the way back to Marius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005996
text: Removed the irritating things. Tell Marius about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005997
text: Get the seeds back at Tvora Road

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005998
text: The monsters stole the seeds. Get the Seed Bags back from the monsters around Baron Allerno's territory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_005999
text: Give the seed pouch to Marius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006000
text: Obtain %s from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006001
text: In order to strengthen the magic circle, you need to bring the monsters close to the magic circle and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006002
text: Open the box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006003
text: It's strange to see a box in this area. Go and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006004
text: Destroy the box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006005
text: The monsters appeared to interfere when you tried to open the box! Avoid the monsters' attacks and open the box within time limit!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006006
text: A small piece that looks like it's from the top of a statue is in the destroyed chest. Take it to someone to find out what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006007
text: Destroy the box

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006008
text: Yoana wants to check what the force flowing out of a certain area is. Reduce the monsters' HP to below 50% then try to see how it reacts to the strange force below the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006009
text: Bring the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006010
text: Jonas wants the power of the goddess. It seems like Yoana has the answer to the goddess' power. Go and meet Yoana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006011
text: Place the Goddess Statue in the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006012
text: Place the Goddess Statue you got from Joana on the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006013
text: Check the crops

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006014
text: Both the magic circle and Goddess statue disappeared when you placed the statue on the magic circle. Check what happened to the crops that Jonaris was worried about and tell Jonaris about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006015
text: Tell Jonaris that the magic circle and statue broke and whent he magic circle disappeared, the crops turned back to normal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006016
text: Find the leather

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006017
text: Gather the leather Horacius needs for the rebellion. You can get it from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006018
text: Give the leather to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006019
text: Pull out and bring Niolle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006020
text: Tauras is currently in charge of the food supplies for rebellion. Pull out and take Niolles to help him. Be careful as Niolles need to be compelte with roots in order for it to be used as food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006021
text: Gathered enough Niolle. Bring it to Tauras.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006022
text: Talk if you can help with anything else.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006023
text: Destroy the seal magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006024
text: Seal magic circle was found in fallow ground. But if you touch the seal magic circle, it inflicts damage. Use the stone that Albina gives you to throw it to break the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006025
text: Seems like Horacius has something to say. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006026
text: Listen to Horacius' story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006027
text: We've decided to side with Hauberk until we find and rescue Goddess Vakarine. Now bring Hauberk and head to the 1st District of Demon Prison!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006028
text: Defeat the demons performing the ritual

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006029
text: Kupole Audra asked you to defeat the demons performing rituals for the escape of Blut in Rituala Assembly Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006030
text: Interefered with the ritual. Go back and report to Kupole Audra in Demon Prison jail area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006031
text: Get secretion of Blut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006032
text: Kupole Audra says we need to weaken Blut's influence. Steal Blut's secretion from the demons in Viejauler basecamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006033
text: Give them to Kupole Audra

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006034
text: Stole all the secretions from demons. Give it to Kupole Audra in Demon Prison jail area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006035
text: There is still work left to do in order to face Blut. Talk to Kupole Audra.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006036
text: Help Hauberk absorb Blut's powers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006037
text: Kupole Audra says the power gathered by Blut can only be controlled by Hauberk. Help Hauberk absorb the power of Blut from the Blut Altar in Concentrated Management Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006038
text: Hauberk successfully absorbed Blut's powers. Go and help Kupole Zydrone in Nuzikalti Hall.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006039
text: Punishment of the Demon Lord Blut

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006040
text: Prepared to defeat Demon Lord Blut. Help Kupole Zydrone and defeat Blut.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006041
text: Defeated the Demon Lord Blut. Talk to Kupole Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006042
text: Talk to Kupole Medeina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006043
text: Kupole Medeina in Shirtis Surveillance aisle looks very seious. Talk to Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006044
text: Defeat the demon servants of Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006045
text: Kupole Medeina said the barrier of the goddess should be stabilized by extinguishing the Nuaele's power. Defeat Nuaele's demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006046
text: Defeated Nuaele's demons. Go back and report to Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006047
text: Seems like Kupole Medeina has a good idea. Talk to Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006048
text: Some of Nuaele's demons used to be Hauberk's demons who received empowered manes from Hauberk before. Defeat Nuaele's demons in 2nd Isolation Area and get the manes of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006049
text: Retriefe Hauberk's manes. Give it to Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006050
text: Seems like Medeina has something that bugs her. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006051
text: Interrogation of Nuaele's plan

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006052
text: Use Medeina's doctrine crystal on the monsters in 3rd Isolation Area and find out Nuaele's plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006053
text: Found out Nuaele's plans. Tell Medeina about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006054
text: Figured out Nuaele's plans. Ask Medeina on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006055
text: Defeat Nuaele's demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006056
text: Kupole Medeina suggested defeating the strongest and most loyal servant of Nuaele. Defeat the monsters of Nuaele in 4th Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006057
text: Defeated Nuaele's demons. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006058
text: Ready to defeat Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006059
text: Defeat Demon Lord Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006060
text: Meet Kupole Aldona and head to Nuaele's territory to defeat Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006061
text: Defeated Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006062
text: Vakarine says that you need to complete the Evening Star Key to get rid of the power controlling Dionys. Go to Kupole Zydrone to complete the key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006063
text: Remove Small Dimensional Crack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006064
text: Kupole Zydrone asked you to remove the small dimensional cracks that interferes with charging the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006065
text: Removed all the dimensional cracks. Tell Kupole Zydrone about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006066
text: Ready to charge the Evening Star Key. Talk to Kupole Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006067
text: Protect Kupole Zydrone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006068
text: Kupole Zydrone asked you to protect her while she puts in the power of the goddess in the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006069
text: Protected Kupole Zydrone well until the Evening Star Key was charged. Talk to Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006070
text: Kupole Zydrone asked you to deliver the Evening Star Key to Kupole Aldona, who is holding down Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006071
text: Release the Seals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006072
text: Use the Evening Star Key to release the seal of Rearda, Kasa, and Rada to free the power of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006073
text: Released all seals and freed the power of the goddess. Return to Kupole Aldona and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006074
text: Ready to remove the strong power from Dionys. Talk to Kupole Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006075
text: Subdue Dionys for Kupole Aldona to remove the power from Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006076
text: Hauberk took the strong power sealed in Dionys and ran away. Talk to Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006077
text: Hauberk took the strong power sealed in Dionys and ran away. Ask Aldona what to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006078
text: Tell Goddess Vakarine that Hauberk took the power in Dionys and ask what you should do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006079
text: You need to find Hauberk who ran away with the Chain of Reversion. Go to Kupole Daiva in District 4 of Demon Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006080
text: Pursue Demon Lord Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006081
text: Daiva says Hauberk must be after the weakened barrier of the goddess. Defeat Hauberk who is destroying the barrier of the goddess in Nebilau Broken District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006082
text: You lost Hauberk. Talk to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006083
text: You lost Hauberk. Talk to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006084
text: Give them to Kupole Daiva

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006085
text: Collected all of Hauberk's Soul Fragments. Talk to Kupole Daiva in Idinga Solitary Confinement.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006086
text: Kupole Daiva seems to have found where Hauberk could be hiding. Talk to Kupole Daiva in Idinga Solitary Confinement.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006087
text: Use the Night Star Spectral Orb at Idinga Solitary Confinement to find demons containing Hauberk and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006088
