text: Hauberk gave up possession and ran away as a soul. Talk to Kupole Daiva in Idinga Solitary Confinement.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006089
text: Daiva says everything is going as planned. Ask Daiva what you should do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006090
text: Kupole Sigita drove Hauberk to Galutin Solitary Confinement. Talk to Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006091
text: Suppress Demon Lord Hauberk

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006092
text: Prepared to close the dimensional crack. Talk to Goddess Vakarine in Demon Prison District 5.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006093
text: Perform ritual to close the dimensional crack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006094
text: Help Goddess Vakarine in her ritual to close the dimensional crack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006095
text: Goddess Vakarine's power alone can't seem to close the gap. Talk to Goddese Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006096
text: The ritual to close the dimensional crack doesn't seem to go well. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006097
text: Goddess Vakarine told you to collect the Traces of Transference to fill the Evening Star Rune. Defeat the demons in Ausura Chaple and collect the traces.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006098
text: Collected all the Traces of Transference needed. Give them to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006099
text: The Evening Star Rune is ready. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006100
text: Use Evening Star Rune on the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006101
text: Use the Evening Star Rune on the demons gathered at the Lankine Seperation District and suppress them. The demons will go Goddess Vakarine themselves when doing so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006102
text: The Evening Star Rune has made many demons obedient. Talk to Goddess Vakarine again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006103
text: More demon's souls are still needed. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006104
text: Suppress demons using the Evening Star Rune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006105
text: Use the Evening Star Rune to suppress the demons gathered in Ishisula Broken District. The Kupoles will take care of those demons afterwards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006106
text: The Kupoles captured many demons. Return to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006107
text: There should be more ways to gather the souls of demons. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006108
text: Goddess Vakarine asked you to use the Evening Star Rune to dominate the demons in Etmesta Isolation Area and bring the Mark of Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006109
text: Give it to Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006110
text: Gathered all the marks of seal. Give it to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006111
text: Prepared to close the dimensional crack. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006112
text: Protect Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006113
text: You successfully closed the dimensional crack! Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006114
text: Kupole Audra is planning to take care of the rest of the demons. Talk to Kupole Audra.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006115
text: With their commander lost, the demons are trying to escape the Demon Prison. Defeat the demons that are trying to escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006116
text: Defeated the demons trying to escape. Report to Kupole Audra.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006117
text: Kupole Audra still has some favors to ask of you. Talk to Kupole Audra.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006118
text: Gathered all the keepsakes. Give it to Kupole Audra.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006119
text: Demon Lord is gone but his demons are left. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006120
text: Kupole Medeina asked you to defeat the demons left in 1st Isolation Area to stabilize Demon Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006121
text: Defeated the demons of the Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006122
text: Kupole Medeina seems like something's bothering her. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006123
text: Kupole Medeina asked you to find the necklace she lost while fighting the demons in the 4th Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006124
text: Give to Kupole Medeina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006125
text: Acquired all the necklaces. Give it to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006126
text: Seems like Kupole Zydrone needs your hlep. Talk to Kupole Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006127
text: Defeat the demon gone wild

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006128
text: Kupole Zydrone says that the demons that came out of Valtruss' influence became wild and strange. Defeat the demons in Orualma.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006129
text: Defeated the wild demons. Report to Kupole Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006130
text: Kupole Aldona feels pity seeing Dionys in pain. Talk to Kupole Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006131
text: Collect Dionys' Claws

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006132
text: Kupole Aldona says Dionys might recover his strength if you bring back its claws. Find and defeat the demons near Rearda Seal that was attacked by Dionys and get Dionys' claw back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006133
text: Give it to Kupole Aldona

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006134
text: Acquired all of Dionys' claws. Give them to Kupole Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006135
text: Kupole Aldona needs your help. Talk to Kupole Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006136
text: Collect the destroyed Mark of Stars

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006137
text: Kupole Aldona says Dionys was stopped but the Mark of Star was destroyed. Collect the scattered pieces of the Mark of Star near Rada Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006138
text: Collected all the pieces of the Mark of Star. Give them to Kupole Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006139
text: Successfully caught Hauberk but his demons are still left. Talk to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006140
text: Defeat the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006141
text: Kupole Daiva asked you to defeat Hauberk's demons that fled to Aklaga Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006142
text: Defeated all Hauberk's remnant forces. Tell Kupole Daiva about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006143
text: Hauberk's remnants are showing suspicous movement. Talk to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006144
text: Defeat Hauberk's remnant forces

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006145
text: Defeated Hauberk's remnanats in Ishdevi Hermitage. Talk to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006146
text: Seems like Kupole Sigita made an important decision. Talk to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006147
text: Collect Demon's Teeth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006148
text: Kupole Sigita says it's about that we show them a lesson. Defeat the demons that hid in Hradeti Crossroad and collect the demon's teeth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006149
text: Deliver to Kupole Sigita

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006150
text: Gathered all demon's teeth. Give it to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006151
text: Goddess Vakarine spent all her strength in closing the gap and has a favor to ask you. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006152
text: Goddess Vakarine says the demons should not be gathered around for the future. Defeat the demons gathered nearby Vanaga Surveillance area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006153
text: Defeated the demons nearby Vanaga Surveillance area. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006154
text: Goddess Vakarine seems concerned for Dionys in pain. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006155
text: Colleted empty souls. Give it to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006156
text: Seems like there are gaps forming around. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006157
text: Remove the Small Dimensional Crack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150401_006158
text: Removed all transfer gaps. Return to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006159
text: I am the secretary of the farm owner, Baron Allerno. {nl}Lord Allerno wants your help in purifying this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006160
text: Lord Allerno hired wizards to build a laboratory for purifying the farm. {nl}He gave the whole farm for it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006161
text: Everyone is tired because of the strange aura. {nl}But they say that this aura will disappear when the device is complete so we'll be fine soon. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006162
text: The work is simple. {nl}All workers, including me, are feeling very exhausted because of the strange aura. {nl}Please check if it is also affecting the the crops near the Abandoned Farmland.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006163
text: Still not finished yet? {nl}Baron Allerno's expecting a lot from the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006164
text: There is a strange aura right? {nl}But it's not affecting the crops.. That's different from Rimas' story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006165
text: The strange aura is definitely there, so we should get rid of it.{nl}If we just perform the ritual Wizard Rimas told us...{nl}Sorry, I suddenly feel a bit dizzy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006166
text: Oh I'm causing such trouble.. Thank you. {nl}You just have to make a magic circle with the firewood I give you and burn the Shaman doll on top of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006167
text: I want to sit and rest. {nl}But I can't do that as a secretary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006168
text: The crops died when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's okay. I was told that the bad aura within the crops will go away like that. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006169
text: Now things will grow better. {nl}Anyway, if you haven't met the baron, I suggest you do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006170
text: Wizard Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006171
text: Welcome to the farm.{nl}The baron is deeply worried about the contamination of this farm so allow me to welcome you for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006172
text: Worries? Ah, the spells aren't concentrated in power because of the strange aura.{nl}We tried laying a magic circle in every test area but they're weaker than expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006173
text: Oh, this is a very important device. {nl}The portal and the power to retain it.. Oops, forget about what I just said. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006174
text: It is something needed to remove the strange aura in this land. {nl}I'm talking about purification. Isn't it such a problem?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006175
text: Well, how is it going?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006176
text: Thank you. Check the magic circle in the test area first. {nl}If you come across a weird crystal, it's a working magic circle so you only have to remove the weird crystals.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006177
text: But if there is no crystal, then it mean there is a problem. {nl}You just have to gather the evil force of monsters in this bottle and bury it near the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006178
text: Great. {nl}But this isn't the only problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006179
text: That power device works with the energy of nature.{nl}With crops, it'll receive plenty of nature's energy.{nl}But, the monsters there are preying on that warehouse and it might become a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006180
text: Luckily, the tenant farmers are cooperative. {nl}But it's a pain that the monsters are preying on that warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006181
text: The power source needs energy of nature and what do you think can be used right away? {nl}The crops in the warehouse, that is. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006182
text: Don't worry. We'll have a good harvest if we solve the corruption problem. {nl}And if that portal is also maintained.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006183
text: It's the Old Food Storage warehouse site. {nl}After all, there's a pile of crops there, so the monsters could prey on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006184
text: I can't leave this place because I have to guard it. {nl}But I can't make the baron go himself either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006185
text: Now we can have some peace for a while. {nl}We just have to keep that portal.. Hmm, anyway, never mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006186
text: Wait that.. seems like a familiar statue? {nl}Sorry but can I take a look?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006187
text: Ah, right. I forgot about the magic circles at Stishka Farm Road. {nl}Take this and try spraying it. I prepared it before. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006188
text: I had a hard time gathering it from the monsters and refining it. {nl}Don't worry. Even evil auras can be useful, depending on how you handle it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006189
text: (Something doesn't feel right about this liquid...{nl}To enhance the magic circle with this sounds suspicious, but let's give it a try.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006190
text: This is a big problem. Where did it go with the food? {nl}Hey, I'm sorry but can you help find the Manticen? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006191
text: Manticen? Nothing's weird about it. It's a monster. {nl}The baron needs it, so I'm looking after it. It likes food. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006192
text: Don't ask about where it's needed. {nl}It's all for the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006193
text: It might be near the brewery. I will look around that area. {nl}If you find it, throw this meat to lure it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006194
text: Baron Secretary Benius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006195
text: This is tough. {nl}Many might be killed..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006196
text: Hmm? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah... Well then, nevermind. I will report it to the baron.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006197
text: Even in a rural area like this, we have heard about you. {nl}We are preparing to fight against the baron's arrogant plundering. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006198
text: It would be a great support to us if you could help us supply ourselves with weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006199
text: I just happened to take the lead like this. {nl}I'm just a tenant farmer who could no longer stand the baron's exploitation and tyranny.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006200
text: What makes us even more angry is that he is trying to fool us under the guise of purification. {nl}All he does is a disgrace to the goddess' name.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006201
text: Please get some wooden rods from the wooden structures nearby. {nl}We're going to make weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006202
text: We don't know how much we can fight the baron's guards. {nl}But we fight, that will have some meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006203
text: This will be about enough. {nl}I will tell you more later, but if what I suspect is right, the baron betrayed the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006204
text: The baron is said to have ordered the magic circles to be put up around the farm to suppress the strange aura. {nl}But that was a lie. The baron is not interested in purification. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006205
text: Please help us get leather for making weapons. {nl}You can get it from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006206
text: There are strange auras spread all over the farm.{nl}The baron said they were dangerous and gave orders to make magic circles to suppress them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006207
text: But nobody was hurt by the strange aura. {nl}It's ridiculous. Instead, the crops grew rather well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006208
text: We won't just stand by anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006209
text: That will be enough. Thank you. {nl}To be honest, I don't care what the baron wants. {nl}But...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006210
text: I mean even if what the baron wants really is purification. {nl}With my colleagues gone, it's nonsense that I have to bear the expensive farm rent fees.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006211
text: That's what I think. Now... I have to collect poison. {nl}It will be useful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006212
text: I'm not sure if this is his weak point. {nl}But I think something is hidden in the Aqueduct Bridge Area's Restricted Area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006213
text: He's a greedy old man so there must be something. I'm sure of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006214
text: Place the poison pot, lure the monster to it, then kill it. {nl}Bring it to me when enough is collected.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006215
text: I'm sorry for having to ask something like this of you. {nl}But please feel pity on us and help us out a little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006216
text: I'm thinking about borrowing farm tools from the farmers nearby for improvised weapons. {nl}You are a famous Revelator, so it should be fairly easy for you to convince them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006217
text: If you persuade them with the letter I give you, they will understand.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006218
text: So many... Thank you so much. {nl}Oh, and if you have time, I hope you can help my colleagues as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006219
text: I am Horacius' colleague. I'm in charge of the food supplies.{nl}The promised day is coming, but we don't have enough manpower. Can you help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006220
text: We will support Horacius.{nl}Everyone is tired of the unreasonable farm rent fees.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006221
text: The baron secretary used to protect us, but now they're gone...{nl}We have only our own two hands to trust.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006222
text: Then please collect Nioles from Riaum Hill.{nl}We can use them with potatoes to make soup, and they're also used as medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006223
text: Even if the baron did something right, he only did it for himself. {nl}No one can blame us for what we're doing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006224
text: Dried food has a long shelf life.{nl}You'll feel full even when you consume only a small amount of beef jerky.{nl}That's why we're accumulating a lot of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006225
text: The farm rent fees have become a burden recently.{nl}The baron used weird reasons to collect them more often.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006226
text: My colleague even disappeared one day.{nl}Since then, whatever the baron says about purification and all seem like a lie.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006227
text: I believe all this has something to do with the baron.{nl}I want to find out what it is, even if I have to resort to violence.{nl}Horacius agrees too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006228
text: You need to get edible meat from the monsters nearby.{nl}Once we have the meat, you just have to place it in the dryer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006229
text: The point is to get edible meat from the monsters.{nl}Most of them are tough and fishy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006230
text: Thank you very much. {nl}We need to be full to fight well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006231
text: Lastly... The problem is that the monsters frequently prey on the food storage house. {nl}There is a fella guarding that place but it's constanly exposed to danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006232
text: The Food Storage is at Vinoga Brewery.{nl}Do you think it's already too late though?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006233
text: The storage keeper told me to thank you for him.{nl}Oh, and if you see my colleagues asking for help, please help them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006234
text: Are you the Revelator?{nl}News like that reaches us, even out here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006235
text: I'm helping Horacius remove the baron's magic circles.{nl}If it's alright, can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006236
text: The baron said the strange aura is dangerous and told us not to go near it.{nl}But I don't think that's the case.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006237
text: It's actually similar to the aura I felt from the giant statue of Goddess Zemyna in Fedimian.{nl}I wonder if it actually purifies the land instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006238
text: Let's see. Now there are around 3 left. {nl}Darbas Entrance, Padeka Altar, and the Fallow Ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006239
text: The people in this farm used to pray to Goddess Zemyna from the Padeka Altar.{nl}After the baron made magic circles though, the monsters took over that place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006240
text: I can only assume that the monsters were drawn to the magic circle. {nl}The magic circle is suppressing the divine power of the altar..? or something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006241
text: It's a monster called Kirmeleech. {nl}Don't forget to remove the magic circle after defeating the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006242
text: It's been a while since we've offered prayers because of Kirmeleech. {nl}What if the goddess is angry?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006243
text: Good job.{nl}Now we can pray to Goddess Zemyna again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006244
text: The magic circle at Fallow Ground has protective barriers so it's difficult to destroy it right away. {nl}I will give you some Magic Stones of Blessing. Try using these to destroy it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006245
text: I used to take priest lessons before Medzio Diena. {nl}I'm here now because I like farming more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006246
text: You will get hurt if you go near the magic circle rashly. {nl}Be sure to destroy the magic circle using magic stone of blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006247
text: You did it! {nl}Now this farm is back to looking the way it should.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006248
text: This is the last one. {nl}The magic circle in Tarvas Entrance will have a lot of monsters interfering. {nl}With the divine power suppressed, the monsters are naturally drawn to that area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006249
text: The magic circle isn't attracting the monsters, but it's suppressing the divine power.{nl}That's why the monsters are gathering.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006250
text: All the magic circles in this farm are destroyed.{nl}Now we can only hope for Horacius' work to succeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006251
text: This looks like part of the Goddess Statue that used to stand.{nl}Seems like someone destroyed it on purpose... Could it be the baron?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006252
text: You don't look like one of the baron's people at least.{nl}We need help. We want to revive this farm and we'll do whatever it takes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006253
text: The Baron is doing something to purify this farm. {nl}But recently the crops are dying and people are starting to fall sick. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006254
text: I couldn't believe it at first, but if this piece is really from a Goddess Statue.. {nl}Either the baron is lying to us or something is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006255
text: First, I better stick the pieces together. {nl}It may be a little blasphemous but can you get some Sticky Sap from the monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006256
text: I feel like it's soiling the Goddess Statue but I have nothing else so we'll have to settle for that. {nl}The goddess will forgive us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006257
text: Yes. That will be enough. Let me try sticking this together first. {nl}Oh, and one more thing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006258
text: The baron has a bad reputation because of the things he has done. {nl}And for what he's been up to nowadays.. He must be planning on something. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006259
text: Some people say 'the baron is human, after all', so he won't do such things. {nl}So we need to collect clues to persuade them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006260
text: If you head toward the crossroad, you'll see an oddly sparkling smoke. {nl}Attack a monster and take it there before killing it. You might find something out, don't you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006261
text: No results yet? {nl}There should be some reaction whether good or bad if you check using the monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006262
text: Surely suspicious. {nl}If that aura is a bad aura, it wouldn't attack a monster, right? {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006263
text: I've got good evidence thanks to you. {nl}This might be enough to persuade the others. Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006264
text: Varas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006265
text: No matter how much I think about it, the magic circles are the reason the harvest is bad. {nl}It's not purifying the land but rather making it worse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006266
text: Even if this is the baron's order, this is too much. {nl}But what can I do when all I've ever held was a plow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006267
text: This area used to be a fertile land. {nl}But ever since the baron's men made the magic circles, harvests decreased a lot. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006268
text: Purify? That's not even funny. {nl}We farmers know better about this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006269
text: You can remove it by lighting fire with my firewood. {nl}But there is a protective shell so even if you light fire, the fire will easily die out. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006270
text: I think it's better to get kindlings from the Dandels all over the area to keep the fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006271
text: I can't stand paying ridiculous farm rent fees at times like this. {nl}How can he do that, as a human?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006272
text: Did you do it? {nl}That's great. But there are more magic circles.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006273
text: If the magic circles are really a like, then you should be able to remove the magic circles in Talia trails with Goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006274
text: If the magic circles really are for the better, I can just pay more rent and ask for forgiveness. {nl}We'll know for sure if we check with the goddess' power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006275
text: But if it isn't, the baron better be prepared. {nl}He fooled us, harmed the land, and betrayed close friends.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006276
text: Indeed Joana has it. Use that power to remove the magic circle. {nl}Then checking the crops around will confirm it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006277
text: You're just in time. {nl}You said you needed this Goddess Statue, right? Here, take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006278
text: {memo X duplicate line}I used the Sticky Sap to glue the pieces and indeed, it was a Goddess Statue. {nl}But this is all I can do so.. It might break easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006279
text: The magic circle will be a problem whether it's good or bad. {nl}But at least, it's better than begging the baron.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006280
text: I used the Sticky Sap to glue the pieces and indeed, it was a Goddess Statue. {nl}But this is all I can do so.. It might break easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006281
text: Alright. Thank you very much. {nl}At least now we know the magic circle is bad for sure. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006282
text: Anyway, I feel bad for the Goddess Statue being broken, but don't be so discouraged. {nl}The goddess will forgive us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006283
text: If the magic circle can't be removed by the power of the goddess, the baron had better be prepared. {nl}He will probably claim that the power of the goddess is evil. I'll watch what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006284
text: Have you seen the crops pouch the monsters took from me? {nl}Can you please help me find it? I need to pay for the farm rent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006285
text: If I don't pay, I will surely be kicked out this time. {nl}Please help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006286
text: Thank you very much. {nl}I worked so hard to gather it all and they just threw it to the monsters.. Those awful guards..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006287
text: There is an unstable magic circle on the way to Ramus Crossroads. {nl}They say to not go near it because a strange aura flows out from it. But it really doesn't seem so. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006288
text: It's full of suspicious stuff. {nl}I have to glue these pieces together so can you check that aura for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006289
text: Thank you for helping us. {nl}From now on, we won't just stand back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006290
text: I hope the goddess blesses your journey..{nl}Please wish us luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006291
text: Revelator, it is time. {nl}Now we will do what we have to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006292
text: Good work. {nl}With so many demons defeated, her vigor should be softened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006293
text: The servants of Hauberk who lost their commander started to follow her. {nl}They essentially betrayed Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006294
text: It's retrieving the Mark that Hauberk gave his servants as sign of loyalty. {nl}Go to 2nd Isolation Area. They must be gathered there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006295
text: Even now, Hauberk's servants think Nuaele is Hauberk. {nl}But if Hauberk gets back his marks, then they will realize who the real master is. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006296
text: But Nuaele is acting strangely. {nl}With the powers she's been collecting, it's actually enough to break through the barrier. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006297
text: You will need Hauberk's help. {nl}Hauberk is also a demon so he must be able to read the thoughts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006298
text: She planned to make this Demon Prison her demonic world from the start. {nl}If this place falls under her hands, not even Ausrine will be able to do anything about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006299
text: What about striking the monsters in 4th Isolation Area first? {nl}If we defeat them, it will be like gettting rid of Nuaele's strongest weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006300
text: They used to be Hauberk's servants. I'm sure Hauberk doesn't need them anymore. {nl}They ran to Nuaele right away the minute Hauberk was sealed and gave her the Piece of Seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006301
text: Nuaele was eliminated, but the demons at the 4th isolated area are still not following her order.{nl}If you don't eliminate her fragments from them, the demons would move again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006302
text: {nl}We should not let this kind of thing occur again in the future.{nl}Please retrieve the fragments of Nuaele by defeating the demons at the 4th isolated area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006303
text: It will take a long time to re-establish order in the prison.{nl}It will take a long time, just like Nuaele did preparing for now..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006304
text: Thanks. I will break the fragments myself. {nl}I wish the Goddesses protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006305
text: Nuaele is engaged in the ritual to summon the demons in his area at the moment.{nl}However, since his arms and legs are all disconnected, it's going to be easy to defeat him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006306
text: You've eliminated the gigantic space of the metastasis, but there are too many demons that came across so far..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006307
text: We have to use the last method.{nl}Please retrieve the symbols of the seal which was put on the demons that had strong power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006308
text: The symbol of seal would absorb the one's power whose name is engraved on the seal.{nl}You would be able to obtain the power if you defeat the demons at Atmesta isolated area with the runes of the night star.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006309
text: We weren't able to monitor all the demons in the prision.{nl}That's why we engraved the symbol of the seal on them so they can't be found.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006310
text: Well done.{nl}You would be able to enlarge the size of the spirit of Hauberk with these symbols.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006311
text: So the monsters were after this particular piece?{nl}This is also my first time seeing it.. I guess we should check Gaudeji Altar on the right side as well then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006312
text: That's why I lured the demons with the demonic stone..{nl}Those villagers were too hasty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006313
text: We should find out whether that is just a symbol or endowned with some kind of power.{nl}First, I want you to collect the toe nails of Lizardmen from the abandoned grape fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006314
text: Lizardmen are the monsters that appeared a lot after Medzio Diena.{nl}If some kind of power is in this tree, it will definitely react to the toe nails.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006315
text: Revelator, this is astonishing!{nl}After I put the power of the tree into the toe nails of the monster that you brought, it corroded right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006316
text: Now let's see how this sample will react.{nl}I hope it works out well.. You should also see it, Revelator!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006317
text: Until my master comes, I will prepare for a large-scale purification.{nl}Can you collect five bottles of Orange Tama body fluid at the Kvie Farm Area for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006318
text: Right now, the bigger problem we have is the monsters, not the bad harvests.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006319
text: Hey you. Revelator. Don't just look at me. Help me.{nl}Please kick out Lizardmen on my fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006320
text: That's so thankful.{nl}Please get me the leaves that Tama is putting on. I got something to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006321
text: Please look at the lower side of the gravevine at Avarza Grape Farm.{nl}I need the root of it. Please get me three of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006322
text: Please be careful since if you touch the roots accidently, the poison may come out from them.{nl}Or the monsters may come out.{nl}It is a good habit to be careful always.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006323
text: If that's the case, please eliminate all short trees.{nl}Ah, don't forget to bring the evidence as well. I need something to report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006324
text: Are you looking for the druid? Of course I know where he is. {nl}But you know, we soldiers have been collecting rent, and it doesn't seem enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006325
text: The Stumpy Trees are most irritating.{nl}They are violent, and they also look disgusting.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006326
text: Please just defeat the short trees at Zole Farm. {nl}If you could do that, I won't say anything anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006327
text: Listen. I am really sorry, but I don't have any power.{nl}If you don't mind, could you defeat all the Cysts at Zirta Brewery?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006328
text: The soldiers want bribes and the supervisor doesn't care at all, even if something happens to us.{nl}The current owner of this farm, Shaton, takes a lot of rent from us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006329
text: I hid them well without being discovered by the soldiers, but there are monsters roaming.{nl}Is it possible for you to retrieve it back for me? It's at the Farm Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006330
text: Hey, I will give you some of my commission, so are you interested in doing some work?{nl}It's a simple task, just get all the pink root moles that are across the underground tunnels.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006331
text: It's you again. As usual, get rid of all the pink root moles across the underground tunnels.{nl}My men don't want to go there because they don't like the underground tunnels.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006332
text: Please, do continue your work on those moles.{nl}It's almost done, so keep up the good work just little bit more beyond the underground tunnels.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006333
text: Oh goddesses, What have you done?!{nl}I heard the Glass Mole has appeared near the Wind Vane Tower, and it's because of you! You should be responsible for it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006334
text: Do you still think I am the stone in your pocket?..{nl}You think I would be defeated?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006335
text: The identity of the gigantic transformed plant

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006336
text: I will help if it's related to the purification

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006337
text: Tell him to take some rest since you will do it for him

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006338
text: I will help if it's related to the purification

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006339
text: About the power generator in front

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006340
text: Notice/!/Some strange essence came out from the magic circle. Get rid of the strange essence.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006341
text: Notice/!/You should collect the magical power of the monsters into the bottles and bury each of them at each end of the magic circle.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006342
text: I will protect the storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006343
text: About the relationship between the power generator and the grains

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006344
text: The Forgotten Magic Circle (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006345
text: Notice/!/Return to Rimas and report him about the magic circle.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006346
text: Sprinkling murky purifying liquid/STANDSPINKLE/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006347
text: Notice/!/The magic circle wants the monsters strongly!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006348
text: About Manticen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006349
text: Notice/!/It looks like the head of the sculpture.{nl}Dig it from the ground.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006350
text: Digging the head part of the sculpture/SITGROPE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006351
text: Investigating the box/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006352
text: Notice/!/The monsters are suddenly rushing in!{nl}Defeat the monsters and break the box!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006353
text: Notice/!/If you open it carelessly, the objects inside it may break.{nl}Please make a wooden hammer that would open the alcohol container!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006354
text: Looking at the wing shaped fragment/LOOK/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006355
text: About the things that are occurring here

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006356
text: I will find it out for him

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006357
text: I will eliminate the magic circle for him

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006358
text: Tell him to leave it since it may be the purification magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006359
text: About the magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006360
text: Joana may have it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006361
text: It won't be here

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006362
text: About the possibility that the magic circle may be for the purification

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006363
text: About the arrogance of the baron

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006364
text: I can't help with such task

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006365
text: I can't agree with that thought

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006366
text: I will try

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006367
text: Tell him that it will be better to do it himself

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006368
text: About the work that you are trying to do right now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006369
text: I will go now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006370
text: I will help

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006371
text: About the strange atmosphere

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006372
text: I will eliminate the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006373
text: Reject since it's scary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006374
text: About the reason that the monster sit down

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006375
text: I don't want to do it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006376
text: About Albina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006377
text: I will destroy the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006378
text: You don't need to listen to it anymore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006379
text: You Can't Fool Me

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006380
text: The Disturbing Monster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006381
text: Managing the Steward's People

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006382
text: Defeat %s who ruined the brewery business

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006383
text: Check the Gaudeji Altar towards the right

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006384
text: Maras didn't know what the piece is, but he told you that there's a similar altar, so check the Gaudeji Altar towards the right.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006385
text: You have found another piece of similar shape at Gaudeji Altar. Meet Lamar as Maras told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006386
text: The land Goddess Austeja used to oversee is full of holy energy. Go to Palama Cliff and put the orb made of ashes near Austeja's altar to recharge its energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006387
text: Arunas, the secretary of the baron is very tired and wants your help. Talk to Arunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006388
text: Arunas, the secretary of the baron wants you to check the strange energy and the crops. Go investigate the place where Arunas pointed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006389
text: There's some strange energy, but it seems nothing special is going on. Tell Arunas that there's nothing special.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006390
text: There's no strange energy as Arunas told you, but Arunas still looks tired. Talk with Arunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006391
text: Start the ritual to eliminate the strange aura

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006392
text: Arunas requested you to do the ritual to eliminate the strange energy. Pile up the magic circle where there's strange energy and burn the spell doll.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006393
text: You burnt the spell doll, but strangely the crops withered. Report this to Arunas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006394
text: Talk to Wizard Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006395
text: Wizard Rimas needs your help. Talk to Wizard Rimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006396
text: Look for the magic circle that needs to be enhanced

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006397
text: Look for the magic circle that needs to be enhanced among the magic circles that are blocking the strange energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006398
text: Eliminate the strange crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006399
text: Strange crystals have come out from the magic circle. This magic circle is working properly so let's just eliminate the strange crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006400
text: Check the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006401
text: You've eliminated the strange crystals. Check the magic circle again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006402
text: Look closely at other magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006403
text: You should find the weak magic circles and enhance them. Look for the magic circles that are not working properly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006404
text: Collect the magical power of the monsters and bury them near the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006405
text: In order to enhance the magic circles, you should put the magical power into the bottles and bury them near the magic circles. Each bottle could only contain one kind of magical power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006406
text: Report to Wizard Rimas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006407
text: You have enhanced the magic circles. Return to Wizard Rimas and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006408
text: Rimas told you that there are lots of other things to care about besides the magic circles. Talk to Wizard Rimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006409
text: Protect the storage from monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006410
text: Wizard Rimas told you that the monsters are going after the storage where the fuel of the power generator is stored. Help Wizard Rimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006411
text: You've defeated the monsters that were about to attack the storage. Tell Rimas about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006412
text: It seems there are more magic circles besides the ones that Wizard Rimas told you about. Get closer to the magic circles to look more carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006413
text: The magic circle is vibrating strangely unlike a while ago. Return to Wizard Rimas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006414
text: Sprinkle the Opaque Purification Liquid on the magic circles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006415
text: Take the Opaque Purification Liquid that Wizard Rimas gave you and pour it on the magic circle. You don't know why an evil aura would enhance the magic circles, but let's get some more information by doing what he told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006416
text: Check the magic circles again

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006417
text: The magic circles will now be enhanced since you sprinkled the Opaque Purification Liquid that Rimas gave to you. Let's take a look at it again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006418
text: When the magic circle was about to be enhanced, the monsters suddenly rushed in! It seems that they are lured to the Opaque Purification Liquid. Go defeat the monsters first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006419
text: This magic circle strongly wants the monsters. Bring the monsters near the magic circles and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006420
text: Talk to Baron Secretary Benius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006421
text: Baron Secretary Benius is looking for something desperately. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006422
text: Search for the Manticen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006423
text: Baron Secretary Benius told you to search for the Manticen near the brewery. Look for Manticen near the brewery with the meats.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006424
text: Report to Baron Secretary Benius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006425
text: You had no other choice, but to defeat Manticen since it was trying to eat a person. Return to Baron Secretary and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006426
text: Investigate the suspicious area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006427
text: An object that looks like the head part of the sculpture is halfway buried under the ground. Go there and dig it out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006428
text: Collect the head of the statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006429
text: It is strange that there is the head of a sculpture in this kind of place. Dig it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006430
text: Investigate the old chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006431
text: You can see the old chest. Get near it and open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006432
text: Break the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006433
text: As you tried to open the chest, monsters appeared and intervened. Avoid the attacks of the monsters and break the chest to open it within the time frame.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006434
text: Investigate the Wooden Wine Cask

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006435
text: It is strange to see the wooden wine cask at the place like here where there aren't not many people around. Go near it and look at it closely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006436
text: Make the wooden hammer and open the wine cask.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006437
text: The wine cask could contain fragile objects, so it should not be carelessly opened. Gather some materials nearby that could be used to make a wooden hammer and open the wine cask.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006438
text: There is a sculpture stuck on the ground that looks like wings. Get closer to it and look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006439
text: Joana remembered something about the fragment. Talk to Joana about the sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006440
text: Obtain some Sticky Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006441
text: Joana wants to glue the sculpture together. Obtain some Sticky Sap from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006442
text: Hand it over to Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006443
text: Acquired the Sticky Sap from the monsters. Hand it over to Joana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006444
text: Collect %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006445
text: Obtain Sticky Sap from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006446
text: It seems that Joana still has some request. Talk to Joana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006447
text: Yoana wants to find out the true nature of the strange energy that exists near the Ramus intersections. Reduce the HP of the monsters in half and take them to the lower side of the magic circles where the strange energy is coming from.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006448
text: The energy may not be bad since the monsters are disappearing. Tell this to Joana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006449
text: Talk to Varas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006450
text: It seems that Varas needs your help. Talk to Varas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006451
text: Destroy Magic Circles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006452
text: Pile up the logs on the magic circle and light them to burn the magic circle. You can increase the life of the fire by using kindling from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006453
text: Report to Varas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006454
text: You've burnt the magic circle successfully. Return to Varas and report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006455
text: Varas told you that there are more magic circles. Talk to Varas again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006456
text: Obtain the Goddess Statue from Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006457
text: Varas told you that you would be able to eliminate the magic circles easily using the mighty power of the Goddesses. Obtain the Goddess Statue from Joana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006458
text: Put the statue of the Goddess on the magic circle at Talia trail.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006459
text: Check the nearby crops

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006460
text: As you put the statue of the goddess on the magic circle, the magic circle disappeared with the Goddess Statue. Check the status of the crops that Varas was worried about.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006461
text: The crops became alive again. With the power of the Goddess Statue, the magic circles have disappeared and the crops became alive again. Report this to Varas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006462
text: Talk to Jugas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006463
text: There's a farmer who needs your help. Talk to Jugas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006464
text: Look for the Sack of Grain

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006465
text: Jugas wants you to retrieve the sacks of grain from the monsters. Look for the sacks of grain from the nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006466
text: Give it to Jugas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006467
text: You've found the Sack of Grain. Give it to Jugas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006468
text: Retrieve the Sack of Grain from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006469
text: Collect the Wooden Rods

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006470
text: Horacius told you that he needs many Wooden Rods to make weapons. Obtain some sticks from the nearby fences.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006471
text: Acquired enough Wooden Rods. Hand them over to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006472
text: It seems that Horacius has many things to do. Talk to Horacius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006473
text: Collect Soft Leather from monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006474
text: Let's collect Soft Leather to help Horacius. You can obtain them from the monsters nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006475
text: Acquired enough Soft Leather. Hand them over to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006476
text: Horacius still has many things to do. Talk to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006477
text: Collect the poison in the pot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006478
text: Put the pot for poison that Horacius gave to you on the ground. Lure the monsters near the pot and defeat them to collect the poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006479
text: Hand over the collected poison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006480
text: Acquired the poison successfully. Hand it over to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006481
text: It seems that Horacius has the last request. Talk to Horacius again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006482
text: Borrow some farming tools from the farmers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006483
text: Horacius told you that he needs many farming tools that will be used as weapons. He can't move since he is changing the tools that he accumulated so far so ask the nearby farmers if you could get some farming tools.{nl}{nl}Horacius told you that since there aren't many weapons, we should fight even with the farming tools. Ask the farmers nearby if you could obtain some farming tools from them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006484
text: Tauras needs you. Talk to Tauras.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006485
text: Collect Uprooted Nioles from Riaum Hill

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006486
text: Tauras told you to pull out Nioles from Riaum Hill. They are valuable as food, and can be used in medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006487
text: Give them to Tauras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006488
text: Acquired enough Niole roots. Take them to Tauras.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006489
text: It seems that Tauras needs more of your help. Talk to Tauras.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006490
text: Hunt for the monsters to get their meat. Put them in the dryer to make beef jerky.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006491
text: Collect the meat

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006492
text: It seems that Tauras has his last request to you. Listen to his request.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006493
text: Protect the food storage at Vinoga Brewery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006494
text: The monsters are trying to steal from the storage where the food is stored. Protect the food storage in Vinoga Brewery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006495
text: You were able to protect the storage before it gets attacked. Tell Tauras that the storage is safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006496
text: Defeat the monsters that are trying to attack the food storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006497
text: Albina needs your help. Talk to Albina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006498
text: Albina needs your help to eliminate the magic circles. Listen for more details from Albina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006499
text: Albina wants you to remove the remaining three magic circles. Talk to her about the magic circle at Padeka altar among them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006500
text: Protect Padeka altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006501
text: Kirmeleech has been lured to the magic circle near Padeka Altar and is sitting on the altar. Defeat Kirmeleech and destroy the magic circle near the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006502
text: You've defeated Kirmeleech and the magic circle. Tell Albina that you've retrieved the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006503
text: Albina wants you to remove the remaining three magic circles. Talk to her about the magic circle at the Fallow Ground among them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006504
text: Albina told you that the magic circle at the Fallow Ground could be broken by throwing the magical stone of the blessing at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006505
text: You've succesfully destroyed the magic circle. Tell this to Albina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006506
text: Albina wants you to remove the remaining three magic circles. Among them, talk to her about the magic circle at the Tarvas entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006507
text: She told you that the magic circle at Tarvas entrance is hard to break due to many monsters there. Defeat the monsters that are rushing in and break the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006508
text: You successfully destroyed the magic circle at Tarvas entrance. Report to Albina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006509
text: It seems that Horacius has something to say. Talk to Horacius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006510
text: Obtain Hauberk's Marks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006511
text: Among the subordinates of Nuaele, some of them used to be the subordinates of Hauberk and they once received the symbols with the power endowed in them. Defeat the subordinates of Nuaele at the 2nd Isolated Area and obtain the symbol of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006512
text: Acquired all the symbols of Hauberk. Hand them over to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006513
text: Find out the plan of Nuaele by defeating the demons at the 3rd Isolated Area using the seal pieces of Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006514
text: Defeat ??monsters that are the subordinates of Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006515
text: Kupole Medeina told you to defeat the strongest and most faithful subordinates of Nuaele first. Defeat ??monsters that are the subordinates of Nuaele at the 4th Isolated Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006516
text: You've succesfully defeated ??monsters that are the subordinates of Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006517
text: Defeat ??monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006518
text: Obtain Sealing Tokens

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006519
text: Goddess Vakarine requested you to use the Evening Star Rune to defeat the demons that are gathered at the Hehmastar Isolation District and collect Sealing Tokens.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006520
text: Acquired all the Sealing Tokens. Hand them over to the Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006521
text: Collect the keepsakes of the investigation team

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006522
text: Kupole Audra requested you to defeat the demons at Bjaurer Hideout and collect the belongings of the investigation team.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006523
text: Obtain the belongings of the investigation team

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006524
text: Collect the fragments of Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006525
text: Kupole Medeina told you to defeat the demons that are still executing the order of her due to the influence of the fragments from Nuaele at the 4th Isolated Area and retrieve the fragments of Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006526
text: Acquired all the fragments of Nuaele. Hand them over to Kupole Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006527
text: Retrieve the fragments of Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006528
text: The behavior of Hauberk's remnants is somewhat strange. Talk to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006529
text: You've defeated Hauberk's remnants at Ishidevi Hideout. Talk to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006530
text: It seems that Kupole Daiva made an important decision. Talk to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006531
text: Kupole Daiva told you that now is the time to show him your real strength. Defeat the demons that hid at Huradeti Crossroads and collect the teeth of the demons that are their symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006532
text: You've collected Demon's Teeth. Take them to Kupole Daiva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006533
text: Kupole Sigita, who is exhausted after using all her power filling the large dimensional crack, seems to have a request for you. Talk to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006534
text: Kupole Sigita told you that the demons shouldn't be allowed to assemble together for the future. Defeat the demons that have assembled at the Vanaga Monitor District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006535
text: You've defeated all demons near Vanaga Monitor District. Talk to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006536
text: Kupole Sigita is worried about Dionys, who is suffering. Talk to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006537
text: To help Dionys recover, Kupole Sigita asked you to collect the empty spirits from the demons that are gathered at Pasaru isolated area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006538
text: You've collected all of the empty spirits. Hand them over to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006539
text: It seems that small dimensional cracks keep expanding from various places. Talk to Kupole Sigita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006540
text: Kupole Sigita asked you to eliminate the small crossover spaces that are remaining as a result of the disaster at Gavara Isolated Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006541
text: You've eliminated all the dimensional cracks. Return to Kupole Sigita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006542
text: Collect the toe nails of the Orange Lizardmen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006543
text: Druid Ellie told you that a mysterious girl left this tree a long time ago so she wants know the true identity of the tree. First, obtain the toe nails of Lizardmen near the Abandoned Grape Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006544
text: Hand over the toe nails to Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006545
text: Acquired all the toe nails of Lizardmen to find out the true nature of the tree. Take them to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006546
text: Collect %s from Orange Lizardmen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006547
text: Druid Ellie was surprised by the result of putting the power of the tree into the molar. Talk to Druid Ellie again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006548
text: Collect the body fluid of Orange Tamas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006549
text: Druid Ellie told you that she needs the body fluid of Tamas to engage in massive scale purification. Collect Orange Tama body fluid from Kvie Farm Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006550
text: You've collected enough Orange Tama body fluid. Hand them over to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006551
text: Obtain %s from Tamas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006552
text: Defeat Orange Lizardmen

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006553
text: Farmer Darcy told you that he can't harvest crops due to the Lizardmen. Reduce the number of the monsters for Farmer Darcy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006554
text: You've reduced the number of Lizardmen. Talk to Farmer Darcy again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006555
text: Farmer Miren is complaining that the druids just sit and watch a tree while many monsters roam about. Defeat Orange Lizardmen for Farmer Miren.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006556
text: Tama Leaf Collection

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006557
text: Investigator Monahan was dispatched by Klaipeda to investigate the damage to the farm. Tell him about the Tama Leaves first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006558
text: You have collected all the Tama Leaves. Please tell Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006559
text: Investigator Monahan needs more of the earth's aura. Gather some grapevine roots from the Avarza Grape Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006560
text: Gathered the necessary grapevine roots. Return to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006561
text: Collect Orange Stumpy Tree Horn Fragments as evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006562
text: Farm Supervisor Dorn said you may enter the farm under the condition of doing some work. Go and eliminate Drakes and gather Orange Stumpy Tree Horns as proof.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006563
text: Collected all the Stumpy Tree Horn Fragments. Tell Farm Supervisor Dorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006564
text: Collect %s by defeating Orange Stumpy Trees

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006565
text: Farm Supervisor Dorn will tell you the druid's location if you bring him the stolen grain bags the soldiers have hidden. Look for an old wooden chest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006566
text: Eliminate the Orange Stumpy Trees

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006567
text: Farm Soldier Gedson is hoping to eliminate the Orange Stumpy Trees. Rid the farm of Orange Stumpy Trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006568
text: You have eliminated all of the Orange Stumpy Trees. Inform Farm Soldier Gedson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006569
text: Tenant Charlotte said a large amount of Chupacabras gather at the smell of grape seeds. Please eliminate the Chupacabras that are coming out of the bushes to investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006570
text: Defeat the Cysts near the brewery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006571
text: Tenant Lewis would like to go work and help the brewery, but the monsters are in the way. Please eliminate the Cysts near the Brewery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006572
text: A considerable number of Cysts have been defeated. Please return to Tenant Lewis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006573
text: Defeat Pink Tree Root Moles

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006574
text: Valen is worried about the damage to the farm caused by the Carcashus. Reduce the number of Carcashus in the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006575
text: A number of Carcashus have been eliminated. Return to Valen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006576
text: Defeat the Pink Tree Root Moles beyond the tunnels

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006577
text: Defeat the Glass Mole near the Wind Vane Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006578
text: General Buros tells you that you were too reckless and the Glass Mole has appeared. Defeat the Glass Mole by the Wind Vane Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006579
text: The Glass Mole has been defeated. Please report to General Buros.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150406_006580
text: Defeat Glass Mole

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006581
text: I want to help purify the Thorn Forest, but I lack the strength.{nl}Can you eliminate some of the Tree Ghouls bothering the soldiers?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006582
text: My body continues to feel heavy... It would be nice if he came to purify the baron's farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006583
text: Sir Baron is trying his best to purify this farm. {nl}The workers sometimes say weird stuff but don't mind them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006584
text: Everybody's working on the farm. No exceptions.{nl}Ignore all those nonsense rumors. What do those idiots know?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006585
text: The baron is busy trying to appease the workers. {nl}Why do they have so much doubt about something they don't know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006586
text: The baron is a very good person. {nl}He made a power source with magic that purges his own farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006587
text: Hey. Have you seen a big monster escape? {nl}If it's true, then this is a big problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006588
text: Where the hell did such a big monster go? {nl}This is dangerous...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006589
text: Ah. Don't worry, it's okay.{nl}Just don't tell anyone about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006590
text: I should've just left it alone... {nl} Ah, I was talking to myself so don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006591
text: I mean what the baron is doing should be obvious, but I'm not sure what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006592
text: The only person here who would carelessly destroy the statue is the baron. Unless he received orders to break the statue.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006593
text: I'm thinking that it could be something from the original farm that is corrupting it, no?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006594
text: I wonder what the baron told the Revelator.{nl}Purify? That's ridiculous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006595
text: Can you keep this a secret from the others?{nl} 'Cause if this reaches the baron's ears, all will be in vain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006596
text: Never listen to anything the baron says.{nl} He's just a greedy old man.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006597
text: Come... Come on! Give it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006598
text: Do not bother the placed food piles.{nl} They should have shuffled over here by now... just keep watching.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006599
text: My son stole from a pile of food that was mixed with Holy Water.{nl}Over time, all of the curse's energy within him should be released.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006600
text: Strangely, we always lack manpower. {nl}Of course, the laziness of the workers here adds to it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006601
text: But if the crystal isn't present, it means there is a problem. {nl}You just have to gather the power of monsters with this pot and then bury it near the spell circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006602
text: This is Baron Allerno's farm. {nl}The baron is trying to purify the farm so don't bug him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006603
text: This year's harvest is also bountiful and the weather is warm.. {nl}If not for the strange aura, then this would be the best farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006604
text: Huh? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. well then, nevermind. I will report it to the baron myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006605
text: If you use the pot near monsters, poison will be collected in the pot. {nl}Give it to me when enough poison is gathered.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006606
text: Baron Secretary Andol's Journal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006607
text: The wizard who claimed to have come from the Mage Tower earned the baron's favor. {nl}But I'm sure that wizard is planning something absurd that I don't know much of. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006608
text: Is there a wonder medicine for eternal youth and immortality? {nl}Isn't that something only within the domain of the goddess. {nl}What is it that the wizard is trying to get out of tricking the baron. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006609
text: He started to suppress the divine aura, calling it strange, and then began to call in an evil aura. {nl}A hole leading to the other world... {nl}All the experiments in the farm were for that hole, betraying the goddess...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006610
text: But the baron was already blinded with eternal life and pushed many soldiers into that hole.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006611
text: I don't know what the baron is working towards. {nl}But I'm sure of one thing, that it is ruining the farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006612
text: I stacked up firewood in front of the magic circle. But it has a protective shield,{nl} so even if you light it, the fire will fade out quickly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006613
text: The only problem is whether the magic circles are good or bad. {nl}At least this is better than kowtowing to the baron.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006614
text: To do this right, we need to gather all the clues. {nl}Only then can we persuade the tenant farmers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006615
text: What do you think? About those magic circles. {nl}Do you think that will really purify our farm?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006616
text: Does this farm look peaceful to you? {nl}Well then, you are looking at it wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006617
text: We were able to be fully prepared with your help. {nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006618
text: Strangely, I feel sluggish and tired... {nl}How about you? Are you okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006619
text: The magic circles have to power up for the spell power source to work properly. {nl}Only then will the portal... I mean the purification will take place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006620
text: Oh, this... Hold on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006621
text: We have to take care of it before it falls into Naktis' hands. {nl}Please get back the Holy Relic of Salvation from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006622
text: But that wasn't easy because of the dimensional crack. {nl}The demons keep crossing over through the dimensional crack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006623
text: Zydrone is keeping Blut by all means. {nl}But we don't know how long it will hold with our powers alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006624
text: We have to weaken the Blut's influence. {nl}Please get the Mark of Blut from Blut's aids in Viejauler Basecamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006625
text: By the way, Blut seems to be proud of what happened to Hauberk because of him. {nl}He was in a group that targeted the strongest and Hauberk was at the top of their list. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006626
text: Blut thought that he was presumptuous and told that to Giltine. {nl}That is why he was torn by Helgasercle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006627
text: You are the one Goddess Vakarine was talking about. {nl}Good work. Eveything will go as Goddess Vakarine plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006628
text: Blut is locked up behind this wall. {nl}Now, we have to take it down at once. Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006629
text: I we didn't take down Blut here, Vakarine would have fallen with it. {nl}Go to Demon Prison 2nd Area. Arune is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006630
text: The demons that lost Blut are causing a rampage. {nl}If they break the barrier of the Goddess and escape to the outside world, then it will be a great disaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006631
text: Good work. {nl}It's a relief that those demons did not notice the barrier weakening.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006632
text: Human exploration teams came in from the outside world in the past. {nl}Unfortunately, they died before we could do anything. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006633
text: I want to at least find their keepsakes to comfort them. {nl}But it's not easy because the demons took them as trophies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006634
text: Kupole Arune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006635
text: You're here. What a relief you're not late. {nl}The power of Demon Lord Nuaele is about to break the barrier of the goddess. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006636
text: Aldona went to fight Nuaele in hopes to last a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006637
text: The demons are crossing over through the gap in 1st Isolation Area. {nl}Closing it before Nuaele joins them will be a big help to Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006638
text: Great work. {nl}With her force cut off, her vigor will also soften down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006639
text: Nuale is using Hauberk's Piece of Seal to entice his servants to join her forces. {nl}We can use that to strengthen Hauberk's powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006640
text: It's to retrieve back the Marks that Hauberk gave his servants. {nl}Go to 2nd Isolation Area. They must be gathered there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006641
text: Now Nuaele should feel it herself. {nl}That she can't escape using other's powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006642
text: Hauberk is a demon like them so it will be easy to read their minds. {nl}And it's even easier for souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006643
text: She planned to make this prison her world from the start. {nl}If her plans succeeded, even Goddess Ausrine's powers would not have been enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006644
text: What about striking the Harugals in 4th Isolation Area first? {nl}Getting rid of them will be like getting rid of Nuaele's most powerful weapon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006645
text: The Harugals used to be Hauberk's elite servants. {nl}But it was also them who turned over Hauberk's seal fragment to Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006646
text: Nuaele is gone now, but there are still demons that continue her orders. {nl}They will repeat the past unless we retrieve her fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006647
text: It's the demons in 4th Isolation Area. {nl}Please take what happened last time as a lesson so that this will never happen again in the future. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006648
text: Thank you. I will destroy these fragments myself. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006649
text: Nuaele is currently performing a demon summoning ritual in her territory. {nl}But both of her arms and legs are cut off, so it will be easy to defeat her. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006650
text: Vakarine is waiting for your help in 3rd Area. {nl}Go quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006651
text: Please help Zydrone complete the Evening Star Key. {nl}You can get the power of Dionys with that key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006652
text: The power to protect from Valtruss is what is controlling the ego of Dionys. {nl}Fortunately, that power can be removed if the power of the Goddess is put in the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006653
text: First, close the small dimensional cracks in the Scars of Fighting Spirits. {nl}It will be difficult to perform the ritual with the waves of demons coming out from there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006654
text: Now go to Oruarma Cathedral. {nl}Protect me from the demons while I put the Goddess' power in the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006655
text: Here. Give this key to Aldona. {nl}He must be blocking Dionys now. Please hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006656
text: Hurry, the strength of Goddess Vakarine.. {nl}Use the Evening Star Key to release the Rearda, Kasa, and Rada Seals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006657
text: We, Kupoles, cannot block Dionys. {nl}Not even Vakarine can do anything if we are late.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006658
text: We will begin to separate the power of Dionys. {nl}If we fail.. The result will be as if tens of Demon Lords are on the loose. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006659
text: We need to approach it with caution. Let me know when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006660
text: Hauberk ran away to the direction of Prison 4th Area, guarded by Daiva. {nl}Please return to the Goddess first. I will take care of Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006661
text: You are still here, so it isn't late yet. {nl}The 4th Area he ran to is like a maze. Daiva can easily chase him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006662
text: Valtruss is defeated but its servants are still left in Oruarma Cathedral. {nl}I want you to let those demons pay for their sins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006663
text: The Grand Hall is where the Goddess recovers her powers. {nl}That is why it should always be safe from the demons. Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006664
text: Dionys is not recovering well. {nl}I think getting back the claws that have his powers might help him recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006665
text: Dionys was an ordinary creation of the human world. {nl}The goddess took and cared for him when the demons cruelly toyed with him. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006666
text: Now, he is the most loyal guardian of Vakarine. {nl}Even though he lost his senses to that power, he must be in pain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006667
text: There are many demons that ran away from Dionys' attacks near the Rearda Seal. {nl}Let's just hope that Dionys' claws are still stuck in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006668
