text: Once Dionys gets back his strength, Vakarine should also recover. {nl}Aside from that, Dionys has other roles that are indispensable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006669
text: Thank you. {nl}This will be of big help to the weakened Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006670
text: The barrier in Nebilau Ruins is the weakest so they must be headed there. {nl}Follow it quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006671
text: The girl who left the sapling, who could it have been?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006672
text: I just can't leave here knowing I got here through the kindness of Gina Greene. {nl}But the land is contaminated so I'm worried if I have to leave regardless.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006673
text: Even someone as distant as you helped me, so I should cheer up. {nl}Those druids said they will help me so I should trust them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006674
text: I can't stand the corruption anymore. {nl}But at least, it's better than the farm beside us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006675
text: Hunt Hauberk's servants at the Internal Separation Plan and gather his Soul Fragments. {nl}Our goal is to gather as much of his soul as we can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006676
text: I know the druids are trying to purify the farm. {nl}I'm just whining because of my frustrations.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006677
text: The druids are the ones having the hardest time. {nl}At least this area is Gina Greene's land, I wonder what they will do with the farms beside ours.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006678
text: All the farms I've seen so far were either corrupted by evil aura or full of monsters and can't be recovered. {nl}But I have a good feeling about this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006679
text: Where are you going? {nl}This is Shaton's private land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006680
text: Even if you have my permission, you better stay low. {nl}Mr. Shaton is sensitive now with his son's problems.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006681
text: Even if you have my permission, you have to take care of my men yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006682
text: Even if you are the Revelator, you better not fool around. {nl}The pollution is not something for you to mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006683
text: A single druid is soiling the whole farm. {nl}I would have kicked him out immediately, if it wasn't for Gina Greene.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006684
text: This area is owned by the son of the Shaton family. {nl}Although, it is run by Shaton himself now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006685
text: The degree of corruption in this farm is too much. {nl}Ellie better know what's she's doing..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006686
text: I have no idea how I will persuade the owner of Shaton. {nl}I've heard that he is really stubborn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006687
text: Clearly, the farm is very different from before. {nl}What could have happened?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006688
text: Tenant Farmer Weiss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006689
text: Even if Shaton changes his mind now, it's too late for me. {nl}Unless some miracle by the goddess happens, how can this insane amount of corruption be purified?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006690
text: The corruption is getting worse and worse. {nl}I don't know how to persuade him anymore.. I just hope he'll listen to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006691
text: Now he's trying to escape using the body of his servant. {nl}Let's look for him by getting rid of the demons that contain Hauberk. Until he gives up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006692
text: Your lead was a big help. {nl}I wonder if this is all the guidance of the goddess..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006693
text: I plan to study the mysterious seedlings from now on. {nl}A wide range of purification, isn't that wonderful?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006694
text: This farm belongs to my son. {nl}I will protect it until my son returns.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006695
text: That druid sure is noisy. {nl}What does he know, to keep on talking..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006696
text: I thought this farm would be able to replace my son. {nl}Now.. I have to let go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006697
text: Please tell the druid that I am sorry. {nl}I'm sure my daughter will take good care of the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006698
text: I'm sorry. There is nothing more I can say. {nl}If only my brother was alive..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006699
text: I'm glad that he seems to have returned to his former self. {nl}Do you believe my brother made it to the hands of the goddess safely?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006700
text: I'm going to give up grape farming and improve the treatment of the tenant farmers. {nl}I think my brother would have done the same.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006701
text: I'm fine as long as the owner pays me but I'm sure others have gone crazy because of the evil aura. {nl}Growing grapes in a contaminated farm that no one can eat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006702
text: Everyone has their own story, don't they? {nl}Sir Shaton, and this farm too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006703
text: Thanks for a while ago. {nl}I didn't want to stay in that terrible place any longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006704
text: Maybe the druids were right. {nl}We don't really have to go through all this if we can purify the farm, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006705
text: Some weird sacks keep coming from other farms. {nl}But we have orders from the baron so we have to clean them up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006706
text: I really don't know anything about it. {nl}A man, inside? They must have gotten something wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006707
text: Since that day, the demons have become those that deserve to die.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006708
text: What a mess.{nl} Back then, I have carried out orders like this handling the sacks. I really don't know what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006709
text: The dimensional crack belongs to you.{nl} Please deal with the other demon souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006710
text: Did you see something strange? {nl} Don't mind it. The baron will handle everything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006711
text: I have never seen an evil aura on the farm, why does my body feel so heavy? {nl}Is it really like the baron says, because of the strange aura...?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006712
text: Demon Lord Hauberk.. His final days were dismal as he was torn and betrayed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006713
text: Even though the large dimensional crack has disappeared, there are still a lot of demons who came in from there.{nl}We will correct the mistakes of the past.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006714
text: Recently, I got sick and drowsy.{nl}It seems the crops are not better than last year.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006715
text: What can I say. I don't hate the soldiers and the crops aren't bad...{nl}But somehow, I don't feel good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006716
text: Thank you.{nl}We will collect the sealed Hauberk's power and take it to the goddess.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006717
text: The goddess is waiting for you to Prison District 5.{nl}Let's move on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006718
text: We don't know whether the goddess is okay or not, but we need to show them a sample.{nl}Can you collect the Demon's Tooth in Hradeti Crossroads?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006719
text: Hauberk...{nl}His life is too pitiful, but it should be removed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006720
text: Well. We came here because of you.{nl}We are holding the ceremony to close the corrupted gap, you need to be completely ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006721
text: Receive this Evening Star Rune.{nl}Let's collect the Demon's Soul to use it and collected corrupted gap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006722
text: You have to go to the Rankina Isolation District, Ishsula Broken District and Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}If you defeat the demon by using the Evening Star Rune, we can save the soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006723
text: I also want you to collect the demons' Sealing Tokens at the Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}Those wield a large amount of power as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006724
text: It's obviously true that all demons should be defeated.{nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, the demons can never be forgiven.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006725
text: It's not allowed for humans to enter. {nl}But, you are allowed by the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006726
text: I was waiting for you by Aldona's orders.{nl}But, please hold on a bit as I'm still not ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006727
text: Though the Demon Lord has disappeared, peace is not meant to come to this place.{nl}Only by defeating all of the demons will true peace come.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006728
text: This demon prison is not related with any world...{nl}A new disaster would befall upon the human world, if these areas fall to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006729
text: Dionys... He is one of the beings who knows Vakarine.{nl}So, He can endure the pain himself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006730
text: The goddess' barrier should be complete if Vakarine recovers quickly.{nl}Until then, the corrupted gap appears continuously.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006731
text: This prison has been made by Goddess Ausrine.{nl}Vakarine regularly visited to check here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006732
text: Even the Kupoles won't be able to take care of Dionys.{nl}Quickly, please complete the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006733
text: Is the Evening Star Key still not ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006734
text: Oh..my poor Dionys..I'm so sorry for giving you this big burden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006735
text: Revelator. You cannot close the dimensional cracks unless you can get Dionys back.{nl}I ask you in the name of the goddess for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006736
text: Hauberk... I'm expecting it already.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006737
text: I could not say the truth because you were close with Hauberk.{nl}Please forgive me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006738
text: Hauberk is also sinner.{nl}You don't need to be sympathetic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006739
text: I only learned it from you...{nl}That we should have listened to Laima's warning from the very beginning.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006740
text: There were many sacrifices.{nl}The damage of the prison is still deep as an effect of the dimensional crack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006741
text: Good job.{nl}Let's use this symbol to increase Hauberk's soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006742
text: It's almost ready.{nl}I ask you to please do it, while me and Kupole are closing the corrupted gap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006743
text: Ever since we closed the dimensional crack, the demons have been assembling.{nl}But I'm powerless to move...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006744
text: In the future, the demons must never be allowed to gather in the same place.{nl}Defeat the demons in Vanaga Monitor District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006745
text: Demons are trying to expand their power using the disaster spirit.{nl}Even after overcoming the current disaster, the peace is still far away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006746
text: The crack will open again if we, the Kupoles, don't keep our eyes on it.{nl}I hope that we can find the Goddess Laima as soon as possible...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006747
text: I've been hearing that Dionys is in pain due to his slow recovery.{nl}Can you collect some empty souls from the demons in Pasaru Isolation District?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006748
text: If Dionys recovers completely, the goddess can reduce the burden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006749
text: Thank you.{nl}If Dionys recovers completely, It's because of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006750
text: The small dimensional cracks are again been carving away at us.{nl}But we don't know why because now we're focusing on the stabilization.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006751
text: Can you deal with the corrupted gap in Gavara Isolation District?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006752
text: We really owe you one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006753
text: Thank you.{nl}I will make sure I do everything possible to prevent another dimensional crack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006754
text: How long can Aldona keep this up...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006755
text: If Vakarine had received the Laima's warning in advance...{nl}Would the situation be better than what it is now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006756
text: I received land from Gytis, but it's infested.{nl}The Ridimeds are the problem, but what can I do with just a hoe and pick?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006757
text: With the demons being unhindered by the weakening seal...{nl} And the villagers' thirst for action, we could be inviting disaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006758
text: For now, we can compose ourselves a bit.{nl}Sorry for the late welcome, I am Goddess Austeja's priest Raeli.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006759
text: Goddess Austeja has sealed sources of evil energy at two locations.{nl}However, the seals are getting weakened by the continuous attacks from the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006760
text: How can you.. there are hidden monsters.{nl}But, It's really good you are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006761
text: The story of that mysterious girl...{nl}We don't know if it is a clue to purifying this land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006762
text: This farm's owner is Gina Greene.{nl}They kindly lend this farm to us who lost the land since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006763
text: I'm getting annoyed.{nl}I want the druids to defeat the monsters, but they are just looking at that tree.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006764
text: Klaipeda is trying to increase its food distribution rate.{nl}With the goddesses gone, we don't expect a great outcome.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006765
text: That's really appreciated.{nl}Firstly, collect the remains of Tama. I have something to check.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006766
text: Strange. I assumed this wouldn't yield anything, but these actually seem mixed with earth's aura.{nl}In order to know more, we need something strongly exposed to the earth's aura here. Can you help me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006767
text: Please take some roots of the grapevines at Avarza Grape Farm.{nl}Three roots will probably be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006768
text: Be careful, poison can spray out if you handle it wrong.{nl}Hidden monsters might also appear.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006769
text: Well. Some sort of holy aura is spreading across the ground.{nl}Thanks to your efforts, we might not give up on this farm after all.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006770
text: Nevertheless, I don't know exactly what this aura is.{nl}It's too weak. Maybe the druids could know something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006771
text: No matter what you have planned, If you don't have any permission, It is better for you to leave from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006772
text: What? Whoever you are, you cannot enter here.{nl}However, depending on what you can do... I can allow it, Do you get me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006773
text: I swear somebody's guilty of embezzlement, but I can't find evidence. {nl}It should be a brown bag of grain. If you see one, take it quickly and return to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006774
text: Did you see the people who have been infected by the poison?{nl}The soldiers said that place is near...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006775
text: Get back here as soon as you're done defeating the Stumpy Trees at Zole Farmland.{nl}I won't ask for anything more if you can do this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006776
text: He's surely out of his mind, ordering us to pick the spoiled grape vines.{nl}The missing son of the Shaton family must be the reason...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006777
text: Please spray this potion at the grape vines. Don't let the soldiers see you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006778
text: The monsters appear near the bush.{nl}More monsters appear by shaking it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006779
text: I am almost done.{nl}I am going to move to the suburbs of Klaipeda, because I've heard they're looking for tenant farmers there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006780
text: Defeating the monsters will only temporary help. Those monsters will come again soon.{nl}But how can I think like that in a situation like this?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006781
text: Shaton is just too stubborn.{nl}But even if I know how he feels...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006782
text: I'm sorry, but if you don't have any business here then please leave this farm.{nl}If my father is angry with you, you might be kicked out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006783
text: Even though the demons attack here, I will never run away from this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006784
text: You have 'ideas' too?{nl}Get out. I don't want to hear it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006785
text: I will believe my master even though he has made a wrong choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006786
text: If it weren't for the money, I would never work on a spooky farm like this.{nl}It would be too much for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006787
text: So you're here to put me back in your little pocket eh..{nl}Don't make me laugh. There is nothing to discuss between us!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006788
text: From the beginning, all of you were the same...{nl}I have been fooled.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006789
text: But, can you stand against my current form now?!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006790
text: Shaking/STANDSHAKE/3/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006791
text: Notice/!/The paper fell!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006792
text: Igniting/FIRE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006793
text: Looking/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006794
text: Explaining the Goddess Statue in Forest Prayer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006795
text: I will go to the Small Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006796
text: Notice/!/Bury the pot passed by Rimas to contain the monster's evil spirit in front of magic circle!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006797
text: Waiting the monster/SITABSORB/2TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006798
text: Notice//!/The monster's attack will be starting!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006799
text: Notice/!/The magic circle rings with strange sounds#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006800
text: Notice/The magic circle seems to be working fine now#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006801
text: Notice/The magic circle seems to work! #5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006802
text: Notice/!/Be careful with it, it seems to be destroyed.{nl}Back to create the hammer to destroy the liquor barrel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006803
text: Destroying/GROPE2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006804

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006805
text: Notice/!/The Corrupted started to attack when yuo touched the wing fragments!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006806
text: Reading the Clue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006807
text: Show the fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006808
text: Leave as this seems suspicious

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006809
text: Igniting/FIRE/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006810
text: Looking into Altar/MAKING/2/TRACK_BEFORE/NONE

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006811
text: Notice/Meet the Kupole Aurne to move Demon Prison 2nd!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006812
text: I will help you to make the keys

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006813
text: I will be fine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006814
text: I will retrieve the fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006815
text: I will meet the Vakarine first

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006816
text: I will defeat the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006817
text: Dionys' Claws

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006818
text: It said to be it's not enough to cheer up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006819
text: The Dimensional Crack (7)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006820
text: Obtain %s from Kowaks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006821
text: Obtain %s from Keparis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006822
text: Destroy the deformed protection stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006823
text: When you looked at the Tree Root Crystal, a deformed protection stone appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006824
text: Read the paper

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006825
text: A piece of paper dropped after shaking the Tree Root Crystal! Let's read it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006826
text: Bishop Aurelius has been waiting for you for hundreds of years. In order for Bishop Aurelius to guide you, you need to collect Spirit Essences.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006827
text: Bishop Aurelius' Spirit has been completely saved at the altar. To find out the next step, talk to Bishop Aurelius by using the Spirit's Scripture in your inventory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006828
text: The secret of Meile Oratorium has been released. Look at the Meile Oratorium.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006829
text: Found the Relic of Mercy. In order to proceed, talk to Bishop Aurelius by using the Spirit's Scripture in your inventory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006830
text: Found the Relic of Mercy. In order to find Maven's first key, talk to Bishop Aurelius by using the Spirit's Scripture in your inventory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006831
text: Insert the Relic of Mercy into the altar at the Small Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006832
text: Find Maven's first key by inserting the appropriate relic into the altars at the Small Hall. If you're having trouble, then call Bishop Aurelius for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006833
text: Look at Maven's secret

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006834
text: Maven's secret has been revealed. Look at Maven's secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006835
text: Acquire the Demon Transformation Scroll

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006836
text: The Demon Transformation Scroll has been completed. Obtain the completed Demon Transformation Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006837
text: Recover the body of Pilgrim Orville's friend

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006838
text: Defeat the Glackuman who killed Orville's friend

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006839
text: Baron Secretary Arunas wanted to check the relation between the strange spirit and the crops. Investigate the place that Arunas was talking about.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006840
text: Bury it in front of the magic circle, after it has collected the monster's energy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006841
text: To enhance the magic circle, the monster's magic should be captured in a pot and buried underground. Place the pot so that it'll attract monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006842
text: Find the person who knows about the fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006843
text: Find the person who has a clue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006844
text: Find someone who knows about the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006845
text: Talk to Joana

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006846
text: Regain the Padeka Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006847
text: All Place of Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006848
text: The Pyromancer Master said she'd gladly help us. First, collect the samples from Pink Chupaluka at Ziuluti Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006849
text: Louise said he's more worried about the future even though we defeated the monsters just now. Talk to Louise again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006850
text: Louise wants you to help making the fence for the future. Get the wood from the Settlement Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006851
text: Obtain Blut's Marks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006852
text: Kupole Audra said we need to weaken the power of Blut. Take the Blut's symbol in Bjaurer Hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006853
text: You have stolen all of Blut's marks from the demons. Take them to Kupole Audra at Demon Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006854
text: Collect %s by defeating the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006855
text: Talk to Kupole Arune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006856
text: The situation of Kupole placed on Shirtis Monitor Pass does not look good. Talk to Kupole Meneina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006857
text: Defeat the demons that arrived from the dimensional crack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006858
text: Kupole Arune said the barrier of the goddess should be stabilized by destroying Nuaele's power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006859
text: Nuaele's subordinates have been defeated. Report to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006860
text: Defeat the demons in the First Isolation Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006861
text: Kupole Arune has the better idea. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006862
text: Regained all symbols of Hauberk. Take them to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006863
text: Collect %s from the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006864
text: Kupole Arune knows something. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006865
text: You noticed the plan of Nuaele. Forward Nuaele's plan to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006866
text: You noticed the plan of Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Arune to prepare the next plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006867
text: Defeat the Harugals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006868
text: Kupole Arune is saying to defeat the most powerful and loyal subordinate of Nuaele first. Defeat the Harugals of Nuaele's subordinate in the 4th Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006869
text: Succeeded to defeat the Harugals of Nuaele's subordinate. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006870
text: Defeat the Harugals of the 4th Isolation Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006871
text: It is almost ready to defeat Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006872
text: Kupole Daiva said to collect the Soul Fragments of Hauberk to defeat the servants of Hauberk throughout District 4.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006873
text: Collect %s from the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006874
text: Collect %s by using the Evening Star Rune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006875
text: Though Master Nuaele has disappeared, There are still remnants of him left. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006876
text: Kupole Arune asked you to defeat the remnants of the demon monsters in First Isolation Area to stabilize the Disappeared Demon Prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006877
text: All of Nuaele's remnants have been defeated. Talk to Kupole Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006878
text: Kupole Arune is waiting for something. Talk to Kupole Meneina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006879
text: Kupole Arune said to retrieve the Fragments of Nuaele to defeat the demons which follow her orders as a side-effect of Nuaele's Fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006880
text: Take it to Kupole Arune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006881
text: All of Nuaele's Fragments have been collected. Take them to Kupole Arune

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006882
text: Collect %s from the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006883
text: Defeat the remnants of Valtross

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006884
text: Kupole Zydrone said that the remnants of Valtross may be making the rampaging. Defeat the remnant monsters on Orualama Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006885
text: The subordinate of Valtross has been defeated. Report to Kupole Zydrone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006886
text: Collect %s around the Rearda Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006887
text: Obtained %s to defeat the demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006888
text: Defeat the demons of Vanaga Monitor District

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006889
text: Kupole Sigita said to remove the small dimensional crack of Gavara Isolation District to stop the disaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006890
text: Seal the dimensional crack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006891
text: It's almost ready to seal the dimensional crack. Talk to the Goddess Vakarine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006892
text: Defeat Orange Lizardmen at Abandoned Grape Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006893
text: Defeat Orange Lizardmen at Ziura Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006894
text: Collec the remains of Tama

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006895
text: Investigator Monahan sent to investigate the damaged farm from Klaipeda. Take the remains of Tama to Investigator Monahan in order to investigate the damaged situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006896
text: All of the remains of Tama have been collected. Take it to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006897
text: Collect the grapevine roots from Avarza Grape Farm

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006898
text: Spray Charlotte's special potion on the spoiled grape vines

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006899
text: Tenant Charlotte said that growing the spoiled grapes has become terrible. Spray Charlotte's special potion on the spoiled grapes for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006900
text: Talk to Tenant Weiss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006901
text: Tenant Weiss has been troubling in now. Talk to Tenant Weiss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006902
text: Tenant Weiss wants to go the Zirta Brewery to work, but he can't go because of the monsters. Please defeat Cysts around Zirta Brewery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006903
text: The considerable number of Cyst are defeated. Back to Tenant Weiss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006904
text: It seems that Tenant Weiss has something to you ask. Talk to Tenant Weiss again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006905
text: Tenant Weiss hid the seeds that he has farmed in secret, but he can't go and take them because of the monsters. Please go and bring Tenant Weiss' seeds from the Farm Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006906
text: Take it to Tenant Farmer Weiss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150414_006907
text: Found the seed pouch of Tenant Farmer Weiss. Take it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006908
text: Our comrades who were attacked by the Petrifying Frost weeks ago are here. {nl}We did not receive support after the world turned like this so we had no choice but to leave them and wait. {nl}But the monsters are now attacking those that are petrified. Those damn monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006909
text: To block the source of danger, we have to strike them before they make their move. {nl}Go to Drasos Chapel Ruins and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006910
text: We have to go to Ruklys base in the Fortress of the Land, in order to get detailed information. {nl}But the Royal Army is blocking the entrance. We can't get in. {nl}Though there is a way around..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006911
text: I'm a wizard who can't use magic. I feel pathetic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006912
text: Antares... He used to be a great wizard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006913
text: I can't return like this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006914
text: My mission... My brother...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006915
text: He made the traps very meticulously even when he was not in his right mind. {nl}I hated him even when he was sane.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006916
text: Find the last valve in the central control room. {nl}If we destroy this, it will be safe no matter what Antares does.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006917
text: That night... I hid in the grass and watched everything. {nl}In the end, everyone pointed their weapons at each other. And to think they were such close friends before..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006918
text: I realized after death that my colleagues' betrayals were because of the curse. {nl}This thing is now useless to me... Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006919
text: A monster in disguise as Goddess Statue. I pity the souls. {nl}Now the souls may rest in peace. This is all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006920
text: They made the tower such a mess. This is unforgivable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006921
text: You better be careful. {nl}Why do you fathom the wizards once loyal here ran away?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006922
text: We can help Goddess Gabija if we have the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006923
text: With the Transport Magic Circles destroyed, we'll have to go floor by floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006924
text: I think I can remember something... But first, it's important to go to the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006925
text: Uhg, my head aches... {nl}Maybe it's because of Antares...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006926
text: We can only assume that the monsters were drawn to the magic circle. {nl}The magic circle is pressing down the divine power of the altar... something like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006927
text: Rashly approaching the magic circle will only hurt you. {nl}Be sure to destroy the magic circle using the Magic Stone of Blessings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006928
text: Have you seen the sacks of grain the monsters stole from me? {nl}Please get me back my sacks of grain. I have to pay the farm rent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006929
text: {nl}If that doesn't happen, we have no choice but to stand up againt the plundering body. {nl}Moreover, the plundering process destroys the authority of the goddess and if the objective of plunder is human's greed over something, then it is something to be angry about.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006930
text: So the Chapparition was behind the curse. {nl}Naktis' curse alone was more than enough already. That's a relief. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006931
text: This is another separated space, neither the world of humans nor demons. {nl}The demons who are harmful to the world are imprisoned here. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006932
text: Demons are crossing over through the gap in 1st Isolation Area. {nl}It will be of great help to Aldona if you can block them before they join Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006933
text: Hauberk is getting back the Marks he gave to his servants. {nl}Go to 2nd Isolation Area. They must be gathered there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006934
text: How about striking the Harugals in the 4th Isolation Area? {nl}Getting rid of them would mean getting rid of some of Nuaele's most powerful weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006935
text: Nuaele may be gone but her remnants are gathering in the 1st Isolation Area. {nl}They intend to continue her will. Please get rid of the demons to dissuade them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006936
text: They are the demons of the Fourth Isolation Area.{nl}Let this be a lesson for them, so that it won't happen again. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006937
text: The goddess had to make a painful decision. {nl}Dionys was like family but she decided to seal the power in him until the prison stabilizes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006938
text: Hauberk ran towards 4th Demon Prison which is protected by Daiva. {nl}First, you should return to the goddess. I will look after Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006939
text: We got Hauberk but now his servants are the problem. {nl}We don't know what they will do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006940
text: Thank you. {nl}If Dionys recovers well, it will be all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006941
text: The Curse of Gluttony prevents you from digesting food when you eat it. {nl}That's why it makes you hungry all the time. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006942
text: We just need to exterminate all the monsters that interfere with the making of the route to the Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006943
text: I heard that the hardness and the elasticity of the wood sticks of Firent at Nefritas Cliff is good.{nl}You can get the rope to tie those sticks from Red Pantos Archers. Please get me those first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006944
text: Our only way right now is to find a solution to each curse one by one. {nl}Just like how every sickness has a different cure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006945
text: Thank you for everything until now but I can't leave my family to starve... {nl}I have no choice but to leave if the evil energy stays in the garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006946
text: This is the vineyard of my brother.{nl}My father runs it for him. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006947
text: Placing bait/CAMPFIRE_LOOP/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006948
text: Notice/The crystal was destroyed when you destroyed all the cores. #5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006949
text: Lighting fire/FIRE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006950
text: Notice/!/You must destroy the cores of the monsters! {nl}Defeat the monsters!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006951
text: Notice/!/Get sheets of scriptures from the monsters!#7

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006952
text: Notice/!/You must get Cold Fluid from monsters and spray it on the altar!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006953
text: Notice/!/The Goddess Statue was fake! Defeat the Sparnashorn#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006954
text: Notice/!/Nothing is happening to the Goddess Statue.{nl}Go to Sculptor Tesla in Siauliai West Woods #3

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006955
text: Fetching water/SITWATER_LOOP/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006956
text: Notice/!/The Goddess Statue started being attacked when you worshiped it.{nl}Get rid of the thorn vines and protect the Goddess Statue from the monsters' attacks.#6

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006957
text: Checking the gravestone/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006958
text: Notice/Gathered the pieces of painting and inserted it in the frame!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006959
text: Notice/Found an old handkerchief in the box.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006960
text: Notice/Found the pot!{nl}Now it's time to place the pot under Tree of Brothers!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006961
text: Notice/!/Velochard that was guarding the hidden space appeared!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006962
text: Opening the box/KICKBOX/1/TRACK_AFTER/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006963
text: Checking../LOOK_SIT/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006964
text: Checking the altar/LOOK_SIT/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006965
text: Of Father, by Father (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006966
text: Of Father, by Father (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006967
text: The Weak Owl Sculpture wants to give the scent of its hometown as a gift to the dead soldiers who has followed its guide. Gather Butterfly Fragrance from the bushes at Butterfly Tomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006968
text: Defeat Demon Lord Taumas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006969
text: Demon Lords have appeared and are aiming for the weakened Seal Tower. Defeat Demon Lord Taumas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006970
text: Defeat Demon Lord %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006971
text: Get %s from Kepo

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006972
text: Julius turned into Draperiun after seeing the Orgel. Calm down the Draperiun by draining its HP to less than 10% and try to persuade it again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006973
text: Light the Tree Root Crystal on fire

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006974
text: The Tree Root Crystal reacted weirdly and is polluting its surroundings! Defeat the monsters first and find the scattered Tree Root Crystal Cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006975
text: Test if Gracius' Reagent is effective. Carefully approach a monster and use the Reagent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006976
text: A page of scripture was dropped on the altar. Find the rest of the pages from nearby monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006977
text: Talk to the soul

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006978
text: You were able to defeat Merge. Talk to the soul that appeared on the altar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006979
text: Get monster's fluid from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006980
text: This sanctuary also seems contaminated. Go to Pardoner Master for advice. You can move to Fedimian Outskirts easily if you buy the scroll from beside the stand.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006981
text: Velochard has been defeated and a treasure chest appeared! Open it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006982
text: Use the portal in Pasala Altar and go to the room with the revelation. You need to pass Maven's final test to get the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006983
text: Baron Secretary Arunas wants you to check the crops and a 'strange aura'. Move to the area marked on the map and check for a strange aura. Then pull out the crops nearby and check them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006984
text: This magic circle strongly wants monster energy. Lure monsters over the magic circle and defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006985
text: Kupole Audra asked for your help to defeat the demons that are performing rituals at the Rituala Assembly Area to help Demon Lord Blut escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006986
text: You've interrupted the ritual for Blut's escape. Go back and report to Kupole Audra at the Corridor of Monitor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006987
text: Kupole Audra says you need to weaken Blut's influence. Steal Blut's Mark from the demons in Bjaurer Hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006988
text: Kupole Audra says the power gathered by Blut can only be controlled by Hauberk. Help Hauberk absorb the power of Blut from the Blut Altar in Concentrated Management Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006989
text: Kupole Arune says you need to stem the power of Demon Lord Nuaele to stabilize the goddess' barrier. Defeat Nuaele's subordinates.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006990
text: Nuaele's subordinates are defeated. Go back and report to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006991
text: Defeat the demons of the 1st Isolation Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006992
text: Some of Nuaele's demons used to be Hauberk's demons who've received empowered Marks from Hauberk before. Defeat Nuaele's demons in the 2nd Isolation Area and get Hauberk's Marks back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006993
text: Use Hauberk's seal fragment to suppress the demons in the 3rd Isolation Area and find out Nuaele's plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006994
text: Found out Nuaele's plans. Tell Kupole Aurne about Nuaele's plans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006995
text: Figured out the plans of Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Arune on what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006996
text: Kupole Arune suggested defeating the strongest and most loyal servants of Nuaele. Defeat the Harugals in the 4th Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006997
text: Defeated the Harugals. Talk to Kupole Arune again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006998
text: Defeat Harugals in the 4th Isolation Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_006999
text: You're prepared to defeat the Demon Lord Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_007000
text: Defeat Demon Lord Nuaele

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_007001
text: Nuaele is gone from Demon Prison and to stabilize it Kupole Arune asked you to defeat the remaining demons in 1st Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150428_007002
text: There are demon monsters left in 4th Isolation Area that are still following Nuaele's orders because of her fragments. Kupole Arune asked you to defeat those monsters and retrieve the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007003
text: Kateen Forest Entrance is relatively safe but don't think of going in any further.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007004
text: The baron is trying his best to purify this farm. {nl}The workers sometimes say weird stuff but don't mind them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007005
text: It would be best if I went myself, but I'm in no position to leave my place now. {nl}Please purify the sanctum using this Holy Water for now. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007006
text: I want to see my son healthy soon. {nl}It's a pain waiting for him to spit out the energy of the evil curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007007
text: It's all the same for farmers and soldiers. {nl}One side works and the other manages it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007008
text: The power source needs nature's strength,{nl}and what would be the most suitable for that at the moment?{nl}The crops that fill the warehouse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007009
text: Even if what the baron really wants is purification. {nl}It doesn't mean we need to bear losing colleagues and expensive farm rent fees. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007010
text: Lastly.. The monsters constantly preying on the food storage is a problem. {nl}There is a fellow guarding that place, but it's dangerous all the time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007011
text: The baron has a bad reputation for the things he has done. {nl}And the strange things that are happening nowadays... I'm sure something fishy is going on. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007012
text: What about getting kindling from the Orange Dandels around here, and continuously lighting it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007013
text: It's not easy to get samples. {nl}I don't have enough time to research them either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007014
text: Hmm, even if it's not the Church's order, shouldn't the Great Cathedral be restored first... {nl}Wouldn't we be able to find the answer to the curse more easily then?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007015
text: Our mission initally was to manage and look over the prison. {nl}But now, we take Goddess Vakarine's orders to block the demons and close the gap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007016
text: Hauberk just passed by this way. {nl}I'm sure he's trying to escape through the goddess' barrier that isn't fully restored.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007017
text: Hauberk is also a sinner. {nl}You don't need to sympathize with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007018
text: Just as I thought. The Monster Suppressor was the problem. {nl}It was to stop the monsters from multiplying but it almost messed up the crops too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007019
text: The bees are a problem but the monsters that came in from the other forests are a bigger problem. {nl}I'm sure they are here for the honey. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007020
text: Are you the one Joseph went to find? {nl}Well, it doesn't matter even if you're not. {nl}If you don't help us, then you're no different from the other Revelators who ran away. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007021
text: There must be fine documents still left in the deeper area of the Great Cathedral... {nl}I feel bad about not being able to see it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007022
text: I'm making medicine to cure the cursed pilgrim. {nl}I'm almost done but it's really difficult to get thistles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007023
text: Whether you have business here or not, you better leave this place if you don't have permission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007024
text: You might as well leave if you're going to talk about 'corruption'. {nl}If not... there is another way for you to get permission from me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007025
text: If you want something, you're going to have to give something. {nl}Did you think I'd let you enter for free?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007026
text: It will be better for you to explain it rather than me. {nl}After all, you were the reason Shaton threw away his obsession.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007027
text: You were the one ransacking their nest, so it was on you. {nl}But I also have a reputation, so I will reward you for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007028
text: Better return quickly

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007029
text: Better meet the priest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007030
text: The Revelators come First

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007031
text: Better stand back as it's dangerous

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007032
text: Better give up as it's dangerous

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007033
text: Notice/The magic circle strengthened when you removed the 4 crystals!!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007034
text: Notice/!/You must gather the spell of monsters in the pot and bury it in front of the magic circle.#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007035
text: Breaking the container/HAMMERING/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007036
text: Better do it yourself

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007037
text: Brewer Dorjen is angry because he was stopped from burning the forest. {nl}Try to calm Dorjen down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007038
text: If they're not after the honey, then there's only one thing possible. Check Bichiu Altar, where monsters have been gathering.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007039
text: The Tree Root Crystal reacted strangely and corrupted its surroundings! First, defeat the monsters nearby and find the scattered Tree Root Crystal Cores.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007040
text: Monsters came out when you worshiped at the sanctum. Defeat the monsters first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007041
text: Royal Survey Corps Ukert seems to have sensed something. Talk to Ukert again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007042
text: Get the secret hint from the platform in Meile Oratorium and obtain the Holy Relic of Mercy. If you have difficulty solving the secret, call on Aurelius' Spirit and ask him for help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007043
text: It's curious that a wine cask is lying off the beaten path. Go and take a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007044
text: Joana wants to find out what the strange aura near Ramus Crossroads is. Attack the monster to drop its HP below 50%, then bring it to the strange aura below the magic circle and interact with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007045
text: Goddess Vakarine's strength alone is not enough to close the dimensional crack. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150511_007046
text: Nuaele is gone from Demon Prison and to stabilize it, Kupole Arune asked you defeat the remaining demons in 1st Isolation Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007047
text: I really want to help the soldiers who are trying to clear the Thorn Forest,{nl} but sadly I just don't have the means to.{nl} Could you do something about the Treegools that are harassing the soldiers?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007048
text: It's dangerous here, get back to the town.{nl} What are the soldiers even doing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007049
text: Ah, so you're the Revelator? {nl} I have a problem, but with you here it might not be so bad. {nl} Mind if I borrow some of your time?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007050
text: You are aware that we are the unit sent out to take care of the Gaigalas?{nl} Recruit! Take this report to Commander Wallace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007051
text: If we get rid of Gaigalas, we can smooth things out with them.{nl}Please make your way to the Worrying Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007052
text: Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007053
text: What a pain in the ass.{nl} How do we convince those monks...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007054
text: Hey you, have you ever seen the one called Ebonypawn?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007055
text: I hope this that was the end of it.{nl}It seems that we Hunters have a bad reputation around these parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007056
text: Are things going smoothly?{nl}I'm hoping to hear good things in the near future.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007057
text: Please help our Natasha.{nl}She's a good girl, if a bit inexperienced...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007058
text: Hopefully this can be resolved without causing a conflict with the monks.{nl}I trust you in taking this matter appropriately.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007059
text: For the most part, do try and appease the monk's demands.{nl}We'll assist you wherever we can.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007060
text: I'm glad to hear that Natasha is doing well.{nl} I wish you the best at Raoki Swamps.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007061
text: Good. So finally the time to retrieve the monastery.{nl}We will be using our power in a such a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007062
text: We've reached this far with your help, Revelator.{nl}Now we just to have to hope that Ebonypawn gets taken care of well. Let's go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007063
text: Senior Monk Potos

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007064
text: What brought you here?{nl}With the circumstances not heading to the way they used to be, we will try our best to help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007065
text: I am sorry if you've come here to visit the monastery.{nl}We are like this since the monsters rushed in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007066
text: The goddesses have taught us to greet everyone with warmth.{nl}Due to the difficulty we are having at the moment, we weren't able to greet the Hunters warmly. I regret this..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007067
text: If that trap was set up by Ebonypawn, I will stand by the Hunters' side.{nl}Whatever excuses you make, they cannot be compared with the pain of our brothers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007068
text: Brother Marko is at Viltis Forest and Goss is at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}Without their support, it is impossible to persuade the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007069
text: I support the Hunters, but I don't know what the other senior monks are thinking.{nl}However, I don't think it would be a problem if we get hard evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007070
text: Monk Wiley

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007071
text: My heart aches to see my brothers suffer in pain.{nl}I am doing my best to take care of them, but I am somewhat scared.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007072
text: For me, my brothers come first instead of the Hunters or the monastery.{nl}I am praying to the goddesses, so that they can recover as soon as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007073
text: Hunter Reina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007074
text: You should be careful when you are crossing this forest.{nl}There are traps everywhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007075
text: You don't seem like a monk... Do you know anything about Ebonypawn?{nl}I heard they created a mess near the farm in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007076
text: Even after taking this antidote, the paralysis doesn't fade away.{nl}But, as a Hunter, I cannot go back until I finish my task.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007077
text: I don't know how many people are suffering because of Ebonypawn.{nl}To put this in other words, Ebonypawn is 'so great'.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007078
text: Senior Monk Marko

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007079
text: The abbot is trapped in the monastery, where it is full of monsters, but mentioning Ebonypawn..{nl}They shouldn't be that rude. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007080
text: If you are going to talk about the Hunters, I refuse to listen.{nl}They are rude people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007081
text: He barely walked here and then fainted.{nl}I think he is breathing for now...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007082
text: Boros! Wake up, Boros!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007083
text: I regret that I was being so harsh to the Hunters until now.{nl}I hope my decision helps the Hunters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007084
text: You should persuade Goss at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}But, since you don't have the decisive proof about Ebonypawn... I can't guarantee the withdrawl of the protection.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007085
text: Hunter Natasha

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007086
text: Persuading someone is so hard.{nl}I hope someone helps me...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007087
text: I wonder how Captain Mintz would react if he was in my situation..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007088
text: Help whatever you could on what they are trying to do.{nl}We, Hunters would help as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007089
text: I should have suggested to help retrieving the monastery from the first place.{nl}I wasn't patient.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007090
text: I will take care for him so don't worry too much, but go to Laukyme Swamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007091
text: You can go to Laukyme Swamp by going up Glade Hillroad again.{nl}Please report to Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz on your way back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007092
text: Hunter Bastille

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007093
text: Are you heading to Tyla Monastery?{nl}The monsters there are already worshiping.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007094
text: Careless, careless.{nl}I was so careless...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007095
text: Monk Chad

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007096
text: Please do not get close to those Hunters.{nl}They are incredibly rude people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007097
text: I don't like the Hunters at all.{nl}I hope they wouldn't change their minds because we are protecting Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007098
text: Senior Monk Goss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007099
text: If you are the pilgrim who came to see Tyla Monastery, I am so sorry.{nl}We lost the place to the monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007100
text: I don't know what the goddesses would say if she sees this...{nl}Gloomy...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007101
text: This is all I know about Ebonypawn.{nl}I think there weren't anything special besides that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007102
text: If you need to more about Ebonypawn, please ask me anytime.{nl}I will answer everything I know about Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007103
text: Finally, we are near Tyla Monastery.{nl}We want to attack, but we should also think about the monks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007104
text: To defeat Ebonypawn, we will do anything.{nl}To the ones who are from the tower of the stars, Ebonypawn is a such creature.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007105
text: Monk Jones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007106
text: The moment now seems like a short nightmare.{nl}We were studying scriptures and drawing water at the monastery not long ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007107
text: I know that I am pathetic since I was forced out by the monsters...{nl}But, I am worried more about the abbot who is praying at the prayer room without knowing anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007108
text: Monk Jeffrey

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007109
text: A long time ago, this forest used to be completely packed with thorns just like Sirdgela Forest.{nl}After the purification, we all thought the monsters were eliminated.. But that was just an illusion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007110
text: I just want to know where all these monsters came from.{nl}After the purification, the only monsters were the ones that lost their ways.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007111
text: Hey! Wake up!{nl}Can you hear my voice?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007112
text: He is fainted, but fortunately he is breathing.{nl}But, the fracture is serious.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007113
text: Ebonypawn, you cheap...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007114
text: Fortunatly, his inner organs seem alright.{nl}But, I can't cure him by transporting him to other places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007115
text: I am going to take care of the outer edge of the monastery.{nl}In the name of the goddesses, I wish you the good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007116
text: We are all ready here.{nl}Although I can't participate in saving the abbot, I will do my best here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007117
text: The prayer room where the abbot is located is safe.{nl}But, we should save him anyways.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007118
text: Our preparations are done here.{nl}If you are ready, tell Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007119
text: You will act with me and Goss.{nl}If you are finished, tell Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007120
text: Hunters can move whenever they want.{nl}I will do my best for the first time in a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007121
text: Moheim is smart so he should've hid the crystal sphere well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007122
text: You can't open it outside without the crystal sphere.{nl}Unless the abbot opens it himself...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007123
text: It's so good to hear that you are okay.{nl}While you are getting the crystal sphere, we should get ready to rescue the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007124
text: I would've bled a lot if it weren't you.{nl}The goddesses must have helped me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007125
text: Fortunately, the abbot seems to know nothing.{nl}I guess that's better. Anyways, the issues have been resolved.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007126
text: I am less worried to find out the abbot is okay.{nl}Now what should we do about Ebonypawn...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007127
text: I am discussing with the abbot.{nl}Please wait beside Mintz for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007128
text: We haven't finished discussing yet.{nl}Please wait little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007129
text: You will leave soon. May the goddesses bless you.{nl}Come to Tyla Monastery sometimes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007130
text: I regret a bit since we should have allied together in the first place.{nl}I guess I forgot the lessons of the goddesses for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007131
text: It is so fortunate that the abbot is okay.{nl}I... feel like crying.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007132
text: I kinda expected that he would be alright since he was in the prayer room...{nl}But seeing him okay with my own eyes comforts me more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007133
text: Please wait beside Mintz for a while.{nl}I should explain everything so it may take little time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007134
text: I've heard about Ebonypawn's letter from Goss.{nl}Please wait little more since everything fits the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007135
text: We've retrieved the monastery and the Hunters fulfilled what they wanted...{nl}These are all blessings of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007136
text: Without your help, I am sure that it would've not gone so easy.{nl}I've heard the stories of many Revelators before, but you are the only one I saw in person.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007137
text: Monk Moheim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007138
text: It's so good that we've retrieved the monastery...{nl}But it's a mess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007139
text: Should we get rid of the monsters first or clean this place first...{nl}That's the problem we are facing at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007140
text: Now is the best chance to get Ebonypawn.{nl}We are surrounding the monastery so I guess even he would not be able to sneak out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007141
text: You saw Ebonypawn?{nl}He is not here. We better go down a bit more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007142
text: Please pray so that we could get Ebonypawn.{nl}I wish you the good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007143
text: Don't worry Revelator. Just go on your way. The people here are just fainted temporarily.{nl}I hope to see you next time for something better instead of Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007144
text: I lost many colleagues from Petrifying Frost here.{nl}I don't understand why I am here to support a newbie Chronomancer here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007145
text: On top of that, we don't know when those violent monsters would attack here.{nl}I don't care what you do, I just hope those monsters get taken care of.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007146
text: We are still sad that we lost our colleagues.{nl}It is very unfortunate that we should take care of that woman in this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007147
text: Thanks. We can stay safe here for some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007148
text: Our comrades who were attacked by Petrifying Frost... they are just left there without avoiding the rain and the wind.{nl}On top of that, we have a limited support... We have no choice, but to wait.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007149
text: But those damn monsters! They are attacking our colleagues.{nl}Please. Could you be with our colleagues to protect them for a while?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007150
text: My old friend, Galen is one of the victims.{nl}Please protect him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007151
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I hope the reinforcement comes soon so he could return to his family even if he is petrified.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007152
text: We didn't treat them badly, but they betrayed us.{nl}Dico Thieves stole the supplies from us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007153
text: They must have taken them to Drasos Chapel Ruins, but since I can't leave this place, I guess we all gonna die.{nl}I am sorry, but can you retrieve the supplies that were stolen by the thieves?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007154
text: A few decades ago, the thieves attacked the guard camp or stole the supplies secretly.{nl}They were punished for doing so, but I guess they forgot about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007155
text: They lured us in front of them and stole the goods from behind.{nl}We should set something up, but our chiefs are fighting against the Knights of Kaliss. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007156
text: We have one more trouble.{nl}I mean Sabina, who is a Knight of Kaliss.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007157
text: They are insisting that they would not go back until they find the damaged artifacts.{nl}We can't get out from this place so I don't know what they want us to do...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007158
text: The city that was destroyed a few hundreds years ago has no assets or no people to protect.{nl}I rather feel like protecting a historical site. Even tomb thieves are here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007159
text: Now, I just hope Sabina stays calm.{nl}We don't want to be like them here because of the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007160
text: It's not an easy thing to ditch the Royal Army guards.{nl}I want to know the truth here. The truth which the soldiers really hate about.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007161
text: I need your help since you don't seem to belong to any side.{nl}Could you make rubber copies of the records that are remaining here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007162
text: These are the records from the time when the Fortress of the Land collapsed.{nl}We could maybe know more about the Fortress of the Land from the headquarter of Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007163
text: But, the Fortress of the Land can't be entered because the Royal Army guards are restricting the access.{nl}Even the Knights of Kaliss.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007164
text: Maybe... we could restore the time of the portal that was used when we retreated from the Fortress of the Land.{nl}It is dangerous from this point on so if you are going to quit, please tell me now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007165
text: What we are planning right now could lead us to the gallows.{nl}Please keep it secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007166
text: When we were in the era of Premier Eminent, we were supported by the superior troops, lots of supplies and etc.{nl}But, 600 years have passed after Premier Eminent died.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007167
text: No matter how large the rebellion was, after experiencing Medzio Diena, our support waned. If anything, it's a question of whether we must remain here. For 600 years?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007168
text: I heard the Dico Thieves were well known thieves.{nl}I heard that they were separated on Medzio Diena... Anyways... what they are doing is like what bandits are doing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007169
text: I also know that there are thieves called Amanda Thieves. They were quiet.{nl}I want to know if they really exist or not since I never saw them before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007170
text: Both of them are criminals that we should catch when we receive more reinforcements.{nl}Especially, Dico Thieves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007171
text: We are observing what the researchers of the Knights of Kaliss are doing, and while pretending to be their guards.{nl}Sabina was one of them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007172
text: They disappear and appear again using the artifacts that are remaining in the city so I have troubles chasing after them.{nl}But, were Chronomancers the people who investigate the portals?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007173
text: I really appreciate for your kindness, but it's not going to be easy. If it was easy, we would've found them already.{nl}I don't know why, but the monsters ate the artifacts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007174
text: This place is the cursed city of the traitor, Ruklys.{nl}It has been cursed with the Petrifying Frost since the end of the rebellion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007175
text: We will permit your entry since the Knights of Kaliss requested us to do so,{nl}but please remain at places where we can keep an eye on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007176
text: I don't know how great you were in the past,{nl}but you have to follow the rules of the kingdom here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007177
text: Benas asked us to secure the route that connects to the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Ah, he is the ruler of the kingdoms soldiers in this region.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007178
text: If you could defeat the monsters in the ruins, that will be the way to contribute to the goddesses and the kingdom.{nl}Of course, I promise you some rewards in return.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007179
text: It will not be bad to show us a good impression.{nl}Because this land is ruled by the Royal Army guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007180
text: It wasn't done by the thieves. We are moving the objects to places where they could be utilized.{nl}It will be way better than them disappearing from here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007181
text: Not bad.{nl}I guess the rumors don't always get exaggerated.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007182
text: We are activating the detectors here because of irregular Petrifying Frost that are blowing,{nl}but, there are no soldiers who could check that due to a recent battle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007183
text: So if you could do that for us, that will show us {nl}your loyalty to the kingdom and continue our efforts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007184
text: There are monsters who try to go after the soldiers who maintain the device.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007185
text: The Petrifying Frost are to be blown from the two places.{nl}I heard you are a quite famous Revelator. Aren't you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007186
text: From some time ago, more soldiers are being attacked by Sparnashorn near the detectors.{nl}If you are the one from the rumor, you would be able to face against that monster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007187
text: Those soldiers are the ones who survived the Petrifying Frost and Sparnashorn.{nl}They can't fight against Sparnashorn since they paralyzed from fear. {nl}In this state they have no chance of defeating Sparnashorn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007188
text: The Petrifying Frost has been delayed a bit.{nl}Whatever we do, there is no way to block the punishments that were brought by Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007189
text: Now the only thing that remains is Sparnashorn... Defeat it quickly and get out of there.{nl}Even a great Revelator like you can not withstand the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007190
text: Retreating is also a tactic, but we can't always do it.{nl}We should finish it when we have an volunteer who is loyal and competent like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007191
text: Hearing that it was defeated is the most hopeful story I've heard in years. {nl}Now I better let the troops rest first and tell them the good news.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007192
text: Although I don't know you, I am glad to see you.{nl}It's good to be acquainted with someone here. Everyone should help each other out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007193
text: For example, help cleaning the monsters at our workplace.{nl}The gathering place. What do you think? Can you help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007194
text: The kind of work I do is business secret so I can't tell you what it is... {nl}No one owns these things anyway. Finders keep them if them if they need them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007195
text: That fast? Have you not missed any of the monsters?{nl}Ahah. Those coward Royal Army guards won't get near here so don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007196
text: You want to know how I got here? {nl}It's all because I have connections. There are some Royal Army guards who buy claws of the monsters to raise their work records.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007197
text: But actually, I don't want to be around those monsters. Especially here.{nl}If you could get me those claws, we will become really good friends.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007198
text: I think you are misunderstanding something.{nl}We are archaeologists, not thieves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007199
text: Thank you so much friend.{nl}Though this seems quite polished.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007200
text: I will tell you something. You better not think about getting something here.{nl}Aside from us, there is the outrageous Dico Thieves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007201
text: I don't want to see them more than those Royal Army guards.{nl}The goods they brought here from outside are piled up at the entrance route of the outer wall... {nl}What would occur if they all disappear?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007202
text: I took a sneak peek, but it seems they haven't returned yet.{nl}Move fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007203
text: Seems like Dico Thieves are planning to do their business bigger than I thought. {nl}That's an enormous amount. Do you think they also have connections with the Royal Army?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007204
text: The terrible scene you can see in this city are the results of the rebellion that was carried out by Ruklys and the citizens 600 years ago.{nl}The Petrifying Frost that started to blow after suppressing the rebellion turn everything into stones.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007205
text: The kingdom would've been destroyed already if Premier Eminent wasn't present.{nl}If he was still alive... We may have got over these hard times sooner.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007206
text: That's the scary wind that turns everything into stones.{nl}After Medzio Diena, the occurrence of the wind varied irregularly.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007207
text: Once you encounter the curse of the Petrifying Frost, you can't restore it.{nl}The sin of the traitor, Ruklys is that heavy.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007208
text: The Knights of Kaliss is trying to find a remedy...{nl}The curse continued for 600 years. I don't think there's a remedy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007209
text: Sparnashorn appears with the wind of Petrifying Frost.{nl}To avoid the exhausted soldiers not get involved with it, we should avoid them fighting against Sparnashorn.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007210
text: If we could eliminate the weak Petrifying Frost with this absorbing scroll at the great square, we may delay the time a bit.{nl}We would be able to lure Sparnashorn to the old market when the next Petrifying Frost blow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007211
text: I've a friend who's supposed to come here but he's nowhere to be found.{nl}I think something happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007212
text: He is hiding among the guards near the great square.{nl}This water bottle has a code on it. If you give it to the guards, he'll know and talk to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007213
text: He is hiding among the guards.{nl}This water bottle has a code on it. If you give it to the guards, he'll know and talk to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007214
text: Hush! Lower your voice. It will be the end of both of us if we get caught.{nl}Did that stupid Hubertas send you here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007215
text: I told him many times that I'd go back if I'm done with my work here.{nl}There is a big problem here actually.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007216
text: Our family can't come into the city from outside.{nl}We can't bring in my family without the troops knowing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007217
text: I'm going to make big fuss at the great square. I'm going to call in Saltistter that are roaming around the area. {nl}In order to do this, you need to gather scented stone powder from the monsters. Can you do it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007218
text: Our families should have passed this place earlier than the Royal Army. {nl}But Retia hurried things when the Petrifying Frost swept by some time ago so we weren't able to.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007219
text: If you pour this here, you will soon see the Saltistter show up its huge body itself.{nl}But that is not our plan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007220
text: We should not make this place a battlefield. Then our families can't pass through.{nl}Let's rub this powder onto the Rambears that appear at the great square.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007221
text: Then Saltistter will attack Rambears. {nl}Retia will not just stand and watch her area be invaded like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007222
text: Our families come from various areas.{nl}I was also once a junior officer with dreams to become a strategist.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007223
text: Of course, it was before the area I was assigned to completely disappeared from the map on Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007224
text: Did you use everything?{nl}Then now it's time to get busy!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007225
text: Go to Retia and tell her that Saltistter is coming here.{nl}She won't believe it but I can already feel the Saltistter running at us. {nl}Hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007226
text: You just have to tell her that Saltistter is coming.{nl}There is no reason for her to suspect us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007227
text: Our families passed through this place without any problems.{nl}Since you are still being trusted by our Royal Army guards, you will not be discovered.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007228
text: This city... you will find many interesting truths if you continue your journey in this area.{nl}And you may also meet our families.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007229
text: I don't want to be here either.{nl}I would not be here if I didn't receive the orders to support the Knights of Kaliss...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007230
text: Kostas has not come back for days so I can't leave this place.{nl}Also the monsters are running wild so I can't just stay still.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007231
text: We have to be here until Kostas comes back.{nl}There are lot of things to do, so I hope he comes back soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007232
