text: The officers don't like the Knights of Kaliss. {nl}As for lower rank guards like me, the Knights of Kaliss give us supplies and supports so there's no reason for us to hate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007233
text: If we can find the Symbol of Silt, then we would be able to enter the area without any problems.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007234
text: I can't hear anything from Kostas.{nl}Ah... I don't know how I should report.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007235
text: The Royal Army guards, the Knights of Kaliss, and we grave robbers are forming an excellent balance.{nl}That's why people can at least walk around.. Before that, this place was not a place to stay.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007236
text: Much of the city remained in its original form 600 years after the misfortune due to Petrifying Frost.{nl}One of my missions here is to clear the records of rebels remaining here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007237
text: I can't leave my post since Kostas is not here.{nl}You can find many records if you look around the trade area so I want you to take care of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007238
text: Don't mind what's written on the records. {nl}It's all nonsense.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007239
text: I have to escort, clean up, and guard. I wonder how they are expecting me to do everything alone. {nl}It's a good thing you came to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007240
text: It is an old story,{nl}but many Royal Army guards came to this place to do a preliminary check to support for the research on the Knights of Kaliss.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007241
text: But, unlike their expectations, the Petrifying Frost were waiting for them.{nl}They died there... I want to get their keepsakes, but it's hard...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007242
text: The authorities do not take it well that tens of soldiers were sacrificed for support activities. {nl}That's why the Royal Army and the Knights of Kaliss have become distant.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007243
text: Good thing I was off duty that day.. I don't even want to think about it.{nl}I will deliver this to the families of the deceased.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007244
text: Gofden...{nl}The Silt Certificate... Ah sorry I talked alone in front of you.{nl}When you are carrying this, you will not receive the curse of the Petrifying Frost. Don't you think that's amazing?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007245
text: People say you go around to save the world according to the will of the goddess?{nl}Then you could also save this city!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007246
text: Our employer does not support us any other funds besides the research funds to revive the city.{nl}That's why the wizards like me, who want to come up with some results are researching while avoiding the eyes of the Royal Army guards and the Knights of Kaliss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007247
text: This will be enough.{nl}Good. Let's combine this with the Symbol of Silt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007248
text: We've succeeded the combination... but I can't predict how effective this would be.{nl}I will give you the Symbol of Silt so try using it on the monsters in this area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007249
text: If it's effective, then something would react to it.{nl}Maybe since the effects for the Petrifying Frost disappeared, it could take little faster. Anyways, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007250
text: Since I handed over the Symbol of Silt to you, I am gonna be dead when the Petrifying Frost blow here.{nl}Please finish the task as quickly as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007251
text: So it was effective right?{nl}Then now, I will amplify it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007252
text: Ah... I almost forgot.{nl}Even if I amplify the Symbol of Silt with the reacting stone, the power doesn't last eternally.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007253
text: Good, good... I will activate it only when the Petrifying Frost blow.{nl}I should obtain the detector somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007254
text: If you could bring me the detector, I will do the rest.{nl}You've contributed a lot in this experiment so I will give you the effects of the Symbol of Silt.{nl}Although it would not last long...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007255
text: There were experiments in the past.{nl}At Roxona Reconstruction Agency, there was a separate laboratory to research on the curse of the Petrifying Frost.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007256
text: But then demons rushed in...{nl}Most of them were killed by the demons or became petrified on the experimental devices.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007257
text: This Symbol of Silt... it reminds me of many things.{nl}It was too bad since the results of the experiments were appearing at that time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007258
text: They told me to protect the objects that are gathered at Gerove Workshop Site.{nl}Do you think this makes sense? Why don't they ask the monsters to protect it instead?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007259
text: Ah! We should just do it like that.{nl}Hey, could you help me a bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007260
text: It's a good thing the cowardly Dico Thieves did not reach here yet.{nl}Things are limited but people are coming in flocks to take them away..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007261
text: If it's cleared up that much, then looks like I can start already.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007262
text: There are some boxes that our thieves left at Gerove Workshop.{nl}When you rub Velas Grass onto them, the monsters would rush in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007263
text: But, you gotta be careful.{nl}The monsters would not treat you preciously so run away after attacking them a little.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007264
text: I think I can leave this place for a while because of you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007265
text: You haven't seen Dico Thieves right?{nl}In fact, I haven't seen them as well, but Amanda told you to be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007266
text: Please take care of the monsters in the military district while I prepare the test. {nl}We should not be caught or interfered.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007267
text: It's relatively safe on top of the fortress.{nl}There are monsters and thieves swarming if you leave this place.{nl}Of course, the Royal Army guards as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007268
text: I don't like it, having to guard here with the Knights of Kaliss around.{nl}You will never understand what it feels like to guard here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007269
text: Until now, I am sure that you've only seen the artifacts that stopped their time.{nl}But, it will be different from this point on since I came here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007270
text: I will proceed the test from up here.{nl}Please go to the portal and activate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007271
text: Don't worry too much.{nl}Everything is just your memories at then so they won't do any harms to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007272
text: I am sorry. Aren't you hurt somewhere?{nl}I didn't know it would go over my expectations.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007273
text: What was that... demons? Are they really demons?{nl}I have no way of knowing. I guess I will have to tune up the portal that leads to the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007274
text: It is little dangerous... but, I want to suggest a deal to you.{nl}We are actually cooperating with Amanda thieves. Yes. I know it's insane.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007275
text: To obtain what you want, you should take this risk.{nl}Just help Amanda thieves to enter into the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007276
text: Would dead people come back if the curse is cured in this city?{nl}No, but the times after now are more important.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007277
text: We feel like we are risking our lives every seconds.{nl}But we continuously watch over so that nothing will go wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007278
text: We're different from those Dico Thieves.{nl}If you help well this time, I will surely pay you back someday.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007279
text: The guards were asking what the fuss was all about so I told them about you. {nl}Everything should be alright.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007280
text: If you watch over the city from here, it feels like the time has stopped.{nl}However, many incidents are occurring everyday.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007281
text: We need to bring Stephonas here.{nl}He promised to get us the frost core which will help in studying the Petrifying Frost.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007282
text: We should empty the watermill ruins, but I might be suspected if I carry out the work...{nl}Since you are respected by the Royal Army guards, I want you to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007283
text: They will reduce their boundaries as they are get attacked.{nl}Or bring a huge army in... but, they won't be able to do that with the current state of the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007284
text: Now, please lure the guards at the watermill ruins.{nl}Just tell them the monsters are going crazy at Estuary Bank Three Ways.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007285
text: Stephonas will pass by secretly.{nl}Of course, you will receive their respects.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007286
text: Rofdel will be watching from the watchtower but on a foggy day like this, it's useless.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007287
text: Stephonas passed through safely.{nl}He was looking for you. Go and help him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007288
text: The guards won't mention our names to Rofdel.{nl}What they have been taking until now was all against the military law.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007289
text: Have you seen the records that are remaining in this city? Didn't they feel somewhat strange...{nl}The Knights of Kaliss are collecting the records which the Royal Army guards have not yet eliminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007290
text: I have a request. Please gather the propagandas which the Royal Army guards circulated.{nl}When we compare those with the records that we've gathered, we will find something lacking.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007291
text: As the defeat of Ruklys became more and more concrete, the Royal Army guards circulated the propagandas more.{nl}There must be some propagandas left in the Petrifying Frost as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007292
text: They made such embarrassing stories sound like a heroic epic to the ignorant people. {nl}600 years have passed, but they are still embarrassing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007293
text: You're the one who made me an opportunity.{nl}But, what the hell. I never heard there were so many guards here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007294
text: I need your help. I need a more powerful bomb.{nl}The frost core that I promised with the Knights of Kaliss is inside the body of Stone Froster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007295
text: Just do as I told you. {nl}If it's not the bomb, we can't pull out the frost core.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007296
text: The purity level is not satisfactory.{nl}It could take some time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007297
text: Since we don't have the fuse, it was made to explode when it gets hit.{nl}I will give you this so I want you to test it on the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007298
text: If we can't get this done, we can't even start with the next step.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007299
text: It won't explode right away and explosion is not steady.{nl}What to do..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007300
text: It should stick to the monster in order to secure the time to explode with a BAM!{nl}Can you get Sticky Liquid from the monsters in Viskas?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007301
text: I'll say it again but this is the only way to keep you safe.{nl}Hmm? Of course you should throw it. I am busy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007302
text: I think you spilled some on your way. {nl}Too bad for your new shoes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007303
text: You will find a stiff Stone Froster in the residential area. {nl}Throw this to Stone Froster to wake it up. Don't forget to move far after throwing it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007304
text: When his armor opens up, we should aim for the space.{nl}Don't forget about the frost core.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007305
text: So this is the frost core that bothered many people.. {nl}The soldiers who helped you will tell the guy watching from the watchtower about your heroic stories so they won't suspect you. Dont' worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007306
text: I was worried a lot because it seems there's a big fuss over there.{nl}But, I also had some productive results. Everything will be alright soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007307
text: If you are going to be near here, please come to me. {nl}I could cast a spell on you to protect you from the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007308
text: Good. Let's go to the old market. {nl}When you touch the petrification detector, Sparnashorn will start to attack you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007309
text: Those Dico Thieves are so smart.{nl}They buy cheap antiques from outside and bury them where the Petrifying Frost blow.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007310
text: Then they will turn into stones.{nl}The aristocrats in the big cities get deceived by them and they buy them at expensive prices.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007311
text: There are stones that constantly float down the Vadovo Dock.{nl}It is the record of the rebellion from 600 years ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007312
text: The records contain the contents that discourage the soldiers so the officers destroyed them from time to time.{nl}But, since we don't have enough workforce, I want you to take care of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007313
text: I don't understand how these heavy stuffs float down here and make us dizzy.{nl}I will probably use them when we repair the watchtower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007314
text: Whenever the Petrifying Frost blow, the number of soldiers decreases, but the kingdom doesn't possess additional soldiers to support.{nl}That's why we ask the grave robbers or the refugees to join the military.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007315
text: Only thing I can do is to attach these leaflets around here.{nl}I hope you could help me by thinking that you are supporting the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007316
text: I'm sure people taking the leaflets but the number of applicants have decreased recently. {nl}Is it because the grave robbers started checking inside. Isn't it suspicious?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007317
text: When a person like Premier Eminent appears again, I'm sure that the kingdom will flourish quickly.{nl}I will pray to the goddesses that you could be an important person like him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007318
text: The number of monsters in Kovos Hall Site is increasing. {nl}We don't even know what is leading them here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007319
text: We don't expect anything from the Royal Army guards who were supposed to help us in the first place.{nl}If you could help us instead, then I will give you the rewards that I promised to give to the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007320
text: We've investigated about the incident that was occurring in this city from a long time ago.{nl}We are trying to find hidden facts about the rebellion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007321
text: I heard you have lots of battle experiences.{nl}I even want to suggest you to join the Knights of Kaliss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007322
text: I believe that there is no curse in this world that can't be cured.{nl}With all my faith, I will discover the cure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007323
text: You're as great as the rumors say. {nl}The Knights of Kaliss need heroes like you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007324
text: This is an interesting place. {nl}This city is filled with things to experiment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007325
text: Stone debris and dust blow a lot in this area so many soldiers and knights cough severely. {nl}The headquarters send us refreshing candies mixed with medicinal herbs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007326
text: But our soldiers were swept by the Petrifying Frost while carrying our supplies for this month.{nl}When we found them, the monsters already stole all of them. {nl}Can you get defeat those monsters and get back the refreshing candies?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007327
text: I would like to give you some if we have extras. {nl}Even the grave robbers are preying on the candies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007328
text: I won't blame you if you eat one secretly. {nl}But you don't seem to be that kind of a person.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007329
text: Soldiers patrolling this area were swept by stone frost while passing by Stalactite square some time ago.{nl}We are only affiliated to the Royal Army, but we're mostly residents of Kalis province.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007330
text: I want to help my folks from back home, but there is no way to get them out of the curse. {nl}We can only get their last will and keepsakes for their families. {nl}Won't you show your kindness for them before they lose their consciousness?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007331
text: I understand their loyalty for the kingdom, but when I see them make people do impossible things that lead to deaths...{nl}I don't know who is the monster anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007332
text: In order to restore the city, the Knights of Kaliss hired many experts.{nl}But they just recruit people without any support afterwards.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007333
text: I desperately need your help so that I can keep doing my research.{nl}If we could create a miraculous medicine that would drag out the{nl}controlled spirit, we may be able to find out the source of this curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007334
text: Besides the knowledge of the spells I possess, I am trying to approach it with various methods.{nl}I will lift this curse for sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007335
text: That's enough ingredients to make the Liberation Elixir. {nl}Now, let's start.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007336
text: I will give you this Liberation Elixir. Use it on the petrified victims at Vienti Fortress.{nl}Their souls trapped in their body might tell you something about what they last witnessed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007337
text: The angry souls might attack you.{nl}Please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007338
text: There was nothing to find out about other than the fact that {nl}they were all trembling in panic and fear when they died.{nl}I guess I better look for even older victims.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007339
text: We can't even find the traces of the bodies of the victims who were sacrificed on the day of Ruklys' rebellion due to Petrifying Frost.{nl}But, that angry souls are deeply permeated into the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007340
text: Please light the fire at the incense burner that I set at Vienti Fortress with the Knightage.{nl}The angry souls will tell you the story of that day.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007341
text: Please do not stimulate the angry souls.{nl}Since they are unstable, I don't know how they would react.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007342
text: The pain, anger... The betrayal and fear...{nl}I can still feel the feelings from that day.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007343
text: But not towards humans. It's as if it is something deep and dark... {nl}I am going back to the knights to find out more about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007344
text: Even trees or paper turn into stones besides living creatures...{nl}I am very interested in these non-senses. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007345
text: If you could help me...{nl}Maybe we could save them even if they are cursed with the petrification. Although they may lose their arms.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007346
text: Even if it works on just one or two from ten of them, that would be great.{nl}I trust on my knowledge and skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007347
text: You weren't able to save any of them? {nl}I guess this is not a good way. I will take back what is left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007348
text: I think we should use different drugs and test as much as we can. {nl}But then we will need a lot of samples.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007349
text: Can you defeat the monsters in Neiveikiama Castle and get me petrified samples?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007350
text: This should be enough for about five tests. Good work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007351
text: To tell you one more time, the curse of the petrification is a chemical reaction so I don't think you would be able to restore it.{nl}If you could come to me fast, then you will save your life even if you lose one of your legs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007352
text: May those victims rest in peace.{nl}However, like the river that attracts those who are thirsty, this place is astounding for me and my thirst for knowledge.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007353
text: There's a dumb monster that is ruining the beautiful place on the top of Nebekia Fortress.{nl}I want you to take care of him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007354
text: It if has a brain, how can it go around ruining this? {nl}Oh well, maybe that's why it's a monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007355
text: Did you defeat it? Great job!{nl}Now I don't have to fear this place being torn down until another monster shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007356
text: The Petrifying Frost just swept by so we should get to work quickly.{nl}We can see when and where the Petrifying Frost start by checking whether the soldiers are retreating or not.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007357
text: And the quickest way to receive the information is to become a Royal Army guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007358
text: I am not sure since I am a low ranking soldier.{nl}This place originally belongs to Kaliss.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007359
text: This place belonged to the kingdom, but due to rebellions, 600 years have passed.{nl}Everyone thinks that the Knights of Kaliss will make a movement again soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007360
text: But, even in this situation, there aren't any conflicts...{nl}The objective of the people who were dispatched here is on the research like Kostas so how would a low rank soldier like me know anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007361
text: According to what senior officers say, they are not officially belonged to the army, but they are rather somewhat more like mercenaries.{nl}I am not sure, but they asked me about many things on the Petrifying Frost.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007362
text: Many people from the Knights of Kaliss actually came here to continue on their research besides Kostas.{nl}What would they want from the city of rebel forces... Isn't it strange?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007363
text: I don't know well since I am a low ranked soldier, but it seems that they don't like each other.{nl}I understand since they are trying to make a move after managing it for 600 years. Who would like it?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007364
text: But, the Knights of Kaliss are saying that it's their fair right and they also said they are going to concentrate on the research so we can't say anything.{nl}What I've heard was to guard them and report their whereabouts... but, then they disappeared again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007365
text: I've obtained it by paying a large sum to the Royal Army guards so just take a look at it without touching it.{nl}Due to the petrified places, this place turned into a land which no living creatures could live for hundreds of years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007366
text: But the lives are great. {nl}I predict that the small number of monsters that used to live here became resistant by being exposed to weak Petrifying Frost.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007367
text: The crystals that grow inside the special monsters could unleash the power that could face against strong Petrifying Frost.{nl}However, the problem is that they get discovered only one in several hundreds or even thousands... That's a pity.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007368
text: Thanks.{nl}We would be able to lift the curse of the petrification if we could amplify this ethereal power.{nl}Please first get me the reacting stones from the monsters at Palaikai Intersections. I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007369
text: Thanks.{nl}The petrification detectors that are left by the Royal Army guards are scattered across Palaikai Intersections.{nl}Among them, please get me the ones that only react to the symbol of schilt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007370
text: Ever since I came here, I feel like someone is keep looking at me.{nl}Anyways, see you again after the work is done.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007371
text: When it gets more apparent in the future, then there would an opportunity to show it to you.{nl}We need to collect more documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007372
text: For now, all I can tell you is that some different objective is involved with the rebellion of Ruklys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007373
text: The Royal Army guards forbid anyone in this city from probing into Ruklys.{nl}Anyone who still does that could be treated as a traitor so they educate the soldiers firmly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007374
text: But as they hide more and more, more people will be curious about Ruklys.{nl}The gallows could be near, but how could a scholar just do nothing?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007375
text: You are so brave.{nl}According to the records, there are 10 portals in total. Among them, four of them are near here.{nl}Could you find out if they are still activating?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007376
text: Please get me the hardened gunpowder from the monsters near the watermill ruins.{nl}Let's make special explosives using that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007377
text: I am going to bring in the thieves in through the central city area. {nl}While you are doing so, if you get encountered by a monster, you will soon get caught by the guards.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007378
text: That's why I want you to act first at the Estuary Bank Three Way.{nl}Unlike Dico Thieves, they pay back to the people they owed to so they will help your journey for sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007379
text: I don't know if you know the relationship between the soldiers and the Knights of Kaliss, but{nl}anyways, the soldiers are looking for something that they can never have.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007380
text: That's why they need the grave robbers. {nl}Of course, it is risky to cooperate with the thieves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007381
text: Even so, it is very valuable.{nl}And for the future, the relationship with the thieves will be useful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007382
text: Please use the Berserk powder on the monsters at the Estuary Bank Three Way.{nl}The monsters won't stand at all and go crazy. It will make a quite mess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007383
text: The information should sometimes be leaked, hid or modified in order to have some values.{nl}We could also make connections with different people by doing so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007384
text: People say history is the record of the winners. I think so too.{nl}Have you seen the tombstones that are still remaining on the ruins near Fedimian?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007385
text: If what the soldiers are spreading is true, then there are many doubts on the records that are remaining here.{nl}And the behaviors of the soldiers that are trying to destroy them are also strange.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007386
text: Throw this against the monsters.{nl}If you are lucky enough, it will explode with a bang!, but if that's not it, you will make them angry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007387
text: Please collect the Dark Crystals from the monsters at Vienti Fortress.{nl}I will try to make an elixir that would pull out the controlled spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007388
text: Thanks. First, would you use this melting solution to the monsters that are struggling due to the Petrifying Frost?{nl}I mean Nebekia Fortress. If it's useful, you would be able to use it on the humans as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007389
text: I personally think the curse of the petrification is a chemical reaction.{nl}Which means you can't restore the things that are once petrified before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007390
text: Even if, Bokor over there tries his best, he won't be able to restore it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007391
text: But, if the petrification is in progress,{nl}Then I think we may able to save the rest even if we lost the parts that have already become petrified.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007392
text: Almost all curses will wear off when the one who casted it dies.{nl}That's why I think the curse of the petrification is similar to the one at Pilgrim's Way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007393
text: But the curse has descended for 600 years.{nl}This means the caster of this curse also has lived for 600 years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007394
text: But, if we could find out the true identity of the caster, we may push it with stronger power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007395
text: Kostas doesn't seem to be scared.{nl}Yet I am scared even though I've worked here for a long time. I don't have a clue where he went...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007396
text: I feel sorry for Gofden who should be waiting for me, but I can't go.{nl}I must continue my research.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007397
text: No one will call you a coward for running from the Petrifying Frost.{nl}But, if you run away from an important task, you will be held accountable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007398
text: I am sure there's a way to restore the city that was damaged{nl}due to the rebellion that occurred 600 years ago.{nl}The research on the Petrifying Frost is one of the ways to restore the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007399
text: I am sure there's a way to lift the curse completely.{nl}Although, it seems that Saliamonas has given up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007400
text: I am sure there are hidden facts.{nl}Although I don't know what they are.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007401
text: This city would feel like lost families to the people of Kaliss.{nl}I am sure there's a way to restore the city.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007402
text: A few of them are mercenaries, but they are also the people of Kaliss.{nl}The way they look at this city will be the same.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007403
text: The grave robbers are going all out here.{nl}We have to wait for extra support from headquarters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007404
text: I don't give false hopes to other people.{nl}I just want to find more realistic method.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007405
text: Were you deceived all this time?{nl}If we rub Velas leaves on the boxes, monsters protect them as if they are something precious.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007406
text: Good. Please get me Velas leaves at the Trade District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007407
text: My heart aches to see my colleagues that are just left out there against the elements after succumbing to the Petrifying Frost...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007408
text: I don't like the Royal Army guards.{nl}They look at us like traitors for what happened 600 years ago.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007409
text: Now is the time to retrieve our land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007410
text: We can't clearly see it on the days like today when the stone debris are blowing a lot.{nl}But, when it rains, you can clearly see Ruklys Street.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007411
text: Disciple Laius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007412
text: We would be able to find the inheritance of the master if we try little more...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007413
text: This time, Hones will not stand without handing out the documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007414
text: While I was coming here, I saw the leaflets that encourage people to join the military.{nl}Rip them off all. They are good for sneezing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007415
text: Since I don't know what the master has in his mind before he passed away, I am worried.{nl}No one would understand my mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007416
text: I want to talk to Hones again.{nl}It's been such a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007417
text: Our landlords tried their best to recover this place.{nl}They used every means and the methods they could use.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007418
text: Everything is my fault that I didn't understand what the master wanted.{nl}I want to apologize to you since I've confused you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007419
text: If Adjutant General Hans does something suspicious, please report to us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007420
text: If the supplies come at the right time, we won't receive the supplies of the Knights of Kaliss secretly from behind.{nl}Ah, please forget what I've just told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007421
text: Aren't the documents arrived yet?{nl}Is Hones still insisting?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007422
text: Please refrain from doing something suspicious.{nl}From this watchtower, I can even see how many fingers you have.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007423
text: You won't be able to avoid the wind of the Petrifying Frost even if the watchtower is tall.{nl}I am too lazy to go up and down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007424
text: When I attach the leaflet, someone detached them.{nl}I am not gonna forgive the one who did this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007425
text: Those grave robbers can't climb up here easily since there is a watchtower here.{nl}Today... the weather is not that good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007426
text: The supplies are coming late today as well.{nl}I heard that the ones who are doing something down there receive the supplies from the Knights of Kaliss secretly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007427
text: When I work at this deserted area for a long time, I get to know many secrets that only senior officers don't know.{nl}I want you to just ignore them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007428
text: Many petrified records are floating down through the Estuary Bank, but we don't order the soldiers to get rid of them.{nl}I heard the records don't contain good contents.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007429
text: I don't understand why they have to do this for what happened 600 years ago.{nl}Well, the guys at Verkti Square are newcomers so they are well disciplined.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007430
text: The soldiers doing their missions here all worked here for a long time.{nl}They experienced lots of things such as Petrifying Frost or monsters so they are somewhat insensitive now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007431
text: Please do not read the old records or take out the artifacts to outside.{nl}Even we can't forgive you if you do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007432
text: Disciple Hones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007433
text: I came here to keep the last words of our master.{nl}The one who could withstand... they are hard words to understand...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007434
text: Please let us know when you see any grave robbers.{nl}If you've ignored them when you saw them, it's like you've committed a crime.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007435
text: How could you have come this far. {nl}Please do not make a mess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007436
text: Whenever I do a mission here, I sometimes remember my colleagues who've been sacrificed by the Petrifying Frost.{nl}He could not avoid the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007437
text: If you find the guy who are detaching the leaflets, please let me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007438
text: Ah, wait. I've heard about you before in the city. {nl}Hmm. I guess I should think little more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007439
text: I hope Laius doesn't get hurt from this.{nl}I wonder why the master didn't tell him honestly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007440
text: I want to talk to Laius again.{nl}But, I guess I should wait until he comes to me...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007441
text: I just hope the monsters stay calm.{nl}Maybe I am expecting too much...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007442
text: The blessings of the goddesses has not reached at this city.{nl}Only the monsters and the criminals are full in this city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007443
text: Please report to us when you see monsters.{nl}Especially, when they are grouped together or make a mess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007444
text: I've written down what to do at the memo.{nl}First, find the Magic Gem Fusion Device at Underground Grave of Ritinis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007445
text: Long time ago, I had serviced as a guard in the army like those guys.{nl}I was a junior officer who wanted become a strategist. At least before Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007446
text: If you find any suspicious individual who is not part of the {nl}Royal Army or the Knight of Kaliss, please report to us.{nl}Especially if they look like grave robbers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007447
text: Please do not touch anything. Just stay calm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007448
text: If you find any old records that cast the kingdom in a negative light, {nl}immediately destroy them or report to us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007449
text: The Petrifying Frost may suddenly come, so please be with us if possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007450
text: Aside from the Petrifying Frost, dangerous monsters and menacing grave robbers lurk the corners here.{nl}I am not responsible for incidents you cause out of our watch.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007451
text: This city is a restricted area.{nl}I will let you pass as I am ordered to, but please refrain from doing anything out of line.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007452
text: You don't know this place well?{nl}Ruklys' rebellion occurred here 600 years ago.{nl}This place is cursed with the Petrifying Frost, and thus is very dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007453
text: I want to be rotated out soon.{nl}I don't want to be in this horrible city anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007454
text: While we all don't want to be in this place, you just walk right into this city. How strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007455
text: It is illegal to take artifacts, records or relics that belong to this place.{nl}Anyone who does will be punished, so please keep that in mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007456
text: Once you are hit by the Petrifying Frost, it's all over for you.{nl}We've lost many of our colleagues to the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007457
text: Many of the kingdom's famous scholars and magicians weren't able to lift the curse of petrification...{nl}I don't understand how a Knight of Kaliss could lift the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007458
text: The relationship between us Royal Army guards and the Knights of Kaliss is somewhat complicated.{nl}Please refrain from doing something forbidden, even if it is by request from the Knights of Kaliss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007459
text: The rules of the Royal Army are supreme here.{nl}Even if you are the famous Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007460
text: Even if you've received a request from the Knights of Kaliss, the orders of the Royal Army precedes them.{nl}We are the law here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007461
text: I am irritated by the Royal Army guards, but then those Dico Thieves appeared.{nl}How come there are so many people in this small space.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007462
text: I can't endure anymore. Please save me from these restraints.{nl}I will be released when you defeat the watchers nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007463
text: My name is Agailla Flurry. {nl}I have realized something from the epitaphs left in the land and I would like to make a confession.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007464
text: How foolish it is to be overconfident and be swayed by shallow feelings. {nl}You, who lives through such times, must have realized something like I did.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007465
text: All other Revelators were wrong.{nl}But if it were you.. I don't know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007466
text: I will return to my hometown with my son.{nl}Yes. For sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007467
text: I can't close my eyes before we defeat that monster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007468
text: I never expected to see someone in this spooky place. I guess you are very competent.{nl}I am continuing the research of my master here. I guess I can be called a scholar.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007469
text: But, in this important moment, Hones is not cooperating with us.{nl}I will be sorry to my master if Hones continues to do like that...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007470
text: Really?{nl}That's the most happiest thing that I've heard recently!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007471
text: Let's see. They must have hid the orb around here that can be used to store the energy...{nl}Please first get me that. I will get ready myself to use that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007472
text: The orb that can be used to tap the energies of the dead.{nl}My master created it. He was a famous sorcerer before.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007473
text: You've brought it fast. We definitely need this to summon the Wisdom Guiding Stone.{nl}The master left it for me. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007474
text: So I have the rights to look at the documents of our master and not Hones right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007475
text: Okay. Please absorb the energies of the dead into the orb.{nl}The monsters in this grave possess the energies of the dead ones so it will be easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007476
text: You need to absorb the energies from more monsters.{nl}The Wisdom Guiding Stone can't be summoned easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007477
text: The orb seems full of energy.{nl}This will be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007478
text: Now, we are able to summon the Wisdom Guiding Stone.{nl}We will inject the energy into the Soul Crystal that is located in Maras Stone Chamber...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007479
text: But, whenever we tried to do that, the monsters also came so we failed each time.{nl}If only Hones helped me...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007480
text: When you obtain the Wisdom Guiding Stone, please show it to Hones at Raiduna Hall.{nl}If he finds out that I am the only one who could continue the research of the master, he would hand over the documents.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007481
text: Hones did not cooperate with us until now, but he would have to hand them over this time.{nl}As the master only left the orb to me, the Wisdom Guiding Stone can only be obtained by me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007482
text: Hmm? Isn't that the Wisdom Guiding Stone?{nl}Who are you and why are you showing it to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007483
text: Damn, Laius is misunderstanding something.{nl}No. Maybe the master and the goddess guided us this far.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007484
text: Anyways, I have the Wisdom Guiding Stone as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007485
text: Laius... has a problem.{nl}I can't say it. Go to the hideout of the master. Then you would believe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007486
text: Maybe, it turned out better than we thought.{nl}I didn't expect Laius would help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007487
text: The master researched about the goddesses throughout his entire life.{nl}And then he discovered something important, but he said if it goes into the hands of the demons, it will be dangerous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007488
text: As you saw, Laius is trying to find the remains of the research of the master due to his greed.{nl}But, they should never be exposed to the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007489
text: Ahah. Revelator. Maybe...{nl}The master said someone who is reliable should dispose of his research before he died.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007490
text: And the remains of the research are at the place where normal people like me or Laius can not reach.{nl}If you are really the Revelator, I want you to dispose of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007491
text: In order to find the remains of the research, we need the Eyes of Truth.{nl}But, not too long ago, they were destroyed due to monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007492
text: With the Wisdom Guiding Stone, you will be able to find the monsters that carry fragments of the Eyes of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007493
text: Even if you are not the Revelator, I am counting on you.{nl}I know the Wisdom Guiding Stone can't be obtained that easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007494
text: Good. With this, we can restore the Eyes of Truth completely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007495
text: Okay. With these Eyes of Truth, we will find the Soul Crystal.{nl}It is little complicated, but please think that is it is that important.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007496
text: Shadowgaler in the Room of Lamentation has the Soul Crystal, but you can't attack it with an usual method.{nl}It has an astral body so it is invisible.{nl}However, with the Eyes of Truth, you would be able to see it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007497
text: I didn't know why the master left such words since he doesn't know which person I would ask to get rid of the remains of the research.{nl}But, now I understand why he left such words since I've met you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007498
text: The remains of the research can be found using the documents which Laius desperately wanted to have.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007499
text: Please take the Wisdom Guiding Stone and the Soul Crystal with you and look for the Magic Gem Fusion Device in the Underground Grave of Ritinis.{nl}I will write down the method for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007500
text: You've come late. {nl}Did you get the documents of the master from Hones?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007501
text: I had a misunderstanding...{nl}But I wanted be acknowledged by the master like Hones.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007502
text: The master always complimented me, but I felt uncomfortable whenever I thought about Hones.{nl}Although, he passed away already... It is good to find out what the master had in his mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007503
text: I feel comfortable now. {nl}I want to talk to Hones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007504
text: Very good. You've found the remains of the master's research.{nl}I will let you dispose of them. It is more important for me to continue the will of the master.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007505
text: I feel disappointed a bit, but I also feel comfortable in a way.{nl}Well... Laius... I hope he would be alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007506
text: Magic Gem Fusion Device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007507
text: Please gather all Spatial Magic Gems.{nl}It is hard to understand the hidden rules of space, but my knowledge would help you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007508
text: My master, who was a Sorcerer, researched on the goddesses.{nl}It was about some special kind of space. He said a vast amount of knowledge can be obtained from that space.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007509
text: Hones' Regular Memo

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007510
text: The Spatial Magic Gem of Contract is in the reception room, but it was destroyed recently.{nl}The monsters must have fragments of the gem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007511
text: When you collect all fragments of the Magic Gem, please go to the Forgotten Priest's Grave. {nl}You can restore the Magic Gem at the Magic Field of Preservation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007512
text: Hones' Regular Memo

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007513
text: You will find the Spatial Magic Gem of Promise at Siaura Mine.{nl}Please use the Soul Crystal to the monsters and collect the Condensed Spite.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007514
text: With that, destroy the Barrier Stone at Siaura Mine.{nl}The Black Chaser will pursue you from behind, but you would be able to find the Spatial Magic Gem of Promise when you reach the end of the mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007515
text: Templeshooter at the Shrine of Remembrance holds the Spatial Magic Gem of Offer.{nl}The Wisdom Guiding Stone will help you to find the hidden Templeshooter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007516
text: Please... save us.{nl}I will soon disappear, but please save the others.{nl}Please save us... them... from the vicious demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007517
text: Kupole Vita

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007518
text: Given that you saw it too,{nl} I'm certain there is something here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007519
text: Ah, I am Kupole Vita.{nl}I guide the spirits on behalf of the missing goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007520
text: I came here to look for spirits who have vanished.{nl} I can sense that there are spirits here who have strayed out of the normal way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007521
text: But, I can hardly find any evidence.{nl}The spirits hardly talk to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007522
text: What? The spirits talked to you first?{nl}You must have something which enables you to save them.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007523
text: I have a request for you.{nl}I want you to hear what they are trying to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007524
text: Since there aren't enough evidence, I think we should look for more spirits.{nl}We should also find out why they disappeared without leaving any words.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007525
text: The reason why the spirits aren't able to talk is due to a contract.{nl}The demons is probably used the Pot of Silence as a Contract of Enunciation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007526
text: However, the ominous energy of the contract is too strong for me to get close.{nl}I will give you some purification powders for you to ward off the energy and destroy the pot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007527
text: Be careful though. {nl}It will be very dangerous if it is related to the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007528
text: Perhaps the vanished spirits breached the contract by talking. {nl}I think they wanted to get out by doing so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007529
text: It seems that you've destroyed the Pot of Silence safely.{nl}Though, is there any other problem?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007530
text: It seems that the demons have noticed our movement.{nl} We should resolve this fast before the demons do anything.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007531
text: Since the Contract of Enunciation was destroyed, we should be able to listen to the spirits in more details.{nl}It will be good to find the spirits that know the details of the circumstance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007532
text: Rimos' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007533
text: It has been a long time. You... I am finally being released.{nl}I've been deceived by the demons. My words, body and even the spirit have been binded to the contract for hundreds of years.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007534
text: Please gather the skeletons binded to the Contract of Flesh at Supube Stone Chamber.{nl} Help them rest in peace...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007535
text: Nutrients... Medzio Diena even makes the people in the past to suffer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007536
text: My body. Unfortunately, it is not mine anymore.{nl}I regret my fault in the past that I've committed due to my greed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007537
text: The Contract of Flesh is tied in Sataruti Hall.{nl}Please burn the contract and the skeletons with holy power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007538
text: We've suffered a lot from regrets and failures for hundreds of years.{nl}The goddesses yet... Would we be saved.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007539
text: I can feel it. I feel myself being freed from the binding contract.{nl}But, there is one more thing to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007540
text: The Contract of Spirit is engraved on Master Genie in Garbingal Burial Chamber.{nl}I will be completely free when Master Genie gets defeated.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007541
text: Please be safe.{nl}We are already dead, but you are not.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007542
text: I can finally be free...{nl}This was the moment I've been waiting for hundreds of years... It feels like a dream.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007543
text: We the Kupoles guide all the spirits to Goddess Ausrine.{nl}They rest in peace beside the goddesses eternally.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007544
text: But they will all disappear if they are extinguished.{nl}But, if the demons are involved... we could maybe use them for nutrients.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007545
text: Something is engraved on this tablet.{nl}To see what's written, you should obtain the materials to make rubbings with.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007546
text: Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007547
text: Oh, you must have seen my notice board.{nl}Well, I don't care if that's not why you came here.{nl}If you could get me the rubbings found in this region, I will properly reward you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007548
text: Let's see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007549
text: May the threads of destiny be cut loose and flutter freely

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007550
text: ?{nl}Could this be Goddess Laima...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007551
text: May the threads of destiny be cut loose and flutter freely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007552
text: Oh, is that a rubbing? Thank you so much. {nl}Let's see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007553
text: The Kingdom's walls will last longer than the Kingdom itself

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007554
text: This is actually correct!{nl}The capital is in ruins now, yet the walls still remain standing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007555
text: Welcome!{nl}Pick out anything you want.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007556
text: Look at the inscription beside me. This tombstone has eroded against the elements since time immemorial. {nl}We need to restore it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007557
text: Be careful with this. It is a poison that turns body fluids into acid.{nl}Throw this on the monsters nearby and bring me the acid you get.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007558
text: Long ago, this place was the training field for those who wanted to become Oracles.{nl}People trained here and created inscriptions with these forecasts.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007559
text: I am sure that must be helpful forecasts in this area.{nl}Even though all the important forecasts are gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007560
text: Oh, yes. There is some diluent that I requested from the Item Merchant in Fedimian.{nl}Could you pick that up for me as well?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007561
text: With the acidic fluid, I can etch deeper into the tombstone.{nl}Don't forget to pay a visit to Fedimian as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007562
text: Ah, this is it. Thank you for your efforts.{nl}Now, I will combine it with the diluting solution and pour it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007563
text: Aha... what...?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007564
text: To eat a Kepa, one simply boils it in salty water.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007565
text: ...{nl}This isn't a useful forecast!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007566
text: Kepas are edible?{nl}Is this a useful forecast? I am confused.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007567
text: There is hardly any sand stuck on the tablet at Gruitis Hall.{nl}I've brought a brush, but it won't be effective enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007568
text: I need a tougher brush. I'm sorry, but could you get me some stiff fur by any chance?{nl}Wait for when the Wendigo Archers faint after hitting them with this dart.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007569
text: Until then, I will be looking around the other tablets.{nl}Alright then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007570
text: Nice, we're both back just in time.{nl}Give those to me. I can easily make a brush out of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007571
text: I'm not sure if you've noticed, but these tablets record forecasts of the future.{nl}This place used to be a training ground for Oracles a long time ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007572
text: I am doing research on the forecasts that are still remaining here.{nl}I need an assistant. What do you think?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007573
text: Good. You will also get valuable information and experience out of this.{nl}Okay, shall we get started?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007574
text: This was the training field of the Oracles in the past.{nl}I am looking for abandoned forecasts here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007575
text: When you pull the levers in order, the tombstones may react.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007576
text: You seem to have some other request for me.{nl}How can I help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007577
text: Eitbaras... he...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007578
text: Thank you for telling me this precious story.{nl}But, we cannot tell you what we know about the story as of yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007579
text: But, I will give you a copy of the writings from the tombstone in return.{nl}I believe you may meet him one day...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007580
text: Eitbaras' Records

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007581
text: I am leaving this record when I am still Eitbaras.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007582
text: {nl}I am in awe of them.{nl}A humble fairy like me can't be compared with them...{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007583
text: I still remember a time when they were peaceful.{nl}But, those days are long gone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007584
text: Those very beings now hold strong ambitions and war with no end in sight...{nl}Even a fairy like me could not pretend to not see this.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007585
text: As the discord of these great beings began to envelop the world, I too became curious to why they conflicted with each other.{nl}Perhaps, now is the time the humans can begin living independent lives.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007586
text: Ausrine refrained from answering my questions about the conflict.{nl}She instead asked me to pray for good luck for the humans taking shelter in their homes.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007587
text: Giltine also didn't give an answer.{nl}As usual, she did not support the role Ausrine suggested to me.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007588
text: But there is fortune and misfortune in luck, and my mission is to manage both sides.{nl}I hold those words true to my heart and use them as a guiding principle in my work.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007589
text: Since then, I've spent countless hours performing my new role.{nl}However, my duties didn't give an answer to my questions.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007590
text: That's why I went to see Giltine.{nl}After listening to my repetitive questions, she finally opened her mouth after a long silence.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007591
text: I am not going to give you the answer.{nl}But, I can give you the power.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007592
text: The power that may lead you to the answer that you are seeking.{nl}Even if you never get the answer, you will be satisfied with your new changes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007593
text: I immediately left without saying anything.{nl}But soon I...realizing I was so close to finally getting something...{nl}found myself sobbing...and realized what I truly wanted{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007594
text: When the sun goes down tomorrow, I will return to Giltine. And tell her my decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007595
text: Archeologist Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007596
text: I am so lucky. The goddesses helped me this time as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007597
text: Ah, I am Justas. I am excavating the records of Demetrius who is the historian from the ancient period.{nl}What has brought you here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007598
text: Is that so... Revelator... Then you would like my research.{nl}Actually, I needed someone who would be my guard and assistant. Are you interested?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007599
text: This place are the ruins before the construction of the kingdom.{nl}But, I am not that interested in here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007600
text: What I really want are the records of Demetrius.{nl}It is unique that it is recorded on a Metal Plate...It seems to contain an amazing story.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007601
text: Maybe we would be able to find out where we came from.{nl}Then we may be able to find out what would happen to us as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007602
text: Good. Good. I will give you the task of obtaining the bone pieces of Hallowventer curse speller.{nl}They are the best materials to use when you make an antirust agent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007603
text: It is so fortunate to have a good assistant.{nl}The goddesses helped me on this as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007604
text: There's a saying that geniuses are freaks. How should the people of the later generations do if the Metal Plate gets rusted.{nl}Anyways, the work is being done quickly because of you so I feel happy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007605
text: I want to request to you to bring the Metal Plate on Ramive Hills.{nl}There are many plates that I could not bring due to the monsters. You can do it right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007606
text: This place is too isolated so the monsters rush in.{nl}Be careful all the time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007607
text: Good!{nl}But, the status is too bad so it would take a long time...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007608
text: What a view, don't you think?{nl}Though there are grander things hidden here, such as the records of historian Demetrius.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007609
text: I am looking for the records of Demetrius that haven't been discovered yet.{nl}The monsters are dangerous, but I have a good feeling.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007610
text: Alruida is near Apsba Hall.{nl}We've been working together for a long time so even if we are far apart, we know each other well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007611
text: Isn't it great to hear that humans, goddesses and demons may lived together for a long time?{nl}But, then how come there are no records remaining?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007612
text: That is so shocking.{nl}A great scholar like Demetrius could had not recorded lies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007613
text: Since we haven't found everything, we can't say this for sure, but...{nl}I think it's about where humans came from.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007614
text: Archeologist Alruida

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007615
text: Are you also interested in historian Demetrius?{nl}Or are you just a traveler?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007616
text: There was a progress in the research because of you.{nl}Now we should find out if his records are fictitious or real.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007617
text: If his records are real, it will make many people shock.{nl}But, personally, I don't want to believe it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007618
text: I am chasing after the Metal Plate that is engraved with the records of Demetrius.{nl}I am keep getting interrupted by the monsters, but we have some results though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007619
text: Ahah...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007620
text: I am looking for the disappeared spirits.{nl}The spirits that are out of their normal journey.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007621
text: After Medzio Diena, scary things are happening.{nl}The reason why the spirits lose their ways are related to it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007622
text: The spirits don't say anything to me.{nl}Have you heard any stories of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007623
text: The only thing I could do was to depress for hundreds of years.{nl}I want to just disappear if I can.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007624
text: What can I do after losing the master and the body.{nl}Besides just watching the demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007625
text: I can't neither go beside the goddesses nor be eliminated.{nl}For what... I am doing... such...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007626
text: Collapsing Stone Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007627
text: The Stone Tower is collapsing by someone. Do you want to go to the Stone Tower?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007628
text: I am leaving this record when I am still Eitbaras.{nl}-{nl}I am in awe of them.{nl}A humble fairy like me can't be compared with them...{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007629
text: I still remember a time when they were peaceful.{nl}But, those days are long gone.{nl}Those very beings now hold strong ambitions and war with no end in sight...{nl}Even a fairy like me could not pretend to not see this.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007630
text: As the discord of these great beings began to envelop the world, {nl}I too became curious to why they conflicted with each other.{nl}Perhaps, now is the time the humans can begin living independent lives.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007631
text: Since then, I've spent countless hours performing my new role.{nl}However, my duties didn't give an answer to my questions.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007632
text: I am not going to give you the answer.{nl}But, I can give you the power.{nl}The power that may lead you to the answer that you are seeking.{nl}Even if you never get the answer, you will be satisfied with your new changes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007633
text: I immediately left without saying anything.{nl}But soon I... realizing I was so close to finally getting something...{nl}found myself sobbing... and realized what I truly wanted.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007634
text: When the sun goes down tomorrow, I will return to Giltine. And tell her my decision.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007635
text: A method to restore a destroyed tombstone at the Namu Temple Ruins?{nl}Since you come to my shop often, I can help you with that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007636
text: The sticky resin from Green Roftlems is widely used as stone adhesives.{nl}However, you can't find them through normal means in the Namu Temple Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007637
text: So, here's a bait box.{nl}They go crazy on the smell of the food inside. They will be lured to that smell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007638
text: When you find the sticky resin, please mix it with this coagulant before using it.{nl}Stones will be easily attached.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007639
text: It will be easier to make perfume from a Kepa than to find it without using a bait box.{nl}Even going to Laukyme Swamp would be less of a hassle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007640
text: Ah. It definitely reacted this time.{nl}I would have spent a long time without your help. Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007641
text: Thanks for helping us.{nl}The goddess helps the ones who try their best, and I think it was you, the Revelator.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007642
text: Many demons are gathering at Rituala to participate in a magic ritual that frees Blut.{nl}Please, first defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007643
text: Valtruss is defeated but his servants are still left in Oruarma Cathedral. {nl}I want you to make those demons pay for their sins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007644
text: Even if you are the Revelator, you better not fool around. {nl}The corruption here is not something for you to mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007645
text: I wish you good luck in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007646
text: I am solely to blame for all of this.{nl}With the Evening Star Key, three seals should be unleashed,{nl} so I could recover my power to find Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007647
text: The dimensional crack.. We cannot close it without Dionys.{nl}Please find Dionys until I recover my power..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007648
text: My mission is to retrieve the relics, but I can't stand and watch this anymore.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters that are roaming around the Great Cathedral?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007649
text: If this Great Cathedral gets purified, all credit would go to you.{nl}But, we still have a long way to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007650
text: I believe that my research will be helpful in tough times like nowadays.{nl}Of course, we should first find helpful forecasts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007651
text: I am sure it contains a breakthrough idea.{nl}What did the Oracle see...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007652
text: Dead of the dead... what could that mean.{nl}Do you have any idea?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007653
text: Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007654
text: Let's see

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007655
text: Day by day

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007656
text: The monsters ruined the apiary and the brewery.{nl}So Joseph went to Klaipeda to look for Revelators who could help us. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007657
text: I thought they would've solved the problem, but guess what happened.{nl}They started disappearing one by one. They backed out. Those cowards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007658
text: If you think you are ready, I will show you the true origin of the curse.{nl}If you can't eliminate it at once, it will cause bigger trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007659
text: But, there is still a way.{nl}If you could help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007660
text: If it's okay with you, can you check the reagent's effects?{nl}Ah, I didn't mean trying it on yourself. I meant trying it on the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007661
text: It's done. {nl}I hope it works.. Can you give this meat to the pilgrim down below?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007662
text: You must feed him until he's satisfied.{nl}Here's all the meat that you got. 15 pieces, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007663
text: Are peaceful days going to return, just like the good old times?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007664
text: I want to bury Dallas at Taika Cliff, where he can see his hometown.{nl}But there are so many monsters there. Please get rid of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007665
text: Aren't you the Revelator?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007666
text: Ah, it's great that you're here.{nl}You must have traveled to various places in the kingdom.{nl}I am sorry, but do you know anything about this mysterious girl?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007667
text: The girl left this tree before Medzio Diena.{nl}My master asked me to find out more about the tree, but I know nothing about it... I want to get help from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007668
text: This farm's owner is Gina Greene.{nl}She kindly lent this farm to people like us who lost land since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007669
text: Hey you. Revelator. Don't just look at me. Help me.{nl}Please drive out the Lizardmen on my fields.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007670
text: You must know that there's a food shortage in the kingdom right now.{nl}If you are okay with it, can you help me with my investigation?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007671
text: I really appreciate it.{nl}First, collect Rambear Fur from the Rambear Archers nearby. I need to check something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007672
text: If that's the case, please eliminate all the Stumpy Trees.{nl}Oh, and don't forget to bring evidence as well. I need something to report with.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007673
text: Even if you are the Revelator, this is a private land. {nl}Get out if you don't have any business here!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007674
text: We have a big problem!{nl}The spoiled grape vines dried to their deaths, but now monsters are attracted to them.{nl}What can I do?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007675
text: Investigate the bushes near the grape vines, hidden monsters may suddenly appear.{nl}I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007676
text: Sometimes, more monsters will appear when you shake the bushes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007677
text: I paid a lot for this at the black market in Fedimian.{nl}Perhaps, this will be much more helpful than you or that shameless druid.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007678
text: This is sturdy. You've been suffered by the trap of Ebonypawn.{nl}But, what have brought you here?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007679
text: You are the Revelator? It's so nice to meet you.{nl}Thanks for saving me... I have another request for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007680
text: We are doing an important mission at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007681
text: This is a little complicated.{nl}We are chasing after Ebonypawn who is the suspect of the murder case at the Astral Tower.{nl}But, he is being protected by these religious rules at the monastery nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007682
text: So, please help us to get Ebonypawn.{nl}We should somehow first persuade the monks.. Though, that's going to be tricky.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007683
text: I am so sorry. {nl}Please first persuade Potos at Diliti Court.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007684
text: The monks shake their heads in denial when we mention Ebonypawn...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007685
text: Do you know of the Astral Tower?{nl}Starting with Lydia Schaffen, the greatest archers are all originated from that place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007686
text: The head of the Astral Tower was killed by Ebonypawn.{nl}I've chased him up till here, but I'm having trouble of doing anything further,{nl}because of the religious rules of the sanctuary{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007687
text: The monastery protect the ones who are falsely charged.{nl}I thought that the law was ineffective after Medzio Diena.. I want to resolve this without creating a conflict.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007688
text: Hello. Traveler.{nl}What has brought you here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007689
text: If you are here to discuss about the Hunters, I am sorry, but I'll pass.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007690
text: The monastery is full of monsters and we should first{nl}cure the monks who have been hit by the paralysis poison.{nl}Now is not the time to be involved in such a complicated matter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007691
text: The Hunters... They must know how to detoxify.{nl}These are the needles that we've gotten from our brothers. I am sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007692
text: If our brothers help, I am willing to help you as well.{nl}I have a lot on my mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007693
text: This... All right. It's pretty obvious who did this.{nl}Well, first give them this antidote. Fortunately, the poison is not that severe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007694
text: I am embarrassed to see the faces of the Hunters... I am sorry.{nl}We also have to consider our position of the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007695
text: But, if the poison is really from Ebonypawn, then the story will be different.{nl}I am sorry, but I want to see the trap myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007696
text: Recently, monsters have rushed into the monastery.{nl}It was very quick and the monsters went crazy in the monastery as if they were possessed by something.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007697
text: We had no other choice but to run away.{nl}The problem was abbot. He was praying in the Prayer Room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007698
text: Fortunately, the Prayer Room is the safest place in the monastery.{nl}We know that even monsters can't do anything there, but we couldn't just do nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007699
text: So, there is not enough evidence, huh?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007700
text: Reina, a subordinate of mine, is looking for the traces of Ebonypawn down there.{nl}Recently, she found something, but it seems she's having difficulty.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007701
text: It looks like your task is going smoothly.{nl}You know, I've received rewards that are bigger than my life in value.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007702
text: Hey, don't walk around recklessly, it's dangerous here.{nl}I recommend you to move out from this forest while you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007703
text: Hello. Traveler.{nl}What has brought you here?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007704
text: What? The captain sent you to me? Excuse me, I'm sorry.{nl}There is a working trap, but it's not easy to get it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007705
text: I kind of have a problem here, I cannot move.{nl}I've been caught by the trap. I'm such an idiot... I've quickly detoxified myself, but it still hurts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007706
text: I will lend you my Jareth.{nl}He makes many mistakes because of his old age, but please understand that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007707
text: I guess I am not competent enough yet.{nl}I wanted to become like the Hunter Captain... I guess I still have a long way to go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007708
text: Let's take a look at this... This has been made with some skill that I have seen often. {nl}The captain is looking for a working trap, right? Please bring him this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007709
text: As your competence increases, people won't know who made these traps.{nl}On the contrary, people may find out who made these traps so easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007710
text: Besides, the difficulty lowers by a lot if there's only one suspect like in this case.{nl}We just have to find his characteristics.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007711
text: As I expected, that is indeed from Ebonypawn. {nl}I can hardly find any trace of him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007712
text: But, the traps are easily made with the materials nearby. {nl}We just have to hope that the monk notices it. First, take it and show it to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007713
text: After you have persuaded the monk, please meet Natasha at Viltis Forest.{nl}I've gotten word that she's at a loss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007714
text: Look at this. This is the silk that was used in this trap... I believe I've seen it before.{nl}If someone got his hands on the supplies of the monastery, we can think of only one person.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007715
text: Good.{nl}After retrieving the monastery, I will tell the abbot about this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007716
text: The captain sent you here?{nl}It's about time that reliable support came to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007717
