text: You will have to persuade the other brothers besides me.{nl}There is a place nearby called Viltis Forest. Senior Monk Marko can be found there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007718
text: Something big happened at the monastery.{nl}Would you be able to help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007719
text: I think I've lost my precious scripture while I was running away.{nl}But, I also have to take care of our brothers.. Can you look for them? I don't care if you only find the pages.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007720
text: If you can't find them, then we would have to accept it.{nl}People's lives are more important than the pages of the scripture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007721
text: So they are ripped off..{nl}I guess we have no other choice. Please, let's first concentrate on curing my brothers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007722
text: It's the worst case scenario.{nl}The forest is covered with thorns and there are traps everywhere.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007723
text: And my brothers are suffering because of the poison.{nl}If the threat of the monsters lowers down, I would be relaxed enough to finish the cure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007724
text: Who made all these traps?{nl}I don't feel very well seeing my brothers suffer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007725
text: Thank you so much.{nl}I will now pray for our brothers for a full recovery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007726
text: Since I quickly ran away from the monastery, I wasn't able to bring many things with me.{nl}I should somehow feed some nutritious food to our brothers who are suffering from the poison..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007727
text: Thank you so much.{nl}There is a mushroom called Tempas. It grows really fast.{nl}Please get me some of those from Juklas Sunny Place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007728
text: You will find it when you walk diligently.{nl}They are usually hidden in the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007729
text: Thanks.{nl}I will pray to the goddesses that they will be okay after eating this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007730
text: Since I am not feeling well right now, I do want to prepare in advance.{nl}If you are going to hunt for monsters nearby, could you please listen to my request?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007731
text: Please collect the stone legs of the Rocktors.{nl}I can use those for my arrowheads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007732
text: The stone legs of Roctors near this are usable.{nl}Other things are somewhat soft.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007733
text: This many.. Thank you so much.{nl}It will be good if we return to the place where the captain is, but we should first finish our mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007734
text: I think the monsters found out that I have suffered from the poison.{nl}They are slowly narrowing the gap. This could be dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007735
text: Let's use Jareth.{nl}Even if you stand in front, they may rush in when you leave.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007736
text: Please hunt for the monsters with Jareth.{nl}After they engage in combat, the monsters will be scared if Jareth unleashes its smell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007737
text: Jareth is old, but very brave.{nl}Sometimes he has the tendency to attack first because of his bravery...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007738
text: Did Jareth do well?{nl}Now we can worry less about the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007739
text: We should retrieve the monastery.{nl}If we don't move fast, the abbot will be in danger.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007740
text: The abbot here is called Marko and he leads the monastery here.{nl}But, he is too stubborn. He is too difficult.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007741
text: I will support here with all I could so I hope you pass my position.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007742
text: I should've persuaded him slowly, but I think we were in a rush.{nl}But, it was that important...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007743
text: You are a different person. Even so, no is no.{nl}They are very rude. They know the circumstances well, and Ebonypawn...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007744
text: And the abbot is locked in the monastery.{nl}Unless we retrieve the monastery, do not mention about the deportation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007745
text: If retrieving monastery is more important, that's good.{nl}If they approve, we will support with everything we can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007746
text: You should first help those monks.{nl}They should have more than one person in trouble. You should do favors for them first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007747
text: Hunters will step up first. They should have done that in the first place.{nl}Then, I have something to request to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007748
text: We were preparing to retrieve the monastery ourselves.{nl}Please let our brothers down there know that Hunters are helping.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007749
text: I shall wait for Boros. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007750
text: Do not think bad about us.{nl}We should first retrieve the monastery, but they are only talking about Ebonypawn so we don't feel comfortable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007751
text: We have a problem. {nl}One of the monks have been suffering to the poison of Ebonypawn.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007752
text: He is breathing, but he is becoming stiff.{nl}What should we do about this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007753
text: This place is dangerous.{nl}Be cautious at all times.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007754
text: We've passed the dangerous situation with an emergency procedure, but...{nl}If we don't detoxify it completely, there will be more crises.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007755
text: This is the first time I'm seeing this kind of combination of poison.{nl}I'm going to check on him, while I do that, please get me the other poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007756
text: If I'm right, then the poison can be acquired from the thorns of a Chafperor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007757
text: The poison must have been made using material that can be found around this area. {nl}Please hurry, before it's too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007758
text: It is so fortunate that we discovered it before it was too late.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007759
text: You are not too late.{nl}I hope one of these three poisons will work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007760
text: We were planning to search for a Wugushi in the city, but fortunately it seems that we don't need to do that.{nl}I think I will be able to make an antidote if we have the leaves from Woodluwa.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007761
text: I was worried that we may have to move to another city.{nl}If we have to look for a Wugushi there, then we can't guarantee our lives.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007762
text: I'll absorb the poison with this.{nl}I am going to keep looking over him so please care of Marko, he seems uneasy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007763
text: You won't understand how embarassed and painful I am.{nl}My brother almost died due to the poison and I received help from the Hunters that I kicked out...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007764
text: Good. You would have to persuade Goss at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}Please tell Marko that I've decided to go with Hunters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007765
text: Fortunately, it turned out alright.{nl}Please meet Captain Mintz on your way to Laukyme Swamp and tell him that everything went alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007766
text: Senior monk Goss is leading the brothers at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}If Ebonypawn did all of these, the goddesses would also understand my rage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007767
text: It's so nice seeing you.{nl}So how did the task at Viltis Forest go?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007768
text: Go first.{nl}I will follow you to Laukyme Swamp if he gets there alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007769
text: So that's it. We now have to persuade one of the monks and retrieve the monastery...{nl}After that, we would be able to contact with the abbot who would decide what to do with Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007770
text: I will gather the Hunters.{nl}Please continue to help Natasha at Laukyme Swamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007771
text: When you go up the Ershike Path, you will reach Laukyme Swamp.{nl}If you fail to persuade them, then we would have to retrieve the monastery ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007772
text: You've come a long way.{nl}So I heard a monk named Goss is taking the place of the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007773
text: Strange... a traveler in this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007774
text: It's so shameful as a hunter...{nl}After finding the traces of Ebonypawn, I was really delighted, but I found out that was a trap...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007775
text: I am sorry, but can you look for the grass that he is looking for?{nl}I can only move one of my arms and my neck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007776
text: It's so fortunate that you came before the monsters.{nl}I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007777
text: Good. Good. {nl}We should first survive before feeling embarassed. Thanks!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007778
text: We have lots of things to prepare.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007779
text: You are not... one of those Hunters.{nl}Since I can't trust them, I have a request for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007780
text: I want to make an ointment for the wounded brothers.{nl}Can you make beehives with the blessing from the goddesses?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007781
text: It took so little time for monsters to sweep across the monastery.{nl}I think I was lucky enough to be alive with the blessing from the goddesses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007782
text: You've tried hard, but... we were making beeswax, but strangely, it doesn't become clear at all.{nl}What should we do about this...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007783
text: That's it. I am sorry, but can you help me with one more thing?{nl}If I only have the resin that is collected in the head of Woodluwa I think I will be able to resolve it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007784
text: I didn't expect I would meet someone other than those Hunters.{nl}I am sure the goddesses haven't abandoned me yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007785
text: I wasn't able to do anything myself, but it is so fortunate that the goddesses have sent you.{nl}I will make some medicine. Thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007786
text: Stranger...{nl}If you don't have any task here, please go back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007787
text: The monastery is locked with the barriers of the monks so it won't be possible without the persuasion from Goss.{nl}But, I... it's too difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007788
text: Hunters... they just won't give up.{nl}I've heard Marko and Potos are with the Hunters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007789
text: But, you should be cautious.{nl}We just can't listen to one side.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007790
text: After persuading him, we can immediately start to retrieve the monastery.{nl}We can expect to expel Ebonypawn then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007791
text: Without Goss, we won't be able to recover the monastery.{nl}I hope you succeed in persuading him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007792
text: But, I think we can resume the talk after retrieving the monastery.{nl}Please show me the competence which I could rely on so I can cooperate with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007793
text: Good.{nl}The Liverworts and Stonacons around here would be enough. Please also bring the proofs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007794
text: You can give up if you feel that's too much for you.{nl}We were gonna finish it ourselves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007795
text: You definitely possess the competence. We also have the same objective.{nl}There is no reason to insist anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007796
text: The senior monk here is very picky.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007797
text: I will gather the monks in front of the entrance of the monastery, so tell the Hunters to gather as well.{nl}After they are here, we will unleash the seals to block any monsters from following us.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007798
text: But, although we retrieved the monastery, don't expect us to expel Ebonypawn.{nl}The abbot will decide everything after he comes out from the Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007799
text: Please understand that we could only do this.{nl}We've only listened to your story.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007800
text: What Goss said also makes sense.{nl}As they gather in front of the monastery, we should have some {nl}decisive evidence that would withdraw Ebonypawn's declaration.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007801
text: I think we would have enough time.{nl}I am sorry, but please go back to Goss and ask him {nl}what happened when Ebonypawn was coming.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007802
text: You can't prove that he was a cruel assassin.{nl}We can't release the ones that are being protected in the sanctuary by just guessing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007803
text: What they said about the traps and the monsters {nl}that conquered the monastery are also the same.{nl}It's only a one-sided story that this was done by Ebonypawn.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007804
text: We are the people who pray for the generosity of the goddesses.{nl}So to withdraw the protection of Ebonypawn, you should show them some decisive evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007805
text: Hmm. I remember that clearly.{nl}One day, someone named Ebonypawn knocked on the door of the monastery. {nl}With his wounded body...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007806
text: After bringing him inside, I began to cure him.{nl}He also requested to protect the sanctuary at our monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007807
text: That's right. Before he came on that day, one man {nl}who seemed to be affected by the poison also came.{nl}He was very ill, and eventually passed away before I could even ask him a question.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007808
text: His grave is in Priekis Rest Area. With his keepsakes.{nl}Ah, Ebonypawn also asked me whether there was someone who came before him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007809
text: The man affected by the poison... I am sure he ran away from Ebonypawn.{nl}But why did he run away from Ebonypawn...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007810
text: There weren't any other things besides that.{nl}Did this help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007811
text: It's not good for the deceased, but I think I should look for his keepsakes from his grave.{nl}I need to find out why Ebonypawn was chasing after him. Please, you have to help me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007812
text: Did you find anything?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007813
text: This is the directory of the Schaffenstar.{nl}There's a letter in the middle of it... This is the seal of the Schaffenstar. Let's rip it off.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007814
text: This is the request letter for murder and the confirmation of the receipt. {nl}The receiver is Ebonypawn...{nl}I think Ebonypawn thought this letter would be at the monastery.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007815
text: I am sure that Ebonypawn caused the mess of the monsters to look for this. {nl}It was easy for him to do this. This is decisive evidence. Let's show it to Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007816
text: A murder request... This is the evidence we need.{nl}The abbot would think differently of him when he sees this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007817
text: All the other monks are ready and went in front of the monastery.{nl}Let's go. I will see you in front of the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007818
text: Everything is clear now.{nl}I will go to the entrance of the monastery first. Let's join there together.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007819
text: You've came?{nl}We are ready to enter the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007820
text: Everyone seems to be gathering in front of the monastery.{nl}Let's hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007821
text: I thought it was a manner not to touch it since it was his last keepsake.{nl}How would anyone have thought it would turn out like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007822
text: Everyone knows that the Hunter Master and the Ranger Master are chasing after Ebonypawn.{nl}But, the reason why no one could step forward is because they didn't have any decisive evidence.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007823
text: Now, this is different. This letter is evidence.{nl}Since we have the seal of the Schaffenstar, we don't have to worry about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007824
text: This place is dangerous... I miss the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007825
text: I want to be safe until I go back to the monastery.{nl}But the monsters near here are very threatening.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007826
text: There will be lots of monsters if we move out a bit from the hills.{nl}I'll be counting on you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007827
text: Now, I can relax until I go back to the monastery.{nl}Thank you so much. I hope the goddesses bless you...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007828
text: We don't have enough water to drink here. It is strange since this place is full of water.{nl}After this place turned into a thorny forest, we can't drink it without purifying it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007829
text: If we have Asilado water plant, we can purify it with that.{nl}But, I am too scared of the monsters... Can you obtain some of them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007830
text: We would last for a while even if there's no food, but not without drinkable water.{nl}I hope you would help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007831
text: Wow. You've collected a lot.{nl}Thank you so much. We will use these water plants well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007832
text: We need help due to the monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007833
text: I didn't expect someone to come to this dangerous place...{nl}I am observing the movements of the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007834
text: Everyone will gather here after we are done. {nl}Just in case they may lose their strength due to the monsters,{nl}before we begin retrieving the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007835
text: There are more dangerous monsters inside the monastery.{nl}We don't have a chance if we lose all our energies here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007836
text: Thank you.{nl}But, I am worried since there are still many monsters left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007837
text: Are you trying to help me more?{nl}If that's so, it will be really appreciated...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007838
text: We've cleaned up many monsters. {nl}One more thing... I want you to do the last task.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007839
text: Thanks for your efforts.{nl}When the monks ask me, I will tell them to pray to the goddesses to protect you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007840
text: When you go into the monastery, let's first secure the entrance of Prayer Room.{nl}I will leave when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007841
text: We've recovered the hall. Let's continue on without taking a rest.{nl}Mintz... please take the rear since the monsters may follow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007842
text: It doesn't look easy from here.{nl}There are many monsters in the hallway so let's be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007843
text: We ended up like this while moving fast to save the abbot...{nl}We will move again after we get some rest so please go first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007844
text: The old body of me can't endure as I unlocked two barriers consecutively.{nl}Shall we go to Prayer Room now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007845
text: It is so fortunate to see you are okay. {nl}Now, we should move the abbot out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007846
text: We barely saved the abbot.{nl}Thanks for your efforts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007847
text: The oratory can only be opened through the orb by Holy Power.{nl}Moheim is responsible of caring for the orb. I reckon he's somewhere near the palor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007848
text: It is impossible to open the oratory without the orb unless someone opens it from the inside.{nl}There is no way for the director to know about this fuss outside either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007849
text: Are you talking about the crystal sphere?{nl}I can't move it out at all so I hid it inside the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007850
text: It's so good to recover the monastery, but when are we going to finish cleaning it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007851
text: It was a really important object so I put it in the box first.{nl}Inside the reception room. If you find it, please take it to Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007852
text: I have to protect this place so I can't go with you.{nl}There aren't many boxes so you will find it easily.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007853
text: Yes. That's the crystal sphere.{nl}Please bring it to Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007854
text: Abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007855
text: Thanks for resolving the crisis.{nl}I can feel the goddesses are protecting you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007856
text: So you've come. Soon, the abbot would come out.{nl}Please wait a bit here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007857
text: Why is the monastery like this and why are you all gathered here?{nl}And you... you seem to have some business with me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007858
text: He is the abbot of the Tyla Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007859
text: We barely managed to come this far so I am hoping for good results.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007860
text: So you are asking me to withdraw my declaration to protect Ebonypawn.{nl}You came this far to do that...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007861
text: Okay. I will discuss this with the senior monks.{nl}Can you wait until then?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007862
text: I will wait for their decision here first.{nl}If their declaration doesn't get withdrawn, then I should think about what to do at then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007863
text: So it seems that their discussion is over.{nl}Let's go there and listen to their conclusion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007864
text: We haven't finished our discussion.{nl}Please wait with the Hunters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007865
text: After we've discussed with the senior monks...{nl}We've decided to withdraw our declaration to protect Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007866
text: From this point on, Ebonypawn won't be protected by Tyla Monastery and we request Ebonypawn to leave at once.{nl}Also, we are not going to be involved with others' decision to punish him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007867
text: I hope the goddessess will be with you on your rest of journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007868
text: Besides from the expulsion, we can't forgive his actions that ruined the monastery.{nl}We should find him since he should be here somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007869
text: He made the monastery like this due to that letter. {nl}Please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007870
text: He is so cunning..{nl}The Hunters are surrounding this place so he will get caught within a short period of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007871
text: We would have had hard time without your help.{nl}Thank you so much for your efforts. I pray that the goddesses be with you on your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007872
text: If it wasn't for your help, the circumstances would have not been like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007873
text: I've read it from the book before. {nl}Some smell has the power to pull the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007874
text: I should've noticed when Ebonypawn brought that lump... I didn't expect that would be enlarged this big...{nl}We are eliminating them as we see them, but I want you to help us as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007875
text: We are luring the monsters with the smell so it won't be effective if you just destroy them.{nl}Please destroy the lumps using this liquid medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007876
text: When I saw it, it was about the size of my palm so I don't understand how it got that big.{nl}This is all my fault...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007877
text: I don't know how long it would take to drive those monsters out...{nl}But now is the time to start.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007878
text: We were able to retrieve the monastery, but as you can see there are still full of monsters.{nl}Could you help us little more?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007879
text: Orange Kowaks inside the monastery are most problematic.{nl}They are the most violent and vicious monsters among the monsters that came into the monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007880
text: They are still inside.{nl}Please eliminate the monsters including them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007881
text: The number of monsters won't increase from this point on.{nl}But, in order to eliminate them completely, we would need lots of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007882
text: The goddesses helped us to retrieve the monastery.{nl}Lots of other sacred places are still occupied by many monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007883
text: It's a mess. {nl}The monsters are sweeping across the monastery so the books are all scattered.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007884
text: When would we able to gather all these books again and divide them into different categories...{nl}If you pick up scriptures, please bring them to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007885
text: You don't have to try hard.{nl}I can collect them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_007886
text: Thanks.{nl}We should be able to gather all of them again right?
