name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008210
text: Enter Verkti Square.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008211
text: Seems like not anyone can enter the city. Talk to Royal Army Guard Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008212
text: Defeat the monsters in the Workshop Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008213
text: Royal Army Guard Retia asked you to cooperate in organizing the road to the Fortress of the Land. Defeat the monsters in the Workshop Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008214
text: Report to Royal Army Guard

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008215
text: Examine the Petrification Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008216
text: Royal Army Guard Retia asked you to check the petrification detectors installed around Verkti Square for Petrifying Frost forecast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008217
text: Checked the petrification detectors as Royal Army Guard Retia asked you. The detectors' reactions are unusual. Return to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008218
text: Royal Army Guard Retia asked you to eliminate the remaining Petrifying Frost in the Plaza. Use the Petrifying Frost Absorption Scroll and remove the Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008219
text: Examine the Petrification Detector and defeat Sparnashorn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008220
text: Royal Army Guard Retia asked you to defeat Sparnashorn that is endangering the soldiers. Check the petrification detector in the old market then lure to the Sparnashorn to defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008221
text: Defeat the monsters in Assembly Hall Site

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008222
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to defeat the monsters in Assembly Hall Site for them to rob the grave.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008223
text: Defeated the monsters in Assembly Hall site as Grave Robber Hubertas asked. Return to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008224
text: Grave Robber Hubertas requested that you obtain monster claws to give to the Royal Army.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008225
text: Give it to Grave Robber Hubertas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008226
text: Steal the petrified stolen goods

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008227
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to get the stolen goods that the Dico Thieves brought in. Steal the petrified stolen goods in the Outer Wall Entrance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008228
text: Stole the goods from Dico Thieves as Grave Robber Hubertas requested. Return to Hubertas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008229
text: Hand over the water bottle engraved with password to the guard nearby the Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008230
text: Grave Robber Hubertas asked you to find Grave Robber Benjaminas who is hidden among the guards near the Plaza. Hand over the password engraved water bottle to the guards for Benjaminas to recognize it and talk to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008231
text: Someone from the guards is calling you! Talk to Grave Robber Benjaminas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008232
text: Collect Fragrant Stone Powder from the Petrified Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008233
text: Benjaminas told you how to get past the soldiers while avoding their eyes. Let's collect the Fragrant Stone Powder from the Petrified Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008234
text: Give it to Grave Robber Benjaminas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008235
text: Collected the Fragrant Stone Powders that Grave Robber Benjaminas asked. Return to Benjaminas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008236
text: Collect %s from Petrified Garden

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008237
text: Rub the Fragrant Stone Powser on Rambear

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008238
text: Grave Robber Benjaminas told you to rub the Fragrant Stone Powders on Rambears in the Plaza to lure Saltistter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008239
text: Rubbed the powders on Rambears as Bejamin suggested. Return to Benjaminas quickly to carry on to the next plan before Saltistter shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008240
text: Guard Gofden is waiting for help in Roxona Marketplace in the Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008241
text: Gofden says even if he wanted to, he can't leave because of the monsters nearby. Defeat the monsters nearby and help Gofden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008242
text: Report to Guard Gofden

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008243
text: Collect the keepsakes of the advance Royal Army

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008244
text: Guard Gofden asked you to retrieve the keepsakes of soldiers swept by the Petrifying Frost in Palduo Square Site and the Commercial district.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008245
text: Give it to Guard Gofden

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008246
text: Acquired the keepsakes of advance soldiers as Gofden asked. Go back and give it to Gofden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008247
text: Chance to Recover

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008248
text: Collect Reaction Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008249
text: Cryomancer Kostas is researching on a device to block the curse of Petrifying Frost. Defeat the monsters in Palaikai Forkroad and get Reaction Stones for Kostas' research.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008250
text: Give it to Cryomancer Kostas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008251
text: Gathered enough Reaction Stones for Kostas. Give the stones to Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008252
text: Get %s from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008253
text: Obtained Reaction Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008254
text: Test the Mark of Silt in Master Craftman's Street

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008255
text: Cryomancer Kostas asked you to test teh Mark of Silt on the monsters in Master Craftman's Street

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008256
text: Successfully tested the Mark of silt as requested by Kostas. Return to Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008257
text: Retrieve the Petrification Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008258
text: Cryomancer Kostas requires the Petrification Detector to amplify the Symbol of Silt. Retrieve a Petrification Detector from the Palaikai Fork that responds to the Symbol of Silt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008259
text: Acquired a usable Petrification Detector. Take it to Cryomancer Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008260
text: Enemy's foe is an enemy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008261
text: Collect Velas Grass in Commercial District

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008262
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas asked you to gather Velas Grass around the Commercial District to make the monsters guard the boxes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008263
text: Give it to Grave Robber Rudolfas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008264
text: Gathered enough Velas Grass. Return to Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008265
text: Work on the boxes in Gerove Workshop Site

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008266
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas asked you to mash the Velas Grass and apply it on Amanda Thieves' boxes in Gerove Workshop Site. When you apply Velas Grass on the boxes, the monsters will think of it as its nest and protect it from thieves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008267
text: Report to Grave Robber Rudolfas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008268
text: Applied Velas Grass on the boxes. Return to Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008269
text: Guard Lyle asked you to defeat the monsters roaming around.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008270
text: Protect the Petrified Soldiers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008271
text: Lyle asked you to protect his fellow soldiers who were swept by the Petrifying Frost in Ruklys Plaza. Defeat the monsters that are attacking the petrified soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008272
text: Protected the last moments of the petrified soldiers as Lyle requested. Return to Lyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008273
text: Protect the Petrified Soldiers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008274
text: Retrieve the Damaged Relics

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008275
text: Guard Nomabis asked you to retrieve the damaged relics that Chronomancer Sabina requested. It's not an easy find so have patience and look for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008276
text: Give it to Guard Nomabis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008277
text: Found the damaged relics as Nomabis asked. Return to Nomabis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008278
text: Collect the Damaged Relics

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008279
text: Chronomancer Sabina says there may be an active portal left among the Fortress of the Land portals scattered around Ruklys Street and asked you to check it. Go and check all four portals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008280
text: Defeat the monsters around Barracks District

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008281
text: Activate the portal of Barracks District

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008282
text: Chronomancer Sabina has asked you to begin the experiment. Activate the portal in Barracks District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008283
text: Deal with monsters on the way to Estuary Bank Junction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008284
text: Adjutant General Hans has asked you to defeat the monsters located between the Downtown entrance and Estuary Bank Junction to make sure the grave robbers make it in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008285
text: Use Monster Stimulant in Estuary Bank Junction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008286
text: Adjutant General Hans wants to sent the Royal Army guards somewhere else to bring in Stephonas. First, use the Monster Stimulant on the monsters in Estuary Bank Junction.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008287
text: Used the Monster Stimulant on the monsters as Adjutant General Hans requested. Return to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008288
text: Lure the guards in Decrepit Watermill

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008289
text: Adjutant General Hans asked you to use the uproar of monsters caused by the Monster Stimulant to lure the guards from Decrepit Watermill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008290
text: You have turned the attention of guards for Grave Robber Stephonas to pass by as requested by Adjutant General Hans. Return to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008291
text: Adjutant General Hans asked you to retrieve the propaganda materials spread 600 years ago by the Royal Army to encourage surrender. The propaganda materials are posted on the Decrepit Watermill.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008292
text: Acquired all the propaganda materials scattered by the Royal Army 600 years ago. Return to Hans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008293
text: Gather Hardened Gunpowder

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008294
text: Grave Robber Stephonas suggested you to collect bomb ingredients to take the Frosty Core from the Stone Froster. Defeat the monsters nearby and collect Hardened Gunpowder.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008295
text: As Grave Robber Stephonas requested to you, you collected enough hardened gun powders. Return to Grave Robber Stephonas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008296
text: Processed Bomb Experiment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008297
text: Grave Robber Stephonas has asked you to experiment the processed gun powders on the monsters before using it. {nl}Try throwing the gun powders to the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008298
text: As requested by Grave Robber Stephonas you've checked how strong the stone gun powders are. You found that they are unstable to use at the moment. Return to Grave Robber Stephonas and let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008299
text: Obtain Sticky Liquid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008300
text: Grave Robber Stephonas asked you to stabilize the instable gun powders and to do so, you should defeat the monsters at Visko Sanctum Ruins and obtain Sticky Liquid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008301
text: Talk with Grave Robber Stephonas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008302
text: As Grave Robber Stephonas requested of you, you obtained enough Sticky Liquid. Return to Grave Robber Stephonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008303
text: Grave Robber Stephonas asked you to defeat Stone Frosters and obtain a Frosty Core which the Knights of Kaliss has asked you to do. First wake up Stone Frosters by throwing the bombs at them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008304
text: Grave Robber Stephonas obtained the Frosty Core from the Stone Frosters. Let's go back to Grave Robber Stephonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008305
text: Obtain the Frosty Core from a Stone Froster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008306
text: Defeat the monsters at Kovos Hall Site

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008307
text: Wilhelmina Carriot wants you to defeat the monsters at Kovos Hall Site.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008308
text: Talk to Wilhelmina Carriot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008309
text: Retrieve Tasty Tablets

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008310
text: Wilhelmina Carriot requested that you retrieve the cough medicine taken by monsters from the soldiers afflicted by the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008311
text: Collect Dark Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008312
text: Bokor Edita asked you to call the host monsters and find out the causes of the curse. To make a medicine to call out the host monster, she asked you to defeat the monsters at Vienti Fortress and collect the dark crystals.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008313
text: Hand them over to the Bokor Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008314
text: You have collected enough dark crystals as Bokor Edita requested to you. Return to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008315
text: Collect % from monsters at Vienti Fortress

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008316
text: Release the petrified soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008317
text: Burn the incense at the Vienti Fortress burner

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008318
text: Bokor Edita requested that you burn the incense at the burner placed in Vienti Fortress in order to hear the thoughts clouding the city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008319
text: Burned incense as requested by Bokor Edita. Return to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008320
text: Use the melting solution to the monsters at Neiveikiama Castle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008321
text: Report to the Alchemist Saliamonas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008322
text: You used the melting solution on the monsters as Saliamonas told you to, but you made them angry. Let's go back to Saliamonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008323
text: Collect the Petrified Samples from the monsters in Neiveikiama Castle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008324
text: Saliamonas asked you to obtain the Petrified Samples by defeating the monsters at Neiveikiama Castle for the experiment of the new medicine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008325
text: You've collected enough Petrified Samples as requested by Saliamonas. Let's go back to Saliamonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008326
text: Deal with elite monsters north of Neiveikiama Castle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008327
text: Defeat Tetraox

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008328
text: Tetraox was hiding in this altar, rather than the restrained souls of the pilgrims. Defeat Tetraox.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008329
text: Defeat the Tetraox that hid in the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008330
text: This sanctum also seems corrupted. Go to the Pardoner Master for advice. You can move to the Pardoner Master easily if you buy the warp scroll from the stand right beside you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008331
text: Talk to Disciple Laius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008332
text: Disciple Laius is waiting for someone's help. Talk to Disciple Laius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008333
text: Search for the orb that can contain vigor

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008334
text: Disciple Laius wants to complete the orb that can contain the vigor to look for the object which the master had left. {nl}First, look for the orb that can contain vigor from the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008335
text: Hand it over to Disciple Laius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008336
text: You've found an orb that can contain vigor. Take it to Disciple Laius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008337
text: You've created an orb that can contain vigor. Ask Disciple Laius how to use it from now on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008338
text: Absorb vigor from the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008339
text: In order to summon the guide stone of the wisdom, Disciple Laius told you that he would need the vigor of the dead one. Use the orb that can contain the vigor of the monsters to absorb the vigor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008340
text: The vigor has been accumulated enough. Talk to Laius what to do with the collected vigor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008341
text: Listen from the Disciple Laius what to do with the vigor that is collected in the orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008342
text: Inject the vigor into the crystal of the hardened astral body

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008343
text: Inject the collected vigor into the crystal of the hardened astral body at Maras Stone Cahmber to summon the guide stone of the wisdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008344
text: Talk with Disciple Hones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008345
text: Acquired the guide stone of the wisdom. Meet Disciple Hones and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008346
text: Obtain %s from the crystal of the hardened astral body

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008347
text: Ask Disciple Hones to give you a hint which the master left.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008348
text: Examine the records which the master left

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008349
text: Disciple Hones told you that the Disciple Laius is misunderstanding something. To find out the truth, please check various records from the master's hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008350
text: It seems that what Disciple Hones told you is right as you looked at the records which the master left for you. Return to Disciple Hones and talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008351
text: Preparations for dangerous search

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008352
text: You may listen the truths from Disciple Hones. Talk to Disciple Hones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008353
text: Collect the Eyes of Truth fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008354
text: The eyes of the truth that sees the astral body are destroyed due to the attacks of the monsters. Use the guide stone of the wisdom to defeat the monster that has the eyes of the truth and collect the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008355
text: Hand them over to Disciple Hones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008356
text: You've collected all fragments of the Eyes of Truth. Go see Disciple Hones and restore the Eyes of Truth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008357
text: You've completed the Eyes of Truth. Ask Disciple Hones what you should see.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008358
text: Obtain the Soul Crystal by defeating Shadowgaler

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008359
text: Disciple Hones claims that it is in the possession of mentor Shadowgaler.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008360
text: Acquired the Soul Crystal. Return to Disciple Hones and listen to what he has to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008361
text: Tell him about what you heard from Hones and the diary of the master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008362
text: Spatial Magic Gem of Contract

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008363
text: Examine the Magic Gem Fusion Device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008364
text: According to the memo of Disciple Hones, you should combine three Spatial Magic Gem into the Magic Gem Fusion Device.{nl}Examine the Magic Gem Fusion Device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008365
text: Retrieve the fragments of The Spatial Magic Gem of Contract

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008366
text: Hones' Memo : The Spatial Magic Gem of Contract is in the reception room, but I heard it recently broke. The monsters probably have those fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008367
text: Retrieve %s from the Reception Room

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008368
text: Activate the Magic Field of Preservation at the Shrine of Remembrance

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008369
text: Hones' Memo : Go to the Forgotten Priest's Grave if you retrieved all of the Magic Gem of Contract fragments. You will be able to restore the Gem at the Magic Field of Preservation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008370
text: Protect the Magic Field of Preservation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008371
text: Insert the Spatial Magic Gem into the Magic Gem Fusion Device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008372
text: Hones' Memo : If you find the spatial magic gem, go back to the fusion device. When you insert all magic gems, the way to find the research of the master will be opened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008373
text: Restore %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008374
text: Spatial Magic Gem of Promise

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008375
text: Collect the Condensed Spite

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008376
text: Hones' Memo : The Spatial Magic Gem of Promise can be found in the Siaura Mine. First, use the Soul Crystal on the monsters and collect the Condensed Spite.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008377
text: Destroy the Barrier Stone at Siaura Mine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008378
text: Hones' Memo : Destroy the barrier stone at Siaura Mine with the Condensed Spite. The Black Chaser will start pursuing you from behind, avoid it and go to the end of the mine. You will be able to find the Spatial Magic Gem of Promise there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008379
text: Destroy the Barrier Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008380
text: The protective layer that was protecting the Barrier Stone has disappeared. Destroy the Barrier Stone and obtain the Sealed Spatial Magic Gem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008381
text: Retrieve the Sealed Spatial Magic Gem by avoiding the Black Chaser

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008382
text: Spatial Magic Gem of Offer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008383
text: Find Templeshooter at the Shrine of Remembrance

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008384
text: Hones' Memo : Templeshooter at the Shrine of Remembrance must be holding the Spatial Magic Gem of Offer. The Wisdom Guiding Stone should help you in searching for the Templeshooter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008385
text: Find Templeshooter using the Wisdom Guiding Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008386
text: Check the Black Shadow

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008387
text: It seems that the Wisdom Guiding Stone found the location of Templeshooter. Find the black shadow and examine it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008388
text: Activate the Magic Gem Fusion Device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008389
text: You've collected all Spatial Magic Gems. Activate the Magic Gem Fusion Device and make the Completed Spatial Magic Gem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008390
text: Hones' Memo : When you find all three Spatial Magic Gems, go back to the fusion device. When you insert all Magic Gems, the way to find the research of the master will be opened at Laudi Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008391
text: Activate the teleportation device to Laudi Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008392
text: Use the completed Spatial Magic Gems at the teleportation device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008393
text: Move to the hidden area by inserting the Completed Spatial Magic Gem in the fusion device.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008394
text: Examine the Master's Legacy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008395
text: You have found the location of the place where the inheritance of the master are hidden. Examine the inheritance of the master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008396
text: You have obtained the inheritance of the master. Tell Disciple Hones about what have happened until now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008397
text: Longing to Speak

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008398
text: Talk to the wandering spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008399
text: There is a wandering spirit in Videntis Shrine. Ask it why is it wandering around.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008400
text: Look for clues nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008401
text: The spirit tried to say something, but it soon disappeared. Search for more clues nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008402
text: Talk with Kupole Vita

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008403
text: You found Kupole Vita while she is looking for something. Ask her what she is looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008404
text: Look for the remaining spirits and talk to them

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008405
text: Kupole Vita told you that she came to look for spirits who vanished. Look for the remaining spirits and talk to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008406
text: Look for an object that the spirits were describing

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008407
text: The vanished spirits left without saying any word. Look for an object with clues that the remaining spirits told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008408
text: You've found the Pot of Silence that the spirits seem to have talked about. But there is some ominous energy is surrounding it, talk with Kupole Vita on how to dispose it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008409
text: Eliminate the ominous energy that is condensing around the Pot of Silence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008410
text: Kupole Vita told you that the ominous energy from the Pot of Silence is so powerful she can't get near it. Find the Pot of Silence at Memum Corridor and scatter Kupole Vita's Purification Powder to look for the condensed evil energy and eliminate it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008411
text: Destroy the Pot of Silence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008412
text: The ominous energy of the Pot of Silence has subsided. Now, destroy the Pot of Silence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008413
text: The demonic energy around here has subsided. Now, destroy the Pot of Silence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008414
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008415
text: While attempting to destroy the Pot of Silence, the demons rushed in. Defeat all demons that rushed in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008416
text: You've destroyed the Pot of Silence. Return to Kupole Vita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008417
text: Unfree Beings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008418
text: Although the Pot of Silence is destroyed, you still cannot tell what the spirits are trying to say. Ask Kupole Vita what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008419
text: Look for spirits wishing to speak to you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008420
text: Kupole Vita told you that it would be good idea to look for other spirits and listen to what they have to say. Look for spirits hoping to share their story in detail.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008421
text: Hand them over to the Rimos' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008422
text: You've collected every skeletons binded to the contract. Return to the Rimos' Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008423
text: Talk with the Rimos' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008424
text: The Rimos' Spirit told you that the skeletons can be purified by gathering them and cremating them. Now ask him what you should do with the gathered skeletons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008425
text: Burn the Contract of Flesh

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008426
text: The Rimos' Spirit told you that in order to terminate the contract, the skeletons binded to the contract should be cremated together with the Contract of Flesh using holy powers. Look for the Contract of Flesh at Sataruti Hall and burn the contract.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008427
text: Report to the Rimos' Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008428
text: You've burned the skeletons binded to the contract along with the Contract of Flesh. Return to the Rimos' Spirit and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008429
text: It seems that you've terminated the Contract of Flesh. Now, listen to the Rimos' Spirit on what you should do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008430
text: Defeat Master Genie at Garbingal Burial Chamber

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008431
text: The last contract is the Contract of Spirit, which belongs to Master Genie. Defeat Master Genie at Garubinal Burial Chamber to liberate the spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008432
text: Fluttering Threads of Destiny

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008433
text: Discover the tablet

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008434
text: Look for the tablet near Sodo Fork of Nuoridin Falls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008435
text: Collect materials to rubbings with

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008436
text: There is something written on the tablet, but you don't have the materials to make rubbings. Let's see if there is anything useful held by the Wendigo Shamans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008437
text: It seems that something is written on the tablet, but there aren't any materials to make rubbings. Look for useful material among the Wendigo Shamans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008438
text: Collect %s from Wendigo Shamans

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008439
text: Make rubbings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008440
text: Acquired material to make rubbings with from the Wendigos. Now, go to the tablet and make rubbings of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008441
text: Look for someone who wants rubbings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008442
text: It seems that the rubbings were made well. Look for someone who wants rubber copies from the Notice Board and bring these to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008443
text: The Walls Outlasting the Kingdom

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008444
text: Examining the tablet

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008445
text: Look at the tablet of Sklada Court

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008446
text: As you looked at the tablet, the monsters rushed in. Defeat them and make the rubbings of the tablet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008447
text: As you looked at the tablet, the monsters suddenly rushed in. Defeat them and make rubbings of the tablet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008448
text: Defeat the monsters that rushed in

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008449
text: The monsters are all defeated, make the rubbings now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008450
text: Talk to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008451
text: It seems that Adrijus has some more words to say. Talk with Adrijus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008452
text: You've accepted his suggestion. Now, ask Adrijus how you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008453
text: How to Eat a Kepa

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008454
text: Talk to Adrijus at The Central Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008455
text: Collect the materials Adrijus requested of you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008456
text: Obtain acidic body fluid by throwing Red Poison Bottles at monsters and diluent from the Fedimian Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008457
text: Hand them over to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008458
text: Hand over the acidic body fluid and the diluting solution to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008459
text: Collect %s by throwing red poison bottles at the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008460
text: You've collected all materials. See what Adrijus does with the acidic body fluid and the diluting solution.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008461
text: Ask Adrijus what's written on the tablet

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008462
text: It seems that Adrijus successfully made rubbings of the tablet. Ask him what was written.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008463
text: The First Epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008464
text: Inspect the lump of soil

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008465
text: There's a lump of soil that looks rather sculptural at the corner of The Old Garden. Inspect the lump of soil.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008466
text: Craft a stone shovel

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008467
text: The lump of soil is noticeably hard, so you're inclined to check what's inside with a shovel. Craft a shovel with nearby wood and stone to excavate the lump with.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008468
text: Shovel the soil away

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008469
text: Although it looks shoddy, you've made a usable shovel. Shovel the soil away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008470
text: A tombstone emerged from the lump. Inspect it to read what's written on it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008471
text: Turn the tombstone around to read the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008472
text: The part of the tombstone where the epitaph is written is facing the ground so you can't read it. Flip the tombstone around and read the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008473
text: Read the epitaph of the flipped tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008474
text: You've succeeded in flipping the epitaph around. Read the epitaph of the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008475
text: The Second Epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008476
text: Look at the tombstone at the Hall of the Past

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008477
text: There is a tombstone at the Hall of the Past. Go near it and take a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008478
text: Collect the fragments of the tombstone from Minos

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008479
text: The upper part of the tombstone is completely destroyed. You may be able to find tombstone fragments from Minos nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008480
text: Return to the tombstone and try to restore it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008481
text: It seems that you've collected all fragments of the tombstone. Return to the tombstone and take a look at it to see if you can restore it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008482
text: Collect %s from Minos

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008483
text: Ask the blacksmith in Klaipeda about adhesives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008484
text: Ask the blacksmith in Klaipeda about adhesives to restore the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008485
text: Ask the blacksmith in Klaipeda about adhesives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008486
text: Return to the tombstone in the Namu Temple Ruins

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008487
text: You were able to obtain some food boxes which Infrogalas Mages like from the blacksmith in Klaipeda. First, return to the Namu Temple Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008488
text: Inspect the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008489
text: Return to the tombstone and check the status of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008490
text: Collect Sticky Resin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008491
text: Collect Sticky Resin from Green Loftlem after dealing with them by luring them with the feed box provided by the blacksmith. {nl}You could also obtain it by hunting Green Loftlem at Laukyme Swamp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008492
text: Restore the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008493
text: Acquired enough sticky resin. Return to the tombstone and reattach the fragments of the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008494
text: Read the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008495
text: You've restored the tombstone to legible condition. Read what's written on the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008496
text: The Third Epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008497
text: Look at the tombstone in the Nevieda Altar Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008498
text: Look at the tombstone near the Nevieda Altar Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008499
text: Collect dry bushes and oil

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008500
text: You should clear the vines wrapping the tombstone to read the epitaph. Obtain some bushes nearby and the oil from monsters to burn them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008501
text: Return to the tombstone near Nevieda Altar Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008502
text: Acquired enough dry bushes and oil. Return to the tombstone near the Nevieda Altar Area and burn down the vine that engulfs the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008503
text: Collect %s from the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008504
text: Burn down the vines that are binding the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008505
text: You've collected enough kindling and oil, so burn down the vines binding the tombstone and read the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008506
text: Defeat the monsters while burning down the vines

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008507
text: The fire lighted well on the vine, but monsters rushed in after smelling the burning oil. Defeat the monsters while the vines burn down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008508
text: Only the tombstone remains after all the vines have burned down. Although it's now sooty, you won't have a problem reading the epitaph. Read the epitaph.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008509
text: Meet the Wings of Vaivora in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008510
text: The tombstones contain the memoirs of a fairy. Some of the memoirs are hard to understand, so look for someone who could interpret it. The Wings of Vaivora at Klaipeda should know something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008511
text: Another Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008512
text: Examine the tombstone in the Namu Temple Ruins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008513
text: Read the writings on the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008514
text: Read the writings on the tombstone aloud. Don't overdo it though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008515
text: Wrote on the stone. Examine the tombstone to see what happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008516
text: The tombstone broke and monsters emerged! Defeat them!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008517
text: Meet Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008518
text: Meet Justas at the Research Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008519
text: Justas seems to be in trouble. Defeat the monsters that are attacking Justas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008520
text: Talk to Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008521
text: Defeated all the monsters. Talk to Justas and find out what this is all about.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008522
text: Justas seems to have been through this often. Talk to him and ask how he ended up here alone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008523
text: Collect Bone Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008524
text: Justas asked you to collect materials for the anti-rust solution from defeating Hallowventer Archer. {nl}{nl} Collect Bone Fragments to make an anti-rust solution to remove and prevent rust on the metal plate left by Demetrius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008525
text: Give it to Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008526
text: Collected all the Bone Fragments needed. Return to Justas and give them to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008527
text: Collect %s from Hallowventer Shaman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008528
text: Seems like there is something under the Stone Tower. Tear down the Stone Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008529
text: Archon appeared from the collapsed Stone Tower! Defeat the Archon!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008530
text: Talk to Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008531
text: You've safely entered the Fortress of the Land. Amanda is waiting for you. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008532
text: Drawing Attention

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008533
text: You need discuss with Amanda on how to pass through the heavy security. Talk to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008534
text: Find materials to make explosives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008535
text: Amanda suggested to you to make a Resounding Bomb. Obtain the materials that are needed to make a Resounding Bomb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008536
text: Acquired the materials that are needed to make a Resounding Bomb. Talk to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008537
text: Talk to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008538
text: Steal the liquid medicine from the Royal Army guard

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008539
text: One of the materials that is needed to make a Resounding Bomb is the liquid medicine which the Royal Army guard has. Steal the medicine from the Royal Army guard.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008540
text: You have enough liquid medicine. Talk with Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008541
text: Set the Resounding Bomb

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008542
text: Set the Resounding Bomb which Amanda created.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008543
text: You've set the Resounding Bomb. Talk to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008544
text: You are ready to detonate the Resounding Bomb. Talk to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008545
text: Move to the next area with Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008546
text: You've exploded the Resounding Bomb. Move to the next area before the Royal Army guards come here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008547
text: It seems that you avoided being detected by the guards. Talk with Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008548
text: Collect Rambear Fur

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008549
text: Investigator Monahan was sent to investigate the damaged farms of Klaipeda Region. Collect Rambear Fur for Investigator Monahan to investigate the extent of farm damage with.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008550
text: You've collected enough Rambear Fur. Take it to Investigator Monahan.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008551
text: Investigate the bushes and defeat Orange Tamas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008552
text: Tenant Farmer Charlotte said that many monsters are attracted by the smell of withering grape vines. Investigate the bushes and defeat the Orange Tamas under the bushes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008553
text: You've defeated many monsters. Return to Tenant Charlotte.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008554
text: Talk to Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008555
text: Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz went to the central part of the hills. Talk with him who is at the camp which is at the inner garden of Diliti.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008556
text: Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz wants you to cooperate with him for saving you. Listen for more details.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008557
text: Talk to Senior Monk Potos

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008558
text: Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz wants the monks to cooperate with the Hunters, but it's not working alright. Persuade Senior Monk Potos on behalf of him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008559
text: It seems like Senior Monk Potos has some kind of request for the Revelator. Talk with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008560
text: Cure the poisoned monks after talking to Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008561
text: Find a way through Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz to cure the poisoned monks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008562
text: The antidote of Mintz is effective to the poisoned monks. Return to Potos and let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008563
text: You need evidence to convince Potos. Ask Mintz if there is any adequate method.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008564
text: Talk to Hunter Reina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008565
text: Mintz said that Hunter Reina would be able to find an adequate evidence. Go look for Hunter Reina at Rykdimo Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008566
text: Hunter Reina looks ill. Talk to her first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008567
text: Search for the trap using Jareth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008568
text: Hunter Reina lent you her companion, Jareth since she can't move. Use Jareth to look for Ebonypawn's trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008569
text: You found Ebonypawn's trap. Return to Hunter Reina with Jareth.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008570
text: You have found a trap that could possibly be evidence. Hand it over to Mintz.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008571
text: Show Ebonypawn's trap to Potos. If Potos has good eyes, he may able to find evidence of Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008572
text: Talk to Hunter Natasha

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008573
text: Mintz said after finish persuading Potos, you should help Natasha. Meet Natasha in Viltis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008574
text: Talk to Monk Wiley

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008575
text: Monk Wiley seems to be in trouble. Ask her if there's anything you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008576
text: Collect the pages of the scripture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008577
text: Wiley asked you to collect the pages of the scripture that he lost while running away. Collect the scattered pages of the scripture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008578
text: Hand them over to the Monk Wiley

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008579
text: You barely collected the pages of the scripture. Hand them over to Wiley.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008580
text: Monk Wiley seems to be in a trouble. Ask him if there's anything you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008581
text: Monk Wiley told you that he can't cure due to the roaming monsters. Defeat the monsters around to ease his mind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008582
text: You have reduced the number of monsters by a lot. Return to Wiley and let him know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008583
text: Monk Wiley seems to be in a trouble. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008584
text: Collect Tempas Mushrooms

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008585
text: Monk Wiley said he doesn't have enough food to feed his brothers. Look for Tempas Mushrooms near Juklas Sunny Place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008586
text: You have collected enough Tempas Mushrooms. Hand them over to Wiley.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008587
text: It seems that Hunter Reina is still not feeling well. Please help her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008588
text: Collect Rocktor's Stony Legs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008589
text: Reina told you that since she isn't feeling well, she must prepare to get ready for the monster's attacks. Please collect Rocktor's stony legs to make arrowheads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008590
text: Hand them over to Hunter Reina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008591
text: You have collected enough materials. Return to Reina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008592
text: Collect %s from Rocktors

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008593
text: It seems that Hunter Reina is still not feeling well. Please talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008594
text: Hunt together with Jareth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008595
text: Reina wants to scare the monsters using Jareth. Hunt the monsters with Jareth near Rykdimo Gate Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008596
text: I think the monsters would be scared with this. Please take Jareth to Reina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008597
text: Hunter Natasha wants to persuade Senior Monk Marko, but it's not that easy. Listen to what she says.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008598
text: Talk to Senior Monk Marko

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008599
text: Natasha wants you to persuade Marko on behalf of her. Talk to Marko.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008600
text: Marko doesnt trust the Hunters. Pass the words you heard to Natasha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008601
text: Senior Monk Marko is trying his best to retake the Monastery. Let Marko know that the Hunters can help in retake the Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008602
text: Talk to the monks

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008603
text: Marko wants you to tell the monks who were sent to the lower area that the Hunters are participating. Meet the monks and talk to them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008604
text: A young monk has collapsed, causing Marko to be very nervous. Hunter Natasha may know a way to improve the status of the young monk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008605
text: Unidentified Poison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008606
text: Hunter Natasha asked your help to find out the ingredients of the poison. Ask her how you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008607
text: Collect Chafperor Thorn Venom

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008608
text: Natasha wants you to bring the samples of three deadly poisons. Please obtain Chafperor Thorn Venom, Toxic Thorn Tree Stump Sap, and Spring Water Venom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008609
text: Collect Toxic Thorn Tree Stump Sap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008610
text: Collect Spring Water Venom

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008611
text: Hand them over to Hunter Natasha

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008612
text: You've collected the samples of poisons requested by Natasha. Hand them over to her immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008613
text: Fortunately, it seems the right poison has been identified. Talk to Hunter Natasha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008614
text: Collect Woodluwa Leaves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008615
text: Natasha told you that we could make an antidote if we have one more ingredient. Please collect Woodluwa Leaves.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008616
text: You've collected enough Woodluwa Leaves. Hand them over to Natasha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008617
text: You were able to save the life of the young monk. Senior Monk Marko has something to say so talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008618
text: Acquired the promise from Marko that you would cooperate. Tell Natasha about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008619
text: It seems that you would have to persuade Senior Monk Goss at Laukyme Swamp. First, report to Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz, the hunter commander at Glade Hillroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008620
text: It seems that Mintz is very satisfied with the progress. Now go meet Natasha at Laukyme Swamp to persuade Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008621
text: Talk to Hunter Bastille

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008622
text: It seems that Hunter Bastille is not well. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008623
text: Collect herbs for detoxification

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008624
text: Bastille requested you to look for detoxifying herbs to cure his paralysis. Collect the detoxifying herbs that Chevas found.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008625
text: Hand them over to Hunter Bastille

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008626
text: You've collected the herbs that Bastille needed. Return to him and cure his paralysis.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008627
text: Talk to the Monk Chad

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008628
text: It seems that Chad needs some help. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008629
text: Collect beeswax

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008630
text: Chad asked you to collect beeswax from the beehives in Viltis Forest. Be careful about monsters attacking and collect beeswax.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008631
text: Hand them over to Monk Chad

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008632
text: You've collected enough beeswaxes. Hand them over to Chad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008633
text: Collect %s from old beehives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008634
text: It seems that Monk Chad needs something. Ask him how you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008635
text: Hunt Woodluwas and collect some resin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008636
text: Chad told you that he can make an ointment if he has some resin from Woodluwas. Hunt for Woodluwas at Svicia Fountain and Zvalge Forest Way and collect some resin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008637
text: You obtained the resins from Woodluwas. Return to Chad and hand them over.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008638
text: Hunter Natasha is trying to persuade Senior Monk Goss but it seems that it's not working well. Talk with Natasha again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008639
text: Talk to Senior Monk Goss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008640
text: Natasha asked you to persuade Goss. Talk to Senior Monk Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008641
text: Senior Monk Goss is being too uptight. Try persuading Goss again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008642
text: Defeat Liverworts and Stonacons and collect evidence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008643
text: Goss asked you to show him the skill that is needed to retrieve the Monastery. Defeat Liverworts and Stonacons around here and bring the evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008644
text: Hand them over to Senior Monk Goss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008645
text: Goss should approve of this. Bring the evidence to Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008646
text: It seems that Goss has acknowledged you. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008647
text: Goss requested you to pass the message to gather the Hunters in front of the entrance of the Monastery. Pass the words of Goss to Natasha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008648
text: Hunter Natasha is looking for crucial evidence on Ebonypawn while the monks and the Hunters gather in front of the entrance of the Monastery. Ask Senior Monk Goss about the details.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008649
text: You've heard from Goss about a case of a dead man that might be linked to Ebonypawn. Tell this to Natasha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008650
text: Hunter Natasha wants to find out what Ebonypawn was looking for from the dead man. Talk to Natasha again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008651
text: Investigate the grave at Priekis Rest Area

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008652
text: Find the grave of the dead man who was killed by Ebonypawn's poison and look for some clues on Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008653
text: You found a book with some writing in it. Show the book to Hunter Natasha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008654
text: The details of what Ebonypawn did is written on the traveler's old book. Show the letter to Goss and talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008655
text: It seems as if Goss has also found out about Ebonypawn's identity. Talk to Hunter Natasha and prepare to charge to Tyla Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008656
text: Enter Tyla Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008657
text: There are many monks and Hunters gathered at Tyla Monastery. Go to the entrance of Tyla Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008658
text: Talk to Monk Jones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008659
text: Monk Jones seems anxious. Ask him what his worry is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008660
text: Defeat Liverworts and Stonacons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008661
text: Monk Jones seems to be unease by the monsters around his fellow monks. Defeat Liverworts and Stonacons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008662
text: It seems that the number of monsters has been reduced a bit. Return to the Monk Jones and assure to him that they're safe now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008663
text: Defeat Liverworts

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008664
text: Defeat Stonacons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008665
text: Monk Jones needs someone's help. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008666
text: Collect Acylado Hydrophyte

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008667
text: Jones says that he requires Acylado Hydrophyte for the Essence of Water. Collect Acylado Hydrophyte from Difference Marsh or Minia Flooding Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008668
text: Hand them over to Monk Jones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008669
text: You've collected enough Acylado Hydrophyte. Hand them over to Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008670
text: Collect %s from the place where the bubbles are coming up

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008671
text: Talk to Monk Jeffrey

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008672
text: Jeffrey is standing on the road to the Monastery. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008673
text: Defeat the monsters around Kalna Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008674
text: Jeffrey requested you to defeat the monsters at the entrance of the Monastery in order to retake the Monastery. Hunt for the monsters around Kalna Fork.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008675
text: You've defeated enough monsters. Return to Jeffrey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008676
text: Defeat the monsters in front of the Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008677
text: Mission to Retake the Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008678
text: The monks and the Hunters are gathered at the Monastery. Help them retake the Monastery from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008679
text: Storm through Apmas Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008680
text: Goss told you to head towards the Prayer Room by fighting through the monsters. Fight through the monsters with Goss and Mintz.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008681
text: You've stormed through Apmas Hall. Talk to Goss to proceed further.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008682
text: Defeat monsters in Apmas Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008683
text: You still have to go a long way to the Prayer Room. Talk to Senior Monk Goss to proceed further.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008684
text: Break through Raktika Hall

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008685
text: The next objective is to break through Raktika Hall located at the north side. Destroy the strange lump that is luring monsters and move out from Raktika Hall with Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008686
text: You've succeeded eliminating the strange lump that was luring monsters at Raktika Hall. Go to the next area with Senior Monk Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008687
text: Eliminate the strange lump that is luring monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008688
text: Senior Monk Goss told you that the mission is halfway done. Talk to him to continue fighting towards the Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008689
text: Storm through Viltis Fountain

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008690
text: Fight through the the crowd of monsters in the hallway and head towards Viltis Fountain. The Prayer Room is just around the corner!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008691
text: Jones says that he requires Acylado Hydrophyte for the Essence of Water. Collect Acylado Hydrophyte from Difference Marsh or Minia Flooding Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008692
text: You've helped Goss release the barrier after reaching Viltis Fountain. Now talk to him and go in front of the Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008693
text: Tetraox suddenly appeared! Defeat Tetraox and go in front of the Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008694
text: Move to the front of the Prayer Room

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008695
text: You've secured the Prayer Room. Go to the Prayer Room.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008696
text: The Hunters and the monks are gathered in front of the Prayer Room. Now talk with Senior Monk Goss and ask him about the way to call the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008697
text: Preparations for the Call

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008698
text: Senior Monk Goss is preparing to call out the abbot in the Prayer Room. Ask him if there's anything you could help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008699
text: Talk to Monk Moheim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008700
text: You will need a Crystal Ball to open the door of the Prayer Room. Meet Monk Moheim who stowed the Crystal Ball.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008701
text: Monk Moheim seems to remember the whereabouts of the Crystal Ball. Ask him where you could find the location of the Crystal Ball.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008702
text: Search for the Crystal Ball in the wooden box in the Reception Room

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008703
text: Moheim stowed the Crystal Ball in the wooden box in the Reception Room. Look for the wooden box in the Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008704
text: You've found the Crystal Ball in the wooden box. Take it to Goss.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008705
text: It seems that everything is ready now. Talk to Senior Monk Goss to call out the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008706
text: Call out the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008707
text: To call out abbot, Goss is trying to manipulate the device in the Prayer Room. Wait until the device gets activated.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008708
text: Talk to the abbot

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008709
text: The abbot moved out from the room. Tell him what has happened so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008710
text: The abbot moved out from the room. Ask him to withdraw the decision to protect Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008711
text: The abbot won't decide quickly. While he discusses with senior monks, go meet Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008712
text: After listening from the senior monks, the abbot finally realized Ebonypawn's true motives. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008713
text: It seems that the decision about what to do with Ebonypawn has been confirmed. Talk to the abbot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008714
text: Search for Ebonypawn, the Assassin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008715
text: The abbot requested you to kick out Ebonypawn from the Monastery. Look for Ebonypawn first in the Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008716
text: Unfortunately, Ebonypawn ran away and Hunter Tracker Capt. Mintz got injured. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008717
text: Senior Monk Potos thinks that the strange lumps that are scattered across the Monastery are luring monsters. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008718
text: Remove the Smelly Lump

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008719
text: Potos requested you to eliminate the lump that is spreading the odor that is luring the monsters. Use the liquid medicine to eliminate them so they can't get near anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008720
text: You've eliminated the lump with odor. Return to Potos.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008721
text: Monk Moheim is worried about the monsters in the Monastery. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008722
text: Defeat the monsters in the Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008723
text: There are still many monsters in the Monastery. Defeat the remaining monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008724
text: You've reduced the number of monsters a lot. Tell this to Moheim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008725
text: Defeat the monsters in the Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008726
text: It seems that Moheim has a trouble cleaning up the Monastery. Talk with Moheim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008727
text: Look for the scripture at Tyla Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008728
text: Moheim requested you to look for scattered pages of the scripture. Find the scriptures that are scattered across the Monastery and hand them over to Moheim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008729
text: Hand them over to Moheim

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150714_008730
text: You've found all scriptures. Hand them over to Moheim.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008731
text: It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to when I moved out of the tower.{nl}I don't know what happened...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008732
text: Good, good... I will make it activate itself only when the Petrifying Frost blow.{nl}I should obtain the nucleus of the detector somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008733
text: If you could bring me the nucleus of the detector, I will do the rest.{nl}You've contributed a lot in this experiment so I will give you the effects of the symbol of schilt.{nl}Although it woud not last long...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008734
text: Long time ago, it used be a big city when compared with Klaipeda or Fedimian.{nl}In terms of everything. It was also an important Trade District.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008735
text: But, that was the story when the city used to belong to the humans. {nl}The monsters are adopting faster than the humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008736
text: We can't even find the traces of the bodies of the victims who were {nl}sacrificed on the day of Ruklys' rebellion due to Petrifying Frost.{nl}Those angry souls are deeply permeated into the city.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008737
text: Please light the bonfire that I set at Vienti Fortress.{nl}I may get a chance to talk to the spirits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008738
text: I've put the scent of butterflies that can be obtained from the deep inside Kateen Forest into the bonfire. {nl}It has the power to comfort the souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008739
text: Even if one is in danger, if one knows that help is coming,{nl} one will have the extra energy to endure longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008740
text: A suitable end for a crazy magician. It could have been dangerous without the defensive magic.{nl}He probably operated the wrong line, without knowing the first valve was destroyed...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008741
text: Anyway, that's great.{nl}Since we've dealt with Antares, let's go up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008742
text: He was always curious about the secret of the tower.{nl}The reason why he was imprisoned was because he was too obsessed with that secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008743
text: I think I can find a way if I have some Red Infrorocktor cores. {nl}I should be able to do something with those even without using magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008744
text: I am sorry, but I can't explain the details.{nl}All I can say is if we use magic, we will be discovered by the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008745
text: Did you just see that monster explode?{nl}That's definitely strange. It's as if the power of its essence is out of control.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008746
text: That vibration from a while ago keeps distracting me.{nl}I hope it's nothing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008747
text: When the demons' attacks started becoming serious, the goddess prepared this in advance.{nl}Fortunately, the device is working alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008748
text: We're almost at the final floor so we just have to press forward a little more.{nl}The goddess must be enduring more than we are.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008749
text: The Jewel of Prominence is now alright.{nl}I am... relieved.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008750
text: You... you are the one Goddess Gabija is looking for!{nl}Please help me. If things continue as they are, we could lose the goddess and the Mage Tower to the demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008751
text: In the past, the demons have aimed to take the Mage Tower.{nl}Though, we were always able to stop their attacks whenever they attacked.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008752
text: But now it's different. Most of the wizards are either dead or have run away.{nl}Only Gabija and a few wizards are still remaining in the tower, protecting it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008753
text: This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I won't be able to use magic, but I will definitely take you to Goddess Gabija.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008754
text: Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008755
text: Gabija has not disappeared completely.{nl}To protect the tower from the demons, she just had to hide herself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008756
text: Because Agailla Flurry could not find her successor, she managed the tower.{nl}To protect a precious thing... she sacrificed herself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008757
text: I can do this alone.{nl}Until Gabija regains her powers again, I will maintain the tower here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008758
text: Okay, go to the fifth floor.{nl}Please pass the Jewel of Prominence to Gabija!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008759
text: This cannot be done without me.{nl}I will somehow manage to hold the tower up, so please pass the Jewel of Prominence to Gabija!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008760
text: What was that vibration?{nl}Could it be...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008761
text: It's the vibration again!{nl}Antares... Now I know. When he exploded, the magic of the tower was disrupted.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008762
text: The tower will collapse if we leave it like this.{nl}Let's quickly go to the Magic Control Room!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008763
text: We should be careful from here.{nl}This floor used to be where Antares' laboratory was located.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008764
text: I feel uneasy.{nl}Maybe, Antares has been released by the attacks of the demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008765
text: I will do the work until Gabija retrieves her power.{nl}Go quickly!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008766
text: We have no choice.{nl}We should give up on the Transport Magic Circles, and instead destroy the monsters that are rushing in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008767
text: Well done.{nl}However, this jewel is just an empty shell.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008768
text: Lastly, we need to collect Flame Sources.{nl}You can obtain them from the monsters that possess the power of fire.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008769
text: I can feel a strange energy.{nl}It seems that the status of the Jewel of Prominence is not normal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008770
text: If Antares had used that power correctly, the Mage Tower would have not turned out like this.{nl}It is such a shame.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008771
text: Oh yeah. There is also a diluting solution that I've ordered from the Item Merchant in Fedimian.{nl}Can you also bring that?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008772
text: To glue stone together, we often use the sticky resin of Infrogalas Mages.{nl}But, you can't find them easily at the Namu Temple Ruins.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008773
text: It would be easier to lure one from the sky than to try finding one without using a food box.{nl}Alternatively, you could just go to Viltis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008774
text: When you go into the monastery, let's first secure the entrance of Prayer Room.{nl}I will leave when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008775
text: The old body of me can't endure as I unlocked two barriers consecutively.{nl}Shall we go to Prayer Room now?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008776
text: It is so fortunate to see you are okay. {nl}Now, we should move the abbot out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008777
text: Prayer Room can't be opened from outside unless a person comes out from the room.{nl}That's why we should endow the sacred energy into the crystal sphere of the monastery when there is an emergency to let Prayer Room know.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008778
text: Moheim is in charge of the crystal sphere. {nl}He is probably around the reception room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008779
text: The abbot in Prayer Room won't know about this.{nl}We should call him out through the crystal sphere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008780
text: I will get the Activation Core

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008781
text: I will go to the goddess

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008782
text: What are you going to do if you can't use the spell?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008783
text: Why the spell can't be used

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008784
text: Notice/Read the Memo from Hones!#5

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008785
text: Surrounded by Enemies

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008786
text: Reclaim the Camp (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008787
text: I will bring it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008788
text: I can't do that

text: Reclaim the Camp (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008790
text: Help collect equipment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008791
text: Do not help.

text: Reclaim the Camp (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008793
text: I'm not yet ready

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008794
text: Reclaim the Camp (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008795
text: I will set up a defensive facility.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008796
text: Reclaim the Camp (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008797
text: Send it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008798
text: Give it a thorough thought.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008799
text: Ignore it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008800
text: Persuading/TALK/0/TRACE_BEFORE/None

text: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008807

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008808
text: You should be able to gather the Essences of Fire when Flame Vapor is let out of the jewel. Fill the Jewel of Prominence with these essences.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008809
text: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008810
text: It seems that the magician Antares is loose. Defeat the Red Infrorocktor that Antares has summoned.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008811
text: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 4F

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008812
text: Defeat monsters and watch the state of the Jewel of Prominence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008813
text: The Jewel of Prominence's status is unusual. Talk to Grita again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008814
text: Activate the Magic Stabilizer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008815
text: You stabilized the Jewel of Prominence using the stabilizer but the Jewel is still emitting an unusual aura. Ask Grita what to do about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008816
text: Find the Magic Control Room

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008817
text: The Jewel of Prominence is stabilized but the explosion at the 3rd Floor has made the Mage Tower unstable. Go to the Magic Control Room to control the disrupted magic of the Tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008818
text: Protect Grita while she is stabilizing the magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008819
text: Grita said we have to go to the Magic Control Room. Protect Grita while she stabilizes the magic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008820
text: You defeated all the monsters, but the Tower is still shaking. Ask Grita what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008821
text: Defeated all the monsters that threatened Grita. Ask Grita what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008822
text: Go to Mage Tower 5F

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008823
text: Grita told you to give the Jewel of Prominence to the goddess while she takes care of the tower. Go to the 5th floor of the Mage Tower where the goddess is located.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008824
text: Defeat Grinender that is blocking the way to the 5th Floor

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008825
text: Collect Rambear Claws

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008826
text: Thief Hubertas asked you to get Rambear Claws to give to the Royal Army.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008827
text: Retrieve the Petrification Detector Activation Core

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008828
text: Cryomancer Kostas says he needs the Petrification Detector Activation Core to amplify the Mark of Silt. Examine the abandoned Petrification Detectors in Palaikai Forkroad and retrieve the Activation Core of the one that reacts to the Mark of Silt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008829
text: Acquired a usable Activation Core of Petriciation Detector. Give it to Cryomancer Kostas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008830
text: Defeat the monsters nearby Estuary Bank Junction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008831
text: Grave Robber Stephonas is looking for someone to help him in the central district of Petrified City.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008832
text: Retrieve the Cough Medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008833
text: Wilhelmina Carriot asked you to retrieve the Cough Medicine that the monsters took away for the soldiers who were swept by the Petrifying Frost.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008834

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008835
text: Light a bonfire in Vienti Fortress

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008836
text: Bokor Edita asked you to light the bonfires in Vienti Fortress to console the Frosted souls in this city.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008837
text: You lighted the bonfire as Edita asked. Return to Edita.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008838
text: Defeat Rubabos

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008839

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008840
text: You've defeated Rubabos as requested by Saliamonas. Return to Saliamonas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008841
text: Defeat Arma that mocked the Sealed Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008842
text: The Sealed Stone asked you to defeat the Arma that mocked it. Defeat Arma for the Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008843
text: Defeated Arma that mocked the Stone. Report to the Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008844
text: Disciple Hones says that Shadowgaler has the Soul Crystal which is the key to finding the teacher's legacy. Use the Eye of Truth to find Shadowgaler and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008845
text: Hones' Memo : Go to the Shrine of Remembrance if you've collected all the Magic Stone of Contract fragments. You can restore the Magic Stone in the preservation magic tile.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008846
text: Jane's spirit and Archon will be freed when you stop the Magic Stone of Interaction. You can weaken the Archon by using the seal that suppress the Spell power on the Archon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008847
text: You need to restore the weathered tombstone. Throw the red poison bottle to the monster to get Sticky Acid Fluid and get the diluent from the Item Merchant in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008848
text: Use the food boxes the Blacksmith gave you to lure Infrogalas Mages that you can defeat for sticky resin. {nl}You can also directly hunt for Infrogalas Mages in Viltis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008849
