name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150717_008876
text: Defeat the monsters gathered

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008877
text: Would it have been better to scrape off the coal powder from Phyracon?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008878
text: Unlease this seal. {nl}The seal can be opened by collecting and breaking the Restraint Crystal from the Flask Mages.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008879
text: I warned my sister Vakarine so that she can prepare for it. {nl}But the waves that the torn demons will create might drag her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008880
text: I need a tougher brush. I'm sorry but can I ask you to collect some stiff hairs? {nl}Shoot this paralyzing needle at Wendigo Archers get them while they're fainted.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008881
text: Grita says the power gathered so far is not enough and that the source should be enhanced. Defeat the monsters in Mage Tower 2F and collect Flame Sources.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008882
text: Defeat Phyracon and collect Black Coal Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008883
text: Cordelier wants Black Coal Powder. Get it from Phyracon for Cordelier.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008884
text: Defeat Phyracon and get %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008885
text: Collect Eternal Embers from Drakes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008886
text: Cordelier asked you to get eternal embers from Drakes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008887
text: Defeat the monsters and get pieces of the Holy Ark

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008888
text: The Seal Stone will just scatter away when released so you need the Holy Ark to hold its soul. Collect the pieces of the Holy Ark from the monsters in Mage Tower 2F.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008889
text: Defeat the Flask Mage and get the Crystal of Restriction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008890
text: {memo Why is there a memo x, if this is used in the game?} The spirit of the Sealed Stone wants to be freed from the seal. Gather the Crystal of Restriction from the Flask Mage and break them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008891
text: The Weak Owl wants you to find other owls that the monsters took away. Find the traces of owl statue in the monster's hideaway locate at the end of Ishrai Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008892
text: Pilgrim Liliya told you that she is very hungry and asked you to get her some food. Get some edible meat from Kepo.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008893
text: Get the meat of Kepari

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008894
text: Pilgrim Julius can't move due to severe hunger. Get some Kepari meat for him to eat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008895
text: Got enough Kepari meat. Give it to Pilgrim Julius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008896
text: Return to the Weak Owl

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008897
text: Obtained oil from the boxes. Return to the Weak Owl.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008898
text: You need a brush to remove the soil on the tombstone. Use the paralysis needle on the Wendigo Searcher and collect Stiff Feather.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008900

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150729_008901

text: Jones says he needs Acylado Hydrophyte to purify water. Get Acylado Hydrophyte fro Daram Wetland or Minia Flooding Area.

text: The keepsakes disappeared with the necklace!

text: Defeat the monsters that interfere while Grita checks the magic tile!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008917

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008918
text: Completed the Jewel of Prominence!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008919
text: Checking the magic tile

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008920
text: This device is suppressing the magic power of the Tower. {nl}You better destroy it quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008921
text: Arrived at Kateen Forest as Goddess Gabija mentioned

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008922
text: Fortunately, the beehive seems alright

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008923
text: Found the mead that Dorjen asked you to bring

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008924
text: Tried setting up a scarecrow but the monsters aren't showing unusual reactions.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008925
text: Restoring

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008926
text: The Symbol of Goddess Austeja is restored!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008927
text: I can now be free...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008928
text: Freedom at last...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008929
text: Finally...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008930
text: I'm free from the restraint...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008931
text: This is enough...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008932
text: I'm free. Finally, I'm free...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008933
text: Thank you for releasing me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008934
text: Thank you for freeing me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008935
text: Now I'm really released.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008936
text: Go upstairs and find Goddess Gabija!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008937
text: The Mushwort that destroyed the Owl Sculpture appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008938
text: Liliya passed away. {nl}Make a grave for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008939
text: Made a grave for Liliya

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008940
text: Searching through the rotten meat

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008941
text: Found food waste from the food pile! {nl}Throw it to the monsters using V key and defeat it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008942
text: Successfully destroyed Tree Root Crystal! {nl}The curse laid around will disappear!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008943
text: The Tree Root Crystal absorbed stamina and threw the core around!{nl}First, find the scattered cores and destroy it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008944
text: You destroyed all the cores and the Tree Root Crystal was destroyed as well

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008945
text: Shaking

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008946
text: A memo fell!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008947
text: Checking the Mutated Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008948
text: The Tree Root Crystal cursed the surrounding area! {nl}Be careful not to step on the cursed ground!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008949
text: You must destroy the core held by a monster!{nl}Hunt the monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008950
text: Found the Crystal Core and destroyed it!{nl}The corruption will now disappear!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008951
text: Checking the Tree Root Crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008952
text: The Tree Root Crystal multiplied! Find the real one and destroy it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008953
text: A memo fell

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008954
text: The Mutated Tree Root Crystal disappeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008955
text: Evil aura from the box was absorbed by the monsters. {nl}Defeat the monsters surrounding the box and put the evil aura back in the box.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008956
text: The chest disappeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008957
text: The altar-bound souls appeared!{nl}Persuade the angry souls and help them find peace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008958
text: Praying

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008959
text: Gather flowers and offer it to the altar-bound souls

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008960
text: Cleaning the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008961
text: Cleaned the altar and gather the flowers again!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008962
text: Calmed the soul!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008963
text: Get Scripture Pages from the monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008964
text: Placing the Scripture

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008965
text: The Tetraox already ate the soul{nl}Defeat Tetraox!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008966
text: The Pilgrim's Soul disappeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008967
text: Checking the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008968
text: Get the Cold Fluid by defeating monsters and spray it on the altar!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008969
text: Spraying Cold Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008970
text: The sanctum has been corrupted instead of being blessed

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008971

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008972
text: The monsters are rushing in near the sanctum!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008973
text: Spraying the Holy Water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008974
text: Purified the Sanctum!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008975
text: The statue of the goddess was fake! Defeat Sparnashorn!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008976
text: The Goddess Statue is not showing any reaction.{nl}Meet with Sculptor Tesla at West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008977
text: Explaining about the Goddess Statue in the Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008978
text: There is a large crack on the plate of the Goddess Statue.{nl}First, look for the materials which the Sculptor Tesla told you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008979
text: Repairing the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008980
text: Inspecting the Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008981
text: The repaired Goddess Statue exploded and created demonic magic circles nearby!{nl}Destroy the magic circles before something comes out of them!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008982
text: Pulling out the Symbol

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008983
text: You've found the Symbol! Use the Symbol to look for the hidden monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008984
text: Burning the Badge

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008985
text: The Sanctum has been purified

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008986
text: Worshiping with Pure Water

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008987
text: The Goddess Statue fell under attack as you worshiped in front of it!{nl}Eliminate the thorny vines that are restraining the Goddess Statue and protect the Goddess Statue from the monsters that are rushing in from everywhere!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008988
text: Putting the flowers in front of the Sanctum

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008989
text: The Sanctum is not showing any reaction!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008990
text: Burning the purifier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008991
text: The Sanctum has been purified

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008992
text: You've defeated Ironbaum that was going after the pilgrim! Now, you will receive the blessing from the sanctum.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008993
text: Witas passed away.{nl}Please make his grave.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008994
text: Making a grave

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008995
text: You've made the grave for Witas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008996
text: Looking at the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008997
text: From the discovered Frame, you can only see ripped pieces of the original Portrait.{nl}Look for the other pieces from the monsters nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008998
text: You've collected all pieces of the Portrait and put them into the Frame!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_008999
text: The chest is locked{nl}Hunt for the monsters nearby and obtain the key!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009000
text: You've found an old handkerchief in the chest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009001
text: Acquired the pot!{nl}Now, it is your turn to set the pot under the Tree of Brothers!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009002
text: Spraying Water for the Tree

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009003
text: Bellochard which was protecting the hidden space appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009004
text: Monsters appeared after smelling something!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009005
text: Digging it again

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009006
text: You found a Truffle from the dug area!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009007
text: Standing up the fallen statue

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009008
text: The fire is weak!{nl}Take an arrow from a High Vubbe Archer and put it into the fire!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009009
text: Completed the scripture for the spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009010
text: A teardrop-shaped jewel appeared from the device

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009011
text: Acquired a round-shaped jewel from Naktis' subordinate

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009012
text: Acquired Maven's key!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009013
text: Inserting the Holy Relic

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009014
text: Collecting the medicine

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009015
text: Opening the door

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009016
text: Collecting the corpses of the priests

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009017
text: Combining

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009018
text: Passing the words of Laius

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009019
text: Telling him what has happened lately

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009020
text: Read the memo of Hones!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009021
text: Laying the remains

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009022
text: Inserting the Spatial Magic Gem

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009023
text: Destroying it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009024
text: Combining the Spatial Magic Gem

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009025
text: Using the Spatial Magic Gem

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009026
text: Checking the inheritance

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009027
text: You sense ominous energy from the pot!{nl}Return to Kupole Vita and inform her about the situation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009028
text: Observing

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009029
text: You have found adequate materials to make rubbings from the monster's inventory

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009030
text: Looking at the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009031
text: Monsters are attacking!{nl}First defeat the monsters, and then make a rubbing!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009032
text: Applying the Grass Juice

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009033
text: The rubbing didn't turn out alright.{nl}Please tell this to Adrijus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009034
text: You've succeeded in creating a rubbing!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009035
text: There is something inside the lump of soil and it is hardened{nl}Please make a hammer using the materials nearby!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009036
text: You would need a shovel to remove the soil!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009037
text: As you searched through the lump of soil, an overturned tombstone appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009038
text: Looking at the tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009039
text: The part where the epitaph is written on is facing the ground{nl}Flip around the tombstone so you could read the writing

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009040
text: The tombstone is destroyed and only the lower part is remaining{nl}You may able to find the fragments from the Minos nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009041
text: We should find the fragments of the tombstone!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009042
text: It will be hard to restore it without some sort of glue.{nl}Ask the blacksmith in Klaipeda for a glue!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009043
text: Make the glue the blacksmith advised to you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009044
text: Gluing the tombstone fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009045
text: You've successfully restored the tombstone!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009046
text: Reading the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009047
text: Searching through the bushes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009048
text: The bushes were too sturdy so you hurt your hands.{nl}Find a way to burn the bushes instead

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009049
text: Don't touch it before you burn it!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009050
text: Lighting up the bushes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009051
text: Reading the epitaph

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009052
text: You are unsure of what was written on the tombstone.{nl}Go to the Wings of Vaivora in Klaipeda and ask.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009053
text: Go to the right side and pull the levers consecutively

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009054
text: Pull the lever

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009055
text: You have obtained the Metal Plate!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009056
text: Monsters rushed in!{nl}It seems that you should defeat the monsters first and cut down the bushes!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009057
text: Use the detecting stick to find the place where the Metal Plate is buried!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009058
text: It seems that you touched on something that you shouldn't touch!{nl}Defeat the Archon that was sealed!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009059
text: Meet Kupole Arune by moving to the 2nd area of Demons Prison!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009060
text: You've collected enough poison from Chafperors. Now collect the poison of thorny trees.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009061
text: You've collected enough poison from thorny tress. Now, collect the poison in the pond.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009062
text: Penitence Route of Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009063
text: It is too dried so the juice doesn't come out anymore!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009064
text: Collecting the bushes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009065
text: Acquired well dried bushes!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009066
text: You've been pricked by the thorns of bushes!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009067
text: Digging up the Metal Plate

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009068
text: You fell down while you were digging up the Metal Plate, but you've digged it well!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009069
text: Monsters suddenly appeared near the Metal Plate!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150908_009070
text: You've dug the Metal Plate well!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009071
text: I've been able to regain some of my power thanks to you, but this is only the beginning  -- {nl} I'll help protect you now by luring the demons with the fake revelation in this tower. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009072
text: Please take Laima's revelation to the Great Cathedral. Believe in yourself and never hold any doubts.{nl} Victory will certainly be yours in the end.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009073
text: Welcome. {nl} We're short on many things, so we have to make use of every bit we've got.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009074
text: Mothstem? I've seen it in Fedimian Suburbs. {nl}Pardoner Master was also looking for it. Were you not able to find it yet?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009075
text: Hurry back to the Pardoner Master. He has been looking for that Jar of Fire for a long time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009076
text: You mean the Jar of Fire? I know about it. {nl}But I won't give you any information for free. Maybe the hardened oil from the Blue Puragi in Saknies Plains could help me talk...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009077
text: If you don't need it, then I also don't have a choice. {nl} I am a merchant, not a volunteer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009078
text: Oh, thank you very much. {nl} I heard that a monster called Mothstem has the Jar of Fire and it would never let go of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009079
text: Um, I heard the Item Merchant saw it recently. You should go ask him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009080
text: What a disaster. It's so disappointing. {nl}A merchant like me may not fully understand what you're feeling but still...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009081
text: For all that, do me a favor and I'll give you something nice. It may not be as great as the one you broke but still quite useful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009082
text: I'm not asking for a lot. {nl} You can see this in the signs the pilgrims make along Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009083
text: If no, then I've got nothing else. {nl} If we can, we will mutually profit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009084
text: You've come to want something, huh? {nl} An interesting life really depends on reckless challenges, huh?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009085
text: Well, well. What have I been doing? {nl} Oh, my Liliya...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009086
text: Her music box and necklace were snatched by Naktis' servants, and infused with Naktis' curse. {nl}It's as if they are trying to mock Maven's teachings.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009087
text: Hold on, my head's ringing again from that curse. {nl} There's still so much to say... I don't know if I will be able to handle it right now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009088
text: Thank you very much. It's really gotten better. {nl} The music box.. My Liliya.. She may no longer be in this world. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009089
text: If you run into any of Naktis' possessions, please be sure to carefully inspect them for her sake. {nl} The symbol of our love that the demon swallowed... Please accept it as our gratitude for helping us claim revenge.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009090
text: That symbol is a necklace blessed by the Great Cathedral, so it must be very useful. {nl} To me, that necklace no longer holds any meaning.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009091
text: Thanks for your kind words.{nl}I would really appreciate it if you could defeat the monsters here that are disturbing me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009092
text: Please test it on the monsters that reflect the light of souls.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009093
text: If you use this medicine this time, the soul trapped in a monster's stomach will shine.{nl}When you defeat those monsters, the trapped soul will be freed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009094
text: Have you found the rest of the restrained souls?{nl}As I expected... this crafting recipe now belongs to you then.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009095
text: Thank you.{nl}Our allies were taken to the nest at the right side of the Ishrai Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009096
text: You should walk around as much as you can.{nl} Flame Vapor only appears for a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009097
text: I've heard that some saw resentful souls.{nl}Maybe, they are souls that could not reach Goddess Ausrine... That's horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009098
text: So you are now one competent Rodelero.{nl}But, how about fighting a Colimencia... The one at the manor of Greene family.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009099
text: When there are some things lacking, it means there is some room to improve.{nl}Don't worry. I can fill that in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009100
text: You would feel some weight of it.{nl}But, you should realize your deficiencies in order to become better Rodelero.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009101
text: What you've done is really amazing.{nl}I am looking forward to see your growth as a Sadhu Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009102
text: Dionys is too strong for us to face against.{nl}Even Vakarine won't be able to do anything if we go late.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009103
text: Suddenly, a squad of Red Fishermen appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009104
text: The Mushwort that ate the Owl Sculpture has appeared!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009105
text: After absorbing stamina, the Tree Root Crystal scattered its Cores!{nl}Find the scattered Cores and destroy them!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009106
text: Tree Root Crystals were divided and scattered!{nl}Find the real ones and destroy them!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009107
text: Looking at the crystal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009108
text: The will dropped from Tree Root Crystals

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009109
text: Defeat the monsters that are tied to the evil energies!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009110
text: Cleaning the altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009111
text: You've cleaned the altar!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009112
text: It seems that Tetraox ate up the spirit!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009113
text: The statue was fake!{nl}Defeat Sparnashorn!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009114
text: The Worrying Owl at Ishrai Crossroads

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009115
text: Grita said in order to activate the Tower's Barrier Device again, it would need a great amount of energy. Set the gem Grita gave you on the ground and recharge the gem with the monsters' life force.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009116
text: The Weak Owl Sculpture told you to find his Owl colleagues.{nl}Look for them at the monster hideout towards the right side of Ishrai Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009117
text: The Destroyed Owl Sculpture was completely destroyed. Tell the Weak Owl Sculpture what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009118
text: Pilgrim Julius suddenly turned into a Drapeliun after seeing the music box. Calm down the Drapeliun that is attacking by reducing its HP below 50% and persuading it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009119
text: Destroy the Cursed Tree Root Crystal Protection Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009120
text: Talk to the Trapped Soul

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009121
text: Check the Karuna Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009122
text: Check the Karuna Altar

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009123
text: Defeat the monsters at Taika Cliff

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009124
text: Taika Cliff seems to be safe now. Talk to Pilgrim Orville.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009125
text: Pilgrim Orville went to Taika Cliff to bury his friend. Follow him to Taika Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20150918_009126
text: Tenant Farmer Weiss hid the seeds that he secretly grew, but he can't go get them due to the monsters. Please bring the seed pouch from the Farm Plaza.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009127
text: If I am going to fall tomorrow, I don't care if I risk my life today.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009128
text: I am sure that they brought them to Drasos Chapel Ruins, but since we can't leave this place, we are going to die due to hunger.{nl}I am sorry, but can you retrieve the stolen supplies for us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009129
text: When we were in the era of Premier Eminent, we were supported by the superior troops, lots of supplies and etc.{nl}But, 600 years have passed after Premier Eminent died.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009130
text: Would dead people come back if the curse is cured in this city?{nl}No, but the times after now are more important.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009131
text: I understand their loyalty for the kingdom, but when I see them make people do impossible things that lead to deaths...{nl}I don't know who is the monster anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009132
text: If you could help me...{nl}Maybe we could save them even if they are cursed with the petrification. Although they may lose their arms.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009133
text: Did you defeat it? Great job!{nl}Now I don't have to fear this place being torn down until another monster shows up.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009134
text: Have you met Wilhelmina at Kovos Hall Site before?{nl}She is in charge of the Knights of Kaliss, but she is full of hatred towards the Royal Army guards.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009135
text: We are in a good relationship with her since we work well together.{nl}We were able to plan this since she helped us well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009136
text: Can you hand over the records to Wilhelmina that you've brought?{nl}We told them that we would help penetrate into Gargoyle so don't forget to receive something before you come here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009137
text: Finally, the records which weren't in hands of the Royal Army guards are here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009138
text: Is this... a love letter? {nl}I don't need it so you can take it or throw it away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009139
text: Hmm... It contains most of what we need. {nl}Please give this scroll to Amanda.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009140
text: This is the scroll designed to face against Gargoyle.{nl}The sounds won't leak out no matter what  you do anything inside so you won't be detected by Royal Army guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009141
text: The Knights of Kaliss possesses many competent wizards.{nl}They will give us what we need.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009142
text: A scroll?{nl}I thought she'd give us something like a ballista or a magicial weapon...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009143
text: But, this is the most effective method for now isn't it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009144
text: Please get rid of Gargoyle.{nl}I need to pack my bag at the Fortress of the Land.{nl}It will not be hard for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009145
text: Object?{nl}Ah, it is a Monocle that lets you to see the true nature.{nl}We could probably find the room where the treasure is located with that easily right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009146
text: Object?{nl}Ah, it is a Monocle that lets you to see the true nature.{nl}We could probably find the room where the treasure is located with that easily right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009147
text: The scroll Wilhelmina gave us is awesome!{nl}I didn't hear a thing even from right beside.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009148
text: Shall we enter the Fortress of the Land?{nl}Let's meet inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009149
text: Spears are mighty and never lose.{nl}I want to see the guy's pitiful face after Shadow Gailer is dead.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009150
text: I heard a monster called Biteregina is threatening people at Manocle Grave.{nl}What do you think? I hope you think of it as the price for learning my skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009151
text: If you were to pick between a gun and a spear, which one would you choose?{nl}If I were you, I would choose both.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009152
text: My soul is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime so I can get released.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009153
text: Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009154
text: Please release this seal.{nl}When you collect the Crystals of Restriction from Flask Mages and break them, the seal will be broken.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009155
text: The contract needs to continue. Please release me.{nl}As those observers are defeated, my spirit becomes free.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009156
text: I am here and all over the world.{nl}My soul was torn into pieces long ago.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009157
text: Where are my other pieces...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009158
text: Are you talking about the fire pot? I know it.{nl}But, I can't give it to you for free. Unless you could get me the condensed oil from Saknis Plains from Blue Puragis...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009159
text: For my future disciple, I have prepared a nice gift at Starving Demon's Way.{nl}I hope you like it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009160
text: Very nice indeed.{nl}You have no problem understanding my spells.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009161
text: The Thaumaturge Master told me to give it to you.{nl}If you hadn't done it, I would have kept it for myself... Such a pity.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009162
text: I don't really mind the rumors, but do people really believe that a spell can preserve your youth? {nl}Well, maybe it can but... {nl}Ah, I don't want to talk about it anymore.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009163
text: For the people who go on the way of the pilgrim with hope, this curse is so much pain for them.{nl}We don't even know the true nature of the curse so I am so mad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009164
text: I was so mad that there were no Revelators back then.{nl}But, after hearing that some Revelator saved the Mage Tower, my thoughts changed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009165
text: I think the goddess may come back when they complete their duties and I complete mine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009166
text: I didn't expect that the true intent of the curse cast on this forest is after the Great Cathedral.{nl}Fortunately, we were able to stop the curse due to one Revelator, but I feel ashamed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009167
text: The curse here is serious, but there are other places where the influence of the curse is more severe. {nl}The city of Ruklys... I heard everything there turns into stone due to the curse of petrification.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009168
text: I think it was my fault that I left the Mage Tower to save the people after Medzio Diena.{nl}Maybe, instead of the Revelator, I could've saved the tower.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009169
text: I heard the story about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Lord at the Great Cathedral.{nl}I guess... now there won't be any more people who suffer from the curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009170
text: I've been to many places before in my life, but this place is really horrible.{nl}Even if I want to rescue the ones who are cursed, the only thing I can do is to help them fall asleep comfortably.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009171
text: I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord attacking the Mage Tower.{nl}That's the most positive news I've heard lately.{nl}All the other news I've heard were horrible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009172
text: Is it true that some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord who casted the curse in this region?{nl}If that's true, it is so fortunate since we don't have to see those horrible things again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009173
text: Oh no... What was I doing?{nl}Ahhh. My Liliya...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009174
text: Don't mess with the food piles.{nl} He should have shuffled over here by now... Just keep watching.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009175
text: While my brothers were on their way to train, they all died from the demons' tricks.{nl}I feel sorry for my brothers who can't return to the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009176
text: And they were so consumed with madness, even after their death, they could not even return to the goddesses.{nl}That's why I want to give them eternal sleep.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009177
text: It was really horrible. Those brothers who used to be kind to each other, hurt and killed each other...{nl}And the demons cheated those brothers who were not led to the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009178
text: My brothers are blaming each other and crying out in madness even after their deaths.{nl}At the altar of the goddesses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009179
text: Death may be the price I pay for my sin. {nl}Even if it was due to the curse of the demons, it is still a sin I've committed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009180
text: I didn't want to... die like this... {nl}Mother...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009181
text: I've realized after my death that my colleague left me because of the curse. {nl}This thing is now useless to me... Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009182
text: Our squad is all dead because of my incompetence.{nl}I'm the only one left alive, but I don't that will stay true for long.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009183
text: It looks like you've done more than Roy's part.{nl}If it wasn't for you, we would not have been successful.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009184
text: They're all either dead or outta here.{nl}I bet I'm the only one left on this floor. Those cowards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009185
text: My body... Unfortunately, it doesn't belong to me.{nl}I regret my faults that I'd committed in the past because of my greed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009186
text: I hope you are okay.{nl}We are all done, but you are not.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009187
text: But...{nl}It won't work with this material alone.{nl}We should also have the tools...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009188
text: {nl}When you go to Orsha, there must be people who have the tools.{nl}Maybe the Blacksmith or the Equipment Merchant...?{nl}Can you go there?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009189
text: Be careful on your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009190
text: The construction of the sanctum...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009191
text: {nl}Hmm...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009192
text: {nl}I would sell it by receiving the money, but I will just give it to you this time.{nl}However, just throw it away after using it since this is disposable after one use.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009193
text: I'm relieved we got it back. {nl}I finally get to see the holy relic, even after death.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009194
text: Please find my friend.{nl}I lived so hard until now, so I can't just die here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009195
text: Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009196
text: Finally... The worst curse has been undone!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009197
text: Good.{nl}Since the hideout is safe now, you can leave the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009198
text: That mean demon occupied our fortress.{nl}I feel so resentful. That magic circle... If we could only have the magic circle...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009199
text: Okay... I can feel the same energy that I felt from Ruklys from you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009200
text: I will open the portal. {nl}I've hid the means to face against the demon across here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009201
text: Please hurry to the hidden place!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009202
text: What is this? A protective magic circle? {nl}Only the stories regarding the magic circle are here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009203
text: Oh... I shouldn't have expected it. {nl}There's nothing here. We better go to the other district.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009204
text: I will take a look around so let's meet at the habitants' district.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009205
text: Well, shall we take a look around Monocle?{nl}If you can see something special, there must be something important there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009206
text: Can you bring more of these old bombs?{nl}I am not trying to use them for malicious purposes. I just want to do some research.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009207
text: I will give you the tools to dismantle the bomb.{nl}If you break the detonator with those, you can bring the bombs safely.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009208
text: I don't know how you found this bomb, but I think they've used a metal detector.{nl}When you investigate more with that, maybe we could find some remains.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009209
text: Find the bombs using this metal detector and use the tools I gave to you to break the detonator.{nl}Then you would able to bring them safely. I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009210
text: This must be more than a few hundreds years old.{nl}What were they trying to do with this bomb...{nl}Anyway, thanks!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009211
text: By the way, why did you come here?{nl}Since you don't say anything about it, this must be important right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009212
text: Anyway, let's go deeper inside.{nl}You should tell me later. Okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009213
text: The demons didn't have special objects.{nl}What... you don't have them?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009214
text: Revelator. {nl}After Medzio Diena, Vakarine's power has become weak, so we have to protect her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009215
text: This is not the world of the humans nor the world of demons, but another space of Vakarine...{nl}We have imprisoned the demons inside this prison who are evil to the world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009216
text: However, after Medzio Diena, Vakarine didn't have the power left to maintain this space.{nl}As you can see, this space is gradually collapsing and the dimensional crack is getting wider.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009217
text: The Demon Lords who are locked in this prison are trying to escape here.{nl}Other demons who came here through the dimensional crack are joining them as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009218
text: Vakarine desperately needs your help.{nl}Please help us with your strength to defeat the demons at this prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009219
text: Please first stop the demons that are trying to release the Demon Lord Blut that is locked here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009220
text: Demon Lord Blut's servants are trying to help him escape here. {nl}Hauberk's help will be useful this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009221
text: Right now, Kupole Zydrone is holding down Blut. {nl}But since Vakarine's power has waned after Medzio Diena, we are not like what we were before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009222
text: Fortunately, Blut hasn't been completely freed yet...{nl}However, we don't know how much longer we can endure by ourselves.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009223
text: We have to somehow weaken the power of the Demon Lord Blut.{nl}I am sure his allies set the camp near Bjaurer Hideout.{nl}Please get the mark of Blut that they hold.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009224
text: Our original duty was to supervise and manage the prison.{nl}But... now, we are trying our best to just hold back the demons. {nl}No matter what it takes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009225
text: So you are the one who Vakarine talked about.{nl}Well done. Everything will be done with goddess' will.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009226
text: We've locked Blut across this barrier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009227
text: No demon besides Blut knows more about Vakarine's weakening than we do.{nl}Blut is not completely freed yet, so we now have an opportunity to get rid of him.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009228
text: But, if we don't defeat Blut quickly, this barrier will collapse soon.{nl}Let's defeat him at once. Are you ready?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009229
text: We were able to defeat Blut because of you.{nl}You brought us hope.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009230
text: As you know, Vakarine's power is... really weak at the moment.{nl}If we had not defeated Blut here, we might not have been able to continue protecting Vakarine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009231
text: Alright. Please go to the 2nd District of the Prison.{nl}To defeat the next Demon Lord, I am sure Kupole Arune has prepared something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009232
text: The demons that lost Blut are causing a rampage. {nl}If they escape to the outside world, it will be a great disaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009233
text: The barrier is gradually collapsing.{nl}I don't know what would happen even if we defeated the demons...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009234
text: Good work. {nl}It's a relief that those demons did not notice the weakening of the crack to the outside world.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009235
text: Human exploration teams came in from the outside world in the past. {nl}Unfortunately, they all died before we could do anything. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009236
text: Humans should not ever come here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009237
text: So you are the Revelator Vakarine talked about. {nl}It is great that you aren't late.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009238
text: The Demon Lord Nuaele's power is weakening the prison at an alarming rate.{nl}However, we Kupoles have no way to stop Nuaele now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009239
text: Also, Kupole Aldona told me that she couldn't just wait for the Revelator...{nl}Without the time for persuasion, she went after Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009240
text: Please stop the demons that are coming here through the dimensional crack.{nl}If you could stop them before they join Nuaele, it will be great help to the safety of Aldona.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009241
text: Goddess.{nl}I hope nothing has happened to Aldona...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009242
text: With her forces diminished, Nuaele's power should be weakened.{nl}Before anything happens to Aldona, I will tell you what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009243
text: Nuaele is difficult to face head-on with only us.{nl}But Nuaele wasn't always that strong.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009244
text: Nuaele became stronger only after obtaining the pieces of Hauberk's seal. {nl}Hauberk's servants who lost their master started to follow her since she had the pieces of the seal{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009245
text: Since then, Nuales started wielding her new mighty power,{nl}To Hauberk, she is like a traitor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009246
text: Knowing that, there should be a way to increase Hauberk's power.{nl} It's not a bad idea from Hauberk's point-of-view either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009247
text: Please go to the 2nd Isolation Area. {nl}I am sure Hauberk's former servants are gathered there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009248
text: I am sure the Demon Lord Nuaele is aware of this now.{nl}That the power of the others is not hers to keep.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009249
text: Hmm... there's something that's been bugging me.{nl} When Nuaele collected power, she could've tried escaping immediately.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009250
text: But, it seems that Nuaele is waiting for something.{nl}We should find out what she is planning.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009251
text: Please interrogate the servants of Nuaele.{nl}Since Hauberk is also a demon, it will be easy to read their minds.{nl}It becomes even easier when they are in their spirit form.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009252
text: It seems she's planned to make this prison her world from the beginning. {nl}If her plans succeed, even if Goddess Vakarine powers were restored, it would not be enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009253
text: Now, please meet with Aldona. {nl}She will take you to Nuaele's territory.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009254
text: Goddess Vakarine is waiting for you at the District 3.{nl}But, I feel somewhat uneasy since she is so stubborn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009255
text: In the past, she told us that she couldn't just not do anything, even if her power was weakened.{nl}We barely managed to persuade her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009256
text: To prevent something from happening to Vakarine, please move to the District 3 as quickly as possible.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009257
text: The dimensional crack and the Demon Lords... they were inevitable.{nl}I could feel my power becoming weaker after Medzio Diena and I had to find some way.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009258
text: I have given my Dionys great power that should not be stolen by the Demon Lord.{nl}But, that power was so strong, it started to control Dionys...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009259
text: I cannot tell you details about that power at this moment.{nl}But, please just know that this power that is controlling Dionys is the only way to close the dimensional crack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009260
text: Please complete the Evening Star Key with Kupole Zydrone.{nl}With the Evening Star Key, Dionys could regain his control back over that power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009261
text: Savior!{nl}I have been waiting for you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009262
text: The strong power controlling Dionys' ego was to never fall into the hands of the demons.{nl}Not to mention Dionys is like a powerful guardian to Vakarine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009263
text: But, it was important to stop the demons...{nl}She had no choice, but to make a heart-aching decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009264
text: We have decided to seal Dionys and its power until the prison regains stability...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009265
text: We don't know what that power is exactly.{nl}But, we know that it can be used to close the dimensional crack and should not be taken away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009266
text: Fortunately, we could detach that power if we put holy power into the Evening Star Key.{nl}Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009267
text: Dionys is the guardian whom Vakarine most adores.{nl}She reluctantly sealed the strong power to Dionys and fell into the deep sadness...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009268
text: Now go to Oruarma Cathedral. {nl}Protect me from the demons while I focus the goddess' power into the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009269
text: Here. Please give this key to Kupole Aldona. {nl}She must be holding down Dionys now. Please hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009270
text: You are not too late!{nl}Let's release the power of the Evening Star Key.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009271
text: When you unleash the seal, the power that is held in the key will be collected to this magic suppressor.{nl}I want you to release the seals at Rearda, Kasa, and Rada.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009272
text: Dionys is not someone we can face against.{nl}Even Vakarine in her old days would not be able to do anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009273
text: The power of the Evening Star Key is accumulating in the magic suppressor.{nl}We are all ready and there's plenty of time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009274
text: We are going to detach the power from Dionys now.{nl}If we fail, it would be as if tens of Demon Lords were let loose.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009275
text: As such, we need to approach this with caution. {nl}Let me know when you are ready.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009276
text: Hauberk fled towards District 4, which is under Daiva's watch. {nl}First, you should return to Vakarine. I will look for Dionys.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009277
text: Savior. {nl}The time has come for you to know the truth.{nl}The power which I gave to Dionys is called the Chain of Reversion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009278
text: The Chain of Reversion is the wonder that connects every boundary of anything...{nl}Hauberk probably wants to use the Chain of Reversion to restitch his spirit together.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009279
text: However, Hauberk too is the key to closing the dimensional crack.{nl}The reason why I left him the way he was, was to store power for the key's functions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009280
text: Hauberk hasn't accumulated all of his spirit yet, so he wouldn't be hard to face against.{nl}Catch him again and close the dimensional crack with the Chain of Reversion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009281
text: The District 4 which he ran away to is like a maze. {nl}Kupole Daiva and you would be able to follow him though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009282
text: How could Vakarine let Hauberk go on a rampage like that...{nl}Well, I guess she must have a reason for that?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009283
text: The Oruarma Cathedral is where the goddess recovers her powers. {nl}That is why it should always be safe from the demons. Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009284
text: Please collect the pieces of the Mark of Star that are scattered near Rada Seal.{nl}It will help the goddess recover her powers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009285
text: Thanks. {nl}If Vakarine recovers, then Dionys should also recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009286
text: So you've come, Savior.{nl}Fortunately, Hauberk seems to be not focused on leaving this place through the dimensional crack.{nl}That means he is not complete yet enough to go out through the dimensional crack.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009287
text: I think...{nl}What if he wanted to escape without going through the dimensional crack you came here with...{nl}You should look for the crack which has been weakened due to the collapse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009288
text: The weakest part now is at Nebilau Broken District, so he probably went there.{nl}Please follow him, I will prepare the next step while you do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009289
text: Even if Hauberk does something, it can only be inside the prison.{nl}Hauberk could never run away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009290
text: With this Night Star Spectral Orb, we can easily find Hauberk.{nl}If Hauberk gives up and tries to run away, I will do my best to block it. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009291
text: I won't be able to stop Hauberk completely, but...{nl}I will try to buy as much time as possible for the Savior.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009292
text: If Hauberk gives up and tries to run away, I will do my best to stop him. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009293
text: I won't be able to stop Hauberk completely, but...{nl}I will try to buy as much time as possible for the Savior.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009294
text: Fortunately, he did not come to my side and he moved as I thought.{nl}With the Savior's power, we can surely catch him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009295
text: It was a success!{nl}If Hauberk can think straight, he should know he has no time to waste defeating Sigita.{nl}At least, let's hope that's the case.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009296
text: There is only one way out from here.{nl}It will be our great chance to catch Hauberk.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009297
text: Push Hauberk into the Galutin Solitary Confinement.{nl}Since Kupole Sigita is blocking Hauberk's exit at the opposite side, you need not to worry about his escape.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009298
text: Well done.{nl}Hauberk didn't know what to do when he saw me and ran away to the Galutin Solitary Confinement.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009299
text: Now, Hauberk would be able to defeat me easily...{nl}But, I guess he thought the Revelator would catch up to him right away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009300
text: However, the way up from here is a dead end.{nl}Tell me if you are ready to catch Hauberk.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009301
text: Well done.{nl}We will collect Hauberk's sealed strong power now and take it to Vakarine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009302
text: Vakarine is getting ready to close the dimensional crack with the other Kupoles.{nl}She is desperately waiting for you, so please hurry to the District 5 of the prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009303
text: I need proof to show to Vakarine we've been fighting here.{nl}Can you collect a Demon's Tooth in Hradeti Crossroads?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009304
text: Thank you. {nl}Please keep this a secret from Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009305
text: Savior.{nl}We really appreciate your help in stopping Hauberk.{nl}Because of you, we are now able to close the dimensional crack and retrieve the spirit of Hauberk and the Chain of Reversion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009306
text: Please do not feel sympathy towards Hauberk.{nl}It is sad that his spirit was torn apart, but he too was a demon to be eliminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009307
text: Good. Now this is the last stage... We need to close the dimensional crack.{nl}With your help, we will be able to prevent catastrophe in this prison.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009308
text: Please prepare, since we will soon start the ritual to seal the dimensional crack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009309
text: We must supplement Hauberk's sealed spirit by adding the power of demons nearby.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009310
text: I would give you the Evening Star Rune, but that is an object that uses my power...{nl}Which means it is not perfectly working yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009311
text: Defeat the demons at Ausura Chapel and collect traces of the transference.{nl}With those, I would be able to complement my lacking power and complete the Evening Star Rune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009312
text: Thanks to you, I can now complete the Evening Star Rune.{nl}Take it. You should collect the souls of the demons with the Evening Star Rune.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009313
text: You must go to the Lankine Separation District, the Ishisula Broken District and the Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}I will send the Kupoles once you suppress the demons there using the power of the Evening Star Rune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009314
text: Once you do so, they will receive the souls that are needed to close the dimensional crack.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009315
text: This is a place where originally humans are not allowed to enter. {nl}But, you are special and thus granted permission by Vakarine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009316
text: Vakarine should recover soon...{nl}She was already tired and has gotten weaker due to the battle with Nuaele.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009317
text: This prison was created by Goddess Ausrine.{nl}Vakarine comes here periodically and manages this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009318
text: Oh... my poor Dionys... I am so sorry for giving you this big burden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009319
text: We weren't able to monitor all the demons in the prison.{nl}That's why we engraved Sealing Tokens on them so they couldn't unleash their power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009320
text: Hauberk's spirit has become strong enough to handle the dimensional crack because of your efforts.{nl}The Chain of Reversion is also ready.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009321
text: We will close the dimensional crack now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009322
text: The Kupoles and I will try our best to seal the dimensional crack.{nl}This is our only chance... if we fail this time, we may not have another chance.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009323
text: I repeat, this is the last chance for the demons to make a counter-attack.{nl}Until the dimensional crack completely seals off, please resist their attacks.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009324
text: Every disaster that struck this land is over now.{nl}Savior. We owe everything to you. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009325
text: Everything stemmed from our arrogance.{nl}When Laima warned us that a time of hardship would come...{nl}I believed in myself so much that I could not understand what she meant.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009326
text: But, your sacred energy tells me everything.{nl}I believe it will be your power and not us that will save this world.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009327
text: I cannot be of any help due to the circumstances.{nl}But, I will stay here and do my best until the Day of Salvation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009328
text: There is one more thing, though.{nl}The dimensional crack that was engraved here is also engraved at various places in your world.{nl}The most dangerous place among them now is Dina Bee Farm..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009329
text: My sister Austeja is having a hard battle alone.{nl}Please also help her as you have helped me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009330
text: Once Dionys recovers, Vakarine will feel less pressured.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009331
text: Thank you.{nl}If Dionys recovers completely, it'll be all thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009332
text: Can you deal with the dimensional crack at Gavara Isolation District?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009333
text: Wait a minute. {nl}The Knights of Kaliss told us that the important thing is located deep inside the fortress.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009334
text: We should go move deeper inside so we can start working on what we are both looking for.{nl}I will try looking for the outpost area with this monocle. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009335
text: Hmm... there's nothing special.{nl}Instead, there are many Royal Army guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009336
text: There are too many Royal Army guards to go further inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009337
text: We should lure the Royal Army guards in order to go deeper inside.{nl}Hmm...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009338
text: That's right. We have Resounding Bombs!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009339
text: Resounding Bombs make really loud sounds although their explosiveness isn't that great.{nl}When you detonate them at various places, the soldiers should move to the locations where the sounds come from.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009340
text: I don't have Resounding Bombs at the moment, but I can make them if I have necessary materials. {nl}For example, if I have Herbs and bombs. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009341
text: I will look for the bombs so I want you to look for the herbs.{nl}Be careful not to be detected by the Royal Army guards.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009342
text: When you collect all the herbs, let's meet at the lower side of the hallway at the upper floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009343
text: The Royal Army guards are on patrol so you should be careful all the time.{nl}I am sure they are busy getting hit instead of explaining for the situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009344
text: You brought them well without getting detected by the Royal Army guards.{nl}I am sorry. When they get hot, they make loud sounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009345
text: Okay. Shall we start the work of the grave robbers?{nl}I saw the Royal Army guards have more bombs than they can handle.{nl}You know what that means, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009346
text: No. no. We are not that kind of people. {nl}We don't mean to send them to the goddesses...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009347
text: We just want to knock them out and take the bombs. {nl}You can do it right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009348
text: I will get ready to make Resounding Bombs.{nl}Just knock them out and bring the bombs. Okay?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009349
text: Even if you get caught by the Royal Army guards, don't tell them about me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009350
text: Good. It's not like they've been detected right?{nl}I will make the Resounding Bombs so wait a bit.{nl}If this works out, we can move deeper inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009351
text: We've completed the Resounding Bombs. {nl}If these detonate well, the Royal Army guards will {nl}move to the locations where the sounds came from. {nl}We will use that moment to head deeper inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009352
text: Here are the Resounding Bombs. I've made them quickly so I can't guarantee their stability.{nl}Please set them well at the hallway on the upper floor and the lower side of the gathering place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009353
text: You should be careful since I can't guarantee their stability...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009354
text: Have you set all of them?{nl}Let's wait until they explode.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009355
text: The Resounding Bombs should be exploding soon.{nl}Cover your ears since they make a loud boom when they explode.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009356
text: We don't have time to waste. Let's hurry!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009357
text: Phew...{nl}I guess the Royal Army guards won't be able to chase after us here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009358
text: We should pray that what we are looking for should be inside. {nl}Go first. Let's meet at Drill Ground of Confliction!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009359
text: You are an outsider... but, thanks for rescuing me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009360
text: Monsters are going crazy due to the loud sounds.{nl}They were almost annihilated.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009361
text: If we go by principles, you guys should be punished by kingdom orders.{nl}But, since you've saved me and many of our colleagues have failed...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009362
text: The safety of our colleagues is more important than your punishment.{nl}If you help us reclaim our camp, then we will forget about the punishment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009363
text: First, rescue our fallen colleagues.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009364
text: If you run away, we'll be in big trouble, so, a soldier will be accompanying you.{nl}We shall take care of your colleague.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009365
text: Don't do anything stupid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009366
text: When our colleagues gather again, we are going to retrieve our camp.{nl}There were many monsters from the beginning, but I've never seen them going crazy like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009367
text: Thank you for rescuing our colleagues, but we haven't retrieved the camp yet.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009368
text: Please help us little more. {nl}It's not a request. It is an order.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009369
text: This place is being protected by the kingdom secretly.{nl}We here too are composed of the selected members from the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009370
text: We are going to reclaim the camp and try our best not to be conquered again. {nl}By doing so, we would be able to protect ourselves from monsters and intruders like you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009371
text: We need some temporary weapons and armors.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009372
text: Many pieces of equipment were dropped on the ground while fighting against enemies.{nl}While I am taking care of my colleagues, please pick up that equipment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009373
text: We also have our pride and fame. {nl}We are going to reclaim our camp so that the sacrifices of our colleagues won't be lost in vain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009374
text: Thank you for collecting the equipment.{nl}We are also ready to reclaim the camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009375
text: Okay. We will begin now.{nl}If you are scared, you can hide behind us. Let's go!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009376
text: Monsters are getting ready at our camp.{nl}Be careful since they are not easy to defeat.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009377
text: Okay. Let's go in!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009378
text: I am sorry for not recognizing you.{nl}Your skills are so astonishing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009379
text: If It wasn't for that sudden attack, we would have not lost the camp.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009380
text: We can't just relax even though we've reclaimed the camp.{nl}We don't know when the monsters will attack again.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009381
text: But, my colleagues are too tired.{nl}You should help us until we organize the camp again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009382
text: It will be simple if you could place a barricade.{nl}It would help stop the monsters for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009383
text: There is wood inside the supply box so please set the barricade with that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009384
text: I've told you before, but you can't be at the Fortress of the Land.{nl}I am going to be quiet about the trespass since you've helped us so please leave at once.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009385
text: If you resist, we would have to execute the kingdom order.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009386
text: If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009387
text: Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009388
text: Please hide.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009389
text: I just hope the chasers won't find this place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009390
text: We can't trust the demons anymore...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009391
text: You better get the black herbs fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009392
text: The priests are only concentrating on the altars so they don't care whether we die in hunger or not.{nl}They think everything will be solved if they pray hard.{nl}That's why we decided to take an action.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009393
text: It is most definitely sinful to obtain the revelation in this manner.{nl}But of course, this is the only way to obtain Maven's fourth key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009394
text: We should find out whether it is just a symbol, or if it is endowed with some kind of power.{nl}First, I want you to collect Lizardmen leather from the Abandoned Grape Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009395
text: Recently, we saw a similar looking girl at the Crystal Mine. {nl}But, strangely, she wasn't able to say anything.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009396
text: Lizardmen are monsters that appeared in great number ever since Medzio Diena.{nl}If some kind of power is in this tree, it will definitely react to their leather.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009397
text: Revelator, this is astonishing!{nl}When I apply the tree's power to the monster leathers that you brought, the leathers corroded right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009398
text: Help me, please.{nl}I have to harvest, but my crops will all die soon because of the poison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009399
text: You are not... a messenger.{nl}This place is a military district, but we desperately need help these days.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009400
text: It seems that you are quite competent.{nl}Can you help us a bit?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009401
text: Thanks.{nl}There's one thing you need to know about this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009402
text: This place is the strategic location which was built when Ruklys caused the chaos.{nl}Eminent who was the prime minister at that time came up with it to block their marching route. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009403
text: They are maintained to block monsters or demons nowadays.{nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, we have not received any supplies or orders from the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009404
text: How could he just abandon his duty as a person who belongs to the kingdom?{nl}Our duty is to protect the magic circle here when some incident occurs here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009405
text: Actually, we were having hard time since we didn't have any forces to look for the subordinate who went missing after going there to repair it.{nl}His name is Higgs. Please look for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009406
text: Are you the one sent by the commanding officer?{nl}I'll be alright now!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009407
text: I think it is near Udringal Empty Lot.{nl}I am worried about whether he is wounded in this cold weather.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009408
text: While he was going to do his duty, he was attacked by monsters. {nl}It will be hard to carry out the mission in his condition or go back alone.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009409
text: Please help me so that I would be able to return safely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009410
text: I am thankful to the goddess that Higgs came back alive. {nl}But who would do his duty...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009411
text: I've told you before...{nl}The duty of our squad is to protect the magic circle that can completely seal off this place.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009412
text: It was Higgs' duty to maintain the magic circle, but he can't do it since he is wounded.{nl}And everyone is getting tired due to the coldness... I want you to help us.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009413
text: Among the four shrines of Romuva Magic Circle, please activate one of them.{nl}However, in case monsters touch it and something bad happens, we will be in trouble.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009414
text: So it changes all the time which one should be activated, but it won't be that hard.{nl}What do you think? Do you want to give it a try?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009415
text: You are doing better than Higgs.{nl}Can you help us one more time?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009416
text: Romuva isn't the only magic circle.{nl}We've sent our subordinates to the Neres Magic Circle as well, but I think the magical power has ran out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009417
text: It's not like we don't have any method, but the method is too much for our subordinates who've become weak...{nl}The only one I can trust is you now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009418
text: Just defeat the monsters near the magic circle. {nl}The vitality would be replaced to magical power. I am counting on you this time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009419
text: The thing that bothers us the most is not monsters nor the maintenance of the magic circle.{nl}The severe coldness is our biggest enemy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009420
text: We appreciate your efforts on behalf of the kingdom.{nl}They should work alright for some time.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009421
text: If you meet a person from the kingdom on your journey,{nl}can you tell that person that we're diligently carrying out our duty here?{nl}May the goddess protect you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009422
text: The attacks of monsters won't just stop along with the supplies that are not coming.{nl}All we can do is just barely blocking their attacks. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009423
text: I am sorry, but could you stop the monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009424
text: Everyone is exhausted due to the cold winds and monsters.{nl}I don't know how much longer we can survive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009425
text: Thank you for your efforts.{nl}I think the monsters have gotten weaker because of your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009426
text: We are most worried about the coldness.{nl}We have food, but we are worried about our clothes.{nl}Chilly air comes into the holes in our uniforms.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009427
text: Can you hunt for Trufflelia at Uzali Crossroads?{nl}Their hairy leathers are very warm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009428
text: We should self supply as much as we can.{nl}Although this place is remote from the mainland, we know what's going on in the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009429
text: Thanks.{nl}I already feel warm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009430
text: Thanks for rescuing me. {nl}I saw you fighting while I was chasing after you and you are really great.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009431
text: I have a simple request to you.{nl}All of my colleagues are exhausted. I am exhausted as well. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009432
text: To warm our bodies, we should light up a fire, but the flint can no longer be used.{nl}Can you get some flint from Tinaga Stone?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009433
text: You haven't found them yet?{nl}Go to Tinaga Stone, north of the Uzali Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009434
text: Thanks. {nl}I owe you a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009435
text: Are you going to the camping ground?{nl}Ah, I am Rochez and I am responsible for the contacting Mesafasla and Stogas squads.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009436
text: While I was returning with the letter, we met a herd of monsters.{nl}I think I will be recovered if I take a rest for a while, but I have to deliver the letter quickly...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009437
text: For now, you are the only one we can trust.{nl}Please pass this letter to Commanding Officer Ades.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009438
text: Ah, if you are okay with it, please defeat the monsters on your way.{nl}I have problem fighting against the monsters in my current condition.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009439
text: I will be okay if I take little more rest.{nl}I am worried about the monsters and the letter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009440
text: Stogas Commanding Officer Ades

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009441
text: You've brought the letter from Mesafasla?{nl}What happened to Rochez?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009442
text: Ah... I'm glad to hear that you are okay.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009443
text: You have been an outsider for a long time {nl}There has been no supply from the kingdom, we don't know what's going on.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009444
text: Even I'm trying to stand by doing self-sufficiency, but It's hard to alive only myself.{nl}If you are okay, please solve the lack of food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009445
text: Please get the meat from Beadbird around here.{nl}Horas told me It has a good taste.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009446
text: We will starve, if the Beadbird.{nl}Here is too cold, so only potatoes are growing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009447
text: Thank you.{nl}First, we have to complete it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009448
text: We are not only just lacking food.{nl}Because we received no supplies from the camp, there has been a shortage of weaponry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009449
text: But, there's more than one way to skin a cat.{nl}We can make caltrops using the old prison fragments.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009450
text: If you are okay, please collect something useful?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009451
text: A long time ago, this prisoner was transferred to Kalejimas.{nl}A very depressing time during the era of King Kadumel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009452
text: It will be okay, if it was moved since Ruklys' rebellion.{nl}Before that, many people were taken to do forced labor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009453
text: Is the Crystal Mine nearby Klaipeda?{nl}Actually that place is one of the work places.{nl}The Ashaq Prison is nearby Orsha as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009454
text: I feel kind of my blood froze when looking at the fragments of prison.{nl}It is kind of feel the grudge...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009455
text: Thank you so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009456
text: As a soldier, I feel uncomfortable to receive help from an ordinary person like you, but...{nl}Horace, who was helping us is lying in the tent at the moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009457
text: He was dispatched here from the kingdom to help our squad.{nl}After Medzio Diena, even when the contact from the kingdom was lost, he helped us a lot.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009458
text: He is sick after eating something wrong while he was looking for anything that could replace food.{nl}He should be recovered soon... Since the circumstances are bad, we want to receive help from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009459
text: First, we should do something about his fever. {nl}A long time ago, Horace once told us that the body fluid of Worgs reduce the fever so let's try that out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009460
text: I hope it proves to be effective.{nl}I feel sad to see him sick.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009461
text: Acquired it.{nl}We should have obtained it before you, but we don't have enough people...{nl}I will give it to him immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009462
text: Fortunately, it seems to be effective.{nl}Since he came out from the camp, why don't you talk to him?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009463
text: This place is full of threats from monsters and the severe coldness.{nl}Also, the contact from the kingdom disappeared and the supplies are not reaching here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009464
text: Even so, the reason why I am doing my duty here is that...{nl}Because this is the last place where we could block attacks from the demons and the monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009465
text: If we block this road where there's danger lurking around,{nl}it will be hard since the demons and the monsters cross here in mass.{nl}If we give up on this place, we have no more way of blocking them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009466
text: We are protecting this place since we should guarantee the safety of the kingdom.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009467
text: Of course, there are many soldiers who fled away without enduring...{nl}We are going to protect this place til the end.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009468
text: You've brought it for me right?{nl}Thank you so much.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009469
text: Monsters were okay after consuming it...{nl}I guess it was a mistake to think humans would be alright as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009470
text: For the continuous flow of food supplies to this squad, there's something I want to test out.{nl}Can you help me a bit?{nl}
