name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009471
text: From a long time ago when famine comes, people ate barks inside trees.{nl}That was possible in an extreme situation, {nl}but we don't know when the situation would turn extreme.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009472
text: I will give you a small dagger so please peel off the barks from the 2nd work place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009473
text: I am planning to develop various recipes using the barks.{nl}Whenever I eat meats, my gum starts to bleed and I feel weakened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009474
text: Thanks.{nl}I am trying to experiment it as I recover, but...{nl}I guess we should hope the kingdom contact us before that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009475
text: When we were constructing this location, there was a building that was used to manage the workers.{nl}Our squad is using it for cargo instead.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009476
text: But, from one day, Sparnashorn started to appear so we can't get near it.{nl}Of course, we can all rush in at the same time and get rid of them...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009477
text: But, the problem is that we have lots of more important and emergent matters to take care of at the moment.{nl}The supplies are still in that cargo.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009478
text: Everyone gave up on that cargo so it will cheer everyone up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009479
text: Sparnashorn is very strong and vicious so don't push too hard.{nl}We always feel cold and hungry so don't worry too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009480
text: You've defeated it!{nl}We better let our colleagues know fast so let's go to the cargo to get the goods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009481
text: I will collect the keepsakes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009482
text: I will experiment it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009483
text: I will get the activating nucleus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009484
text: I am on the same side with the Knights of Kaliss

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009485
text: I am on the same side with the Kingdom Soldiers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009486
text: I will defeat Gargoyle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009487
text: They are too strong to face against

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009488
text: Go to the Fortress of the Land by following the Grave Robber Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009489
text: This is enough...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009490
text: I will go to Vseio Cliffs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009491
text: I will hand them over to Justas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009492
text: Look around with Monocle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009493
text: Do you have any plans?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009494
text: The Resounding Bomb may be dangerous

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009495
text: I will go steal the bombs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009496
text: I will come back after setting it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009497
text: Wait with your ears covered

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009498
text: I have something to do

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009499
text: Hand over the unexploded bombs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009500
text: I will try finding it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009501
text: Let's move

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009502
text: I have something to do

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009503
text: I can't help you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009504
text: I will go collect the equipment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009505
text: I can't help you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009506
text: Think about it one more time

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009507
text: I don't know what you are saying

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009508
text: I will lend you my power

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009509
text: I am not competent enough yet

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009510
text: Tell me how I can help Aldona

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009511
text: To the Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009512
text: Follow me well

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009513
text: Mesafasla, the Strategic Spot (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009514
text: Mesafasla, the Strategic Spot (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009515
text: I can do it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009516
text: Decline it since it doesn't look that simple

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009517
text: How can I help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009518
text: I can't help you with that

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009519
text: Protect the Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009520
text: I will take care of those monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009521
text: I don't have time for that

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009522
text: I will bring them for you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009523
text: Please do that yourself

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009524
text: Necessities

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009525
text: I will look for a flint

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009526
text: Why don't you look for other means?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009527
text: Contacts

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009528
text: I will deliver the message for you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009529
text: I  don't want to get involved in a difficult situation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009530
text: To Eat Something

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009531
text: How can I help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009532
text: That won't be a problem

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009533
text: Caltrop instead of a Caltrop

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009534
text: I will find adequate bars for you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009535
text: I can't help you with that

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009536
text: About the old bars

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009537
text: How can I help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009538
text: I don't have time to help you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009539
text: The duty at Stogas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009540
text: Eatables

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009541
text: How can I help you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009542
text: You better take some rest first

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009543
text: Priority

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009544
text: I will kick out Sparnashorn for you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009545
text: It can't be done

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009546
text: Collect the nucleuses of Red Infrorocters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009547
text: Just as Royal Army Guard Retia requested to you, you eliminated all faint Petrifying Frost. Go back to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009548
text: Secret Trade

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009549
text: Grave Robber Amanda told you that in order to go into the Fortress of the Land, you would need the help of her. Please collect the records from Ruklys Era to go into the Fortress of the Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009550
text: Amanda asked you to hand over the records from Ruklys Era to Wilhelmina Carriot who is working at Kovos Hall Site and receive the weapons that can be used to defeat Gargoyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009551
text: You've received the silence scroll from Wilhelmina Carriot. Let's hand it over to the Grave Robber Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009552
text: Grave Robber Amanda asked you to defeat Gargoyle that are standing at the gathering place in order to enter the Fortress of the Land. Use the silence scroll which you've received from Wilhelmina Carriot and make sure the sound doesn't go out from it and defeat the Gargoyle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009553
text: The spirit that is tied to the seal stone wants to be freed. Defeat Blindlems and the spell dolls to set the spirit free from it restraints.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009554
text: Defeated the Blindlems and Spell dolls. Return to the seal stone and free its spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009555
text: Black Shaman Doll

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009556
text: You've entered the Fortress of the Land safely. Talk to Amanda who is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009557
text: Collect the herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009558
text: Amanda asked you to make Resounding Bombs in order to change attention of the guards. Please obtain some herbs which are the materials to make Resounding Bombs from the lower floor at the base camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009559
text: Hand them over to the Grave Robber Amanda who is at the lower side of Upper Story Hallway

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009560
text: Acquired the herbs which are the materials to make Resounding Bombs. Hand them over to Amanda who is at the lower side of Upper Story Hallway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009561
text: Amanda is trying to disturb the soldiers by making Resounding Bombs. Ask the next step to the Grave Robber Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009562
text: Steal the bombs from the guards

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009563
text: The Royal Army guards possess bombs, which are the next materials to make Resounding Bombs. Faint the Royal Army guards and steal the bombs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009564
text: Hand them over to the Grave Robber Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009565
text: You've stolen enough bombs. Hand them over to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009566
text: Talk with Grave Robber Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009567
text: To disturb the guards, set the Resounding Bombs created by Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009568
text: Move to Drill Ground of Confliction with Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009569
text: The Resounding Bomb has exploded. Before the Royal Army guard comes back, let's move to the next area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009570
text: Neutralize the old trap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009571
text: Look for the old unexploded bombs by using metal detector or scan skills. When you find old unexploded bombs, use the bomb disassembling tools to retrieve the old traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009572
text: Hand over the unexploded bombs to Sapper Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009573
text: Move to Drill Ground of Confliction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009574
text: As Grave Robber Amanda has instructed to you, move to Drill Ground of Confliction.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009575
text: Defeat the monsters that are attacking the soldiers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009576
text: Monsters are rushing in! Move out from the attacks from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009577
text: You've saved the Royal Army guards from the monsters. Talk with Guard Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009578
text: Royal Army Guard Delus is confused after looking at you. Talk with Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009579
text: Royal Army Guard Delus said you should be punished, but since the circumstances are not in favor of them, he will let it go if you help the soldiers. Bring the guards who've fallen behind.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009580
text: You've brought the guards safely. Talk with Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009581
text: It seems that Delus still has many requests to you. Talk with Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009582
text: Collect the equipment that can be used

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009583
text: Delus told you that in order to reclaim the camp, you would need more equipment. Pick up the weapons and armors that were dropped on the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009584
text: You've picked up enough weapons and armors. Talk with Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009585
text: You are ready to reclaim the base camp. Talk with Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009586
text: Move to the base camp by following the guards

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009587
text: You are ready to reclaim the base camp. Follow the guards and move to the gathering place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009588
text: Defeat the monsters that are occupying the base camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009589
text: You've reclaimed the base camp. Talk with Guard Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009590
text: Set the barricade

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009591
text: It seems that Delus worries about the defense at the camp although he is exhausted. To improve the defense at the camp, obtain the barricade from the supply box and set it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009592
text: You've set all the barricades. Return to Guard Delus.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009593
text: You've listened to the request of Delus. Talk to Delus again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009594
text: The guards are all under attack! Defeat the monsters that are rushing in.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009595
text: Talk to the Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009596
text: After you defeated the monsters, some spirit appeared. Talk with the Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009597
text: Defeat Specter Monarch

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009598
text: Strange spirit appeared. Talk with the Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009599
text: Search for the hidden place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009600
text: Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit is telling strange stories about him being a demon and whatnot. Anyways, use the portal to move to the secret location and investigate the place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009601
text: Kupole Zydrone asked you to protect her while she puts divine power into the Evening Star Key.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009602
text: You've unleashed the seals and released the power of the key. Go back to Kupole Aldona and talk with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009603
text: Daiva says Hauberk must be after the weakened space of the prison. Defeat Hauberk who is looking for the space of the weakened prison at Nevirau Collapsed Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009604
text: Collect Orange Lizardman Leather

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009605
text: Druid Ellie told you told you that a mysterious girl left this tree and she wants to know more about the tree. Obtain Lizardmen Leather near the Abandoned Grape Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009606
text: Hand it over to Druid Ellie

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009607
text: To find out the identity of the tree, you've obtained all leathers of Lizardmen. Bring them to Druid Ellie.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009608
text: Druid Martinek told you to persuade Gord Shaton, but if that fails your next move is to meet with his daughter. Try to persuade Vanessa Shaton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009609
text: Talk with Mesafasla Assistant Commander Gorman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009610
text: Assistant Commander Gorman seems to be in a trouble since his subordinate who he ordered to do some mission is not coming back. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009611
text: Rescue Higgs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009612
text: It seems that Higgs is somewhere around Udringal Empty Lot. You'd better find him before something happens.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009613
text: Talk with Higgs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009614
text: You've saved Higgs from the monsters that were rushing in. Please comfort him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009615
text: Higgs wants to come back to the squad, but it appears that he can't do that alone. Ask him if there's anything you can do to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009616
text: Escort Higgs to the camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009617
text: It seems that Higgs doesn't have any way of returning. Please escort him to the place where Assistant Commander Gorman is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009618
text: You've escorted Higgs to the camp safely. Assistant Commander Gorman wants to say thanks to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009619
text: This place seems to be an important place. Listen to the explanation about the region from Gorman.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009620
text: Assistant Commander Gorman is trying to give you the duty which Higgs should've been responsible for. Talk with Assistant Commander Gorman.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009621
text: Activate the desinates shrine to activate Romuva Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009622
text: When you activate one of the shrines among Romuva Magic Circles, the shrines at each end will react at the same time. Use that and activate the altar which Gorman has told you. If you've forgotten which shrine to activate, check the letter which Gorman has given to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009623
text: You've succeeded activating Romuva magic circle. Tell this to Gorman.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009624
text: There is a problem at Neres Magic field. Ask the Mesafasla Assistant Commander what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009625
text: Hunt for the monsters and recharge the magical power of the magic circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009626
text: It seems that you would be able to charge the magical power using the vitalities of the monsters. Hunt for the monsters near the Neres Magic Circle and charge the magical power.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009627
text: It seems that the Neres Magic Circle has been activated after the magical power has been charged. Report this to Gorman.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009628
text: Talk to Baskez

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009629
text: It seems that Baskez is exhausted by dealing with the continuous flow of monsters that are rushing in. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009630
text: Defeat the monsters near the camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009631
text: Baskez is more worried about the monsters that are rushing in endlesssly more than anything. Defeat the monsters near the camp for Baskez.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009632
text: It seems that there would be no more monsters that woud attack the camp. Tell his to Baskez.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009633
text: Defeat the monsters near the camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009634
text: Baskez is worried about the severe coldness more than anything. Ask if there's anything you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009635
text: Collect Truflelia's Furry Leather

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009636
text: Baskez told you that with Truflelia's Furry Leather, he and his colleagues would be able to endure the coldness. Hunt for Truflelia's Furry Leather.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009637
text: Acquired enough amount of Truflelia's Furry Leather. Pass the furry leathers to Baskez.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009638
text: Higgs seems to be in a trouble since he can't set the fire. Talk to him and look for a way to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009639
text: Look for a flint at Tinaga Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009640
text: Higgs told you that he can't set the fire since he ran out of flints. Investigate black rocks from Tinaga Stone and obtain flints.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009641
text: Acquired enough flints. Hand them over to Higgs who would be trembling due to the coldness.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009642
text: Investigate the black rocks and obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009643
text: Talk with Liaison Officer Rochez

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009644
text: Liaison Officer Rochez is wounded and hiding near Ulksh Camp. Talk to him and ask him for a way to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009645
text: Defeat the monsters that are going to the camping ground

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009646
text: Liaison Officer Rochez wants you to pass the message of Mesafasla to the Stogas squad. First, defeat the monsters that are on the way to the camping ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009647
text: Pass the message to Stogas Commanding Officer Ades

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009648
text: You've arrived at the camping ground safely after defeating the monsters. Pass the message to Ades.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009649
text: Defeat the monsters on the way

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009650
text: Talk with Supply Officer Ronda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009651
text: Supply Officer Ronda is worried about the food at the squad. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009652
text: Collect Blue Bird Meat

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009653
text: Ronda wants to resolve the problem of lack of food with the meat from the monsters. Hunt for Blue Birds near the camping ground and collect the meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009654
text: Acquired the meat. Hand them over to Ronda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009655
text: Ronda is looking for someone who can help with the lack of food. Talk with Ronda and ask her if there's anything you can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009656
text: Collect Plateau Potatoes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009657
text: Supply Officer Ronda asked you to collect potatoes since she can't fight by just eating meats. Collect the potatoes from Stogas Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009658
text: Acquired enough potatoes. Hand them over to Ronda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009659
text: There are many things lacking besides the food. Ask if there's anything you can help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009660
text: Collect Bar Fragment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009661
text: Ronda wants to make more caltrops by collecting Bar Fragments. Collect the Bar Fragments at Nubarsk Cliff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009662
text: Hand them over to Ronda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009663
text: You've collected usable Bar Fragments. Hand them over to Ronda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009664
text: Talk with Ades

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009665
text: It seems that Ades is looking for someone who could help him. Talk with Ades.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009666
text: Collect Worg Body Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009667
text: Ades wants to cure the magician who has a fever. Collect Worg Body Fluids that are proven to be effective for reducing fever.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009668
text: Hand them over to Ades

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009669
text: You've collected enough Worg Body Fluids. Hand them over to Ades.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009670
text: Talk to Horace

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009671
text: Horace was looking for something that could be a substitue for the food and he got sick. It seems that he's asking for help so listen to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009672
text: Collect the barks inside the stems of trees

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009673
text: Horace wants to find out whether the barks can be edible. Peel off the barks using a handknife from the trees that are located on Nubarsk Cliff and Second Almol Work Place.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009674
text: Acquired enough barks from the trees. Hand them over to Horace.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009675
text: Obtain %s from the lower part of trees that are scratched with a handknife

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009676
text: Talk with Mortimer

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009677
text: Mortimer feels that the supplies that are stored at the cargo at the upper side should be retrieved. Look for a way to retrieve them with Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009678
text: Defeat Sparnashorn at the Work Management Office

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009679
text: It seems that Mortimer is having a trouble due to Sparnashorn that is occupying the squad cargo. Defeat Sparnashorn at the Work Management Office and help him to retrieve the cargo.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151001_009680
text: You successfully defeated Sparnashorn. Pass this happy news to Mortimer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009681
text: Object?{nl}Ah, it's nothing special, but it is a Monocle that enables one to see the true nature of the special force.{nl}We will be able to find the room with the treasure easily with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009682
text: Object?{nl}Ah, it's nothing special, but it is a Monocle that enables one to see the true nature of the special force.{nl}We will be able to find the room with the treasure easily with it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009683
text: However...{nl}We can't set up a tombstone with only these ingredients.{nl}I've ordered some necessary tools from the Blacksmith and the Equipment Merchant in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009684
text: {nl}Please get it for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009685
text: So Antanas sent you.{nl}Here's the hammer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009686
text: Damn!{nl}We've lost the Fortress of the Land to those dirty demons!{nl}The magic circle... If we only have that magic circle...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009687
text: Yes... I can sense the same force like Ruklys within you..{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009688
text: I will give you the means to fight against the demons.{nl}I will open the portal for you so please protect our fortress..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009689
text: What are these scrolls...{nl}A defensive magic circle? I can only see pictures of strange magic circles.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009690
text: No demons would be able to obtain the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009691
text: {nl}The only letters that I can recognize are the ones about how to activate the magic circle and how to repair it.{nl}The battlefield? Where is that place...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009692
text: What? You are interested in the revelation?{nl}But there are nothing here that are related to it...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009693
text: You better go to the other district first.{nl}I will look around more so let's meet at the habitants' area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009694
text: Okay. Let's look around again with the Monocle.{nl}If you can see some special force, then there will be something like the treasure of Ruklys.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009695
text: Maybe, we would be able to find the revelation which you are looking for.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009696
text: By the way, what is the thing that you are looking for?{nl}I guess it's important since you don't say anything about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009697
text: Did you find something special from the demons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151016_009698
text: What? There isn't anything?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009699
text: Our family is different from those Dico thieves.{nl}Although we break some rules in order to survive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009700
text: Fencer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009701
text: So you've come here to learn the skills of the Fencer.{nl}That's good to hear. I welcome anyone who wishes to learn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009702
text: We, Fencers, are faster than anyone and we take away the lives of enemies with accurate attacks.{nl}People think that we are splendid, but we always put our best efforts continuously.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009703
text: I will test you to see whether you are strong on basics.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009704
text: Good. Continue to defeat the monsters in the Forest of Prayer.{nl}You may become bored, but those basics are most important.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009705
text: The monsters in the Forest of Prayer are not easy.{nl}Prove your competence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009706
text: Very good. You seem to be ready to learn.{nl}I will start to teach you from this moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009707
text: Even if one can damage many foes at once, it is meaningless unless one is able to finish them all off.{nl}Don't you agree?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009708
text: Defenses? Well, about that...{nl}Unless you can land a strike on us Fencers, there's no need for us to think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009709
text: Ignas... I feel like throwing up when I heard that he allied with the demons.{nl}I will spread his evil plans no matter what it takes.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009710
text: If we take a little more rest, we would be able to move soon.{nl}Until then, we will pray to the goddesses so that we wouldn't get discovered.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009711
text: Alina... Grazina...{nl}I hope they are okay...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009712
text: Okay, so everything is ready.{nl}Now, how can we penetrate through Gargoyle...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009713
text: I will pray that your plan will succeed.{nl}We also have high expectations.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009714
text: Premier Eminent...{nl}I am sure that there is a reason why his name has been kept mentioned.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009715
text: The important things are probably hidden deep inside the fortress.{nl}Go first. I will follow you soon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009716
text: There are so many soldiers here than we expected.{nl}Be careful.. Don't get spotted. Let's meet inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009717
text: Go first to the habitants area.{nl}I will take a look around more.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009718
text: What do these scrolls imply.{nl}There are many demons these days, but were they trying to protect something?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009719
text: Shh, be quiet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009720
text: I will do my best to survive and go back to Orsha.{nl}Then, I will be able to continue the will of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009721
text: You better obtain some black herbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009722
text: Quick and Accurate [Fencer Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009723
text: Something is solidified hard inside the pile of soil.{nl}Please make a shovel using the materials nearby!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009724
text: Talk with the Fencer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009725
text: Meet with the Fencer Master in the Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009726
text: The Fencer Master wants to test your basic skills. Go to the Forest of Prayer and defeat the monsters to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009727
text: Report to the Fencer Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151022_009728
text: You've defeated enough monsters as Fencer Master requested to you. Go back to Fencer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009729
text: Welcome to the world of Centurions.{nl}Let's learn about formations one by one.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009730
text: If your determination is not strong enough, then you better give up now.{nl}If that's not the case, first defeat Devilglove who is roaming around here somewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009731
text: Move yourself one step closer to the goddesses by giving a donation.{nl}May their blessings be with you always.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009732
text: Do you want to learn superior magic of the Psychokino?{nl}I am not sure if you possess such skills.{nl}In order to improve your magical skills, you better learn how other Psychokinos investigate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009733
text: There are some books which the Psychokino left at the Mage Tower.{nl}I am sure those books will be helpful to you.{nl}Go to the Mage Tower and come back after reading those books.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009734
text: Go to the Mage Tower and come back after reading the books of the Psychokino.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009735
text: Were the books helpful?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009736
text: You seem to be ready.{nl}Good. I will teach you the superior magic of the Psychokino.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009737
text: So you've come here to learn about the superior magic of the Linker, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009738
text: If that's the case, why don't you help me with my previous task?{nl}This goes for all the Linkers and I want you to be a part of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009739
text: There is a material that is necessary in order to proceed to the next level {nl}from the research of Linker magic which I was previously doing.{nl}Please get me the crystal of the distorted spirit from Manahas, {nl}and the fragments of confusing emotions from Genar Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009740
text: Please get me the crystal of the distorted spirit from Manahas and the fragments of confusing emotions from Genar Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009741
text: Have you obtained all of them?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009742
text: This is enough.{nl}Because of your help, we can now research easier and faster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009743
text: Now, I will tell you how to use the superior magic of the Linker.{nl}Pay attention and do not miss a thing!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009744
text: You want to learn more magic of the Thaumaturge?{nl}I'm liking your attitude, but there's a limit to what I can tell you.{nl}You need to realize this yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009745
text: If you participate yourself into a hard battle, you may realize something from it.{nl}Go to Mage Tower 1F and face against Salamander.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009746
text: It won't be easy.{nl}That beast is dangerous, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009747
text: When you come back after defeating Salamander from Mage Tower 1F, you will realize something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009748
text: Very good indeed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009749
text: You must have realized something from this battle.{nl}Concentrate while thinking hard on it.{nl}I will show you the new magic of the Thaumaturge.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009750
text: You want to learn more magic of the Elementalist?{nl}I'm happy to hear that you're eager to learn more, because that says about your attitude.{nl}If you're not ready for it, you may be detrimental to you.{nl}But, it seems like you really need a higher level of practical experience.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009751
text: I've heard that there is a powerful monster named Reaverpede in Escanciu Village.{nl}If you come back after defeating Reaverpeade, I will become a valuable asset to you.{nl}I wish you good luck.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009752
text: The Reaverpede at Escanciu Village isn't easy, be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009753
text: You've done well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009754
text: Now, I can relax and teach you some magic.{nl}Look closely at what I am about to show you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009755
text: You want to learn superior skills of the Sapper?{nl}Hmmm... I'm not convinced yet. {nl}How about a test first?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009756
text: There's nothing better than real battles in order to test one's skills.{nl}Please come back after defeating Biteregina at Owl Burial Ground.{nl}It is very strong so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009757
text: Good.{nl}I will wait here and pray for your safe return.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009758
text: You just come back after defeating Biteregina at Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009759
text: Very good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009760
text: As I promised to you before, I will show you superior skills of the Sapper.{nl}Pay attention to what I am about to show you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009761
text: You said you wanted to learn the superior skills of the Hunter?{nl}Yes. I believe that you are capable of learning those skills.{nl}However, first do me a favor before I will teach you the new skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009762
text: Try dealing with monsters at Starving Demon's Way, Pilgrim Path, {nl}Altar Way, Forest of Prayer and Apsimesti Crossroads.{nl}Dealing with a variety of monsters is necessary knowledge for {nl}a Hunter in order to remain calm under any circumstance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009763
text: So were they easy for you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009764
text: Alrigt, as promised, I will teach you the superior skills of the Hunter.{nl}I bet you are a fast learner.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009765
text: You want me to teach you new skills of the Wugushi?{nl}Then you better learn the methods on how to make new poison.{nl}You will be able to create very strong poison if you use the poison of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009766
text: Okay. Take this pot first.{nl}Just put the monsters that have poison into these pots, but the poison will disappear if they die so you should catch them alive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009767
text: But, it's hard to force them into pots.{nl}When a monster's HP is reduced to less than half, {nl}then it will become easier to put them into pots.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009768
text: Just get some monsters with poison into this pot.{nl}The poison will disappear if they die so you should catch them alive.{nl}You will easily put them into pots when their HP is less than a half.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009769
text: Good.{nl}This will be enough.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009770
text: Okay then. I will teach you the new skills of the Wugushi.{nl}Before I will teach you, I request you to focus...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009771
text: Do you want to learn more skills of the Scout?{nl}Good. I like your attitude.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009772
text: Now, I will test your reconnaissance skills.{nl}Just reconnoiter at the place I will tell you.{nl}You can do it right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009773
text: Go to the Mage Tower and visit all the places in the records to see if there's anything.{nl}Just write down in the records how the places are.{nl}Each floor has one place so just don't forget to record every places.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009774
text: Go to the Mage Tower and just write down how the conditions are at those places.{nl}Each floor has one such place so don't forget to write down all of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009775
text: You've done well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009776
text: Not only your movements, but your reconnissance skills are very good.{nl}I can conclude that you are able to learn the new skills of the Scout well enough.{nl}Let us concentrate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009777
text: So you've come here to learn about the superior magic of the Thaumaturge?{nl}I am surprised to see that you are already at that level.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009778
text: I am not suspecting you, but you must pass one of the tests of Thaumaturge.{nl}The objective of this test is to see whether you could control the magical power stably.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009779
text: There's a test place which I've prepared for you when you go to Laukyme Swampy Place.{nl}Go to that place and move the magic condensing sphere to put it on top of the magic circle.{nl}If you don't control it well, it may fly away to somewhere or you may fail so be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009780
text: Go to Laukyme Swampy Place and move the magic condensing sphere to put it on top of the magic circle.{nl}If you don't control it weill, it may fly away or you may fail so be cautious.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009781
text: I knew that you were going to do well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009782
text: Now, I will teach you the superior magic of the Thaumaturge so concentrate to learn well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009783
text: An Elementalist is adept at many attributes to control various elements, {nl}but it doesn't control all attributes. If you wish to learn the superior magic of the Elementalist, {nl}I should test to see whether you are competent enough to face against other attributes{nl}that we are not familiar with and show your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009784
text: There is a strong boss monster at Poslinkis Forest. {nl}Its name is Netherbovine and it has a Darkness elemental property. {nl}Defeat Netherbovine to prove me your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009785
text: You are way better than I expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009786
text: You are qualified to learn the superior magic of the Elementalist.{nl}I will teach them to you right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009787
text: You've already reached the level to learn the superior skills of the Wugushi?{nl}This is very surprising.{nl}But, lastly, I should test to see if you possess such skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009788
text: Come back after defeating Rajatoad at Demon Prison District 1.{nl}If you are competent enough to learn the superior magic of the Wugushi, you're able to do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009789
text: Rajatoad isn't an easy foe.{nl}Be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009790
text: I now have to acknowledge your skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009791
text: Good. I can't say otherwise.{nl}As I promised to you, I will teach you superior skills of the Wugushi.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009792
text: You want to learn the superior skills of Scout?{nl}Then, I will test your battle skills now.{nl}You should fight well in order to survive from dangers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009793
text: Come back after defeating Deadborn at Demon Prison District 1.{nl}It is very strong, but you should be able to defeat it in order to learn the superior skills of Scout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009794
text: If your battle skills are not high enough, an irrevocable result may come when you fact against a danger.{nl}I hope you can protect yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009795
text: Come back after defeating Deadborn at Demon Prison District 1.{nl}It will not be easy, but I have thrust in you that you will defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009796
text: Your battle skills are amazing.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009797
text: I will teach you the superior skills of Scout right away.{nl}You will be able to learn fast.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009798
text: Magic Studies of Psychokino [Psychokino Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009799
text: Where can I learn it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009800
text: Research of Spirits and Emotions [Linker Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009801
text: Mage Tower in Chaos [Thaumaturge Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009802
text: I will defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009803
text: Real Experiences of Elementalist [Elementalist Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009804
text: What should I do?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009805
text: Sapper's Proven Abilities [Sapper Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009806
text: This and That [Hunter Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009807
text: Living Poison [Wugushi Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009808
text: Teach me

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009809
text: Reconnaissance Duty at Mage Tower [Scout Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009810
text: Controlling Magic Test [Thaumaturge Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009811
text: The Attitude towards the Dark Property [Elementalist Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009812
text: The Master of Poison [Wugushi Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009813
text: The Battle Abilities of Scout [Scout Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009814
text: Read all magic books of Psychokino

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009815
text: Psychokino Master told you that when you read all Psychokino magic books at Mage Tower, it would greatly help you. Come back after reading each Psychokino magic book on each floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009816
text: Collect the research materials by defeating monsters at Manahas and Genar Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009817
text: The Linker Master is researching how to enhance the magic of Linker even beyond. Obtain the crystal of distorted spirit from Manahas and the fragments of confusing emotions from Genar Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009818
text: %s from Manahas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009819
text: %s from Genar Field

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009820
text: Defeat a strong monster at Mage Tower 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009821
text: The Thaumaturge Submaster told you that you would need some basic qualifications in order to receive realization. Defeat Salamander at Mage Tower 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009822
text: Defeat a strong monster at Escanciu Village

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009823
text: The Elementalist Master told you that he would look at your skills through real battles. Defeat Reaverpede at Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009824
text: Defeat a strong monster at Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009825
text: The Sapper Submaster has asked you to prove your skills through real experiences. Prove your skills by defeating Biteregina at Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009826
text: Defeat a variety of monsters in different areas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009827
text: The Hunter Submaster claims that the ability to handle any foe is necessary. Deal with monsters at Starving Demon's Way, Pilgrim Path, Altar Way, Forest of Prayer and Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009828
text: Get some poisonous monsters and put them into pots.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009829
text: The Wugushi Master told you that you can make stronger poison when using poison from monsters. They must be caught alive so put them into pots when their HP are reduced to less than a half.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009830
text: Reconnoiter Mage Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009831
text: Scout Submaster asked you to go to a dangerous place and finish reconnaissance task. Go to all designated locations on all floors of the Mage Tower and record the circumstances on the records.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009832
text: Do the test of Thaumaturge

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009833
text: Thaumaturge Submaster told you that he has made preparations to verify your skills. Go to Laukyme Swampy Place and pass the test of moving the magic condensing sphere into the magic circle. If the sphere is too far or if it gets near magic decomposing pillar, you should start all over again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009834
text: Defeat a strong monster at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009835
text: The Elementalist Master told you about the Dark elemental property. Through real battles, learn how to face against the Dark elemental property...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009836
text: Defeat a strong monster at Demon Prison District 1

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009837
text: Wugushi Master is talking about real battle experiences. Defeat Rajatoad at Demon Prison District 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151102_009838
text: Scout Master told you that fighting power is also important. Prove your skills by defeating Deadborn at Demon Prison District 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009839
text: If the path to the Gateway of the Great King is safe then I will be able to see more people.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009840
text: A true Cataphract is the first warrior that steps up and fights in the front lines. {nl}If anything gets in your way, just strike it all down.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009841
text: In the end I thought of something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009842
text: It's such a tremendous relief to find that the abbot is safe.{nl}I have tears in my eyes...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009843
text: A few decades ago, the thieves attacked the guard camp or stole the supplies in secret.{nl}They were punished for doing so, but I guess they forgot about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009844
text: Everything is crumbling under the cruel flow of time...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009845
text: My family was able to pass with no problems.{nl}The Royal Army still has trust in you, I don't think you'll get caught.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009846
text: I have so much to do already being a guard and caretaker.{nl}Why do I have to do everything myself? Still, I'm glad you're here to help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009847
text: Luckily I was off duty that day... I was in the advanced party, you see.{nl}I will pass this on to my relatives.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009848
text: Just come at me. Show me how you fight with a sword and shield.{nl}Just know that, depending on your skill, I can either teach you or reject you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009849
text: This isn't the place for a showdown. {nl}Meet me at the vacant lot under Kapas Highway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009850
text: You have some bad habits, but there's room for improvement.{nl}As you know, I'm a demanding teacher, so prepare yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009851
text: I'm going to go find the second valve in the Central Control Room now.{nl}As long as that is destroyed there's nothing Antares can do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009852
text: Finally... I am so relieved that I finally managed to find you!{nl}Please help. Goddess Gabija is in desperate need of your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009853
text: In the past, the demons have aimed to take the Mage Tower.{nl}Though, we were always able to stop their attacks whenever they attacked.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009854
text: But now it's different. Most of the wizards are either dead or have run away.{nl}Only Gabija and a few wizards are still remaining in the tower, protecting it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009855
text: Goddess Gabija and the remaining mages are protecting the tower...{nl}But even the goddess will almost be at her limit {nl}since she lost most of her power on Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009856
text: We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.{nl}Only you can stop all that from happening.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009857
text: Please, come to the Karsta Hall Site at the Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009858
text: This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I won't be able to use magic, but I will definitely take you to Goddess Gabija.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009859
text: Gabija has not disappeared completely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009860
text: To protect the tower from the demons, she just had to hide herself.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009861
text: Because Agailla Flurry could not find her successor, she managed the tower.{nl}To protect a precious thing... she sacrificed herself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009862
text: Are you ready?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009863
text: Gabija did not disappear on purpose.{nl}She had to protect the tower from the constant demon attacks.{nl}There was no choice for her other than to go.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009864
text: Ordinarily, the best way to get accepted as a Pardoner is to contribute a lot of money.{nl}But, I think completing an assignment would be better for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009865
text: Bring the object called a Fire Jar.{nl}There are rumors saying that the Fedimian Merchants have seen the jar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009866
text: Equipment Merchant Yorgis

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009867
text: Item Merchant Muras

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009868
text: Yes! This is it. Talk about a Kepa being the last to know about it's breath.{nl}In any case, I consent to your admittance as a Pardoner.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009869
text: Psychokinos show their powers by trusting in their abilities.{nl}You should show how much you trust yourself to achieve the perfect Psychokino level.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009870
text: The Red Vubbe Fighters in this forest will surely be a strong opponent to you.{nl}But you can face them if only you believe in yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009871
text: If you can't believe in yourself, who are you going to believe when you use your powers?{nl}Right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009872
text: Your abilities are already greater than you imagine.{nl}But with my teachings, you can dream of reaching an even higher level.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009873
text: I've prepared a nice present for my future disciples at Starving Demon's Way.{nl}I think you'll like it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009874
text: What the gift could be?{nl}What gift do you think would suit a Necromancer best?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009875
text: Sure it's impressive, being a Necromancer.{nl}But using our powers on humans is considered taboo.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009876
text: You know that Pilgrim's Way holds the lessons of Maven right?{nl}To be able to cast a curse on humans as if they originally sinned... Naktis sure is formidable.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009877
text: This isn't the first time demons have attacked the tower, but it's never lasted for this long. {nl}People on the outside believe Gabija to be missing, is that right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009878
text: Thanks to our other allies I'm alright.{nl}I never thought Ironbaum could be destroyed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009879
text: This Great Cathedral is an important heritage of the first bishop Maven, {nl}as well as being the sacred location of the revelations.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009880
text: But my body refuses to leave this place.{nl}I don't think I can dare to carry out such a sacred mission like this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009881
text: So you are now one competent Rodelero.{nl}But, how about fighting a Colimencia... The one at the manor of Greene family.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009882
text: If you dream to become the greatest Cataphract,{nl}you should be able to defeat Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm without a sweat.{nl}If you understand me, you come back quickly.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009883
text: You want to advance? Then there's something you should do for me instead of a test.{nl}Please retrieve the lost indulgence money from Aqueduct Bridge Area. You can do it right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009884
text: I heard it was lost in the region near Aqueduct Bridge Area, so please find it from Aqueduct Bridge Area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009885
text: At the time when I didn't know what to do, the goddesses have sent you.{nl}Anyway, congratulations on your advancement.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009886
text: So you want to become a Falconer Master.{nl}I don't know which bird you'll end up with, {nl}but the best way to interact with anyone is through food.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009887
text: Can you go fetch some meat from Beast-type monsters to use as food?{nl}Let's see if you have what it takes to be a Falconer Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009888
text: The stronger the monster is, the more meat you'll get.{nl}Weaker monsters won't give you as much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009889
text: It seems like you've completely destroyed the Pot of Silence.{nl}Is there another problem, though?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009890
text: Soon... Almost there. We can finally be free...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009891
text: We, Fencers, are faster than anyone and we take the lives of enemies with our accurate attacks.{nl}We may look showy, but behind all that is strenuous and continuous effort.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009892
text: Being the best in your field is really impressive, huh?{nl}Especially if you're a Psychokino.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009893
text: For someone like you a battle test should be an easy task by now.{nl}At this point I think it would do you better to learn about {nl}the research carried out by earlier Psychokinos.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009894
text: There's a tome left by the Psychokinos of the Mage Tower, close to Fedimian.{nl}I think that tome could be of use to you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009895
text: The tower is probably crawling with monsters, but I'm sure you can handle it.{nl}Now hurry and go fetch it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009896
text: You might... have to look in every single floor.{nl}Psychokinos aren't that easy to classify, you see...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009897
text: Looking at your expression right now, I think that tome is definitely going to help you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009898
text: Make sure to keep that in mind.{nl}What I'm going to teach you now is just to help make your journey a little bit easier.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009899
text: You've finally reached the last stage of the Linker.{nl}I recently started on a new study which I think will be useful to you as well.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009900
text: What if Linkers could connect not only to people's spirits but their emotions as well...{nl}I think this would allow for a stronger string of mana.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009901
text: What do you think?{nl}Think of it as your last task and helping me out with my research.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009902
text: Thanks.{nl}Let's see... I'm going to need some kind of trace of a spirit and emotions.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009903
text: Get me a Crystal of Twisted Soul from Manahas and {nl}a Shard of Chaotic Emotions from Genar Field.{nl}They'll be excellent objects of study for my research on spirits and emotions.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009904
text: Looks like I'll be able to finish my research in no time with such a helpful assistant.{nl}This is all for the benefit of Linkers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009905
text: So. While we prepare for research, let me teach you about a Linker's strongest type of magic.{nl}It becomes quite difficult since it's the last stage, but I have faith that you can do it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009906
text: Thaumaturges, unlike other wizards, focus more on actual battles.{nl}Even if you're trying to learn more magic, which is admirable in itself, {nl}there's only so much I can teach you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009907
text: You're doing well.{nl}Go to the 1st floor of the Mage Tower and fight the Salamander.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009908
text: Sometimes learning from a difficult opponent is important.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009909
text: Go to the 1st floor of the Mage Tower and defeat the Salamander. {nl}There's something you must learn there. That's how I learned, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009910
text: You're mighty good.{nl}I'm sure you've learned something from this battle.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009911
text: Always remember that.{nl}There's magic even stronger than the one I taught you so far, {nl}but even that magic comes down to how you use it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009912
text: I wish other people could be as passionate about magic as you are.{nl}But getting into something blindly can do you damage, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009913
text: Yes...{nl}I think what you need is some high-leveled battle experience.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009914
text: I heard Escanciu Village hosts a fierce type of monster called Reaverpede.{nl}Defeating it will be a valuable experience for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009915
text: It is not an easy opponent, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009916
text: Elementalists have to combine different elemental properties.{nl}So, the more diverse your experience is, the better the payoff.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009917
text: Excellent job.{nl}I feel confident about teaching you other types of magic now.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009918
text: To prove yourself, you have to battle.{nl} I hear there's a dangerous monster called Biteregina at Owl Burial Ground.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009919
text: You need to able to face danger if you want to become the best Sapper.{nl}What do you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009920
text: The best techniques will give you the best payoff.{nl}I expect great things from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009921
text: Your skills are impressive.{nl}I promise that, if you follow my teachings, you will become an even greater Sapper.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009922
text: You say you want to become the greatest Hunter?{nl}For someone of your caliber, that is not unthinkable.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009923
text: But don't think you're going to do well no matter what.{nl}First you need to do something for me; then I'll teach you a new technique.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009924
text: As a Hunter you need to be able to face different monsters.{nl}You need to be able to keep your composure in front of any opponent.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009925
text: Go and defeat some monsters in Starving Demon's Way, Pilgrim Path, {nl}Altar Way, Forest of Prayer and Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009926
text: Being picky with hunting won't help your experience or your training.{nl}To learn how to keep your cool when faced with any monster, go out and face different types.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009927
text: So, what do you say?{nl}I'm sure you must have a feeling about this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009928
text: Alright, from now on just do as I say.{nl}I'll teach you the path of a real Hunter.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009929
text: How to be a stronger Wugushi?{nl}Help me make poison and I'll teach you a few things.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009930
text: Thanks.{nl}I want you to catch me some poisonous monsters in this jar.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009931
text: It's not that easy to trap them, though.{nl}You have to make sure they're tired enough, then you can put them in the jar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009932
text: You can make very potent poison from monster venom, you see.{nl}But bring them alive. If they die, the venom disappears and it won't work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009933
text: Shall we learn a new Wugushi technique, then?{nl}I'm going to go straight into it, so pay attention.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009934
text: You work well, no doubt about that.{nl}Keep learning more advanced techniques and you could become famous.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009935
text: This time we're going to test your reconnaissance skills.{nl}All you need to do is scout the place I tell you to. Got it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009936
text: Go to the Mage Tower.{nl}I'll let you know the exact location later.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009937
text: Survey the area and write a report. Remember each floor has different areas.{nl}Try not to miss anything and record everything you can.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009938
text: The work of a Scout is synonymous with reconnaissance.{nl}And perfecting your basic skills is the best training you can get.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009939
text: You came back safely.{nl}I see you're not just agile but you have scounting skills, too.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009940
text: Come find me whenever you want to learn a new technique.{nl}And don't forget: perfecting your basic skills is the best training you can get.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009941
text: The best Thaumaturge... I'm surprised you're already at a level where you can aim for that.{nl}But the domain of the Thaumaturge is very, very wide. It's practically infinite.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009942
text: Alright. Enough of this small talk.{nl}Are you ready to show me just how well you can control your magic?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009943
text: I have a testing site at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}Go there and move the Magic Concentration Orbs to the magic detection area.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009944
text: If you lose control of your magic they can end up in another place, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009945
text: I used to train like that all the time when I was younger.{nl}Things became a bit of a mess after Medzio Diena, but it'll be fine.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009946
text: Impressive.{nl}I knew you could do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009947
text: Since you completed this test I'm going to pass on to you my last teaching...{nl}How you use and develop it, however, is up to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009948
text: We create our own limitations.{nl}I can see you feel the same way.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009949
text: Being an Elementalist doesn't mean you can control all the elements.{nl}However, we don't let that become a weakness to us, either.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009950
text: Especially for someone like you who's aiming for the top level of Elementalist...{nl}You mustn't let that happen.{nl}Understood?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009951
text: One element property we don't often deal with... is darkness.{nl}I wonder if your skills are enough to face this particular element.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009952
text: The Netherbovine in Poslinkis Forest is known for the element of darkness.{nl}Go there and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009953
text: For us who believe in the goddesses, working with darkness is taboo.{nl}Although there are those who risk it for the single purpose of defeating the goddesses' enemies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009954
text: Your abilities are remarkable.{nl}I'd say you're more than qualified to learn the highest level of the Elementalist.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009955
text: Allow me to teach you, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009956
text: I have a task for you. The request came from Wings of Vaivora.{nl}It seems like some baron opened a portal that needs to be closed.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009957
text: It was... the Demon Prison.{nl}I wonder what this person was thinking of opening a place full with crawling demons.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009958
text: Apparently they sent this request to other places as well, but we can't miss it, can we?{nl}Be the first to complete the task and I'll teach you one of the strongest Wugushi techniques.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009959
text: Your target is the Rajatoad in Demon Prison District 1.{nl}An easy opponent for a Wugushi, but you can never be too careful in that prison.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009960
text: Some people have really lost their sense out of fear of disaster.{nl}Orsha is struggling enough as it is. {nl}I don't know if it's a good idea to go there, but I don't want more people to get hurt, either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009961
text: Seems like you did a very good job after all.{nl}It was a difficult task, but I have to admit you have skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009962
text: Alright. Let's get started on the new technique. {nl}I promise to look after you until you become a top Wugushi.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009963
text: So you came to learn the last technique of the Scouts.{nl}Before that, there's something I want you to do for me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009964
text: It's a favor for the Scout Master...{nl}Apparently the Wings of Vaivora sent us a request but there's no one to carry it out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009965
text: And you're a full-fledged Scout now.{nl}I think this will be a good chance to see what you've learned so far, {nl}and I'm confident you can pull through it...{nl}What do you say?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009966
text: The mission is to defeat the Deadborn in Demon Prison District 1.{nl}They're very powerful monsters, but for someone of {nl}your level it won't be that difficult of an opponent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009967
text: Your expertise in reconnaissance and stealth won't keep you safe forever.{nl}I hope you keep that in mind and take care.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009968
text: You fought bravely.{nl}As promised, I'm going to teach you the last technique.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009969
text: From the way you completed all my tasks I think you'll have no problems learning it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009970
text: The Himil family was at the center of the original Schaffenstar.{nl}Then they left, and when I was born they were no longer an archer family but a warrior family.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009971
text: We can be misunderstood for dealing with evil forces {nl}or using the power of demons instead of the goddesses.{nl}But using evil forces isn't evil in itself.{nl}We remain within the realm of our magic and the goddesses' blessing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009972
text: I came from outside the kingdom.{nl}This place wasn't the only one affected by Medzio Diena, you know.{nl}I came to see what's happening here, but it's taking longer than expected.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009973
text: The name Saker was given to me by the royal family.{nl}That's how dedicated I am to the kingdom, as I always will be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009974
text: I was in the army once.{nl}I couldn't get used to living with so many rules, however, so I quit shortly after.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009975
text: Plague Doctors don't depend solely on the grace of the goddesses for their healing powers.{nl}We also use human medicine, which means we are able to cure ailments other clerics cannot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009976
text: Everything in the world can be expressed in numbers.{nl}Even music. You don't believe it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009977
text: Dragoons are exceptionally brave warriors.{nl}No one can stop a Dragoon charging with their spear.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009978
text: Sometimes simple persuasion isn't just enough and you must do things by force.{nl}This may very well be the case with wizards now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009979
text: When you curse someone you must dig your own grave too.{nl}Do you get what that means?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009980
text: Carrying a heavy cannon around all the time is far from easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009981
text: Not to mention that cannon balls cannot be compared to bullets or arrows.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009982
text: I'm not just trying to tell you how hard it is for me, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009983
text: Isn't the markmanship of Musketeers just fascinating? With skills like that....{nl}You can fire fast and clear a whole group of enemies or step up and deliver that fatal blow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009984
text: After Medzio Diena, Plague Doctors became more important than ever.{nl}That's why I want to mentor future Plague Doctors and help the world.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009985
text: I know many people think numbers are a pain to work with.{nl}It perplexes me how something so simple and clear can be difficult.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009986
text: To put it simply, a Chaplain is... a priest that is affiliated with the army.{nl}It is believed that helping the army in accordance to {nl}the will of the goddesses will in turn protect everyone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009987
text: Everyone that goes to war desperately wants a sacellum, {nl}so that they may receive blessings from the goddesses.{nl}That is why Chaplains are needed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009988
text: So. It seems that you have finally made up your mind about becoming a Chaplain.{nl}A priest like yourself is always welcome.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009989
text: Although... There are some formalities left.{nl}To cut straight to the chase, how about helping {nl}the Royal Army stationed here for your assignment?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009990
text: The more I see, the more I like it.{nl}The Royal Army here at Dvasia Peak is spearheading a road to the Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009991
text: They are running into a lot of trouble due to the intense hindrance of the monsters.{nl}Wounded soldiers are only the beginning, the amount {nl}of materials stolen by monster is simply staggering.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009992
text: Talking about dealing with a few monsters...{nl}It will be a great deal of help to the Royal Army {nl}if you could retrieve some of the materials from them as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009993
text: You will be able to leave a memorable impression on the Royal Army if you help them out.{nl}Of course, it is also good reference to use when recommending you to become a Chaplain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009994
text: Excellent.{nl}I have already started to hear praise of your deeds.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009995
text: Now, let me tell you what Chaplains are capable of.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009996
text: (Something seems to be engraved here, but the black fog makes it too dark to see.){nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009997
text: The inner shell of Keparis is perfect.{nl}They last a long time after being polished and engraved. {nl}Would you go and get me some?{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009998
text: You were faster than I thought.{nl}Now I can polish this inner shell and make it into a scripture. Thank you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_009999
text: String made from Orange Dandel leather is good, but a bit short.{nl}I'm going to give you an anvil for tanning.{nl}Can you make some bookbinding string from the leather string?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010000
text: First you need to get some leather string from Orange Dandels.{nl}Then you use this anvil to turn it into some sturdy bookbinding strings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010001
text: (There are engraved images of goddesses, humans and a demon goddess.)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010002
text: Blacksmith Ilanai

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010003
text: Antanas sent you here, right?{nl}I have to tell you, this was not an easy request...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010004
text: Not many would take this order, you know. {nl}Are you engraving a holy spell?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010005
text: The chisel? Ah. {nl}I couldn't get it exactly the way Antanas wanted so I had someone else take care of it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010006
text: Go see Jura.{nl}She works at the equipment shop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010007
text: See you later.{nl}Make sure to come back if you need anything repaired.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010008
text: Equipment Merchant Jura

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010009
text: The chisel?{nl}Ah, you mean the one Ilanai ordered?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010010
text: Jura is in charge of the chisel, not me.{nl}She's the equipment merchant.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010011
text: Good, this is just how I wanted it.{nl}Now I can get started.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010012
text: Did you get the chisel?{nl}Special orders are always welcome so feel free to come back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010013
text: We're collecting the objects left behind by the Kedora Merchant Alliance during Medzio Diena.{nl}Our leader Merrisa is in charge of the operation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010014
text: The District 4 which he ran away to is like a maze. {nl}Kupole Daiva and you would be able to follow him though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010015
text: Please show your sympathy....{nl}Hauberk simply does not remember the brutal sins he committed in his past.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010016
text: Please do not feel sympathy towards Hauberk.{nl}It is sad that his spirit was torn apart, but he too was a demon to be eliminated.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010017
text: He is merely incapable of remembering the sins he committed in the past.{nl}It will be a bloody day when he remembers his name...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010018
text: I could not tell you the truth as Hauberk was near you.{nl}Please forgive me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010019
text: Hauberk is also a sinner. {nl}You don't need to sympathize with him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010020
text: Be weary of Hauberk trying to recollect his Soul Fragments.{nl}His Soul Fragments merely do not remember each other...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010021
text: It will be a bloody day if when he remembers his name...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010022
text: This was all because we were so pretentious.{nl}When Laima warned us that trouble was coming...{nl}I was so confident in myself I couldn't understand the meaning of Her words.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010023
text: Are you the person they sent here?{nl}Even if it's not you, will you please help our village?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010024
text: It wasn't like that on Medzio Diena, but then the bees suddenly started turning into monsters. {nl}Other apiaries are already devastated; I'm worried about what will happen to ours.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010025
text: You there.{nl}Are you with that group of Revelators that ran away?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010026
text: Good.{nl}I only believed the priests but I can't take it any longer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010027
text: So I want to recruit a talented Revelator like you, what do you say?{nl}I'll pay you well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010028
text: You came back faster than I thought.{nl}So. Did you have a look?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010029
text: Are you the Revelator who purified Seal Tower?{nl}Finally... you're here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010030
text: These seals exist because of several dimensional cracks spread throughout the world...{nl}If the seal had been broken, the demons would have started an invasion.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010031
text: On Medzio Diena I lost most of my power, so I gathered all that was left of it to make a seal...{nl}Alone, however, all I could manage to put together was this measly seal...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010032
text: Thanks to you, the seal of Uskis Arable Land is now stable.{nl}However, many other Revelators have lost their consciousness {nl}to the evil energy of the seal in Spring Light Woods.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010033
text: It looks like the discussion is over.{nl}Let's see what conclusion they came to.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010034
text: When you first came to see me I wondered if you were worthy of the title of Hoplite...{nl}But here you are now, a full-fledged Hoplite.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010035
text: At last it seems it's time for your final test.{nl}I want to see the results of your training so far.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010036
text: The Apsimesti Crossroads have long been the stage of Hoplites' final test.{nl}Many Hoplites have fought monsters and battled there until their spears broke...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010037
text: All their broken spears and armors...{nl}The fruit of those efforts will be the judge of your final qualifications.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010038
text: This test won't simply serve to measure your strength.{nl}The level you're trying to reach cannot be achieved that easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010039
text: To complete it you will also have to experience yourself the {nl}efforts that others have gone through to reach the final level.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010040
text: Good job.{nl}You'll be a good role model for future aspiring Hoplites.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010041
text: I know you're already at the top level, but if there's anything you need, just come see me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010042
text: You look a lot more striking than the first time I saw you, my friend.{nl}Alright, let me teach you the last Barbarian techniques.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010043
text: I will be frank, I do have my doubts about you on whether you can handle them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010044
text: Talk is cheap. What matters is your skill.{nl}This medicine is something we use for training in my hometown... {nl}Actually it's more like a poison.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010045
text: Drink it and defeat the monsters down at the Apsimesti Crossroads.{nl}Of course, you'll have to do it on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010046
text: But you're strong enough, so. You can quit if you want.{nl}If that's all you want to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010047
text: It seems your passion for power is even greater than mine.{nl}I like it. I'm going to teach you everything I know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010048
