text: Yeah. You're a true Rodelero now.{nl}But to really become stronger you have to learn how to give up your strengths once in a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010049
text: You seem ready.{nl}If so, head to the Apsimesti Crossroads and fight some monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010050
text: Sounds easy, right?{nl}How about fighting without your shield then?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010051
text: A Rodelero's shield is its most reliable ally.{nl}But you cannot be a true warrior if you're not confident in your own strength.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010052
text: Once again you proved your potential.{nl}Leave the rest to me. I'm going to teach you techniques that'll make your jaw drop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010053
text: I thought you'd give up after a while...{nl}But here you are. You must really like Cataphracts, huh?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010054
text: You're not so bad yourself.{nl}If you complete the task I'm about to give you, I might just start to like you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010055
text: It's very simple.{nl}All you have to do is go to the Apsimesti Crossroads and defeat some monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010056
text: But don't forget, we are Cataphracts.{nl}I'll be really disappointed if you're not straddled on your companion's back at all times.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010057
text: If you're not familiar with battling on top of your companion, {nl}you might as well give up on being a Cataphract.{nl}Don't tell me you feel dizzy!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010058
text: Bravo!{nl}I was only half-joking earlier, but I really had no idea whether you could do it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010059
text: Feel free to come see me again.{nl}I think I can put up with teaching you a couple of things.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010060
text: I'm sorry, but there's something I need you to do that's more urgent than your final test.{nl}The Apsimesti Crossroads are being crowded with monsters and people are in danger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010061
text: Use the things you've learned to defeat the monsters.{nl}I should be the one to deal with this but it's an urgent matter, so we'll do this instead of the test.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010062
text: A broker standing between life and death...{nl}That's how the Bokor Master from Klaipeda described the Bokor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010063
text: However, that doesn't apply to humans.{nl}You must always help people according to the will of the goddesses. Remember that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010064
text: That was an impressive deed.{nl}I will now teach you everything I know about being a Bokor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010065
text: I think it was when I was around your level...{nl}Tesla told me this as his last teaching.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010066
text: You can have the best eye for materials and the best techniques...{nl}But without proper maintenance you won't last long as a sculptor.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010067
text: Back then I didn't understand what he meant, but now I think I do.{nl}You can make the best statue out of the best materials, {nl}but if your work doesn't last, isn't it worthless?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010068
text: That's why maintenance is so important.{nl}I just received an order that would be good for you, would you like to give it a try?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010069
text: Let's make this your final test, then.{nl}The priests asked for repair work on the statues of Goddess Vakarine in Orsha and Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010070
text: First go to Bellai Rainforest and collect some greasy Papayam pulp.{nl}I'll use it to make a balm to repair the statues.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010071
text: Tesla always said that a work of honest care perseveres for hundreds of years.{nl}Hm... I think he was right.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010072
text: You're back already?{nl}Just wait a moment. I'll make the balm right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010073
text: The balm is finished.{nl}Go to Orsha and Fedimian and use it to repair the statues of Goddess Vakarine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010074
text: Take good care of them, they are statues of the goddess after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010075
text: Tesla used to always tell me this.{nl}The duty of a Dievdirbys is not only to carve the piece, but to look after it with gentle care.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010076
text: If you want to become a memorable Dievdirbys, you must never forget this state of mind.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010077
text: I was just starting to think it was about time you came to see me.{nl}Alright. If you're ready to show me just how strong your faith is.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010078
text: You see, Paladins are fearless because we believe the goddesses will always protect us.{nl}So. Make sure you're ready for this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010079
text: This ancient relic is cursed.{nl}It has the power to attract monsters.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010080
text: Go to Hyth Cliff in Starving Demon's Way.{nl}Find the Abandoned Altar and use the relic on it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010081
text: I assume you know what happens next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010082
text: Right now so much is being tainted by evil forces.{nl}But as long as we believe in the goddesses, nothing can stop the Paladins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010083
text: I say you have what it takes to be called a true Paladin now.{nl}Alright. I'm going to teach you what a Paladin is really about.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010084
text: It seems you're finally starting to feel the limits of your abilities.{nl}Know that in the final level of Rodelero... you can break those limits.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010085
text: Whether or not you're able to face that is another question.{nl}The Colimencia in the Greene Manor should help you with that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010086
text: I believe that people have no limits.{nl}They simply go through moments of distress.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010087
text: I merely offer people a way to overcome them.{nl}So all you need to do is prove that you're ready to face you own distress.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010088
text: How was fighting such a strong enemy?{nl}I'm sure you realized your own shortcomings.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010089
text: But if you chose the path of the Rodelero you must carry it through to the end.{nl}Isn't that what breaking your limits is all about?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010090
text: If your goal is to become the best Cataphract,  you need to book some results.{nl}Right? I'm talking about defeating an enemy that'll make your name known across the country.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010091
text: I'm sure you've heard about the savage Gaigalas of Tenants' Farm.{nl}The number of victims killed by it is countless, they say.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010092
text: That should be enough for you.{nl}Go and defeat it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010093
text: There's nothing the spear of a true Cataphract can't break through.{nl}Just keep this in mind if you want to become the best there is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010094
text: Impressive. The more I see what you can do, the more I like you.{nl}The title of greatest Cataphract is coming for you, that is for sure.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010095
text: How you carry out your mission is up to you, {nl}but your blessings are the salvation of many others. {nl}Helping others in relieving their agony is a virtue every Sadhu of the goddesses needs.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010096
text: However, you must possess the power to put it into practice.{nl}If you want to reach the highest power of the Sadhu, show me that you have it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010097
text: Go and face the evil deeds of the monsters that terrorize us.{nl}I hear the Colimencia is causing mayhem at the Greene Manor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010098
text: To me there is no real final stage.{nl}I hope you abandon all conceit and keep advancing in your journey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010099
text: Other Paladins are already following the footsteps of your heroic acts.{nl}But I want to see for myself just how much you're worth.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010100
text: Since this is your final test, it's won't be easy.{nl}Maybe the Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm... Yes, that will suit you as a worthy opponent.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010101
text: As long as you believe in the goddesses there's nothing to fear.{nl}It's what I've been telling you since the first time you became a Paladin.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010102
text: I know rumors are always a little exaggerated. {nl}But you, you sure live up to your story.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010103
text: I'm sorry I ever doubted you were worthy of the title of Paladin.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010104
text: This isn't exactly a level anyone can reach...{nl}I sincerely hope you'll prove that you're worthy of that position.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010105
text: Where can I find it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010106
text: Give me a different task

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010107
text: It's best to face it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010108
text: That sounds dangerous; I'll pass

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010109
text: That's a bit too much for me

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010110
text: I'll show you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010111
text: I'm not powerful enough for that yet

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010112
text: There can be no weaknesses

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010113
text: I'll come back after I train a bit more

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010114
text: I'll accept your request

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010115
text: That place is dangerous; I'll pass

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010116
text: Tell me about the request

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010117
text: That sounds dangerous; I'll pass

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010118
text: Supporting the Royal Army at Dvasia Peak [Chaplain Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010119
text: I'll help the Royal Army

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010120
text: It does not concern you

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010121
text: There seems to be something written here but the fog makes it hard to see.{nl}Please collect more crystals that emanate a mysterious light from monsters,{nl}so we have enough light to see.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010122
text: With all the crystals that emanate a mysterious light combined, the writings became visible!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010123
text: The last thing I need is another task

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010124
text: I'll go and defeat it right away

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010125
text: That's a little too much for me

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010126
text: I don't think that's necessary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010127
text: The Substitute Owl Sculpture wants to help out the soldiers. On behalf of the Substitute Owl Sculpture, defeat Treegools at Byreti Vacant Lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010128
text: You've defeated all Treegools you could find. Report to the Substitute Owl Sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010129
text: Defeat Treegools

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010130
text: In order to defeat Gaigalas, you need the power of the Owl Sculptures that fell asleep without completing their magic. Awaken the memories of the Sleeping Owl Sculptures to complete the magic that will weaken Gaigalas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010131
text: As you touched the small Gribas, a squad of Red Fishermen appeared. Defeat them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010132
text: Defeat Red Fisherman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010133
text: So that's the Werewolf that led the unknown soldier to the death. Defeat the Werewolf and pray for his soul.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010134
text: You stabilized the Jewel of Prominence using the stabilizer but the Jewel is still emitting an unusual aura. Ask Grita what to do about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010135
text: Look for the Rodelero Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010136
text: Meet with the Rodelero Submaster at Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010137
text: Spar with the Rodelero Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010138
text: Rodelero Submaster is telling you that will show you how to fight with a sword and shield. Beat the Rodelero Submaster in sparring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010139
text: You won sparring with the Rodelero Submaster. Talk again to the Rodelero Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010140
text: Suppress the Rodelero Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010141
text: Look for the Wugushi Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010142
text: Meet with Wugushi Submaster at Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010143
text: The Wugushi Submaster has asked you to collect some poisons as a test. Collect some Synthetic Poisons from Bites at Saknis Plains using this Disposable Tube.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010144
text: Deliver it to Wugushi Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010145
text: You have collected enough Synthetic Poisons. Return to the Wugushi Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010146
text: Look for the Hoplite Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010147
text: Meet with the Hoplite Submaster at West Forest of Siauliai.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010148
text: The Hoplite Submaster wants you to defeat Shadowgaler before the Hackapell Master does just to mess with him. Defeat the Shadowgaler at Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010149
text: Report to the Hoplite Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010150
text: You successfully defeated Shadowgaler. Report to the Hoplite Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010151
text: Call for the Wugushi Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010152
text: The Wugushi Submaster at Gateway of the Great King is looking for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010153
text: The Wugushi Submaster is telling about the importance of poison immunity. Defeat Rajatoad at Demon Prison District 1 and return to the Wugushi Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010154
text: Report to Wugushi Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010155
text: You successfully defeated Rajatoad. Report to the Wugushi Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010156
text: You need to show your skills to the Cataphract Submaster. Defeat the Biteregina at Owl Burial Ground who is endangering people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010157
text: You successfully defeated Biteregina. Report to the Cataphract Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010158
text: Meet with the Psychokino Submaster at Miner's Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010159
text: The Psychokino Submaster is telling how important it is how believe in yourself.  Prove your skills by defeating Red Vubbe at Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010160
text: Report to the Psychokino Submaster

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010161
text: You've defeated Red Vubbe. Report back to the Psychokino Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010162
text: Talk with the Linker Submaster at Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010163
text: The Linker Submaster wants to know how to use mana. Show him the method of using mana by defeating the Unusual Vubbe Fighter at East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010164
text: Report to the Linker Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010165
text: You've defeated the Unusual Vubbe Fighter at East Siauliai Woods. Report back to the Linker Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010166
text: Defeat the Reaverpede in Escanciu Village for the test from the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010167
text: Report to the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010168
text: You have defeated Reaverpede. Report back to the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010169
text: Meet with the Rodelero Submaster at Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010170
text: The Rodelero Submaster mentioned about your potential as a Rodelero. Defeat the Colimencia at Greene Manor to find out your defects.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010171
text: You've defeated Colimencia. Report back to the Rodelero Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010172
text: Meet with the Cataphract Submaster at Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010173
text: The Cataphract Submaster mentioned that is important to pierce through the challenges you will encounter. Prove your skills by defeating Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010174
text: You've defeated Gaigalas. Report to the Cataphract Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010175
text: Meet with the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010176
text: Meet with the Elementalist Submaster at Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010177
text: You've defeated Netherbovine. Report back to the Elementalist Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010178
text: Get back the holy relic of salvation by defeating Loftlems.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010179
text: The Demon Transformation Scroll has been completed. Obtain the completed Demon Transformation Scroll.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010180
text: Defeat wild animal monsters and get some meats for feeding. Any monsters are fine, but as monsters get stronger, it will be easier for you to get the meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010181
text: Defeat wild animal mosters and obtain %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010182
text: Jane is saying that if the Magic Stone of Interaction be stopped, she and Archon will be freed. Find out some tools that could be of use made by Valius during his life.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010183
text: Psychokino Master told you that when you read all Psychokino magic books at Mage Tower nearby Fedimian, it would greatly help you. Come back after reading each Psychokino magic book on each floor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010184
text: You have read all of Psychokino magic books. Report back to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010185
text: Linker Master is researching how to enhance the magics of Linker further. Obtain the crystal of distorted spirit from Manahas and the fragments of confusing emotions from Genar Field.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010186
text: You have obtained all of materials the Linker Master asked. Return to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010187
text: Defeat monsters at Manahas and obtain %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010188
text: Defeat monsters at Genar Field and obtain %s.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010189
text: Defeat Salamander at Mage Tower 1F

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010190
text: The Thaumaturge Submaster told you that you will need more battle practice than theories. Defeat Salamander at Mage Tower 1F.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010191
text: You've defeated Salamander. Return to the Thaumaturge Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010192
text: You've defeated Reaverpede. Return to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010193
text: You've defeated Biteregina. Report back to the Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010194
text: You have completed an assignment of the Hunter Submaster. Return to the Hunter Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010195
text: The Wugushi Master wants to collect some poisons. Go put some monsters alive into this pot. When a monster's HP is reduced to less than half, then it will become easier to put them into this pot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010196
text: You have caught a lot of monsters with poison. Return to the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010197
text: You have reconnoitered all areas. Return to the Scout Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010198
text: The Thaumaturge Submaster told you that he has made preparations to test at Laukyme Swamp. Go pass the test of moving the magic condensing sphere into the magic circle. If the sphere is too far or if it gets near magic decomposing pillar, you should start all over again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010199
text: You have passed the Thaumaturge Submaster's test! Return to the Thaumaturge Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010200
text: The Elementalist Master told you that you need to overcome Darkness elemental property you don't usually handle. Learn the Darkness elemental property by defeating Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010201
text: You have defeated the Netherbovine. Return to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010202
text: The Wugushi Master has asked you to do a request from Wings of Vaivora. Go defeat Rajatoad at Demon Prison District 1.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010203
text: You have defeated the Rajatoad. Return to the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010204
text: The Scout Submaster has asked you a request from the Scout Master to prove your skills. Go defeat Deadborn at Demon Prison District 1 and prove him your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010205
text: You have defeated the Deadborn. Return to the Scout Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010206
text: Talk to the Chaplain Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010207
text: Talk to the Chaplain Master at Dvasia Peak.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010208
text: Retrieve stolen material by dealing with the monsters at Dvasia Peak

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010209
text: The Chaplain Master asked for help with the soldiers spearheading a road to the Gateway of the Great King. Retrieve stolen material by dealing with the monsters at Dvasia Peak.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010210
text: Report to the Chaplain Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010211
text: This seems to be sufficient stolen material. Return to the Chaplain Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010212
text: Retrieve %s from monsters at Dvasia Peak

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010213
text: Giedra has asked you to get some transparent skins of the Kepari Shaman to make a Scripture. Go defeat the monster and collect the transparent skins.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010214
text: Collect %s from Kepari Shaman

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010215
text: Kupole Audra told you that you need to weaken the influence of Demon Lord Blut. Take the Blut's symbol from demons in Bjaurer Hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010216
text: Collect Broken pieces of spear and armor of Hoplites

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010217
text: The Hoplite Master has asked you to collect traces of old senior Hoplites. Collect Broken pieces of spear and armor from monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010218
text: You have collected all the asked traces. Report back to the Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010219
text: This is the last test of the Barbarian. Drink this Barbarian medicinal liquid and defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while your body is under the influence. You have to finish this test by yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010220
text: The Rodelero told you that you need to abandon your strength. Defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads without a shield. You have to finish this test by yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010221
text: The Cataphract Master told you that he will teach you after finishing a test. Defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while riding your companion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010222
text: You have completed the test. Report back to the Cataphract Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010223
text: The Bokor Submaster has asked you to defeat monsters who torment people as a test. Defeat the increased monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010224
text: Collect Papayam Greasy Pulp at Bellai Rainforest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010225
text: The Dievdirbys Submaster has emphasized about management and asked you to repair a Goddess Statue as a test. Collect Papayam Greasy Pulp at Bellai Rainforest to make a balm for repairing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010226
text: You have collected enough of Greasy Pulp. Bring it to the Dievdirbys Submaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010227
text: Repair the Goddess Statues at Fedimian and Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010228
text: Defeat the monsters who are attracted to the relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010229
text: The Paladin Submaster wants to test your faith. Offer the relic to the abandoned altar at Hyth Cliff in Starving Demon's Way and defeat all the appearing monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010230
text: Defeat the monsters who are attracted to the relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20151224_010231
text: The Cataphract Master says that you need a worthy opponent. Prove your skill by defeating the Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010232
text: Just as I expected!{nl}I figured you had what it needs to become a good Rune Caster.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010233
text: You need to craft your own Rune Stone if you want to become a Rune Caster.{nl}You'll need to gather the required materials to create it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010234
text: Since I owe you, I'll give you the most important material, the Blue Demon Stone.{nl}There are quite a few more materials required, so listen up.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010235
text: Go to Tyla Monastery and get Malstatue's Evil Energy Fragment.. {nl}You also need to gather Velaphid's Cold Blood and Pumpleflap's Robust Horn as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010236
text: You can gather the rest of the required materials to craft a {nl}Rune Stone from various monsters at Tyla Monastery.{nl}Remember, acquire Malstatue's Evil Energy Fragment, {nl}Velaphid's Cold Blood and Pumpleflap's Robust Horn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010237
text: I see you've gathered all of the materials.{nl}Now, let's start with creating a Rune Stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010238
text: This is your Rune Stone.{nl}Now you will be able to use magic of the Rune Caster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010239
text: It's a success!{nl}If Hauberk has any thought of doing so, he wouldn't have wasted any time in harming me.{nl}Let's hope he does so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010240
text: It may have been thanks to Goddess Austeja, but this region was safe from Medzio Diena.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010241
text: But the goddess hasn't come again afterwards...{nl}The monsters are also becoming a nuisance and making everyone feel nervous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010242
text: I'm thinking of quiting beekeeping and look for another job because of the monsters.{nl}But the villagers say that this is supposed to be safer than other places... {nl}I can't imagine how it must be elsewhere.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010243
text: They say that the goddess made a seal at Uskis Arable Land and Spring Light Woods.{nl}The villagers expected an flock of monsters because of the honey... {nl}But I think it is because of the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010244
text: Cleopas and the villagers...{nl}They keep creating problems with the priests because {nl}the monsters are interrupting the beekeeping.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010245
text: I think that we should stand together at a time like this...{nl}Somehow I don't think that'll happen unless Goddess Austeja comes back.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010246
text: They say that the Owl Sculptures placed around the {nl}forest are there to make sure that souls don't get lost.{nl}Some kind of sculptor supposed to have sculpted them alone...{nl}It's impressive that he managed to make all of them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010247
text: There had been some tales of meeting the lost souls...{nl}But lately they are a more common sight. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010248
text: The monsters are also attacking more than before.{nl}What in the name of the goddess happened out there...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010249
text: The Rune Caster and the Rune Stone [Rune Caster Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010250
text: Ask what the materials are

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010251
text: If you had saved all of the sealed souls in the sealed stones past the Mage Tower, you will be able to receive the last mission from the sealed stone on the way to the Great Hall of Keturidu.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010252
text: Talk with the Rune Caster Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010253
text: Talk with the Rune Caster Master at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010254
text: Collect Rune Stone materials from Tyla Monastery

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010255
text: The Rune Caster Master says that you must collect the materials for the Rune Stone required to cast Rune Magic. Collect Malstatue's Evil Energy Fragment, Velaphid's Cold Blood and Pumpleflap's Robust Horn from Tyla Monastery.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010256
text: Report to the Rune Caster Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160224_010257
text: You have collected all required materials. Return to the Rune Caster Master and hand them over.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010258
text: I have a request for you.{nl}The soldiers are suffering too much from Luvine Rubbas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010259
text: Even when the Dico thieves went crazy, I didn't say anything {nl}so I didn't know they would slap me from behind.{nl}The Dico thieves stole our supplies.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010260
text: Now, I just hope Sabina stays calm.{nl}We don't want to become like those people due to the Petrifying Frost here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010261
text: Many skilled scholars and wizards in the kingdom didn't solve the curse of the Petrifying Frost...{nl}I don't understand what he can do as a Kaliss Knight.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010262
text: Wait. My head still rings due to the curse. {nl}I have many stories to tell you... I don't know if I will be able to endure until then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010263
text: If you show your loyalty to the goddess, {nl}you will be able to receive a blessing from the goddess.{nl}Please understand that each pilgrim has different amounts{nl}of contribution which they can make from each other.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010264
text: I realized that the betrayal of my colleagues was due to the curse.{nl}I don't need this anymore... Thank you...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010265
text: It's not that we don't know the efforts of the priests, but we should protect our village ourselves.{nl}It's hard for us to live on due to the monsters so we can't just stay still.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010266
text: You got in trouble.{nl}Because of me... I am so sorry.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010267
text: Actually, people saying that the Petrifying Frost is {nl}punishment for the revolt is just a made-up story.{nl}It was the curse that came when the revolt was over,{nl}so I understand why humans think like that.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010268
text: But, the first one who broke it was the Demon Queen, Gesti.{nl}She brought the curse of the petrification in this region... {nl}and humans died and their spirits turned into stones.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010269
text: Of course, the goddesses tried to save the humans!{nl}But, the demons claimed that the humans were not just dead, but they also turned into stones...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010270
text: Rather, they... asked us whether we have forgotten not {nl}to interfere with each other's matters... and they... there...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010271
text: Wait. This is too scary...{nl}A terrible disaster has come down. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010272
text: A disaster so big... that the goddesses had to give up on the salvation of this place.{nl}It was a threat. They warned us that they would bring an even greater disaster...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010273
text: Yes. The Petrifying Frost... everything...{nl}That's the cost of giving up on the salvation to block an even greater disaster.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010274
text: We want to rescue all those spirits even now when the war with the demons has started.{nl}Since you fixed all the detectors, I will lead the spirits to their eternal rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010275
text: Many documents of the Great Cathedral were lost because of the servants of Naktis.{nl}Thinking about it now, that was too much of a loss...{nl}All those were accumulated for hundreds of years...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010276
text: But, he is also the key to close the dimensional crack.{nl}The reason why I left him like that was because {nl}I wanted him to reserve his strength to be the key.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010277
text: I heard Dionys is suffering from slow recovery.{nl}Can you obtain the empty spirits from the demons at Pasaga Isolated Sphere?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010278
text: I think they are planning to burn the entire forest...{nl}They are just not listening. Can you stop him?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010279
text: Everything was ruined because of the monsters.{nl}That's why Joseph looked for the Revelators after going to Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010280
text: Because of the evil energy, I can't do the farming. Those monsters are really...{nl}I've been farming here for a long time, but after that girl came here, we faced terrible things.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010281
text: Do you know the place called the Astral Tower?{nl}All the famous archers in the history are from this place starting from Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010282
text: Start searching

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010283
text: Something strange seems to be happening.{nl}Frozen soldiers and a Necromancer...{nl}Should we collect some information at the post of the soldiers?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010284
text: Finished searching

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010285
text: Boards with blood...{nl}When we put together the situation so far, it seems a massacre has occurred here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010286
text: Sound of a scream

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010287
text: You've heard the sound of scream!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010288
text: Necromancer Adomas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010289
text: Help... To Lemija...{nl}I should tell Lemija to be careful about Faustas...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010290
text: We should run away quickly... my... bag... memo... to Lemija...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010291
text: Please hurry, before it's too late. We should somehow stop Faustas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010292
text: I am Lemija... Who are you?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010293
text: This... memo? Are you giving it to me?{nl}Sure, I will read it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010294
text: Did Adomas just ask you to beware of Faustas?{nl}That doesn't make sense. He is our colleague...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010295
text: Then wait. {nl}Adomas... Where is he?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010296
text: What? Adomas... Is that really true?{nl}And those frozen soldiers chasing you... what are you talking about?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010297
text: Even if you say it like that, it's hard for me to believe.{nl}But, this memo... I can tell it is written by Adomas...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010298
text: I gotta go see it and check.{nl}If you are okay, can you take me to Adomas?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010299
text: Nothing is here?{nl}Ah, I am sure Adomas wouldn't have done it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010300
text: Are you joking with me?{nl}I don't know how you know Adomas and Faustas... but you are really rude.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010301
text: Alright. I am done. {nl}I have to meet with two other people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010302
text: Faustas broke the taboo and experimented with the dead bodies of humans!{nl}The frozen soldiers that you've seen so far is all because of him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010303
text: While I was trying to stop Faustas...{nl}He told me that he would send me to Adomas...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010304
text: I am so sorry. I should've trusted you.{nl}I am sure that Adomas... I don't know why Faustas is doing this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010305
text: Actually, Faustas came to Vedas Plateau because of the Necromancer Master's instructions.{nl}The families of the soldiers who worked here asked us to handle the corpses.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010306
text: But, then we lost contact after that...{nl}The master who was worried sent me and Adomas here.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010307
text: But, then... how come such tragedy...{nl}He is not someone who would do something like this.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010308
text: I am sure that there is a story behind all of this...{nl}We need to avoid breaking the taboo.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010309
text: We don't have enough time to request help from the master.{nl}And even when they are the same as us, Faustas is especially skilled...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010310
text: I am sorry, but... Can you help us stopping Faustas?{nl}I am begging you, please.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010311
text: He just didn't break the taboo. How could he do that to Adomas...{nl}What's wrong with him...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010312
text: This is enough!{nl}Hold on. I will make you a talisman.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010313
text: It is completed. Use this talisman on a frozen soldier. {nl}It will absorb the magical power of Faustas that is embodied in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010314
text: I will prepare the magic to break the barrier. {nl}Please collect his magical power to the talisman.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010315
text: It is very strong and dark magic...{nl}I think this will be enough, but is this really the magical power of Faustas?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010316
text: This is strange.{nl}It seems that the magical power became stronger than what I knew before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010317
text: The magic to break the barrier is ready.{nl}Hurry. Follow the road at the bottom and go to Minkatos Forkroad from the post.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010318
text: Here. From now on, I will break the barrier with his magical power. {nl}Please move away for a bit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010319
text: Hey... you...{nl}Have you ever lost someone you love in front of your eyes?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010320
text: Those soldiers... the ones who are more cruel than the demons...{nl}They've taken my Elluma away...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010321
text: Even if I continue to kill them! {nl}I just... I just cannot forgive them... and I couldn't protect her... {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010322
text: It was so miserable... As I had to follow her to the goddesses...{nl}Demons with scars on their faces came close...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010323
text: Yes.. The Kruvina that he handed over... would save her... {nl}If I could find her back, the taboo is...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010324
text: But, look at me...{nl}Even when I devoted my life to that greedy Kruvina...{nl}I wasn't able to find her... I... can't meet her anymore...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010325
text: Elluma... Is she going to forgive me?{nl}I am sorry. Lemija... I will apologize to Adomas if I can meet him...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010326
text: That is... for sure...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010327
text: Faustas...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010328
text: I am sorry... Please give me some time to think about it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010329
text: No matter what the reason, the sins Faustas has committed can't be forgiven.{nl}He broke the taboo, experimented with humans and he even killed Adomas...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010330
text: But... Everything was done to save his loved one...{nl}Anyway, I will tell the master about Faustas.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010331
text: But, to the bereaved families...{nl}I hesitate to tell them that the soldiers have done such a thing...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010332
text: Thank you so much for helping me so far.{nl}Alright then... I will do my work now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010333
text: His power... is strange. {nl}An evil energy... I don't feel so good.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010334
text: Let's go. It is more important to stop Faustas than me.{nl}There has to be some reason behind it...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010335
text: It seems that Adomas passed away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010336
text: As I was looking for Faustas, I found the barrier that he created.{nl}I was trying to break the barrier, but soon I failed because the magical power was too strong.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010337
text: It is little uncomfortable, but nothing other can be done in order to reduce the gap from him.{nl}The frozen soldier who you saw... {nl}We just have to steal his magical power that is embodied in the soldier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010338
text: But, instead of me, we need the medium to hold the magical power.{nl}Since I was attacked by Faustas, his magical power is a big burden to me.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010339
text: Could you collect the pieces of the corpses from the monsters nearby? {nl}I will create the talisman that will be used as a medium with those pieces.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010340
text: Old Letter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010341
text: To my missing grandfather.{nl}-{nl}Hello, grandfather. How are you? {nl}I am guarding at Vedas Plateau and I lifted my pen as I remember you.{nl}I am doing this because I miss you so I hope you don't scold me!{nl}How's the village?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010342
text: When I heard about the demons that were locked in the underground mine from you, it was too scary..{nl}Ronesa wept after listening about it with me.{nl}I feel everything precious which I felt normal in the past.{nl}I will write you another letter next time. I hope you are well until then.{nl}-{nl}- Your grandson, Hendrick -

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010343
text: Memo left by the Commander

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010344
text: I am the commander of the Vedas Plateau headquarter.{nl}I am leaving this in hope that someone will understand this.{nl}My subordinates have completely changed.{nl}They started to suffer from the coldness and hunger so they abandoned their pride and started to steal nearby places like the bandits.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010345
text: It's been a long time that they didn't follow my orders.{nl}Even so, I couldn't stop them from living on.{nl}My condition is getting worse.{nl}Even if I lose to my disease, I won't be like them.{nl}I will lock myself into the hideout.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010346
text: Hidden Commander

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010347
text: Who are you...?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010348
text: So you've come after reading my memo...{nl}I guess my last wish reached the goddesses...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010349
text: I am so glad that I met you...{nl}I don't have enough time...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010350
text: I have a favor to ask you...{nl}There is a woman who is waiting for me... although... I am dying...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010351
text: On behalf of me... Please hand over this wedding ring to her...{nl}I don't think I can keep the promise we made... I am sorry...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010352
text: Do you have any business with me?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010353
text: ...This ring... so it happened like that...{nl}Yes... he...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010354
text: Thank you so much for handing this over to me...{nl}If you don't mind, I want to be alone for now...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010355
text: Thank you... Her name is Retia...{nl}She must be working at Verkti Square...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010356
text: Now, I will be able to go beside the goddesses...{nl}Thank you... so much... my friend....

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010357
text: Have you collected the relics of the soldiers?{nl}Thank you so much. I will pass these to the remaining families.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010358
text: Thank you for telling me the last news about him...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010359
text: The 13th of X{nl}-{nl}Elluma... Elluma died...{nl}While I left my seat, the soldiers started to attack her.{nl}As I gained my consciousness, I found out that I killed the soldiers with my own hands.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010360
text: I'm feeling empty...{nl}This mission doesn't matter to me... I didn't even protect my beloved one...{nl}Maybe I should've followed Elluma as well...{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010361
text: The 14th of X{nl}-{nl}The demon with black clothes appeared in front of my eyes.{nl}I had nothing to fear since I've already made up my mind that I would follow Elluma.{nl}The demon grinned at me and asked me if I wanted to save Elluma.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010362
text: He was holding a red stone piece called the Kruvina,{nl}Since this place is full of snow, the corpses don't rust... that power may save Elluma.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010363
text: The 18th of X{nl}-{nl}As I used the Kruvina, the magical power that I possess amplified.{nl}The problem is that as the Kruvina continuously attempts to get my life force, {nl}it continuously consumes my life force.{nl}I guess I should handle the Kruvina more cautiously.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010364
text: The Xth of X{nl}-{nl}I can feel that the Kruvina is slowly encroaching my body.{nl}It's like a glass that has its bottom broken, even when I am not using the Kruvina, I can feel my life force flowing.{nl}But, I can't stop now.{nl}I've already broken the taboo and experimented with humans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010365
text: The 11th of X{nl}-{nl}Starting from tomorrow, Faustas will be dispatched to Vedas Plateau.{nl}Due to the instructions of the Necromancer Master. {nl}He received a request to clear the corpses of the soldiers.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010366
text: I said I will follow because I thought the mountain covered {nl}with snow would be helpful to both me and Faustas.{nl}Faustas was surprised, but it seemed he didn't like it.{nl}I should get prepared soon.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010367
text: The 12th of X{nl}-{nl}I've arrived at Vedas Plateau without any problems.{nl}I had worried that I would only encounter the corpses of the soldiers, but I felt better as I saw a few survivors.{nl}The soldiers are strong as I expected.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010368
text: As the Necromancer Master instructed, Faustas started to collect the corpses.{nl}I should think about what I can do for the living soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010369
text: Lover's Grave

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010370
text: Here lies Faustas and Elluma.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010371
text: You go first. I will follow you soon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010372
text: Fading breaths

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010373
text: Checking consciousness

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010374
text: You should first get yourself together

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010375
text: Looking for the memo

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010376
text: Stare of the distrust

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010377
text: Relaying the story about Adomas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010378
text: Let's go together

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010379
text: The Incident That Happened Here (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010380
text: Looking for the traces

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010381
text: The Incident That Happened Here (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010382
text: Praying for Their Rest (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010383
text: Ask what you should do

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010384
text: Let's avoid before we receive anymore damage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010385
text: Praying for Their Rest (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010386
text: I can't do it anymore

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010387
text: Praying for Their Rest (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010388
text: Let's leave now

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010389
text: The Unfolding Truth

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010390
text: The Results for Them

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010391
text: We don't have time for it

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010392
text: Comforting Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010393
text: Unknown Recipient

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010394
text: The Story Behind Them (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010395
text: The Story Behind Them (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010396
text: I can't hand it over

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010397
text: Look for Necromancer Adomas carefully

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010398
text: You've found Necromancer Adomas who has fallen at Vedas Plateau. Look at Adomas to see what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010399
text: Search the bag of Adomas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010400
text: Necromancer Adomas died after leaving the words to pass the memo to Lemija. Find the memo from the bag of Adomas and hand it over to Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010401
text: Hand over the memo to Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010402
text: You've found Necromancer Lemija! Pass the memo of Adomas to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010403
text: Talk with Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010404
text: As you handed over the memo of Adomas, Lemija's look isn't that good. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010405
text: Move to Kansia Brookside to check the corpses of Adomas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010406
text: Necromancer Lemija can't believe you since you suddenly appeared and said that your friend died. Take Lemija and go to Kansia Brookside where the corpse of Adomas used to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010407
text: The corpse of Adomas is gone! First, talk again with Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010408
text: An incident that occurred here

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010409
text: Search the soldiers' post

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010410
text: We are sure that something strange is occuring at Vedas Plateau. We better check the soldier post first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010411
text: The results of the search at the soldier post

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010412
text: Find out what occurred here

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010413
text: Chase after the sound of the scream

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010414
text: As you were searching the soldiers' post, you heard some sound of screams. Go to Spega Springs where the sound of the scream came from.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010415
text: Move to Spega Springs where the sound of the scream came from

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010416
text: It seems that the missing Necromancer and Lemija know each other. Talk with Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010417
text: Defeat the monsters while protecting Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010418
text: Praying for their eternal rest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010419
text: It seems that Lemija knows Faustas. Talk with Lemija about Faustas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010420
text: Collect the pieces of the corpses of the monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010421
text: Lemija told you that she should steal the magic of Faustas in order to break his barrier. Obtain the pieces of corpses from the monsters to make the talisman that will be used to steal the magical power from the frozen soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010422
text: Hand over the pieces of the corpses to Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010423
text: You've collected all pieces of the corpses which Lemija requested to you. Go back to Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010424
text: Defeat the monsters and collect the pieces of the corpses

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010425
text: Lemija completed the talisman which is the medium to collect the magical power. Now talk with Lemija what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010426
text: Absorb the magical power of Faustas from the frozen soldier

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010427
text: You are ready to absorb the magical power of Faustas. Absorb the magical power of Faustas by using the talisman which Lemija created for you on the frozen soldier.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010428
text: Hand over the talisman that contains the magical power to Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010429
text: You've filled full of Faustas magical power onto the talisman. Hand over the talisman to Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010430
text: As Lemija requested to you, you've filled the magical power into the talisman of Lemija. Talk with Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010431
text: Move to the hideout of Faustas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010432
text: Lemija told you that since she is ready, she wants to go to the hideout of Faustas with you. Move to the hideout of Faustas with her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010433
text: You've arrived in front of the hideout of Faustas. Talk with Necromancer Lemija what to do with the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010434
text: Stop Faustas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010435
text: Lemija broke the barrier that was blocking the hideout of Faustas. Hurry and stop Faustas!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010436
text: Talk with Necromancer Faustas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010437
text: You've defeated Adomas that was transformed by Faustas. Listen to him why he did such thing from Faustas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010438
text: Defeat the transformed Adomas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010439
text: Faustas died after telling his story. Talk with Necromancer Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010440
text: It seems that Lemija is a bit relieved. Talk with Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010441
text: Check the old letter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010442
text: Read the old letter which you found from the hideout

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010443
text: Pass the letter to the receiver

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010444
text: The address is not written on the letter. According to what's written on the letter, it seems that you will have to find the letter and give to the receiver.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010445
text: The Story Behind Them

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010446
text: Check the memo of the commander

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010447
text: Acquired the memo from the monster which was written by the commander from Vedas Plateau. Read the memo.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010448
text: Search the house where the commander is hiding

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010449
text: What happened at Vedas Plateau and the reasons why the commander is hiding is written on the memo. Search the housse where the commander is hiding.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010450
text: Talk with the commander at Vedas Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010451
text: Surprisingly, the commander was living at the house where he used to hide. Talk with the commander.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010452
text: Hand over the ring to Guard Retia at Verkti Square

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010453
text: The commander told you that he can't live on since he is sick. He asked you to tell his death to his fiance and hand over the ring.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010454
text: Collect the relics of the soldiers at Vedas Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010455
text: Acquired relics from the monsters that seems belonging to the soldiers in Vedas Plateau.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010456
text: Hand over the goods to Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010457
text: Acquired the relics from monsters that seem belonging to the soldiers in Vedas Plateau. Hand them over to Necromancer Lemija.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160310_010458
text: Hand over %s to Necromancer Lemija

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010459
text: The abbot is locked in a monastery filled with monsters, but Ebonypawn...{nl}There's a limit to how someone acts. Don't you agree?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010460
text: It wasn't just the bees that changed.{nl}These monsters I had never seen in my life started to come over to Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010461
text: I know this doesn't concern you on a personal level.{nl}But whatever the reason, as a cleric I cannot help the work of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010462
text: Really? Thank you!{nl}All you need to do is plant these seeds at the Radanza Farm. Thank you once again!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010463
text: On top of that, the abbot is locked inside the monastery.{nl}One thing is after we reclaimed the monastery, {nl}but before then please don't mention the expulsion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010464
text: Let's make this your final test, then.{nl}The priests have asked to repair the statue of Goddes Ausrine in Orsha {nl}and the statue of Goddess Vakarine in Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010465
text: The balm is finished.{nl}Take it and repair the Goddess Statues in Orsha and Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010466
text: I've prepared some magic to break the barrier. Go now.{nl}Follow the road south to the Soldier's Camp, the head to the Minkatos Forkroad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010467
text: Burning Stones [Fletcher Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160323_010468
text: You've received the balm. Use it to repair the statue of Goddes Ausrine in Orsha and the statue of Goddess Vakarine in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010469
text: Thank you. I hope I'm not giving you needless trouble all because of me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010470
text: Although I don't know you, I am glad to see you.{nl}It's good to be acquainted with someone here. Everyone should help each other out.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010471
text: If you could bring me the nucleus of the detector, I will do the rest.{nl}You've contributed a lot to this experiment so I will give you the effects of the Symbol of Silt.{nl}Although it woud not last long...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010472
text: I didn't expect that the true intent of the curse cast on this forest is after the Great Cathedral.{nl}Fortunately, we were able to stop the curse due to one Revelator, but I feel ashamed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010473
text: So nothing occurs as I expected.{nl}If that's the case... We can't say we are in distress. We just have to rely on the one{nl}that we demons want to eliminate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010474
text: Oh, I heard from Titas but I didn't think that's you. I feel reassured. {nl}Well then, please support the monster extermination mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010475
text: This thing on my side is devised to read the memory of the spirits.{nl}I made it myself. I have done this before.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010476
text: No remorse for revolting.{nl}This Restraint Token will calm them down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010477
text: By the way, Blut seems to be proud of what happened to Hauberk because of him. {nl}He was in a group that targeted the strongest and Hauberk was at the top of their list. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010478
text: I need proof to show to Vakarine we've been fighting here.{nl}Can you collect demon teeth in Hradeti Crossroads?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010479
text: Dead of the dead... what could that mean?{nl}Do you have any idea?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010480
text: But you have to pay for damaging public facilities. {nl}Sorry but you have to fix the wooden seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010481
text: I'm getting too old for this..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010482
text: Merchant Dolonas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010483
text: That coward is sure taking too much time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010484
text: Tomalov

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010485
text: Preparation is killing me.{nl}I hope the Kedora Merchant Alliance can stay in Manahas a bit longer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010486
text: The Kedora Merchant Alliance is currently recruiting new comers in Manahas.{nl}Entry test is to bring slimy wings to them.{nl}There are two options, one is to go back to Fedimian and buy them. The other is defeating the monsters and acquire them myself. But Fedimian is too far away and the monsters in this area are far too tough for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010487
text: {nl}If it is not too much of a problem, could you help me with this?{nl}You can get slimy wings from defeating Kepari Shamans and Orange Dandels.{nl}If I get in the Kedora Merchant Alliance, I will surely repay you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010488
text: I am not entirely certain whether the Kedora Merchant Alliance will stay in Manahas while I go back to Fedimian and get back.{nl}They wouldn't even tell me where they are headed next.{nl}Even if I do manage to follow them, they might ask for something different.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010489
text: Could you get some more?{nl}I don't think these will be sufficient.{nl}But thank you so much for all your trouble.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010490
text: We will need a lot of solvent in order to make the reagent that removes Naktis' curse.{nl}But, as you can see, we can't get the solvent at the moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010491
text: The girl left this tree before Medzio Diena.{nl}My master asked me to find out more about the tree, but I know nothing about it... I want to get help from you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010492
text: {nl}First, go down to the well and fill this bowl on that well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010493
text: I am working here by order, but this place feels bad.{nl}A long time ago, the son of my master disappeared in the underground tunnels. That alone is somewhat frightening.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010494
text: It is completed. Use this talisman on a frozen soldier. {nl}It will absorb the magical power of Faustas that is embodied in them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010495
text: I'll help you, but I still don't believe you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010496
text: Kedora Merchant Alliance Applicant

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010497
text: Guilty Conscience [Sapper Advancement] (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010498
text: The Sapper Master wants to donate money and return the stolen goods to repent for the past. Head to West Siauliai Woods after passing through Klaipeda, then go to Flude Island and find the stolen goods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010499
text: Sculptor Tesla says he'll help you become a Dievdirbys if you get him sculpting materials. Get Blue Crystals from the Yekubs in Crystal Mine 2F, Miners' Village located in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010500
text: You defeated all the monsters, but the Tower is still shaking. Ask Grita what to do next.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010501
text: You checked the petrification detectors as Royal Army Guard Retia asked you. The detectors' reactions are unusual. Return to Retia.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010502
text: Still Needs Memory [Bokor Advancement] (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010503
text: Statue Maintenance [Dievdirbys Advancement] (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010504
text: Grace of Wealth [Pardoner Advancement] (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010505
text: Demon Svitrigaila is trying to craft an orb to destroy the Soul Condenser. Obtain detonators from monsters that have one and use a recipe to craft Svitrigaila's orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010506
text: Kupole Arune seems to know something. Talk to Kupole Arune.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010507
text: Talk to Tomalov

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010508
text: Tomalov in Genar Field is waiting for someone to help him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010509
text: Collecting Sticky Wings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010510
text: Tomalov wants to join the Kedora Merchant Alliance and the entry test is to bring sticky wings. Help him on his test by getting slimy wings from Kepari Shamans and Orange Dandels.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010511
text: Report to Tomalov

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160718_010512
text: Acquired a sufficient amount of sticky wings. Hand them over to Tomalov.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160811_010513
text: As your competence increases, people won't know who made these traps.{nl}On the contrary, people may find out who made these traps so easily.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010514
text: Our comrades who were attacked by Petrifying Frost... they are just left there without avoiding the rain and the wind.{nl}On top of that, we have a limited support... We have no choice, but to wait.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010515
text: The grave robbers are going all out here.{nl}We have to wait for extra support from headquarters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010516
text: I want to talk to Laius again.{nl}But, I guess I should wait until he comes to me...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010517
text: The level of the strongest Hunter... I am not sure if you could follow well.{nl}I will give you an assignment. Hunt for various types of monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010518
text: Well done.{nl}However, this jewel is just an empty shell.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various materials.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010519
text: I am sure there is magical power left.{nl}I have nothing else but to hope it still exists.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010520
text: So nothing occurs as I expected.{nl}If that's the case... We can't say we are in distress. We just have to rely on the one{nl}that we demons want to eliminate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010521
text: Ah, is this the first time you've seen our merchants?{nl}I fully understand. It's because we've only done our business in secret.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010522
text: I think...{nl}What if he wanted to escape without going through the dimensional crack you came here with...{nl}You should look for the crack which has been weakened due to the collapse.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010523
text: If you resist, we would have to execute the kingdom order.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010524
text: We had no other choice but to run away.{nl}The problem was the abbot. He was praying in the Prayer Room.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20160925_010525
text: It is little uncomfortable, but nothing other can be done in order to reduce the gap from him.{nl}The frozen soldier who you saw... {nl}We just have to steal his magical power that is embodied in the soldier.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010526
text: There are many strange things that can't be seen in forests other than Kateen Forest.{nl}Such as the wooden owl sculptures.w

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010527
text: I support the Hunters, but I don't know what the other senior monks are thinking.{nl}However, I don't think it would be a problem if we get hard evidence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010528
text: For example, help cleaning the monsters at our workplace.{nl}The gathering place. What do you think? Can you help us?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010529
text: Whose side are you on?{nl}The Royal Army or the Knights of Kaliss?{nl}If you don't want to answer, then just do what you are told.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010530
text: Is this... a love letter? {nl}I don't need it so you can take it or throw it away.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010531
text: A scroll?{nl}I thought she'd give us something like a ballista or a magicial weapon...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010532
text: But as they hide more and more, more people will be curious about Ruklys.{nl}The gallows could be near, but how could a scholar just do nothing?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010533
text: The soldiers doing their missions here all worked here for a long time.{nl}They experienced lots of things such as Petrifying Frost or monsters so they are somewhat insensitive now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010534
text: Please do not read the old records or take out the artifacts to outside.{nl}Even we can't forgive you if you do so.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010535
text: Poison is a double-edged sword. So you must take caution when handling it.{nl}If a drop of it enters your system through a scratch...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010536
text: Fight me and win.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010537
text: This battle was a shameful one as a commander. {nl}I don't know what would have happened if it wasn't for you..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010538
text: Wait. My head still rings due to the curse. {nl}I have many stories to tell you... I don't know if I will be able to endure until then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010539
text: Show your determination to defeat enemies for the goddesses.{nl}Sacrifice their vicious beings to the sanctum as proof of your belief.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010540
text: The only thing I could tell to the villagers who were wounded was to wait..{nl}Even if it was the monsters' doing. Reality is cruel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010541
text: Not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}Welcome to Doppelsoeldner!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010542
text: Whew, this is really endless. {nl}I don't know how much longer I can take it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010543
text: What a rare meat delicacy. Must have been hard to obtain it.{nl}Be a good Falconer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010544
text: Vincentas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010545
text: I don't know who you are but...{nl}Assassub Ebonypawn is lurking around.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010546
text: {nl}As you can see, all my best soldiers...{nl}It didn't spare me neither...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010547
text: {nl}It's far too dangerous for you as well. Run!{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010548
text: {nl}You are the Revelator. The Revelator who made the name in the Western part of the Kingdom?{nl}If you are the Revelator, perhaps you can face Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010549
text: {nl}Could I ask you to help me?{nl}In order to face Ebonypawn, there are some items we need...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010550
text: {nl}We need them quick.{nl}They will be among the supplies we have lost during the escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010551
text: This old life perhaps be useful for the Kindom...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010552
text: Nevermind that..{nl}It was a mere rambling of an old man.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010553
text: Have you retrieve them?{nl}Let's see...{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010554
text: Oh thank heavens, they are in good shape.{nl}I will look for something that might be of some use for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010555
text: Yes, yes. Take this military bomb and antidoe with you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010556
text: Ebonypawn is hiding somewhere here.{nl}Watch out for the traps set by Ebonypawn.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010557
text: Our squad fell into those traps...{nl}So please be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010558
text: {nl}Get you to the armory and on your way there, search for that coward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010559
text: We weren't taking the assault lying down. We did manage to hurt Ebonypawn.{nl}Not certain on the severity though.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010560
text: The state of his wounds will keep him away from attacking the Revelator hastily.{nl}Even so, best to not let our guard down.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010561
text: Sorry for being so useless. If I weren't injured...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010562
text: These are from my men.{nl}At least, their keepsakes have been retrieved.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010563
text: {nl}To be perfectly honest, I had my doubts about you.{nl}But after seeing what you have done for me... I have something to tell you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010564
text: {nl}I am Vincentas of the Royal Bodyguards.{nl}My duty is to protect the Royal family from threats ever since Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010565
text: {nl}I was on a mission to escort them to safety.{nl}The surviving members of the royalty is working towards rebuilding the Kingdom and the preparation is almost complete.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010566
text: {nl}The Chancellor was on the way to seek co-operation from Southern cities. It was then when Ebonypawn struck.{nl}Sent by those who want to eliminate the royal family.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010567
text: {nl}To rebuild the kingdom, Ebonypawn must be eliminated.{nl}At my current state, all I could do is ask for your help.{nl}I am so ashamed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010568
text: The battle we have had caused great harm to both sides.{nl}Ebonypawn at his most weakest is our best chance to strike.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010569
text: {nl}The training field that we have not yet searched, he must be there.{nl}Punish Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010570
text: I want to join the fight...but I will only drag you down.{nl}However, I will patch myself up and join you right away just in case.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010571
text: At my current state, getting there would be a challenge. So, if possible, could you sweep up some of the monsters on your way to the inner training ground.{nl}I will join you as soon as possible.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010572
text: I am beginning to think that Goddess has not foresake the Kingdom.{nl}She has brought you here, after all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010573
text: So, Ebonypawn has finally fallen.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010574
text: You exceed your own reputation.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010575
text: I am not ready to fight yet but i can move.{nl}I have to inform the royalty.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010576
text: I will tell them of your triumph.{nl}Let us meet again in the future.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010577
text: A new Miko is always welcome.{nl}Just following Kanuushi's orders are busy enough.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010578
text: We have to find Divine Spirits, maintain the barrier that suppresses the Tree.{nl}If you desire to join us, you wouldn't mind helping us, right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010579
text: I have set some barriers thoroughout the kingdom.{nl}They suppress the Tree from getting larger.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010580
text: Could you check up on those barriers for me?{nl}Completing this errand would prove whether you are up for more difficult tasks of a Miko.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010581
text: Since you are not a proper Miko yet, you won't be able to perceive barriers.{nl}Take this gohei with you.{nl}Wave it in front of a barrier and it will reveal itself to you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010582
text: Nevellet Quarry 1F, Royal Mausoleum Workers Lodge,    Sicarius 1F.{nl}Also, there are one each in Residence of the Fallen Legwyn Family, 2nd Demon Prison and Roxona Reconstruction Agency West Building.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010583
text: I want you to know that I am not giving you this workload not because I don't want to do it myself.{nl}You understand, right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010584
text: There were days where we would just sit in our rooms, sipping tea all day...{nl}Alas, those days are gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010585
text: Have you check them all?{nl}Nothing unusual right?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010586
text: The barriers that I personally set up cannot be broken easily.{nl}Anyway, good work.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010587
text: You can be a good Miko like me.{nl}My eyes never deceive me. I can see that in your future.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010588
text: Then I could have some time to breathe...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010589
text: Be careful with this. It turns your bodily fluid acidic.{nl}Throw it at monsters and retrieve their bodily fluids.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010590
text: It would be easier to lure one from the sky than to try finding one without using a food box.{nl}Alternatively, you could just go to Viltis Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010591
text: To make the scripture, sheets are important, but binding is also important.{nl}Especially, the strings. It will be no good if the scripture gets untied.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010592
text: There are so many soldiers here than we expected.{nl}Be careful.. Don't get spotted. Let's meet inside.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010593
text: Have you ever seen the Great Cathedral or the Mage Tower before?{nl}How about a gigantic goddess statue like the one in Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010594
text: Is there anything else you want to ask?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010595
text: The kingdom fought hard against Medzio Diena.{nl}Two of the four heroes are from the royal family.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010596
text: {nl}The kingdom must stand proud and tall for the world to stand straight. That makes assassins like Ebonypawn the number one target to be taken of with extreme prejudice.{nl}Godspeed.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010597
text: Hmm, even if it's not the Church's order, shouldn't the Great Cathedral be restored first... {nl}Wouldn't we be able to find the answer to the curse more easily then?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010598
text: I don't know if we will be able to find a way to release the curse if things continue like this.{nl}If I only had the power, I would have driven all demons out from the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010599
text: The current state of absent goddesses, we had to take matters into our own hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010600
text: {nl}With greater authority comes greater responsibility.{nl}Despite the increased burden on our shoulders, we had to live and fulfill the duties of an inquisitor and a cleric.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010601
text: After Medzio Diena, our authority grews and so did our responsibility.{nl}We had no manpower to train new inquistors until now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010602
text: {nl}It is a shame that those so-called believers with different faith are growing in numbers and their activities growing rampant.{nl}That is why we must strengthen our base by accepting voluteers to our noble profession. Inquisitors.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010603
text: In the past, she told us that she couldn't just not do anything, even if her power was weakened.{nl}We barely managed to persuade her.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010604
text: Your lead was a big help. {nl}I wonder if this is all the guidance of the goddess..

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010605
text: The demons that are spreading the vicious curses are still roaming the Great Cathedral.{nl}As a priest under the goddesses' name, how can I just leave this be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010606
text: We are going to reclaim the camp and try our best not to be conquered again. {nl}By doing so, we would be able to protect ourselves from monsters and intruders like you.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010607
text: Whether it's to restore the weakened seal or to cure the addled Revelators, {nl}We will need that symbol.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010608
text: I know that purification is important,{nl}but if we don't save those poisoned farmers right away, they may lose their lives.{nl}As a druid, how can I leave those people behind?
