name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010609
text: I will believe my master even though he has made a wrong choice.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010610
text: The tales of valor about you as a paladin haven been well heard and inspired so many other paladins.{nl}But I want to see your prowess with my own eyes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010611
text: All the heathen activities are a bit too much to handle on our own...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010612
text: Thank you for helping us.{nl}I should visit the site to see what they were planning.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010613
text: An archer does not just shoot from far behind.{nl}A hackapell charges towards the battleground with trusty comrades. Straight in.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010614
text: And our combat style is not tied to a bow and arrows.{nl}We can wield a pistol, a dagger, a sword, a shield and other various weapons to bring the most efficient outcome in combat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010615
text: Many other archers lack flexible mind.{nl}There are some limitations when you only train yourself with one type of weapon.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010616
text: Our bowsmanship is more advanced form.{nl}The combat style that can adapt to different combat situations.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010617
text: That is the bowsmanship of a Mergen.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010618
text: A shield is not a cowardly tool.{nl}The real cowards are those who only use their shields to hide behind it.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010619
text: We equip light and get as close to your enemy as possible.{nl}Strength is the most effective way to strike down upon your foes.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010620
text: How can you claim yourself to be a gladiator if you are afraid of combat?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010621
text: Our ways of spears exist for the kingdom.{nl}Tender one's spear and fend off the enemies of the kingdom.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010622
text: Charging towards the battlefield faster than anyone else. Crushing our enemies and protecting our kins.{nl}That is the path of a lancer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010623
text: Vincentas' Squan In Peril(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010624
text: As a Revelator, I cannot simply walk away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010625
text: Goodbye.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010626
text: Vincentas' Squan In Peril(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010627
text: Don't worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010628
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010629
text: Ebonypawn set up traps in the armory.{nl}Find Ebonypawn at Supplies Camp.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010630
text: Obtained a piece of obstacle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010631
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010632
text: At Supplies Camp, there are traps set by Ebonypawn.{nl}Throw a piece of obstacle to deactivate traps.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010633
text: Ebonypawn's traps have been destroyed.{nl}Now find Ebonypawn in food storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010634
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010635
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(4)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010636
text: On the road to closed town, you can see the keepsakes of the fallen comrades of Vincentas.{nl}Collect them and deliver them to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010637
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(5)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010638
text: Go to the Barrack and find Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010639
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(6)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010640
text: Find the traces of Assassin Ebonypawn in the repair shop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010641
text: What is the story behind the royal family?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010642
text: Assassin Ebonypawn(7)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010643
text: The assassin shall fall.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010644
text: I need some time to prepare myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010645
text: Now get to the inner training ground and defeat Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010646
text: The End of Ebonypawn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010647
text: The Sign of the Assassin

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010648
text: Great Miko Barrier[Miko Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010649
text: I will check up on those barriers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010650
text: The task is too daunting.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010651
text: Vincetas' Squad In Peril

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010652
text: Talk to Vincentas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010653
text: You see an injured royal soldier. Ask him what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010654
text: Retrieve Vincetas' Squad Keepsakes

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010655
text: Vincentas' men have been fallen at the hands of Assassin Ebonypawn. Retrieve the lost items of the fallen soldiers that were left behind while retreating.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010656
text: Retrieve all the lost items. Report back to Vincentas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010657
text: Search for Ebonypawn in the Armory

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010658
text: You are fully prepared. Now, seek Ebonypawn.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010659
text: Destroy Ebonypawn's Traps

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010660
text: There are traps set up by Ebonypawn. Destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010661
text: Destroy Ebonypawn's Traps

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010662
text: Search the Supplies Camp for Ebonypawn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010663
text: Search Ebonypawn in the Supplies Camp

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010664
text: Remove Obstacle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010665
text: The broken furniture is blocking your way to the supplies camp. Use the military bombs to remove the obstacle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010666
text: Remove the traps by throwing a piece of obstacle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010667
text: The supplies camp is infested with the traps set by Ebonypawn. Throw pieces of obstacle at it to disable them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010668
text: Search for Ebonypawn in the Food Storage

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010669
text: Find Ebonypawn in the Food Storage.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010670
text: Defeat all the monsters and destroy the obstacle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010671
text: Retrieve the keepsakes of Vincentas' Squad

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010672
text: The keepsakes of Vincentas' Squad soldiers who have fallen at the hands of Ebonypawn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010673
text: Find Ebonypawn in the Barrack

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010674
text: Find Ebonypawn in the Barrack.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010675
text: Find the traces of Ebonypawn in the repair shop

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010676
text: Ebonypawn is running out of places to hide. Find the traces of him in the repair shop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010677
text: You've found some traces of Assassin Ebonypawn. Report back to Vincentas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010678
text: Tell Vincentas about the traces you've found in the repair shop.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010679
text: Defeat the monsters on the way to the inner trainning ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010680
text: Vincentas cannot get into combat due to his wounds. Defeat the monsters on the way to the inner training ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010681
text: Defeat Assassin Ebonypawn

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010682
text: Now, it is time to face Ebonypawn. According to Vincentas, the inner training ground is the only place where he could be hiding. Go to the inner training ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010683
text: Report to Vincentas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010684
text: You've defeated Ebonypawn. Report back to Vincentas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010685
text: Talk to Miko Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010686
text: Talkt to Miko Master at Passage of the Recluse

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010687
text: Check the Barrier Set By Miko Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010688
text: Miko Master has set up barriers to keep the Tree from growing. Check up on them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161005_010689
text: You've checked all the barriers. Report back to Miko Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010690
text: The cure for the Nobreer epidemic is finally complete.{nl}The patients' condition is slowly improving, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010691
text: I refuse to accept there was ever any truth to the words of Ruklys, the traitor.{nl}As a servant of the Royal Army, my beliefs are with the Kingdom entirely.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010692
text: If we knew the inside of the Fortress of the Land, we could have disguised some members of the Knight of Kaliss as tomb raiders and gotten in...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010693
text: Sometimes your armor breaks and you gotta fight with your bare body.{nl}The feeling you get when you still manage to hurt the enemy like that... You gotta live it to know it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010694
text: What, you don't believe me?{nl}Guess you're still a little unexperienced...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010695
text: Amanda is going to carve something on the tombstone.{nl}What could she be thinking of writing?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010696
text: We've decided to have a few Knights of Kaliss infiltrate the location undercover.{nl}Paying Amanda costs a fortune.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010697
text: However I don't want them to risk their lives in vain.{nl}I'm sorry to ask, but since you've been inside the fortress, I would like you to give us an idea of what we should be careful of.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010698
text: Please write down anything we should mind inside the Fortress of the Land on these notes.{nl}Feel free to be very specific.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010699
text: I pondered deeply before deciding to have the Knights of Kaliss enter the fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010700
text: {nl}In the end, money was the biggest aspect to factor in my decision.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010701
text: This should be enough.{nl}I'll select a few talented knights to enter the fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010702
text: If you helped the Amanda Grave Robbers, guess I gotta believe you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010703
text: I received orders from Amanda to join the Dico Tomb Thieves and get anything that could be useful to the Knights of Kaliss.{nl}Unfortunately I can't deliver the stuff myself so I was gonna ask a few of Amanda's people.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010704
text: The thing is they're still not here, so I'm worried the Dicos are gonna find out about me.{nl}Would you go to the Inner Enceinte District for me and deliver the things to a person called Wilhelmina Carriot?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010705
text: Amanda did say she would get one of her subordinates in the Dico Tomb Thieves; I assume that's you.{nl}Let me see what you brought.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010706
text: Making business with the Amanda Grave Robbers was definitely a good decision.{nl}Thank you for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010707
text: Did you really do it?{nl}I mean, the monsters around here are kinda weak, so, you know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010708
text: {nl}You need to fight a monster that's stronger than you.{nl}Without depending on your armor, that is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010709
text: Don't push yourself too much, though, get some training first.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010710
text: Wow... You really did it, huh.{nl}Impressive.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010711
text: You look a bit tired, though.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010712
text: Ah... Thanks to you I did find a proper stone, but I don't have the tools to carve it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010713
text: Stone carving tools?{nl}Yes, I have them right here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010714
text: {nl}You're always welcome to ask for anything you need.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010715
text: Yeah, this should do it.{nl}Hold on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010716
text: I'm gonna go carve it now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010717
text: I carved out our achievements on it.{nl}I want our successors to remember them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010718
text: Thank you for finding the textbook.{nl}I know it wasn't your intent coming here, but you were a great help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010719
text: To Pilgrim's Way

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010720
text: To the Fortress of the Land

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010721
text: You should pay a reasonable price.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010722
text: Precious Object

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010723
text: I'll deliver the things for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010724
text: I can't help you with that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010725
text: Talking about meeting Arghidas downtown...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010726
text: Giving the objects to Wilhelmina Carriot...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010727
text: Competitive to the Extreme

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010728
text: I can't do it, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010729
text: Notable Grave Robbers and Adventurers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010730
text: I'll go see the Dievdirbys Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010731
text: I have somewhere else to be.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010732
text: Would it be possible to get the tools?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010733
text: To go to the Great Cathedral mentioned in the Mage Tower Revelation, you must pass through Pilgrim's Way, which connects to Fedimian. Move to Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010734
text: Wilhelmina Carriot seems to have made a decision. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010735
text: Report on the Environment Inside the Fortress of the Land

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010736
text: The Knights of Kaliss plan to infiltrate the Fortress of the Land without the knowledge of the Royal Army. Use the writing tools provided by Wilhelmina Carriot to note down any aspects they will need to be careful of when entering and navigating the inside of the fortress.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010737
text: You have completed your report on the environment inside the fortress. Return to Wilhelmina Carriot and talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010738
text: Talk to Arghidas from the Dico Tomb Thieves

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010739
text: Arghidas seems to be anxiously waiting for someone. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010740
text: Deliver the Objects Gathered by Arghidas to Wilhelmina

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010741
text: Arghidas, who is disguised as a member of the Dico Tomb Thieves, wants to deliver a few objects to Wilhelmina. Bring the objects to Wilhelmina for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010742
text: Talk to the Murmillo Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010743
text: Defeat a Strong Monster While Equipping 3 or Less Armor Items

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010744
text: To impress the Murmillo Master, you must defeat either a monster 3 levels or more above yourself, or a special, elite or boss monster of up to 5 levels below you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010745
text: You have defeated a correct target monster while equipping 3 or less armor items. Talk to the Murmillo Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010746
text: Amanda seems to be struggling with something. Talk to her and ask her what's wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010747
text: Ask the Dievdirbys Master for Help

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010748
text: Amanda has found a good stone in which to carve stories of her feats, but she's missing the carving tools. Borrow the carving tools from the Dievdirbys Master and bring them to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161214_010749
text: You have obtained the tools from the Dievdirbys Master. Bring them to Amanda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20161221_010750
text: What a rare meat delicacy. Must have been hard to obtain it.{nl}Be a good Falconer.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010751
text: I realize you are a Revelator, but please understand I cannot cooperate with the demons in any way.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010752
text: Here, take it.{nl}It looks like your faith in the goddesses is very strong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010753
text: The seal of Demon Lord Baiga...{nl}Now that's scary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010754
text: {nl}Out of the three demon lords under Giltine, Baiga is the most terrifying.{nl}He's extremely cold and distant, but most of all cruel.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010755
text: I imagine Dawn Maidens must have the same power of curse as Naktis, seeing as they are so similar in appearance.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010756
text: If there was a way to find out, it would be extremely useful for my research on curses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010757
text: Think your companion is the best?{nl}Let's see you prove it, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010758
text: What, you didn't expect me to just believe you, did you?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010759
text: What's wrong...?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010760
text: {nl}It seems you have something to ask.{nl}I'll be glad to help you if I can.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010761
text: Hm... I've never seen this script either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010762
text: It's probably best if you ask someone with more knowledge.{nl}Someone like the Sage Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010763
text: Let's go see the Sage Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010764
text: So you found some writings engraved in a tombstone at Fasika Plateau and you brought a rubbed copy.{nl}Alright, let me have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010765
text: I'm not sure what script this is, but it isn't human.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010766
text: My word...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010767
text: This is demon language.{nl}It's ordering someone to put a curse on Fasika Plateau, it seems.{nl}I worry these orders may already have been put into practice.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010768
text: {nl}That is what it's written, although curses aren't really my forte.{nl}Maybe the Bokor Master will know how to handle this curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010769
text: I should go see the Bokor Master, she's the expert on curses.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010770
text: The demons are planning to curse Fasika Plateau, you say?{nl}I see, I need to find a way to stop them from placing this curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010771
text: To curse an area as wide as Fasika Plateau, the demons would need to plant a few cursed objects throughout.{nl}They could very well have done this already.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010772
text: {nl}It's hard to tell what the cursed objects might be with the naked eye.{nl}You'll need to take the curse detecting orb I'm going to give you.{nl}The orb detects the energy of the cursed objects and will guide you towards them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010773
text: {nl}The Curse Detector, however, cannot distinguish between different types of curses.{nl}Besides, Fasika Plateau is a rather large area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010774
text: You're right.{nl}Regardless of the setbacks, the important thing is to find the cursed objects and stop the demons.{nl}Here, have the Curse Detector.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010775
text: {nl}Use the Curse Detector to find the cursed objects and bring them to me so I can destroy them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010776
text: There's no time to waste.{nl}We must stop Fasika Plateau from becoming a cursed land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010777
text: The energy coming from this broken piece of mirror...{nl}It's a curse of dissidence and conflict.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010778
text: {nl}I'll take care of the pieces of mirror.{nl}We may have stopped the curse, but this won't keep the demons from trying again...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010779
text: {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010780
text: That's... a ledger from the Kedora Merchant Alliance. And it's written in secret ink.{nl}Are you saying you found this at Genar Field?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010781
text: {nl}Let's see...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010782
text: {nl}First, I'm going to need the rest of the ledger.{nl}If that's okay, would you go back to Genar Field and find it for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010783
text: {nl}I'm afraid I have to stay and collect some things for the Alliance...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010784
text: Thank you.{nl}I'll give you a detector to find the rest of the ledger written in secret ink.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010785
text: Use the detector and it will lead you to the rest of the ledger.{nl}Go to where it points you and collect the remaining parts.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010786
text: I hope no part of the ledger has been damaged.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010787
text: You found the rest of the ledger. Thank you.{nl}You just took a lot of work out of our hands.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010788
text: It's going to be a while until I get more supplies, but I'm already out of Holy Powder.{nl}I can't go to Klaipeda myself, though, it would make me worry for the soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010789
text: Would you?{nl}Take my letter, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010790
text: {nl}As the Chaplain Master, I could never make you buy materials for me with your own money.{nl}Thake this letter to the Priest Master and he will give you the Holy Powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010791
text: Supplies are delayed, I see.{nl}Just a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010792
text: The Priest Master is getting some Holy Powder.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010793
text: Here you go.{nl}You can deliver this to the Chaplain Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010794
text: What great relief you brought me.{nl}This should last me for a good while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010795
text: You were cursed by a Dawn Maiden?{nl}Oh no, are you all right?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010796
text: That's a relief.{nl}There's no doubt the goddesses are looking over you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010797
text: {nl}Dawn Maiden curses aren't as strong as the ones cast by Nakis, but they seem based on the same principles.{nl}If only I could research their essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010798
text: Are you sure?{nl}But you were just cursed by a Dawn Maiden...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010799
text: {nl}Well, if you really are determined to find a way to break Naktis' curse...{nl}Just make sure you're careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010800
text: Come back if you feel it's too dangerous.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010801
text: So this is the essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010802
text: I'll start studying it immediately, hopefully soon I can find a way to break Naktis' curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010803
text: You're here again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010804
text: {nl}Although, you do look a litte... hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010805
text: {nl}Did something happen?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010806
text: You're looking for a way to soothe the Rabees and Honeybeans?{nl}Well, regular bees usually like the scent of Beaj flowers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010807
text: Rabees and Honeybeans are a little different, though.{nl}To soothe them, we will need to combine Beaj flowers and scented herbs to create a candle with the power of Goddess Austeja.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010808
text: You can easily find the Beaj flowers and scented herbs at Uskis Arable Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010809
text: I'll combine the flowers and the herbs and use the power of Goddess Asteja now to create the candle.{nl}It won't take long, just wait a moment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010810
text: Priest Raeli is making the candle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010811
text: The candle is complete.{nl}You only need to place it where the Rabees and Honeybeans live.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010812
text: Honeybeans and Rabees live mostly in Dina Bee Farm...{nl}Just place the candle in any area where you see them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010813
text: The effects won't be immediate.{nl}But the scent of the candle will help them calm down eventually, so don't worry too much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010814
text: Alright, if you really think your companion is so great, let's put it to the test.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010815
text: {nl}True companions stay loyal and fight together.{nl}When you're fighting a monster and your companion helps you win, that's when you really see what they're made of.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010816
text: {nl}I'll agree with you if you can defeat a monster stronger than you with your companion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010817
text: It's okay to give up, though.{nl}Don't let your companion get beat up just to prove something.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010818
text: Not too shabby, huh?{nl}Alright, you can brag all you want about your companion.{nl}I'll agree.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010819
text: That spirit again...{nl}I even sang them their favorite song, I don't know what happened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010820
text: {nl}Escanciu Village is nice and far, too.{nl}Maybe I should check the trumpet...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010821
text: Do you mean it? That would be great.{nl}The divine spirit in Escanciu Village loves the sound of this trumpet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010822
text: This is the score for the spirit's favorite song.{nl}Play this to the divine spirit, I'm sure they'll love it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010823
text: Just make sure to hit the notes right, the divine spirit of Escanciu Village is very sensitive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010824
text: I knew the Divine Spirit was gonna love that song.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010825
text: Are you saying there's an evil spirit in the Mokusul Chamber?{nl}Very well, I will find it and banish it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010826
text: If you say so, alright. Thank you.{nl}I will tell you how to drive the spirit away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010827
text: {nl}Use my evil spirit detector to find it, then trap it with the draining orb.{nl}You should make sure to trap the evil spirit as soon as you find it, or else it may escape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010828
text: And don't let your guard down after you find the spirit.{nl}Evil spirits are extremely agile and could attack when you least expect.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010829
text: Thanks to you those who lie in the Mokusul Chamber can rest in peace at last.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010830
text: I've taken on the work of Appraiser Master.{nl}Fedimian has always been a city where many visit, and so too are there many who request my identifying work.{nl}But what's more, because I've become the Appraiser Master even more people are requesting me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010831
text: Even though there's a lot of work for me to do here, I still receive requests from my clients for in-person identifications.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010832
text: {nl}When this happens, it's very difficult.{nl}I understand requesting in-person visits because of personal reasons but I also have a lot to do here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010833
text: Oh, I'm happy to hear that.{nl}If you help me, I'll teach you my identification techniques.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010834
text: {nl}After I became Appraiser Master, the Fencer Master and Orsha's Accessory Merchant, Jurus, sent me letters.{nl} Their positions keep them busy, so they requested that I make an in-person trip.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010835
text: {nl}The Fencer Master asked for identification on a family heirloom.{nl}She wants to sell her heirlooms to help the poor but she needs my certificate.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010836
text: {nl}Then, Jurus asked me to identify his shop's accessories.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010837
text: {nl}But after also becoming a Master I've sudden gotten busier and, after considering the rest of my work, I can't go.{nl}So, you see, please bring the Fencer Master's heirlooms and Orsha's accessories to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010838
text: {nl}If you do, I can identify them and also judge to see if I can issue certificates.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010839
text: The Fencer Master is in the Forest of Prayer, while the Accessory Merchant, Jurus, is in Orsha.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010840
text: That's the Fencer Master's heirloom..and Jurus' accessories too. {nl} Please give them to me. I'll try identifying them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010841
text: Wow.. both are such fine items.{nl}The Fencer Master's heirloom is well kept.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010842
text: {nl}The craftsmanship level of Jurus' accessories is quite high.{nl} Even if I compare it with accessories from the nobles and royals, I can barely notice a difference.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010843
text: {nl}I will now issue the quality certificates.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010844
text: The Appraiser Master is writing the quality certificates.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010845
text: To show my thanks for helping me, I want to teach you my identification skills, but there is still a lot of work for me to do.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010846
text: {nl}Please deliver these certificates to the Fencer Master and the Accessory Merchant, Jurus.{nl}I will prepare to teach you about identification skills on your return.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010847
text: The value of the Fencer Master's heirloom is so impressive that it's an item that can't be carelessly judged.{nl}And Jurus' accessories are so beautifully and exquisitely crafted that they can't be easily imitated.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010848
text: {nl}These items cannot be thoughtlessly degraded.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010849
text: Did you deliver the certificates?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010850
text: {nl}You did well in my place.{nl}As a way to relay you, I will teach you my techniques.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010851
text: If the fragment you're carrying is imbued with divine energy, it could very well be a relic.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010852
text: Allow me to have a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010853
text: Your fragment looks like a simple piece of a wand.{nl}I'm... not sure if there's any divine energy in it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010854
text: {nl}Although it could be that I'm simply not skilled enough to detect it yet.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010855
text: {nl}Oh, now that I think of it, I did see a few demons carrying around similar fragments.{nl}I didn't pay much attention to it then, but it would be good to investigate them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010856
text: {nl}If it's not too much to ask, would you retrieve a few of their fragments?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010857
text: I will be studying the fragment we have meanwhile.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010858
text: You brought the fragments.{nl}I can confirm whether they are related to each other or not now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010859
text: After gathering all the fragments I do feel a faint divine energy, like you said.{nl}If my guesses are correct, these fragments could belong to a destroyed relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010860
text: {nl}Destroying a holy relic like this can only be the work of Naktis or her subordinates.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010861
text: {nl}Unfortunately, Inea isn't sure about the fragments, either.{nl}They do seem to form the shape of a wand, but there is no such object on our list of recovered relics.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010862
text: {nl}I suppose it lost its power and value as a relic after being destroyed.{nl}And there are still many relics Inea hasn't recovered; she must have been unable to collect these fragments as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010863
text: {nl}Oh, but she did say something that could be useful.{nl}Apparently Priest Ruodell at the Grand Corridor has found a fragment similar to these.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010864
text: {nl}Take these two fragments and go see Priest Ruodell at the Grand Corridor.{nl}He can sense divine energy better than any priest. He may just find a connection between the fragments.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010865
text: You brought the wand fragments.{nl}Let me have a look, then.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010866
text: I found similar fragments inside the Main Chamber.{nl}The divine energy in them was so faint I nearly missed them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010867
text: {nl}I couldn't find any mention of the fragments in the order's list of recovered relics, however.{nl}They could belong to an old, forgotten relic.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010868
text: {nl}I was going to try and recover the remaining fragments and bring them back to the order.{nl}But it seems we already have all of them here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010869
text: {nl}First, I'm going to use divine power to examine the fragments.{nl}If it's not too much to ask, would you handle any demons nearby?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010870
text: I'm trying to see whether the relic can be restored, but it could take some time.{nl}Have you cleared the area of demons?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010871
text: Fortunately I happen to have all the tools I need; I believe I can restore the relic to its original shape.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010872
text: I did restore the relic using my tools and some divine power, but it still feels unstable.{nl}I suppose it's inevitable, considering it was already destroyed once.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010873
text: {nl}I believe Priest Goda is preparing a magic circle at the Sanctuary.{nl}I heard he was still missing an instrument to finish the magic circle...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010874
text: {nl}Would you take this wand to Priest Goda so he may use it for the magic circle?{nl}It may be a little unstable, but it does contain divine energy and I'm sure it can be used for the circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010875
text: Unstable as it is, I don't think the wand would be considered a proper relic by the order.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010876
text: {nl}I believe it will be put to better use by helping Priest Goda finish his magic circle.{nl}I suppose I'll be hearing from the order later...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010877
text: Have you delivered the wand yet?{nl}You ought to hurry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010878
text: So this is the wand.{nl}I heard about it from the other priests.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010879
text: As you know, I'm creating a magic circle to deal with the demons in the Sanctuary.{nl}It's a magic circle meant to weaken the power of the demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010880
text: {nl}I haven't been able to finish it, however.{nl}I'm missing an instrument I can use to complete the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010881
text: {nl}The wand you brought looks a little unstable, like it could easily break.{nl}But I suppose the divine energy could preserve it for a while.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010882
text: {nl}Would you please complete the magic circle for me?{nl}I'm afraid the demons would notice if I tried to move there myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010883
text: After the magic circle is completed, I'll make sure to find another instrument to replace the wand.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010884
text: You finished the magic circle! I already feel the demons becoming weaker.{nl}Thank you so much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010885
text: Have you seen a type of monster that looks like a tombstone? They're called Burialers.{nl}I discovered that these monsters were created by combining a tombstone and a spirit through evil energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010886
text: {nl}I only wish I could free those poor spirits trapped in the tombstones and guide them to eternal rest...{nl}But I was so invested in the curse, I'm afraid there is no more strength left in me now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010887
text: {nl}Would you be so kind as to purify the Burialers for me while I recover?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010888
text: I will give you the holy water you'll need for the purification.{nl}To see the effects, you must use the holy water only after the Burialer has been weakened.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010889
text: I'll be counting on you while I recover my health.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010890
text: You purified all the Burialers in the area.{nl}I feel a little better now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010891
text: {nl}I can deal with the other Burialers from now on.{nl}Thank you for your help.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010892
text: Edward

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010893
text: Oh... Hello there. My name's Edward.{nl}I was just on my way to tend to some important issues.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010894
text: {nl}Unfortunately, I was attacked by monsters on the road and they took all my equipment.{nl}Luckily I escaped in one piece, but I'm going to need a weapon for my protection.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010895
text: {nl}If that's alright, would you find me my weapons?{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010896
text: I'm missing a dagger and a bow.{nl}They have my name carved on them, so you'll know they're mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010897
text: Thank you.{nl}I really can't move around without my weapons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010898
text: You're something else.{nl}Thank you very much.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010899
text: The truth is... my daughter suffers from a rare disease.{nl}I did see a priest who I heard had cured a child suffering from the same illness, but...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010900
text: {nl}The priest says he cannot cure my daughter right away.{nl}He needs a very particular kind of flower called Davelae, is what he said.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010901
text: {nl}That's the reason I came all the way here, you see...{nl}I heard from a farmer not long ago that an unknown flower had bloomed where the Tamas live.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010902
text: {nl}I want to know if this flower is the one I'm looking for... Could you perhaps bring it to me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010903
text: I would go myself, but I think I sprained an ankle earlier when the monsters attacked.{nl}I saw you handle those monsters and I thought this task wouldn't be too much of a trouble for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010904
text: I only wish this flower is the one I'm looking for...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010905
text: I don't think this is a Davelae flower.{nl}It looks too different from what I heard...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010906
text: {nl}I looked all around for this flower; I don't think I'll find it here.{nl}I guess I'll have to keep going up towards Shaton Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010907
text: {nl}I'm sorry for the trouble...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010908
text: Oh, hello, nice to see you here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010909
text: {nl}I'm afraid I was, yet again, attacked by a group of monsters.{nl}They were too many to handle with my weapons alone, but fortunately I had some paralyzing poison saved up for an emergency.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010910
text: {nl}I barely managed to escape; I was just catching my breath right now.{nl}I think I'm going to need more poison if I want to keep looking for that flower...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010911
text: {nl}I asked the tenants if there was any herb around with paralyzing effects, but it seems not.{nl}The only thing that does have those effects is Cyst fluid.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010912
text: {nl}If it was a herb I could easily pick it myself... but a monster is a little too much for me.{nl}If that's okay, can I ask you to collect some Cyst fluid for me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010913
text: I'll give you an empty flask.{nl}Please collect the Cysts' fluid in it after you defeat them.{nl}Thank you for your kindness.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010914
text: I do see a few Cysts over there... but I wouldn't dare go near them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010915
text: Thank you!{nl}I can coat my arrows with the fluid now and get moving.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010916
text: {nl}This... Cyst fluid smells awful, now that I notice...{nl}I wonder if that's why it paralyzes other monsters...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010917
text: Well, I'm still a little sore, but I'm all set to start moving again.{nl}I looked all around the farm but the Davelae flower was nowhere to be seen... the tenants had never heard about it, either.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010918
text: {nl}I hear this road leads to the Reservoir, so that's the path I'm planning to take now.{nl}If you're going in the same direction, would you care to join me?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010919
text: Very well, I'll get going then.{nl}I have my poisoned arrows now, so I can deal with a monster or two.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010920
text: I'm afraid I'll have to owe you another favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010921
text: {nl}It seems the Cyst fluid I was going to use for poison has attracted the monsters.{nl}As I was running away from them I accidentally broke the flask.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010922
text: {nl}Suddenly a whole horde of them came running.{nl}Sigh... My wounds haven't healed yet and now I'm out of poison. I'm in a bit of a tough spot, but I have to make it through.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010923
text: {nl}This is nothing, really, compared to the pain my daughter must be going through... I need to keep moving.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010924
text: You must have been worried for me.{nl}After having depended on you so many times...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010925
text: My body is starting to hurt all over.{nl}I need to take a Melbania antidote and keep looking for the Davelae flower...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010926
text: Thank you...!{nl}This should be enough to cure the symptoms.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010927
text: I'm starting to feel better now.{nl}Oh, and also... I asked a steward here and he said he's seen a flower that looks like the Davelae.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010928
text: {nl}I want to keep moving right away... but in this condition, I don't think I can get too far...{nl}If that's alright, would you bring me the flower he mentioned?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010929
text: He said he saw it near the Tvirta Reservoir Embankment.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010930
text: I have a feeling this will be the flower I'm looking for.{nl}If it isn't... Well, I'll just have to keep looking...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010931
text: Ooohh...! It looks... exactly like the Davelae...!{nl}I've been searching for this flower for so long... I can't even remember when I started.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010932
text: {nl}My daughter can finally be healthy...{nl}Thank you... thank you so much!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010933
text: {nl}I need to return to my daughter right away.{nl}Thank you for finding the flower... I'm forever grateful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010934
text: Will I finally find the flower here...?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010935
text: So many thoughts run through my head when I'm wandering around.{nl}Most of all I think of my daughter...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010936
text: It looks like I'm all out of food for Jareth.{nl}But I can't ask the commander... I need to find some food around here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010937
text: {nl}I don't think I've recovered enough to do it on my own, though...{nl}Would you find me some meat or something I can feed to Jareth?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010938
text: {nl}You can probably hunt some Cockats around here, that should work.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010939
text: You'll see plenty of Cockats in this region.{nl}Thanks for the help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010940
text: I'm going to need a lot of meat, considering how much Jareth eats.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010941
text: I think this should be enough.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010942
text: There's a suspicious trap here.{nl}Remove it?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010943
text: Are you saying the suspicious trap you found was made to attract monsters?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010944
text: {nl}That has to have been set up by Evoniphon.{nl}Although I'd never heard of a trap like that.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010945
text: {nl}We would be in big trouble if one us was caught in that trap.{nl}Thank you for letting us know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010946
text: I can finally move now, but I'm still really tired and dizzy.{nl}I was wondering if you could bring me some honey from the Pendrosiums.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010947
text: Wow, thank you, I appreciate it.{nl}But the thing is, you can't just catch the Pendrosiums to get to the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010948
text: {nl}There's this scent I use after tiring them out a little.{nl}The Pendrosiums are really sensitive to it; a little whiff and they're knocked out. That's when you get the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010949
text: {nl}Just put the honey in bottle.{nl}There's plenty of Pendrosiums wandering around so they shouldn't be hard to find.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010950
text: I can handle the hunger, but I can't stand being this dizzy...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010951
text: You filled it all the way up!{nl}Thank you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010952
text: I don't know if the Hunters think all these demons are gathering here because of Evoniphon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010953
text: {nl}But right now there are just too many demons... I can barely move around.{nl} I'm especially worried about the Infrogalas Mages.{nl}They're too many for me to handle on my own.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010954
text: It's dangerous out there, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010955
text: I really think something needs to be done about the Infrogalas Mages.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010956
text: These demons just keep coming back, don't they?{nl}Still, I feel a little better now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010957
text: {nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010958
text: I just don't feel quite safe yet, you know.{nl}The energy left behind by the Brambles is still affecting Sirdgela Forest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010959
text: {nl}And if the monsters come all the way to Viltis Forest, then there's no way we can stop them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010960
text: {nl}On the road leading to Sirdgela Forest there's a place called Zvalge Forest Way.{nl}Some time ago I installed a few devices there to stop the demons from advancing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010961
text: {nl}The monsters didn't let me carry on though, and the devices were never activated.{nl}If only I can activate them now, we wouldn't have to worry about the monsters for a while...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010962
text: Thank you so much for helping!{nl}The blocking devices are little tricky to activate, though, so let me explain.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010963
text: {nl}I installed the four devices underground, so you won't see them at first.{nl}The orb will react when it's near the place where they're buried, so you'll know how to find them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010964
text: {nl}Once you find the devices, you need to turn on all four.{nl}They'll shut down after a while, so you'll have to be quick here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010965
text: {nl}Only after all the devices are on can they be activated.{nl}There will be monsters around, so be careful.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010966
text: If you manage to activate the devices, it will keep the monsters of Sirdgela Forest from advancing here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010967
text: I'm glad you could activate the devices, that's a big relief to hear.{nl}Thank you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010968
text: I believe I've become a little sensitive recently.{nl}I have a strange feeling.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010969
text: {nl}You've probably noticed all the Loftlems wandering around.{nl}I can't tell why, but the way they're moving seems a little strange.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010970
text: {nl}I feel as if I'm being watched... I want to make sure, but I'm afraid they will notice if I try to investigate.{nl}Would you face a few Loftlems and bring me anything particular you may find?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010971
text: Thank you.{nl}My intuition rarely fails, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010972
text: {nl}Make sure to bring back anything odd you may find.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010973
text: I'm also curious to know what the Loftlems' structure is like.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010974
text: So the Loftlems are carrying around strange devices, you say?{nl}Let me have a look.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010975
text: Hmm, I'm not sure about the device, but it seems to record images through the monsters' eyes.{nl}It also contains some demon energy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010976
text: {nl}Why would the Loftlems be recording images... And the demon energy... what does this mean?{nl}There may not be a way to eradicate all the Loftlems, but we cannot let them use these devices.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010977
text: {nl}We must do something about the demon energy.{nl}I do have an idea; would you be willing to help?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010978
text: I'm thinking we could use something called a Hallucination Stone on the Loftlems.{nl}First, we're going to need Liverwort spores to make the stone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010979
text: {nl}But remember not to touch live Liverwort.{nl}The vacant lot south of Pakridy Entrance has plenty of dead Liverwort to collect, so I advise you to go there.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010980
text: With the Hallucination Stones, we can make the Loftlems record false images.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010981
text: That's quite a lot your brought... thank you.{nl}I'll get started on the stone right away.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010982
text: The Hallucination Stones are complete.{nl}Not it only needs to be buried in the grounds near the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010983
text: {nl}Could I ask you to take the Stones and bury them for me?{nl}I'm afraid the monsters will suspect if they notice me doing anything unusual.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010984
text: You may bury them in three different spots along the road.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010985
text: I just wonder why they are collecting these images.{nl}They're monsters, what are they possibly doing with them...?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010986
text: I ought to investigate this further and alert the order.{nl}I'm extremely thankful for your help.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010987
text: Hang on... I can't let the Dico Tomb Thieves find those chests, though.{nl}They get a hold of them, my superiors are gonna kill me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010988
text: {nl}Oh, I got it! I can just make a few fake chests, they'll never know!{nl}If you got any time on your hands, do you wanna find me some stuff I can put inside?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010989
text: I'll be here making the chests.{nl}There's a lot of Moyas around here, maybe you can get some rocks or something from them, that'd be perfect.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010990
text: I hid everything at the Gerove Workshop Site; put the fake chests in a place where they can see it, too.{nl}I'm guessing they'll think they're ours and steal them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010991
text: Woah, yeah, that's more than enough.{nl}Thanks a lot.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010992
text: I'm making the fake chests to fool those Dico guys.{nl}Can't let them get their hands on the stuff we have over at the Gerove Workshop Site, ya know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010993
text: {nl}I'm thinking I should get some "treasures" to plant around the fake chests, too...{nl}Have you seen those Saltisdaughter wands?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010994
text: {nl}They have some sort of crystals at the end that look hella expensive.{nl}Can you bring me some of those crystals?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010995
text: Alright, I'm counting on you.{nl}I'll be here preparing the rest of the chests.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010996
text: I bet you those guys are just gonna take the chests without even looking inside.{nl}It's not like they have the guts to stay more than a few minutes, anyway.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010997
text: Woah... Are you sure these came from the monster wands?{nl}Bet I could make some nice cash selling this stuff in the market... Thanks, anyway.{nl}I'll take care of the rest.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010998
text: Guard Horton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_010999
text: Do you see the flooded district below the tower?{nl}There's something shiny there and I'm really curious to know what it is.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011000
text: {nl}I think it might be a gem, but my boss is always watching so I can't go down and check.{nl}And I wouldn't dare go down there by myself with all the monsters around.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011001
text: {nl}If you don't mind, would you go and see what it is?{nl}If it really is a gem, I'll make sure to give you a proper reward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011002
text: I think there may be more than one gem, so please look carefully.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011003
text: Sometimes the guards will find antiques in the petrified city.{nl}It could very well be possible that there are treasures hidden at the Flooded District, too.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011004
text: So the shiny object was an old magic circle?{nl}I don't recall hearing about a magic circle ever existing in the Flooded District.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011005
text: {nl}I'm guessing it was a magic circle someone started to make a long time ago.{nl}Seeing as it was abandoned, it can't have been very important.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011006
text: With the way the world is today, we don't get many supplies coming in.{nl}We're constantly short on rations, so the soldiers often need to get food from around the area.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011007
text: {nl}Do you see those chests under the tower{nl}That's where we hide our emergency food supplies.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011008
text: {nl}We can easily see who accesses them from the top of the tower, and the monsters don't know about them, either.{nl}If that's alright, would you bring me a bag of food from there?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011009
text: {nl}I didn't have anything for breakfast and I'm a little hungry now.{nl}I'm afraid I can't leave my post... Please do me the favor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011010
text: Any chest is fine.{nl}I'll warn the other guards.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011011
text: We find these emergency food supplies useful when our rations are late.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011012
text: This is more than enough!{nl}I'll make sure to share with the other soldiers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011013
text: Guard Manderson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011014
text: As you may know, this entire area was petrified by Ruklys' curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011015
text: {nl}Many objects lost here are now inside the stomachs of monsters.{nl}Rumor has it they gobbled up a few expensive items as well.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011016
text: {nl}Don't ask me how those things are still alive when everything else turned to stone.{nl}In any case, I would really like to find out if the rumors are true, but with my superior right in front...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011017
text: {nl}If you don't mind, would you check for me?{nl}The Coastal Fortress isn't very far...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011018
text: If you find anything, make sure to bring it to me immediately.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011019
text: The Coastal Fortress may be dangerous, but who knows what kind of treasures are still lost there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011020
text: These are some heavy pouches you brought!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011021
text: There doesn't seem to be anything good in here.{nl}There's a ring, but it looks old.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011022
text: {nl}Oh, there's something engraved in it.{nl}It's a little hard to read...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011023
text: {nl}Lyshys Beacon Mound?{nl}That's the name of a place...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011024
text: {nl}I wonder what it means.{nl}Would you go there and check?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011025
text: Lyshys Beacon Mound is in the Coastal Fortress.{nl}The ring could be a sort of key, so make sure to take it with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011026
text: If you find any treasures, please don't tell anyone.{nl}We're bound to get in trouble, especially if any robbers find out about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011027
text: So it was only a meeting place for an illegal trade?{nl}That's very far from what I imagined...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011028
text: {nl}No treasure, either...{nl}It doesn't sound like much, does it? I should let it go.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011029
text: {nl}Oh, but do keep this a secret from Rofdel and the other guards.{nl}I wouldn't want them to misunderstand.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011030
text: Coming all the way up at the start of my shift is the worst.{nl}I'm tired and it's so dangerous out here.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011031
text: Sometimes our rations arrive late and we resort to emergency food supplies.{nl}Of course, the place where we keep them is a secret.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011032
text: I heard some thieves were looking for expensive items in this area.{nl}Even the guards sometimes find antiques there, can you imagine?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011033
text: The hardest thing for me is climbing all the way to the top of the tower.{nl}I just envy the people who work at the bottom, that's all.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011034
text: I ate some Melatinun meat on my way here, but it must have been toxic.{nl}The monsters took all my food too when they stole my weapons, you see.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011035
text: {nl}I've been surviving on any scraps of food I've been able to find, but I really shouldn't have eaten that Melatinun meat.{nl}I did ask around and it seems the Melania herbs that grow nearby are detoxifying.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011036
text: {nl}I need to gather all the strength I can and go find the Davelae, but in this condition...{nl}If you can, please bring me some Melania...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011037
text: Welcome.{nl}Oh, I don't believe I've seen you before, adventurer.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011038
text: {nl}There may be few of us, but we are working hard to stop the demons.{nl}That said, we can always use the help of any brave adventurers.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011039
text: {nl}If you enter this mission, you must protect the Divine Torch from the demons.{nl}This may sound simple, but be careful, as the demons become stronger and stronger over time.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011040
text: {nl}Once in a while you will also see a treasure chest appear; be sure to open it.{nl}Now, if you wish to enter the mission, just give me the word.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011041
text: This is a warning to all adventurers attempting to enter the Narcon Prison!{nl}The Royal Army has reported that this dungeon is currently inhabited by large numbers of demons.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011042
text: There was an unidentified magic piece discovered near Gaudezi Altar.{nl} After talking with Maras, go find Lamar.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011043
text: Report to the Cleric Master, who manages the sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011044
text: Find the Cleric Master and tell her about the sanctuary!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011045
text: Making the offer to the sanctuary...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011046
text: I'll donate 10 silver.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011047
text: Collecting scroll...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011048
text: Good Use For a Wand (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011049
text: Good Use For a Wand (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011050
text: I'll think about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011051
text: Good Use For a Wand (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011052
text: Good Use For a Wand (4)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011053
text: Good Use For a Wand (5)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011054
text: Good Use For a Wand (6)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011055
text: I'll complete the magic circle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011056
text: You can complete the circle yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011057
text: To the Path of Eternal Rest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011058
text: I have no time to help, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011059
text: Anything for the Daughter (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011060
text: Anything for the Daughter (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011061
text: An Awful Smell (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011062
text: That's nasty.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011063
text: An Awful Smell (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011064
text: I don't really want to go with you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011065
text: The Worth of a Flower (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011066
text: You don't look so good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011067
text: I have nothing else to say.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011068
text: The Worth of a Flower (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011069
text: For the Lack of Better Nourishment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011070
text: I can find some meat for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011071
text: It's a Trap! Or Is It...?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011072
text: I'll get rid of it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011073
text: I don't want to touch anything suspicious.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011074
text: Revitalized

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011075
text: Sorry, I'm allergic to honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011076
text: Ensuring Safety (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011077
text: I'll sort it out for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011078
text: I'm sure you can do this on your own.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011079
text: Ensuring Safety (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011080
text: I don't think you need to worry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011081
text: Activating...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011082
text: We're Being Watched (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011083
text: It's probably just a feeling.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011084
text: We're Being Watched (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011085
text: Whatever you need, just let me know.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011086
text: We're Being Watched (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011087
text: I can go and bury them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011088
text: I think you can bury them yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011089
text: It's Only a Stone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011090
text: Useful Deception

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011091
text: Outstanding Eyesight

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011092
text: Emergency Food Supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011093
text: Treasure Hunting (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011094
text: Treasure Hunting (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011095
text: Defeat the Incoming Demons

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011096
text: You can now use the Uphill Defense Mission to obtain various items!{nl}Press the F5 key to read the details in the Quest info window!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011097
text: Demons on the Move

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011098
text: You can now use Hunting Grounds!{nl}Press the F5 key to read the details in the Quest info window!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011099
text: Deciphering the Mysterious Writings (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011100
text: Let me show you the copy so you can read it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011101
text: Deciphering the Mysterious Writings (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011102
text: Do you have anything in mind?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011103
text: I have other issues to tend to, sorry.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011104
text: Deciphering the Mysterious Writings (3)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011105
text: We must find them by any means we have.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011106
text: In an Unexpected Place

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011107
text: You should go find it yourself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011108
text: The Chaplain Master's Errand

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011109
text: I can go get the holy powder myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011110
text: Explaining about the Chaplain Master's situation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011111
text: Origins of the Curse

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011112
text: I can get the Dawn Maiden essence.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011113
text: I feel like resting for a while now.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011114
text: Angry Bees (1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011115
text: How can we make the bees calm down?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011116
text: That doesn't sound like much of a problem.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011117
text: Angry Bees (2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011118
text: I'll place the candle down myself.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011119
text: My Best Buddy

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011120
text: I'll prove it to you!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011121
text: Appease the Divine Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011122
text: I can try and appease the spirit for you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011123
text: Why don't you do it yourself?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011124
text: Eternal Rest Interrupted

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011125
text: I'll find this evil spirit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011126
text: Quality Certificate [Appraiser Advancement](1)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011127
text: Quality Certificate [Appraiser Advancement](2)

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011128
text: Deliver the Quality Certificate

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011129
text: Okay, I will return with the items.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011130
text: Defeat the Meleech and %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011131
text: Collect Well-Cut Wood

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011132
text: Farmer Druva wants to build a scarecrow that will drive out the monsters. Collect well-cut wood as material for the scarecrow.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011133
text: You've collected all the well-cut wood. Return to Farmer Druva.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011134
text: Upon touching the altar, the Pilgrim's Spirit appeared and started to call in nearby monsters. Defeat all the monsters and try talking again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011135
text: Ask the Blacksmith in Klaipeda About Adhesives

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011136
text: Ask the blacksmith in Klaipeda about adhesives to restore the tombstone.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011137
text: Defeat White Dandels at the Resident Quarter and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011138
text: Defeat Red Deadborn Scaps and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011139
text: Defeat Blue Flasks and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011140
text: Inspect the Mysterious Trap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011141
text: A mysterious trap has been discovered in Glade Hillroad, located in Juklas Sunny Place. Inspect the trap before someone gets hurt.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011142
text: Check the Suspicious Wand Fragment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011143
text: There is a suspicious wand fragment on the ground.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011144
text: The wand fragment reacted, attracting nearby monsters. Defeat all the monsters!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011145
text: Find Someone to Ask About the Wand Fragment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011146
text: You have obtained a fragment exuding a faint divine energy. Find a priest who can help you analyze the fragment. Start with Priest Aden at the Main Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011147
text: Defeat the Monsters Attracted by the Fragment's Reaction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011148
text: Priest Aden seems to have finished analyzing the fragment. Talk to priest Aden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011149
text: Obtain Another Fragment From the Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011150
text: Priest Aden has seen the monsters carry around a fragment similar to the one you found. Obtain the fragment from the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011151
text: You have obtained another fragment from the monsters. Bring it to Priest Aden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011152
text: Defeat Nearby Monsters and Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011153
text: Priest Aden seems to have something to say about the fragment. Talk to Priest Aden.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011154
text: Go to the Grand Corridor and find Priest Ruodell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011155
text: Priest Ruodell seems to have something to say. Talk to  Priest Ruodell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011156
text: Priest Ruodell believes that the divine energy released by analyzing the wand fragment could attract nearby monsters. Defeat any monsters around to ensure you are both safe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011157
text: You have defeated enough monsters in the area. Talk to Priest Ruodell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011158
text: Priest Ruodell seems to have restored the fragments now. Talk to Priest Ruodell.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011159
text: Priest Ruodell believes the restored wand will be useful to Priest Goda, who is preparing a magic circle at the Sanctuary. Talk to Priest Goda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011160
text: Priest Goda seems to have something to say. Talk to Priest Goda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011161
text: Complete the Unfinished Magic Circle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011162
text: Priest Goda has asked you to use the wand to complete his magic circle. The divine energy in the circle could attract nearby demons who will try to destroy it, so defeat any incoming demons and protect the magic circle until it is complete.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011163
text: The magic circle is now complete. Talk to Priest Goda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011164
text: Priest Roana is looking concerned about something. Talk to Priest Roana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011165
text: Purify the Burialers

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011166
text: Priest Roana wants to guide the spirits trapped in the Burialers to the path of eternal rest. Use Priest Roana's holy water on the Burialers after reducing their HP to 30% or less to purify them.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011167
text: You have purified all the nearby Burialers. Talk to Priest Roana.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011168
text: Talk to Edward

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011169
text: Edward seems heavily concerned about something. Talk to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011170
text: Recover Edward's Equipment

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011171
text: Edward has had his equipment stolen by monsters. Recover Edward's equipment from the hands of the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011172
text: You have recovered all of Edward's equipment. Bring it to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011173
text: Defeat Orange Lizardmen and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011174
text: Defeat Rambear Archers and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011175
text: Edward seems to have something to say. Talk to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011176
text: Collect the Unknown Flower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011177
text: Edward heard from the locals that there is an unknown flower growing at the place where the Tamas live. Collect the unknown flower and bring it to Edward so he can confirm whether it is the Davelae flower he is searching for.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011178
text: You have collected the flower mentioned by Edward. Bring it back to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011179
text: Edward looks upset. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011180
text: Collect Cyst Fluid

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011181
text: Edward is out of poison to use on the monsters and unable to move. He found out that Cyst fluid possesses the same effects as the poison and has asked you to collect some for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011182
text: You have collected the Cyst fluid. Bring the flask of fluid back to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011183
text: Edward seems ready to keep moving. Talk to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011184
text: Protect Edward from the Monsters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011185
text: You found Edward being attacked by monsters on the way to the Reservoir. Defeat the monsters and protect Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011186
text: You have rescued Edward from the monsters. Talk to Edward and see if he is alright.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011187
text: Edward looks frighteningly pale. Talk to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011188
text: Collect Melbania Herbs

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011189
text: Edward became poisoned after eating some Melatinun meat. Find some Melbania herbs to help Edward detoxify.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011190
text: You have collected the Melbania herbs. Bring them to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011191
text: Edward looks excited about something. Talk to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011192
text: Collect the Rare Flower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011193
text: Edward heard from Steward Valen that a rare flower very similar to the Davelae has bloomed nearby. Collect this flower and bring it to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011194
text: You have collected the rare flower. Return to Edward.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011195
text: Hunter Reina seems to have something to say. Talk to Reina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011196
text: Collect Cockat Meat

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011197
text: Reina is running out of food for Jareth and would like some Cockat meat to feed him. Defeat the Cockats and collect their meat.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011198
text: You have collected the Cockat meat. Bring it to Hunter Reina.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011199
text: Defeat Green Cockats and Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011200
text: Check the Trap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011201
text: There is a trap lying out in plain sight. Have a look at it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011202
text: The trap was activated and released a strong smell that attracted nearby monsters. Defeat the incoming monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011203
text: Find a Hunter to Ask About the Trap

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011204
text: The trap you found seems extremely dangerous. Find Hunter Reina and talk to her about the trap.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011205
text: Hunter Bastille seems eager about something. Talk to Hunter Bastille.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011206
text: Obtain Honey From the Pendrosiums

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011207
text: Hunter Bastille has asked you to collect honey from nearby Pendrosiums. Make sure the Pendrosiums' HP is at 50% or lower before using  Bastille's scent on them to collect the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011208
text: You have filled a whole bottle with the honey. Return to Hunter Bastille and deliver the honey.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011209
text: Monk Chad is looking a little uneasy. Ask him about what is going on.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011210
text: Defeat the Infrogalas Mages

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011211
text: Monk Chad says the other monks are having trouble moving around because of all the Infrogalas Mages. Defeat any Infrogalas Mages nearby.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011212
text: You have defeated a few Infrogalas Mages nearby. Talk to Monk Chad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011213
text: Defeat the %s Wandering Nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011214
text: Monk Chad still looks rather uneasy. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011215
text: Activate the Blocking Devices

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011216
text: Take the orbs given by Monk Chad and activate the blocking devices near Zvalge Forest Way. To do so, you need to first find the devices and turn on all four of them, then interact with them again to activate the devices. At the same time, you will need to defeat any nearby monsters to protect the devices from their attacks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011217
text: You have activated all the blocking devices now. Report back to Monk Chad.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011218
text: Monk Jones is looking around restlessly. Ask him if anything is wrong.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011219
text: Defeat the Loftlems

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011220
text: Monk Jones feels like the Loftlems are observing him and the camp. Defeat the Loftlems and report back on anything suspicious you may find.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011221
text: The eyes of the Loftlems look a little strange. Return to Monk Jones and talk to him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011222
text: Defeat Loftlems and Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011223
text: Monk Jones looks heavily worried about something. Talk to Monk Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011224
text: Collect Liverwort Spores

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011225
text: Monk Jones has asked you to collect some Liverwort spores to make a Hallucination Stone to use on the Loftlems. Collect the Liverwort spores and bring them to Monk Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011226
text: You have collected the Liverwort spores. Return to Monk Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011227
text: Monk Jones' Hallucination Stone seems to be complete now. Talk to Monk Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011228
text: Bury the Hallucination Stone Nearby

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011229
text: Monk Jones needs the Hallucination Stone buried around the camp to prevent the monsters from spying on him. Bury the Hallucination Stone nearby as instructed by Monk Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011230
text: You have buried the Hallucination Stone. Report back to Monk Jones.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011231
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas seems worried about something. Talk to Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011232
text: Collect Sparkling Stones

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011233
text: Rudolfas is making fake chests to trick the Dico Grave Robbers and has asked you to find something to fill them with. Collect some sparkling stones from the Moyas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011234
text: You have collected the sparkling stones. Bring them to Grave Robber Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011235
text: Collect %s from the Moyas

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011236
text: Collect Crystal Fragments

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011237
text: Grave Robber Rudolfas needs a few objects to plant around the fake chests. Defeat a few Saltisdaughters and collect crystal fragments from their wands.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011238
text: You have collected plenty of crystal fragments. Bring them to Rudolfas.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011239
text: Collect %s from Saltisdaughters

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011240
text: Talk to Guard Horton

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011241
text: Guard Horton is attentively looking at something. Ask him about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011242
text: Check the Flooded District
