name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011243
text: Guard Horton is sure he can see something shining in the Flooded District. Go and check what it is for him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011244
text: The shining object was an old magic circle. Report back to Guard Horton and tell him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011245
text: Guard Horton seems to have something to say. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011246
text: Retrieve Emergency Food Supplies

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011247
text: Guard Horton is very hungry and has asked you to bring him some emergency food supplies. Retrieve some food supplies for Guard Horton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011248
text: You have obtained the emergency food supplies. Bring them to Guard Horton.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011249
text: Talk to Guard Manderson

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011250
text: Guard Manderson seems to have something to say. Talk to Guard Manderson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011251
text: Retrieve the Valuable Objects

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011252
text: Guard Manderson believes the monsters at the Coastal Fortress are carrying around some very valuable objects. Defeat the monsters and retrieve the objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011253
text: You have collected a few heavy bags from the monsters nearby. Bring the bags to Guard Manderson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011254
text: Collect %s from the Minos

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011255
text: Guard Manderson seems to have found something inside the bags. Talk to Guard Manderson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011256
text: Investigate Lyshys Beacon Mound

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011257
text: Guard Manderson believes there might be something at the region mentioned on the ring he found, so he wants you to go and investigate. Go to Lyshys Beacon Mound and see what you can find.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011258
text: It looks like the writings on the ring were about an illegal trade. Report back to Guard Manderson.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011259
text: Find the Saalus Convent

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011260
text: You can now participate in a simple tutorial about the Uphill Defense Mission.{nl}Feel free to take this quest if you are unfamiliar with this mission.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011261
text: You are now allowed to play the Uphill Defense Mission to receive various reward items.{nl}{nl}Start by talking to Sister Lhasa at the Saalus Convent.{nl}Type

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011262
text: in the chat window to see the location and type of mission, as well as the number of daily entries.{nl}{nl}First, find the Saalus Convent and speak with Sister Lhasa.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011263
text: Find the Hunting Grounds

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011264
text: You can now participate in a simple tutorial about Hunting Grounds.{nl}Feel free to take this quest if you are unfamiliar with Hunting Grounds.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011265
text: You are now allowed to play on Hunting Grounds and obtain the special equipment they offer.{nl}{nl}Hunting grounds exist only in certain regions and help you raise your character faster, as well as obtain unidentified items.{nl}Check the Hunting Grounds icons on the Mini Map or World Map to see their locations.{nl}{nl}First, go to Gytis Settlement Area and find the Hunting Grounds.{nl}Then, interact with the notice board in front of the Hunting Grounds to enter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011266
text: Deciphering the Mysterious Writings

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011267
text: Talk to Barte About the Writings on the Tombstone

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011268
text: Barte isn't sure about the writings on the tombstone. She says the Sage Master is known for being a very erudite person and advises you to go see him instead. Go to Knidos Jungle and talk to the Sage Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011269
text: The Sage Master seems to have finished deciphering the writings. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011270
text: The Sage Master says that the demons have planted a series of cursed objects at Fasika Plateau in hopes of turning the area into a cursed land. The Sage Master suggests you should see the Bokor Master to find a way to deal with the curse. Talk to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011271
text: The Bokor Master seems to have figured out a way to thwart the demons' plans. Ask her about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011272
text: Find the Cursed Objects Using the Curse Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011273
text: The Bokor Master says it can be hard to tell what the cursed objects might be. Instead, she believes they can be found with a curse detecting orb. There's no way for the Bokor Master to know what type of curse it is, however, so the curse detector may not work properly. Go to Fasika Plateau and use the curse detector to find the cursed objects.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011274
text: The Entire Region of Fasika Plateau

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011275
text: You have collected all the cursed objects in Fasika Plateau. Take them to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011276
text: Merrisa seems surprised that you found something from the Kedora Alliance at Genar Field. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011277
text: Find the Kedora Alliance Ledge Using the Detector

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011278
text: Merrisa has asked you to find the Kedora Alliance ledger. Go to Genar Field and use the detector to find it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011279
text: All Over Genar Field

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011280
text: You have found the Kedora Alliance's ledger. Talk to Merrisa.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011281
text: The Chaplain Master seems to need something. Talk to the Chaplain Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011282
text: Obtain the Holy Powder

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011283
text: The Chaplain Master ran our of the holy powder needed to bless the soldiers of Dvasia Peak. He requests you to obtain some holy powder from the Priest Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011284
text: You have obtained the holy powder from the Priest Master. Deliver it to the Chaplain Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011285
text: Talk to Priest Daram.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011286
text: Obtain Dawn Maiden Essence

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011287
text: Priest Daram wants to find out more about Naktis' curse by studying the essence of Dawn Maidens. Collect some Dawn Maiden essence for her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011288
text: You have collected the Dawn Maiden essence. Deliver it to Priest Daram.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011289
text: Defeat Dawn Maidens and Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011290
text: Angry Bees

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011291
text: Ask Priest Raeli about the way to soothe the angry Rabees and Honeybeans at the Dina Bee Farm.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011292
text: Obtain the Materials for the Candle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011293
text: Priest Raeli believes a scented candle made with the power of Goddess Austeja could help relieve the angry Rabees and Honeybeans. Find some fragrant herbs and Beaj flowers to make the candle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011294
text: You have collected all the materials for the candle. Talk to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011295
text: Priest Raeli has completed the candle. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011296
text: Place the Candle

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011297
text: Place the scented candle near the Rabees and Honeybeans.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011298
text: You have placed the candle around the monsters. Return to Priest Raeli.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011299
text: The Hackapell Master doesn't look too convinced by your companion. Talk to the Hackapell Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011300
text: Prove Yourself to the Hackapell Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011301
text: The Hackapell Master believes that the best companion is the one that fights strong opponents together with its master. She is willing to acknowledge you if you fight an Elite, Special or Boss monster with a level equal or superior to yours together with your companion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011302
text: You have defeated a powerful opponent together with your companion. Talk to the Hackapell Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011303
text: It looks like the Miko Master is procrastinating again. Talk to her.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011304
text: Appease the Divine Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011305
text: The Miko Master says the divine spirit is angry for missing the sound of music. She believes the spirit can be appeased by the tune of a trumpet. Play the trumpet for the spirit at Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011306
text: You have appeased the divine spirit with the sound of your trumpet. Return to the Miko Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011307
text: Talk to the Warlock Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011308
text: Defeat the Evil Spirit

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011309
text: You have promised the Warlock Master that you would defeat the evil spirit for her. Use the Warlock Master's detector to find the spirit, then catch it with the draining orb.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011310
text: The Warlock Master is wondering about what happened to the evil spirit in the Mokusul Chamber. Talk to her about it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011311
text: Quality Certificate [Appraiser Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011312
text: Talk to the Appraiser Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011313
text: Talk to the Appraiser Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011314
text: Pick Up the Objects for the Appraiser Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011315
text: Pick up the family heirloom from the Fencer Master and the accessories from Jurus and deliver them to the Appraiser Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011316
text: Deliver the Quality Certificates

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011317
text: Deliver the Certificates to the Fencer Master and Accessory Merchant Jurus

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170313_011318
text: Talk to the Appraiser Master

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011319
text: Priest Aden is investigating how to release Naktis' curse so he wants to look at the reports of other priests. Obtain the reports from Yosana at Grand Corridor, Gadan at Penitence Route of Great Cathedral, and from Prosit at Sanctuary.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011320
text: Talk to Bishop Aurelius at the Grand Corridor

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011321
text: Acquired Maven's First Key. Talk to Bishop Aurelius who is waiting at the Grand Corridor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011322
text: Pass through the Penitence Route at the upper side of the Grand Corridor and enter the Grand Corridor to meet Aurelius.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011323
text: Priest Roana told you that the curse at Penitence Route is a different kind of curse and asked you to find its true origin. Activate all the Altars of Purification at Penitence Route.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011324
text: You've activated all the Altars of Purification at Penitence Route. Talk to Priest Roana again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011325
text: Look for documents that describe ways to transform into a demon at the Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011326
text: Bishop Aurelius told you that before you find the next key, you should look for documents that describe ways to transform into a demon. Look for the documents that describe ways to transform into a demon.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011327
text: There are many orbs that are spreading the curse at various places in the Sanctuary. You can't destroy them normally so collect them and bring them to Priest Prosit.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011328
text: All Areas of the Sanctuary

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011329
text: Move to Drill Ground of Confliction with Amanda

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011330
text: You found a dud bomb at the Fortress of the Land. Ask the Sapper Master about how to handle it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011331
text: Move to Drill Ground of Confliction

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011332
text: As Grave Robber Amanda instructed, move to the Drill Ground of Confliction.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011333
text: Speak with Grave Robber Amanda in the Residents' Area of the Fortress of the Land

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011334
text: What you found in the secret area is a strange scroll. Move back to the residents' area and talk with Amanda again.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011335
text: Defeat White Dandels at the Resident Quarter and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011336
text: You finally got the certification ticket that ensures safe access to the storage quarter. Speak to the Old Manager.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011337
text: The Old Manager has left for the Storage Quarter and will be waiting for you there. This is your chance to leave a note for Amanda to make her own certification ticket.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011338
text: Speak with the Old Manager in the Storage Quarter

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011339
text: Left the note safely. Go to the Old Manager in the Storage Quarter.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011340
text: You met with the Old Manager. Ask the Old Manager on what to do to get the revelation.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011341
text: Install the owl sculpture in the Storage Quarter of the Fortress of the Land. After that, lead the lost spirits to the owl sculpture.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011342
text: The Cataphract Master told you that he will teach you after finishing a test. Defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while riding your companion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011343
text: You have obtained a fragment exuding a faint divine energy. Find a priest who can help you analyze the fragment. Start with Priest Aden at the Main Chamber.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011344
text: Find Priest Ruodell at the Grand Corridor of the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170330_011345
text: Priest Ruodell believes your wand could be helpful to Priest Goda, who is creating a magic circle at the Sanctuary. Go and speak with Priest Goda.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170420_011346
text: You will need a shovel to dig through the soil!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170420_011347
text: Defeat Blue Temple Slaves and Collect %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170420_011348
text: To impress the Murmillo Master, you must defeat either a monster 3 levels or more above yourself, or boss monster of up to 5 levels below you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170510_011349
text: The Hackapell Master believes that the best companion is the one that fights strong opponents together with its master. She is willing to acknowledge you if you fight a monster with a level equal or superior to yours together with your companion.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170726_011350
text: Defeat the Meleech and Obtain %s

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170726_011351
text: Farm Soldier Upham says he was separated from his colleagues after a monster attack. Help him arrive safely to General Buros.{nl}This quest will cancel automatically if you move to another map.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170803_011352
text: If you don't have a Hawk, you can adopt one for free at the Companion Trader!

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170912_011353
text: You can easily find the Beaj flowers and scented herbs at Uskis Arable Land.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20170912_011354
text: Priest Raeli believes a scented candle made with the power of Goddess Austeja could help relieve the angry Rabees and Honeybeans. Find some fragrant herbs and Beaj flowers to make the candle.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20171128_011355
text: If someone opposes me, the inclination to fight is always there.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20171128_011356
text: The history of the Bullet Marker has just begun.{nl}So I believe that the start of every great Bullet Marker's history is to have with them pride and self-respect.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180208_011357
text: Iona

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180208_011358
text: It's been hard taking care of the bees after they became aggressive.{nl}The people of the village have been trying, but it's not easy.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180208_011359
text: Because of the bee problem, we can no longer make our typical honey liquor.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011360
text: I am the only one left in the Legwyn family, so each symbol is important to me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011361
text: It's okay if it's not intact.{nl}If we at least have the seal of the family, we can let the rest of the world know that the Legwyn family is still alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011362
text: How horrible...{nl}If I become the official heir of the Legwyn family, I will not forget this.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011363
text: A request came in, are you interested?{nl} This will be a good way to test your skills.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011364
text: Highly impressive. You've proven your skill.{nl}It's nice to know that we can work together if another request comes in. Thanks.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011365
text: You will help? Thank you.{nl}From my sources a Poata in Greene Manor should be carrying the ornament.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011366
text: Please check if the Poata has the Legwyn family ornament.{nl} Please... I request this of you.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011367
text: This... this is the ornament of the Legwyn family.{nl} I cannot thank you enough for finding it for me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011368
text: The world knows me as the Squire Master.{nl}But, I am also the sole survivor of the Legwyn family.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011369
text: As the last of the family I wish to restore its name.{nl}If you come across the Seal of our family at the Legwyn Family Residence please bring it to me. Please...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011370
text: There are a lot of requests out there, but this one is too good to miss, no?{nl} What do you think? Give it a shot?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011371
text: Seems like you did a very good job after all.{nl}It was a difficult task, but I have to admit you have skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011372
text: You say you want to learn about us?{nl}Well then, it would help you if you learned about the research carried out by earlier Psychokinos.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011373
text: From your face I can tell the tomes were helpful.{nl}That is Psychokinos. Enticing, don't you agree? Hehehe.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011374
text: Attitude Towards the Dark Property [Elementalist Advancement]

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011375
text: A Long Tail Gets Caught

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011376
text: Honor of the Legwyn Family

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011377
text: Legwyn Family's Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011378
text: The Master of Poison

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011379
text: Magic Studies of Psychokino

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011380
text: The Scout Master wants to check your abilities. Defeat Deadborn at District 1 of Demon Prison and return to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011381
text: Retrieve the Legwyn Family Ornament from the Poata

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011382
text: The Squire Master is looking for the ornament the Legwyn family. Defeat Poata at Greene Manor and retrieve the ornament.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180418_011383
text: Defeat Monsters and Obtain Fragments of Legwyn's Seal

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180517_011384
text: Ah, now I've received the order.{nl}Return to Commander Julian.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180517_011385
text: That was great. You were of great help to this mission. {nl}What do you think about enlisting to the army?

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180517_011386
text: Savior, you are the one that will take the Goddess' Revelation and save this world from the demons,{nl}and truly make this world complete by fulfilling their will. {nl}The time is nigh.{nl}I will be waiting for you in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180629_011387
text: Whenever you're lost, just listen closely.{nl}The melody will guide all those who have done good.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180629_011388
text: Pied Pipers can overcome any calamity.{nl}As long as their flute keeps playing.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180827_011389
text: Defeat Poata and Retrieve the Legwyn Family Crest

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180914_011390
text: The candle is complete.{nl}Now you only need to place it where the Rabees and Honeybeans live.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20180914_011391
text: Rabees and Honeybeans live at the Dina Bee Farm.{nl}Go there and place the candle near the monsters.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190104_011392
text: Looks like this necklace and collection belongs to you now.{nl}If it wasn't for you, Maven's teachings would have been left as a curse.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190104_011393
text: With the warp magic circle under me, you could quickly go to the Room of Ancestral Rituals.{nl}I wish for your success...

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190104_011394
text: I already gave up hope that I will become free a few hundreds of years ago.{nl}Even now, I have little hope for it.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190104_011395
text: I will tell you one more time. Don't consider this Archon as similar to the one in your era.{nl}It will be a difficult fight without using the seal.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190104_011396
text: The Hackapell charge into battle with their trusty companions.{nl}We don't have a set combat style.{nl}Pistols, daggers, swords, shields, bows; you can use anything that you feel comfortable with.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190611_011397
text: I could not tell you the truth as Hauberk was near you.{nl}Please forgive me.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20190820_011398
text: Even now, Hauberk's servants think Nuaele is Hauberk. {nl}But if Hauberk gets back his marks, then they will realize who the real master is. {nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20200128_011399
text: Ah, is this the first time you've seen our merchants?{nl}I fully understand. It's because we've only done our business in secret.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20200129_011400
text: The Man Who Destroyed the Tower

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20200129_011401
text: The Beholder's Conciliation

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20200129_011402
text: Proceed through Arka Chapel and to the Reception Room to solve the mystery of the Platform of Love.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20200129_011403
text: You have lured enough demons to Apgaule Altar.{nl}Open the inventory to use the Spirit's Scripture to summon Bishop Aurelius to talk to him.

name: QUEST_LV_0200_20200129_011404
text: The Beholder has appeared at the Penitence Route of the Great Cathedral.{nl}Talk to the Beholder.
